[\[24a.1\]]a hoHsra kas dgyes shing 'khril/_/dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus/_/tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni/_/zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs na/_/bdud bzhi gnon pa'i tshul du bzhugs/_/bka' las mi 'da' 
[\[24a.2\]]thugs dam skong /_/'das na lha yang brlag pa'i phyir/_/lha chen mang po'i klad 'gems shing /_/bsod nams sku yang chem chem gsol/_/rdo rje b+han d+har ldan pa yis/_/khrag chen po yang dkrug cing gsol/_/zangs gri rnon pos yan lag gcod/_/
[\[24a.3\]]rnge'u chung rdung zhing kha T+waM 'phen/_/sha khrag za ba'i rnal 'byor ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang /_/dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis/_/se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni/_/zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin du/_/khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs/_/
[\[24a.4\]]gzhal yas dmar nag chen po nas/_/sangs rgyas sku yi yum chen mo/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/log par lta ba'i bdud rnams kun/_/ro la brkam pa'i za stangs kyis/_/rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du/_/khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du 
[\[24a.5\]]stobs/_/rol cig sprul cig rnal 'byor ma/_/sod cig longs shig rnal 'byor ma/_/gtogs shig sbyongs shig rnal 'byor ma/_/choms shig choms shig rnal 'byor ma/_/khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs par/_/gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de/_/de 
[\[24a.6\]]bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na/_/gsad pa'i las la shin tu dgyes/_/drongs shig drongs shig dzaHdzaHdzaH/_/chings shig chings shig hU~M hU~M hU~M/_/sdoms shig sdoms shig ha ha ha/_/sgrol cig sgrol cig phaT phaT phaT/_/de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag_/oM hU~M ta 
[\[24a.7\]]thA ga ta su pa u go ba/_kro d+ha ki li/_sa ma ya yo gi ni/_ma hA maN+Da la/_ar+g+haM pra tits+tsha/_kA la kriSh+Na pi ta lo hi ti dzA la su khe na yA mi/_yo ga kA ya/_sarba bud+d+ha la/_ma hA he ru ka_/sa ma ya yo ga ru lu yot+ta ma dz+wa la ni/_ha na d+ha ha rU pe pa dzaH/_sarba sid+d+hi 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]kA ru NI ka_/ma ha su khe na/_ba tha ra su khe nas ma ya yo ga dzA la a su A/_/bo ga yo gi sid+d+hi/_a la la hoH/_mu khA gsod byed seng ge'i mgo/_/ser nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs kyis/_/phyag gi thal mo bsnol nas ni/_/khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du 
[\[24b.2\]]stobs/_/khro gnyer spyan bgrad mche gtsigs shing /_/spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can/_/mche tshogs mang po'i 'khor du byas/_/zhe sdang 'joms ma'i za byed ma/_/ma hA rak+tas sku brgyan cing /_/dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/_/mthing nag 
[\[24b.3\]]seng ge'i ral pa phyar/_/thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan/_/ye shes sku yi cha lugs na/_/mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol/_/sti ra chung ngu mang po'i tshogs/_/brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas/_/dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil nas/_/tsham ngam 
[\[24b.4\]]brkyang bskum chen pos ni/_/zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs bzhugs/_/bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong /_/srog chags mang po'i snying 'dren cing /_/bsod nams lus kyang chem chem gsol/_/b+han d+ha rak+tas zhal du stobs/_/rdo rje klad 
[\[24b.5\]]'gems rnge'u chung rdung /_/zhing chen za ba'i mu khA ste/_/'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang /_/dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis/_/se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni/_/bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du/_/khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs/_/
[\[24b.6\]]khrag 'thung chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams/_/ro la brkam pa'i za stangs kyis/_/rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du/_/khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs/_/de 
[\[24b.7\]]bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag_/mu khA gsod byed stag gi mgo/_/dmar nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs can/_/phyag gnyis bdud rtsi thal sbyar zhing /_/shin tu dga' ba'i mdangs kyis 'khril/_/khro gnyer spyan bgrad mche gtsigs shing /_/spyan 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can/_/mche tshogs mang po'i 'khor du byas/_/nga rgyal 'joms pa'i za byed ma/_/ma hA rak+tas sku brgyan cing /_/dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/_/thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan/_/ye shes 
[\[25a.2\]]sku yi cha lugs ni/_/mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol/_/se ral kha yi tshul dag tu/_/thod rlon phreng bas lus brgyan cing /_/dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus/_/tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni/_/zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs/_/
[\[25a.3\]]bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong /_/srog chags mang po'i snying 'dren cing /_/bsod nams lus kyang chem chem gsol/_/b+han d+ha rak+ta zhal du stobs/_/dgra stas klad 'gems lcags kyus 'dren/_/rnge'u chung rdung zhing stir chen za/_/'jigs su rung ba'i 
[\[25a.4\]]rkan sgra dang /_/dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis/_/se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni/_/bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du/_/khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs/_/khrag 'thung chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/rab tu 
[\[25a.5\]]gcod pa'i bgegs chen rnams/_/ro la brkam pa'i za stabs kyis/_/rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du/_/khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs/_/de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag_/mu khA gsod byed dur rkun mgo_/sngo gnag gyad kyi 'gying stabs kyis/_/stir chung za 
[\[25a.6\]]zhing gtso la stobs/_/khro gnyer spyan bgrad mche gtsigs shing /_/spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can/_/mche tshogs mang po 'khor du byas/_/'dod chags 'joms ma'i za byed ma/_/thal chen rak+tas sku brgyan cing /_/dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir 
[\[25a.7\]]bgrad/_/thod rlon tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan/_/ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni/_/mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol/_/se ral kha yi tshul dag tu/_/thod rlon mang po'i phreng bas brgyan/_/dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus/_/tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]ni/_/zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs/_/bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong /_/srog chags chen po'i snying 'dren cing /_/bsod nams lus kyang chem chem gsol/_/spu gris mgo gcod rnge'u rdung zhing /_/kha T+wAM 'phen cing b+han d+ha 'thung /_/gsod la 
[\[25b.2\]]dga' ba'i mu khA ste/_/zhags pas 'ching ba'i mkha' 'gro ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang /_/dgyes pa chen mo'i spyugs pa yis/_/se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams/_/
[\[25b.3\]]ro la brkam pa'i za stangs kyis/_/rab tu drangs te tshul bzhin du/_/khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs/_/de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag_/mu khA gsod byed shwa na'i mgo/_/mthing nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs can/_/glo snying 'dren cing gtso la stobs/_/khro 
[\[25b.4\]]gnyer spyan bgrad mche gtsigs shing /_/spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can/_/mche tshogs mang po'i 'khor du byas/_/phrag dog 'joms pa'i za byed ma/_/thal chen khrag gis sku brgyan can/_/dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/_/thod rlon 
[\[25b.5\]]tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan/_/ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni/_/mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol/_/sti ra chung ngu mang po'i tshogs/_/brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas/_/dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus/_/tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos 
[\[25b.6\]]ni/_/zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs/_/bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong /_/srog chags mang po'i snying 'dren cing /_/bsod nams lus kyang chem chem gsol/_/b+han d+ha rak+tas zhal du stobs/_/kha T+wAM 'phen cing rnge'u chung rdung /_/zhing 
[\[25b.7\]]chen za ba'i mu khA ste/_/'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang /_/dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis/_/se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni/_/bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du/_/khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs/_/khrag 'thung chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma/_/
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams/_/ro la brkam pa'i za stangs kyis/_/rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du/_/khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs/_/de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag_/mu khA gsod 
[\[26a.2\]]byed bya rgod mgo/_/dmar nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs can/_/zhing chen rgyu 'dren zhal du stobs/_/khro gnyer spyan bgrad zhal gdang sa shing /_/spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can/_/gshog tshogs mang po'i rgyan du byas/_/gti mug 'dzoms pa'i za 
[\[26a.3\]]byed ma/_/thal chen khrag gis sku brgyan cing /_/dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/_/thod rlon tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan/_/ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni/_/mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol/_/sti ra chung ngu mang po'i tshogs/_/brgyus nas sku 
[\[26a.4\]]yi rgyan du byas/_/dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus/_/tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni/_/zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs/_/bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong /_/srog chags mang po'i snying 'dren cing /_/bsod nams lus kyang chem 
[\[26a.5\]]chem gsol/_/b+han d+har 'thung zhing rnge'u chung rdung /_/zhing chung ril mid zangs gris 'debs/_/zhing chen za ba'i mu khA ste/_/'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang /_/dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis/_/se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni/_/bgegs chen 
[\[26a.6\]]drangs te tshul bzhin du/_/khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs/_/khrag 'thung chen mo mkha' 'gro ma/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams/_/rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du/_/ro la brkam pa'i za stangs 
[\[26a.7\]]kyis/_/khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs/_/de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag_/mu khA gsod byed snar mgo ring /_/ser nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs can/_/zhing chen lag gis gtso la stobs/_/khro gnyer spyan bgrad zhal gdangs shing /_/spyan gsum 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]'jigs pa'i sdang mig can/_/gshog tshogs mang po'i rgyan du byas/_/bka' las 'das pa za byed ma/_/ma hA rak+tas sku brgyan cing /_/dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/_/thod rlon tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan/_/ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni/_/mi 
[\[26b.2\]]'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol/_/sti ra chung ngu mang po'i tshogs/_/brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas/_/dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus/_/tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni/_/zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs/_/bka' las mi 'da' 
[\[26b.3\]]thugs dam skong /_/srog chags mang po'i snying nas 'dren/_/bsod nams lus kyang chem chem gsol/_/b+han d+ha rak+tas zhal du stobs/_/dbyug pas klad 'gems rnge'u chung rdung /_/zhing chen za ba'i mu khA ste/_/'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang /_/dgyes 
[\[26b.4\]]pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis/_/se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni/_/bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du/_/khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs/_/khrag 'thung chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/bar chad byed pa'i bgegs 
[\[26b.5\]]chen rnams/_/ro la brkam pa'i za stangs kyis/_/rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du/_/khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs/_/de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag_/mu khA gsod byed bya rog mgo/_/mthing nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs can/_/rdo rje klad 'gems 
[\[26b.6\]]spu gris gcod/_/b+han d+har khrag chen gtso la stobs/_/khro gnyer spyan bgrad zhal gdangs shing /_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/gshog tshogs mang po'i rgyan du byas/_/zhing bcu gso da cing za byed ma/_/ma hA rak+tas sku brgyan cing /_/dbu 
[\[26b.7\]]gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/_/thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan/_/ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni/_/mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol/_/sti ra chung ngu mang po'i tshogs/_/brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas/_/dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]dbus/_/tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni/_/zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs/_/bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong /_/srog chags mang po'i snying 'dren cing /_/bsod nams sku yang chem chem gsol/_/kha T+wAM 'phen cing 
[\[27a.2\]]rnge'u chung rdung /_/'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang /_/dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis/_/se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni/_/bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du/_/khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs/_/khrag 'thung chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma/_/stabs 
[\[27a.3\]]glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams/_/ro la brkam pa'i za stangs kyis/_/rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du/_/khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs/_/de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag_/mu khA gsod byed 'ug pa'i mgo/_/ser 
[\[27a.4\]]nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs kyis/_/lag gnyis b+han d+has khrag chen stobs/_/snying chen glo snying 'dren tshul du/_/khro gnyer spyan bgrad mche gtsigs shing /_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/gshog tshogs mang po'i rgyan du byas/_/sha khrag za ba'i mkha' 
[\[27a.5\]]'gro ma/_/ma hA rak+tas sku brgyan cing /_/dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/_/thod rlon tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan/_/ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni/_/mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol/_/sti ra chung ngu mang po'i tshogs/_/brgyus nas sku yi rgyan 
[\[27a.6\]]du byas/_/dur khrod chen po'i me chen dbus/_/tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni/_/zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs/_/bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong /_/srog chags chen po'i snying 'dren cing /_/bsod nams lus kyang chem chem 
[\[27a.7\]]gsol/_/lcags kyis 'dren cing rnge'u rdung rol/_/'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang /_/dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis/_/se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni/_/bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du/_/khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs/_/khrag 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]'thung chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams/_/ro la brkam pa'i za stangs kyis/_/rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du/_/khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs/_/de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag_/
[\[27b.2\]]khA hi khA hi/_rdo rje bka' yi pho nya rnams/_/rdo rje bran mo gtum bag can/_/'jigs pa'i gzugs can mang po ste/_/sna tshogs las rnams grub par byed/_/dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/dmar ser mi srin chags 
[\[27b.3\]]pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig pa la phyag drug gzugs/_/b+han d+has khrag chen gtso la stobs/_/g.yag chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing /_/sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/_/zhing za lcags kyus tri shUl 'phen/_/spu gris gsod cing rgyu 'dren zhags/_/thod 
[\[27b.4\]]rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de grub par byos/_/dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig 
[\[27b.5\]]can/_/dmar skya tshangs ma chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/b+han d+has khrag chen gtso la stobs/_/sbrul gdug mgo yi zhal gdangs shing /_/sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/_/rtse lnga rdo rje zhing chen za/_/kha T+wAM 
[\[27b.6\]]'phen cing lcags kyu zhags/_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum tshul gyis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin byed/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de grub par mdzod/_/dbang phyug tshogs 
[\[27b.7\]]kyi bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/ser nag khro mo chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/dril 'khrol dbyug to stir chen za/_/b+han d+has khrag chen gtso la stobs/_/gzig chen mgo yi zhal gdangs 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]shing /_/sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/_/lcags kyus 'dren tshul spu gris 'debs/_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya 
[\[28a.2\]]sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de grub par mdzod/_/dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/dkar dmar khyab 'jug chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/b+han d+has khrag chen gtso la 
[\[28a.3\]]stobs/_/bya bang mgo yi zhal gdangs nas/_/sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/_/sti ra khrag chen kha T+wA~M rde'u/_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya 
[\[28a.4\]]sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de grub par mdzod/_/dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/ser nag gzhon nu chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/zhing chen rgyu 'dren gtso la stobs/_/
[\[28a.5\]]pha wang mgo can zhal gdangs shing /_/sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/_/b+han dmar kha T+wAM 'khor lo 'dril/_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya 
[\[28a.6\]]sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de grub par mdzod/_/dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/dmar ser dbang mo chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/zhing chen khog 'dren 
[\[28a.7\]]gtso la stobs/_/dred chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing /_/sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/_/b+han dmar dbyug chen lcags kyus 'dril/_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de grub par byos/_/dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/dmar mo 'phrog chen chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/
[\[28b.2\]]zhing chen rgyu 'dren zhags pas stobs/_/dom chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing /_/sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/_/dril 'khrol lcags kyu dung dmar dbyug_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[28b.3\]]yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de grub par byos/_/dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/sngo nag bdud rtsi chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/
[\[28b.4\]]b+han d+has khrag chen gtso la stobs/_/chu srin mgo yi zhal gdangs shing /_/sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/_/kha T+wAM mda' 'phen rin chen yum/_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' 
[\[28b.5\]]bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de grub par byos/_/dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/sngo skya zhi ba chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/glo snying 'dren 
[\[28b.6\]]cing gtso la stobs/_/sdig chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing /_/sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/_/dril 'khro rtse lnga dung dmar dang /_/rin chen bum pa khros pas 'dzin/_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen 
[\[28b.7\]]gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de grub par byos/_/dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/nag mo be con chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/stir chen glo snying 'dren cing stobs/_/khra chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing /_/sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/_/khrag chen dung 'thung kha T+wAM 'phen/_/gris 'debs rgyu zhags dbang phyug ma/_/thod rlon g.yang 
[\[29a.2\]]gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de grub par byos/_/dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/
[\[29a.3\]]ser nag khro mo chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/b+han d+has khrag chen gtso la stobs/_/wa chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing /_/sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/_/zhing chen rgyu 'dren sti ra'i rde'u/_/rab tu gtum pas 
[\[29a.4\]]kha T+wAM 'phen/_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de grub par byos/_/dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/_/
[\[29a.5\]]'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/mthing nag za byed chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/stir chen snying 'dren gtso la stobs/_/stag chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing /_/sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/_/dung 
[\[29a.6\]]dmar dril 'khrol kha T+wAM gris/_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de grub par byos/_/dbang phyug tshogs kyi 
[\[29a.7\]]bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/dmar mo khrag 'thung chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/bgegs 'dul lcags kyus zhal du stobs/_/rgod chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing /_/sgra dang 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/_/dung dmar zhing dbyug kha T+wAM 'phen/_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de grub par byos/_/
[\[29b.2\]]dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/dmar mo khrag 'thung chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/b+han d+has khrag chen gtso la stobs/_/rta chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing /_/sgra dang bcas 
[\[29b.3\]]pas bka' bzhin byed/_/rtse lnga dril dbyug kha T+wAM 'phen/_/zhing chen za ba'i dbang phyug ma/_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 
[\[29b.4\]]'dod las de grub par byos/_/dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/dkar dmar gcig pu chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/b+han d+has khrag chen gtso la stobs/_/byi chen mgo yi zhal gdangs 
[\[29b.5\]]shing /_/sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/_/rdo rje tri shUl dril dbyug zhing /_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de grub 
[\[29b.6\]]par byos/_/dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/dmar nag yid 'phrog chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/stir chung za zhing gtso la stobs/_/sbyang chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing /_/
[\[29b.7\]]sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/_/kha T+wAM dung dmar lcags kyu gri/_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]grub par byos/_/dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/dkar dmar grub pa chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/stir chen glo snying gtso la stobs/_/bu shud mgo yi zhal gdangs 
[\[30a.2\]]shing /_/sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/_/pad+ma kha twAM dung dmar zhags/_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de 
[\[30a.3\]]grub par byos/_/dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' sdod ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/ljang ser klu mo chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/b+han d+has khrag chen gtso la stobs/_/sha chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing /_/sgra 
[\[30a.4\]]dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/_/rde'u rdung kha T+wAM gri 'debs zhing /_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de grub par byos/_/
[\[30a.5\]]dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/dmar nag gsod chen chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/stir chen lo snying gtso la stobs/_/spang ti mgo yi zhal gdangs shing /_/sgra dang bcas 
[\[30a.6\]]pas bka' bzhin byed/_/rdo rje ral gri rnge'u chung rdung /_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de grub par byos/_/dbang 
[\[30a.7\]]phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/ljang dmar me mo chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/zhing chen rgyu 'dren zhal du stobs/_/skyin chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing /_/sgra dang bcas pas 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]bka' bzhin byed/_/dung dmar kha T+wAM lcags kyu dril/_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de grub par byos/_/dbang phyug 
[\[30b.2\]]tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/ljang ser phag mo chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/b+han d+has khrag chen gtso la stobs/_/phag chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing /_/sgra dang bcas pas 
[\[30b.3\]]bka' bzhin byed/_/rtse lnga zhing za kha T+wAM gri/_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de grub par byos/_/dbang phyug 
[\[30b.4\]]tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/ljang nag sna chad chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/bdud rtsi dung dmar zhal du stobs/_/rnga chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing /_/sgra dang bcas pas bka' 
[\[30b.5\]]bzhin byed/_/kha T+wAM grangs gri zhags pa 'dzin/_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de grub par byos/_/dbang phyug 
[\[30b.6\]]tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/sngo skya chu mo chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/zhing chen glo snying 'dren cing stobs/_/bya rog mgo yi zhal gdangs shing /_/sgra dang bcas pas bka' 
[\[30b.7\]]bzhin byed/_/dung dmar dril 'khrol kha T+wAM gri/_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de grub par byos/_/
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/dmar skya rgan mo chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/bdud rtsi dung dmar zhal du stobs/_/skeg chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing /_/sgra 
[\[31a.2\]]dang bcas pas bka' bzhin du/_/dbyug dril kha T+wAM rgyu 'dren cing /_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de grub par byos/_/
[\[31a.3\]]dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/gnag cing nag mo chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/zhing chung za zhing gtso la stobs/_/khu byug mgo yi zhal gdangs shing /_/sgra dang bcas pas 
[\[31a.4\]]bka' bzhin byed/_/lcags kyu dung dmar kha T+wAM gri/_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de grub par byos/_/dbang phyug tshogs 
[\[31a.5\]]kyi bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/sngon mo ra na chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/zhing chen rgyu zhags 'debs shing stobs/_/ra chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing /_/sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/_/
[\[31a.6\]]dung dmar kha T+wAM dril chen zhags/_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de grub par byos/_/dbang phyug tshogs kyi 
[\[31a.7\]]bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/dmar mo bum rna chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/b+han d+has khrag chen gtso la stobs/_/spre'u chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing /_/sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/_/
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]zhing chen kha T+wAM 'phen tshul du/_/lcags sgrog kun 'dzin zangs gris 'debs/_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 'dod las de grub par byos/_/
[\[31b.2\]]dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/_/'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can/_/ljang nag gsus 'dzin chags pas 'gying /_/dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/zhing chen glo snying gtso la stobs/_/sbyang chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing /_/sgra dang bcas 
[\[31b.3\]]pas bka' bzhin byed/_/dril chen sgra sgrogs dung dmar 'thung /_/kha T+wAM 'phen cing rde'u chung za/_/thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas/_/brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon/_/rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du/_/stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/_/ci 
[\[31b.4\]]'dod las de grub par byos/_/pho nya rdo rje dbang phyug ma/_/cir yang 'gyur ba'i gzugs can rnams/_/'jigs pa'i gzugs can mang po yis/_/dam bcas bzhin du las kun byos/_/de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i sprin rnam par spros pa bdud btul ba'i 
[\[31b.5\]]le'u ste dgu ba'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje he ru ka khrag 'thung chen po rnams byang chub kyi sems kyi sprin las/_oM ma hA tsit+tA maN+Da la/_kro d+ha ha ha ha/_he he he/_phaT phaT phaT/_tsa tur yo gI ni hring hring hring /_tring tring tring /_mring mring mring /_
[\[31b.6\]]kring kring kring /_ha ha ha zhes brjod pas rdo rje he ru ka sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa khros pas rngam par gnas so/_/rat+na he ru ka sbyin pa'i khro ba mdzad do/_/chags pa'i he ru ka dang sku dbang gi tshul gyis shin tu khro ba mdzad do/_/las kyi he ru ka kun du mi mdzad pa med pa'i tshul 
[\[31b.7\]]gyis gdug pa'i khro bo chen po'o/_/de dag kyang rdo rje 'dzin ma khro mo dang /_/rin chen dbyug to ma zhes bya ba'i khro mo dang /_/pad+ma b+han d+ha 'dzin ma zhes bya ba'i khro mo dang /_/las kyi dbyug to ma zhes bya ba'i khro mo dang bcas pa rnams brkyang bskum gyi stabs kyis dpal he 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]ru ka la 'khril nas gnyis su med pa'i tshul kyis mnyam pa chen por gnas so/_/de'i phyi rim na rnal 'byor chen mo dkar mo dang /_/rnal 'byor chen mo skul byed ma dang /_gsod byed ma dang /_za byed ma dang /_rnal 'byor ma dang /_gtum mo dang /_rnal 
[\[32a.2\]]'byor ma las grub par byed ma dang /_rdo rje rigs byed ma dang /_dbang sdud chen mo dang /_drag po'i cha byad kyis khrag dang keng rus kyi dkyil na zhabs gnyis thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du brkyang bskum gyi tshul du gnas so/_/de'i phyi rim na rdo rje phra men chen mo dang /_seng 
[\[32a.3\]]ge mgo chen mo stabs dang ldan ma dang /_/stag mgo chen mo stabs dang ldan ma dang /_myos byed rta mgo chen mo dang /_'ug pa'i mgo can dang /_bya rgod mgo gsod byed stabs chen mo dang /_mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]mgo can gcod byed chen mo dang /_wa'i mgo can 
[\[32a.4\]]skul byed ma'i stabs chen mo dang /_rab tu sgra 'byin gyi mgo can dang /_rnam par rab tu sgyus gsod mdzad pha wang mgo can chen mo dang /_mi gtong bar za bar byed ma phag gi mgo can zhe sdang chen mo rnams rang rang gi lag cha dang /_gdug pa'i mtshon dang chas nas 
[\[32a.5\]]gnas par mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba las rnam par bsgyur ba'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo ste le'u bcu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das gtum pa chen mo dang /_rnam par sgyur ba'i tshogs rmongs ba sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[32a.6\]]gyis dgyes par mdzad de 'di dag phyung bas kun du g.yo ba chen po mdzad do/_/o~M sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_ma hA shrI he ru ka sarba kha thaM/_du ba tsa ma hA tsaN+Da hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT/_o~M ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_ma hA rat+na he ru ka sarba kha taM d+hu/_pa tsa ma hA tsaN+Da trA~M trA~M 
[\[32a.7\]]trA~M/_phaT phaT phaT/_o~M sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_ma hA shrI pad+ma he ru ka sarba kha taM ma d+hu/_hrIM hrIM hrIM hrIM hrIM/_phaT phaT phaT/_o~M sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA yA/_ma hA shrI karma he ru ka sarba kha taM d+hu/_pa tsa ma hA tsaN+Da ha ha ha/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT/_ha la ha 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]la ha la hU~M/_oM sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_bud+d+ha lo tsa nA DA ki ni/_ha na ha na ha na/_hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M sarba kA ru Ni kA ya/_badzra lo tsa na ma hA DA ki ni d+ha ka d+ha ka hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_rat+na lo tsa na DA ki ni/_pa tsa pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M sarba ma hA kA ru Ni 
[\[32b.2\]]kA ya/_ma hA pad+ma lo tsa na DA ki ni d+ha ha d+ha ha d+ha ha/_hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_karma lo tsa na ma hA DA ki ni tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hU~M hU~M hU~M/_hrU~M hrU~M ha~M/_hra~M hra~M hra~M/_ha ha ha/_phaT phaT phaT/_o~M ru lu gau rI/_o~M ru lu tsau rI/_o~M ru lu pra mo hA/_o~M ru lu be ta lI/_o~M 
[\[32b.3\]]ru lu tsaN+Da lI/_o~M ru lu g+hasma ri/_oM ru lu sma shA nI/_bin d+ha bin d+ha/_g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma/_ha na ha na ha na/_hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/_o~M tsau ra ka ra sid+ha he he/_o~M gau ra ka ra byA g+h+ri he he/_o~M tsai ra ka ka ra sri gla he he/_o~M shwa na ka ra gr-i D+ha he he/_o~M kAng ka ka ra kA ka phaT phaT/_
[\[32b.4\]]o~M ga tA ka ra pany+tsa ma he he phaT/_hasta ka ra U lu ka he he he/_hriM hriM hriM/_phaT phaT/_ma hA tsa tu ra yo gi ni ha ha ha/_he he he/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT/_b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/_b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/_b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/_b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/_b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/_ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu 
[\[32b.5\]]ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu/_khA hi khA hi khA hi khA hi khA hi khA hi/_phaT phaT phaT/_sa ma ya sa ma ya/_yo ga yo gi ni phaT phaT phaT/_hU~M hU~M hU~M zhes brjod pas thams cad rab tu brgyal/_rab tu dngangs/_rab tu myos/_rab tu bsgral bar gyur to/_/bsnams 
[\[32b.6\]]shing gsol nas mi gnas par mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mnyes pa las sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs rngam pa'i stabs kyis dzaHdzaHdzaH_hU~M hU~M hoHhoHzhes par mdzad do/_/mngon 
[\[32b.7\]]spyod kyi las kyi sbyor ba sbyor ba chen po mdzad do/_/gsang ba'i rdo rje'i mdzod nas gsang ba'i yum gyi pad+ma yongs su yangs pa'i nang du sems can gyi tshogs byang chub sems su mdzad nas mkha' phab ste sras su bskyed par mdzad de mdzad nas dran pa rnyed do/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]kyi sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa me dpung bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshon cha dang dbu dang zhal mang zhing skyi bung zhes byed pa dngangs shing gsod par mthong ste smras pa/_rab tu 'jigs pa'i khro bo rnams/_/shin tu bde ba'i gnas shig nas/_/bton pa skal ba rab tu 
[\[33a.2\]]chung /_/da ni ci mdzad la gor mdzod/_/lha cig rje cig 'o na zhes smras pa'i tshig gis sems can gyi mtshan ma 'byongs bar gyur par mkhyen to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos rab tu smros la gnong long shig_/rje la gus par dam nos la/_/'di la 
[\[33a.3\]]gnas phar skal med pas/_/phyi yi dkyil 'khor sa la 'dug_/ces bka' stsal pas dngangs pa rtas par gyur te/_rdo rje bran mo'i mna' bor nas smras pa/_skyes mchog lha rjes su zhig lags/_/'bangs dang bka' stsal bdag cag nyan/_/phyi yi gnas 
[\[33a.4\]]su gnas su bgyi/_/ma sring bran g.yog 'khor yug rnams/_/'jigs pa'i skus ni gzhes su gsol/_/ci mdzad khyod mkhyen gzhes su gsol/_/yun du skal ldan gzhes su gsol/_/bdag cag 'jig rten skyong ba'i rnams/_/[{]di ring [,]de ring [}]dam mnos 
[\[33a.5\]]slan chad du/_/'khor rnams skyong bar mi bgyid dam/_/bka' bzhin las kun mi sgrub bam/_/theg pa 'dzin la mi stong ngam/_/bzhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor mi zin na/_/da lta bzhin du 'jigs pa dang /_/shi nas dmyal bar shog ces smras te 
[\[33a.6\]]mna' bor ro/_/de nas khrag 'thung chen pos cang mi gsung bar bzhugs pa las rab tu gsod byed ma dang /_/tshangs ba mo dang /_gzhon nu mo dang /_dbang mo dang /_grub mo dang /_bskyod chen mo dang /_rdo rjer gdong chen mo dang /_mi mo rlag par 
[\[33a.7\]]byed pa chen mo dang /_/phag mo gsod byed ma dang /_gtum par mdzad ma dang /_brlan par mdzad ma dang /_phag chen mo dang /_nag mo ral pa chen mo dang /_rdo rje 'dzin ma chen mo dang /_rdo rje nag mo chen mo dang /_rdo rje rgan byad chen mo dang /_rdo rje yid 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]'phrog par byed ma dang /_rab tu gcig tu zab mo dang /_rdo rje srin mo'i cha byad chen mo dang /_sngo gnag chen mo dang /_ljang nag chen mo dang /_be con chen mo dang /_zhi ba bum sna chen mo dang /_las la grub pa mo dang /_bka' nyan par byed ma dang /_tsham ngam gyi 
[\[33b.2\]]gzugs dang /_drag shul ma dang /_nyul ba mor tshul ston ma de dag la sogs pa ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams rab tu gus par bka' nyan te/_rdo rje bran mor bka' nyan te/_/rdo rje bran mor dam blangs nas/_/ci 'dod las rnams bdag cag bgyid/_/ces mna' 
[\[33b.3\]]bor te 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang /_mtshon cha dang /_gnas pa'i gzhir bcas te phyi'i snam bu la gnas pa'i las byed par gnas so/_/de dag gi dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa bshad de/_dkyil 'khor phyi rol gru bzhir bcas/_/dbus su zla gam rak+tar bcas/_/
[\[33b.4\]]bA su twA yi maN+Da la/_/dri chu rak+ta'i tshom bur bri/_/hrIHlas dbus su [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad gzugs/_/yang na dbu gsum phyag drug pa/_/thod pa b+han d+ha dmar chen bkang /_/brgyad dam nyi shu dgu ru ldan/_/yang na lnga dang ldan pa la/_/lnga pa'i yi ges byin gyis brlab/_/
[\[33b.5\]]zad 'phro phud dang ldan pa la/_/uts+tshuSh+Ta yi sngags kyis bzlas/_/thod pa dmar blugs btung bya zhing /_/ming ngam b+h+yo 'am ru lu yis/_/mngon sum phyin par bos nas ni/_/kha nas rak+tas rab gtor te/_/he ru ka yi las rnams kun/_/gong nas 'byung ba'i las 
[\[33b.6\]]bzhin bya/_/sgeg mo na chung de dag la/_/dbang gi chags pas 'dod spyad de/_/ta ma la yi phur bus gdab/_/ci 'dod las rnams grub par sbyin/_/chags dang gsod dang rgyags pa che/_/mnyam pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin gyis/_/tsau ra ka ra'i 'khor rnams kyang /_/bzhi 
[\[33b.7\]]yi las la 'jug par ni/_/ming tsam 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/bskul na rtse gcig las rnams 'grub/_/de nas kun du bzang mo chen mos ming tsam du chos thams cad gnas par mkhyen to/_/gsang ba sgyu 'phrul chen po 'di bsdu ba chen po mdzad do/_/
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]de nas sems dpa' rnal 'byor mchog_/kun kyang sems dpa' rnal 'byor mchog_/chos kun ming tsam rnal 'byor yin/_/ming tsam rnal 'byor ma yin par/_/sems dpa' rnal 'byor 'ga' yang med/_/de nyid dus gsum rang bzhin te/_/de nyid 
[\[34a.2\]]kun du bzang mo mchog_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud dag las/_/sems ma rdo rje de dag las/_/gsang ba'i nges don gang yang med/_/ces chos thams cad 'dus pa chen mor mkhyen to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi he ru ka 'dus pa chen mo'i dkyil 'khor te 
[\[34a.3\]]le'u bcu gnyis pa'o//_//a hoHrgyu nyid stong pas 'bras bu mngon sum pa/_/byin gyis brlab tu med pas byin gyis brlab pas 'grub/_/sangs rgyas mdzad pa nyid kyang sems can yin zhes rgyal bas gsungs/_/de nyid mi mdzad med par shes pa kun gyi 
[\[34a.4\]]nang na rab tu bsngags/_/chags pa mi gtong chags pa mngon sum dgongs pa yin pas dkyil 'khor gong ma kun gyi dang /_/sgrub la dga' bas bsgrub tu med phyir bsgrubs pas 'grub ces rgyal bas rab tu gsungs/_/pho mo med phyir pho mo snang la dga' ba spyod 
[\[34a.5\]]brtson rgyal bas 'grub ces bsgrub pa kun gyis gsungs/_/stong par rtogs la spyod la g.yel ba rnal 'byor min zhes rgyal bas gsungs/_/med la gtod cing dge sdig 'chol ba sdig can yin par rab tu gsal/_/dge sdig yod phyir brtson pas 'grub ces theg 
[\[34a.6\]]pa kun las 'byung /_/bag dang mi ldan rang bzhin med par gnas pa la/_/gtso mchog mi bkur khungs phyin chos la mi brtson sems can yin par mngon sum gsal bar snang /_/de bas sgyu 'phrul gsang ba mchog 'di bu rnams gang zhig nyan brtson pas/_/
[\[34a.7\]]'grus pa bslabs pa bag dang ldan pa lobs pa dang por ngo shes bya/_/skad cig gzugs la 'phangs pa med par gus ldan gsang ba'i sdud pa yin/_/rdo rje slob dpon mchog la dad pas sangs rgyas ma lus kun la mchod pa chen po yin/_/lam la 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]mkhas pas rdo rje slob dpon bkur ba'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_rnal 'byor ma rnams rab tu 'dun pa chen po skyes te/_mchod pa chen po bkur stis mchod/_/dkyil 'khor dang po phun sum tshogs/_/gnyis pa gsang ba'i mchod pa la/_/
[\[34b.2\]]gsum pa rol pa gleng slong ba/_/khros pa'i sprin las bdud rnams btul/_/don gcig sgyu 'phrul bka' stsal pa/_/tshogs kyi mchod pa dgyes pa che/_/dus gsum rtag tu ma byung ba/_/lam la mkhas pa yin par bsngags/_/brtson dang ldan pas rab mnyan dang /_/
[\[34b.3\]]gsang ba'i sgrub pa 'di bsgrub pa/_/kun kyang kun du bzang po yin/_/bcom ldan 'das rmongs pa sel ba zhes bya ba sgyu 'phrul chen po rdzogs so//_//[{D837}]bod skad du/_gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma chen po'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[34b.4\]]'das dpal kun du bzang po ye shes bla ma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na/_/sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po ni/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi bla ma ste/_/rnal 'byor kun gyi gsang mchog bde/_/gnas gsang ba na bzhugs nas su/_/snying po bla ma 'di 
[\[34b.5\]]skad bshad/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba bla ma'i longs spyod chen po phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje'i bdag nyid can/_ma lus mi 
[\[34b.6\]]lus lus pa med pa thams cad kyang so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te/_shin tu gsang ba bla ma chen po'i dbyings 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na/_gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo gsal ba la ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal 
[\[34b.7\]]yas khang nam mkha'i dbyings ltar rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa/_yon tan bla ma chen po dpag tu med pas rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gyur pa/_lhag pa'i ye shes rin po che bla ma'i glo 'bur bzhis mdzes pa/_rtse mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad so so ma yin tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shes bla mas kun du 'khyil ba/_ye shes bla ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang /_kha dog la sogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad par du gyur pa/_
[\[35a.2\]]spags pa/_tshad dpag tu med pa/_ye shes rin po che bla ma'i phreng ba dang /_chun 'phyang dang /_shar bu'i rgyan dang /_gzugs dang sgra dang /_dri ro reg bya la sogs pa mi sgrib par gsal bar rang byung la/_gsal ba'i rgyan khyad par can bla mas bklubs pa/_tshad med pa 
[\[35a.3\]]bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can/_rnam par thar ba brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa/_phyi dang nang med pa kun yang bla ma chen po nang du gyur pa/_shin tu gsang ba bas khyab bdal ba'i bla ma chen po'i gzhal yas khang na pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i khri/_mi 'jigs 
[\[35a.4\]]pa seng ge'i khri dang /_stobs glang po che'i khri dang /_rdzu 'phrul rta'i khri dang /_dbang rma bya'i khri dang /_thogs pa med pa nam mkha' lding gi khri dang /_rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang /_gos pa med pa pad+ma rin po che'i gdan brtsegs 
[\[35a.5\]]pa ni/_ye nas gsang ba bla ma'i phyir/_/yum gyi gzhal yas phyogs bcur 'bar/_/ye nas pha rol phyin pa'i phyir/_/thogs pa med pa'i khri rkang brtan/_/rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal phyir/_/nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan 'bar zhing /_/gdod nas dri 
[\[35a.6\]]ma med pa'i phyir/_/rnam par dag pa pad+mo gdan/_/re ba yid bzhin skong ba'i phyir/_/yid bzhin rin chen gter gyi gdan/_/ma bsags lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i phyir/_/sna tshogs dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyan/_/yon tan chen po'i gdan stengs 
[\[35a.7\]]na/_/sku mdun dang rgyab med par thams cad tu zhal bla ma tha le bar gsal zhing mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pas thams cad du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las sna tshogs par snang ba/_thabs dang shes rab kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/_ye shes drug gi phyag ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i phyag rgya can/_sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang ldan pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po bla ma dang /_
[\[35b.2\]]btsun mo dam pa sra ba'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po bla ma dang /_btsun mo dam pa snang ba'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po bla ma dang /_btsun mo dam pa mnyen pa'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang /_de bzhin 
[\[35b.3\]]gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po bla ma dang /_btsun mo dam pa dro ba'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po bla ma dang /_btsun mo dam pa bskyod pa'i dbyings kyi bla ma la sogs pa ye shes rgyal po stangs dpyal kun kyang mthing ga dang /_dkar 
[\[35b.4\]]po dang /_ser po dang /_le brgan dang /_ljang gu'i mdog bla mar 'tsher ba ste/_gnyis su med par 'khril bas chos kyi dbyings kun tu mtha' yas par bla ma chen po'i spyod pas khyab pa ni 'di lta ste/_dper na til gyi gang bu'am mngar gyi sgrom bu bzhin kun du bde 
[\[35b.5\]]ba chen pos khyab par bzhugs so/_/de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong dbang bla ma dang /_btsun mo gzigs par bya ba'i bla ma dang /_byang chub chen po rdo rje thos dbang bla ma dang /_btsun mo gsan par bya ba'i bla ma dang /_byang chub chen po rdo rje snom dbang bla ma dang /_
[\[35b.6\]]btsun mo mnam par bya ba'i bla ma dang /_byang chub chen po rdo rje myang dbang bla ma dang /_btsun mo myang bar bya ba'i bla ma dang /_byang chub chen po rdo rje sogs shes bla ma dang /_btsun mo sgron ma'i bla ma dang /_byang chub chen po rdo rje gcod shes bla ma dang /_btsun mo gdug 
[\[35b.7\]]pa'i bla ma dang /_byang chub chen po rdo rje 'jug shes bla ma dang /_btsun mo char 'bebs bla ma dang /_byang chub chen po rdo rje 'dus pa'i bla ma dang /_btsun mo rgyas pa'i bla ma dang /_'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg g.yas bla ma dang /_btsun mo rtag par ma yin 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]pha'i bla ma dang /_'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg g.yon bla ma dang /_btsun mo chad par ma yin pa'i bla ma dang /_'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg gsang bla ma dang /_btsun mo bdag tu ma yin pa'i bla ma dang /_'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg 'dus bla ma dang /_/btsun mo mtshan mar ma yin pa'i bla ma 
[\[36a.2\]]dang /_de lta bu'i tshogs brjod kyis mi lang ba dang gnyis su med par gsang ba dgyes pa'i dbyings bla ma na bzhugs so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor bla ma de nyid kyi gsang ba bla ma 'di nyid 
[\[36a.3\]]kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las byung ngo /_/e ma'o de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid dbang sgyur dkyil 'khor bla ma'i ngang /_/ngang nyid rnam dag bde mchog gsang ba'i dbyings/_/dbyings nyid mnyam sbyor bde mchog rin 
[\[36a.4\]]chen gter/_/mi zad gter ldan bdud rtsi gsang ba'i bla/_/bla med byang chub thig le ya mtshan dkyil 'khor snang /_/rang snang ba nyid ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan rnam dag snang ba ni/_/sku gsung thugs yon phrin las sel med pa'i yid bzhin rin chen mi zad 
[\[36a.5\]]par ldan pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo bla ma rdo rje mchog gi gnas nyid do/_/rdo rje gsang ba bla ma'i nges don du'o/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma las dbyings dang ye shes gsang ba'i bde ba'i bla ma nges pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas 
[\[36a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das yid byed pa bla ma rdo rje kun du bzang po thams cad ma lus pa'i tshul rdo rjes btsun mo bya ba mo kun du bzang mo'i bla ma la 'jug par gyur to/_/gsang ba'i bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do/_/o~M chos kyi chos nyid bya ba'i dbyings/_/kun du bzang mo 
[\[36a.7\]]bde ba'i yum/_/ma g.yos rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni/_/bdag yin bdag gi spyod yul bas/_/phyag rgya sna tshogs so sor gsal/_/nub phyogs 'og min gnas mchog tu/_/ma chags pad+ma'i gdan bting ba/_/dus gsum rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gnas/_/
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi la/_/phyag rgya bzhi dang yang dag ldan/_/dbang med skal ngan bsal ba'i phyir/_/nang gtan phyi rim lcags dang ldan/_/rgyal ba yongs kyi gsang ba'i chos/_/sus kyang gting dpag bka' ba ste/_/kun du bzang po nyid kyis gzigs/_/hoHde 
[\[36b.2\]]nas btsun mo bya ba kun du bzang mos gsang ba bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do/_/o~M sems kyi sems nyid byed pa'i gtso/_/kun du bzang po rdo rje yid/_/ye shes brgyad kyi rang bzhin te/_/shar phyogs mngon dga' bsam yas nas/_/nI la lta bu'i gter 'byin pa/_/gsang 
[\[36b.3\]]'dus 'phrul gyi lde mig gis/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo phye ste/_/byang chub mchog gi nang gtan bkrol/_/ma chags pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/_/'gro don byang chub sems bskyed de/_/'gro lnga skye bzhi dbang du bsdus/_/sku gsung thugs nas dbang bskur ro/_/zhes gleng 
[\[36b.4\]]ngo /_/de nas bya ba mo kun du bzang mos gsang ba bla ma'i mchod pa 'di ched du phul lo/_/o~M rin chen pad+ma'i dkyil 'jam 'di/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'bul lags kyis/_/bla med 'phrul gyi lde mig ste/_/dgyes mchog rdo rje gsor nas ni/_/bdud rtsi char chen 
[\[36b.5\]]dbab tu gsol/_/zhes ched du gleng ngo /_/de nas yang yid byed pa po rdo rje kun du bzang pos bdud rtsi bla ma'i char pas snod bcud kyi 'dzam bu'i gling tshim par bya ba'i phyir gsang ba bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do/_/o~M rdo rje bla ma'i dgyes rab 'di/_/gsor nas bdud rtsi'i char 
[\[36b.6\]]dbab phyir/_/'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i gnas su gsor/_/mi dmigs bde dang spro ba 'di/_/kun du bzang mo dbyings su bskyil/_/zhes ched du gleng ste/_/gnyis su med pa las nyid kyi spyod yul thams cad gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bla ma khyad par du spags pa rdul phra 
[\[36b.7\]]mo snyed 'thon nas sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par mdzad pa ni/_la la ni gsang ba bla ma'i dkyil 'khor du bzhugs te yan lag thams cad rdo rjer byin gyis rlob/_la la ni 'gro ba drug 'dul ba'i don du thub pa chen po drug tu bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/_
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]lha yi gnas na brgya byin mgon/_/lha ma yin la thags zangs ris/_/mi la bdud 'dul shAkya mgon/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gnas na kha 'bar bde/_/byol song seng ge nyid du smra/_/dmyal ba la ni gshin rje mgon/_/sku dang cha lugs tshul ston cing /_/
[\[37a.2\]]la la lhums zhugs sku la bltams/_/la la tshul bsrung rab tu byung /_/la la bsnyen rdzogs dka' thub byed/_/la la dam nod 'gro ba sgrol/_/la la bcu drug chos la btsud/_/la la mer 'bar chur yang 'brug_/la la nam mkha' sgra ru 'bar/_/la la rdo rje 
[\[37a.3\]]brag tu sra/_/la la gso gsod 'pham rgyal byed/_/la la bcing sgrol 'gug sgrol byed/_/la la bdud 'dul ngan song sbyong /_/la la dkyil 'khor mchod sprin 'khril/_/kun kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor/_/de ltar rtag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni 
[\[37a.4\]]'di lta ste/_theg pa dang po bcu drug mgon/_/gnyis pa bzhi yi lta spyod bsrung /_/gsum pa bcu gnyis nges par bstan/_/bzhi pa gnyis kyi lta spyod sbyangs/_/bzhi pa'i theg pa mdor bsdus na/_/bla med theg pa'i dbyings su btsud/_/theg pa bzhi yi nges 'byung 
[\[37a.5\]]la/_/theg pa gcig gis 'bras bur gnas/_/kun 'byung dkyil 'khor sgyu 'phrul che/_/mang la 'brel bas dra ba'i don/_/thun mong min pas gsang ba'i don/_/theg pa'i bcud de snying po'i dbyings/_/zhes ched du gleng ste/_snod bcud kyi 'jig rten 
[\[37a.6\]]rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang bar gnas sgyur ba dang /_phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to/_/de nas snod bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad dang /_snyigs ma med par gsang ba 
[\[37a.7\]]bla ma'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par sangs rgyas nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/e ma'o rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags/_/skye mched khams rnams mang po kun/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid/_/sa chu can dang 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]mA ma kI/_/me long gos dkar sgrol ma ste/_/nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/_/srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas zhing /_/thams cad ma lus chos so cog_/sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin/_/sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi 
[\[37b.2\]]rnyed do/_/zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs so/_/e ma'o phyogs bcu'i stong khams ye nas dben/_/srid pa gsum nyid dag pa'i 
[\[37b.3\]]zhing /_/snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas/_/phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas/_/thams cad mchog gi snying po bas/_/gzhan du rgyal bas chos mi btsal/_/nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos/_/btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed do/_/zhes brjod pas chos thams cad 
[\[37b.4\]]ye nas sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to/_/de nas dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa las ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos/_/sna tshogs snang ba rang bzhin gsang /_/gsang mchog snying po bla na 
[\[37b.5\]]med/_/thams cad gsang ba'i dbyings su nges/_/bla ma mchog gi snying po las/_/sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med/_/ces brjod pas thams cad dbyings su nges par mkhyen to/_/de ltar yin na yang 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pas 'gro ba'i rigs 
[\[37b.6\]]bsam gyis mi khyab par smin pa la thugs rje chen po sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir rdo rje bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o bde gshegs snying po las/_/rang gi rnam rtog las kyis sprul/_/sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang /_/gnas 
[\[37b.7\]]dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i/_/bdag dang bdag gir so sor 'dzin/_/sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de/_/bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin/_/rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yis/_/nan gyis mkha' la mdud pa bor/_/bcings med rnam par grol 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]med pa'i/_/ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos/_/bstan phyir spro ba sna tshogs mdzad/_/spros kyang 'phel 'grib med pa'i dbyings/_/de ltar yin na yang de ltar ma rtogs pa rnams la kun rdzob kyi phung po byang chub kyi sems bla ma'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[38a.2\]]du sems kyi ngo bo bskyed pa'i phyir/_rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do/_/stong zhing dben pa'i sems nyid ni/_/rigs dang kha dog dbyibs med de/_/ci yang med la cir yang snang /_/mi bskyod rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung /_/rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor sna 
[\[38a.3\]]tshogs kyang /_/sems kyi sgyu 'phrul chen po yin/_/gcig dang du mar mi dmigs te/_/mngon shes drug gis thams cad byed/_/bla ma'i ting 'dzin chen po yis/_/dkyil 'khor chen po byed par bstan/_/rgyu lnga rkyen bzhis bsdus pa la/_/rgyal ba'i dkyil 
[\[38a.4\]]'khor che phra bsgom/_/bzhi yi rim pa tshul bzhin byed/_/rgyan dang phyag rgya'i tshul rnams kun/_/til 'bru'i nang du ri rab bskyed/_/sangs rgyas stong gi dkyil 'khor dang /_/stangs dpyal gnyis kyi phyag rgya yang /_/ri rab til 'bru'i tshul bzhin du/_/dpe 
[\[38a.5\]]byad rgyan gyis brgyan spras pa'o/_/nges pas bzhi bcu rtsa lnga bsgom/_/dbyings dang ye shes stangs dpyal gnyis/_/dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po/_/hoHgzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad de/_/yul la kun du bzang mo'o hoH/_/tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan te/_/yul 
[\[38a.6\]]la khams gsum byams ma'o hoH/_/'du shes snang ba mtha' yas te/_/yul la na bza' dkar mo'o hoH/_/'du byed don yod grub pa ste/_/yul la dam tshig sgrol ma'o hoH/_/rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste/_/yul la yangs pa'i spyan can ma hoH/_/mig la sa yi 
[\[38a.7\]]snying po ste/_/yul la dkar mo sgeg chen no hoH/_/sna la nam mkha'i snying po ste/_/yul la me tog dpa' phreng ma'o hoH/_/lce la spyan ras dbang phyug ste/_/yul la chos kyi dbyangs can no hoH/_/rna bar phyag na rdo rje ste/_/yul la las kyi gar mkhan ma'o hoH/_/kun 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]'dus sgrib pa rnam sel te/_/yul la me tog char 'bebs hoH/_/kun shes kun du bzang po ste/_/yul la gsal ba'i sgron ma'o hoH/_/gcod shes byams pa'i bdag nyid de/_/yul la gdug pa'i sprin 'phro hoH/_/'jug shes 'jam dpal gzhon nu ste/_/yul la 
[\[38b.2\]]tsan+dan char 'bebs so/_/g.yas gnyis stobs chen khro bo ste/_/yul la gdong mo 'jigs tshul hoH/_/g.yon gnyis gshin rje'i gshed po ste/_/yul la sder 'phro 'jigs tshul hoH/_/gsang ba rta mgrin dpa' bo ste/_/yul la dur khrod bdag mo hoH/_/lte bar bdud rtsi 
[\[38b.3\]]'khyil ba ste/_/yul la gtum mo 'jigs tshul hoH/_/rgyud drug 'khor ba'i gnas drug tu/_/thub drug phyag rgya chen po'o/_/kun du sku dang kun du gsung /_/kun du thugs kyi phyag rgya yang /_/lus ngag yid la de bzhin hoH/_/sems nyid sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste/_/sgyu ma'i cho 
[\[38b.4\]]'phrul chen po las/_/dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu lnga/_/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nges pa las/_/snying po'i dkyil 'khor bla ma yin/_/zhes brjod pas sems can thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang dbyer med 
[\[38b.5\]]par dgyes te mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings na bzhugs so/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma las dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i ngang du sems kyi rang bzhin cir yang 'grub pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang 
[\[38b.6\]]bzhin gcig dang du mar dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor bla ma 'di dbyung bar bzhed nas ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs so/_/o~M ye shes bla ma rol pa yis/_/phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar 
[\[38b.7\]]brtags na/_/dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub/_/rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por spyod/_/'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas/_/gru chad bzhis brgyan rdo rje'i khyams/_/kun du gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan/_/rol mo 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin/_/dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan/_/seng ge glang chen rta dang khyung /_/nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la/_/nyi zla pad+ma rin po che/_/gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul/_/'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang /_/
[\[39a.2\]]g.yas nas mthong thos mnam pa dang /_/myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas/_/gru chad la ni gcod byed dang /_/snang byed sogs byed 'jug byed rnams/_/btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas par gnas/_/bar khyams la ni thub drug dag_/rgyud drug sbyong ba'i phyag rgyar 
[\[39a.3\]]gnas/_/de bzhin thig le chen po dag_/mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dag_/bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan/_/sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa dag_/btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas/_/rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che/_/pad+ma'i ral gri nor bu 'bar/_/ut+pal klu shing la sogs 
[\[39a.4\]]mtshan/_/mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin/_/mthing ga dkar po ser le brgan/_/ljang gu la sogs sna tshogs mdog_/mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can/_/gsal 'tsher lhun stug gzi byin 'bar/_/'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po/_/'bar ba'i phreng 
[\[39a.5\]]ba 'khrigs pa ste/_/mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi/_/dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub hoH/_zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad du dkyil 'khor bla ma chen po brjod kyis mi lang ba zhing gi rdul snyed du gsal bar gyur 
[\[39a.6\]]to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba bla ma 'di sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las 'di dag phyung ngo /_/a hoH/_bde mchog ngo mtshar byang chub sems chen po/_/thig le mnyam sbyor sgyu 'phrul bla 
[\[39a.7\]]ma'i dbyings/_/rnam dag thig le byang chub sems kyis rol/_/ngo mtshar rmad byung bla ma chen po'i dbyings hoH/_/dmigs bya dmigs byed mi dmigs gsang ba'i dbyings/_/ye shes rang rig dkyil 'khor bla ma bsam mi khyab/_/mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab gsang ba'i 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]dbyings/_/ye shes kun gsal dkyil 'khor spros med bla ma'i ngang /_/ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/gsang ba'i snying po nges pa'i bla ma chen po las dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas ye shes rgyal po de btsun mo bla ma'i dbyings dang gnyis su 
[\[39b.2\]]med par gyur nas/_bde ba chen po byang chub kyi sems rim par gsal ba zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa rtser chib nas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa phyogs bcu dus bzhir dgos par bzhed nas sku gsung thugs bla ma'i dbyings nas 'di dag phyung ngo /_/dang po bla ma'i lung bstan pa/_/
[\[39b.3\]]mtshon du med pa'i byang chub sems/_/ye shes snying po gsal ba dang /_/bsgom pa rnam gsum dus gcig rdzogs/_/byang chub sems kyi thig le la/_/ma bkag lhun gyis rdzogs pas na/_/de ni thig le chen po'i don/_/de ni de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings/_/de ni kun 
[\[39b.4\]]du snang ba'i dang /_/de ni rgyu yi rim par ldan hoH/_/gsang ba bla ma'i tshig tu'o/_/gsang ba bla ma'i nges don las/_/gsang ba gsung gi dkyil 'khor grags/_/b+h+rU~M bi shwa bi shud d+he badzra swA hA/_hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra tsit+ta o~M/_a a a badzra pa ta sa ma ya o~M/_hU~M badzra d+h+ri ka_/
[\[39b.5\]]mUM d+hA tu I shwa ri/_o~M dzi na dzika/_lA~M dwe Sha ra ti/_swA rat+na d+h+r-ika_/mA~M mo ha ra ti/_a~MHa ro lika_/bA~M ra ga ra ti/_ha pra dz+hA d+h+r-ika/_tA~M badzra ra ti/_k+Shi hi rA dzA ya/_hU~M lA se sa ma ya staM/_trA~M a gar+b+ha ya/_trA~M mA le sa ma ya hoH/_hrIHha ho pad+ma ban+d+ha ma/_hrIHgI ti ra 
[\[39b.6\]]hoH/_ha~M dziM ku ru pa na hrIH/_AHnr-i t+ya rA ga yA mi/_mai d+hA ri Ni swA hA/_dzaHd+hU pa pra be sha/_th+l+hIM ni sa ra ma bA ya swA hA/_hU~M puSh+pa a be sha_/hU~M sa rA dzA ya swA hA/_ba~M d+hU pi su k+Sha Ni/_mU~M shrI A ra~M gA ya swA hA/_hoHgan+d+he tsit+ta/_o~M mu ne kr-i swA hA/_o~M mu ne hU~M drU~M swA hA/_o~M mu 
[\[39b.7\]]ne pra~M swA hA/_oM mu ne sru~M swA hA/_o~M mu ne k+Sha~M swA hA/_o~M mu ne ye swA hA/_hU~M ya mAn+ta kr-i ta phaT/_o~M ma hA badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/_hU~M pra dz+nyAn+ta kr-ita phaT/_o~M ma hA rat+na d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/_hU~M pad+mAn+ta kr-i ta hU~M phaT/_o~M ma hA pad+ma d+ha ra ma 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/_o~M big+h+nAn+ta kr-i ta hU~M phaT/_o~M ma hA karma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/_o~M e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya hoH/_sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/_dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH_o~M A~MHhU~M swA hA/_badzra sa ma ya/_badzra sa ma ya/_badzra sa ma ya/_badzra sa ma ya/_badzra sa ma ya/_
[\[40a.2\]]o~M A~MHhU~M swA hA/_o~M ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs/_/yon tan phrin las rmad po che/_/skyon bral byang chub sems chen po/_/de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor bas/_/phyag rgya bla mar bdag sbyor cig_/o~M badzra sa ma ya hU~M/_o~M badzra 
[\[40a.3\]]sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/_badzra sa ma ya hoH/_dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH_zhes gsungs pas gsung gi dkyil 'khor bla ma chen pos 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du grags/_rab tu grags/_kun tu grags so/_/grags pas snod bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[40a.4\]]bla ma chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/de nas yang ye shes rgyal po stangs dpyal dag gnyis su med par rol pa mdzad pa bla ma la thim par gyur te/_de nas ye shes rgyal po de nyid dang byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo /_/o~M chos dbyings mnyam pa 
[\[40a.5\]]chen po las/_/ye shes gsal ba rnam par dag_/chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis/_/skye med chos la dbang sgyur shog_/o~M ma hA gu h+ya ma shU n+ya tA d+harma dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/_hU~M dag cing gsal ba'i rang bzhin te/_/skyon med sems nyid rin po che/_me long lta 
[\[40a.6\]]bu'i ye shes kyis/_/srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur shog_/o~M ma hA gu h+ya ma hA A daR+sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/_swA~M khams gsum re skong rgyal po ste/_/yid bzhin rin chen gter gyi mchog_/mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis/_/'gro ba re skong rgyal 
[\[40a.7\]]por shog_/o~M ma hA gu h+ya ma hA sa man+ta A be sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/_a~M nyes pa'i skyon bral dri ma med/_/skye 'gag med pa'i dngos grub ste/_/so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis/_/srid gsum nyes dmigs sel bar shog_/o~M ma hA gu h+ya ma 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]hA bra ti bra be sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/_hA dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor mthar phyin cing /_/grub pa las kyi bye brag las/_/bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis/_/skye 'gro dbyings su sgrol bar shog_/o~M ma hA gu h+ya ma hA kr-i ta a nuSh+ThA na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/_a ni 
[\[40b.2\]]stong dang mi stong gnyis/_/dbu ma la yang mi gnas shing /_/stong pa chen po'i ye shes kyis/_/mi 'gyur dbyings la dbang sgyur shog_/o~M ma hA gu h+ya ma hA A be sha shu n+yA tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/_o~M bder gshegs sku yi ngo bo las/_/mi shigs rdo rje 
[\[40b.3\]]rgyal ba'i gtso/_/sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pa yis/_/rdo rje sku yi gtso bor shog_/o~M ma hA gu h+ya sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/_a~M bder gshegs gsung gi ngo bo las/_/mi shigs rdo rje chos kyi dbyings/_/sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pa yis/_/
[\[40b.4\]]rdo rje gsung gi ngo bor shog_/o~M ma hA gu h+ya sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/_hU~M bder gshegs thugs kyi gtso bo las/_/mi shigs rdo rje rdo rje'i thugs/_/sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pa yis/_/rdo rje thugs kyi byin rlobs shog_/o~M ma hA gu h+ya sarba ta 
[\[40b.5\]]thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/_swa~M mi 'gyur ba yi zhing khams nas/_/ma bskyed pa yi 'bras bu lags/_/ma bsags pa yi longs spyod 'byung /_/cir yang grub pa'i ye shes kyis/_/rang dbang thabs kyis sgyur bar shog_/swa~M ma hA gu h+ya sarba ta 
[\[40b.6\]]thA ga ta ma hA pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/_zhes gsungs pas gsal la 'bar bas thim par gyur to/_/e ma ngo mtshar rab 'byam gyi/_/ngo mtshar ya mtshan gsang ba'i chos/_/sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das/_/sna tshogs sgra rnams dbyings su gsal/_/
[\[40b.7\]]gsung gcig yan lag dkyil 'khor ni/_/bsam gyis mi khyab khyab mchog dbyings/_/thams cad gsung gi phyag rgya mchog hoH/_gsang ba'i snying po nges pa'i bla ma chen po las dkyil 'khor bsdu ba dang gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]ye shes rgyal po de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yan lag thams cad dkyil 'khor bla mar lhun gyis grub pa'i dgongs pa rtser chib nas rdo rje bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du gsungs so/_/sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i/_/thams cad byang chub 
[\[41a.2\]]mchog gi rgya/_/gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi/_/snying po phyag rgya 'da' dka'o/_/mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge/_/rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge/_/lnga gnyis zur du spros pa las/_/sbyar ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu/_/hU~M dang mu~M gnyis rtse sbyar te/_/'bru brgyad bsnol 
[\[41a.3\]]nas thugs kar bkan/_/rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/_/bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i rgya/_/'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/_/hU~M bsgreng rtse mor rdo rje 'bar/_/zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil cing /_/'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/_/'bru bzhi sbas nas 
[\[41a.4\]]thugs kar bkan/_/mu~M bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/_/nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril/_/btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta/_/'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte dbus na/_/ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' dag_/yum mchog yangs ma'i spyan dang ni/_/gnyis med dbyings 
[\[41a.5\]]kyi ngang du 'khril/_/'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/_/o~M bsgreng rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar/_/zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil cing /_/'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/_/'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/_/la~M bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/_/nyi ma 'bru 
[\[41a.6\]]lngas las su 'khril/_/btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta/_/shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs nas/_/bde gshegs rnam par snang mdzad dag_/yum mchog kun du bzang mo dang /_/gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/_/'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar 
[\[41a.7\]]bkan/_/swa rtse 'bar ba rin po che/_/zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing /_/'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/_/'bru sbas bzhi nas thugs kar bkan/_/ma~M bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/_/nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril/_/btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]kyis lta/_/lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs nas/_/bder gshegs rin chen 'byung ldan dag_/yum mchog khams gsum byams ma dang /_/gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/_/'bru sbas bzhi nas thugs kar bkan/_/A~M bsgreng rtse mor pad+ma 'bar/_/zla brtul 
[\[41b.2\]]'bru sbas dril gsil zhing /_/'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/_/'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/_/pa~M bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/_/nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril/_/btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta/_/nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs 
[\[41b.3\]]nas/_/bde gshegs snang ba mtha' yas dag_/yum mchog na bza' dkar mo dang /_/gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/_/'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/_/ha bsgreng rtse mor ral gri 'bar/_/zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing /_/'khril 
[\[41b.4\]]ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/_/'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/_/trA~M bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/_/nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril/_/btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta/_/byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs nas/_/bde gshegs don yod grub 
[\[41b.5\]]pa dang /_/yum mchog dam tshig sgrol ma dang /_/gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/_/rin chen myu gu g.yas phyogs na/_/sgeg cing 'gying ba g.yon phyogs na/_/sa snying dkar po rdo rje'i rigs/_/yum mchog dkar mo sgeg chen dang /_/dkyil 'khor bar 
[\[41b.6\]]khyams shar phyogs na/_/gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/_/ral gri 'byin pa g.yas phyogs na/_/phreng ba bgrang ba g.yon phyogs na/_/dkyil 'khor bar khyams lho phyogs na/_/nam snying ser po rin chen rigs/_/yum mchog dpal gyi phreng ba dang /_/gnyis 
[\[41b.7\]]med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/_/pad+ma dkar po g.yas phyogs na/_/pi bang 'gyed pa g.yon phyogs na/_/dkyil 'khor bar khyams nub phyogs na/_/spyan ras le brgan pad+ma rigs/_/yum mchog chos kyi dbyangs mkhan dang /_/gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/_/rdo rje 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]rtse lnga g.yas phyogs na/_/bar gyi cod pan g.yon phyogs na/_/dkyil 'khor bar khyams byang phyogs na/_/phyag na mthing ga las kyi rigs/_/yum mchog gar gyi cod pan dang /_/gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/_/mdzes pa'i klu shing g.yas phyogs 
[\[42a.2\]]na/_/bdug spos 'dren pa g.yon phyogs na/_/dkyil 'khor bar khyams shar lho na/_/byams pa dkar ser bder gshegs rigs/_/yum mchog bdug pa'i sprin 'phro dang /_/gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/_/gser gyi 'khor lo g.yas phyogs na/_/
[\[42a.3\]]me tog 'thor ba g.yon phyogs na/_/dkyil 'khor bar khyams lho nub na/_/sgrib sel dmar ser rin chen rigs/_/yum mchog me tog char 'bebs dang /_/gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/_/rin chen snye ma g.yas phyogs na/_/sgron ma 'degs pa 
[\[42a.4\]]g.yon phyogs na/_/dkyil 'khor bar khyams nub byang na/_/kun bzang dmar ljang las kyi rigs/_/yum mchog gsal ba'i sgron ma dang /_/gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/_/ut+pal sngon po g.yas phyogs na/_/tsan+dan 'thor ba g.yon 
[\[42a.5\]]phyogs na/_/dkyil 'khor bar khyams byang shar na/_/'jam dpal dkar ljang rdo rje'i rigs/_/yum mchog tsan+dan char 'bebs dang /_/gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/_/thub drug phyag rgya chen po ni/_/rgyud drug gnas nas 'dren pa ste/_/gseg par phyag rgya tshul 
[\[42a.6\]]'dzin pas/_/sku mdog ser pos mi rnams 'dren/_/pi bang phyag rgya tshul 'dzin pas/_/sku mdog dkar po lha rnams 'dren/_/go cha mdung thung phyag rgya yis/_/sku mdog mthing nag lha min 'dren/_/rin chen 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis/_/sku mdog sngon po 
[\[42a.7\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'dren/_/po ti brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya yis/_/sku mdog ser nag byol song 'dren/_/me 'bar chu 'bebs phyag rgya yis/_/sku mdog sngon po dmyal ba 'dren/_/sgo bzhi phyag rgya tshul gnas pa/_/rdo rje gnod pa g.yas phyogs na/_/lcags kyu 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]'phen pa g.yon phyogs na/_/stobs chen khro bo chen po yang /_/yum mchog rdo rje lcags kyu dang /_/gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/_/nr-i mgo gdengs pa g.yas phyogs na/_/zhags pa 'phen pa g.yon phyogs na/_/khro chen gshin rje gshed po yang /_/yum mchog 
[\[42b.2\]]rdo rje zhags pa dang /_/gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/_/sbrul mgo gdengs pa g.yas phyogs na/_/lcags sgrog sdom pa g.yon phyogs na/_/khro chen rta mgrin dpa' bo yang /_/yum mchog rdo rje lcags sgrog dang /_/gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/_/rgya gram 
[\[42b.3\]]gnon pa g.yas phyogs na/_/dril bu 'khrol ba g.yon phyogs na/_/khro chen bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yang /_/yum mchog rdo rje dril 'khrol dang /_/byang gi sgo nas dbyings su 'khril/_/kun bzang mnyam bzhag ye shes 'phro/_/yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad+ma'i dkyil/_/
[\[42b.4\]]gnyis med dbyings kyi gsang chen spro/_/bde mchog ngo mtshar thugs kyi dkyil/_/spro bsdu rdo rje thal mo dag_/bsgyur bas rang sems ye shes gsal/_/de nyid shes rab thabs su rdzogs/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba nges pa'i bla ma chen po las phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste 
[\[42b.5\]]lnga pa'o//_//de nas ye shes rgyal po de rdo rje bkod pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig rgyan rnam par spros pa'i dgongs pa la cig char bzhugs te/_rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di brjod do/_/shin tu phra ba'i ting 'dzin mchog_/dpe dang tshad du mi gzung zhing /_/gzhal yas 
[\[42b.6\]]phyag rgya la sogs te/_/mtshon du med la snang bar bsgom/_/shin tu phra bas rnam sbyangs te/_/rig pas rgya khyon tshad med pa/_/gzhal yas phyag rgya la sogs pa'i/_/mtshon du med la snang bar bsgom/_/phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang /_/tshogs chen gnyis las 
[\[42b.7\]]'grub pa yi/_/'dod pa lnga yi yon tan rnams/_/nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam rdzogs te/_/rags dang phra dang 'bring la sogs/_/ji ltar 'dod pa rang gar bya/_/tsa ka li dang tshon rtsi dag_/bya dang mi bya med pas na/_/de la dgag par ma gsungs so/_/
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]'gro don 'tsham pa de bzhin te/_/sna tshogs mchod pas rgyas par mchod/_/bdag nyid chen pos mchod pa yis/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes/_/srid gsum 'gro ba ma lus kun/_/dga' ba chen pos tshim pa yin/_/sgyu 'phrul 
[\[43a.2\]]dra ba'i dgongs pa yis/_/rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus dang /_/rigs drug 'gro ba mngon du 'gyur/_/lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad/_/gang na'ang yod pa ma yin te/_/rnam dag ye shes sbyor ba yis/_/dbyings la dbyings nyid sgom pa yis/_/kun byas 
[\[43a.3\]]dbang phyug rig pas 'jug_/de nas dad ldan gus 'jug pa/_/de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des/_/rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus/_/bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig_/rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul/_/snying yang yon gyi mchog yin te/_/bla ma mnyes phyir gus 
[\[43a.4\]]ldan dbul/_/dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod na/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyes pa yin/_/gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos/_/skyon rnams ma lus nges par 'byang /_/dad ldan brtson 'grus bskyed byas na/_/phan pa'i dbang nod theg 
[\[43a.5\]]tshad sbyin/_/des na dbang phyug rgyal po yis/_/dbang gi rim pa rnams bstan to/_/'gro la phan phyir las rnams sbyin/_/grub pas 'dzin rgyal po sbyin/_/mi 'gyur rab 'byam bde chen no/_/gang 'dod rim gyis sbyin par bya/_/blo dang ldan pas theg tshad nod/_/yang 
[\[43a.6\]]na sras kyi dam pa ste/_/chud ma zos par rdzogs dbang sbyin/_/sems kyi rnam pa nyid gu blud/_/sgo 'byed bde bas gyen du bskyil/_/de nas dbang phyug chen po des/_/mi 'gyur sgron mar sku bskyod cing /_/sems kyi thig le sgo phye ste/_/tshangs pa chen po'i 
[\[43a.7\]]dbyangs bzhed nas/_/go 'byed rdo rje'i ljags brkyang ste/_/dad ldan skyes bu dbang bskur ba/_/rdzogs pa chen po'i bde dbang ni/_/che mchog gong na med pa na/_/gsang ba'i dbu rgyan gyi dbang dang /_/thabs mkhas byin brlabs che bas na/_/las rnams 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]kun gyi dbang dang ni/_/khams gsum dbang du bsdus pas ni/_/slob dpon zhal chab kyi dbang ngo /_/hU~M thabs mkhas thugs rje'i byin brlabs kyis/_/rigs kyi bu mchog dbang bskur phyir/_/gsang ba'i dbu rgyan 'di bcings pas/_/rigs kyi bu mchog deng phan chad/_/
[\[43b.2\]]'jig rten che ba kun gyi bla/_/che ba'i che ba zil gyis gnon/_/sangs rgyas che ba'i mchod gnas ni/_/rnal 'byor chen po khyod nyid yin/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga to gu h+ya badzra rat+na ma ku Ta trA~M trA~M/_badzra gu h+ya sid d+hi hU~M/_hU~M thabs mkhas byin brlabs chen po ni/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yin te/_/byin brlabs chen po 
[\[43b.3\]]rnam bzhi po/_/dbang bskur gnang phyir gtad pas na/_/rigs kyi bu mchog deng phan chad/_/sems can kun la snying brtse phyir/_/mu stegs rtag chad yan chad nas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzad spyod la/_/khyod kyis mi bya gcig kyang med/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod 
[\[43b.4\]]pa yis/_/sems can kun gyi re ba skong /_/o~M sa ma ya gu h+ya e ba~M ma ya a/_slob dpon zhal chab kyi dbang ni khams gsum kun la dbang yid bzhin du sgyur te/_hU~M nga ni rgyal ba kun gyi bla/_/thig le byang chub sems chen po/_/nga ni khro rgyal kun gyi rje/_/ye 
[\[43b.5\]]shes rol pa'i 'byung gnas gter/_/nga ni spyi dpal bla na med/_/skyon bral thabs kyi rgyal po yin/_/sems kyi dkyil nas drangs pa'i chu/_/khyod kyi lce la phab pa 'di/_/snying gi dkyil du gzung bar byos/_/rigs kyi bu khyod deng phan chad/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i 
[\[43b.6\]]thugs mchog zung /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo yin/_/byang chub sems dang mnyam pa'i phyir/_/sems dpa' kun gyi mchod gnas yin/_/rigs kyi bu khyod deng phan chad/_/phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi/_/bstan pa phyi nang zab mo kun/_/sems kyi dkyil 
[\[43b.7\]]du bsdus nas kyang /_/rdo rje lce yis sgo phye ste/_/bdud rtsi sman mchog dam pa 'dis/_/dad ldan skyes bu ngoms par byos/_/sems kyi thig le dkyil 'khor du/_/zhi khro 'byam pa'i gter sgoms la/_/srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur cig_/dbang can thams 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]cad bkol bar byos/_/skye 'gro kun la snying brtse'i phyir/_/gdul ba'i phyag rgya 'di yang spyod/_/dug gsum rtsa ba gcad par byos/_/phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag_/rnam dag chen po nyid kyi lam/_/byed spyod thabs tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa/_/
[\[44a.2\]]'gro don byang chub sems kyi dbyings/_/sems kyi chu 'di btung bar byos/_/rnal 'byor chen pos dam du zung /_/hU~M de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des/_/mnyam pa'i don la gzhol ba'i phyir/_/ye shes rgyal pos 'di skad gsungs/_/snying gi dkyil du rnam sbyang 
[\[44a.3\]]ba/_/hU~M nyid ring pos mtshams sbyar te/_/thams cad bde ba chen po'i dbyings/_/dge sdig las kyis mi bcos shing /_/sgom dang sgrub pas mi 'byangs pa'i/_/rnam dag sems nyid rin chen gter/_/rdo rje snying po ye shes kyis/_/khro rgyal kun gyi gtsor gyur 
[\[44a.4\]]cig_/shrI ma hA su kha badzra bo d+hi hU~M ho/_/o~M a~M/_mi 'gyur ba yi ye shes gnas/_/ma btsal phyin pas bde ba'i mchog_/ma bltas gsal bas ye shes spyan/_/gong na med pa'i kun gyi rje/_/ye shes rang gnas bdal ba la/_/mi 'gyur g.yung drung sa thob 
[\[44a.5\]]shog_/o~M ma hA gu h+ya bru~M dz+nyA na maN+Dal/_/dz+nyA na gu h+ya sid d+hi swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/_gzungs dang ting 'dzin stobs dang mi 'jigs pa/_/'gyur ba med pa'i sman mchog thig le lnga/_/mtshan mchog rdzogs pa chen pos lus brgyan cing /_/o~M sarba ta thA ga to gu h+ya At+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa 
[\[44a.6\]]ho ha/_khyung gi gshog pa g.yas g.yon gdengs pa yis/_/klu rnams zil gyis gnon par byed pa ltar/_/srid gsum yon tan mchog tu rdzogs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas kun la mdzes pa'i cod pan mchog_/mchog tu che bas bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon/_/o~M 
[\[44a.7\]]sarba ta thA ga to ma hA gu h+ya badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa ho/_/hU~M bde ba chen po'i rang gnas la/_/ye shes rgyal po stangs dpyal du/_/'gyur ba med par longs spyod cing /_/thabs dang shes rab 'phro 'du yis/_/skye 'gro sras su 'dzin par shog_/o~M sarba ta thA ga to gu h+ya a nu 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]rA ga ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/_/dbyings nas nyi shar mkha' la rdzogs sras 'gyur/_/rgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba dam tshig dang dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po des thugs rje chen po 
[\[44b.2\]]gdung ba'i dam tshig lu gu rgyud la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig sta na chen po'i phrin las mdzad do/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang /_/zhing bcur ldan pa'i longs spyod la/_/gsung gi 'phro 'du rnam sbyangs te/_/lnga yi 
[\[44b.3\]]tshom bu yang dag gsal/_/sgo lnga byin rlabs 'dren pa'i mchog_/ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i lam/_/gtsug tu snang mdzad sems dpa' che/_/skur skyed byin rlabs rmad po che/_/pho nya mang po'i 'phro 'du yis/_/zhing bcu gnas nas blangs nas su/_/nyi zla steng du 
[\[44b.4\]]de bzhag ste/_/shes pa gsum po dbyings su bstim/_/rang rgyud 'khor ba'i sa bon las/_/ljang gu ni ru 'phang bstod de/_/ni ljang hU~M du gnas bsgyur nas/_/yas 'dus mas 'dus hu~M la 'dus/_/hU~M ni bde gshegs ye shes lnga/_/dkar la gsal bar skur bskyed 
[\[44b.5\]]de/_/bde chen 'od zer 'phro bas brjid/_/rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa/_/yab yum bcu yi byin rlabs nyid/_/le brgan hU~M ni dbyings su sbyor/_/kun tu bzang mo bde ba'i mkha'/_/sangs rgyas sems can gnyi ga'i yum/_/rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas gtso/_/
[\[44b.6\]]sras su gyur pas bde ba'i mchog_/zhing gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams/_/gnas ni kun bzang yum gyi mkha'/_/sa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sa/_/mi ldog nyi zla'i gdan stengs su/_/mkhas pas sku yi phyag rgyar bskyod/_/mtshan dang dpe byad yang 
[\[44b.7\]]dag ldan/_/rtag tu sku mchog g.yung drung sbyin/_/ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/de nas ye shes rgyal po des/_/gsang mchog bde ba'i mchod sprin gyis/_/phyogs bcu'i zhing khams rdul snyed na/_/rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul phran snyed/_/de kun 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]gsang mchog mnyes bya'i phyir/_/nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo de/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis dbyings su thim/_/'khril nas gsang ba'i dgongs pa mdzad/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad phrag gnyis hU~M spros pas/_/klong du hU~M chen gcig tu 'khyil/_/kha dog 
[\[45a.2\]]rnam bzhi yang dag ldan/_/rigs bzhi lha mo rnam spros te/_/stong khams bkang nas mchod pa byed/_/la la gsang mchog dbyings su 'khril/_/la la 'dod lnga'i mchod pa byed/_/rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang /_/bla re rgyal mtshan 'phan gdugs dang /_/rin chen 
[\[45a.3\]]do shal se mo do/_/dbyibs legs rin chen phung pos mdzes/_/bsam rdzogs rin chen sdong po yis/_/rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus mchod/_/la la 'gro ba re ba skong /_/la la bdud 'dul ngan song sbyong /_/kun kyang gsang ba'i mchod 'bul byed/_/nyid kyi 
[\[45a.4\]]gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang /_/gnyis su med par 'khril nas su/_/'khril nas ga na'i mchod pa byed/_/stong khams nyungs 'brur gzhug tshul du/_/ga na'i mchod pa chen po yis/_/thams cad mnyes pa chen por gyur/_/de nas ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi gsang 
[\[45a.5\]]ba'i rgyal mo dang gnyis su med par 'khril nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/e ma'o bde gshegs spyod pa'i mchog_/sna tshogs spyod la rang bzhin gsang /_/ma chags pa yi ngo bo las/_/chags pa chen po'i spyod pa 'byung /_/spyod pa chen po rnam gnyis la/_/
[\[45a.6\]]rtogs nas chags pas su spyod pa/_/yang dag chags pa chen po ste/_/'di ni tshangs mchog rgyal po yin/_/sems kyi spyod pa rnam pa gnyis/_/zhing bcu mnyes pa'i las bya'o/_/zhes ched du gsungs so/_/de lta bus phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin
