[\[45a.7\]]gshegs pa'i zhing khams kyis bsdus pa thams cad mnyes pa chen pos thim par gyur to/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las thugs rje gdung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal po de mchod pa bla ma'i rgyan bkod 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad gsungs so/_/sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i/_/dkyil 'khor bla ma dgongs pa'i mchog_/bro gar 'du 'phro'i phyag rgya yis/_/'dzul lam nam mkhar 'gro bar nges/_/glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis/_/chos 
[\[45b.2\]]kyi sems dpa'i dngos grub len/_/bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgya yis/_/yid bzhin sems dpa'i dngos grub len/_/rgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis/_/'od 'bar bla ma'i dngos grub len/_/A li kA li'i phyag rgya yis/_/thams cad grub cing rdo rje nges/_/rgyu 'bras 
[\[45b.3\]]dbyings su sbyor shes shing /_/bla ma'i dgongs pa gang sbyor ba/_/rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du nges/_/skye ba rnam bzhi rgyud sbyangs nas/_/mtshan rdzogs sa la gdon mi za/_/zhes gsungs pas tshogs chen po rnam pa gnyis rdzogs par gyur to/_/de nas nyid kyi 
[\[45b.4\]]bla ma'i mdzad spyod la dgyes pa chen pos glu 'di blangs so/_/o~M phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi/_/ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che/_/bsod nams dkyil 'khor sku yi tshogs/_/snang stong thig le kun du rdzogs/_/ho/_o~M rdo rje bsod nams thig le che/_/rdo rje 
[\[45b.5\]]ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan/_/rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas pa/_/rdo rje rgyal po thig le che/_/ho/_o~M mi dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings/_/mtha' yas kun nas sna tshogs 'phro/_/mtha' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim/_/sna tshogs sku gsung thugs chen po/_/ho/_
[\[45b.6\]]o~M sku gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che/_/yon tan phrin las kun tu rdzogs/_/ye nas lhun rdzogs kun tu bzang /_/'dus pa'i rdzogs chen thig le che/_/ho/_o~M phyogs bcu 'jig rten rdul snyed du/_/rgyal ba'i don rnams rdul phran snyed/_/sprul pa rdul phran bsam 
[\[45b.7\]]yas kyi/_/skad cig yud la lhun gyis grub/_/ho/_o~M thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs/_/sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che/_/sku gsung thugs kyi kun tu khyab/_/sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che/_/ho/_o~M thams cad thig le bla ma'i don/_/sgyu 'phrul bla ma thig 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]le'i dbyings/_/dbyings nyid byang chub sems chen po/_/snying po bla ma nges pa'i don/_/thig le gnyis las g.yos ba med/_/ho/_sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las tshogs chen po rnam pa gnyis mnyes pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas de 
[\[46a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal po de sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po'i 'jigs pa chen po'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'du mdzad de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag tu lta ba dang /_rmongs pa'i dbang gis gab pa'i gsang ba chen po ni ma rtogs/_sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon 
[\[46a.3\]]par zhen pas chos mnyam pa nyid kyi don ni phyal bar bor/_/bram ze'i ngan sngags mang po ni blo'i gdeng du blangs nas snying rje chen po'i las dang ni bral gnas su ming btags nas zhe sdang sgrol ba'i las ni rgyun du byed/_thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med pa'i don ni ma 
[\[46a.4\]]rtogs/_'dod chags spyod pa'i las dang skad cig tsam yang ma bral/_rang rig pa'i ye shes ni blo la nub/_don dam pa la kun du gti mug pas ni rgyun du khebs/_sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan ni ma rtogs/_nga rgyal khengs pa'i dregs pa'i las ni rgyun du byed/_
[\[46a.5\]]tshad med pa bzhi'i las dang ni bral/_phrag dog gi tshub mas ni rgyun du khrid de/_bdag tu rmongs pa dang rtog pa la zhen te/_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang bral bas rgyu dang 'bras bu la rmongs te/_srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba rdo rje dmyal 
[\[46a.6\]]ba chen por bskal pa chen po stong phrag drug cur skyes so/_/de las thar nas nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba chen por bskal ba chen po drug tu skyes so/_/las kyi sgrib pa rtsub mo de las thar te sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyar nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]srin po chen po lus gcig 
[\[46a.7\]]mgo bo brgya pa mgo bo sna tshogs pa/_lus brgya pa mgo gcig pa lus dang yan lag mang po 'dug pa mtshon cha sna tshogs pa thogs shing gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul mang po ston pas klu'i ris nas 'bras bu che ba man chad dbang du bsdus nas sa bon rtsub mos mang po 'debs so/_/
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]de nas sngon legs par spyad pa'i 'bras bus bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis sku'i dbyibs legs par brgyan pa ye shes phyin ci ma log pa'i spyan gyis gzigs te/_las ngan pa'i srin po de nyon mongs pa'i bag chags sbyang ba dang /_khams gsum 
[\[46b.2\]]gyi sems can bde ba la gzhag pa'i phyir thugs rje chen po'i ye shes skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po dgyes pa chen po ye shes kyi rgyal po de nyid 'jigs byed chen po rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bla ma chen po 
[\[46b.3\]]sprin rnam par spro ba sgyu 'phrul bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_de bzhin nyid kyi bla ma chen po'i dbyings nas nyid kyi gsang ba'i bdag mo khro mo'i rgyal mo chen mo mngon du phyung ste/_hi hi zhes dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis pad+ma rgyas par mdzad de/_gnyis su 
[\[46b.4\]]med pa'i dgyes pa chen pos thim nas gsang ba bla ma'i sprin las/_/hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra dz+wa bi Sha kro d+ha badzra dz+wa la maN+Dal phaT phaT ha la ha la hU~M zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad dur khrod bdal ba chen po'i rang bzhin khrag gi rgya mtsho dba' rlabs 'khrug pa'i 
[\[46b.5\]]dkyil na/_keng rus chen po ri rab kyi steng na rdo rje me dpung du 'khyil ba'i dbus na 'og rdo rje rgya gram mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su bris pa/_phyogs bzhi ngos bzhi 'bar bar khyams gsum rdo rje rin po che'i glo 'bur du mdzes pa/_sgo bzhi rta babs mu khyud du bcas pa/_rdo rje rin 
[\[46b.6\]]po che rgya gram mthing ga 'bar ba'i rtsig pa dra ba ris su brtsigs pa/_steng yid bzhin gyi rin po che 'bar ba/_rdo rje rgya gram 'bar ba'i bla re mig [{]mangs su [,]mang du [}]bres ba/_rtse mo dbyibs bla mas 'og min gyi gnas na srid pa'i rtse mo man chad bum pa'i tshul du dbyibs rdo rje rgya 
[\[46b.7\]]gram mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]gcig tu 'khyil pa/_ye shes rdo rje rgya gram gyi cho 'phrul bla ma'i 'od 'bar bas phyogs bzhir 'phros shing 'khrugs pas khams gsum thams cad bdal ba/_rgyal mtshan bla ma chen po dang /_ru mtshon bla ma chen pos phyogs bzhi grwa bzhi 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]nas bsgreng ba/_gsang ba bla ma'i rtsig pas phyi rim bskor ba/_rdo rje rin po che'i phyi rol gyi shing ljon pa bla mas phyogs mtshams gtibs pa/_phyi dang nang med pa kun du yang bla ma chen po'i nang du gyur ba/_khams gsum thams cad rdo rje ra ba'i 
[\[47a.2\]]rtsig pa 'chor ba med pa'i gzhal yas khang na khro bo dang khro mo'i rol pa'i phyag rgya stong gi 'jig rten rdul phra mo snyed 'thon par gyur to/_/de nas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'ur 'ur dang chem chem dang /_shig shig dang /_thor thor dang /_
[\[47a.3\]]gtogs shig dang /_choms shig dang /_sod cig dang /_drol zhig dang /_sbyongs shig la sogs pas 'jig rten na dbang che zhing dpa' brtul che zhing brtul zhugs can rnams brgyal bar gyur to/_/de nas dgyes pa chen pos ye shes rgyal po de nyid 
[\[47a.4\]]dur khrod bla ma chen por dgyes nas khrag gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil keng rus chen po'i ri rab kyi steng na rdo rje me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na rdo rje ye shes kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa la nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang mchod pa bla ma chen po mdzad de gnyis su med pa'i 
[\[47a.5\]]dbyings nas 'di phyung ngo /_/hU~M badzra du tri nan sUr+ya tsan+d+ra pad+ma maN+Da la de ba tiSh+Tha na~M zhes brjod pas ye shes rin po che'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa 'od 'bar ba'i sdeng du dur khrod gdug pa'i tshogs seng ge la sogs pa bla ma chen po'i khri btsugs te/_gdan bla ma nyi zla 
[\[47a.6\]]dang pad+ma spel bar bting ba'o/_/de nas cho 'phrul bla ma chen pos btul ba/_bsam gtan bla ma chen po spags pa tshad med pa/_dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ye shes bla ma chen pos dregs pa thams cad dus gcig tu btul ba'i snam rten bla ma chen po la 
[\[47a.7\]]mtshon pa dang /_dmigs pa'i yul las 'das pa'i phyag rgya bla ma 'od 'bar ba bzhugs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po chen po sku mthing nag cir yang 'gyur ba/_rdo rje ljags kyis gsung 'brug stong gi sgra sgrogs pas stong khams thams cad dus 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]gcig tu 'jig pa/_ye shes me'i thugs kyis snang srid kyi bud shing dus gcig tu bsregs pa/_steng 'og med par kun du skyi bung zhes byed pa/_dbu dgu phyag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_zhabs rnam pa brgyad du gtams pa/_phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams 
[\[47b.2\]]pa/_dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_spyan 'bar ba nyi shu rtsa bdun mnga' zhing rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rdo rje mthing ga khyung gi gshog pas 'jig rten gyi khams yog par bkab pa/_khros pa'i rgyal mo mthing nag 'bar ba dang gnyis su med par bzhugs 
[\[47b.3\]]so/_/gnyis su med pa'i dbyings nas shar phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i steng du ma hA de ba dang /_'dod pa'i lha gan rkyal du brtul ba'i steng du nyid kyi gzugs kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das bud+d+ha he ru ka_/sku mdog ser nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs 
[\[47b.4\]]bzhir gyur pa dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/_/phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa'o/_/bder gshegs khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bzhugs so/_/lho phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i gdan stengs su gshin rje gan rkyal du 
[\[47b.5\]]bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi tshor ba'i phung po las bcom ldan 'das rat+na he ru ka sku mdog sngo nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa/_mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa/_dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba chen mo'i tshul gyis 
[\[47b.6\]]bzhugs so/_/nub phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i steng du chu bdag gi rgyal po dang 'khor lo nag po b+h+r-ing gi ri ti gan rkyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi 'du shes kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das pad+ma he ru ka sku mdog dmar nag dbu gsum phyag drug 
[\[47b.7\]]zhabs bzhir gyur pa/_mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa/_dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/_/pad+ma khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o/_/byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i gdan stengs su gnod sbyin stongs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gan 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]rkyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi 'du byed kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das karma he ru ka sku mdog ljang nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad par gyur pa/_mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste/_dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_las mchog khros pa'i rgyal 
[\[48a.2\]]mo dang 'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs so/_/de nas dreg pa chen po la sogs pas gdug pa'i sems kyis gtum pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan pas mgrin gcig tu 'dug pa'i nga ros gtum pa'i brlang tshig tu smras pa/_thong thong snying rje'i bdag po ci 'di ltar 
[\[48a.3\]]byed dam zhes zer zhing shin tu gtum pas rngam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos ye shes rgyal po de nyid sku gzi brjid chen po'i mdangs su gyur te/_thugs rje chen pos 'dul ba'i thabs kyis sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i gsang sngags bla ma'i rngam pa'i gdangs skad 
[\[48a.4\]]chen po 'di dag phyung ngo /_/hU~M hU~M hU~M/_ha ha ha/_khA hi khA hi khA hi/_zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i gdug pa'i tshogs de dag gi snying dang dbang po kun phyung nas nang grol kun drangs yan lag kun bcad btubs te sha zos/_khrag 'thungs rus pa kun 
[\[48a.5\]]'chos so/_/de nas 'jigs byed chen po de nyid kyis hU~M hU~M hU~M b+h+yo e a ra li dzA dzA zhes brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' dang bcas pa yungs 'bru gcig tsam du chud par bsdus so/_/de nas 'byung po ma rungs pa thams cad kyi rje bo'i yang 
[\[48a.6\]]rje bo/_/dregs pa chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma 'byung mo thams cad kyi rje mo'i yang rje mo/_/srin mo chen mo mi srun mo dang /_tshangs ma dang /_khro mo dang /_dbang mo dang /_'jug sred mo dang /_gzhon nu mo dang /_dmar po dang /_bdud rtsi mo dang /_zhi 
[\[48a.7\]]ba mo dang /_be chen mo dang /_srin mo dang /_za ba mo dang /_dga' ba mo dang /_ra ro khrag 'thung mo dang /_gcig pu spyod ma dang /_yid 'phrog ma dang /_grub mo dang /_rlung mo dang /_gsod byed mo dang /_me mo dang /_phag mo dang /_rgan byed mo dang /_sna chen 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]mo dang /_chu lha mo dang /_nag mo chen mo dang /_ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang /_bum sna sngo nag chen mo dang /_gsus 'dzin sngo nag chen mo la sogs pa dang /_yang bran dang /_g.yog dang /_yang g.yog la sogs pa 'khor zhing gi rdul kyang bsdus so/_/
[\[48b.2\]]de nas yang dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid dgyes pa bla ma'i gsang ba chen po sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mngon par 'du mdzad de sku gsung thugs bla ma las 'di dag phyung ngo /_/o~M AHhU~M/_badzra pad+ma pra be sha pad+ma hU~M a la la ho zhes brjod pas 
[\[48b.3\]]'byung po ma rungs pa thams cad shin tu chags pa'i yid g.yos nas gsang ba rgyas par byas nas khab lan gyi rdo la lcags 'du ba'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po'i sku la mi srun mo la sogs pa brgyad 'khril lo/_/bcom ldan 'das ser nag chen po'i sku la 
[\[48b.4\]]tshangs ma la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo/_/bcom ldan 'das sngo nag chen po'i sku la bdud rtsi mo la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo/_/bcom ldan 'das dmar nag chen po'i sku la khrag gis myos ma la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo/_/bcom ldan 'das ljang nag chen po'i sku 
[\[48b.5\]]la me mo la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo/_/de nas dgyes pa chen po de dag gis hU~M zhes brjod pas pad+ma'i tshogs bsdus te shin tu bcum par gyur to/_/de nas dgyes te ha ha zhes brjod pas nyid kyi shes pa'i tshogs rnam par shes pa brgyad las dkar po la 
[\[48b.6\]]sogs pa brgyad rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas te 'thon par gyur to/_/'thon nas kyang 'khor lo 'bar ba'i phyi rol shar phyogs nas 'khor bar khro bo'i gzugs kyis snying rje 'jigs tshul gyis stan la gnas so/_/de nas dgyes te he zhes brjod pas nyid kyi 
[\[48b.7\]]shes pa'i yul brgyad las seng gdong chen mo la sogs pa brgyad rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas te 'thon nas yang 'khor lo 'bar ba'i bar khyams su snying rje 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis stan la shin tu rngam pa'i stabs kyis gnas so/_/de nas dgyes te 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]phaT ces phyogs bcu'i zhing ma lus par bsgrags pas phyogs bcu'i zhing ma lus pa na 'gro ba rnams kyi don ma lus par mdzad pa thub pa chen po drug bcom ldan 'das drug 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad cing 'gro ba drug 'dul ba dang /_yid chos 
[\[49a.2\]]dbyings nas rol te spor byed nyi zer zhags pa can la sogs pa brgyad du gyur te/_'bar ba'i bar khyams gsum pa la zhing skam gsher spel ba'i gdan stengs su rang gi lag cha dang shin tu rngam pa'i stabs kyis shar phyogs nas 'khor bar gnas so/_/de nas dgyes te 
[\[49a.3\]]phaT ces brjod pas nyid kyi phyin ci log bzhi las rdo rje srings 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi rang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen po'i sgo bzhir snying rje 'jigs tshul gyi stan la shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs kyis thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du 
[\[49a.4\]]gnas so/_/de nas dgyes pa chen po'i sprin las/_bud+d+ha rol pa'i phyag rgya bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis dus gcig tu phaT ces brjod pas thams cad khros nas 'byung mo thams cad kyang rang gi gnas su yud tsam gyis phyin par dgye'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 
[\[49a.5\]]'thung chen po de nyid thugs rje chen pos bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa cig char zhugs te sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo /_/o~M badzra a mr-i ta ma hA kro d+hi a~M a~M zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das 
[\[49a.6\]]khrag 'thung chen po'i snam logs nas 'thon to/_/'dam khu blud de dran pa rnyed do/_/de nas khrag 'thung chen po de dag kun ya mtshan chen por gyur te cho 'phrul chen po mdzad pa mthong ngo /_/de dag gi dus su 'jig rten drug na gnas pa'i dregs pa chen po rnams 
[\[49a.7\]]dus gcig tu btul bar mthong ste/_shin tu zhum zhing bred nas mgrin gcig tu smras pa/_'bangs su mchi 'bangs su mchi/_/'bangs su nan tan ma bgyis na/_/mgo dang lus kyang brgyar 'gas shing /_/snying yang gas shing gtubs gyur cig_/rul 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]myags tshig nas rlag pa dang /_/dmyal bar lhung nas 'bod par shog_/ces 'bangs su mchi bar rang rang gis dmod btsugs so/_/de nas de dag kun dkyil 'khor gyi gdan du bzhag go/_/de nas yang de thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/_rang rang 
[\[49b.2\]]gi chung ma dang /_bu mo dang /_rang rang gi ma dang /_sring mo rnams dkyil 'khor du phul te/_bdag cag rnams kyi mchis brang dang /_/ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams/_/dkyil 'khor chen por bzhes su gsol/_/dpa' bo lha rjes bzhes su gsol/_/bdag 
[\[49b.3\]]cag 'khor tshogs thams cad kyis/_/'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di/_/ming tsam 'dzin par su bgyid pa/_/nor bu rin chen 'bar ba ltar/_/de yi dgos pa rdzogs par bgyid/_/ces dmod btsugs so/_/de nas de'i ma dang /_sring mo dang /_chung 
[\[49b.4\]]ma dang /_bu mo rnams yud tsam gyis phyin par 'ongs nas las kyi dngos grub stsol ba las/_/de nas khrag 'thung ye shes chen pos ming btags/_lag tu rdo rje byin nas rdo rje bran dang pho nyar dbang bskur ro/_/de nas dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen po'i don 
[\[49b.5\]]phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gsal zhing 'bar bar bya ba'i phyir ye shes rgyal mo de nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang gnyis su med par gyur nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje bla ma las 'di dag phyung ngo /_/e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos/_/mkha' 
[\[49b.6\]]dbyings gnyis su med pa las/_/mkha' la bla ma'i dkyil 'khor shar/_/khri btsugs nyi dkyil gdan stengs su/_/de la lha tshogs gdan du bting /_/hU~M 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte dbus su/_/khri bshams nyi dkyil ya bdud gdon/_/de yi steng du bsam 
[\[49b.7\]]bya ba/_/byang chub sems las sku bskyed pa/_/dpal chen bla med he ru ka_/dbu dgu phyag kyang [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad de/_/spyan yang 'bar ba nyi shu bdun/_/dbu la rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan gsol/_/zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad du gtams/_/rdo rje mthing ga khyung gi 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]gshog_/'jig rten khams kyang yog par bkab/_/sbrul nag 'jigs su rung ba dang /_/dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/_/dbu gsum dang la byung ba ni/_/g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal/_/rnam par thar ba'i dbu gsum gyis/_/
[\[50a.2\]]khams gsum mya ngan zlo ba'i zhal/_/dbu gsum bar nas rngam pa ni/_/g.yas sngo g.yon ljang dbus mthing zhal/_/thabs dang shes rab sems kyi dbu/_/srid gsum dbyings su rdzogs pa'i zhal/_/dbu gsum mtha' nas rngam pa ni/_/g.yas mthing g.yon mthing 
[\[50a.3\]]dbus mthing zhal/_/khams gsum re ba skong ba yi/_/lung dang man ngag sems kyi dbu/_/'gyur ba med pa'i mthing nag zhal/_/skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshems/_/dbu dgu rol pa'i byin brlabs las/_/g.yas gsum glog stong lce 'byin cing /_/g.yon 
[\[50a.4\]]gsum 'brug stong sgra sgrogs pa/_/dbu gsum rdo rje ser chen 'beb/_/spyan dgu dang la gzigs pa ni/_/chos dbyings kun du bzang po dang /_/kun du bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings la/_/'gyur ba med pa'i tshul gyis gzigs/_/spyan dgu bar nas gzigs 
[\[50a.5\]]pa ni/_/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyis/_/srid pa'i sems can thams cad la/_/byams mgon snyoms pa'i spyan gyis gzigs/_/spyan dgu mtha' nas gzigs pa ni/_/g.yas gsum zhe sdang khros pa'i spyan/_/gzigs pas bdud dang mu stegs 
[\[50a.6\]]sgrol/_/g.yon gsum byams mgon snyoms pa'i spyan/_/gzigs pas mtha' yas bde la 'jog_/dbu gsum ye shes rol pa'i spyan/_/gzigs pas skye 'gro gnas su stobs/_/dbu dgu rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan dgu/_/lnga dgu bzhi bcu rtsa lnga yang /_/bud+d+ha 
[\[50a.7\]]bzhi bcu rtsa lngas brgyan/_/stong pa chen po'i ye shes kyis/_/khyab bdal chen po'i rtags su bsnams/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad phyag na rol pa yis/_/stong pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dbyings su sbyor/_/zhabs brgyad nga rgyal dregs pa 'joms/_/thabs dang shes rab ldan pa 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]yis/_/rdo rje mthing ga gshog pa brkyang /_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad phyag na bsnams pa yis/_/rdo rje glo snying zhing chung g.yas/_/b+han d+ha zhing chen stir chen g.yon/_/nang zhags nyi ma khyung chen g.yas/_/zhing chen zla ba 'ug pa g.yon/_/me dang rgya mtsho ga'u g.yas/_/
[\[50b.2\]]rlung dang rin chen ri rab g.yon/_/yon tan [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dbyings su rdzogs/_/dang po rdo rje dung chen ni/_/khams gsum dbang du bsdus nas kyang /_/bdud dang mu stegs kun 'joms pa'o/_/gnyis pa stir chen glo snying ni/_/srid pa'i sems can thams cad 
[\[50b.3\]]kun/_/dam tshig sta na dbyings su sgrol/_/gsum pa stir chung ril mid ni/_/dug gsum rnam par sgrol ba'i rtags/_/bzhi pa stir chen nang zhags ni/_/rgyud lnga'i sems can dbyings su 'dren/_/lnga pa nyi zla zung du 'dzin/_/byang chub sems las g.yos pa 
[\[50b.4\]]med/_/drug pa khyung dang 'ug pa ni/_/mkha' 'gro thams cad 'khol ba'i rtags/_/bdun pa me dpung rlung gis 'thor/_/srid pa'i bag chags thal bar rlog_/brgyad pa ri rab rgya mtsho rnams/_/thams cad ma lus g.yeng gnas shing /_/'byung ba lnga 
[\[50b.5\]]la mnga' brnyes pa'o/_/dgu pa rin chen ga'u ni/_/dngos grub sprul pa 'byung ba'i rtags/_/dgu gnyis zung du ldan pa las/_/stong pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dbyings su rdzogs/_/dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan pa ni/_/thod skam 'bar ba phreng ba yis/_/zhi ba phyogs gcig mya ngan 
[\[50b.6\]]zlo/_/mngon par rdzogs pa'i sku brnyes pa'o/_/thod rlon 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'di/_/khams gsum dbang du bsdus nas su/_/sprul pa'i sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o/_/thod pa phyed tshal phreng bas ni/_/dug lnga bdud rtsir sbyor ba ste/_/longs spyod sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o/_/
[\[50b.7\]]zhing chen rlon pa'i na bza' ni/_/chos dbyings mnyam pa chen po ste/_/chos kyi sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o/_/stag lpags g.yang gzhi'i sham thabs ni/_/phrin las rnam bzhi'i rang bzhin te/_/rdo rje'i sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o/_/sbrul nag chun 'phyang mang po ni/_/
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]ye shes thams cad 'byung ba'i rtags/_/rtags chen sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o/_/zhabs brgyad lha brgyad brdzis pa ni/_/nga rgyal can rnams tshar gcod pa'o/_/sangs rgyas khros pa'i rgyal mo ni/_/kro d+hi shwa ri yum gyi gtso/_/mthing nag 'bar 
[\[51a.2\]]ba'i ral pa can/_/rgyan dang cha lugs gtso dang mthun/_/'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis su/_/b+han d+ha rak+ta gtso la stobs/_/'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam/_/shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs na/_/khri dang nyi dkyil nyi zla'i gdan/_/de yi steng du bsam 
[\[51a.3\]]bya ba/_/gzugs kyi phung po gnas gyur pa/_/khrag 'thung bud+d+ha he ru ka_/dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/_/g.yas ljang g.yon sngo dbus ser zhal/_/phyag drug mngon par rol pa las/_/'khor lo dgra sta zhags pa g.yas/_/b+han d+ha rde'u chung 
[\[51a.4\]]kha T+wA~M g.yon/_/ser nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan/_/bde gshegs khros pa'i rgyal mo dang /_/'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam/_/lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs na/_/khri dang nyi dkyil gshin rje'i gdan/_/de yi steng du bsam bya ba/_/tshor ba'i 
[\[51a.5\]]phung po gnas gyur pa/_/khrag 'thung rat+na he ru ka_/dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/_/g.yas ser g.yon dmar dbus sngo zhal/_/phyag drug mngon par rol pa las/_/rin chen gshol dang gtun shing g.yas/_/b+han d+ha dgra sta rde'u chung 
[\[51a.6\]]g.yon/_/sngo nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan/_/rin chen khros pa'i rgyal mo dang /_/'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam/_/nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su/_/khri dang nyi dkyil klu yi gdan/_/de yi steng du bsam bya ba/_/'du shes phung po gnas 
[\[51a.7\]]gyur pa/_/khrag 'thung pad+ma he ru ka_/dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/_/g.yas sngo g.yon dmar dbus ljang zhal/_/phyag drug mngon par rol pa las/_/pad+ma rde'u chung spu gri g.yas/_/b+han d+ha kha T+wAM so phreng g.yon/_/dmar nag dur khrod 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]rgyan gyis brgyan/_/pad+ma khros pa'i rgyal mo dang /_/'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam/_/byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs na/_/khri dang nyi dkyil gnod sbyin gdan/_/de yi steng du bsam bya ba/_/'du byed phung po gnas gyur pa/_/khrag 'thung karma he ru ka/
[\[51b.2\]]dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/_/g.yas dmar g.yon ser dbus ljang zhal/_/phyag drug mngon par rol pa las/_/ral gri zhags pa rde'u chung g.yas/_/b+han d+ha thod dbyug kha T+wAM g.yon/_/ljang nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan/_/las mchog 
[\[51b.3\]]khros pa'i rgyal mo dang /_/'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bzhugs/_/'khor lo 'bar ba'i phyi rim na/_/me dpung 'bar ba'i gzhal yas na/_/mkha' dbyings gnyis su med pa las/_/mkha' las skyes pa'i phra men ma/_/shar phyogs su ni bsam bya ba/_/
[\[51b.4\]]sa bdag bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/_/kun gzhi gnas gyur phra men ma/_/rnal 'byor sngo nag go'u ri ma/_/ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil/_/mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol/_/spyugs par glu blangs ha has bzhad/_/sti ra dbyug pa 
[\[51b.5\]]g.yas pa na/_/b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na/_/skye shi ma la brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/lho phyogs ngos su bsam bya ba/_/gsod skyen bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/_/rnam shes gnas gyur phra men ma/_/rnal 'byor ser nag tso'u ri ma/_/ral pa kham nag 
[\[51b.6\]]gyen du 'khyil/_/mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol/_/spyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad/_/thabs kyi mda' drangs g.yas pa na/_/shes rab bzhu bdungs g.yon pa na/_/ya ma ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/nub kyi phyogs su bsam 
[\[51b.7\]]bya ba/_/nyi ma bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/_/nyon mongs gnas gyur phra men ma/_/rnal 'byor dmar nag pra mo ha/_/ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil/_/mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon/_/spyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad/_/chu srin rgyal 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]mtshan g.yas pa na/_/b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na/_/sUr+ya ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/byang gi phyogs su bsam bya ba/_/zla ba bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/_/reg bya gnas gyur phra men ma/_/rnal 'byor mthing nag pe ta li/_/ral pa kham nag gyen 
[\[52a.2\]]du 'khyil/_/mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon/_/spyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad/_/rdo rje rtse lnga g.yas pa na/_/stir chung mgo gcod g.yon pa na/_/tsan+t+ra ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/shar lho mtshams su bsam bya ba/_/me lha bsgyel ba'i 
[\[52a.3\]]gdan stengs su/_/lta byed phra men gnas gyur pa/_/rnal 'byor dmar nag puk+ka si/_/skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs shing /_/dur khrod g.yang gzhi slag pa gyon/_/spyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad/_/sti ra chen po g.yas pa na/_/tshems 
[\[52a.4\]]bar rgyu 'dren g.yon pa na/_/ag+ne ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/lho nub mtshams su bsam bya ba/_/bden bral bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/_/nyan byed gnas gyur phra men ma/_/rnal 'byor mthing nag sma sha ni/_/skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan 
[\[52a.5\]]brdabs shing /_/srog chags chen po g.yang gzhi gyon/_/spyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad/_/sti ra chung ngu g.yon pa na/_/tsit+ta phyung ba g.yas pa na/_/ni ri til brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/nub byang mtshams su bsam bya ba/_/rlung lha bsgyel ba'i gdan 
[\[52a.6\]]stengs su/_/snom byed gnas gyur phra men ma/_/rnal 'byor ser nag tsaN+Da li/_/skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs shing /_/'jigs su rung ba'i slag pa gsol/_/spyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad/_/sti ra chung ngu g.yas pa na/_/b+han d+ha bcad 
[\[52a.7\]]pa g.yon pa na/_/ba ya be la brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/byang shar mtshams su bsam bya ba/_/dbang ldan bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/_/myong byed gnas gyur phra men ma/_/rnal 'byor ljang nag g+has ma ri/_/skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs shing /_/
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]sti ra chen po'i shun pa gsol/_/spyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad/_/b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yas pa na/_/rtse gsum 'khrug pa g.yon pa na/_/i shwa ra la brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rim du/_/smug nag 'bar ba'i bar khyams na/_/gsang 
[\[52b.2\]]ba'i mkha' las skur bskyed pa/_/shar gyi phyogs su bsam bya ba/_/dri za bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/_/kun gzhi yul las gnas gyur pa/_/phra men thogs med seng ge'i gdong /_/rnal 'byor ser nag seng ge ma/_/mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang 
[\[52b.3\]]gzhi gyon/_/phyag gnyis bsnol nas shin tu 'gying /_/sti ra chen po sprug cing gsol/_/in+d+ra ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/lho yi phyogs su bsam bya ba/_/grul bum bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/_/rnam shes yul la gnas gyur pa/_/phra men dpa' 
[\[52b.4\]]bo stag gi gdong /_/rnal 'byor dmar nag bya g+h+r-i ma/_/mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon/_/phyag gnyis gyad kyi 'dor tshul gyis/_/stir chung bskyur nas 'bru tshugs lta/_/ra tri'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/nub kyi phyogs su bsam bya ba/_/
[\[52b.5\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/_/nyon mongs yul la gnas gyur pa/_/phra men rtog 'dul wa yi gdong /_/rnal 'byor dmar nag sri ka ma/_/mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon/_/phyag gnyis stir chen nang grol 'dru/_/hri 'di gdan la 
[\[52b.6\]]brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/byang gi phyogs su bsam bya ba/_/gnod sbyin bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/_/reg bya yul la gnas gyur pa/_/phra men btang snyoms spyang mo'i gdong /_/rnal 'byor mthing nag shwa na ma/_/mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon/_/
[\[52b.7\]]phyag gnyis rol pa chen po yis/_/sti ra phyed mar btsal nas gsol/_/yak+Sha'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/shar lho mtshams su bsam bya ba/_/srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/_/lta byed yul la gnas gyur pa/_/phra men gzi brjid bya rgod gdong /_/
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]rnal 'byor dmar nag kri ta ma/_/mchu brdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon/_/zangs gri rnon po g.yas pa na/_/rgyu zhags drang ba g.yon pa na/_/rak+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/lho nub mtshams su bsam bya ba/_/srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan 
[\[53a.2\]]stengs su/_/nyan byad yul la gnas gyur pa/_/phra men gsal byed dur bya'i gdong /_/rnal 'byor rnal ma kang+ka ma/_/mchu brdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol/_/stir chung stod smad g.yas g.yon na/_/rngam pa'i tshul gyis phrag la bkal/_/rak+Sha sa la 
[\[53a.3\]]brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/nub byang mtshams su bsam bya ba/_/srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/_/snom byed yul la gnas gyur ba/_/phra men sa le bya rog gdong /_/rnal 'byor dmar nag kha khwa ma/_/mchu brdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon/_/
[\[53a.4\]]zangs gri dmar po g.yas pa na/_/b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na/_/rak+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/byang shar mtshams su bsam bya ba/_/srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/_/myong byed yul la gnas gyur pa/_/phra men rdzogs byed 'ug pa'i gdong /_/rnal 
[\[53a.5\]]'byor ljang nag hu lu ma/_/mchu brdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol/_/rdo rje lcags kyu g.yas pa na/_/stir chung spyi 'joms g.yon pa na/_/rak+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/'bar ba'i bar khyams tha ma la/_/thod skam 'bar ba'i gzhal yas 
[\[53a.6\]]na/_/zhing chen bsnol ma'i gdan stengs su/_/shar gyi phyogs su bsam bya ba/_/nyul byed yul la gnas gyur pa/_/sbor byed chen mo mi zad ma/_/sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog ma/_/zhing chen rol pa'i slag pa gsol/_/ral pa kham nag gyen 
[\[53a.7\]]du 'bar/_/spyugs pas glu blangs srid gsum 'bar/_/ha ha gad mos ye shes rol/_/nyi zer zhags pa g.yas pa na/_/b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na/_/ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/lho yi phyogs su bsam bya ba/_/mi mgon thub pa gnas 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]gyur pa/_/spor byed chen mo mdung thung 'phen/_/rnal 'byor ser nag nyul chen ma/_/ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil/_/mi yi g.yang gzhi gos su gyon/_/spyugs pas glu blangs srid gsum sbyangs/_/ha ha gad mos mi rnams spor/_/rdo rje mdung thung g.yas pa 
[\[53b.2\]]na/_/b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na/_/ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/nub kyi phyogs su bsam bya ba/_/chos kyi dbyings las gnas gyur pa/_/spor byed rdo rje dril 'khrol ma/_/rnal 'byor mtshon du med pa'i sku/_/ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar/_/chos nyid 
[\[53b.3\]]dbyings kyi na bza' gsol/_/spyugs pas glu blangs stong khams spor/_/ha ha gad mos dbyings su sbyor/_/gsung bsgrags dril bu g.yas pa na/_/b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na/_/ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/byang gi mtshams su bsam bya ba/_/lha min thub 
[\[53b.4\]]pa gnas gyur pa/_/spor byed thod phreng skar mda'i gdong /_/rnal 'byor sngo nag nyul chen ma/_/srog chags chen po'i g.yang gzhi gyon/_/ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar/_/spyugs pas glu blangs khams gsum sbyangs/_/ha ha gad mos lha rnams spor/_/rdo rje 
[\[53b.5\]]skar mda' g.yas pa na/_/b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na/_/ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/shar lho mtshams su bsam bya ba/_/lha 'dul thub pa gnas gyur pa/_/spor byed khyung thogs gnod sbyin ma/_/rnal 'byor mthing nag nyul chen ma/_/'jigs 
[\[53b.6\]]byed g.yang gzhi gos su gyon/_/ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar/_/spyugs pas glu blangs stong khams grags/_/ha ha gad mos lha rnams spor/_/rdo rje khyung chen g.yas pa na/_/b+ha d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na/_/ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/lho nub 
[\[53b.7\]]mtshams su bsam bya ba/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]thub pa gnas gyur pa/_/spor byed me khyer glog phreng 'dzin/_/rnal 'byor dmar nag nyul chen ma/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mgrin [{]rings [,]ring [}]g.yang gzhi gyon/_/ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar/_/spyugs pas glu blangs snang srid sbyangs/_/
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]ha ha'i gad mos [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]spor/_/rdo rje glog phreng g.yas pa na/_/b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na/_/ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/nub byang mtshams su bsam bya ba/_/byol song thub pa gnas gyur pa/_/spor byed 'jigs chen slog sha rdebs/_/
[\[54a.2\]]rnal 'byor smug nag nyul chen ma/_/ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar/_/slag chen brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi gyon/_/spyugs pas glu blangs stong khams grags/_/ha ha'i gad mos byol song spor/_/rdo rje slag sha g.yas pa na/_/b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na/_/ro rlon 
[\[54a.3\]]steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/byang shar mtshams su bsam bya ba/_/dmyal mgon thub pa gnas gyur pa/_/spor byed gshin rje ral gri sla/_/rnal 'byor sngo nag nyul chen ma/_/ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar/_/gshin rje g.yang gzhi gos su gyon/_/spyugs 
[\[54a.4\]]pas glu blangs srid gsum sbyangs/_/ha ha'i gad mos dmyal ba spor/_/rdo rje ral gri g.yas pa na/_/b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na/_/ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs/_/'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi la/_/phyin ci log bzhi gnas gyur pa/_/shar gyi sgor ni 
[\[54a.5\]]bsam bya ba/_/phag chen po yi gdan stengs su/_/rta gdong srin mo'i g.yang gzhi gsol/_/rdo rje lcags kyu g.yas pa na/_/b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na/_/phag chen po yi gdan stengs su/_/stobs chen khro bo chen po dang /_/'khril ba chen po'i tshul du 
[\[54a.6\]]bzhugs/_/rngam pa'i tshul gyis phyir bltas pa'o/_/lho yi sgor ni bsam bya ba/_/ra gdong chen mo'i gdan stengs su/_/phag gdong chen mo'i g.yang gzhi gyon/_/lcags kyi dril zhags g.yas pa na/_/b+han d+ha rlon pa g.yon pa na/_/ra gdong chen mo'i 
[\[54a.7\]]gdan stengs su/_/khro chen gshin rje gshed po dang /_/'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis su/_/rngam pa'i tshul gyis bltas pa'o/_/nub kyi sgor ni bsam bya ba/_/bum rna chen mo'i gdan stengs su/_/dred gdong chen mo g.yang gzhi gyon/_/lcags sgrog me 'bar 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]g.yas pa na/_/b+han d+ha rlon pa g.yon pa na/_/srin po bum rna'i gdan stengs su/_/khro chen rta mgrin chen po dang /_/'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis su/_/rngam pa'i tshul gyis phyir bltas pa'o/_/byang gi sgor ni bsam bya ba/_/gsus po che yi gdan stengs su/_/spyang gdong 
[\[54b.2\]]chen mo g.yang gzhi gyon/_/dril bu thal chen g.yas pa na/_/b+han d+ha rlon pa g.yon pa na/_/gsus po che yi gdan stengs su/_/khro chen bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang /_/'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis su/_/rngam pa'i tshul gyis phyir bltas pa'o/_/ho badzra gu h+ya tshig tu'o/_/
[\[54b.3\]]gsang ba'i snying po'i de kho na nyid nges pa sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po las bdud btul ba dang nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi che ba'i yon tan phyogs bcur gsal ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid gsung gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di 
[\[54b.4\]]yang dag par grags shing dam tshig rjes su 'dzin pa'i dgongs pa rtser chib nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo /_/bru~M bi shwa kro d+ha badzra dz+wa la maN+Da la tsakra hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT/_ha la ha la du tri tsakra nAn/_sUr+ya tsan+d+ra pad+ma de ba tiSh+Tha nAn/_/hU~M hU~M ha ha hU~M hU~M badzra ma hA 
[\[54b.5\]]shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA na ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/_hU~M badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA shI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA na ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/_o~M sarba ta thA ga to bud+d+ha/_ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/_o~M trA~M rat+na ma hA shrI he ru ka 
[\[54b.6\]]ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA na ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/_trA~M sUr+ya rat+na ma hA kro d+hI shA ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/_o~M hrIH_pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA na ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/_hrIHshwa pad+ma ba mu ka ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/_ha karma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA na 
[\[54b.7\]]ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/_karma ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/_badzra ke'u ri ha/_badzra tse'u ri ha/_badzra pra mo hA ha/_badzra pe tA li ha/_badzra puk+ka si ha/_badzra g+hasma ri ha/_badzra sma sha ni ha/_badzra tsaN+Da li ha/_badzra sing ha mu kha he/_badzra byA g+h+r-i mu kha he/_badzra sri la mu 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]kha he/_badzra shwa na mu kha he/_badzra gr-i d+ha mu kha he/_badzra kang+ka mu kha he/_badzra gA ka mu kha he/_badzra hu lu ka mu kha he/_badzra Ar+ya te tsa te nga tsa/_badzra a mo g+ha hU~M/_badzra A lo ka ba~M/_badzra b+hasmi pA la ya ba to ho/_eh+ye hi phri ta Ar+ya ni tsa 
[\[55a.2\]]tu ra ba ya phaT/_badzra be yo gi pra ti Ar+ya ni tsa tu ra thA ya hU~M phaT/_badzra mu a ni a pra ti Ar+ya ni pa shi ka ra phaT/_badzra mu ni a pra ti Ar+ya pa ni shi ka ra phaT/_badzra mu ni a suM ba a ni ba shi ka ra phaT/_badzra mu ni 
[\[55a.3\]]a pra ti Ar+ya ni pa shi ka ra phaT/_badzra mu ni a du pri ti a ni pa shi ka ra phaT/_e h+ye hi A na ya ho/_o~M ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/_dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH_badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hU~M phaT ces gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyis stong gsum gyi dkyil 'khor khyab par dus gcig khyab par 
[\[55a.4\]]grags pa dang /_dam nod pa bka' nyan gyi tshogs ma'i srin mo la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang so so'i srog gi snying po phul lo/_/badzra ma nu rAk+Sha si/_badzra pra ma ni/_badzra rau tri/_badzra baiSh+Na be/_badzra ping ga laM/_badzra ke ma ri/_badzra in+d+ra na/_badzra su ra ya tra/_badzra so hu mya/_
[\[55a.5\]]badzra a mr-i ta/_badzra da na ta/_badzra rAk+Sha si/_badzra bak+Sha si/_badzra ra ti ha~M/_badzra ru ti ha~M/_badzra e ka tsa ra~M/_badzra ma no ha ra~M/_badzra sa na d+hi ha~M/_badzra ba ya bya/_badzra ma hA ma ram na/_badzra ag+ne ye/_badzra tsa mun+t+ri/_badzra pu tra na/_badzra ba ru Ni/_badzra ma hA kA la/_badzra 
[\[55a.6\]]tIk+Sh+Na ba~M/_badzra laM po d+ha ra/_ye shes rgyal po dgongs su gsol/_/khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa/_thugs rjes khro dpal rngam pa'i tshogs/_/'bar ba'i byin brlabs rmad po che/_de nyid du ni bdag la stsol/_/oM badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/_o~M badzra sa ma ya hoH/_badzra sa ma ya 
[\[55a.7\]]phaT/_a li u li ta li ta pa li da~M sta~M kho na rau tri kha ra yo ga ni kha ra~M hU~M ha he phaT ces brjod pas_/'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu kun/_/tshig cing 'bar bas thams cad khyab/_/gsung gi khro tshogs chen po yis/_/kun du khyab cing gang gyur to/_/de nas bcom 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi de dag gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir nges par brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa/_/gru chad bzhis brgyan par khyams dang /_/gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan/_/'bar ba'i bar 
[\[55b.2\]]khyams gsum gyis mdzes/_/thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid/_/'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po 'khrug_/khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag_/gtum pa dom gyi sbar bas ni/_/dbang phyug lha chen la sogs pa/_/dregs pa chen po gtum tshogs mnan/_/gdan du 
[\[55b.3\]]byas te sku bzhugs pa/_/smug nag sngo nag ser nag dang /_/dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/dbu dgu phyag ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_/dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/_/rngam pa'i sgra chen 'jigs par sgrogs/_/stag lug sbrul dang 
[\[55b.4\]]nyi mar chas/_/sti ra che chung nang zhags dang /_/khyung dang yid bzhin nor bu dang /_/stong gi 'jig rten khor yug bcas/_/rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang /_/ral gri dgra stang shol la sogs/_/rang gi lag cha sna tshogs dang /_/btsun mo 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang 
[\[55b.5\]]bcas/_/gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang /_/spor byed chen mo brgyad rnams dang /_/dbyug pa mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin/_/sgo bzhi'i phyag rgyar mdzes pa dang /_/lcags kyu la sogs thod pas mdzes/_/slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/_/bcu gnyis dang 
[\[55b.6\]]ni brgyad kyis mdzes/_/rang gi stan dang lag char chas/_/ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du/_sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis gang zhing khyab par gyur 
[\[55b.7\]]to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po de nyid don yod pa'i 'bras bu chen po dam tshig chen pos gzung ba'i phyir 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig rdo rje 'di gsungs so/_/bla med mi spong bla ma bkur/_/sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad/_/yang dag lam 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]du zhugs la byams/_/gsang ba'i don phyir smra mi bya/_/rtsa ba'i dam tshig chen po ni/_/gdong chen bcu yi don rtogs kyang /_/rtsa ba gsum po mi 'da'o/_/yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis ni/_/gti mug 'dod chags zhe sdang dang /_/nga rgyal phrag 
[\[56a.2\]]dog mi spong ngo /_/dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chu/_/dag pa'i snod bcud mi dor ro/_/spyi dpal bcu yi mnga' brnyes kyang /_/yan lag bcu po mi dor ro/_/gzhan yang yan lag dam tshig rnams/_/'da' bar mi mdzad rdo rje dam/_/sa ma ya ni rdo rje che/_/mi 'da' 
[\[56a.3\]]rgyal ba nyid kyi dam/_/bsam rdzogs lhun grub che mthar phyin/_/srid gsum dag pa dbang chen sgyur/_/mi 'jigs kun tu bzang por spyod/_/theg pa mtha' yas 'dul ba'i thabs/_/ji snyed sdom pa mtha' las pa/_/ma lus rnam dag lhun gyis rdzogs/_/
[\[56a.4\]]nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang /_/tshe thung bsam pa log pa dang /_/mya ngan sdug bsngal chen po dang /_/dmyal ba nyid ni rdo rje byed/_/dgu rdzogs bcur ldan gsum gyis sbyangs/_/bskang ba la sogs mtha' yas mchog_/ces gsungs pas de bzhin 
[\[56a.5\]]gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ro/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las 'jigs byed chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig rdo rje'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal 
[\[56a.6\]]po de nyid chos thams cad man ngag bla ma chen po'i snying po byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i ngang du snyigs ma med par byung btab pa'i phyir sku gsung thugs bla ma chen po'i thig le chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas man ngag bla ma chen po'i snying po 'di phyung ngo /_/
[\[56a.7\]]byang chub sems kyi bde chen la/_/rgyu rkyen rten dang len bcas pa'i/_/skyon med thig le chen po las/_/ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs/_/phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs/_/'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang /_/rang bzhin gsang ba'i 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]don rnams ni/_/yi ge tshig la rab brten te/_/khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa/_/ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas/_/dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/_/dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba/_/thugs 
[\[56b.2\]]kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog_/dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i thig le dbyings/_/'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum/_/byed pa rigs kyi gtso bo ste/_/byang chub sems kyi rdo rje'i tshogs/_/dbang po yul dus rig pa'i rnams/_/bdag nyid chen po lhag 
[\[56b.3\]]par rdzogs/_/thugs kyi ye shes lngas blta zhing /_/snying po thig le mnyam sbyor bas/_/bde ba'i ye shes chen por rol/_/ye shes dgyes pa mchog tu 'bul/_/zad med zag pa med pa yi/_/bsod nams ye shes sgyu mar rol/_/rol mo'i dkyil 
[\[56b.4\]]'khor mtha' yas mchog_/gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings/_/phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa'i dbyings/_/sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs/_/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun/_/ma lus bdag gis dbang sgyur ro/_/dbang sgyur ye shes rol pa 
[\[56b.5\]]yis/_/dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor rdzogs/_/rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub/_/rdzogs chen rtogs pa chen po yis/_/rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs/_/rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bas/_/thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ma 
[\[56b.6\]]lus 'byung /_/phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon/_/sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor ma lus sgrol/_/bya ba med pa'i dkyil 'khor spyod/_/ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la/_/thos bsam bsgom pa'i mnyam sbyor bas/_/rang 'byung kun nas lhun 
[\[56b.7\]]gyis grub/_/'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yin/_/rgyu rkyen rten dang ldan pa yi/_/thams cad byang chub sems kyi dbyings/_/byang chub sems kyi bde chen gyis/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad dbyings su thim/_/
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]thig le chen po bla ma las/_/sgyu ma byang chub lam du bstan/_/skyon dang yon tan thams cad kyang /_/byang chub thig le nyid kyi ngang /_/spyod pa rnam pa nyid kyi yang /_/thig le chen po'i lam du nges/_/sgyu ma rol pa'i dkyil 'khor yang /_/thig le 
[\[57a.2\]]chen po'i dbyings su sbyor/_/sdom pa rnam pa bcu gsum dang /_/spyi yi dam tshig mtha' yas pa/_/thig le chen po'i ngang du gsal/_/snod bcud 'jig rten ma lus pa/_/thig le nyid kyi rol pa'i dbyings/_/tshogs chen rnam pa gnyis po yang /_/byang chub 
[\[57a.3\]]sems kyi dbyings su nges/_/gzhal yas khang dang rgyan rnams dang /_/cho 'phrul byang chub sems su thim/_/khro tshogs bdud 'dul rol pa yang /_/byang chub sems su nges pa yin/_/'gro drug sems can gsum po yang /_/ye shes drug dang sku gsum 
[\[57a.4\]]du/_/nges pa'i thig le chen po yin/_/lnga yi rten dang rkyen bzhi yang /_/dbyings kyi ma dang dus kyi sring /_/thig le chen po'i ngang du 'dus/_/snga phyi gsum dang yod med khams/_/sku gsung thugs su nges bstan pa'i/_/thig le byang chub sems su nges/_/
[\[57a.5\]]phung po khams dang skye mched kyang /_/phyag rgya bzhi bcu gnyis po yang /_/thig le nyid las gzhan na med/_/bzhi yi las dang gcig po yang /_/thig le sems kyi ngang du gsal/_/'gro ba'i don du 'byung ba yi/_/dgu dang stong phrag brgya bcu bzhi/_/byang chub 
[\[57a.6\]]sems las gzhan na med/_/bde skyid sdug bsngal mang po yang /_/rtogs pa bde chen dbyings kyi don/_/ye shes ye shes rol pa yang /_/rdo rje snying po'i dbyings su nges/_/kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' dang /_/dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams/_/nyag gcig 
[\[57a.7\]]yab tu nges par rdzogs/_/thar pa'i lam mchog dbyings kyi yum/_/kun du bzang mo la sogs kyang /_/thig le ma yi ngang du gsal/_/gzhal yas khang dang dkyil 'khor dang /_/bzhugs gnas khyad par mang po yang /_/ye shes chen po'i gnas su bsdu/_/
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]mchod pa'i rgyan dang longs spyod kun/_/rigs pa'i byang chub sems chen po/_/cho 'phrul chen po'i ngang du 'dus/_/rgyu 'bras gnyis kyi ngo bo dang /_/chos so cog gi rang bzhin rnams/_/byang chub sems su nges pas na/_/dkar nag las kyis ma gsungs so/_/byang 
[\[57b.2\]]chub sems kyi bde chen ni/_/ci yang med las cir yang snang /_/cis kyang ma bcos g.yung drung sku/_/cir mi mdzad la thams cad sgrol/_/dmigs pa med par kun la khyab/_/ma bskos rgyal po yang dag pa/_/ma sbyangs ye shes snying po che/_/ma bsgoms cig car don nyid rdzogs/_/ma bsgrubs 
[\[57b.3\]]rgyal ba kun gyi gtso/_/ma sbyangs skyon dang yon tan med/_/tshig dang yi ges mi mtshon te/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyis rnyed par dka'/_/kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' yis/_/rnyed nas rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor spyod/_/
[\[57b.4\]]spyod pas 'gro ba sgrol ba ste/_/de la nyes pa'i skyon mi mnga'/_/zhes gsungs pas/_phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes nas stug pos brgyan pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs so/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las 
[\[57b.5\]]man ngag snying po byang chub sems bde ba chen po'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas yang ye shes rgyal po de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dgongs pa yang dag pa'i phrin las chen po 'di ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ched du sku 
[\[57b.6\]]gsung thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog_/'bar ba gtum chen rngam pa la/_/khros pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/_/sangs rgyas bsod nams sku yang 'jig_/bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la/_/mtshan ma ming 
[\[57b.7\]]du bcas par bya/_/bkug nas rdo rje'i phur pas gdab/_/rdul du byas nas tshogs la 'bul/_/e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas/_/bcings gyur bskyod nas phyogs bcur g.yos/_/myos 'gyur gas te tshig 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]par 'gyur/_/pa~M gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog_/'bar ba'i gzi brjid lhun chen la/_/chags pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/_/rdo rje gsum yang dbang du 'gyur/_/bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la/_/mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya/_/rdo rje chags 
[\[58a.2\]]pa'i phur bas gdab/_/chags pa'i tshogs la thim par dbul/_/ba~M gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas/_/ci 'dod de bzhin byed par 'gyur/_/ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog_/'bar ba'i 'du 'phro'i gzi chen 
[\[58a.3\]]la/_/dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/_/yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/_/bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la/_/yon tan yid bzhin gter du brtag_/nga rgyal dga' 'phro'i phur bas gdab/_/rdo rje gzi brjid 'phel bar brtag_/ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 
[\[58a.4\]]'khor du/_/lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas/_/gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'phrul chen spro/_/yid bzhin nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/_/ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog_/gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la/_/dang ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/_/gtum chen 
[\[58a.5\]]rngam po'ang lha ner 'gyur/_/bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la/_/gtum chen 'khrug pa'i ngo bor brtag_/lhan ner gsal ba'i phur bas gdab/_/'bar ba lha ne'i tshogs la 'bul/_/ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas/_/'bar ba lha 
[\[58a.6\]]ne'i byin gyis khyab/_/thams cad g.yo ba med par 'gyur/_/a/_thams cad rdzogs pa chen po ste/_/las su ma gyur gcig kyang med/_/las kyi khyad par rdzogs pa yi/_/srid pa gsum du bsdus pa rnams/_/byin gyis ma brlabs gcig kyang med/_/rdzogs pa 
[\[58a.7\]]chen po'i phrin las kyis/_/sbyangs pas bsam rdzogs lhun gyis grub/_/ho/_slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/_/lhag ma kha chu 'dod pa sbyin/_/rang gi dam tshig rab bsgrubs te/_/gang 'dod las de byed par bsgo/_/khrag 'thung chen po la sogs te/_/bro gar glu tshig 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]chen mos ni/_/ji ltar 'dod pa thams cad kun/_/thams cad ma lus byed pa yin/_/mdzod ldan chen mo la sogs te_/bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/_/'du bar 'dod na 'du bar byed/_/'phel bar 'dod na 'phel bar byed/_/lbos mo chen mo la sogs te/_/bro gar 
[\[58b.2\]]glu tshig chen mos ni/_/rmongs par 'dod na rmongs par byed/_/myos par 'dod na myos par byed/_/seng gdong chen mo la sogs te/_/bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/_/thams cad kun la za bar byed/_/rdul cha tsam yang med par byed/_/bzhad gdong chen mo la sogs te/_/
[\[58b.3\]]bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/_/thams cad kun la 'byin par byed/_/kun la rab tu nyams par byed/_/a/_spor byed chen mo la sogs te/_/nyul byed chen mo brgyad rnams la/_/bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/_/thams cad kun la nyul bar byed/_/ma lus gnas 
[\[58b.4\]]nas spor bar byed/_/slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/_/bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/_/sbad cing gtang bar bya ba ste/_/thams cad ma lus byed pa yin/_/ljon shing dang ni lcug phran tshal/_/sdong gcig dang ni me reg tu/_/dang ba dga' ba chags pa dang /_/khros 
[\[58b.5\]]pas ka li rab tu bya/_/zhes gsungs pas phrin las rnam pa bzhi sti ra'i rnga dang bcas par phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams 'dul bar gyur te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po 'jigs byed chen po de nyid dam tshig sti ra'i rnga bla ma rdung zhing sti ra rngam 
[\[58b.6\]]pa'i mdangs 'di phyung ngo /_/e yi tshogs chen 'byam pa ru/_/sti cha'i rnga chen sgra bsgrags pas/_/hU~M ha he phaT sgra 'byin cing /_/yig 'bru brgyad kyi byin brlabs kyis/_/ru lu hU~M b+h+yo'i gsung sgrogs pa/_/khro bo rngam pa'i sgra skad kyis/_/srid pa gsum tshang 
[\[58b.7\]]bshig nas kyang /_/stong gsum bsgral ba'i sgra 'byin pa'o/_/sti ra rnga chen 'di brdungs pas/_/gnod sbyin srin po kun bsgral te/_/mu stegs kun gyi snying yang 'byin/_/sti ra'i rnga chen 'di bsgrags pas/_/steng gsum khro bo'i tshogs kyis bkang /_/kun kyang 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]rnga brdung di ri ri/_/rnga sgra chen pos stong gsum bshig_/rnga sgra chen pos bdud dpung bsgral/_/rnga sgra chen pos srid gsum sbyangs/_/rnga sgra chen pos dgra bgegs 'dul/_/rnga sgra chen pos ngan song sbyangs/_/rnga sgra 'brug gi sgra bsgrags pas/_/na rag 
[\[59a.2\]]dmyal khams stongs bar byed/_/rnga sgra tug chem ri rab rnyil/_/sti ra rnga chen sgra phyung bas/_/phyin ci log rnams snying yang 'byin/_/rnga chen 'brug gi sgra sgrogs shing /_/rnga thabs glog stong 'gyur ba bzhin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dam bskang /_/ma mo 
[\[59a.3\]]mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig bskang /_/rnal 'byor rnam lnga'i dam tshig bskul/_/sti ra rnga chen 'di brdungs pas/_/nyan thos mdo sde gnas nas sbar/_/rang rgyal lta ba dbyings su sgrol/_/sti ra'i rnga chen 'di bsgrags pas/_/lha dang mi yi theg pa yang /_/bla med theg 
[\[59a.4\]]pa'i dbyings su btsud/_/sti ra rnga sgra 'di bsgrags pas/_/stong khams sti ra'i rnga sgras bkang /_/kun kyang rnga brdung di ri ri/_/rnga thabs glog stong lce 'byin cing /_/rnga skad 'brug stong sgra sgrogs pas/_/byin brlabs lcags kyi ser chen 'bebs/_/stong gsum 
[\[59a.5\]]'khrug cing srid gsum 'thor/_/rnga thabs g.yab mor bor ba dang /_/kha dang ka yi du mtshon gyis/_/thams cad gnam lcags chen pos btab/_/ka la chen po la sogs te/_/rdo rje chags 'og ldegs pa'i rnams/_/dus gcig tu ni tsit+ta 'byin/_/sti ra 
[\[59a.6\]]chen po'i rnga sgra yis/_/srid pa khrag gi rgya mtshor bskyil/_/dus gcig tu ni dbang chen rdzogs/_/rnga sgra rin chen khang pa brtsegs/_/bsam rdzogs che la dbang thang thob/_/rnga sgras g.yo ba med par byed/_/chos la 'dzud pa'i sgra yang 'byin/_/rnga sgras ci 'dod 
[\[59a.7\]]dgongs pa rdzogs/_/byang chub sems ltar de ma thag_/ces gsungs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi sbyor bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bla ma chen po 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]man ngag gi snying po dang bcas pa de la shin tu rngam pa'i mdangs kyis dgyes pa chen po'i glu 'di blangs so/_/hU~M gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar/_/'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi/_/khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin/_/mtshe ba zad yag za byed che/_/
[\[59b.2\]]ho/_hU~M rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir/_/tug chem ri rab 'bum rnyil skad/_/a la la yi gad rgyangs che/_/spyugs pa'i 'thor rlung g.yeng ba che/_ho/_hU~M khro bo'i shes rab 'od po che/_/ye shes dkyil 'khor kun du gsal/_/'bar ba'i ye shes kun du 
[\[59b.3\]]'joms/_/sna tshogs ye shes thig le che/_ho/_hU~M khro bo'i rgyal po sprin chen po/_/khros pa'i dkyil 'khor char chen 'bebs/_/dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter/_/sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che/_ho/_hU~M bdud rnams kun gyi bdud chen po/_/
[\[59b.4\]]bdud kyi bdud ste bdud rnams 'joms/_/'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs byed pa/_/'jigs byed chen po bdal ba che/_/hU~M rdo rje brag chen sra ba po/_/rdo rje chu bo sdud chen po/_/rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che/_/rdo rje rlung ste 'thor rlung che/_ho/_hU~M stong gsum khro bo'i dkyil 
[\[59b.5\]]'khor tshogs/_/'jigs byed mtshon du med pa'i sku/_/sna tshogs gsung dang sna tshogs thugs/_/'jigs byed rngam pa'i ye shes gter/_/ho zhes blangs pas stong gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jigs byed chen po rnams dbyer med pas mnyes 
[\[59b.6\]]par gyur to/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las dang yongs su mnyes pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'i don/_/gsang ba kun gyi bla ma ste/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po yin/_/nges don chos 
[\[59b.7\]]kyi snying po las/_/'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang /_/dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang /_/sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'phros te/_/sde snod kun dang rgyud kun yang /_/'byung nas gtan la nges par 'bebs/_/'gro drug sems 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]can gsum po yang /_/sta na chen po'i dbyings su bstan/_/ling ga pad+mar bcas pa yang /_/ga na chen po'i dbyings su sbyor/_/snang srid kha dog mang po yang /_/ga na chen po'i lam du bstan/_/rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di/_/rtogs nas 
[\[60a.2\]]smra bar gang byed pa/_/de nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs/_/rtag tu byang chub sems la gnas/_/tshe 'di nyid kyis mngon sangs rgyas/_/nor bu rin chen 'bar ba ltar/_/bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin 'grub/_/ces gsungs pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de 
[\[60a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes te/_mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings na lhun stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs so/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po las gdeng chen po'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//
[\[60a.4\]]rtogs pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i le'u stong phrag brgya pa las lung gi spyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma chen po'i le'u las thams cad ma lus par 'phros pa de dag gi 'bras bu'i mchog rdzogs so//_//_
[\[60a.5\]{D838}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya many+dzu shrI karma tsa tush+tsa kra gu h+ya tan+t+ra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa 'jam dpal las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud/_'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis 
[\[60a.6\]]thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen por gyur te/_yum chen mo dang gnyis su med pa'i mkha' la bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/_'khor khro bo dang /_khro mo dang /_ma mo dang /_mngag gzhug dang /_'bangs la sogs pa rnams 
[\[60a.7\]]kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa chen po la 'dud pa'i tshul du bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das btsun mo dang gnyis su med par gyur/_skye 'gag dang bral ba'i don 'di ston to/_/ye nas ma skyes gshin rje chen po'i tshogs/_/rnam dag 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]dbyings kyi rang nyid rnam par dag pa la/_/gnyis med 'dus pa'i sras mchog gshin rje gshed/_/thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag pa yi/_/kun gyi ye shes thams cad 'dus pa ste/_/thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/_/sems can 
[\[60b.2\]]ma lus mya ngan 'das pa'i lam/_/ye shes thams cad de yi ngang la rdzogs/_/'khor ba'i nyes skyon thams cad tshar gcad phyir/_/'dod chags 'dus pa'i dpal ldan gar gyi bdag_/bye ba phrag brgya dpag tu med par yang /_/'dul ba'i dbang 
[\[60b.3\]]gis de lta bu yi gzugs su bstan/_/zhes gsungs pas 'khor gyi khro bo dang khro mo la sogs pa thams cad mgu bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed chen po la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo/_/sems 
[\[60b.4\]]can 'khor bas gdungs pa la/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i lam mchog bstan/_/bstan pa dam pa 'di gsungs pas/_/thams cad sgrol ba ngo mtshar che/_/zhes gsol to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yum dang gcig tu 'dus 
[\[60b.5\]]te/_'di skad ces gsungs so/_/sprul pa'i sku dag tshad med dpag tu med/_/thun mong ma yin 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed/_/sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las rmad du byung /_/mi dge bcu dang mtshams med tshar gcad pa/_/zug rngu mi mnga' chos nyid rmad 
[\[60b.6\]]po che/_/chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/_/sprul pa'i sku dang gsum ni don dam kun du sbyor/_/phyogs bcu bde bar gshegs pa thugs kyi dpal/_/yang dag ye shes dpal yin 'jam dpal yin/_/zhes bstod de gnyis su med par gyur to/_/de nas de 
[\[60b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa dam pa de la 'khor gyis de bzhin du gsol pa la dgyes te/_'di skad ces gsungs so/_/zhi ba gnyis med chos kyi ngang nyid las/_/snying po gnyis med byang chub sems dpa'i don/_/thams cad 'dus pa'i bla med dam pa ste/_/de bzhin 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]gshegs pa'i snying po 'di bshad do/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta e h+ye hi ta thA ga ta pra ba ti/_bo d+hi satwa d+harma d+hA tu/_e h+ye hi dzaHhU~M h+ye hi h+ye hi hU~M hU~M hU~M/_zhes brjod nas brdas mtshon par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das steng gi phyogs su sems can thams cad 
[\[61a.2\]]sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/snyoms par zhugs pas phyogs la phyogs su bltas te/_rang bzhin gyis sgrol ba'i nus pa can du gyur te/_thams cad kyang sgrol bar gyur to/_/de nas yum gyi tshogs thams cad kyis dgyes pa chen po'i 
[\[61a.3\]]brda 'dis bcom ldan 'das la bskul lo/_/e ma'o phyogs bcu dus gsum rdzogs pa yi/_/ye shes 'dus pa'i phrin las mchog_/bla med theg pa nges pa la/_/sbyor ba mchog gis bshad du gsol/_/zhes bskul bas/_phyogs bcu'i de bzhin 
[\[61a.4\]]gshegs pa thams cad dgyes par gyur to/_/de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang phyug gi 'khor mya ngan las 'das pa thams cad dang bcas nas sku'i rgyan gyis brgyan te/_so so'i btsun mo'i dgyes pas sku'i nyams su bstar bar gyur 
[\[61a.5\]]to/_/de ltar gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ba spu langs te 'di skad ces ched du brjod do/_/sku gsung thugs rnams 'gro ba so sor 'dul/_/ngang gi zhi ba'i dbyings las ma g.yos kyang /_/phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro ba so sor 'dul/_/de phyir 
[\[61a.6\]]mchog gi rgyal po 'di bshad do/_/zhes gsungs pas/_'khor rnams rab tu dga' mgur rangs par gyur te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sku gsung thugs kyis 'gro ba rang rang 'dul/_/dbyings las 'dren pa rdo rje gsor byas te/_/'di ltar 'dul bar mdzad 
[\[61a.7\]]pa ngo mtshar che/_/zhes brjod do/_/sku la zhugs nas mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khro bos 'dul bar mkhyen nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/khra dang spyang ki srin mo mu stegs rnams/_/bdud dang log 'dren thams cad 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]tshar gcad phyir/_/chos nyid sgyu ma lta bu sprul nas phrin las mdzad/_/ces gsungs pas/_'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/_'di skad du/_e ma'o che ba'i yon tan kun la khyab pa la/_/ngang gis khro bor bstan pa 'di lta bu/_/ngo mtshar rmad byung sprul pa 'di lta 
[\[61b.2\]]bu/_/rab tu mi srun 'dul ba ngo mtshar che/_/zhes gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bskul bar 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/khyad par rim par bstan pa'i khro gnyer ni/_/ye shes dbyings kyis kun la khyab par ston/_/khro bo bzhi dang brgyad dang bcu 
[\[61b.3\]]la sogs/_/ston pa mchod phyir khro bo mang po bstan/_/ngang khro kun khyab shugs khro rang rang 'dul ba yi/_/bye brag so sor rab tu shes bya la/_/mtshan ma drag po zhi ba dbang dang rgyas/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzlog ste rab tu bshad par bya/_/lte bar bcas pa'i rtsibs can la/_/'khor 
[\[61b.4\]]ba gcod byed rtse mo can/_/gru gsum e yi pho brang a/_/zla gam rnam gsum dbang gi tshul/_/mu khyud dad can rgyas pa phyi/_/rnam bzhir ldan pa'i 'khor lo la/_/rab tu mdzes pa'i thig gdab bo/_/dbus su ma he'i zhing gdan la/_/rtse dbus zhing rkyang re re'o/_/
[\[61b.5\]]rus pa tshogs kyi dba' rlabs brag tu spungs/_/rak+ta khrag gi dpa' klong mtsho lta bu/_/gnam lcags ngur mo rab tu ta la la/_/dur khrod rab tu brgyan pa de bsham mo/_/dbus su khro rgyal gshin rje gshed/_/sku ni nag po dug 'dra la/_/dbu gsum dkar dmar mthing 
[\[61b.6\]]ba ste/_/ral pa kham nag srid rtser 'bar/_/rtse la me 'bar rked nas zhag kyang 'dzag_/rtsa ba chu ste sdang mig rab tu bgrad/_/phyag drug phyag mtshan bsnams pa'i thor tshugs ni/_/sdigs mdzub rgyu zhags lcags kyu g.yas/_/dung chen mdung thung gsal shing 
[\[61b.7\]]g.yon/_/zhabs bzhi thur du bstan pa ni/_/brkyang bskum tshul gyis 'gro ba dbang du sdud/_/sku stod glang chen ko ba zhing phrag la/_/sku smad stag ste sham thabs tsham ngam can/_/e yi pho brang dbus su'o/_/yum yang yab dang sku mthun te/_/pho brang dbus su 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]g.yon du'o/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis mche ba can/_/khram bam b+han d+ha bsnams pa'o/_/rtse la khro bo yab yum bcu/_/rab tu khros pa'i sdang mig can/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du dgod par bya/_/zla gam dur khrod ma mo ste/_/sgo la de bzhin bsrung 
[\[62a.2\]]ba'o/_/de la rim pas mgu bar bya/_/zhes brjod de/_'di sku gsung thugs las phyung ngo /_/o~M a kro many+dzu shrI mu~M/_/hU~M badzra kro d+ha b+hid nan hU~M/_o~M badzra be tA li rak+Sha maM/_/hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M/_hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M/_o~M ru ru du na/_o~M dza dza ya ba/_
[\[62a.3\]]o~M ya shug b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/_dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH_/zhes brjod pas phyogs bcu thams cad 'khrugs te/_g.yos so/_/'gul to/_/ldeg go/_/chem mo/_/'ur te/_g.yo 'gul du gyur te/_'khrugs par gyur to/_/de nas yum gyi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs par gsol 
[\[62a.4\]]ba gdab ste/_gsol bar zhus pa/_e ma'o rab tu blo ldan khyod/_/'jig rten 'khrugs par mdzad pa'o/_/dbang med las kyis mnar ba la/_/bder gshegs gsung du gsungs pa ste/_/rab tu bde bar mdzad du gsol zhes glengs pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[62a.5\]]ting nge 'dzin mchog gi rgyal po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs ste 'di gsungs so/_/o~M badzrA na la ka la hU~M badzra ga ta pra be sha ho/_zhes gsungs pas/_'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag rab tu 'jam par gyur to/_/gyur pas sems can thams cad slar sngon kho na 
[\[62a.6\]]bzhin du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed chen po la skyabs su dong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thabs dang shes rab kyi phyag rgyas mnyes par bya ba 'di gsungs so/_/rtse gcig mnyam par gzhag bya ste/_/sgeg mo g.yon du gnas 
[\[62a.7\]]par bya/_/bskul ba'i ting 'dzin brlan pa la/_/bskyod pa byang chub lam du drangs/_/gnas nyid bder gshegs skyed pa'i rkyen/_/rtse mo o~M la phaT du bstan/_/zhes gsungs pas/_phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rol mos mnyes 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]par gyur to/_/'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/_gleng gzhi'i rtsa ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las zhi bar bya ba 'di ched du brjod do/_/rab tu dkar ba'i yul dag la/_/mgu ba'i sems dang ldan byas te/_/dang bas 
[\[62b.2\]]mgu ba'i las byas zhes/_/bla med rgyal bas rab tu bshad/_/sa gzhi dkar ba rab mnyam la/_/gru bzhir ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor la/_/lte bar bcas shing rtsibs brgyad pa/_/mkhas pas bsgrims te bri bar bya/_/dkar dang ldan pa'i zla ba la/_/gcig nas gsum nas 
[\[62b.3\]]mgo btsugs la/_/khams gsum rab tu mgu bya'i phyir/_/nyams su lon par byas la bsgrubs/_/dbus su ye shes bdag po la/_/shar du nag 'joms chen po ste/_/lho ru ya ba ti zhes bya/_/nub tu khro bo dmigs pa la/_/byang du bdud 'joms dgod par bya/_/
[\[62b.4\]]shar lho lho nub nub byang dang /_/byang shar mtshams su dgod pa ni/_/glang mgo khro tshe gcod sbyong rje/_/las grub brgyad de [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin/_/steng 'og dmar po brag dgod bsgroms te dgod/_/zla gam lam mo gsum rnams so/_/sgo sgor sgo srung ma rnams bri/_/
[\[62b.5\]]de yi yum dang bcas pa rnams/_/khro bo nyid dang sku mthun pa'o/_/sems dpa'i 'dug stangs gnas byas la/_/sgeg mo g.yon du bsten byas la/_/sngags g.yog mdzes par tshogs byas la/_/mgu ba'i phrin las brtsam par bya/_/ske tshe thal ba rus pa la/_/
[\[62b.6\]]dzam+b+ha la yi gzugs lta bur/_/byas la snying gar bri ba ni/_/a ma pa la si ti'am/_/gang 'dod pa yi yi ge de/_/phaT dang swA hAs dam ltar bya/_/ming byang gong ltar bri byas la/_/gang ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du bzhag_/de la 'di yang rab tu brjod/_/o~M a 
[\[62b.7\]]kro badzra shAn+tiM na ga badzra swA hA/_o~M a kro te ka shAn+tiM ba la bu~M zhes brjod la snying gar brgyab na/_thams cad mgu nas dang ba'i sems kyis zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas zhi ba'i las byas zin nas/_phyogs bcu'i gdug pa zhi bar bya ste/_bdag la mi dga' ba 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]med na las 'grub pa yin no/_/'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/_thams cad zhi ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad rgyas par bya ba 'di ched du brjod do/_/gser las grub pa'i yul dag 
[\[63a.2\]]la'ang /_/dpal rgyas sems dang ldan byas te/_/rgyas par bya ba'i sems kyis su/_/dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad par bya/_/dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin byas la/_/ba yi chag chag btab byas te/_/rnal 'byor dam pa blo ldan pas/_/thig 'di gdab pa rab tu brtsam/_/
[\[63a.3\]]gser las grub pa'i thig skud la/_/dpal ldan 'phel ba'i sems dang bcas/_/slob ma dam pa las grub par/_/bsams la thig 'di gdab par bya/_/pho brang gser la rtse mo g.yu/_/rdo rje rtsig pa gser las grub/_/gru chad sgo rnams lcags las grub/_/
[\[63a.4\]]rnal 'byor sngags pa blo ldan pas/_/thig bzhi re'u cha brgyad du 'gyur/_/mtha' nas thig gdab man ngag can/_/de la sogs pa bsam par bya/_/rin chen skyil krung 'dug byas la/_/dbus su gsang sngags bdag bos te/_/phyogs phyogs sgo ba dam pa rnams/_/
[\[63a.5\]]snga ma bzhin du bsgoms nas kyang /_/rang sngags skyes bu de bskyed do/_/o~M a kro te ka puSh+TiM ba la na hU~M/_o~M a kro puSh+TiM ti ba ta na s+t+wa~M/_zhes brjod pas bdag po yab yum la/_/'khor rnams 'bru re ba las sam/_/rang rang bskyed pa dam pa ste/_/sngags dang ldan par 
[\[63a.6\]]ting 'dzin gsal/_/bzhugs dang brtan dang mchod pa dang /_/phyag byed pa la sogs pa yi/_/las kyi bya ba ma lus par/_/thams cad ma lus tshang bar bya/_/skyed dang grub pa'i 'bras bu ni/_/rgyal ba bsnyen te thag mi ring /_/rang grub 'bras bu de la sogs/_/phyogs 
[\[63a.7\]]dus kun nas gshegs pa yi/_/dngos grub dam pa rab ster zhes/_/'dren pa dpa' bos yang dag bshad/_/de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin byas nas/_/sa zhag gser las grub pa la/_/gzugs ni dam pa rab tu bya/_/phyi gan gan rkyal 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]mnan byas la/_/nang hU~M puSh+Ti~M a bu tse swA hA/_snying gar bris nas brjod bya ba/_/snying po sngags kyi dam pa ste/_/bla med dam pas rab tu bshad/_/o~M badzra puSh+TiM A yu ba shang shrI puSh+TiM swA hA zhes brjod na thams cad rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo 
[\[63b.2\]]gsang ba'i rgyud las/_/thams cad rgyas par bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bdag nyid dbang gis 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/zangs las 'brel ba'i yul dag la/_/rang 
[\[63b.3\]]dbang med de dbang bsdus nas/_/'du ba'i sems dang ldan byas te/_/dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad par bya/_/zangs sam dmar po'i sa dag la/_/dkyil 'khor snga ma dag dang 'dra/_/legs par khod snyoms zin pa dang /_/thig ni rab tu gdab par bya/_/lte ba can la rtsibs 
[\[63b.4\]]brgyad pa/_/kun tu zlum pas rgyas pa mtha'/_/lte dbus gzhu bdungs bris byas la/_/de steng bdag po dam pa gzhag_/thams cad ma lus mchog tu 'gugs/_/sa pa la yang thogs pa med/_/zhes ni yang dag bla med des/_/bshad par bya ste rab tu bsten/_/
[\[63b.5\]]gzhan yang rab tu bshad bya ba/_/sems kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/_/bla med yang dag nges pa'i lam/_/sangs rgyas byang chub la sogs rnams/_/gzhung las 'byung ba'i tshig don rnams/_/ma nor gsungs pa'i bka' bzhin du/_/bsgrubs na 'grub par bshad 
[\[63b.6\]]pa'o/_/de dag 'gags par gyur pa na/_/phal pa gzhan lta smos ci dgos/_/bsdu dang 'dren pa byang chub lam/_/'di dag go 'phang thob bya'i phyir/_/yungs kar rkang rjes sa 'am gzhan/_/khrag gsum thal chen bsres byas la/_/ga'u'i nang du blugs byas la/_/
[\[63b.7\]]ga'u gnyis ni kha sbyar te/_/skud pa dmar po zangs la sogs/_/bcing ba bsdams te dkris byas la/_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni thog tu gzhag_/yungs kar zangs gnyis bsreg byas te/_/dud pas ga'u de la bdug_/de la bdugs par gyur pa dang /_/bzlas 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]pa'i snying po brjod bya zhing /_/lan grangs khri tshad du ma ru/_/brjod na sangs rgyas la sogs rnams/_/'gugs par gyur na phal ba gzhan/_/smos ci dgos te nges par 'gugs/_/o~M badzra a kro many+dzu shrI ba shang ma hA sarba til bru~M/_lan grangs 
[\[64a.2\]]mang du brjod byas na/_/ci ltar bsams pa thams cad 'gugs/_/rgya shug bskus pa'i khu ba dang /_/ma yi lag pa'i khu ba gnyis/_/snga ma bzhin du bkug byas na/_/'gugs par 'gyur zhes dpa' bos bshad/_/yang na rang gi lag pa'ang rung /_/zhes 
[\[64a.3\]]gsungs pas thams cad ma lus par 'dus te/_dper na phyogs thams cad nas mtsho la sbrang ma 'du ba bzhin du 'dus te bdag gi dbang du bya ba de dbang du 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rjes gsungs so/_/'phags pa las bzhi 
[\[64a.4\]]'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/_dbang gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po gshin rje'i tshogs 'du mdzad de/_/rang bzhin gyi mthu can 'di gsungs so/_/'byung byed ye shes dkyil 'khor ni/_/dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin 
[\[64a.5\]]byas la/_/bdag nyid khro bo chen po ste/_/yum yang de bzhin de yi'o/_/yab yum gnyis med byin brlabs las/_/thig skud rgyus pa lcags las byas/_/de ni las kyi thig ces bya/_/thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad/_/'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu 
[\[64a.6\]]khyud bcas/_/kun du gru bzhi sgo khyud can/_/gru chad ldan te dur khrod rgyan/_/mdzes par bris te gzhan na min/_/sten pa'i lha ste snga ma bzhin/_/bskyed pa'i sngags 'di brjod byas pas/_/bdag dang 'dra bar bskyed par bya/_/o~M a kro te ka hU~M a/_hU~M badzra 
[\[64a.7\]]be tA li rak+sha maM/_b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/_hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M/_dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH_/b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/_zhes brjod pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad g.yos so/_/rab tu g.yos so/_/kun du rab tu g.yos so/_/'gul 'gul/_rab tu 'gul/_kun du rab tu 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]'gul lo/_/ldeg ldeg_/rab tu ldeg_/kun du rab tu ldeg go/_/chem chem/_rab tu chem/_kun du rab tu chem chem mo/_/'ur 'ur/_rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun du rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/_/dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/_/mtha' mtho na dbus dma' ste/_'jig rten 
[\[64b.2\]]gyi khams 'di dag rab tu g.yos par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i bdag nyid des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rab tu gsung gi gsang sngags gsungs pas bdag cag spro lags so/_/'jig rten du 'di lta bur mthu can la 
[\[64b.3\]]bdag zhu lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis khro bar mdzad pa de la bdag mngon du sems can thams cad rab tu yang zhu bar 'tshal lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen por 'du mdzad pa des 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/o~M shrI ba ra yak+sha 
[\[64b.4\]]gu ya/_sarba ta kri badzra kA la rU pa ma ra na phaT ces gsungs pas/_'jig rten na dbang che ba dang /_mthu che ba la sogs pa thams cad btul nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang /_/gsung du med pa'i chos nyid la/_/rang 
[\[64b.5\]]sems 'phro 'dur gyur pa las/_/phyogs bcur gsungs pa de dag yin/_/de bas nan tan bskyed byas te/_/drag po'i tsham ngam bshad par bya/_/'jig rten bcud kyi gdug pa kun/_/tsham ngam glog ltar 'gyur ba las/_/ngo mtshar ya mtshan bsgrag par bya/_/
[\[64b.6\]]e ma'o yab yum gnyis med rol pa'i mkha' dkyil nas/_/phyogs bcur 'phro ba byang chub sems/_/rigs kyi yab dang de bzhin btsun mo ni/_/rtag par bsgoms te de bzhin gshegs par bya/_/rdzas dang phyag rgya sngags dang bcas rnams ni/_/gzugs dang 
[\[64b.7\]]'dod pa'i 'bras bu gang 'dod grub par ro/_/mi dge bcu dang ldan pa'i rnam par 'dren pa der byas te/_/sngags dang phyag rgya rdzas rnams dang /_/ga'u pad+ma dam pa dang /_/kham pa rdza yi 'ji ba yis/_/khrag sna gsum dang gi wang ngo /_/de dag phrin las 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]mchog yin te/_/grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za/_/bla med dpa' bos yang dag gsungs/_/phyogs bcu'i gdug pa ma lus kun/_/'dul bar 'gyur te the tshom med/_/'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las drag po'i le'u ste 
[\[65a.2\]]lnga pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed/_ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang la longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir/_ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/rang bzhin 'phags pa kun du shes rab ste/_/de bzhin rnam par mi rtog yin pas na/_/'di 
[\[65a.3\]]gnyis chos kyi sku zhes rab tu bshad/_/chos kyi longs spyod 'dul ba'i don la rgyas/_/'gro ba'i don rdzogs ma lus skur 'byung dang /_/bdud dang mu stegs srin po gdul ba'i phyir/_/mtshan dang dpe byad gzugs su sprul nas ni/_/ma lus tshar gcod don du 'di gsungs 
[\[65a.4\]]so/_/'khor lo rtsibs brgyad du khyud zlum por bcas/_/sbrul gyis rgya gram dag gi mtha' bskor la/_/lte bar rdo rje rgya gram bri bar bya/_/de yi steng du ka pA la gnyis la/_/gcig la gshin rje dbu drug pa yi gzugs/_/gcig la yum chen khro gnyer gzugs bris la/_/nang 
[\[65a.5\]]du dgra bo rkang rjes su dang ni/_/dri dang de bzhin khrag sna gsum/_/thal chen rgya shug bskus pa'i khu ba dang /_/brdzis la dgra bo'i gzugs byas la/_/bcug la skud pa dkar pos bcing /_/dkyil 'khor thog tu gzhag par bya/_/o~M ya mAn+ta ka_/hrISh+TiM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka 
[\[65a.6\]]badzra kro d+ha phaT phaT a/_zhes brjod pa tsam gyis ni/_yab yum sku mdog mthing nag la/_/dbu skra kham nag ral pa gyen du brdzes/_/dbu la thod pa rlon pas brgyan/_/sku la sbrul nag chun po dang /_/zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs/_/phyag drug phyag mtshan bsnams 
[\[65a.7\]]pa ni/_/g.yas kyi dang po sdigs mdzub la/_/rgyu zhags lcags kyu bar tha ma/_/dung chen tri shUl gsal shing g.yon/_/de ltar cha lugs gsal ba dang /_/dbyangs 'di blang bar nan tan bya/_/hU~M rngam pa'i rgyal po khrag 'thung gshin rje gshed/_/khams gsum dbang sdud 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]rtags su zhal gsum po/_/dbyings nas sprul pa'i yab yum lhun gyis grub/_/las ngan 'khrul ba'i sems can gdul dka' ba/_/gdug pa de dag 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol/_/dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas la/_dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/_sa ma ya s+t+waM/_zhes pa lan 
[\[65b.2\]]grangs mang du brjod/_des ni brtan par bzhugs par 'gyur/_/khrag chen rgod khrag sha dang tshil/_/chen po la sogs gtor ma bsham/_/de ni dkyil 'khor thog dag tu/_/bdag nyid ting 'dzin gsal ba las/_/sngags 'di 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas/_/
[\[65b.3\]]o~M badzra ha sta ba ba he ha dA na hrISh+TiM che ge mo mA ra ya hu~M hu~M phaT phaT/_che ge mo hasta ba pri ti nir te sa hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/_nyin zhag gcig la lan 'bum bzlas/_/nyin zhag gsum gyi bar du bzlas/_/de dag bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang /_/gtor ma'i las dag brtsam bya 
[\[65b.4\]]ste/_/bskyed dang bskul dang rdzogs pa dang /_/phyogs bcu'i khro bo spyan drangs te/_/bzhugs dang brtan dang mi g.yo sogs/_/ma lus rdzogs pa'i phrin las bya/_/de ltar phrin las rdzogs pa dang /_/yang nas yang du bstab pa bya/_/de ltar bstab pa byas pas na/_/dgra bgegs 
[\[65b.5\]]dbang 'gyur smos ci dgos/_/de nas yang 'di ched du brjod de gsungs so/_/o~M nga ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi/_/bder gshegs thugs kyi sras yin par/_/bdud dang srin po log 'dren rnams/_/ma lus tshar gcod byin brlabs te/_/mgon po 
[\[65b.6\]]gshin rje nyid kyi sras/_/don rnams thams cad ma lus pa/_/de nyid du ni bsgrub par bya/_/dgra rnams thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir/_/phrin las rdo rje can gyis mdzod/_/zhes brjod cing sngags kyis brdeg pa ni phrin las mchog gi rgyal po zhes gsungs 
[\[65b.7\]]so/_/dus dang dus dang zhag grangs ni/_/nyi ma gcig la stong rtsa gcig_/nam gyi gung la brgya rtsa gcig_/tho rangs thun gcig brgya rtsa gcig_/srod kyi gung la brgya rtsa gcig_/de ltar nyin zhag gsum bar du/_/bzlas pa zhag grangs tshang bya zhing /_/phyag rgya bca' 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]zhing gzugs la brdeg_/nya la byas na gdon mi za/_/o~M mA ra na kha da sarba hrISh+TiM ya man/_hu~M hu~M tre kha da pa ra na pa la hu~M hu~M phaT phaT swA hA/_rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i phyag rgya bcas la dgra bo'i gzugs la brdeg go/_/o~M badzra hU~M khaM s+pha ra na phaT/_hU~M A be sha ya/_hu~M hu~M 
[\[66a.2\]]phaT phaT a/_yang phyag rgya gong ma bcas la/_o~M badzra kro d+ha nI la tan+t+ra hu~M hu~M/_hrISh+TiM kr-i ta na na/_hu~M hrI Sh+TiM bi kr-i ta nan nan zhes brjod la/_bdag gi lag pas dbang bskur ro/_/yang phyag rgya bcas la/_/sngags 'di la yang lan grangs mang du bya'o/_/oM badzrA tsaN+Da hrISh+TiM badzra sti ra baM/_
[\[66a.3\]]kha hi hu~M hu~M che ge mo dbang du sdus shig_/hril hril zhes lan grangs mang du brjod do/_/rdo rje rgya gram gyi phyag rgyas brdeg go/_/yang phyag rgya bcas la sngags 'dis brdeg go/_/oM badzra kang ka ma ka la ya na hu~M phaT phaT a/_zhes 'bum bzlas la rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgyas 
[\[66a.4\]]brdeg go/_/yang phyag rgya bcas la sngags 'dis brdeg go/_/o~M badzra a gu sha tre tha sti ra ba~M hu~M hu~M phaT phaT che ge mo mA ra ya dza hU~M zhes dbang du sdus shing /_hu~M hu~M phaT phaT zhes lan grangs mang du brjod do/_/rdo rje gdengs pa'i phyag rgya bcas la dbang du bsdu'o/_/yang 
[\[66a.5\]]phyag rgya bcas la sngags 'dis brdeg go/_/o~M hu~M hu~M phaT phaT 'dus 'dus rang rang ya~M ya~M ra~M ra~M hring hring du ba b+h+yo hu~M phaT che ge mo dun b+h+yo zhes bzlas la/_kha T+wAM gi phyag rgyas brdeg go/_/de ltar las de dag yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par byas la/_
[\[66a.6\]]bzlas pa byas na las ci byas pa thams cad dbang du 'du bar nges zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/_ngan sngags dbang sdud kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i 
[\[66a.7\]]gshed/_bcom ldan 'das kun la khyab pa'i phrin las bsgrub pa 'di/_sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/lnga phung yan lag gzhom pa dang /_/dug gsum rtsad nas gcad pa dang /_/'bras bu rgyal bar bsgrub bya'i phyir/_/nan tur phrin 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]las bshad par bya/_/dang po'i las ni rgyas dang gsang /_/dgug dang gtad dang bcing dang dgrol/_/sbyor ba'i gdug pa ma lus kun/_/phrin las 'di yis byed par 'gyur/_/dang por btsal ba'i btsal thabs ni/_/rnam pa drug dang ldan pas btsal/_/stag 
[\[66b.2\]]mo gad la mchong stabs dang /_/seng ge gangs la 'gying tshul dang /_/khwa spyang gzan la rgyug tshul dang /_/bya rgod gzan la 'babs tshul dang /_/dom chen rmi lam rmi tshul dang /_/khwa skeg thang shing snyeg tshul gyis/_/ro yi phung po btsal bar bya/_/ri la 
[\[66b.3\]]'dug na 'gying bas btsal/_/sribs la 'dug na mchong bas btsal/_/gdags la 'dug na 'dug pas btsal/_/'or na 'dug na 'babs pas btsal/_/brag la 'dug na rmi bas btsal/_/nags la 'dug na snyeg pas btsal/_/rgyal rigs 
[\[66b.4\]]yin na seng ge stangs/_/bram ze yin na stag mo stangs/_/rje'u rigs yin na bya rgod stangs/_/dmangs rigs yin na dom gyis bya/_/ma ning yin na spre'u yis bya/_/dog la yin na khwa spyang stangs/_/de ltar ro yi tshol stangs ni/_/rnam pa drug dang ldan pas btsal/_/brtags 
[\[66b.5\]]nas 'ongs pa gyur pa dang /_/gshin rje rgyal po'i tsham ngam bya/_/khro bo bcu yis stang stabs kyis/_/ro la kun tu bskor byas la/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su gzhag_/de ltar gzhag pa'i las byas nas/_/mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan/_/rkang pa byang shar
