[\[66b.6\]]mtshams su bstan/_/lag pa g.yas pa lho yi phyogs/_/lag pa g.yon pa nub kyi phyogs/_/rkang pa g.yas pa shar gyi phyogs/_/rkang pa g.yon pa byang gi phyogs/_/de ltar gan rkyal bzhag byas la/_/da ni phur ba dgod bya ste/_/mig dang rna ba sna dang lce/_/lag 
[\[66b.7\]]gnyis rkang gnyis pho mtshan dang /_/lkog ma de bzhin snying ga dang /_/lte ba pus mo dpung ba gnyis/_/gru mo de bzhin long bu gnyis/_/mtshog ma de bzhin spyi bo dang /_/dku dang de bzhin mchan khung gnyis/_/dpral ba rnams su gdab byas la/_/phur ba de dag 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]lha yi skur/_/rab tu brtags te goms pa dang /_/rang bzhin gnas nas gshegs pa dang /_/ting nge 'dzin du bsgoms pa dang /_/gzugs brnyan nang du bkod pa gsum/_/tshad pas gdungs pa'i bye ma la/_/mar zhu de bzhin thim pa bzhin/_/gnyis su med par 
[\[67a.2\]]shes bya la/_/gong du bstan pa'i lha rnams ni/_/rnam shes bzhi dang dbang po bzhi/_/de las gyur pa'i yul rnams ni/_/brgyad po ngang du shes par bya/_/sgo ma lus la grags pa'o/_/thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'i phyir/_/steng 'og khro bo de las gyur/_/de dag kun gyi 
[\[67a.3\]]sku gsung thugs/_/ma mo gsum gyis nga nyid de/_/yab ni kun la khyab pa la/_/yum ni kun la sdud pa ste/_/bya ba byed pa bdag nyid do/_/phung po kun la khyab pa la/_/mnyes pas phul phyin lha yi tshogs/_/'gro drug kun la ma lus snang /_/de ltar las rnams zin 
[\[67a.4\]]pa dang /_/zhag grangs du bya dam yang bca'/_/dngos grub thob par 'dod pa yi/_/rnal 'byor chen pos ting 'dzin gsal/_/de ltar byas nas mi la sogs/_/thams cad dbang du 'du bar gsungs/_/dgra bgegs la lta smos ci dgos/_/drag po'i phrin las 
[\[67a.5\]]grub 'dod pas/_/dgra bo'i ming byang bris byas la/_/bam gyi kha yi nang du gzhug_/rdo rje rgya gram rgya yis gdab/_/he ru ka yi phyag rgyas mnan/_/yungs kar rgyal pos drag tu brdeg_/rgya shug bkus pas drag tu blugs/_/nyi ma bzhi la drag tu brdeg_/sngags dang 
[\[67a.6\]]phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad/_/dam rdzas mchod pa shin tu dgram/_/rnal 'byor ting 'dzin drag tu bya/_/yengs na bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur/_/g.yeng bar mi mdzad khro bos gsungs/_/des ni las kyi 'bras bu yang /_/shin tu zad pa med pa ste/_/mkha' 
[\[67a.7\]]la 'phur dang sa la 'dzul/_/chu la bying med mngon shes ldan/_/zhes gsungs so/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las ro langs kyi sgrub pa la/_ngan sngags kyi phur bus gdab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje nyid rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/ye shes 'khyil ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed steng na/_/ye shes nyi ma gsal ba'i thig phran gdab/_/mu khyud zlum po sbrul gyi zhags pa bri/_/stegs bu phyogs mtshams phur bus 
[\[67b.2\]]bskor bar bya/_/de ltar bris pa'i dkyil du dgod pa ni/_/o~M ni dbus kyi lte ba la/_/shar du hri la lho ru staM/_/nub phyogs hu~M la byang du ha/_/byang shar mtshams su dza zhes pa/_/shar lho tri la lho nub me/_/nub byang a la rab tu rten/_/rten pa'i yi ge de bkod nas/_/dbus su 
[\[67b.3\]]bstan par bsgom pa ni/_/gshin rje ste sku dmar nag la/_/dbu gsum po la phyag kyang drug_/dbu la thod pa tshal gyis brgyan/_/zhal g.yas smug nag g.yon ljang ba/_/dbus ni sku dang rab mthun pa/_/sku la thod pa brgyan gyi tshal/_/zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum du bzhugs 
[\[67b.4\]]pa/_/yab kyi sku la rab 'jug pa/_/g.yon phyogs gnas pa gong ma bzhin/_/o~M a mr-i ta ta ka sarba a mr-i ta kro ta hU~M phaT/_/o~M a mr-i ta kro Ta hUM phaT/_/de ltar yab yum gsal bar bskyed/_/pad+ma'i gdan la rab bzhugs pa'o/_/'khor la sogs pa'i rim pa ni/_/bskyed 
[\[67b.5\]]pa gong ma'i rim pa'o/_/rtag tu bzlas pa bsnyen pa'i sngags/_/mi drag mi bul mi zhan par/_/ting 'dzin gsal bar bsgom byas te/_/zhi la 'tsher ba'i ting 'dzin la/_/ri rab dbus kyi lte dbus la/_/rab brtan 'og gi go go nas/_/rdo rje tshe yi dbang stsol te/_/
[\[67b.6\]]phyogs bcu gdug pa'i tshe 'dren te/_/gdug pa ma lus 'gugs par 'gyur/_/tshe'i snying po 'di rtag tu bzlas/_/o~M sa ma ya many+dzu shrI mu tra a ko A yu pha la si ti ni bru~M a/_des ni tshe yi dbang thob nas/_/sangs rgyas sku dang mnyam pa dang /_/bskal pa ma zhig 
[\[67b.7\]]bar du ni/_/lo lnga lon pa bzhin du gnas/_/de nas bskul ba'i gnas 'di gsungs/_/e ma'o phyogs bcu kun nas 'dus pa yi/_/ye shes rgyal po'i thig le 'di/_/gsang chen rmad du byung ba ste/_/rgyu drug 'khor ba'i sems can rnams/_/ye nas 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]lhun gyis grub pa'i bcud/_/thams cad ma lus chos so cog_/chos kyi sku 'am chos kyi dbyings/_/don dam tshig dang mngon sum pa/_/dngos po mtshan ma thams cad las/_/khyab pa'i mya ngan thugs rje che/_/phra mo sems kyi rang bzhin te/_/gti 
[\[68a.2\]]mug mun pa sel ba ste/_/nyon mongs dri ma kun dang bral/_/shin tu sad pa mya ngan 'das/_/thugs rje'i rang bzhin gshin rje ste/_/rdo rje tshe'i rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba'o/_/zhes gsungs pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad rngam pa'i zhal 
[\[68a.3\]]nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/e ma'o phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten ye nas dben/_/bder gshegs thams cad ye nas lhun gyis grub/_/mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i ye shes lhun rdzogs pa'i/_/phyogs bcu'i stong khams 'jig rten rgyan du bcas/_/
[\[68a.4\]]thabs dang shes rab kyis ni dbang bskur na/_/bdud dang srin po log 'dren tshe bsdus te/_/dbang bskur gnang ba des kyang byin bskyed de/_/shar phyogs dri za'i gnas nas tshe drongs shig_/o~M badzra ku la e swa shwa ra na ha ha ho ho hu~M hu~M/_zhes ni dbyangs dang bcas pa 
[\[68a.5\]]yis/_/rdo rje rigs las grub pa yi/_/bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyis/_/mgon po gshin rje tshe dbang bskur/_/de nas rin po che'i tshe'i dbang bskur ba'i phyir 'di gsungs so/_/e ma'o rin chen 'chang ba kun gyi bdag_/'jig rten dbang phyug 
[\[68a.6\]]dbang byed pa/_/gtso mchog khyab par byin brlabs te/_/mi 'gyur rigs kyi tshe thob nas/_/lho phyogs gshin rje'i gnas nas tshe drongs shig_/o~M rat+na ku la A yu he he ho ho ha~M/_rin chen dgyes pa'i dbang bskur bas/_/khyad par byin brlabs 
[\[68a.7\]]thob gyur cig_/de nas pad+ma rigs kyi tshe'i dbang 'di yang gsungs so/_/e ma'o khro gtum rngam pa'i tshogs/_/pad+ma rigs kyi dbang phyug ste/_/snang ba med las lhun gyis grub/_/rdo rje 'chang gis dbang bskur bas/_/klu 'dul tshe yi dbang thob shog_/
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]pad+ma ku la A yu he he ho ho ha~M/_lhun gyis grub pa tshe yi dbang /_/thogs med dam pa thob par shog_/de nas las kyi rigs kyi tshe'i dbang bskur ba 'di brjod do/_/e ma'o rang bzhin mtshan ma med pa yi/_/ye shes lnga ldan phrin las gtso/_/gnyis su med pa las kyi rigs/_/
[\[68b.2\]]las rnams thams cad dbang bskur bas/_/gnod sbyin gdon las tshe drongs te/_/gnod sbyin bgegs 'dul dbang thob shog_/o~M karma ku la A yu he he ho ho ha~M/_zhes brjod pas thams cad tshe'i dbang nyid du gyur te/_ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/tshad med bzhi yi thugs 
[\[68b.3\]]rjes kyang /_/nyon mongs dgra rnams zhi gyur cig_/ces phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe'i dbang bskur ro/_/'phags pa las bzhi'i 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/_'jam dpal tshe sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[68b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i bdag nyid de/_mtha' byed 'byung ba de nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs las byung ngo /_/gshin rje las kyi phrin las 'di/_/myos dang mgo 'khor byed pa dang /_/yid 'khrug khrag tu skyug par byed/_/log 'dren rnam pa drug tu bstan/_/
[\[68b.5\]]log 'dren mthar byed dkyil 'khor ni/_/bcu gnyis 'khor lo rtsibs can de/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi ni gos la bri/_/sum brtsegs ldan pa'i mu ran la/_/dbyangs kyi yi ges kun tu bskor/_/hriSh+Ti'i sngags kyis gnon byas la/_/tha la thod pa gtang bar bya/_/de nas 
[\[68b.6\]]sngags kyis dgang bar bya/_/ya ma na te ra tsa'i tshogs/_/sa ste 'byung byed do yi rten/_/me ste thams cad sreg pa'o/_/bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed skur bskyed la/_/yum yang de ru bsgom byas la/_/phyogs bcu gdug pa thams cad kun/_/ma lus tsham 
[\[68b.7\]]ngam drag par bya/_/bzlas pa'i snying po ma nor bar/_/sgra dang 'du byed rab spangs te/_/bde zhing yid 'ong gnas dag las/_/rab tu sdang mig sdang sems bcas/_/sgra dang bcas pa'i sems spangs te/_/nyi ma shar nas nub kyi bar/_/rgyun dang dus su bstan pa'o/_/
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]bar bar bskul ba'i las bya zhing /_/bcol ba'i las dag rab tu brjod/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo gshin rje'i tshogs thams cad yum btsun mo dang gnyis su med par byas te/_bzlas pa'i sngags 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs las phyung ngo /_/
[\[69a.2\]]oM hrISh+T+ri pi kri tA na na/_hu~M hu~M pa na a nu da b+ha ba/_sarba d+harma tsa tsAr+ya a ti ba ha~M/_o~M la~M ya~M a~M/_badzra bo d+hi ta thA ga ta kro d+hi shwa ri/_a byi ta badzra kro d+hi shwa ri/_he he ha~M ha~M/_sngags 'di rab tu brjod byas pas/_/kha dog che zhing lus po che ba dang /_/rgya dag yongs su 
[\[69a.3\]]ma chad thams cad nam mkha' ste/_/gsal ba'i shes rab thams cad nam mkha' 'dra/_/mthar phyin sngags kyi lung la mkhas par bya/_/de yi sbyor ba thams cad dgyes skongs shing /_/dbang sdud sngags ste drag po'i las dang sbyar/_/mi dmigs gtso 
[\[69a.4\]]bo'i sngags dang phyag rgyar gnas/_/sgrol dang mthar phyin phrin las gnas su bstan/_/ting 'dzin rim pa 'di dag ldan par bya/_/khro bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sgyu ma la dbang sgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_go 'phang chen po la sbyar 
[\[69a.5\]]ba'i thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_thugs rjes zhe sdang sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab kyis 'dod chags sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_/ye shes kyis gti mug sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[69a.6\]]dang /_yon tan gyis nga rgyal 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'bad pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis phrag dog 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de dag 'joms pa'i sngags ni 'di dag go/_/pradz+nyA ku la/_dz+nyA na ku la/_d+ha ka ku la/_gu na ku la/_bIr+ya 
[\[69a.7\]]ku la/_b+hU ta ku la/_badzra ku la/_pad+ma ku la/_karma ku la/_rat+na ku la/_sarba ta thA ga ta ho/_zhes brjod nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/dper na me dang 'od bzhin du/_/'od la sbrang ma 'du na yang /_/me lce'i drod ni 'od la yod/_/'od 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]kyis sbrang 'tshig ci bzhin du/_/skyon gyis dri ma thams cad dang /_/bdud dang mu stegs log 'dren dang /_/mi mthun pa yi dgra dang bgegs/_/shes rab thabs kyis gzir gnon pa'i/_/me lce dang ni sbrang ma 'dra'o/_/tha dad pa yi mi mthun pa'ang /_/'phags pa 'jam dpal 
[\[69b.2\]]gshin rje nyid/_/'khrigs pa med cing sgrol bar byed/_/mi skye ye shes ral gri yin/_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal dral byas nas/_/gnas dang gnas ma yin pa yi/_/rgyu dang rgyu ma yin pa yi/_/nyon mongs sems can mtho ris gnas/_/bsgral ba'i zhing du smos pa de/_/de la 
[\[69b.3\]]de bzhin drag tu bya/_/rigs dang lo grangs mthun pa la/_/de bzhin byas na skyon pa ste/_/de dag yongs su shes par bya/_/las dang bya ba rtsol ba rnams/_/nyams kyi phyag rgya rang don sad/_/de rtags dka' ba mi 'gyur te/_/mi la ya yi 'og gos la/_/gi wang dag 
[\[69b.4\]]gis bris byas te/_/'og nas 'byung ba'i gsang sngags dang /_/gang bya spel la bris byas la/_/rak+ta dag gi kha chus bran/_/thub pa drug gi snying po bri/_/gsang ba'i sngags 'di drag tu brjod/_/o~M hwiSh+T+r-i kro d+ha bi kri ta/_hriSh+T+r-i kro d+hi ma ra ta/_pra sang he te ba mu ka_/
[\[69b.5\]]he hang he hang /_kA la rU pa hu~M hu~M phaT phaT a/_de skad gsung gi sgra bsgrags pas/_/dgra dang bgegs dang mu stegs dang /_/bdud dang srin po ma lus rnams/_/gzir cing gnon pa drag tu bya/_/mi mthun phyogs kyi 'byung po de/_/gdul bar bya ba'i don ched du/_/
[\[69b.6\]]khro bo'i sku ru bsgom byas te/_/thams cad bsgral bar bya ba yi/_/rang bzhin grub pa 'di gsungs so/_/o~M pra mA rte na/_na mo badzra badzra ki mo na ta/_a hang pra khu ma khum mo mu sti swA hA/_de skad ces ni gsungs pa yis/_/rang bzhin gyis ni dbang du 'gyur/_/bdud 
[\[69b.7\]]rnams dag ni khro zhing gtum/_/srin po dag ni 'jigs shing rngam/_/mu stegs log 'dren rgol bar byed/_/de dag gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/_/phrin las dam pa 'di brtsams so/_/dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/_/dbus kyi pho brang lte ba la/_/bdud rnams 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]'dul ba'i snying po bri/_/shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su/_/dri za dbang bsdu'i snying po bri/_/lho yi phyogs kyi 'khor lo la/_/mu stegs sgrol ba'i snying po bri/_/nub kyi phyogs kyi 'khor lo la/_/klu rnams tshar gcod snying po bri/_/byang gi phyogs 
[\[70a.2\]]kyi 'khor lo la/_/gnod sbyin tshogs rnams dbang sdud bri/_/hu~M bi g+ha nan/_hu~M rak+sha nan/_o~M tir ti ka nan/_o~M mar nan na/_mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor lte dbus su/_/mtshams kyi bgegs gnon snying po bri/_/hu~M d+ha hu~M pAH_hu~M lA/_hu swA/_gru chad rnam pa 
[\[70a.3\]]bzhi po la/_/thod pa rlon pa bri bar bya/_/mu khyud thod pa'i phreng ba gtang /_/phyi rol sbrul gyis yongs su dgang /_/de ltar dkyil 'khor zin pa dang /_/rnam par 'tshe ba'i gzugs rnams kun/_/kham pa rdza yi ga'u la/_/gzugs su yongs su bri bya ste/_/
[\[70a.4\]]dbus su yongs su gzhag par bya/_/kha dog dmar pos bcings nas ni/_/rtse gcig phyag rgya bcas byas la/_/gsang sngags 'di yang 'bum khri brjod/_/o~M pra ma rta na mo ha sra badzra dza ki mo na d+ha a hang pra khu ma mo tha tha swA hA/_na mo do gi kha d+ha mu pra pa tha byi tha 
[\[70a.5\]]u ste ni nan sarba ta ta na phaT/_phyag rgya de dang bcas pas brdeg_/zhag gsum bzlas pa byas na ni/_/bgegs dang log 'dren dbang du 'dus/_/gzhan yang de bzhin bzhugs pa'i khro/_/dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang /_/smug nag ljang nag kham pa dang /_/
[\[70a.6\]]so so'i cha lugs rngam pa'i gzugs/_/mgon po gshin rje nag po yis/_/bgegs dang log 'dren gzir cing gnon/_/rngam pa'i zhal du 'di bstabs so/_/o~M che ge mo kha ram khA hi/_o~M hriSh+T+r-i che ge mo kha ram khA hi/_o~M kA la rU pa che ge mo kha ram khA hi/_/hu~M hu~M 
[\[70a.7\]]phaT phaT a/_/nyin zhag gsum gyi bar du bzlas/_/de nas phyag rgya gsum bcas te/_/yang nas yang du gzir cing gnon/_/phyag rgya de dang gsang sngags 'dis/_/lan grangs stong rtsa gcig tu brdeg_/o~M hriSh+T+r-i badzra ya ya na parna su put+ta hu~M hu~M phaT phaT a/_/las dang 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]rdzas dang sngags dang ni/_/phyag rgya brtson 'grus ma yengs par/_/'bum mam grangs ni ci mang du/_/yang nas yang du nan tan bya/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos rab tu gsungs so/_/'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las log 
[\[70b.2\]]'dren mthar byed kyis mnan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i bdag nyid des mthar byed 'byung ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las las phyung ngo /_/gnod sbyin mthar byed phrin las 'di/_/dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin 
[\[70b.3\]]bris la/_/bzlas pa'i snying po bri bar bya/_/ya ste skyed pa me ste sreg_/tos la snying rje ru la chags/_/n+dza ni 'byung byed yab kyi gsang /_/yo la kun 'byung ta la bsdu/_/bdag nyid las kyi mthar byed sku/_/yab yum gnyis med rol pa las/_/byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 
[\[70b.4\]]'phro/_/'dzum dang bcas pas yul la 'bul/_/byang chub bla med sangs rgyas la/_/mchod cing ci ltar mdzad pa ltar/_/bdag kyang rab tu bsgral slad du/_/ting 'dzin 'du ba nam mkha' 'dra/_/zhes gsungs pas phyogs bcu'i gdug pa can thams cad spa gong ste bred 
[\[70b.5\]]nas myos par gyur te/_dper na mi ra ro ba bzhin no/_/de nas nan tan gyi phrin las 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las las phyung ngo /_/gdug pa ma lus 'dul mdzad pa/_/khro bo chen po hU~M sgra can/_/las rnams mthar byed phrin las sku/_/
[\[70b.6\]]gnod sbyin sdang sems ldan pa kun/_/bar chad bya bar sems pa ste/_/de dag zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir/_/sku mdog nag po chen po ste/_/dbu skra kham nag gyen du 'khyil/_/thod pa tshar gsum dbu rgyan can/_/phyag g.yas zhing chen g.yon b+han d+ha/_/spyan gsum 
[\[70b.7\]]mche gtsigs zhabs kyang brkyang bskum ste/_/mi mthun bgegs dang sdang ba'i dgra/_/ma lus dbang sdud phrin las mchog gi sku/_/mi sdug tshul 'chang dregs pa'i khyo shug ldan/_/zhing chen g.yang gzhi rgyan du byas/_/zhe sdang dbang sdud stag gi sham thabs 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]can/_/nyon mongs dbang sdud glang chen ko rlon can/_/'dren pa'i khro rgyal gdug 'dul dam pa 'di/_/dus ngan tha ma'i sems can 'dul dka' ba/_/nyon mongs dbang sdud dpal gyi zhal du stobs/_/'gro ba ma lus thugs rjes dbyings la dgod/_/
[\[71a.2\]]zhe sdang shugs 'chang khro bo'i gtso/_/gdug par gyur pa'i dgra bgegs 'dul mdzad pa/_/nga rgyal la sogs rtag tu dug gsum sku/_/ye shes ngang las thams cad rdzogs par mdzod/_/o~M badzra hriSh+T-I bi kri tA nan/_ta thA ga ta ya ma ra tsa hU~M phaT a/_zhes 
[\[71a.3\]]pa'i sngags dang bcas la bdag nyid las mthar byed kyi skur bsgoms la phrin las bcol zhing gnon pa drag tu bzlas pa'i snying po bzlas so/_/de'i dus su sbyin sreg byed na phrin las brtsam par bya ste/_/me thab e yi dbyibs 'dra la/_/bang rim sum 
[\[71a.4\]]brtsegs kha khyer can/_/ngos la me yi phreng ba gtang /_/kha khyer rdo rje ra ba la/_/mu ran thod pa'i phreng ba ste/_/me ste bsreg bya 'chang zhes pa/_/kha dog nag po shin tu rid/_/phyag na zhugs gling bgrad phreng dang /_/be con ril ba thogs pa ste/_/tshul bzhin 
[\[71a.5\]]spyan drangs gdan bzhugs bstod/_/dbang dang phyag tshang gshegs pa rnams/_/gang ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du bya/_/gnyis 'og rang bzhin ya ma'i sku/_/gnyis med spyan drangs bzhugs la bcol/_/sbyin sreg phrin las zin pa dang /_/bcol bskul dag kyang 
[\[71a.6\]]rab tu bya/_/rdzas ni dug dang lan tshwa dang /_/ske tshe sbrang rtsi yungs nag dang /_/gu gul nag po la sogs pa'i/_/lcags 'dra'i rdzas la rab tu bsngags/_/bdag nyid lha yi skur bsgoms la/_/dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa yi/_/sngags 'di rab tu rtse gcig 
[\[71a.7\]]bzlas/_/o~M hU~M ya khang me tra ha mu kha hri Sh+T+r-i ya ma ra tsa phaT hu~M/_phyag rgya zil gnon phyag rgya bca'/_/dkyil 'khor bskor zhing gsang sngags bzlas/_/bdag nyid nub kyi phyogs 'dug ste/_/las kyi mthar byed skur bsgoms la/_/gsang sngags mi bul mi drag 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]par/_/bzlas na myur du 'grub pa ni/_/yid 'khrugs myos nas dbang med 'gyel ba dang /_/rab tu brgyal nas thal bar 'jig pa dang /_/de rnams mi 'grub pa ru nges ma bshad/_/ces bcom ldan 'das don yod pa'i khro bos gsungs so/_/'phags pa 
[\[71b.2\]]las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/_gnod sbyin mthar byed kyis gnon pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas yang 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed chen pos mthar byed 'byung ba 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs las phyung ngo /_/srin po mthar byed 
[\[71b.3\]]phrin las 'di/_/dkyil 'khor bsgom pa bya bar bstan/_/ya ste rgyu la ta ste rkyen/_/yo ni kun du bskul ba la/_/ni ni sdud pa'i don yin te/_/ri zhes bya ba lhun stug pa/_/ya la 'dus te k+She la thim/_/bdag nyid chings zhes bya ba'i sku/_/dbu gsum 
[\[71b.4\]]po la phyag drug ste/_/g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ser nag_/phyag drug phyag mtshan bsnams pa ni/_/g.yas pa ba su ta yi zhags/_/g.yas par gsal shing tha ma lcags kyu'o/_/g.yon gyi dang po chu srin bar ma ka ta ri/_/tha ma rdo rje rgya gram 
[\[71b.5\]]bsnams pa'o/_/sku stod glang chen ko rlon la/_/sku smad stag gi sham thabs te/_/zhing chen g.yang gzhis sku la brgyan/_/gzhan yang dur khrod rgyan mchog rnams/_/ma lus sku la rdzogs pa la/_/bskul ba'i dbyangs 'di blang bar bya/_/mi shigs rdo rje gar 
[\[71b.6\]]gyi bdag_/rdo rje gsang ba'i gshin rje ste/_/phrin las rgyal po grub pa'i las/_/o~M dang a~M dang hU~M zhes pa/_/o~M ni dpral ba'i steng du dmigs/_/a~M ni lce yi steng du la/_/hU~M ni thugs ka nyid du'o/_/de las 'od zer rab spros te/_/bdag lus nam 
[\[71b.7\]]mkha' lta bur gyur/_/phaT ces bya ba rab brjod pas/_/'jig rten khams rnams 'od kyis khebs/_/de nyid sreg pa ma yin te/_/yid kyi ye shes me 'bar ba/_/gcig gi stong nyid gang yin pa/_/kun gyi stong pa de yin no/_/ji ltar mkha' la mtshon snang 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]ba/_/nam mkha' nyid las byung ba ltar/_/sngags kyi 'phro 'du btang ba yang /_/sems las byung ba nam mkha' la/_/rnam shes stong pa'i ngang la 'du/_/bdag nyid chos kyi skur bsgoms la/_/zhe sdang 'phro 'du mang byas la/_/bskyed pa'i 
[\[72a.2\]]sngags ni drag tu bzlas/_/o~M ma hA daM Sh+To ta ka pe ra a ra ne tsa na ka ta khai che ge mo la dus zhes pa dang /_sngags gong nas 'byung ba dang /_spel te las byas na gdon mi za'o zhes gshin rje khro bo'i rgyal pos gsungs so/_/'phags pa las bzhi 'khor 
[\[72a.3\]]lo gsang ba'i rgyud las klu mthar byed kyis gnon pa'i thabs kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas yang khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed kyis mthar byed 'byung ba 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las las phyung ngo /_/ya ma mthar byed 
[\[72a.4\]]phrin las ni/_/dkyil 'khor snga ma 'dra bar dmigs/_/bzlas pa'i snying po 'di yang bri/_/ya ste 'byung byed k+She yis sreg_/ya ni yang dag tsa ni skems/_/ni zhes pa ni khug cig pa'o/_/ra zhes bya ba bsgral ba la/_/ma las skyes byed slar sdud pa'o/_/bdag 
[\[72a.5\]]nyid ya ma mthar byed sku/_/sku mdog ljang nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/_/sku la thod pa phyed tshal brgyan/_/dbu yi skra ni kham nag la/_/ral pa gyen du 'khyil ba ste/_/phyag g.yas chu srin dbyug to 'phyar/_/g.yon pa phyag na zhing chen za ba'o/_/sku 
[\[72a.6\]]stod glang chen ko rlon la/_/sku smad stag gi sham thabs can/_/dur khrod me dbus bzhugs pa la/_/yum yang de dang 'dra bar bsgom/_/bzlas pa'i ting 'dzin me 'dra la/_/bzlas brjod rlung 'dra g.yo zhing bskyod/_/lce la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/_/steng du bzlas 
[\[72a.7\]]pa'i snying po dgod/_/tha ma dbyangs dang bcas pa la/_/hriSh+T+r-i sngags kyi phreng ba gdab/_/phar 'phros rnam shes 'gugs par bsam/_/tshur bsdus gshin rje nyid la thim/_/'phro 'du bzlas pa de dag kun/_/gong du bshad pa dag la yang /_/de dag rab tu sbyar 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]zhes bshad/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i khro bos bskul ba 'di gsungs so/_/o~M ya ma las kun 'jigs par byed pa ni/_/thams cad dbang sdud ya ma mthar byed sku/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ljang /_/zhabs gnyis dor thabs klu rgyal gnon/_/
[\[72b.2\]]sku la sbrul nag stong gis brgyan pa ni/_/bgegs rnams 'dul zhing rtag tu 'chi bar mdzad/_/sku la thod pa'i phyed tshal brgyan pa ni/_/'gro ba thugs rje phyogs gcig dgongs pa'i rtags/_/dbu skra ral pa gyen du 'khyil ba ni/_/srid gsum ma lus dbang du sdud pa'i rtags/_/
[\[72b.3\]]phyag g.yas chu srin dbyug to bsnams pa ni/_/dgra bgegs 'jigs pa che las sgrol ba'i rtags/_/g.yon pa zhing dbyug phyag na bsnams pa ni/_/thugs rjes sems can mya ngan lam la 'jog_/ko rlon g.yang gzhis sku la brgyan pa ni/_/dug lnga ma spangs 
[\[72b.4\]]gnas su dag pa'i rtags/_/stag gi g.yang gzhis sku la brgyan pa ni/_/dug gsum gnas su bsgral nas chos kyi sku/_/skye med dang las g.yo bskyod mi mnga' yang /_/zhe sdang phrin las bya ba'i dus la bab/_/o~M hriSh+T+r-i ya ma ra tsa sarba ma ra ya nan dza sa ma ya/_
[\[72b.5\]]zhes brjod cing zhe sdang dang ldan par ting nge 'dzin gyis bzlas pa dang sbyar te las byas na gdon mi za'o/_/de dag ni 'di 'os pa tsam gyis ma yin te yang dang yang du 'dris par byas la nan tan gyis ma byas na 'phral du phra mo tsam gyis 'grub pa ma yin no/_/'phags 
[\[72b.6\]]pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las ya ma mthar byed kyis gnon pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas yang las phran tshegs bsgrub pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las las phyung ngo /_/zla ba 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la/_/
[\[72b.7\]]pad+ma 'am 'khor lo gang yang rung /_/yang na rin chen dra ba la/_/dra mig rnams ni 'dug par gnas/_/rin chen phur bu nang du bltas/_/de ru bri 'am gzugs par bya/_/tha ma sbrul gyi zhags pas bskor/_/dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/_/khru gang thur 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]du brkos byas la/_/ga'u kha sbyar nang du ni/_/yungs kar blugs la bzlas pa bya/_/rtags la ma yengs 'phro 'du yis/_/rgyun mi 'chad par bsgrub par bya/_/o~M badzra kA la da du kha la/_pra ma rta na hU~M phaT/_sle kha sle kha phaT phaT ces bzlas 
[\[73a.2\]]la/_/bdag nyid ya mAn ta kar bsgoms la/_sngags ni nus tshad du bzlas na 'grub nges so/_/yungs kar rgyal po bsgrub pa'o/_/de nas 'khor khro bo la sogs pas/_bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/e ma'o 
[\[73a.3\]]dbyings las byung ba dang /_mkha' la rgyu dang sa la dbang ba gsum gyis bskul ba'i dbyangs 'di bdag cag len lags so/_/ye shes mkha' ldan ma mo'i dpal/_/gzi brjid 'bar ba'i phrin las can/_/dpal gyi phyag brnyan rak+ta'i dri snom 
[\[73a.4\]]ma/_/ma mo khyod ni kun gyi gtso mo dpag tshad brgyad khrir rgyug_/bud med lus la 'jigs byed tshul 'chang ba/_/kha nas me 'bar rgya mtsho'i gting nas skems/_/mig nas zhag 'dzag ri rab thal bar rlog_/skad cig tsam la stong khams dbang du sdud/_/'jig 
[\[73a.5\]]rten lha chen brgyad kyang 'dar yed yed/_/che ge mo zhig dbang du sdud par byed/_/bud med gzugs can dus la bab/_/che ge mo o~M trag rag+sha/_hri Sh+T+r-i ya ma mam nan zhes bskul ba ni dbyings kyi ma mo'o/_/nam mkha'i gting dpag yangs la gnas bcas shing /_/bar 
[\[73a.6\]]snang khams la rgyu ba'i tshogs/_/khams gsum thams cad dbang du sdud/_/lcags kyi bya khra lta bu ni/_/ma mo rnams kyi mchog kyang yin/_/kha 'bar stong gi gtso mo ste/_/'jigs byed rnams kyi dbang byed ma/_/srid gsum dbang du sdud pa mo/_/gzigs pa'i 
[\[73a.7\]]go 'phang nam mkha' 'dra/_/gshegs shing bzhugs pa glog pas mgyogs/_/g.yas kyi gshog pa brdabs pa yis/_/bdud dang srin po rdul du rlog_/g.yon gyi gshog pa brdabs pa yis/_/dgra bgegs 'byung po dbang du sdud/_dam tshig can gyi 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]dus la bab/_/o~M ma ra trag rag+sha/_tri yo ya ma ra tsa ka ka ru ba hriSh+T+r-i dza zhes bskul ba ni mkha' lding gi tshogs so/_/ya ma na ste grub pa mo/_/la la lag na rgyu zhags 'chang /_/la la lag na thod phreng 'dzin/_/la la zhing chung ba su 'dren/_/la la me khyer rgya mtsho 
[\[73b.2\]]skems/_/la la 'gugs byed nyams pa 'dzin/_/la la sbrul nag zhags pa 'dzin/_/la la pho nya 'gugs shing 'dren/_/sngags pas bos shing gdungs pa'i tshe/_/dam tshig dus la bab po sa ma ya/_/sdang bar sems pa'i snying nas drongs/_/brtse ba'i tshogs 
[\[73b.3\]]kyi dus la bab/_/o~M ka ha trag rak+sha/_rat+na ka la hriSh+T+r-iM swA hA/_zhes spyan drangs zhing bskul ba ni gter bdag gi tshogs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed kyis 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po las bzhi 'khor lo 'di/_dus 
[\[73b.4\]]phyi ma la rnal 'byor pa gang zhig bsgrub pa'i las byed na/_nga yang thugs dam las mi g.yel la/_'khor khro bo dang /_khro mo la sogs pas kyang /_nga'i thugs dam rjes su bsgrub par mdzad pas_/dus tha ma la dam pa'i chos 'di rnal 'byor pa'i sku 
[\[73b.5\]]la bsngo ba la sogs pa la dam tshig 'byung bar zhal gyis bzhes so/_/de nas 'khor rnams bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rjes/_dus tha ma la 'byung bar zhal gyis bzhes pa la dga' nas/_yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/_/'phags 
[\[73b.6\]]pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/_mjug bskul ba dang gnang ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba chen po rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas 'khor khro bo dang khro mo la sogs pa rnams kyis/_ngag 
[\[73b.7\]]mthun pas bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/e ma'o bcom ldan khro rgyal gtso/_/las bzhi 'khor lo'i rgyud 'di la/_/ngo mtshar rmad byung bstan pa la/_/bdag cag the tshom 'tshal ba rnams/_/bder gshegs gsung 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]gi ngo bo yis/_/zhu ba'i dmigs rnams bshad du gsol/_/'phags pa zhes bgyi ji ltar lags/_/las bzhi zhes bgyi ji ltar lags/_/'khor lo zhes bgyi ji ltar lags/_/gsang ba zhes bgyi ji ltar lags/_/rgyud ces bgyi ba ji ltar lags/_/rnam dag 
[\[74a.2\]]dbyings las bzhengs nas ni/_/zhu ba'i dmigs rnams bshad par mdzod/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo gzhan la gdug par mdzad pa yis/_tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis gsung phyung ste/_'di skad 'khor la bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi 'khor 
[\[74a.3\]]rnams zhu ba yi/_/dmigs rnams zhu ba rab tu legs/_/'phags pa zhes su bstan pa ni/_/gdug pa ma lus kun las 'phags/_/ye shes sems dpa' 'byung ba'i gzhi/_/dpe yis de la bskrun du med/_/las bzhi zhes su grags pa yang /_/
[\[74a.4\]]de la las ni rnam pa gnyis/_/thabs dang shes rab 'dul dbang dang /_/sku gsum phrin las 'dul ba ste/_/thabs dang thabs su 'brel ba la/_/shes rab 'brel bas yum zhes bya/_/chos dang longs spyod pa yi sku/_/'dul dbang las zhes bya bar 
[\[74a.5\]]grags/_/de la bzhi zhes bya ba yang /_/zhi ba rgyas pa dbang mngon no/_/zhi ba bya ba'i nges tshig kyang /_/ting 'dzin rim pa byams pa la/_/'phro 'du dkar la 'tsher ba ste/_/thams cad mgu bar byed pa dang /_/mi mthun pa rnams zhi bya'i phyir/_/de phyir zhi ba zhes 
[\[74a.6\]]bya'o/_/rgyas pa gser ltar ser ba la/_/ting 'dzin sprul pa mang por khyab/_/phyogs bcur 'gro ba'i don byas te/_/bskul ba'i sa la gzhes pa yi/_/sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs te/_/bdag gi ba spu'i bu gnas/_/kun du zhugs te rgyas pa la/_/tshe dang dbang 
[\[74a.7\]]thang dpal la sogs/_/thams cad rgyas pas rgyas zhes bya/_/de la dbang gi nges tshig kyang /_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad nas/_/bdag gi yid la bsams pa kun/_/yab yum sprul pa'i khyad par las/_/ci 'dod thams cad dbang du sdud/_/las dang bya 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]ba ma lus dang /_/bdag nyid lha yi skur bsgoms pas/_/'du bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za/_/de la drag po'i phrin las kyang /_/gshin rje gshed dang gshed bdag mo/_/yab yum khyad par sprin lta bu/_/nam mkha' khebs pa byed pa ltar/_/gnyis med byang chub 
[\[74b.2\]]khyad par las/_/'phro 'du 'od zer sprin lta bu/_/nam mkha' gang bar khyab pa la/_/khro bo'i sprul pas khebs gyur te/_/'jig rten rdul du bshig nas ni/_/gdug pa ma lus kun btul te/_/slar bsdus yab yum sku la bsdu/_/de ltar nas dang yungs 'bru 
[\[74b.3\]]tsam/_/ma lus kun du 'gengs byed cing /_/dmigs pa gang na gnas pa dag_/btsal te slar yang 'gugs la sogs/_/'di dang 'di zhes bya med par/_/'khor ba tshang nas sprugs bsams te/_/drag po'i phrin las grub par bsam/_/'khor lo zhes 
[\[74b.4\]]su bstan pa yang /_/mi 'khor 'khor phyir rtse mo 'phro/_/lte ba 'khor la rtse mos gcod/_/de phyir 'khor lo zhes su grags/_/gsang ba zhes su grags pa yang /_/kun la mi bstan rtsa ba ste/_/thun mong kun gyi ma yin pas/_/de phyir gsang ba 
[\[74b.5\]]zhes bya'o/_/de la rgyud ces bya ba yang /_/tshang zhing 'brel bas btags pa dang /_/breng chags dgos pa sgrub pa yi/_/de phyir rgyud ces bya bar bshad/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/nyi ma bzhi la las bzhi zhig_/gsungs 
[\[74b.6\]]shing nges par bstan pa ste/_/dngos po ci la bsgom par bgyi/_/zhi ba la ni ji ltar bgyi/_/sngags rnams ji ltar bzlas par bgyi/_/phrin las nges par bstan pa ste/_/rgyas pa dag la ji ltar bstan/_/sngags rnams brjod pa ji lta bu/_/dbang la ji ltar 
[\[74b.7\]]bsgom par bgyi/_/sngags rnams brjod pa ji lta bu/_/drag po'i las su bstan pa la/_/lha ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_/bzlas pa'i sngags rnams ji ltar lags/_/phrin las rnam bzhir bstan pa des/_/las ni ji lta bu zhig 'grub/_/gzhi 'am 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]gnas ni ji lta bu/_/de dag ji lta bu yis bri/_/nges par bstan pa'i man ngag la/_/bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan khro 'dul des/_/gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/gang bsgom lha rnams sku mdog 
[\[75a.2\]]dkar/_/yum yang de dang 'dra ba la/_/phyogs bcu'i 'khor rnams rigs dang sbyar/_/bdag nyid ya mAn ta ka ru/_/sku mdog gsal bar bsgoms nas ni/_/bzlas pa'i sngags 'di mgu bas bzlas/_/ya mar tsa sa to me ya/_che ge mo ba lu ka shIn+taM ku ru 
[\[75a.3\]]swA hA/_ya me to run yo ta ya/_che ge mok+Sha ra tsa shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/_ya ta yo ni ri ya k+She ya/_che ge mo pa la mu sti shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/_yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya/_che ge mo ma ra ya shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/_mi drag mi bul mi zhan par/_/ting 'dzin sbyor ba ldan byas te/_/
[\[75a.4\]]nyi ma re la rim bzhin sbyar/_/grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za'o/_/phrin las nges par grub pa ste/_/bsgom par bya ba sku mdog ser/_/yum yang de dang 'dra ba la/_/phyi ma rim bzhin sbyar bar bya/_/gser lta bu yi ting 'dzin la/_/'phro 'du byang chub sems 
[\[75a.5\]]lta bu/_/phyogs bcu ma lus don byas te/_/bdag gi phung po ma lus dang /_/tshe dang longs spyod 'phel bar bsam/_/de tshe sngags 'di bzlas par bya/_/ya ma ra tsa sa to me ya/_che ge mo bra ma ya/_puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/_ya me to ru na yo ta ya/_che ge mo ka k+Sha puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/_ya ta 
[\[75a.6\]]yo ni ra ya k+She ya/_che ge mo zhig sa sti puSh+TiM nyu ru swA hA/_yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya/_che ge mo zhig mA ra ya buSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/_/de tshe rang rig ting 'dzin gyi/_/mthu dang ldan par byas te ni/_/sngags de bzlas pa byas na ni/_/'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med/_/thams 
[\[75a.7\]]cad dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir/_/lha yang sku mdog zangs lta bu/_/yum yang de dang 'dra bar bsgom/_/lha rnams gzhung bzhin bskyed pa ni/_/mthar byed 'byung ba'i bzlas ba'o/_/ya ma ra tsa sa to me ya/_che ge mo hu~M hu~M ba shang ku ru swA hA/_ya me to ru na yo 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]ta ya/_che ge mo hu~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_ya ta yo ni ra yak+She ya/_che ge mo hu~M hU~M phaT phaT/_kA la rU pa swA hA/_yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya che ge mo hu~M hU~M phaT phaT/_kA la rU pa hu~M hU~M phaT phaT/_/sngags kyi bzlas pa byas na ni/_/bla med sangs rgyas thams cad kyang /_/'du 
[\[75b.2\]]zhes gsungs te gdon mi za'o/_/lha ni sku mdog lcags lta bu/_/mthing ga rab tu khros pa la/_/gcer bu ral pa gcig ste 'jigs/_/ma rungs 'dul ba bsgoms nas ni/_/bzlas pa 'di ni drag tu bzlas/_/ya ma ra tsa sa to me ya che ge mo a mu khaM bra ma 
[\[75b.3\]]ya ni hU~M paT/_ya me to ru na yo ta ya/_che ge mo a mu kha~M mu ra tsa ya hU~M phaT/_ya ta yo ni ra yak+She ya che ge mo a mu kha~M rak+ta tsa ra hU~M phaT/_yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya che ge mo a mu kha~M mA ra ya hU~M phaT/_bdag nyid 'jigs byed skur bsgoms la/_/sngags kyi 
[\[75b.4\]]phreng bas phog 'gyur na/_/mngon shes ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyang /_/'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za/_/zhi ba'i dus su bzlas pa yis/_/dang pos sems ni g.yos par 'gyur/_/gnyis pas yid la 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gsum pas dkar po'i ngo bo 
[\[75b.5\]]dang /_/bzhi bas thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/_/rgyas pa'i dus su bzlas pa yis/_/dang pos dpal yang 'phel bar byed/_/gnyis pas dbang thang skyed par byed/_/gsum pas gzi byin rnyed 'gyur te/_/bzhi bas tshe ring ma lus rgyas par 'gyur/_/
[\[75b.6\]]dbang gi dus su bzlas pa yis/_/dang pos sems kyang g.yos par byed/_/gnyis pas 'jug par nus pa ste/_/gsum pas dmigs pa dbang du 'du/_/bzhi pas thams cad dbang du 'du'o/_/drag po'i bzlas pa byas pa yis/_/dang pos mgo 
[\[75b.7\]]ni 'khor bar byed/_/gnyis pas yid 'khrugs gsum pas khrag tu skyugs/_/bzhi pas gdon mi za ba'o/_/gzhi 'am gnas su bstan pa ni/_/bcu gnyis 'khor lo rtsibs can de/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi ni gos la bri/_/zhi ba pad+ma zla ba la/_/rgyas 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]pa glang po'i rgyab tu bya/_/dbang ni bud med snying gar te/_/dgug pa seng ge dre'u dang gnyis/_/dbye ba rta dang ma he gnyis/_/smyo 'bog sha ba'i rgyab tu bya/_/lkugs pa lug gi khong du gzhug_/bskrad pa rnga mo'i rgyab tu bya/_/gsang ba skyes pa'i snying ga ste/_/
[\[76a.2\]]gnon pa ri rab 'og tu bya/_/snag tsha'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yang /_/khrag sna gsum dang byi la'i gcin/_/pho rog dag gi sgro rtsa la/_/shi ba'i skra las pir byas la/_/gang brtsams 'grub par nges par bshad/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das brtsam pa'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[76a.3\]]mchog de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/nges par bstan pa'i rgyud 'di la/_/khro bo'i bzlas pa ji ltar lags/_/yum gyi bzlas pa ji ltar lags/_/ma mo'i sngags rnams ji ltar lags/_/khro bo'i sngags rnams ji ltar lags/_/zhe sdang 'joms mdzad khro bo des/_/
[\[76a.4\]]gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/khro bo yab yum lce la gzhag_/ma mo sngags kyi mthu byin che/_/khro bo mang po 'od 'phro ba'o/_/de yi bzlas pa 'di dag go_/o~M a kro d+he ka ya mAn ta ka kA la rU pa pa tsa te ni hU~M phaT/_o~M a~M hu~M pa tA li rag+sha man/_o~M ro ga mdun b+h+yo/_
[\[76a.5\]]tsa mun ta kyi kyi ma b+h+yo/_nam gru ma ba ya ti b+h+yo/_o~M o~M o~M/_kro d+ha badzra ba smi/_badzra kro d+ha ma la/_badzra kro d+ha tis+tha/_badzra kro d+ha kang+ka/_badzra kro d+ha smig sha_/badzra kro d+ha rag khang /_badzra kro d+ha ta ki ni/_badzra kro d+ha rag+sha/_badzra kro d+ha yak+Sha/_badzra kro d+ha ku Na Da li/_badzra 
[\[76a.6\]]kro d+ha kri ta/_badzra lo ka/_badzra ba smi/_badzra shu la/_badzra ku lan/_badzra kang+ka/_badzra mu la/_badzra sri ta/_badzra ba mu/_badzra shu la/_badzra sma ra/_hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M/_hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M/_dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH_b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal 
[\[76a.7\]]ye shes sems dpa' khro bo'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/nges par bstan pa'i rgyud 'di la/_/tshe zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags/_/yungs kar bsgrub pa ji ltar lags/_/de yis las ni ci zhig 'grub/_/phur bu zhes bgyi ji ltar lags/_/dang po 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]dam bca' ji ltar lags/_/bcom ldan khro bo'i rgyal po la/_/de skad ces ni zhus pa dang /_/gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/tshe zhes bya ba'i don 'di yang /_/chos nyid spros pa med pa la/_/kun du mi 'gyur nam mkha' 'dra/_/bskyod med dus kyis 
[\[76b.2\]]bshig tu med/_/'gro ba 'khrul pa'i ngo gang la/_/bag chags ngan pas bslus pa yis/_/tshe la bar chod 'ong bar gsungs/_/de phyir tshe yi bsgrub pa gsungs/_/yungs kar bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyang /_/bag chags 'khrul pas gnod 'gyur ba/_/
[\[76b.3\]]mi mthun pa dang gnyen po ste/_/de dag 'dul ba'i don du bstan/_/de ni las kyi 'bras bu yang /_/sngon nas las ngan mthu rtags te/_/mi mthun pa de 'gugs par byed/_/de nas yungs kar rgyal pos bya'o/_/phur bu zhes su bstan pa yang /_/
[\[76b.4\]]bdag nyid khro bo chen po ste/_/gnyis med mkha' la gnas bsams te/_/phur bu zhes ni de la bya'o/_/phyogs bcu'i thugs las skyes pa ste/_/de phyir phur bu zhes su bstan/_/dang bor dam bcas 'di ltar ro/_/lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la/_/mtshams med 
[\[76b.5\]]lnga ni kun spyod cing /_/gos ngan re ba gon pa dang /_/zas ngan lci ba za ba'i tshe/_/de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung /_/dus ngan tha ma byung ba'i tshe/_/lha mo'i nang na 'od zer can/_/'phags pa'i nang na 'jam dpal gnyis/_/'di gnyis ma gtogs dngos grub 
[\[76b.6\]]gzhan/_/rigs 'dzin kun la ma yin no/_/khro bo'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/_/nges par dbang du ma gyur pa'i/_/dang po 'das dang da ltar gyi/_/phyis 'byung ba ni gang yang med/_/dgra bgegs 'bum mam stong yang rung /_/de ma thag tu brlag par byed/_/
[\[76b.7\]]khrag gi char yang 'bebs par byed/_/ces gsungs pas/_'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad tshar bcad de/_drag po'i phrin las grub par gyur to/_/de nas 'khor rnams kyis/_'jam dpal khro bo gshin rje gshed po la 'di skad ces 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]bstod do/_/'phags pa khro bo 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed/_/chos sku byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las/_/tshad med bzhi yi ngang nyid rnam dag pas/_/bdag nyid khro bo 'bar ba'i sku ston cing /_/tshangs pa brgya byin lha chen drag po rnams/_/
[\[77a.2\]]gnyis med byang chub sems kyis sgrol bar mdzad/_/ma he'i steng na zhabs ni brkyang bskum gnas/_/las kyi dbyug pa dag gis rdul du rlog_/klu yi rgyal pos sku la brgyan pa ni/_/snyan cha mgur dang dbu dang phyag zhabs rnams/_/yan lag lnga la nges par 
[\[77a.3\]]dkris te gnas/_/dbu skra kham nag ral pa gyen du 'bar/_/spyan gsum gnyis med rnam thar don la gzigs/_/mgo bcad phreng bas dbu yi rgyan du byas/_/ljags dang mche ba glog ltar 'dril zhing 'bar/_/'jigs byed drag po'i zhal spyan 
[\[77a.4\]]rab tu bgrad/_/mi lpags rlon pa dag gis stod g.yogs shing /_/stag lpags rlon pas sku yi rgyan du byas/_/de 'dra'i sku mdog 'bar ba'i cha lugs 'chang /_/ngo mtshar rmad byung che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes bstod nas gnyis su med par gyur 
[\[77a.5\]]to/_/'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las le'u bcu bzhi pa'o//_//'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/_rgyud phyi ma rim par bkod pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//_
[\[77a.6\]{D839}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sarba ta thA ga ta bud tro pU na gu h+ya ba no shi a shwad da/_ma bin sa ma hA tan+t+ra nA ma/_bod skad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa gsang ba rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba/_dpal 
[\[77a.7\]]rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bde ba chen po phyogs bcu dang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i 'byung gnas/_sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje gsang ba 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pas spras pa/_bkod pa rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor lhun po brtsegs shing yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas sna tshogs rnam par snang ba'i ngo bo/_/zab pa dang rgya che ba'i yan lag thams cad 
[\[77b.2\]]gsal bar byed cing ye shes kyi tshogs kyis chos ma lus pa mthar phyin pa/_kun du phrin las rgya cher 'phrul pa'i bdag nyid/_dpal bde byed pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug chags pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin brnyes pa med pa'i chos nyid kyis thams cad la dbang 
[\[77b.3\]]bskur ba de nyid lha thams cad 'du ba'i gnas gzhal yas khang bar du gyur ba/_'og min rdo rje lhun po'i gnas ye shes kyi snang ba rin po che sna tshogs ni 'od 'bar ba'i khang [{]bzangs[,]bzang[}]/_'dod pa'i yon tan gzugs sdug pa sna tshogs dang /_dri zhim pa sna 
[\[77b.4\]]tshogs dang /_ro bro ba sna tshogs dang /_reg bya 'jam pa sna tshogs dang /_chos kyi bde ba bskyed pa sna tshogs phyogs bcur 'phro zhing 'khrigs pa rtse mo mtho zhing khyams kyi rnam par phye bar sgo bzhi sgo khang dang bcas par bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe bde bar gshegs 
[\[77b.5\]]pa'i rol pa chen po kun du snang ba dang /_'od kyi dpal dang /_dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang /_cho 'phrul bkod pa dang /_rnam par gzigs dang /_mi bskyod rdo rje dang /_mngon par snang ba dang /_brtan pa'i dbang phyug dang /_'brug sgra dang /_dri ma med pa dang /_
[\[77b.6\]]rin chen phung po dang /_nam mkha'i mdzod dang /_rin chen dra ba dang /_dkon mchog mtshan dang /_rin chen tog dang /_'od zer snang ba dang /_tshe mtha' yas dang /_chos kyi dbang phyug dang /_chags pa med pa'i 'od dang /_dga' ba'i spyan dang /_don 
[\[77b.7\]]thams cad yod pa dang /_brtson 'grus shugs can dang /_las chen 'phrul las dang /_gnod sbyin 'dul ba dang /_sna tshogs dbang phyug go/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde ba'i blo gros dang /_rgya mtsho'i sgra dbyangs dang /_
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]gzi brjid bkod pa dang /_'khor lo rnon po dang /_shes snang ba dang /_rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang /_'od zer 'phro ba dang /_drag shul can dang /_dri ma sems dpa' dang /_sgyu ma'i sprul pa dang /_rin chen rgyal po dang /_dra ba can dang /_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[78a.2\]]dang /_gser 'od 'phro ba dang /_rin chen snye ma dang /_chos kyi mtho ba dang /_dri ma med pa dang /_mun pa sel ba dang /_dga' ba'i dbyangs dang /_gzhon nu rin chen dang /_rdo rje rnam par gnon pa dang /_gar mkhan dang /_bro'i rgya mtsho dang /_thogs med bkod 
[\[78a.3\]]pa dang /_pad+mo dga' ba dang /_sa li dbang phyug dang /_rin chen spungs pa dang /_sprin gyi phreng ba dang /_yid 'ong me tog dang /_ye shes sgron ma dang /_spobs pa brtsegs pa dang /_kha lo sgyur ba dang /_dran pa'i dbang phyug dang /_pad+ma'i blo gros dang /_las byed pa'i stobs dang /_snying po 
[\[78a.4\]]blo gros rnams so/_/de dag kun kyang rang rang gi btsun mo'i tshogs dang 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so/_/gzhan yang pad+mo 'phro ba dang /_pad+ma 'dzin pa dang /_pad+ma sgrogs pa dang /_pad+ma bskyod pa dang /_pad+ma tshim byed dang /_pad+ma 'thor ba dang /_pad+ma snang 
[\[78a.5\]]ba dang /_pad+ma dbang byed rnams kyang rang rang gi phrin las kyis bkod do/_/gzhan yang 'jigs byed chen po byams pa'i dbang phyug brtse ba'i dbang phyug dang /_pad grol dbang phyug dang /_grol ba'i dbang phyug dang /_sbyin pa'i dbang phyug dang /_spyod pa'i 
[\[78a.6\]]dbang phyug dang /_smra ba'i dbang phyug dang /_mthun pa'i dbang phyug kyang rang rang gi rig pa bcas pas 'khod do/_/de dag la sogs pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnam par 'byed pa dang /_'byed pa med par snang ba'i sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 
[\[78a.7\]]'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang /_thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po pad+ma chags pa'i spyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_thugs ka'i dpal be'u la sogs pa'i gnas rnams 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]nas/_'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed pa bkye bas/_des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gsal bar byas pa dang /_ya mtshan gyi ltas chen po bco brgyad 'byung bar gyur to/_/de nas snod dang bcud du bcas pa'i gsal zhing 'bar bar gyur 
[\[78b.2\]]nas/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thugs dam bskul te/_de dag gis kyang cho 'phrul rnam par 'khod pa zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen pos rang gis 'khor lo'i khyams dag tu spro bar byed mdzad do/_/de yang zhing khams rnam par sbyong zhing 
[\[78b.3\]]slar 'khor gyi 'khor dang bcas pa 'od zer 'phro ba'i gnas su 'dus so/_/de ltar 'chad pa'i rgya chen po'i rnam par rol 'phrul bas rol zhing zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas par gyur nas bzhugs pa las 'khor thams cad kyis the tshom skyes par gyur to/_/de'i dus na 
[\[78b.4\]]mthun par gleng ba ni/_kye ma ho ya mtshan sna tshogs chos/_/rgyal ba'i mdzad pa ya mtshan che/_/cho 'phrul dpag med gyur pa yi/_/dgos pa'i don nyid ji lta bu/_/rgyu rkyen med par sangs rgyas ni/_/gsang gsum dam tshig spro mi mdzad/_/de yi mtshan nyid yang 
[\[78b.5\]]snang ba/_/gsang ba'i dbang po bskul bar mdzod/_/khyod ni rgyal ba kun gyi sras/_/dgongs don rgya mtsho don mnga' ba/_/bka' yi bdag po dgongs mdzod dag_/legs par zhu zhing gsol gdab mdzod/_/de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes lnga brgya 
[\[78b.6\]]dang bcas pas gzhan dag gi the tshom rnam par gcod pa dang rang nyid kyi sgo gsal bar bya ba'i phyir mdun rol nas langs te/_phyogs bcu nas 'khod nas mchod pa'i tshogs rgya chen po bkod cing rgyal ba kun la mchod de/_lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bskor ba byas 
[\[78b.7\]]shing rtse gcig tu gus pas phyag 'tshal nas/_dga' ba'i bzhin gyis gsol ba btab pa/_e ma rgyal ba nyid kyi sku/_/rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor dag_/ting 'dzin ye shes gnas las byung /_/dga' mdzad dkyil 'khor 'dus pa dang /_/byang 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]chub sems sprin char chen gyis/_/nyon mongs la sogs sbyong mdzad cing /_/thugs rje chen po ye shes kyis/_/tshogs pa'i 'bras bu legs smin mdzad/_/sku mdangs dga' ba'i bzhin bcas pas/_/gsang ba'i theg pa bstan du gsol/_/khyod 
[\[79a.2\]]kyi dgongs don gting dpag dka'/_/zab cing phra la rgya che bas/_/'khor rnams the tshom ri bos gnon/_/thugs rje che mnga' gsal bar mdzod/_/'di dag thams cad bstan pa'i snod/_/mgon po btang snyoms lhun mnga' mdzad/_/dus 'dir rtsom pa don che ste/_/smon 
[\[79a.3\]]lam 'bras bu mthar phyin mdzod/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i brtan g.yo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad thugs mnyam pa nyid rtse gcig gi sgo nas gzigs so/_/rnam par gzigs kun du gzigs/_
[\[79a.4\]]de ltar dgongs nas dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad smra bsam las 'das par sna tshogs rnam par smros shig_/de nyid dngos po dang bar gzigs nas/_gzigs pa'i mtha' dang /_dgongs pa'i mtha' dang /_mdzad pa'i mtha' kun la snyoms pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 
[\[79a.5\]]snyoms par bzhugs te/_bkod pa dang /_rnam par bkod pa dang /_rnam par bshad pa dang /_dgongs pa dang /_rnam par dgongs pa dang /_rol pa dang /_rol pa chen po dang /_mdzad pa dang /_sna tshogs mdzad pas kun du spro bar mi byed de/_'jig rten drug gi 
[\[79a.6\]]rnam pas bsdus pa'i stong gsum gyi dngos po 'di dag_/sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor 'di las gzhan du snang bar mi dgongs so/_/de'i dus dang sa dang sa'i khyad par dang /_dkyil 'khor bkod pa dag kyang rnam par mi gzigs/_kun du mi gzigs shing dgongs 
[\[79a.7\]]pa yang mi 'gog go/_/de dag ni mthar yang mi gnas shing nam mkha' lta bur bzhugs so/_/de nas ting nge 'dzin de la zhugs ma thag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bur rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ngo mtshar gyi sgo nas bskul zhing gzhan dag gi don thugs g.yo bar mdzad pa'i glus g.yo slong bar mdzad de/_tshul ban don gyi rgyal po che/_/'dren pa kun gyi rgyud nyid pas/_/nam mkha' lta bu'i rgyud nyid pas/_/nam mkha' lta bu'i dkyil 'khor nas/_/
[\[79b.2\]]thugs rje chen po'i ya mtshan ston/_/kye ma'o mgon po don kun gnas/_/zhi ba'i las dam 'jug byed pa/_/byang sems thugs rje'i rlan bral lam/_/rdos can chos dang 'grang 'gyur cing /_/zhes gsol ba btab pa las kyang ci yang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de nas yang yum 
[\[79b.3\]]gzi ldan pad+mo zhes bya bas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin las slong ba'i glus skul bar mdzad de/_mi dmigs ting 'dzin bsam 'das brjod dang bral/_/bde ba chen po ye shes byang chub sems/_/mi dmigs thugs rje mi 'da' dam tshig gis/_/rol ba'i cho 'phrul rgya 
[\[79b.4\]]chen bstan du gsol/_/de skad ces yang bskul ba'i rjes/_/mgon po'i gnas rnams la dgongs nas/_/'od zer rnams bkod 'dzum mdzad de/_/'khor ba legs sbyin skabs dbye mdzad/_/legs so legs so rdo rje can/_/pad+mo 'dzin pa'i grogs bcas pas/_/
[\[79b.5\]]yang yang bskul bar mdzad pas na/_/gnang zhing bstan par mdzad pa la/_/dga' ba'i spyan rjes dang bar gyis/_/gang 'dod rtogs pa zhi bar mdzod/_/ma 'ongs rtogs pa mtha' dag rnams/_/thugs rje shugs kyis bzung mdzad de/_/don kun khyab pa'i snang ba yis/_/
[\[79b.6\]]gzung bar bya ba'i skabs dbye mdzad/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba'i rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las rnam par sprul pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas dga' zhing 'khor 'dus pas/_/dga' 
[\[79b.7\]]ba'i bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rgyas mdzad de/_/gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal bzhin/_/thugs rjes 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gzungs/_/de nas gzigs ldan pad+mo can/_/'dzum mdangs rgyas pas bskul mdzad de/_/'o byed 'khyud pa la sogs pa/_/dga' bzhin 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]chags par rnam par 'gyur/_/e ma rig pa'i rgyal po khyod/_/thugs rje chen po nyi 'od bzhin/_/thugs rje 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gzungs/_/phyogs ris med pas go 'byed pas/_/yul du gyur pa kun rgyud dgongs/_/mi dmigs cho 'phrul nam 
[\[80a.2\]]mkha' las/_/bkod pa rgya mtsho sprin phung bzhin/_/thugs rje sprul pa'i char chen pos/_/sna tshogs las brgyad dag par mdzod/_/de nas gtso bo rdo rje 'chang /_/ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs mdzad de/_/rang gi mtshan mos rab mdzes pas/_/rgyal po zil 
[\[80a.3\]]gnon gzi brjid can/_/phyag gi 'khor lo rab bskor cing /_/phyogs rnams kun du gzigs mdzad de/_/mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings dag na/_/rdo rje sprul sku mngon phyung nas/_/gzi ldan pad+mo chen mo dang /_/rol pa'i tshul du bzhugs mdzad de/_/'dzum 
[\[80a.4\]]mig chags pa'i bzhin dag gis/_/'khor rnams slong ba'i sngags brjod do/_/o~M AHhU~M ma hA b+hasmi sha ku ru bi na hr-i da ya a~M b+ha ba hi a la la ho/_/gnyis su med pa'i byang sems kyis/_/dkyil 'khor sbyor zhing bsdu bar mdzod/_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs 
[\[80a.5\]]rdzogs sku/_/rdo rje gar gyi rol mdzad cing /_/dga' mchog rdo rje byang chub sems/_/'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i pad+mo'i gnas/_/dkar 'tsher dag pa'i rang bzhin te/_/dmar po dbang dang gnyis med par/_/gsal khyab kun du spros pa las/_/dkyil 'khor sprul pa 
[\[80a.6\]]mtha' yas 'thon/_/zhi 'gog mya ngan 'das pa dang /_/byang chub mgon gnas lam zhes dag_/gnyis med gnyis su sbyor mdzad cing /_/rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bkod/_/ngo mtshar sprul pa rnam par rol/_/brjid dang bcas pas gar mdzad cing /_/'dzum par 
[\[80a.7\]]mdzad dang rol pa dang /_/kun du 'gying dang spyan mdzes bltam/_/smin ring bskyod cing bsgyur ba dang /_/rdo rje phur pas g.ya' bas slong /_/'dor zhing skum dang 'jog ldeg dang /_/rnam par rol pa'i gar gyis kyang /_/rigs kyi phrin las sna tshogs sprul/_/nam mkha' 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]kun tu khyab par mdzad/_/rnam par rol pa'i bde 'byung bar/_/byang chub sems sogs zhi zhing gsal/_/rol pa'i char nyid mngon babs pas/_/'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na/_/brtan dang g.yo ba ma lus pa'i/_/sangs rgyas zhing khams dag byas nas/_/byang 
[\[80b.2\]]chub sems tshogs rol pa la/_/brdeg dang 'khyud dang sdom pa las/_/sbyor dang bstim dang mnyes pa dang /_/kun du rab dgyes ye shes thig_/sna tshogs snang ba nyi ma'i 'od/_/yang dag bde la rab gnas mdzod/_/de 'dus pa'i che tshogs pa'o/_/phyogs bcu kun 
[\[80b.3\]]nas bzhes mdzad de/_/thabs dang shes rab byin brlabs pa'i/_/byang sems rnam dag rgyun gyis mchod/_/rnga dang sil snyan sgra sgrogs shing /_/dbang po tshim pa'i rol rtsed dang /_/gar dbyangs glu drug sna tshogs kun/_/stong gsum gang bar gsung byas te/_/
[\[80b.4\]]bcom ldan pad+mo bde yang bde/_/gzi ldan yum dang bcas par mchod/_/e ma 'dus pa'i tshogs dbus nas/_/thugs rje che mnga' nyi dkyil bzhin/_/'khor lo kun sgyur sgrol mdzad pas/_/rang gi dkyil 'khor rgyas par mdzad/_/rdo rje 'chang ba'i gsol 
[\[80b.5\]]'debs kyis/_/dkyil 'khor dag la lhun grub rdzogs/_/pad+ma'i dpal ldan sems pa che/_/phrin las ye shes gnas kun sbyong /_/khyod zhabs bskyed pa thugs rje'i stobs/_/khams gsum ma lus dag pa yi/_/de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mchog_/mgon 
[\[80b.6\]]po bka' drin mdzad pas legs/_/de skad gsol btab dgyes par 'gyur/_/phyag rgya chen po'i gnas la bzhugs/_/de nas dga' ba'i byang chub sems/_/sngon gyi rgyud dang lam bzhi las/_/sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/sngon gyi rgyud dang 
[\[80b.7\]]lam grogs rnams/_/dgongs shing thugs rje'i ye shes thugs/_/rang bzhin gnas nas kun dgongs te/_/phyogs bzhi nas ni bskul bar mdzad/_/kye kye mchog gsum bde ba'i sku/_/byams pa'i thugs mnga' sku gsal mdzad/_/rdo rje rgyal po byang 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]chub sems/_/bdag dgongs 'gro ba'i don chen mdzad/_/kye kye yon tan rin chen tshogs/_/thugs rje mnyam nyid ye shes che/_/rgyal po 'khor lo byang chub nyid/_/dkyil 'khor sna tshogs sprul pa'i mdzod/_/kye kye rnam par dag pa'i sku/_/
[\[81a.2\]]dga' ba rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i gnas/_/so so'i ye shes sna tshogs 'byed/_/chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid/_/kye kye 'gro ba'i don chen bdag_/btang snyoms mi 'dor sna tshogs dor/_/bya ba grub pa'i ting 'dzin mchog_/phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag 
[\[81a.3\]]ston/_/rang dga'i bskum pas g.yo mdzad de/_/phyogs bzhi byang chub dga' gnas 'jug_/kye ma'i 'gro rnams de bzhin nyid/_/byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul las/_/nyon mongs gzung 'dzin sgrib pa yis/_/rang gi mtha' lam 'ges par byed/_/'di dag 
[\[81a.4\]]thugs rje'i gnas su rung /_/ye shes gsal ba'i thabs mang pos/_/thams cad dus gcig bsgral byas nas/_/rang gi bde chen don ston mchog_/zhes gsungs pad+ma'i rig pa 'dzin/_/sangs rgyas sras bcas dga' bar mdzad/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[81a.5\]]thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las thugs rje sprul pa'i rol pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/_/rdo rje 'chang ba stan las langs/_/bde gshegs bsngags pa rjod byed cing /_/bskum pas 
[\[81a.6\]]dbyangs kyis gsol ba btab/_/kye ma ho mchog gsum dam tshig sku/_/ye shes bla na med pa'i bdag_/byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid/_/rnam 'phrul thugs rje'i dus nyid pas/_/rigs kyi 'khor lo dpag med sku/_/de ring bkra shis phun sum tshogs/_/thugs 
[\[81a.7\]]rje chen po yal 'dor na/_/ci phyir theg chen mchog tu sngags/_/yang dag zhus pa'i tshig gsan nas/_/thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor gzigs par mdzad/_/mgon po'i pad+ma'i sku de nyid/_/gzi ldan yum dang rol mdzad cing /_/dri med ye shes phyogs gzigs shing /_/
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]gnyis med byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsal/_/theg pa gsang chen cher 'byung ba'i/_/lam 'di dpal ldan rol mo'i mchog_/sangs rgyas sras bcas sdud mdzad de/_/gzhan 'phrul gnas tshogs g.yo mdzad cing /_/stong gsum 'di dag spyod 
[\[81b.2\]]mdzad cing /_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 'jug ste/_/sku las 'od zer spro bar mdzad/_/des khyab rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal/_/ye shes 'od mdangs sems dpa'i sku/_/gnas lngar gsang ba'i sngags kyis gzhug_/phyag rgya chen po yongs rdzogs sku/_/
[\[81b.3\]]zhal gsum phyag drug dga' ba'i mdangs/_/dmar gsal pad+ma rA ga'i mdangs/_/g.yas g.yon zhal gnyis sngo dang ser/_/rigs rgyan mtshan ma kun gyis mdzes/_/phyag na pad spong bum pa dang /_/rdo rje rtse lnga dpal be'u dang /_/mtha' mas mda' 
[\[81b.4\]]gsor gzhu 'dzin pa'o/_/rin chen sna tshogs na bza' dang /_/phyag rgya'i yum bcas rol pa mdzad/_/gzhal yas khang pa sgo bzhi dang /_/rin chen sna tshogs rta babs bcas/_/dra ba dra phyed mu tig phreng /_/b+han d+ha dril bu sogs kyis spras/_/dbus 
[\[81b.5\]]kyi dkyil 'khor cher 'phags pa'i/_/pho brang ka ba gdung rnams la/_/pad+mo rdo rje sogs pas spras/_/'dod pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs/_/gnas rnams kun du rin chen khri/_/pad+ma 'khor lo nyi zlas mtshan/_/phyi rol bar khyams 'khor ba dang /_/snod 
[\[81b.6\]]rnams kun du pad+ma la/_/thabs dang shes rab bye brag gis/_/nyi ma zla ba rkyang pa'o/_/de nas pad+mo rnam dag kun/_/dbus kyi gdan la bzhugs mdzad de/_/dgyes pa'i gar dbyangs bskyod pa'i mthus/_/thabs dang shes rab rdzogs par mdzad/_/de tshe 
[\[81b.7\]]thugs mchog byang chub sems/_/mkha' klong rnam par dag pas na/_/rig pa bde ba chen po'i sku/_/sna tshogs sna tshogs shar ba de/_/gsung nyid yi ge 'khor lo'i tshogs/_/'bar ba 'od zer rtse lnga ba/_/cho ga'i yan lag rim bzhin du/_/thugs 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]kyi mtshan ma dam tshig bya/_/sngags bcas 'phro zhing 'du ba'i tshul/_/rgyal po bder gshegs yab yum dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems ma dang /_/las mdzad khro bo yab yum dang /_/phyag rgya chen po'i skur gyur nas/_/rigs 
[\[82a.2\]]kyi rgyal phreng mtshan mas mdzes/_/rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs shing /_/rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod/_/de tshe mgon po bde chen po/_/rigs kun bdag 'gyur zhes bya bas/_/pad+mo rnam par 'phrul ba yi/_/dkyil 'khor chen po 'byin 
[\[82a.3\]]par mdzad/_/byang sems kam las rnam 'phrul ba'i/_/bder gshegs 'od zer snang ba'i sku/_/zhal dang phyag la sogs pa'i rgyan/_/gtso bo'i cha lugs ci lta bar/_/rang 'od yum dang 'khril bar mdzod/_/bkra shis mtshan ldan bde ba la/_/rA ga pad+mo hU~M zhes pas/_/
[\[82a.4\]]sngags mchog yi ge 'bru brgyad de/_/las kun grub par mdzad pa yin/_/gang gi pad+ma sha ri dang /_/b+hu d+ha hU~M gis bsnan byas na/_/zhi rgyas dbang drag las kun dang /_/grub chen brgyad kyi tshogs sog rnams/_/sbyor ba tsam gyis grub 'gyur zhing /_/yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]gnas 
[\[82a.5\]]pa gnas pa yin/_/'byin pa'i dus su gsang sngags la/_/yi ge dza yis gdags byas nas/_/rnam 'phro rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor/_/rigs bdag sku gnas dgyes par bzhugs/_/thugs rje skul ba'i glu dang sngags/_/'od zer tshogs kyis skul ba mdzod/_/
[\[82a.6\]]dam tshig gsum ston sngags kyi mthus/_/dgyes chags brtan pas gzi dang ldan/_/o~M rnam dag pad+mo bde ba'i dbyings/_/ye shes byin las gsal ba'i mchog_/dkyil 'khor gsang gsum dam tshig che/_/mnyam nyid rigs bdag thub pa che/_/byin brlabs 
[\[82a.7\]]'dor bar mi mdzad pas/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs/_/gsal mdzad gnyis su med pa'i sku/_/rang gi ngo bos gnas pa yin/_/gtso bo sngags kyis bskul byas te/_/'od zer rgyan bcas thugs kar bsdus/_/yi ge A nas aH'i bar/_/bcu 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]drug 'od zer 'phro byas pas/_/'gro kun sangs rgyas skur bkod cing /_/rigs mthun dkyil 'khor kun gsal 'gyur/_/sngags kyi 'od zer sgrar bcas pas/_/chos rnams bcu drug dag pa'i dbyings/_/rang gi gnas su bkod byas pas/_/mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa 
[\[82b.2\]]gnyis rdzogs/_/de bzhin kA nas k+Sha yi bar/_/sum cu rtsa bzhi'i rim bzhin gsal/_/brnyan pa'i yi ge drug dang bcas/_/'od 'phros thams cad sangs rgyas sku/_/ye shes dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas/_/sngags kyi 'od zer sgrar bcas nas/_/chos mang 
[\[82b.3\]]ye shes zag pa med/_/slar nyid sku yi gnas zhugs pas/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rdzogs/_/gzhan yang rin chen sna bdun dang /_/bkra shis brgyad sogs kun gyis spras/_/kha~M las rnam 'phrul che mtha' yas/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi dkar dmar 
[\[82b.4\]]mdangs/_/pad+ma sogs dang ral gri 'dzin/_/chos kyi snang ba'i rgyan gyis bsgrubs/_/pad+ma rgyan 'bring rang bzhin mchog_/shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/_/ga~M las sprul pa'i chos dbang phyug_/dmar ser zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/_/pad+ma'i phreng ba 
[\[82b.5\]]bum pa 'dzin/_/dkyil 'khor gnas su bzhugs pa'o/_/g+ha~M las sprul pa'i chags med 'os/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis byu ru'i 'od/_/pad gnas glegs bam me long 'dzin/_/nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa'o/_/nga~M las sprul pa'i spyan dag 
[\[82b.6\]]ma/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis btsod kyi mdog_/rin chen phreng bas bsil yab 'dzin/_/byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa'o/_/tsa~M las sprul pa'i mi bskyod pa/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi chu shel mdog_/rdo rje dril 'dzin 'khril pa'i tshul/_/
[\[82b.7\]]dpal be'u bum sogs 'od phreng rgyan/_/tsha~M las sprul pa'i rta dbang phyug_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi bai DUr+ya/_/rin chen snye ma dung phor 'dzin/_/lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/_/dza~M las sprul pa'i 'brug sgra ni/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis gur 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]gum mdog_/rin chen chag shing 'gu d+he 'dzin/_/nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/_/nya~M las sprul pa'i dri med dpal/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi mar gad mdog_/rin chen pad srungs za ma tog_/byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la 
[\[83a.2\]]bzhugs/_/ta~M las sprul pa'i rin chen dbyangs/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog_/rin chen dril bu yum dang 'khril/_/rin chen mdzod spungs 'khor lo sogs/_/tha~M las sprul pa'i nam mkha'i mdog_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi sngo skya'i mdangs/_/
[\[83a.3\]]rin chen gling bu pad+mo 'dzin/_/shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la zhugs/_/da~M las sprul pa'i dra ba can/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi mthing ga'i mdog_/rin chen phreng dang pad+mo 'dzin/_/lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/_/d+ha~M las sprul pa'i dkon mchog 
[\[83a.4\]]rgyan/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar skya'i mdangs/_/chos kyi rgyal mtshan rgyud [{]mangs [,]mang [}]'dzin/_/nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/_/na~M las sprul pa'i rin chen tog_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma ra ta/_/dgos 'dod bum pa dpag bsam shing /_/
[\[83a.5\]]byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/_/Ta~M las sprul pa kun du snang /_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog_/'khor lo dril 'dzin yum dang bum pa 'dzin/_/gtsug tor dri med rdo rje 'dzin/_/tha~M las sprul pa'i 'od kyi dpal/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi 
[\[83a.6\]]shel gyi mdog_/'khor lo dra ba ral gri 'dzin/_/shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/_/da~M las sprul pa'i dga' dbang phyug_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi nyi ma'i mdangs/_/'khor lo rgyal mtshan dga' ba'i mdzod/_/lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la 
[\[83a.7\]]bzhugs/_/ta~M las sprul pa'i cho 'phrul bkod/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar skya'i mdangs/_/nyi ma'i 'od phreng rdo rjes spras/_/nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/_/na~M las sprul pa'i rnam par gzigs/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis ljang skya'i mdangs/_/
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]ku sha'i chun po'i a mra'i mdangs/_/byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/_/pa~M las sprul pa'i don yod pa/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang sngo'i mdog_/rgya gram dril bcas yum dang 'khril/_/rdo rje gdengs pos ral gri 'dzin/_/pha~M las sprul pa'i brtson 
[\[83b.2\]]'grus 'khyugs/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi kar ti ka_/rgya gram phreng ba rtse gsum 'dzin/_/shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/_/ba~M las sprul pa'i las chen po/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi ser skya'i mdog_/pad+ma'i phreng ba nor bu 'dzin/_/lho yi dkyil 
[\[83b.3\]]'khor gnas la bzhugs/_/b+ha~M las sprul pa'i gnod sbyin 'dul/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi pad+ma'i mdangs/_/phyag na rdo rje mche ba 'dzin/_/nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/_/ma~M las sprul pa'i sna tshogs dam/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang ser mdangs/_/
[\[83b.4\]]zla ba rin chen dbyug pa 'dzin/_/byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/_/bder gshegs rgyal ba de dag kyang /_/tsakra sgyur rgyal ma lus dang /_/mtshan dang dpe byad sna tshogs rgyan/_/rigs btsun btsun mo mdzes par bya/_/yang sprul byams pa'i dbang 
[\[83b.5\]]phyug ni/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi gangs ri mdog_/rdo rje gdengs dbyug ral gri dang /_/tri shUl thod bcas pad+ma'i lcug_/rngam brjid 'khor bcas yum dang 'khril/_/drag po'i rgyan cha shar gyi sgo/_/khwa las sprul pa rtse ba'i dbang /_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi 
[\[83b.6\]]gser gyi mdog_/rin chen dbyug pa pad+mo dang /_/thod rnga rdo rje myu gu'o/_/ra~M las sprul pa'i rnam grol dbang /_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar mdangs gsal/_/pad+ma dang ni dril bu dang /_/thod sprul ras sngon ba dan 'dzin/_/la~M las sprul pa'i 'gro dbang phyug_/
[\[83b.7\]]zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang gu'i mdog_/rdo rje rgya gram pad+mo dang /_/gri gug gtun shing phreng ba can/_/rin chen phreng bas mdzes byas nas/_/'khor bcas rngam pa'i mdangs bcas pas/_/lho la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi ru/_/gzhan 'jigs drag po'i las kyis 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]'khod/_/sha~M las sprul pa'i byin dbang phyug_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi dkar dmar 'od/_/rtse gsum b+han d+ha rin chen 'khril/_/mi yi thod pa ri mos mtshan/_/Sha~M las smra ba'i dbang phyug ste/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi ser skya'i mdangs/_/
[\[84a.2\]]rin chen rtse dgu bgrad phreng dang /_/pad+ma'i lcug ma sdigs mdzub mdzad/_/sa las sprul pa'i spyod dbang phyug_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar skya'i mdangs/_/dbyug pa rtse gcig pad+ma dang /_/dgra sta zhags pa phyag na 'dzin/_/ha~M las sprul pa'i dbang 
[\[84a.3\]]phyug ste/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang gu'i sku/_/ral gri lcags kyu dgra sta dang /_/me yi phreng ba 'khor lo 'dzin/_/gzhan 'joms 'jigs pa'i khro bo'i mchog_/rang 'od rigs mthun yum dang rol/_/drag po'i rgyan tshogs ma lus 'gengs/_/pad+ma'i 'dab ma 
[\[84a.4\]]bzhin du 'khod/_/ka las bde ba'i blo gros dang /_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi nam mkha'i mdangs/_/yum bcas rdo rje dril bu dang /_/nam mkha'i mdzod kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_/kha las khang pa rgya mtsho'i sgra dbyangs can/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi bu sha ra/_/
[\[84a.5\]]rin chen pi bang phreng ba dang /_/rnga yab rdo rje cod pan thogs/_/ga las gzi brjid bkod pa ni/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi rgya skegs mdog_/pad+ma'i lcug ma zla ba dang /_/'khor lo yid bzhin bum pa dang /_/g+ha las sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnon pa ni/_/zhal gcig 
[\[84a.6\]]phyag bzhi ma ra dang /_/'khor lo dbyug pa ma mo shing /_/rgya gram rin chen lcug ma 'dzin/_/tsa las shes rab snang ba ni/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang skya'i mdangs/_/rin chen phung po pad+ma dang /_/rtse gsum dril thabs 'od dkyil 'khor/_/tsha las rdo rje rgyal mtshan 
[\[84a.7\]]te/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog_/rin chen gdugs mdzes nyi ma dang /_/dpa' bo longs spyod pad+ma'i spyan/_/dza las 'od zer 'phro ba can/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi mdangs dmar gsal/_/pad+ma 'khor lo mchod sdong bu/_/mu tig chun po za ma tog_/
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]dz+ha las sprul pa'i drag shul can/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang ser mdog_/'od kyi me phung me 'od dang /_/ral gri 'bar ba g.yas dang g.yon/_/ta las sprul pa'i dri ma sel/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis dmar skya'i mdangs/_/nyi ma'i phreng ba gaN DI rdeg_/chos kyi 
[\[84b.2\]]tsakra rdzogs byed pa'o/_/tha las sgyu ma'i 'phrul pa ni/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa la sha/_/seng ge rgya mtsho rin chen phreng /_/rin chen bum pa de bcud bcas/_/las kyi rin chen rgyal po ni/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi rA ga'i mdangs/_/ri bo pad+ma chu dri dang /_/gser nya 'phyo 
[\[84b.3\]]ba'i rdzing bu yin/_/d+ha las 'phros pa'i dra ba can/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang gu'i mdog_/rgya gram dril bu 'phro ba dang /_/b+han d+ha sbrang yab 'dzag pa'i rgyun/_/ta las sprul pa'i lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ni/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi kar ta'i 'od/_/pad+ma'i rgyal mtshan dkar 
[\[84b.4\]]dmar mdangs/_/dri yi gzhong pa ku sha'i tshul/_/tha las gser 'od 'phro ba 'dzin/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi mthing ga'i mdog_/glegs bam mdzes pa'i sku gzugs dang /_/rin chen mdzod dang zla ba'i 'od/_/Da las rin chen snye ma ni/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi pad 
[\[84b.5\]]rA ga_/pad+ma'i sdong bu dpag bsam shing /_/b+han d+ha rtse gsum zla tshes gzugs/_/d+ha las chos kyi mthong ba ni/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi sna tshogs sku/_/go cha ye shes sgron ma dang /_/dpal be'u zur brgyad nor bu tog_/sna tshogs sprin phung ser gra bcas/_/mche 
[\[84b.6\]]ba dril bu ngang pa 'dzin/_/b+ha las gzhon nu rin chen ni/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang ser mdog_/rgya gram 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang /_/'od zer rtse gsum sngags pa'i bum/_/sems dpa' chen po de dag rnams/_/rgyan phreng cha lugs 'od zer dang /_/yum 
[\[84b.7\]]gnas 'khril zhing rang gnas kyi/_/gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs/_/nyam na las 'phrul ba yi/_/rdo rje rnam par gnon la sogs/_/rigs kyi mtshan ma ci bzhin du/_/pad+ma rA ga rak+ta mdangs/_/be'u gser mdog in dra bzhin/_/pad+ma rdo rje 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]rims sogs mtshan/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi yum dang 'khril/_/'og ma'i phyag mtshan mthun pa yi/_/rang rtags mtshan ma sna tshogs dang /_/pad+ma'i lcug mas mtshan byas pa'i/_/me tog 'bras bu rnams kyis mdzes/_/shar la sogs pa'i 
[\[85a.2\]]phyogs bzhi ru/_/byang chub sems dpa'i cha lugs kyis/_/rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas su 'khod/_/ya wa ra las sprul pa yi/_/pad+ma 'phro ba la sogs bzhi/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis dkar dang ser/_/dmar ljang pad+mo me long dang /_/rin chen phreng ba bi bang gar/_/mchod pa 
[\[85a.3\]]las mdzad nang gi mtshams/_/Sha sha sa ha las 'phrul pa'i/_/pad+mo tshim byed la sogs bzhi/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis rigs gnyis gzugs/_/bdug spos me tog dung dang dri/_/'gying tshul tri shUl las kyi tshul/_/mchod pas phyi yi mtshams na gnas/_/
[\[85a.4\]]de dag gi gsang sngags ni/_o~M d+he hi rA ga pad+ma shi ri bu ta hU~M hU~M swA hA/_o~M pad+ma ma hA d+ha ba ra bu na si ta ma hA d+ha ma hr-i da yA hU~M hU~M/_brad tang ya dza swA hA/_dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi'o/_/o~M tsakra a lo ka na ma rak+Sha sa~M b+ha ra da na hri ti ba ya ba ti dza swA hA/_nub phyogs pa'i 
[\[85a.5\]]dkyil 'khor ro/_/o~M badzra da ra ba kr-i ta ya ni sha~M ra ti ba sha~M ni dza swA hA/_shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la'o/_/o~M rat+na ku ti du man ta b+han d+ha b+han d+ha du na du na bi dza swA hA/_lho phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor pa'o/_/o~M pi sha tsi na d+ha ma ma du ru ha ha ha ha sarba gurba ni hU~M phaT 
[\[85a.6\]]swA hA/_byang gi dkyil 'khor ba'o/_/o~M ma ma a ba lo ka na ru ru yu ru si de b+h+yo de satwa ma ma hU~M dza swA hA/_rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o/_/o~M bi lo ka nA ma si ta na ma ku ru ku ru bo d+hi sa twa b+ha ra bu na dza hU~M dza swA hA/_rigs las sprul pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[85a.7\]]kyi'o/_/o~M bin d+ha bin d+ha sarba karma si de de pi ku ru bu ta sa~M bo ha hU~M o~M a~M dza swA hA/_lha mo rnams kyi'o/_/o~M a pa sma ra kro d+ha sni/_yak+sha hU~M hU~M hU~M bi ta~M pa ka phaT swA hA/_khro bo rnams kyi'o/_/gsang sngags rgyal po mi bzad pas/_/rnam par sprul pa sku yis ni/_/stong 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]gsum gnas nas g.yo mdzad de/_/rang gi lha la gsal bar mdzod/_/de nas mgon po rdo rje 'dzin/_/bde chen gar gyi dbang phyug gis/_/dkyil 'khor rnam gsum gsal byed pa'i/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/_/dkyil 'khor byin brlabs 
[\[85b.2\]]dbang bskur zhing /_/rigs kyi bdag pos gsal bar mdzod/_/gnas kun mtshan ma yongs dag nas/_/rnam gsum snang ba gnyis med 'gyur/_/o~M na ma sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta ma hA bo d+hi h+ya su tra~M tri sha shu d+he so nA khya hU~M hU~M hU~M/_o~M rin chen dbu 
[\[85b.3\]]rgyan gyi sngags sarba bu ta ku ru rat+na ma ma ku ta/_a a bIr+ya sad ma ma ku a b+hi Shiny+tsa o~M AHhU~M swA hA/_o~M pad+ma a mo ka sa ma ya shri ha ha ha tshin d+ha ma ni a smi sha bi ma ma ya hU~M hU~M/_sngags gsum gyi gsal bar phyed pa'o/_/o~M bi sha tsin d+ha ma ni a ba sa~M 
[\[85b.4\]]bo da ma ma ku ru si la la ta si na bi bud pa pa~M da hU~M hU~M hU~M/_rnam par spro ba'i sngags so/_/o~M ma ta la ni bi sha tsakra ku ma ta bu ta na ma si la du tri si hU~M phaT swA hA/_dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i sngags so/_/o~M a~M a a min du she ma la shan dun d+he ta thA ga te b+h+yod 
[\[85b.5\]]ti pad+ma ku ru AHhU~M swA hA/_rbad pa'i sngags so/_/o~M pad+ma mu kha~M pad+ma pa ba sa bo ti di ra ya~M gu ru hU~M hU~M hU~M ha~M ha~M dar sha swA hA/_snying po'i sngags so/_/o~M na ma su tra~M b+ho ga ga na gu ma le sa~M sA ra hU~M phaT swA hA/_rig pa mchog gi sngags so/_/o~M ba ga ga ba sa~M po pad+ma d+ha 
[\[85b.6\]]a h+ye h+yi ma hA kA ru ma da a ma d+hu na dza dza/_spyan drang ba'i sngags so/_/o~M pad+mo sa~M ga ga su ra ta ra ga sa ma ye s+t+wa~M/_gdan gyi sngags so/_/o~M a mu ka si nam sarba b+h+yo ga ga ta pU tsa me da na da hU~M tri swA hA/_mchod pa'i sngags so/_/o~M pad+ma bi lo ku ma la su na~M 
[\[85b.7\]]tu tra~M swA hA ba sa~M hi hi/_dgyes par bya ba'i sngags so/_/de nas gsang ba'i bdag po mchog_/rdo rje gsang ba rmad 'byung ba'i/_/sku dang gsung thugs gsang sngags che/_/byin gyis brlabs pa don bshad mdzad/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes mchog_/
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]de dag dkyil 'khor rnam 'phrul mchog_/dri ma med pa'i byang chub sems/_/de ni dkyil 'khor snying po mchog_/rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas chen po/_/thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i tshul/_/rang bzhin byang chub sems nyid las/_/rang bzhin lhun grub rdzogs 
[\[86a.2\]]chen po/_/'gro ba'i snang ba dam pa'i mchog_/rang bzhin dag pa dri med chos/_/dkyil 'khor gnas mchog gnyis med pa'o/_/phung po khams sogs rnam dag sku/_/e ma'o chos sku mya ngan 'das/_/e ma'o chos rnams ye shes sku/_/e ma'o chos kun rnam par 'phrul/_/rgya 
[\[86a.3\]]che sngags kyi tshul ldan pa'i/_/dkyil 'khor gsang gsum ngo mtshar che/_/thabs lnga mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis/_/sngon dang da lta 'brel don 'byung /_/thabs mkhas pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs/_/bsod nams ye shes dag pa'i shugs/_/sa dang sa 'das don chen po/_/
[\[86a.4\]]ta thA ga ta'i byin brlabs dbyings/_/la la sku dang gsung dang thugs/_/zab pa de nyid rang gi mthus/_/gsang gsum gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ya mtshan chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rnam 'phrul sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes so/_/
[\[86a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams/_/dga' ba chen po ngo mtshar gyis/_/rgyud gsum rnam 
[\[86a.6\]]dag tshim gyur nas/_/dgyes pa'i dbyangs kyis gsol ba btab/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan che/_/gnyis med rol pa ya mtshan che/_/dri med dag pa ya mtshan che/_/'od 'phro 'du ba ya mtshan che/_/byang chub sprin phung ya mtshan che/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba ya mtshan 
[\[86a.7\]]che/_/'phrul pa 'byung pa ya mtshan che/_/khro bo 'byung ba ya mtshan che/_/byin brlabs cho 'phrul ya mtshan che/_/tha ba rlan mdzad ya mtshan che/_/'gog pa rlung mdzad ya mtshan che/_/bdag cag 'khor tshogs 'dus pa rnams/_/dam tshig can du byin brlabs 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]mdzad/_/za 'og rim pa ci bzhin du/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'god/_/de nas bcom ldan bde chen pos/_/chags pa chen po rdo rje'i sku/_/sku dang gsung thugs gnyis med pa'i/_/'khor rnams rab tu sbyang ba'i phyir/_/rdo rje rgyan gyi ting 'dzin gyis/_/rang gi dkyil 'khor gsal 
[\[86b.2\]]bar mdzod/_/de tshe byang chub sems chen po/_/'od zer kun du khyab pa des/_/dga' ba chen po'i mchod pa yis/_/gnas kyi mtshan ma gsal bar mdzod/_/'du shes med dang 'gog gnas sogs/_/rang gi rtog pa'i mtha' zhes rnams/_/dri ma med pa'i byang chub sems/_/
[\[86b.3\]]rin chen chu des dbang bskur nas/_/rang gi ye shes dbang thob ste/_/'gro ba'i don byed nus dang ldan/_/las la spyod pa'i gnas rnams dang /_/rang skyob pa yi sems dag gis/_/thugs rje chen po'i byang chub sems/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di gnyer ro/_/byang chub 
[\[86b.4\]]sems kyi mtshan ma yis/_/'dus pa'i gnas lnga rig par bya/_/o~M gu h+ya badzra sa ma s+t+wa~M/_a la la ho/_/rdo rje ro langs bsdus pa yis/_/gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po rnams/_/rigs kyi dgongs pa ji lta bar/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i las la gnas/_/skal bzang dam 
[\[86b.5\]]tshig chen po ste/_/de las 'das na rlag par 'gyur/_/bka' yi bsgo ba'i don chen pos/_/'das pa'i 'khor tshogs bsam yas pas/_/dam tshig thob pas gral 'khod do/_/de nas gsang ba'i bdag po nyid/_/dbang thob las mdzad chen po des/_/bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[86b.6\]]gtsug gi phyag_/rnal 'byor lugs su byas nas ni/_/phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod/_/mnyam 'gyur gsol ba rab tu gdab/_/'di ltar ma byung ngo mtshar khyod/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang phyug che/_/mngon spyod ya mtshan ston par spyod/_/bka' yi 'khor lo 
[\[86b.7\]]dam pa nyid/_/smra bsam yul las rab 'das kyang /_/dpes mtshon snang ba la brten nas/_/yi ge ming tshogs la sogs kyis/_/gsal bar mtshon te go bar mdzod/_/ston pa dbang phyug dam pa des/_/gsol ba btab pa'i don dgongs nas/_/brjod bsam 'das 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]ba'i ting 'dzin las/_/mnyam par bzhugs nas mi gsung bzhugs/_/de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis/_/stobs mchog seng ge chen po la/_/logs su btud de phyag 'tshal nas/_/rmad 'byung mchod pa sna tshogs byas/_/gsol btab blo 
[\[87a.2\]]mchog seng ge khyod/_/bdag cag zhu ba'i gnas skabs phye/_/stobs mchog seng ge gsang bdag gis/_/gsol ba btab pa'i don dgongs nas/_/'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs khyod nyon cig_/bdag la zhus shig spobs par byos/_/slar nyid gsol ba 
[\[87a.3\]]btab pa'i don/_/kun gyis mthun pa'i tshig smras pa/_/mgon po rgyal ba kun gyi mdzod/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras kyi mchog_/byang chub sems dpa' rje btsan la/_/chos rnams ston pa'i gnas la gsan/_/bcom ldan gsang mchog dam pa des/_/
[\[87a.4\]]gsang sngags lam rnams mi ston cing /_/dgongs mdzad 'brel pas mi mdzad pa/_/rgyu dang rkyen gyis gang lags pa/_/'khor ni tshogs la bstan du gsol/_/gsal zhing dbye bar mdzad par rigs/_/zhus pa'i don nyid slar gsungs pa/_/rgyal ba 
[\[87a.5\]]kun gyi gsang ba'i mdzod/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dngos/_/sna tshogs snang zhing gsal bar mdzod/_/de nyid rdzogs pa'i gsang sngags can/_/bshad las 'das pa'i don de ni/_/dgongs don rgyal bas gsung mi mdzad/_/de ltar ston pa rgyal mchog 
[\[87a.6\]]gis/_/rnam par brjod pa mi mdzad pas/_/yang dag don gyi snying po nyid/_/rgya cher bka' ni gsal ba yin/_/'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams nyon cig_/byang chub dam pa'i snying po ni/_/smra bsam las 'das brjod med pas/_/tshig tu brjod pa legs ma yin/_/gnyis 
[\[87a.7\]]mtha'i rtog pa las gzhan dag_/tshig gi snang bas the tshom skyed/_/grol ba nyid kyis 'ching 'gyur zhes/_/'das dang ma byon thams cad dang /_/da ltar byung ba'i dgongs pa'i don/_/ma gsungs mi gsung gsung du med/_/de nas sems dpa'i snying po ni/_/spros dang bral ba'i 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]byang chub sems/_/kun rdzob bden pa'i tshig dbang du/_/mtshan ma'i tshig gis rnal 'byor rnams/_/don dam rtogs dka' 'gro ba'i phyir/_/rgyal bas tshig skor bstan pa yis/_/'dus tshogs 'khor gyis yang zhus pa/_/stobs mchog seng ge de ltar na/_/bdag 
[\[87b.2\]]sogs ma 'ongs rnal 'byor pas/_/tshig gi rjes 'brangs don dag tu/_/gsang ba'i las brjod gsal byed pa/_/ji lta bu yis mtshon par 'gyur/_/dpa' bo khyod ni rgyal ba'i sras/_/dbang bskur thob par zhu ba spobs/_/bcom ldan dbang mchog dam pa la/_/zhus 
[\[87b.3\]]shing stobs mchog seng ge khyod/_/des kyang 'khor gyis zhus pa bzhin/_/rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin pa la/_/phyag 'tshal rmad 'byung mchod rdzas nas/_/rdo rje tshig tu 'di skad gsol/_/kye ma ston pa thugs chen po/_/phyogs bcu rgyal ba kun 'dus pa/_/byang chub sems kyi 
[\[87b.4\]]mtshan nyid de/_/tshig tu brjod pa ma mdzad na/_/ma 'ongs sgra la brten pa dag_/don la reg par mi 'gyur phyir/_/mtshon bya mtshon par byas nas ni/_/snying po byang chub don 'di la/_/dpes mtshon 'thad par grub byed pa/_/gsang ba de nyid bstan du gsol/_/de nas 
[\[87b.5\]]mgon po rdo rje 'dzin/_/ye shes lnga dang rtags ldan pa'i/_/phyag gi mtshan ma gsor mdzad cing /_/rmad 'byung ya mtshan ston par mdzad/_/thams cad pad+mor 'gyur ba yi/_/rmad 'byung chos kyi sgra yang sgrogs/_/o~M AHhU~M swA hA/_bo d+hi tsit+ta gu h+ya/_sa ma ya 
[\[87b.6\]]a sa/_a nu bo d+hi tsit+ta a nan ta gar b+ha/_ma hA sa twa pra ta a hU~M/_'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang /_/sangs rgyas grags chen thams cad dag_/rab tu drag cing brgyal 'gyur nas/_/gzhan lta ma lus smos ci dgos/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag bka'/_/
[\[87b.7\]]bshad kyis rigs kyi bu rnams nyon/_/don dam kun rdzob gnyis med par/_/yang dag bden pa'i don bstan pa/_/de ni dngos po mtshan nyid de/_/mkha' ldan chen po rnams kyi gdeng /_/ji srid blo yi chos dag tu/_/gnyis su snang ba'i mtshan ma la/_/
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]bsam brjod kun rdzob zhes bya ste/_/de las 'das pa don dam yin/_/sku gsum gnyis su med pa yi/_/snang ba'i dngos po ma 'gags pa/_/dus gsum bstan pa chen por gnas/_/yid bzhin pa yi don nyid do/_/thams cad sgyu ma 
[\[88a.2\]]lta bu'i tshul/_/thams cad rang bzhin stong pa nyid/_/zung du 'jug pa'i ye shes ni/_/de nyid bla med mchog dam pa/_/de skad ces ni bka' stsal nas/_/a la la yi sgra brjod do/_/stobs mchog seng ge dri ba dris/_/de ltar lags so bcom ldan 'das/_/sngags kyi lha la blo 
[\[88a.3\]]gnas gang /_/spyod la gnas pa gang dag gis/_/phan tshun 'brel 'gyur ci lta bur/_/blo yi rim pa 'jug bya 'am/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa'i don/_/mtshan nyid rnam dag dus 
[\[88a.4\]]lags pa/_/bgrang dang bgrang ba las 'das pa'i/_/dngos po mtshan nyid de bzhin no/_/legs spyod bden pa'i lam 'jug cing /_/rnam gsum sngags kyi don spyad na/_/'brel pa shugs kyis sgrub byed na/_/lta spyod gnyis ldan bden pa'i mchog_/rnal 'byor sa la 
[\[88a.5\]]legs gnas shing /_/bden gnyis 'brel pa'i don bsgrubs nas/_/yang dag rtag pa'i don gsal 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor sa spyod sa thob shog_/ma skyes thabs kyi ye shes ldan/_/thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings/_/bden gnyis dbye ba med pa yis/_/
[\[88a.6\]]yang dag don mchog sgyu ma'i sku/_/kun rdzob sgyu ma thabs kyi gsung /_/phyag rgya sgyu ma'i tshul nyid de/_/med pa ma yin mtshan med de/_/rnal 'byor gnyis dang ldan phyir ro/_/slob pa'i rnal 'byor gnyis brten nas/_/lhun gyis grub pa'i sa goms nas/_/bden 
[\[88a.7\]]'gyur bden pa gnyis la gnas/_/che chung mthu yis grub pa yin/_/sgra yi rjes 'brangs rnal 'byor pas/_/don med spyod la gnas par 'gyur/_/yang dag kun rdzob bden gsal bas/_/gnyis med don dam bden par gnas/_/sna tshogs chos kyi g.yul ngo 
[\[88b\]]
