[\[110a.6\]]'jigs pa'i hU~M sgra sgrogs/_/klu yi rgyal po'i gnas na bzhugs/_/gzhan gyi rdzu 'phrul 'joms par byed/_/o~M ma hA ha ya grI ba pad+ma d+ha ru na~M bi d+ha ha ra hU~M phaT rtsa ba'i sngags so/_/o~M na mo ud ta~M he ru lu ru ka~M ba mu kha/_/A ka ra Sha ya rak+Sha na ga~M gu ru hU~M phaT snying 
[\[110a.7\]]bo'i sngags so/_/o~M pad+ma rag ma kur+ya ra ka~M ru lu ru lu hU~M phaT nye ba'i snying po'o/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyogs bzhi ru/_/lcags kyu lcags sgrog zhags pa dril bu rnams/_/dkar dmar ser ljang 'od mdangs 'bar/_/seng ge ce spyang stag 'brug dang /_/
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]mgo brtsegs sprul pa'i 'khor dang bcas/_/rang gi las kyis 'khod pa dang /_/'jigs pa'i cha lugs rngam gzugs gnas/_/las mdzad klu yi dkyil 'khor 'dul/_/klu chen brgyad sogs bsdus byas na/_/mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par bya/_/rang gi dam tshig 
[\[110b.2\]]dran pa'i shugs/_/spyan rnams spyan ngar 'dod par byed/_/o~M na ga me ga na na ga ra tsa ya sa ma ya hU~M/_/dkyil 'khor gsang bar dbang bskur nas/_/'od bzang gzi mdangs me dpung 'bar/_/rigs kyi dbu rgyan gsal byed phye/_/ye shes 'od tshogs 
[\[110b.3\]]gnas bcas te/_/dkyil 'khor gsang bar goms zhugs kyis/_/tshul 'dzin dkon mchog mngon du dbye/_/tshogs rnams ma lus mgrin gcig tu/_/gar dbang sku la skyabs gsol zhing /_/'dod yon gsol 'debs dam bcas pa/_/bsod nams 
[\[110b.4\]]phung po'i gter la spyod/_/kye ma dkyil 'khor ya mtshan che/_/bdag cag 'khor rnams rab sgrol mdzad/_/rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor dpe bral bas/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du gnas/_/bde chen lam 'di sngon ma rtogs/_/da ltar thugs 
[\[110b.5\]]rje drin gyis rnyed/_/rnal 'byor gsang bar 'dzin byed kyis/_/ji ltar bsgos pa'i bka' bzhin 'gyid/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i dam 'di las/_/gal te nyams na 'das par shog ces dam bcas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med 
[\[110b.6\]]pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan pad+ma'i skus/_/yum la chags tshul 'dzum mdangs kyis/_/bka' yi bsgo bas dgyes 
[\[110b.7\]]mdzad de/_/mi shigs ting 'dzin la gnas mdzad/_/phyogs skyong dri za rgyal chen po/_/rang gi chung ma tshogs bcas pas/_/gnas gzhan 'jigs par mdzad pa dang /_/rang gi mthus bcus 'dul bar mdzad/_/sku ni bai DUr+ya 'tsher ba'i mdangs/_/
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]zhal gsum phyag rgya drug gis rol/_/rin chen mdzod bum sngags chen lcug_/'khor lo phreng ba ma ga ta/_/rgyan dang cha lugs rin chen tshogs/_/dbyings kyi dbang phyug yum chen mo/_/dmar skya zab mo'i tshul du sbyor/_/'od 'phro sems dpa'i gdug 
[\[111a.2\]]pa'i 'phro/_/rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan rin chen phreng /_/phyag rgya bzhi yis brjid pa'i lha/_/rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang /_/gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs brgyan/_/bar khyams 'khor gyi dbus nas 'gying /_/pad+ma'i lte bar skyil krung bzhugs/_/shar du 'joms byed 
[\[111a.3\]]rdo rje'i sku/_/dkar gsal rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/_/lho ru rin chen blo gros sku/_/dpal be'u gdugs mdzes 'od mang ser/_/nub kyi phyogs kyi rgyal po rtog_/dkar dmar pad+ma glegs bam 'dzin/_/byang du 'jig rten kun sgrol ba/_/ljang skya rdo rje rgya gram bri/_/shar lho dra ba'i 
[\[111a.4\]]dbang phyug ni/_/ser skya rin chen b+h+r-ing ga ra/_/lho nub chos kyi lhun po mchog_/rtse gsum pad+ma'i lcug ma 'dzin/_/nub byang rgyal ba'i ye shes tog_/sngo skya seng ge'i bum pa 'dzin/_/byang shar sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtsegs/_/ljang ser g.yung drung rdo rje mtshan/_/'di dag 'khor 
[\[111a.5\]]los sgyur rgyal byin/_/mtshan dang dpe byad 'od mdangs rgyan/_/skyes bu chen po'i longs spyod 'phel/_/cha mthun yum dang 'khril bar bzhugs/_/o~M bi ta dz+nyA na ta na sa~M bo ga ta hU~M phaT/_o~M d+harma mu ni nas nas hU~M/_o~M bi ha ra phra mo tha na hU~M phaT/_o~M dz+nyA na lo tra sa~M bo ga ya hU~M 
[\[111a.6\]]phaT/_o~M rat+na ma ru d+he sa gru~M ba hU~M phaT/_o~M ma hA shu ti mu sa mo ha hU~M phaT/_o~M bud d+ha bud d+ha sar+ya na ku mA ra hU~M phaT/_o~M na ma ga ga na si ta yo ga hU~M phaT/_o~M ni sa ha he hi hu mu ga ra ba ri hU~M phaT/_'khor lo'i gsang sngags rab brjod pas/_/lha rnams phyi yi gnas 
[\[111a.7\]]su spro/_/drag po'i rgyu 'bras sbyang byas te/_/gnas kun dag pa'i ye shes che/_/rigs mchog ye shes 'od gsal bas/_/shar gyi dbang po dri za sogs/_/gnas mgon skyabs dang dbang du mdzad/_/nyon mongs las kyi dregs pa'i tshogs/_/rang rgyud zhi nas byang 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]sems bcas/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod/_/snying po mdongs gsol phul bar 'gyur/_/o~M trag sha ka sarba ra ma mas hU~M hU~M swA hA/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig pa 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_/bstan pa myur du spel cig_/rgya chad pa'i 
[\[111b.2\]]sngags kyis thams cad bsrung bar gyur pa bde legs su bya ba'i gnas pa bdag cag dus thams cad dkyil 'khor 'dir gnas shing de 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag bsrung bar bya ba dang bran bzhin du gnas par bgyi'o/_/slar yang bdag cag rnams mgon pos 
[\[111b.3\]]bzhengs la byin gyis brlabs te dbang bskur ba dang grol bar mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa dang /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rig pa'i snying po 'di byin gyis brlabs so/_/o~M u o~M mr-i ta bi ga na shu ta hU~M phaT swA hA zhes gsungs pa dang /_/de dag dang 
[\[111b.4\]]po'i sangs rgyas bzhin du 'od zer dang bcas par gyur nas gzhal yas khang gi rgyan du 'khod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las thugs ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 
[\[111b.5\]]'khor 'phrul pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas bde byed gar dbang phyug_/pad+ma tshogs pa'i sku chen pos/_/yon tan rin chen sgyu ma'i chos/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/_/mkha' 'gro tshogs bcas gshin rje rnams/_/rgyal 
[\[111b.6\]]po rgyal chen rgyal mor gnas/_/'khor bcas 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir/_/mkha' 'gro chen mo'i tshogs 'phrul mdzad/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med las/_/gzi ldan gar gyi dbang phyug ma/_/pad+ma rA ga nam mkha'i mdog_/zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi 
[\[111b.7\]]ste/_/pad+ma'i sdong po bdud rtsi'i snod/_/rdo rje kha T+wAM zhags pa thogs/_/rin chen phreng ba'i rgyan gyis bklubs/_/khyod bzhed 'jigs mdangs tshul 'dzin cing /_/brkyang bskum zhing mchog nyi ma'i dkyil/_/g.yang gzhi nyi ma'i phreng ba sa brgyan/_/o~M pad+ma ma 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]hA kro d+hi shwa ri hU~M phaT/_dpal gyi lha mo mchog nyid dang /_/o~M dang sprul te phyogs dang mtshams/_/pad+ma'i gdan la zhing gis mtshan/_/brkyang bskum sku mdog sngon mo'i tshogs/_/phyag na gri gug thod pa khrag_/'bar ba'i cha lugs sga 'bar ma/_/
[\[112a.2\]]phyi rol sprul pa'i tshogs bcas pas/_/dur khrod chen po'i gnas su rol/_/rdo rje rin chen pad+mo dang /_/las dang sgyu 'phrul mkha' la bzhad/_/sna tshogs sgyu ma bzhin rgyas spyan/_/kha dog phyogs mtshams ji lta bu/_/gsal zhing mun pa'i rdul gyis gos/_/zhing 
[\[112a.3\]]gi dbyug pa rtse gsum dang /_/gser gyi mda' dang rdo rje dang /_/chu srin rgyal mtshan zhags pa dang /_/zhing chen rdo rje rtse dgu gdengs/_/gri gug rgyu ma'i zhags pa sdom/_/rdo rje gdengs pa rtse gsum khrag_/zhing chen khog phyes snying 'dren cing /_/de bzhin rlung yab 
[\[112a.4\]]thod pa 'chang /_/o~M badzra ta kr-id ma hA la ti ti hU~M hU~M phaT/_/o~M badzra ta tri me dar hU~M phaT/_o~M DA ki mad kum pa ya hU~M phaT/_o~M DA ki nI ti bre sha hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra DA ki bi la sa hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra DA ki dri ku Ta ma le hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra DA ki dz+wa la dz+wa la hU~M phaT/_/phyi rol 
[\[112a.5\]]pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/_/seng ge rta dang ce spyang wa/_/bya rgod kang ka bya rog 'ug_/mgo brnyan mche gshog chen mo brgyad/_/hU~M las sprul te mdog dmar po/_/phyag na gri gug thod pa khrag_/rdo rje ral gri rtse gsum mdung /_/'khor lo dgra sta be con mda'/_/
[\[112a.6\]]gtun shing zhing khog g.yang gzhi sprul/_/ne'u le gzhong pa rin chen khyung /_/zhal gdangs so so'i phyogs mdangs bzhin/_/kun kyang khro bcas khyams par gnas/_/zhing lpags g.yang gzhi thod phreng sprul/_/khrag zhag thal ba'i tshom bus brgyan/_/
[\[112a.7\]]mkha' 'gro rigs bdun ma sring sprul pa'i tshogs/_/mche gshog 'bar ba phyogs bcur 'khrugs/_/o~M se ra ba ra na hU~M phaT/_o~M ni ra~M te sha pa mu kha hU~M phaT/_o~M ka~M na ma du na hU~M phaT/_o~M mu ra na na~M hU~M phaT/_o~M sUr+ya sa mo ka hU~M phaT/_o~M 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]badzra sni ga sha bru~M hU~M phaT/_o~M ni sha kur+ya ra na hU~M phaT/_o~M re la~M su bag sha hU~M phaT/_mkha' 'gro bcu drug 'di dag kyang /_/'od 'bar glog gi phreng ba can/_/'od kyi ru lu'i sgra 'byin cing /_/spyan mur khro gnyer mche ba can/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi rol pa'i stabs/_/
[\[112b.2\]]dbyings dang shes rab rab rtogs la/_/so so'i phrin las mdzad pa'i phyag_/zhal dang sku ni so so'i mdog_/o~M ru khu sa~M ta gu na DA+e ta sa mo ra ga hU~M phaT snying po'i sngags so/_/o~M badzra DA ki dzA la sha~M ba ra ku ma ra hU~M phaT nye ba'o/_/o~M DA ki hU~M sa~M ba ra dzA li mu kha ma 
[\[112b.3\]]me hU~M phaT rtsa ba'i sngags so/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi dkyil 'khor spro ba'i mthus/_/de dag dran pa med par brgyal/_/slar nyid rang gi 'khor du bsdus/_/dam tshig dkyil 'khor chen por bkod/_/de nas mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang bcas/_/gdul bya rnams 
[\[112b.4\]]kyi gnas dor nas/_/rgyal ba'i bstan pa bzung byed cing /_/rdo rje theg pa sbyor bar mdzad/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las mkha' 'gro ma sprul pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//
[\[112b.5\]]de nas bcom ldan dgyes pa'i gtso/_/gar gyi dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs/_/gzi ldan yum dang zhal sbyor zhing /_/phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/_/phyogs kyi bgegs 'dul byed pa'o/_/khams gsum 
[\[112b.6\]]gnon pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin gnas/_/rin chen 'bar ba'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na/_/rin chen pad+ma seng ge'i gdan/_/dri med nyi zla spras pa la/_/dbus kyi lha mchog chen po ni/_/zhabs brgyad phyag ni bcu drug dang /_/dmar ser 
[\[112b.7\]]nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin/_/bgegs la sogs pa'i tshul dang ldan/_/pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo gri/_/thod pa rin chen dgra sta ras/_/yum chen dbang phyug sgeg mo dang /_/rgyan tshogs rin chen phreng ba can/_/dri med pad+mas bklubs pa'o/_/o~M ba ga ba te ru ka~M sa~M 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]po ga ta ya hU~M phaT/_/mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' ni/_/dkar ser rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/_/g.yas su rin chen sems dpa' ste/_/ser po rin chen 'khor lo thogs/_/rgyab tu pad+mo'i sems dpa' nyid/_/dmar ser rtse gsum bum pa thogs/_/g.yon du 
[\[113a.2\]]las kyi sems dpa' ste/_/ljang ser dril bu tri shU la/_/o~M badzra swa t+ta hU~M phaT/_/o~M rat+na swat+ta hU~M phaT/_/o~M pad+ma swat+ta hU~M phaT/_/o~M karma swat+ta hU~M phaT/_/'khor lo pad+ma'i rtse mo la/_/yum dang 'khril ba'i tshul gyis 'khod/_/phyi rol pad+ma'i rigs bdun la/_/bder 
[\[113a.3\]]gshegs yab yum nyis stong tshogs/_/bder gshegs rdo rje rin chen dang /_/pad+ma rgya gram sna tshogs mkha'/_/sku mdog pad+ma rA ga dang /_/in+d+ra la sogs rim bdun la/_/ral pa rtse mdzod bum pa la/_/lcug ma dril bu glegs bam dang /_/chos kyi 
[\[113a.4\]]rgyal mtshan phreng ba 'dzin/_/kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa/_/rin chen rgyan phreng 'od mdangs can/_/phyag mtshan gri gug thod pa dang /_/pad+ma'i phreng ba rtse gsum bsnams/_/lhag pa'i phyag bzhi 'dzin par mdzad/_/dang por rang rtags phyag rgya bsnams/_/
[\[113a.5\]]o~M badzra du ki bi shi ka du ku~M di ka~M ma~M hri sa~M ga ta sU~M sra mo ta phaT swA hA/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi'o/_/o~M badzra sa mo yo ga ta sa ra la su hU~M phaT/_/rin po che rnams kyi'o/_/o~M pad+ma bu~M si nyi ha~M he he ma~M ba~M hU~M phaT/_/pad+ma'i rigs rnams kyi'o/_/o~M karma b+h+yo tru~M hU~M 
[\[113a.6\]]rak+Sha mur+ya sa hU~M phaT/_/las kyi rigs kyi'o/_/o~M badzra tsakra bru~M si ti yo gI shwa ri hU~M phaT/_/'khor lo'i rigs kyi'o/_/de nas dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i tshogs/_/phyogs rnams kun du spros byas pas/_/rdo rje rigs kyi pho nya yin/_/phyogs kyi rgyal po'i gdon 
[\[113a.7\]]rnams 'gugs/_/skrag shing byed nas dgra 'gugs shing /_/so so'i rigs dbyer 'khrug pa dag_/rdo rje gsang ba'i sngags kyis gzer/_/rang gi dam tshig rjes su dran/_/srog gi snying po dbul bar bya/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gis/_/dbang bskur 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]byin brlabs rdzogs byas nas/_/dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i gnas su 'khod/_/gsang ba 'dzin pa'i gnas 'dor nas/_/rang gi lus su gnas byas te/_/gzhal yas khang gi rgyan du gzhag_/de dag gi snying po ni/_o~M sa mu dar dzin na ga su tra b+ha ba si tri sni sha hU~M 
[\[113b.2\]]pru~M phaT zhes pa'o/_/slar gso ba'i sngags ni/_o~M su mu ge Da~M sa~M myag he he ru tu pa la si ta~M dza hU~M phaT/_lha rnams kyi snying po bsdus pa ni/_/o~M sarba sa ka ra bru~M bag sha sa~M me bra~M mu rak+Sha hU~M zhes pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i 
[\[113b.3\]]gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las khams gsum gnon pa'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan gar dbang sku/_/sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus mdzad nas/_/khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sprul byas te/_/gnod sbyin grul bum 'dul 
[\[113b.4\]]bar mdzad/_/gzhal yas gru gsum mthing nag la/_/dbus su 'khor lo nyi ma'i gdan/_/dpal chen pad+ma he ru ka_/dur khrod chen po'i rgyan gyis brjid/_/zhal gsum pa la phyag drug ste/_/sku mdog pad+ma rA ga'i mdangs/_/rtse gsum gtun shing ral 
[\[113b.5\]]gri dang /_/pad+ma zhags pa thod rnga 'dzin/_/glang chen ko ba thod rlon sprul/_/yum dang zhal sbyor 'khril ba'i tshul/_/thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las/_/yi ge las sprul khro bo'i rgyan/_/shar du rnam rgyal mdog dkar sngo/_/zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje 
[\[113b.6\]]dung /_/'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang /_/ral gri me 'od kyis mtshan pa/_/lho ru gshin rje gshed po ni/_/sngo nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa/_/thod dbyug rin chen ne'u le dang /_/rtse gsum me dpung thod rnga 'dzin/_/nub tu rta mchog khro bo'i sku/_/zhal gsum 
[\[113b.7\]]phyag drug dmar skya'i mdog_/'khor lo sdigs mdzub rtse gsum dang /_/ral gri thod pa Da ma ru/_/byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste/_/ljang sngon zhal gsum phyag drug pa/_/rgya gram gri gug pad+ma dang /_/be con rtse gsum seng ge 'dzin/_/shar 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]lhor dbyug pa sngon po ni/_/sngo skya zhal gsum phyag drug pa/_/dbyug pa tsakra pad+ma dang /_/rnga yab b+han d+ha dril bu 'dzin/_/lho nub mi g.yo mgon po ni/_/zhal gsum ser skya phyag drug pa/_/rin chen ral gri gtun shing 'dzin/_/pad+ma thod khrag 
[\[114a.2\]]mdung rtse gsum/_/nub byang 'dod pa'i rgyal po ni/_/dmar skya zhal gsum phyag drug pa/_/rdo rje dbyug pa rin chen bum/_/thod pa bdud rtsi sting 'dzin pa'o/_/byang shar stobs chen dud ka'i mdog_/zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa'i mdangs/_/rdo rje rtse gsum bam 
[\[114a.3\]]chen khog_/sna tshogs rdo rje bam chen khrag_/'jigs pa'i cha lugs khro phreng dang /_/gyad kyi dor thabs rol pa'i stabs/_/o~M badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya hU~M phaT/_/o~M badzra kro d+ha ya mA na ta ka hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta ku Na Da li hU~M phaT/_
[\[114a.4\]]o~M badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha Tak+ki rA dza hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hU~M phaT/_phyogs skyong rgyal po gnod sbyin dang /_/grul bum tshogs rnams dbang bsdus te/_/gsang sngags drag pos bsgral 
[\[114a.5\]]byas na/_/slar gsol ye shes lhums su gyur/_/dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i dbang bskur zhing /_/dam tshig la gzhan dkyil 'khor tshul/_/kun gyi srog snying phul ba ni/_/dam tshig chen pos byin brlabs mdzad/_/slar yang dam tshig 'dzin pa'i sngags/_/
[\[114a.6\]]'khor rnams kun la sbyin par mdzad/_/o~M badzra kra ka ra murda si na ba mu ka hU~M phaT/_o~M AHhU~M badzra su ka ta b+ha mo tra~M a la la hU~M phaT/_/lha rnams kun gyi dam tshig ni/_/rdo rje gsang ba gsum las byung /_/rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po'i sku/_/khams gsum 
[\[114a.7\]]dus kyis dbang bskur nas/_/'khor ba'i chos las rgyal byed cing /_/byang chub sems kyis de nyid gsal/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las khro bo phrin las rol pa'i le'u ste 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan gar dbang skus/_/gzi brjid dgod pa'i rgyan bkod cing /_/lha min grong khyer 'dul ba'i phyir/_/yum gyi dkyil 'khor 'phrul bar mdzad/_/chos dbyings sprul pa'i gnas bzang mchog_/rgyal ba'i rang bzhin rin 
[\[114b.2\]]chen spros/_/gru bzhi khang pa sgo dang bcas/_/rta babs ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes/_/dbus kyi pad+ma'i gdan bzhugs pa/_/gnyis med rol pa'i yum gyi sku/_/mdog dmar rgyan du zangs chen gzugs/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi mdzes pa'i mdangs/_/'khor 
[\[114b.3\]]lo dung khrag pad+mo dang /_/rin chen 'bar ba rtse dgu 'dzin/_/rin chen pad+ma'i phreng ba can/_/stod bzang na bza' dkyil bzang bzhugs/_/o~M pad+ma mu sha ra sa ma ka ta hU~M phaT/_/shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su/_/pad+ma dbyings phyug gsal ba mo/_/rin 
[\[114b.4\]]chen phreng ba glu ma che/_/dkar dmar ser dang ljang gu'i mdog_/rdo rje gsum pa pad+mo dra ba dang /_/na ra si la'i snod rin tshogs/_/rang gi dkyil 'khor ma spros shing /_/sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/_/o~M tsun d+he shwa ri hU~M phaT/_o~M Sh+Ni sha badzra sa~M bru~M ga 
[\[114b.5\]]hU~M phaT/_o~M byi tsu swa te hU~M phaT/_mtshams kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/_/de bzhin bde ba skyed byed yum chen bzhi/_/dra ba mo dang glog 'gyur rgyan/_/gshog pa can dang 'dod pa'o/_/dkar ser dmar skya sngo bsangs dang /_/ljang gu mdog legs la 
[\[114b.6\]]bzhugs nas/_/rdo rje rin chen pad+mo dang /_/ut+pal ljang gu legs mdzad pa'o/_/o~M nu te no tsa kru hU~M phaT/_o~M sa~M bo ga ta su he bya hU~M phaT/_o~M ma ma kri bru~M he he hU~M phaT/_o~M ta re ga ga na a ma la hU~M phaT/_/phyogs rnams kun du mkha' khyab pa/_/til gang 
[\[114b.7\]]bzhin du gnas gyur pa/_/ma mo gshin rje'i tshogs rnams kun/_/'khrug rngam rod rod por gyur nas/_/thugs rje can la skyabs su mchi/_/srog gi snying po dbul bar byed/_/de nas dkyil 'khor bsdus byas te/_/rang gi gnas su dbang bskur zhing /_/
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]dam tshig dga' ba'i sdom pa rnyed/_/bder gshegs ye shes gsal bar 'gyur/_/kun gyis mthun par khas blangs te/_/dam tshig bsrung zhing rnal 'byor skyong /_/o~M me ma rak+ta sa bra ti id da~M sa bu ta phaT/_o~M trak+sha ra la si bad Ta ta phaT/_ma 
[\[115a.2\]]mo dang 'byung po rnams kyi snying po'o/_/o~M yu me si d+ha ru lu ru lu hU~M phaT/_gnod sbyin rnams kyi'o/_/o~M AHhU~M yo ga bri gu me/_ha sa ha sa/_ru lu ru lu hU~M phaT/_slar gso zhing byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla 
[\[115a.3\]]na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las rin chen dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor 'phrul pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//de nas gar gyi dbang phyug nyid/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo yis/_/sa 'og sa 
[\[115a.4\]]bla sa stengs rnams/_/'joms byed gza' dang rgyu skar dang /_/bdud dang de yi rigs 'khor kun/_/'du bar bya ba'i ting 'dzin la/_/snyoms zhugs 'khor lo sprul pa mdzad/_/thabs dang shes rab bsgrub byas pa'i/_/'od zer gsal bas stong gsum gang /_/rin chen 
[\[115a.5\]]'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang /_/sgo bzhi rta babs phreng bas brgyan/_/'khor lo rim gsum gdan dang bcas/_/rdo rje pad+ma rin chen gyis/_/khor yug seng ge glang chen mchog_/nyi mas mdzes pa'i pad+mo yi/_/dbus kyi dpa' bo yum dang bcas/_/zhal gcig 
[\[115a.6\]]phyag bzhi rdo rje rin/_/pad+ma ral gri 'dzin par mdzad/_/dmar ser kun du rgyu ba ni/_/ljang ser pad+ma dril bus 'khyud/_/mtshan dang dpe byad rgyan phreng bklubs/_/sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i dbu rgyan can/_/phyag rgya bzhi yis mdzes byas pa'o/_/rdo rje 'khor lo rtsibs 
[\[115a.7\]]rnams la/_/rigs kyi sems dpa' nyi shu bzhi/_/dkar dang dmar dang ser ba'i mdangs/_/rdo rje dril bu pad+ma bsgom/_/'khor lo rin chen snye ma bsnams/_/dang po'i phyag gnyis mtshan byas shing /_/lhag ma gri gug thod pa thogs/_/khro zhing sems dpa'i cha 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]lugs kyis/_/rgyan phreng rigs kyi dbang po gsum/_/rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyan gyis bklubs/_/o~M badzra swa ta kro d+ha he he ru lu hU~M phaT/_/rdo rje rigs rnams kyi'o/_/pad+ma te sh+tha swA da na ma ku ru ku ru hU~M phaT/_/pad+ma rigs kyi sems dpa' rnams kyi'o/_/o~M i ku ri 
[\[115b.2\]]tsag ban d+ha si d+hi phaT phaT/_kro d+hi shwa ri hU~M phaT/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rigs kyi'o/_/sgo bzhi mdzes gzugs khro mo ni/_/mi mthun blo gros dpa' chen mo/_/ye shes mkha' dbyings bzhi rnams te/_/dkar ser dmar dang rim pa bzhin/_/rdo rje lcags kyu 
[\[115b.3\]]zhags pa dang /_/lcags sgrog dril bu mtshan ma'i phyag_/o~M badzra a~M gu sha dzaHpA sha hU~M/_s+pho Ta pa~M/_g+hen+De hoH/_phaT/_dgug gzhug bcing ba'i las dag dang /_/dbab pa'i cho ga mnyes par byed/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kun/_/sku gsung 
[\[115b.4\]]thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dus/_/rigs gsum sems dpa' khro bor bstan/_/'jigs byed cha lugs rngam pa'i stabs/_/rdo rje gcod byed 'jigs pa che/_/rdo rje 'joms pa'i yid 'phrog byed/_/rdo rje rab bzang blo gros mchog_/rdo rje'i bstan pa 
[\[115b.5\]]g.yul las rgyal/_/pad+ma'i sprin chen 'brug sgra'i dbyangs/_/pad+ma'i blo gsal mya ngan 'joms/_/pad+ma'i sdong po nga ro myos/_/pad+ma'i 'od zer bdud rtsi'i 'od/_/'khor ba brtsegs pa myur du bzlog_/'khor lo dga' ba sbrang rtsi'i mchog_/'khor lo sgrol 
[\[115b.6\]]dang rtse gsum 'ching /_/'khor lo rol pa dga' byed stobs/_/'di dag sprul pa 'khor tshogs skus/_/gnas gsum po dag 'dul bar mdzad/_/de nas gza' dang rgyu skar rnams/_/gdug pa'i nga ro chu ma shums/_/sgra chen sgrogs shing sprul nas kyang /_/
[\[115b.7\]]mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par 'gyur/_/dkyil 'khor chen po skyabs gsol zhing /_/bstan pa bzung bar dam bcas so/_/de dag so so'i srog snying dag_/lus sems dad pas phul byas pas/_/dkyil 'khor chen po dbang bskur zhing /_/rab gnas 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]gdan la gzhag par bya/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las rang sangs rgyas thams cad khro bor byung ba'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan dbang gi lha/_/
[\[116a.2\]]pad+ma bde chen yum bcas la/_/'gro drug rgyu 'bras bya ba'i phyir/_/bde chen byang sems dkyil 'khor sprul/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas 'bar ba/_/rin chen phreng sogs 'jigs byed brgyad/_/dur khrod chen po'i gnas bzhin brgyan/_/dbus kyi 'khor lo 
[\[116a.3\]]gdan bcas la/_/rigs lnga'i he ru ka bzhugs mdzad/_/yum chen lnga dang 'khril bar sbyor/_/kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa/_/dmar nag dkar ser ljang gu'i mdangs/_/rdo rje kha T+wAM ral gri dang /_/tri shUl zhing dbyug tho ba bsnams/_/g.yas par dung 
[\[116a.4\]]phor g.yon thod khrag_/bar ma gri gug pad+ma ste/_/tha ma yum dang 'khril ba'i tshul/_/spyan dgu sdang mig dmar po bzlog_/khro gnyer ral pa gyen du brdzes/_/thod sprul khrag dang thal bas brgyan/_/g.yang gzhi ri sha'i rgyan gyis mdzes/_/o~M badzra shrI he ru ka 
[\[116a.5\]]badzra kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M phaT/_o~M b+hud+d+ha shrI he ru ka b+hud+d+ha kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M phaT/_o~M rat+na shrI he ru ka hU~M phaT/_rat+na kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M phaT/_pad+ma shrI he ru ka hU~M phaT/_o~M pad+ma kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M phaT/_o~M karma shrI he ru ka hU~M phaT/_karma kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M phaT/_/bde chen byang chub sems kyi rgyan/_/rol 
[\[116a.6\]]pa kun tu khyab mdzad de/_/khams gsum ma 'dres rnam par dbyings/_/bde ba chen po gnyis med 'gyur/_/dbang bskur byin brlabs rigs kyis bskur/_/bskyed de dbu la rang gi bdag pos brgyan/_/smon 'jug g.yo ldang bskyod pa yi/_/lha mo bzhi dang mnyam par 
[\[116a.7\]]sbyor/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las bde ba chen po'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa nyid la bzhag ste bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na bdud kyi rgyal 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]bo ma tra ru tras/_rang gi rdzu 'phrul chen po bstan zhing /_/'khor dang bcas pas phyogs bcur rgyug cing rig pa 'dzin pa dang /_/rnal 'byor mtha' dag gi bar gcod byed cing bde 'gro'i bde ba thams cad rgyun gcod pa dang /_/rang nyid kyi nyon mongs pa bskyed 
[\[116b.2\]]do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_/rigs kyi 'od zer mtha' yas pa zhes bya bas stong gsum gyi 'jig rten thams cad skad cig gis gsal bar mdzad do/_/rgyal ba'i dbang po stong 
[\[116b.3\]]gsum 'dir/_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mdzes par byin brlabs te/_/rin chen ka ba gdan phreng dang /_/gzugs mdzes la sogs kun gyis spras/_/nyi ma zla ba rin chen khri/_/pad+ma seng ge la sogs gnon/_/sgo bzang khyams su bcas pa yi/_/rnam dag gzhal yas khang 
[\[116b.4\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]sprul/_/de nas bcom ldan bde chen pos/_/dpal ldan gar gyi dbang phyug skus/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rigs tshogs rnams/_/dga' ba'i sprin gyis bskul bar mdzad/_/bde ba chen po gnyis med mthus/_/rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gcig tu gyur/_/yongs 
[\[116b.5\]]rdzogs gsal ba rgya chen pos/_/dkyil 'khor rgya chen sprul par mdzad/_/dbus su pad+ma'i rigs rgyal po/_/gtso bo pad+ma rdo rje'i mdangs/_/zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs byed sku/_/rdo rje dga' ba'i spyan 'dril zhing /_/shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kun du/_/bder 
[\[116b.6\]]gshegs rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog_/rnam snang rin chen don grub rnams/_/rin chen phyogs kyi mtshon mdangs gsal/_/rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang /_/ral gri pad+ma sna tshogs dang /_/gtso bo pad+ma'i drug mtshan can/_/stong pa'i sgra snyan dril bu g.yon/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[116b.7\]]spyan mdzes mA ma kI/_/dkar mo dam tshig sgrol ma dag_/mdog bzang phyag mtshan gtso bo bzhi/_/sangs rgyas ting 'dzin rdzu 'phrul stobs/_/thabs dang shes rab nyis stong tshogs/_/'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mo la/_/rang gi mtshan ma so so'i tshul/_/
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]dmar mdangs dkar dang gser gyi mdog_/ni ra ka ta'i mdog 'tsher zhing /_/pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo rin/_/pad+ma tri shUl bcas pa 'dzin/_/g.yas na 'khor lo [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin/_/rdo rje skyil krung legs brgyan brjid/_/gzhan yang khro bo'i 
[\[117a.2\]]tshogs 'bar ba/_/phyi rol 'khor lo'i bar khyams dang /_/sgo la sogs pa'i 'jigs gzugs kyis/_/rngam pa'i mdangs bcas 'khod pa ni/_/khri tshogs yang sprul mtshon cha dang /_/rigs kyi sprul pa'i don byed pa'i/_/khams gsum 'jigs byed khro bo dang /_/
[\[117a.3\]]mkha' 'gro'i dag pa'i tshogs bcas rnams/_/dur khrod rgyan gyis rab mdzes shing /_/rigs kyi kha dog mtshon cha dang /_/'od zer 'phro ba 'khrigs pa'i tshul/_/gsang sngags drag po brjod mdzad pa'o/_/de ltar dkyil 'khor khro zhi tshogs/_/skad cig gsal 
[\[117a.4\]]bar rdzogs byas nas/_/phyi yi gnas su spro zhing bya/_/gsang sngags rgyun gyi skal bar byed/_/hU~M a la la ho/_ma hA pad+ma hr-i da ya/_a A o~M AHhU~M/_ma hA pad+ma ku ru/_ha la ha la b+hi sha na hU~M hU~M phaT/_/stong khams sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i gnas/_/rab 
[\[117a.5\]]'khrug bred rgyas rmongs pa dag_/'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyis bder byas shing /_/rang gi sangs rgyas zhing la bkod/_/dkyil 'khor gnas su bsdus byas nas/_/rang gi 'khor lo mdzes byas te/_/dbang bskur byin brlabs rdzogs 'gyur nas/_/dbu la 
[\[117a.6\]]rigs kyi bdag pos brgyan/_/o~M pad+ma kun d+hA li hr-i da ya na bi mu ku ru ha na da ha hU~M phaT/_/gsang sngags kun gyis brjod byas na/_/'jig rten gsum po sdud pa yi/_/pho nya rdo rje kI la ya/_/dregs byed gtso bo dag rengs bya/_/de nas bcom ldan bde chen skus/_/
[\[117a.7\]]sangs rgyas thams cad bskul ba'i phyir/_/rdo rje se gol lan gsum brdab/_/dam tshig chen po'i sngags chen brjod/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs tshogs rnams/_/ting 'dzin bsdu ba'i rdo rje las/_/gcig tu gnas nas 'gro ba gzigs/_/dregs 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]byed gtso bo ma rungs rnams/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu log 'khrul zhing /_/sangs rgyas bstan pa log mi 'gyur/_/log pa'i lam la mngon zhen cing /_/mngon pa'i nga rgyal mthus bsnyems nas/_/'jig rten gsum dag phung byed na/_/zhi bas 'dul bar mi 'gyur 
[\[117b.2\]]na/_/khro bo'i rol pa mdzad mod kyi/_/'dul bar gzigs nas bka' gros mdzad/_/kye ma 'dul ba'i tshogs chen dag_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ltar/_/da lta'i dus 'dir byung ba ste/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las/_/log pa'i 
[\[117b.3\]]lam du 'khrul pa ste/_/khro bo'i tshul du byung gyur pa/_/de tshe sems can thams cad kun/_/shin tu khro zhing gtum par 'gyur/_/de ltar gyur pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/_/mnar med la sogs gnas ngan len/_/mi bzad sdug bsngal mtha' la brten/_/
[\[117b.4\]]ji lta bu yi thabs kyis 'dul/_/shin tu gti mug mdongs pa'i tshogs/_/de bzhin bag chags ngan pa yis/_/rig 'dzin bdun rgyud gcod byed cing /_/bstan pa'i gsung rab 'jig par 'gyur/_/las kyi mun pas 'gro ba 'khyams/_/dus ngan 
[\[117b.5\]]rigs ngan phra men ma/_/gnod byed gdon dang log 'dren dang /_/srid gsum 'jig cing dam tshig 'dral/_/'di lta bu yi thabs kyis ni/_/sangs rgyas thugs rje rnam 'phrul bstan/_/nga rgyal chen po mdongs pa yi/_/lta ba ri bo mthu brnyes tshogs/_/
[\[117b.6\]]da lta'i tshe ni 'di byung 'gyur/_/rgyal ba 'das dus sbyor byed cing /_/ji bzhin las la 'khrul bar byed/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mdzod/_/mngon spyod rol pa'i thabs chen gyis/_/'di dag bstan pa'i dus la bab/_/srid gsum gdug 
[\[117b.7\]]cing gtum pa la/_/zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/_/shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las/_/khro bo de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad/_/khro bo'i tshul can khros pa yi/_/'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na/_/sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pa yis/_/khams gsum 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]ma lus smos ci dgos/_/rang bzhin dag pa'i ngo bo las/_/phrag dog 'khrul pa'i rlung dag gis/_/'jig rten phyin ci log tu 'khyams/_/ji bzhin gnas pa lam bral bas/_/khams gsum brlag pa'i lam la zhugs/_/'jig rten 'di dag snying 
[\[118a.2\]]rje zhing /_/mngon shes gdul dka'i rmongs tshogs rnams/_/khro bo'i tshogs kyis sbyor bar mdzad/_/zhes bsgrags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 
[\[118a.3\]]'khor bsgral bya'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen pos/_/pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug skus/_/ma tang ru tra la sogs pas/_/bdud kyi tshogs bcas 'dul ba'i phyir/_/yum chen sku gcig rol mdzad de/_/byang chub sems sprin 
[\[118a.4\]]phyogs bcur spro/_/dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dkyil 'khor gsal/_/dkyil 'khor 'dus tshogs dkyil 'khor che/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i bdag nyid che/_/dgyes bcas gar bcas gdan la bzhugs/_/zhal gsum gangs ri mdangs ldan 
[\[118a.5\]]pa/_/pad+ma gtun shing rtse gsum thogs/_/rin chen rgyan sogs dbu rgyan bcas/_/dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/snod gcig dus gcig sprul pa mdzad/_/mtha' dang dbus med 'jig rten gnas rnams kun/_/drag po 'thing nag 'bar ba'i 
[\[118a.6\]]gzhal yas khang /_/'khor lo rtsibs drug bar khyams nyi rim ldan/_/kun du zla kham sgo khyud gru bzhir bcas/_/rin chen 'bar ba'i thod dbyug rgyan dang bcas/_/tshad med ye shes 'khor lo la bsten cing /_/'jigs byed khro bo'i rgyan tshogs mang po 
[\[118a.7\]]bklubs/_/nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas/_/smon lam dbang dang thugs rje'i byin brlabs kyis/_/'jig rten drug dang dus bzhi phyogs bcu na/_/gzugs khams ma lus dbang du bsdu ba na/_/drag po lha brgyad nga rgyal gzhom pa'i 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]phyir/_/lha chen phyogs skyong tshogs kyis rtsig pa byas/_/sku bzhi dpal brgyad tshang bar bya ba'i phyir/_/rgyal chen rigs bzhi bzung nas ka ba byas/_/theg pa gzhan las 'phags pa'i don/_/glang chen ka la ling gis ka gtan byas/_/gling bzhi'i mi rnams dgos 
[\[118b.2\]]'dod bskang ba'i phyir/_/gza' skar mig tshags byas pas 'gyur ldog med/_/'jig rten zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir/_/seng ge ka la sha yis ka zhu byas/_/'khor ba'i gcong rnying gtan nas sbyang ba'i phyir/_/seng ge'i kha nas bdud rtsi'i 'o ma 'dzag_/thod rus bar 
[\[118b.3\]]khyams rdo rje'i gzer gyis brgyan/_/zhing chen rnga yab bla re 'phan gdugs dang /_/thugs rje byang sems kun du khyab pa'i phyir/_/nyi zla 'bar ba'i rgyan chas gsal bar ldan/_/sprul pa'i me rlung 'brug gis dus bzhir phye/_/khro bo'i 'byung gnas thugs rje'i sgra dang 
[\[118b.4\]]bcas/_/rin chen khri dang pad+ma nyi zla gdan/_/gser gyi seng ge spyan gsum pa/_/drug bzhi rtsal 'phags nyi shu brgyad/_/khri rkang brgyad kyis bar khyams dag la gnas/_/thugs rje che bas nyi ma nyi shu brgyad/_/'jigs pa spangs pa'i seng ge nyi shu brgyad/_/sprul 
[\[118b.5\]]sku thob pas dbang mo nyi shu brgyad/_/kun du 'od kyis la rab gnas pa/_/rin chen khri rkang 'degs pa'i stobs dang ldan/_/mgon gnas dben par gzhan dag gis/_/mthong rkang sbas pa'i chos nyid lung /_/phrin las rnam par rdzogs pa'i gnas/_/rigs bzhi 
[\[118b.6\]]khrag 'thung he ru ka_/bzhugs gnas mi 'gyur chos kyi sku/_/de nyid kun du 'od kyi lung /_/pad+ma le brgan phyogs bcu'i 'od/_/sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i tshul/_/chags par gyur pa pad+ma ste/_/che ba'am yon tan lung du ston/_/mkha' dbyings 
[\[118b.7\]]rnam dag dri med pas/_/ma chags pad+ma can gyi lung /_/stong zhing gsal bas gzhan gang 'phags/_/nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor brtsegs pa yin/_/seng ge 'khor lo tshogs chen pos/_/thabs dang shes rab ya bral bas/_/spros med rang gis bzlums pa ni/_/
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]ma skyes pa yi chos nyid lung /_/'od zer gsal bas 'tsher bas na/_/yang gab sbas pa ye shes lung /_/'phro 'du khyab par gyur pa'i tshogs/_/shes rab rigs kyi gsang ba'i yum/_/thabs dang shes rab dgyes pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/
[\[119a.2\]]tshogs chen yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor chen po ni/_/bdag po khro bo chen po'i sku nyid du/_/gsang sngags 'di yis yongs rdzogs bya/_/o~M pad+ma shrI he ru ka pad+ma kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M/_ma hA tsa Na Da sar+b+ba duSh+Ta na phaT/_/dkyil 'khor bdag po rngam brjid cha lugs dang /_/'bar 
[\[119a.3\]]ba'i me 'od dmar gsal 'phro ba'i mdangs/_/dbu lnga phyogs bzhir las bzhi'i tshul du bzhugs/_/dbu ma mnyam nyid bde ba dbyings su gzigs/_/ral pa'i srid rtse me 'od bzhin du 'bar/_/smin ma khro gnyer sma ra sogs myur ba/_/lus thung sku rgyan gyad kyi cha 
[\[119a.4\]]byad la/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i spyan gyis rang gi yul rnams gzigs/_/rdo rje rin chen khyung gi gshog pas gtams/_/bcu drug rol pa'i spyan dang phyag mtshan dang /_/sgeg po'i zhabs brgyad chas dang 'chas par gnas/_/'jig rten gsum po zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir/_/
[\[119a.5\]]khro bo'i tshogs bcas 'gying bag yum bcas gnon/_/'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba'i rtse mo la/_/bder gshegs rigs lnga'i snang ba sna tshogs ston/_/rang gi zhing sbyong drag po'i gnas 'dul zhing /_/thams cad rigs kyi dkyil 'khor che la dgod/_/phyogs bcu'i 
[\[119a.6\]]rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kyis/_/yab yum gnyis kyi dga' ba bskyed par mdzad/_/gnas su nyi zla pad dkyil zla ba la/_/sku gsung thugs kyi sa bon yongs rdzogs gsal/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka 
[\[119a.7\]]badzra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mo drug rnams la/_/mkha' 'gro'i rgyal mo kham rgya chen mo drug_/zhag gcig phyag gnyis 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can/_/rigs drug mtshan ma cha lugs 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]ci lta bu/_/bud+d+ha badzra o~M/_satwa badzra hU~M/_rat+na badzra trA~M/_pad+ma badzra trI/_karma badzra ha/_g+hu na badzra phaT/_phyi rol dkyil 'khor khyab par spros byas te/_/'gro rnams dud sogs khams rnams dag byas nas/_/rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen pad+mo dang /_/ral gri kha T+wA~M rtse gsum 
[\[119b.2\]]dril bu bcas/_/g.yon pa bdud rtsi thod pa gang ba thogs/_/mkha' 'gro rab gtum rigs kyi dbu rgyan can/_/rang gi phreng ba dur khrod rgyan gyis bklubs/_/las kyi kham rgya sna tshogs gzugs kyis bzhugs/_/dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/_/long 
[\[119b.3\]]ba rgyab 'brel rgyan rnams rdzogs/_/sku mdog mtshan ma sna tshogs la/_/phyag sbrel zangs kyi thod pa thogs/_/o~M shrI khA'i o~M shwa ri khA'i/_tra~M/_shrI khA'i a/_dmus long 'khor ba bcu drug dag byung ste/_/thod rus bar khyams gnas su bkod par bya/_/
[\[119b.4\]]o~M shrI khA'i hU~M/_shrI khA'i hU~M/_lcags kyi spyang mo brgyad rnams yang sprul bcas/_/ye shes sprul pa'i khyi bcu rngam par 'khod/_/me ri sprin ltar gtibs pa ril zhing 'khrugs/_/bar khyams phyi ma'i gnas la kun du 'khod/_/o~M tib ta tsakra shwa na mu 
[\[119b.5\]]mo ra kha~M hU~M phaT/_ku ku ra yag+sha hU~M phaT/_/dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/_/dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH_phyag rgya las/_/mgo dgu brtsegs pa'i rkang gcig po/_/mgo brgyad lag brgyad rol pa dang /_/mgo drug lag drug rkang drug dang /_/mgo gsum 
[\[119b.6\]]rkang gsum lag gsum po/_/dkyil 'khor chen po sgo bzhi ru/_/tshad med sprul pa'i phyag rgyas rol/_/de dag rol pa'i byin brlabs las/_/steng 'og phyogs mtshams ma lus pa'i/_/thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems/_/me 'brug rlung 'brug 
[\[119b.7\]]phyag rgyas gsal/_/rab tu rdzogs pa'i tshul du byung /_/o~M dzi na la to tsa ra~M yag+sha ku ru ban ts+tsha hU~M phaT/_/gzhan yang sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor tshogs/_/bse yi byan lag dmar po dang /_/dung bya khrung khrung la sogs rnams/_/'jig rten 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]tsam pa'i tshogs kyis bskor/_/o~M ha ha ru ru ma hA tsan+de shwa ri bi sha na ya hUM hUM phaT/_/kun gyi rtsa ba'i sngags so/_/o~M pad+ma bi ta si to he he tsakra b+h+yo phaT/_/snying po'i sngags so/_/o~M hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/_e a ma ra li hU~M dza/_nye ba'i snying po'o/_/o~M 
[\[120a.2\]]b+h+yo e A ra li dza zhes brjod pas khro bo 'khor lo ma lus par byon zhing /_/rang gi dkyil 'khor gnyis su med par gyur nas/_/he ru ka chen po nyid kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyu'i dkyil 'khor du gnas shing /_/rang gi dkyil 'khor rnams dam tshig bkod par mdzad 
[\[120a.3\]]do/_/de nas sprul pa'i 'khor lo tshogs/_/ma lus rol par byin brlabs shing /_/bdud dang grags byed rmongs byed cing /_/rang gi gnas su 'du bar mdzad/_/o~M hu lu hu lu ra~M dza la e a ra li dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/_a la la ho/_/o~M ma tra ru tra ha la ha la hU~M phaT/_dug 
[\[120a.4\]]gsum dngos po sbyang ba'i phyir/_/rngam pa'i khro tshogs phyogs bcur spro/_/khro 'dzum phyag rgya bstan mdzad cing /_/he he ru ru'i gsang sngags brjod/_/ha la rdo rje'i gad rgyangs kyis/_/bdud dang srin po la sogs brgyal bar mdzod/_/o~M sarba pa pa ka ra he ta pa byi sha 
[\[120a.5\]]ma ta ru tra hU~M phaT/_o~M sarba pa pa he ta ba byi sha kha tang ru tra hU~M phaT/_o~M sarba pa pa ka ra he ta pa byi sha kha tang ru tra hU~M phaT/_dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor pho nya'i tshogs/_/dpal chen rdo rje thog thog ser chen 'bebs/_/hU~M dang phaT kyis srid gsum 'khor 
[\[120a.6\]]ba 'jig_/hU~M dang phaT kyi byin brlabs bsam mi khyab/_/rdo rje khrag 'thung khrag gi rgya mtsho skems/_/rdo rje mtshon cha gnam lcags thu lum 'dril/_/gsang sngags log par lta ba'i bdud rnams 'joms/_/rdo rje ser chen thog bcas 'bar zhing 'khrugs/_/nyams 
[\[120a.7\]]pa'i snying dang dbang po thal bar rlog_/ye shes thugs rje a la la/_/o~M ma hA shrI he ru ka b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/_gardza gardza/_ha la ha la hU~M phaT/_/de nas bdud dang ru tra bcas/_/rdo rje mtshon chas bsgral bsgral nas/_/'khor gyi longs spyod rol mdzad cing /_/sha khrag nang 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]grol bdud rtsi dang /_/rus rkang dbang por bcas pa la/_/tshogs kyi longs spyod ston mor mdzad/_/kun gyi dgyes pa rdo rje'i glus/_/mthun par sgra dbyangs gcig gis bstod/_/thugs rje rnam dag pad+ma'i rang bzhin las/_/thugs kar la~M las sprul pa'i byang chub 
[\[120b.2\]]sems/_/phyogs bzhi dbus lngar brjid pa'i sku mchog ni/_/grub pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa'i ye shes lnga/_/dpal lus khyad par 'phags pa zhal gyi dbyings/_/dbang mchog lhun gyis grub pa'i rta skad can/_/thar lam thugs rje thabs mkhas sprul pa yi/_/ye 
[\[120b.3\]]shes byin brlabs khro rgyal 'bum du sprul/_/smin mdzad smon lam yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]grub pa yi/_/dmigs pa'i mtha' bral pad+ma yum gyi tshul/_/chos rnams ma lus gsal bar gzigs pa'o/_/chags med thugs rje pad+ma'i tshul/_/sgra skad thams cad mtha' las 
[\[120b.4\]]grol/_/zab dang rgyang ring chos kyi don rnams mtshan nyid las/_/shangs kyi rlung sgrom dug gsum rtsad nas chod/_/zhal gyi ha~M la 'brel pas rgyud lnga gcod/_/rno dbal mche ba skye shi rtsad nas gcod/_/le brgan ljags kyi gsung sgra rgya mtshor 'chad/_/
[\[120b.5\]]rol pa'i phyag gis 'gro ba 'dul la mkhas/_/gshog bzhi bskyod pas phrin las rnam bzhi mdzad/_/zhabs rol pas ni zil gnon mdzad pa'i tshul/_/sku che yan lag rags pa ri bo bzhin/_/thugs mchog ye shes stong nyid nyi ma bdal/_/ye shes 
[\[120b.6\]]lha mchog byin brlabs 'byung ba'i gnas/_/ngo mtshar rol pas khro bo kun gyi rje/_/dpa' bo sku mchog mnga' la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/de nas bde chen dbang gi skus/_/'khor lo dam tshig sgrogs mdzad cing /_/rdo rje gsang ba'i sku gsung thugs/_/gsal bar 
[\[120b.7\]]byin brlabs bskyed par mdzad/_/o~M AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta sa ma yo gi sid+d+hi hU~M/_pa ho ka ka ma la su ta sa hU~M/_o~M badzra sa ma ya kro d+ha sa ma ya o~M AHhU~M/_ma hA yo gi tsit+ta ra~M ba rak+ta ma la khA'i khA'i hU~M/_o~M kha kha le la ru lu ru lu hU~M phaT/_i d+ha na sa ma 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]ya a la la ho zhes rdo rje'i glu blangs so/_/pad+mo gar mdzad do/_/bde ba chen pos mchod pas tshim par 'gyur ro/_/de'i dus na bdud la sogs pa rnams bsgral ba'i tshogs rnams byang chub sems bde ba chen po'i ye shes kyis brgyan te/_/dbang bskur 
[\[121a.2\]]ba'i mthu sogs kyis/_/bdag po rig 'dzin thams cad kyi bdag po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol du 'khod cing gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin par gyur to/_/de'i 'khor rnams kyang dam tshig gi snying po blangs na bran du mdzad par khas blangs 
[\[121a.3\]]so/_/snying po brjod pa ni/_/ma ma trag sha ru tra ma ma b+h+yo/_slar bsgo ba'i sngags ni/_o~M ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo pad+ma hr-i d+d+ha ru ru hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las gsang chen 'dus 
[\[121a.4\]]pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan gar dbang gis/_/rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bsdu mdzad nas/_/bdag dang gnyis med rol pa'i mthus/_/khro bo'i rgyal po sku chen dag_/sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs/_/gsang gsung 
[\[121a.5\]]dam tshig phyag rgya che/_/dkyil 'khor rgyu yi dam tshig sku/_/bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'o/_/chos dbyings yon tan 'byung gnas gzhal yas khang /_/rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rigs kyi cod pan can/_/rigs kyi dbang phyug skye 'gro ma lus sgrol/_/rdo rje 
[\[121a.6\]]bkod pa rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor che/_/dbang po yul tshogs rigs kyi sku lngar ldan/_/shes rab thabs dang mi gnyis 'du 'bral med/_/dus gsum cig char sgrol bas tshar gsum rgyan/_/khams gsum yongs sgrol mdzad kyi rgyan du che/_/mi gnas mya ngan 
[\[121a.7\]]gsung rab rgya mtsho sgrogs/_/ma bsgribs ma gsal go 'phang mdzes par mthong /_/mi ldog yul sgrol stabs drug mdzes par mgyogs/_/gar yang thogs med byin brlabs shugs dang ldan/_/'tsher skad gdangs snyan ma sring spro ba 'gyed/_/kham dmar 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]ral pa'i dbus nas dbugs 'byung ba/_/dpral ba zhur po brjid pa'i khyad par dang /_/rta mgrin 'od 'bar gsal ba'i khyad par ni/_/don mchog khyad par yon tan rmad du byung /_/ljang gu me 'bar rta mgo'i rang bzhin ni/_/'gyur med ye shes ji bzhin gsal/_/
[\[121b.2\]]byams pa'i mdangs kyis khams gsum khyad par gzigs/_/rdog ma le brgan 'bar ba'i khyad par mchog_/stug po bkod sogs zhing khams rab 'byam na/_/rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed khro bo kun/_/zhing khams gsum dag ma lus dbang du sdud/_/shes 
[\[121b.3\]]rab thabs su 'brel pa'i rta skad ni/_/grub pa'i dpal tshogs tshangs pa'i rta dbyangs yin/_/dang po'i gdangs kyis rgyal ba'i zhing khams sgrogs/_/gdangs skad gnyis pa ri rab rtse la 'tsher/_/gsung snyan gdangs gsum snyan pa'i khyad par ni/_/bcu drug slad ma'i ngan 
[\[121b.4\]]rtog thar lam ston/_/spyan mig glog ltar 'gyu ba cher 'phags shing /_/sha khrag rlon pa za ba'i srin po 'joms/_/'tsher can yid la gdung ba'i rta skad ni/_/mun mthu'i 'gro ba ma lus gsal bar mdzad/_/rgyu dbyings grangs dang gzigs thabs rtog pa'i don/_/
[\[121b.5\]]hU~M las dpal chen khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bskyed/_/gnas ni sna yi dbugs [{]rings [,]ring [}]dro ba lags/_/phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa 'byung /_/shangs kyi rlung sgrom yangs pas ye shes srog_/gsang ba'i tshub mas sdug bsngal snying nas 'byin/_/rgya chen 
[\[121b.6\]]sprul pas bag chags tshar gcod de/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho lugs las bzlogs pa yi/_/rigs kyi rlung gis dug lnga dbyings su sgrol/_/zlum dkar gzangs [{]rings [,]ring [}]rno dbal tshems/_/zhal du bdar ba'i byang chub sems/_/ma skyes chos nyid kun la rol/_/zhi 
[\[121b.7\]]rgyas dbang sdud drag po yi/_/cir yang 'gyur ba'i hom khung ste/_/las lnga 'brel ba'i zhal zhes bya/_/'khor ba yongs su smin pa dang /_/las [{]mangs [,]mang [}]nyon mongs dbang btsan dang /_/skye ba mi skye lung ma bstan/_/de smin mdzad pa chen po yi/_/'jog ldog cir yang 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]gyur pa dang /_/rjod byed gnyis ka'i bstan gyur nas/_/'byar zhing bskyod pas ljags nyid do/_/yig 'bru'i rgyu nyid bder gshegs thugs/_/rdo rje myu gu ting 'dzin thugs/_/'od nyid nyon mongs rnam dag 'joms/_/rig byed ye shes phyag rgya dang /_/
[\[122a.2\]]yig 'bru sa bon phyag rgya dang /_/yon tan rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/srid pa gsum ste lta ba dang /_/rgyud dang las kyi rim pa'o/_/de phyir ye shes rol pa'i dbyings/_/snying po phyag mtshan phya mo dag_/bstan par gyur nas mkha' yi dbyings/_/chos sku chu yi zla 
[\[122a.3\]]ba bzhin/_/sna tshogs snang la rang bzhin med/_/dur khrod chen po'i gnas kun du/_/gar gyi dbang phyug rnam par rol/_/shar du rol pa'i phyag bzhi mtshan ma ni/_/khro chen snying 'byin kha T+wAM 'bar ba dang /_/rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhags pas rol/_/de bzhin 
[\[122a.4\]]lho la sogs pa'i phyag kyang bzhi/_/thod pa khrag bkang rdo rje lu gu rgyud/_/rdo rje be con thod rlon 'dzin par rol/_/me yi zhags pa dag dang khyung gi khra/_/sdigs 'dzub rtse la ye shes 'bar/_/rdo rje kha T+wAM ga ni rab tu 'khrol/_/rdo rje rtse dgu rtse lnga gdengs pa dang /_/
[\[122a.5\]]rtse gsum rtse gcig 'bar ba gsor zhing brdeg_/ye nas ma skyes dang ba'i cho 'phrul ston/_/ye shes lnga yi yon tan khyad par ni/_/rin chen dra ba sangs rgyas stong gis brgyan/_/klu rgyal nag po 'dra ba'i thabs shes kyis/_/rtse ba rnam thar sgo gsum sku 
[\[122a.6\]]gsung thugs/_/sprul pa'i don mdzad dkyil 'khor sna tshogs ston/_/gsang ba'i yum bzhis sku la 'khril byed cing /_/byang chub sems bzhi de nyid ston par byed/_/rdo rje dra bas rin chen glog 'gyu ba/_/khyung gshog a mo theb gshog sder mo can/_/
[\[122a.7\]]sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis kyi thugs rje shar/_/thabs kyi rnam par 'phrul pas g.yas nas brkyang /_/srid gsum ma rig mun pa sel byed pa'i/_/shes rab zla stong rtsa gnyis g.yon nas khyab/_/thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'i byin brlabs che/_/sprul 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]pa 'phros pas dug gsum rgyun mi 'chad/_/sna tshogs rol pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa yi/_/phrin las brgyad kyis bdag nyid sku che ba'i/_/dpa' bo stag gis steng phyogs 'dul zhabs brgyad/_/rgya bye'u lcags kyis shar lho'i zhabs brgyad de/_/rdo rje 'chol bas lho 
[\[122b.2\]]yi phyogs na brjid/_/bse khrab smug pos lho nub rkang pa brkyang /_/sna tshogs brjid pas byang shar mtshams su gyon/_/shu kan dar gyis byang shar zhabs mdzes shing /_/mche ba dmar pos nub byang brgyangs pa'i gdan/_/sbrul nag 'khril pa'i zhabs kyis 'og 
[\[122b.3\]]phyogs 'dul bar mdzad/_/khro brgyad gnon cing gzir bas zhabs brdebs shing /_/dug chen bcom zhing sgal tshigs gnon/_/brang gnon ldan pa 'jom zhing 'jigs mdzad dang /_/'khor gyi sku la sbas pas ye shes gsal/_/sku nyid 'khor la sbas pas dbyings 
[\[122b.4\]]kyis brgyan/_/thugs rje rol pas gzhal yas khang du bstan/_/phrin las rol pas hU~M mdzad hU~M gis brgyan/_/sa bcu zil gnon stobs bcu'i dbang dang ldan/_/de nas gar gyi dbang phyug che/_/dam tshig gar gyi byin brlabs kyis/_/rgyun gyi ting 'dzin la gnas 
[\[122b.5\]]nas/_/yum chen gzi ldan dgyes par mdzad/_/dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya ni/_/mnyes mdzad gzi ldan dbang phyug ma/_/ji snyed bud med sna tshogs dang /_/gsung gi rdo rje mi smad do/_/gtso bo rab tu gdungs pa la/_/rab tu smra bar gang byed pa/_/sgeg pa'i tshig 
[\[122b.6\]]gis brgyan nas su/_/sri zhu'i sems kyis gdungs pa la/_/ye shes tshogs kyis rab bskor ba'i/_/lha mo'i tshogs rnams bskor byas te/_/rang gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du/_/gnyis med mnyam pa'i rgya gzhi gdab/_/byang chub sems tshogs gsal ba'i 
[\[122b.7\]]rgyun/_/thim pa'i dkyil 'khor don chen gsal/_/dbyings phyug sprul tshogs bsam yas dag_/nges pa'i ye shes rol pa'i sku/_/stong gsum dbang por gdon mi za/_/'jig rten gsum gyi 'byung gnas mchog_/dus gsum kun gyi gnas dang 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]rten/_/phyogs bcu dkyil 'khor thams cad na/_/dam tshig chen po de nyid mang /_/phyi nang gsang ba'i mthar phyin pa/_/thams cad pad+mo rnam dag pas/_/cho 'phrul rnam kun de bzhin nyid/_/thugs rje chags pa'i phrin las kyis/_/dbang drag 
[\[123a.2\]]phrin las gnod sbyin gnas/_/gnyis med 'bar bas thams cad sreg_/las dang bag chags sgrib sogs kun/_/gnas nas gshegs mdzad ye shes tshogs/_/lhun gyis dang bas kun du 'joms/_/snyigs ma lnga brgya dus kyi mtha'/_/srid gsum sems 
[\[123a.3\]]can 'dul dka' ba/_/'phro 'du 'khyil ba'i 'od mdangs mdzad/_/'jig rten mkhyen dang mya ngan 'das/_/gnyis med thugs kyis sa le mkhyen/_/de ltar dgongs pa'i khyad par de/_/'gro ba mtha' dag 'dul don du/_/rnam par thar pa dbu gsum bstan/_
[\[123a.4\]]g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing ga_/ye shes drug gi phyag mtshan ni/_/g.yas pas rdo rje rde'u chung dang /_/mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pas rol/_/dril bu rgyu zhags thod rlon g.yon/_/bskal pa'i me ri sbrul zhags dang /_/thod rlon phreng ba rgyan du 
[\[123a.5\]]byas/_/sgeg pa dpa' bo 'jigs su rung /_/dgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed/_/snying rje rngam dang zhi ba'i sku/_/sku gsung thugs kyi gar thabs can/_/'jigs byed khro bo rnam par rgyal/_/skye ba med pa'i chos dbyings su/_/mtshan ma med pa'i chos 
[\[123a.6\]]bshad pas/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rgyal/_/longs sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis/_/mi 'jigs stobs mchog gdan stengs na/_/sangs rgyas zhing khams thams cad du/_/zab mo rgya chen chos ma bstan/_/dngos dang dngos med gsal byed 
[\[123a.7\]]pas/_/me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /_/sprul pa 'gro mang don gyi phyir/_/phal mang bkod pa'i sa rnams su/_/dngos po mtshan ma rnam 'phrul gyis/_/bya ba grub pa'i ye shes tshogs/_/thams cad mtshan ma nam mkha'i dngos/_/de nyid sgro btags 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]chos dang bral/_/kun ldan byams sems de kho na/_/rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med/_/he ru ka yi bde chen dbyings/_/chos rnams kun gyi rgyu yin de/_/'od gsal ba yi gnas 'jug pas/_/rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya bshad/_/de bzhin 
[\[123b.2\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/_dkyil 'khor rgyu'i don phyung ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan dpal gyi skus/_/gar gyi dbang phyug lhun grub mchog_/thugs rje brjid 
[\[123b.3\]]pa'i stobs ldan pas/_/yon tan khyad par bstan pa'i phyir/_/nam mkha'i ri mo phyag rgya'i rngom/_/cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs pa'i rngom/_/zil gyis gnon pa'i gnas mchog rngom/_/tsham ngam chen po'i stang stabs rngom/_/sku mdog brgyad kyis 
[\[123b.4\]]brjid pa'i mchog_/phyag rgya'i don dang ldan pa'i sku/_/ha~M lnga 'brel par gyur pa'i zhal/_/zla kham cir yang 'gyur ba'i ljags/_/skye shi rtsad nas gcod pa'i tshems/_/rnam pa'i 'brug ltar sgrogs pa'i dbyangs/_/ting 'dzin nam mkha'i skar tshogs bzhin/_/
[\[123b.5\]]phrin las rgya mtsho rlabs tshogs ltar/_/byin brlabs cho 'phrul sprin phung tshogs/_/mdzad pa'i rol mo gar thabs rngam/_/bdud dang srin mo 'dzoms byed rnams/_/khams gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i gdan/_/stong gsum dus gcig bsgral ba'i zhing /_/
[\[123b.6\]]rtog pa 'joms pa'i brtul zhugs mchog_/sku gsung thugs mchog yon tan ni/_/rngom brjid sum cu rtsa drug mnga'/_/rgya chen yan lag rags pas brjid/_/grangs ma rkyen dang 'tsham pas brjid/_/bkur gshog gtso bo mthong bas brjid/_/khyad 
[\[123b.7\]]zhugs bla ma yin pas brjid/_/gdangs chen stong gsum gang bas brjid/_/gsal bas mtha' gnyis yangs pas brjid/_/thugs rje thugs dam mthar phyin brjid/_/ma rmongs thabs kyis 'dul bas brjid/_/ma 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]'gags sa le mkhyen pas brjid/_/med la zad mi shes pas brjid/_/gcig la 'dod dgur sgyur bas brjid/_/gnod sbyin pham par mdzad pas brjid/_/thabs mkhas skyon gyis ma gos brjid/_/rims bral nyam thag rol pas brjid/_/
[\[124a.2\]]'khor ba yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]mgon mdzad brjid/_/cig char zil gyis gnon pas brjid/_/bya ba'i ye shes rdzogs pas brjid/_/sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs/_/zil gnon nga rgyal bcag par bya/_/de su ro yi nang nas ni/_/glog 'gyu lce ni lan 
[\[124a.3\]]gsum 'byung /_/so 'am sen mo gcad par bya/_/de nyid ral gri bzang por 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor pa yi grangs bzhin dbyung /_/de thogs nam mkha' la song nas/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags brjod bya/_/o~M b+hU ru na ra sa ma ta ya hU~M phaT/_/gar gyi dbang 
[\[124a.4\]]phyug nga rgyal gyis/_/gang 'dod gnas su 'gro bya zhing /_/dregs byed tshogs rnams zil gnon te/_/brtul zhugs spyod pas glu blang zhing /_/brtul zhugs spyod pa sna tshogs pas/_/yud tsam gcig la gnas su dag par byed/_/bcom ldan pad+ma he ru 
[\[124a.5\]]ka'i/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni/_/ji ltar sprul zhing cir yang snang /_/mtshan nyid gcig tu ma nges pas/_/sku gsung thugs sprul bsam yas che/_/rang bzhin las dang yon tan gyi/_/byin brlabs ya mtshan sgrib med gsal/_/khams 
[\[124a.6\]]gsum kun las rtsal 'phags shing /_/rang gi dkyil 'khor rnam gsal las/_/byin brlabs 'gro la rgya cher ston/_/chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /_/sprul sku sna tshogs 'dul ba'o/_/tshig gi gsung rab rig pa'i gsung /_/bzhi la sum cu 
[\[124a.7\]]drug gis brjid/_/dug gsum sku gsung thugs kyis sbyangs/_/dug lnga bde ba chen pos spyad/_/dbyings las ye shes rol pa'i mthus/_/skye 'gro ma lus rgyas btab nas/_/rang bzhin dag pa'i dbyings su sbyong /_/rgyal ba gang gi thugs rjes kyang /_/'di la skyabs 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]su yod ma yin/_/srid pa gsum du dag byas nas/_/srid pa'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya gsang bas 'debs/_/thig le chos sku rig pa'i mchog_/gar gyi dbang phyug zhes su bsngags/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog 
[\[124b.2\]]rol pa'i rgyud las/_khro bo rngom brjid ston pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o//_//de nas 'khor gyi gtso bo mchog_/gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pas/_/yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal lo/_/mchod pa rgya chen phul byas te/_/'gro ba brtse ba'i sems can 
[\[124b.3\]]las/_/bsgrub pa'i rim pa zhu bar mdzad/_/bcom ldan dngos grub kun gyi bdag_/gdul bya kun gyi don gyi phyir/_/thun mong dngos grub ji lta bur/_/de bzhin mchog gi dngos grub dag_/bsgrub par bya ba'i thabs ni gang /_/las kyi cho ga ci lta bur/_/
[\[124b.4\]]yan lag tshogs pa'i ldan byas nas/_/tshe 'di mchog tu gyur ram ci/_/thabs mang cho ga bshad par bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang /_/rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs te/_/ma 'ongs 'gro la phan pa'i phyir/_/sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor 
[\[124b.5\]]ba las/_/ngo mtshar 'phrul pa 'di gsungs so/_/rgyal ba kun gyi dam tshig che/_/rnam gsum phyag rgya la gnas nas/_/las kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa ni/_/gnas bzang dag tu brtsam par bya/_/phyag rgya'i grogs la brten pa na/_/bzlas brjod yan lag ma 
[\[124b.6\]]nyams par/_/gsang sngags yi ge bcu bzhi pa/_/sum 'bum dag tu brjod byas nas/_/rol pa mtshan ma bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/mchog chen mtshan ma mnyams pa/_/rab brtags dur khrod gnas nas blangs/_/khro bo chen po'i tsham ngam gyis/_/yungs kar thal 
[\[124b.7\]]ba la sogs pas/_/sum b+ha ni yi sngags brjod cing /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gshin rje bskrad par bya/_/de nas dri zhim sbyar ba yi/_/dag byed chu yis legs bkrus te/_/me tog phreng sogs rgyan gyis brgyan/_/gsung gi phyag rgya byin brlabs shing /_/dpa' bos 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]rang gi khyim du blang /_/glu drug dbyangs drug bcas pa yis/_/khro rgyal rol ba'i bro yis sbyangs/_/bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor nyams dga'i mchog_/rgya khyon 'dom gang khru yis bstod/_/ci bzhin la sogs cho ga bzhin/_/rdzas dang sa 
[\[125a.2\]]gzhi dag bya zhing /_/sa bon gnas pa'i las rdzogs nas/_/bsrung zhing dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/_/yab yum bsgrub pa'i grogs bcas rnams/_/dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhir gnas bzung ste/_/mchog chen dkyil 'khor kha ru bzhag_/bsrung ba'i 'khor 
[\[125a.3\]]lo legs ldan pas/_/stong nyid ting 'dzin nas brtsams te/_/dkyil 'khor mnyes sogs rdzogs byas nas/_/ro langs dgug cing gzhug bya ste/_/bar chad med par bzlas brjod bya/_/o~M bi ra na trag sha ta ha la ta'i lo ma ta ya man ta tsan tra hU~M phaT/_
[\[125a.4\]]ting 'dzin 'od zer gsal ba'i rgyun/_/zur ma chag par brjod byas te/_/'bum tsho gcig gis g.yo 'gyur zhing /_/gnyis kyis 'od dang bcas par snang /_/'bum phrag gsum gyis sgra bstan zhing /_/langs te kun du lta bar byed/_/de tshe rnal 
[\[125a.5\]]'byor dbang po yis/_/skra nas bzung nas bsgyel byas la/_/rta mchog sngags kyis dbang du bya/_/rdo rje khyung gshog phyag rgya yis/_/don gyi gsung gis go bar spyod pas bro yang brdung /_/ting 'dzin sngags dang yan lag rnams/_/ma bral rang gi gnas 'ongs 
[\[125a.6\]]te/_/dkyil 'khor mtha' ma bskor byas nas/_/mchod pa bro glu dang bcas pas/_/lha rnams mnyes pa'i cho ga bya/_/de nas brtul zhugs chen po yis/_/go la lang g+ha gnon pa yis/_/bro la sogs pa rdzogs byas nas/_/ro de gser du gyur ba 
[\[125a.7\]]yin/_/de ni mchod dang sbyin pa dang /_/rang la dgos pa'i yo byad bya/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/_ro langs bsgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]gar gyi dbang phyug gis/_/gzi ldan yum dang rol mdzad cing /_/'khor gyis zhus pa'i tshig gsan nas/_/thun mong dngos grub bzang po nyid/_/ma 'ongs 'gro la phan gdags phyir/_/rim pa bzhin du phan gdags mdzad/_/dbang thob dam tshig la gnas 
[\[125b.2\]]pas/_/yid mthun gnas mchog bzang po ru/_/mig sman sbyor ba bsgrub byas te/_/byin brlabs ldan pas 'gro don byas/_/rang gi ting 'dzin la gnas pas/_/rang gi gsang sngags 'bum rdzogs nas/_/mtshan ma phra mo mthong ba dang /_/bsgrub pa'i 
[\[125b.3\]]dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya/_/dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba yi/_/phyag rgya gsang sngags ting 'dzin ldan/_/rin chen sngags kyi bzlas brjod ni/_/'bum phrag gsum du gsung bar bya/_/o~M pad+ma ma tsa ga hru a la sa ma ra si ti yo na hU~M phaT/_
[\[125b.4\]]dkyil 'khor gnas kyi rtags mthong nas/_/grong mtha'i gnas su 'gro byas te/_/sus kyang ma mthong mtshan mo rung /_/lha 'dre gtum po'i grong du bsdad/_/rang gi 'khor gyi tshogs rnams kyis/_/mi rgod btsan 'brang bsrung bar bya/_/der ni b+han d+ha mtshan 
[\[125b.5\]]ldan du/_/gzi chen mar ni bltas nas su/_/mtshan gcig yal bar sngags bzlas shing /_/ting 'dzin ma nyams sbyor ba byas/_/skya rengs dang po 'char dus su/_/dud pas bdugs te bcang bar bya/_/glu dang bro yi brtul zhugs dang /_/lha rnams kun 
[\[125b.6\]]gyi stang stabs kyis/_/gnas de'i bdag po dbang du sdud/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags ldan pas/_/slar nyid mig sman shas gcig byug_/de nas 'khor gyi tshogs bsgo zhing /_/skye 'gro kun la gsang bar bya/_/pad+ma bsgrub pa'i an rdza lis/_/ci 'dod dngos 
[\[125b.7\]]po mthong bar 'gyur/_/gzhan yang ril bu'i sgrub thabs ni/_/bdud rtsi lnga las 'byung ba yi/_/rdzas dag sha lnga dang bsres te/_/thod pa mtshan ldan nang bzhag nas/_/dkyil 'khor rgyan dang ldan gnas su/_/thabs dang shes rab ldan gnas su/_/gar gyi 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]dbang phyug sku bsgoms shing /_/yi ge bcu bzhi gsang sngags kyis/_/'bum phrag gsum du bzlas byas te/_/mtshan ma phra mo mthong ba dang /_/bdud rtsi gong bu bsgril byas te/_/rgya shug 'bras bu'i tshad tsam du/_/rin chen za ma tog tu gzhug_/dkyil 
[\[126a.2\]]'khor de yi dbus bzhag pas/_/bsrung ba'i tsa kras bsrung bya zhing /_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags ni/_/'bum phrag lnga ru brjod par bya/_/'od zer lcags kyu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/o~M ma hA pad+ma sa~M bo ta hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT swA hA/_de nas ril bu de blangs te/_/kha'am 
[\[126a.3\]]lag tu bzung byas nas/_/gang 'dod gnas su 'gro byed cing /_/ci 'dod pa dag grub par byed/_/lha yi gnas mchog nyams dga' bas/_/snga dro gcig gis 'khor bar nus/_/gzhan yang bcud len bzang po nyid/_/skyes bu gang gis bsgrub 'dod pas/_/bdud 
[\[126a.4\]]rtsi rgyal po a ru ra/_/gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pas mchog_/nyi shu rtsa gcig ra bor sba/_/sul rangs rgyas par gyur pa dang /_/ba gcin phur mo thal ba dang /_/ser skya'i ba mar btso bar bya/_/de nyid sbrang rtsi dang sbyar bas/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig zhag gi bar/_/
[\[126a.5\]]zho re'i tshad du bskyed cing bza'/_/dkyil 'khor gsang ba la brten nas/_/gar gyi dbang phyug skur bsgoms shing /_/rig 'dzin pa yi sngags brjod cing /_/mtshan rtags gsal bar ma mthong bar/_/yan lag ma nyams brtson 'grus bskyed/_/o~M pad+mo 
[\[126a.6\]]bi ha ra ha ra ta sa ni hU~M phaT swA hA/_/gsang sngags sum 'bum ma rdzogs par/_/a ru ra yi 'bras bzang stong gi tshad/_/legs par sbyar te zos pa'i mthus/_/nad dang zug rngu'i tshogs 'joms shing /_/tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs/_/rgas la 
[\[126a.7\]]sogs pa'i skyon sel cing /_/rig 'dzin gnas su 'gro bar byed/_/de bzhin dbang po'i lag pa dang /_/kha ra bu ram nye shing dang /_/zur rngul mu zil sogs pas/_/rang gi cho ga shes pa yis/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags kyis 'grub/_/gar dbang 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]dkyil 'khor la ni brten byas te/_/so sor mnyams sbyangs pa'i sa/_/ba yi 'o ma dang sbyar zhing /_/ba yi mar gyis gzungs btab nas/_/mtshan ma ma byung bar du gzhag_/de ni rig 'dzin dngos grub thob/_/o~M pad+mo i dra dra a he de bi na hU~M phaT/_
[\[126b.2\]]o~M pad+mar rgya a gar ta dar sha hU~M phaT/_o~M pad+mo sa mon bi sha le hU~M phaT/_o~M g+hu li sa bo tam go ra na hU~M phaT/_o~M pad+mo me sha a nan da ta ya ka ra hU~M phaT/_de dag las rnams 'grub pa dang /_/rtag tu rang gis 'char byas shing /_/gsang ba'i sngags lam 
[\[126b.3\]]la brten nas/_/tshe 'di grub par gyur pa yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/_thun mong gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o//_//de nas gar gyi dbang phyug nyid/_/
[\[126b.4\]]phyag rgya rol pa'i skur bcas kyis/_/snod ldan byang chub sems dpa' dag_/mchog gi dngos grub skyed byed pa'i/_/rig 'dzin gnas kyi mtshan nyid bshad/_/dmar po dbang gi dkyil 'khor du/_/b+han d+ha mtshan dang ldan pa brgyad/_/pad+ma'i 'dab ma la bkram 
[\[126b.5\]]nas/_/tshe 'das sngags kyis brgyan par bya/_/de ni bza' btung longs spyod tshogs/_/ma nyams phun sum tshogs par spyad/_/gar dbang lha la mos pa yis/_/gsang sngags rgyal po rjod byed cing /_/sum 'bum bzlas pa'i grangs tshad nas/_/mtha' sngags 
[\[126b.6\]]gzhan gyis brgyan byas te/_/rtags mthong bar du bzlas brjod brtsam/_/o~M a su sha o~M a yu sha so ta bru~M/_/'od zer du ba lta bu dang /_/phyag rgya'i dbyings dang 'byung ba'i dus/_/bro drug glu dang gar bcas pas/_/brtul zhugs chen po bdud rtsi spyad/_/sku gsung 
[\[126b.7\]]thugs mchog phyag rgya che/_/gsang ba'i yum bskyed snying po mchog_/oM e ka te bi ga te ma tang ka te swA hA/_/ma nyams nyams pa'i phyag rgyar gsal/_/gnyis su med par sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje pad+mor ldan byas pas/_/thabs kyi phyag rgya'i cho 'phrul la/_/
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]gzi ldan gsang ba e gru gsum/_/nyi ma pad+ma shes rab ldan/_/so so gsal ba'i brdas mtshon te/_/o~M bru~M pad+ma A yu she/_/byin brlabs rnam par 'phro ba yis/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thugs bskul zhing /_/byang chub sems mchog 
[\[127a.2\]]tshe yi rgyun/_/sgrub pa po la gsal bar mdzad/_/pad 'dab brgyad pa nyi mar bcas/_/dbus su gsang ba'i rdo rje che/_/hU~M gis gsor zhing a yis bskyod/_/yang dang yang du bskul ba ni/_/sku gsung dbyings su gyur pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems mchog 
[\[127a.3\]]rgyun/_/b+han d+ha mtshan ldan nang du bcug_/rnal 'byor gar dang legs bcas pas/_/bkra shis tshigs bcad glu blang zhing /_/bkra shis gar dang dbyangs su bcas/_/longs spyod ston mo kun gsol zhing /_/dngos grub don phyir gsol ba gdab/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[127a.4\]]pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las tshe bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o//_//de nas gar gyi lha mchog gis/_/thams cad bdud rtsir byin brlabs nas/_/phyi nang snod bcud ma lus kun/_/
[\[127a.5\]]rigs lnga'i sku ru bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/rang las byung ba'i rang bzhin dang /_/dngos grub snying po kun bsdus bshad/_/chos rnams ma lus rnams brtags nas/_/rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor tshul du gnas/_/de las 'byung ba'i dngos rnams kyis/_/de nyid lta bur 
[\[127a.6\]]sbyor ba bya/_/dang por bsod nams tshogs bsags shing /_/rdo rje bla ma mnyes byas pas/_/phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas dag tu/_/lha nyid nye bar bsgoms byas pas/_/dkyil 'khor chen po brtsam par bya/_/rigs kyi lha yi dkyil 'khor gyis/_/rigs 
[\[127a.7\]]kyi phyag rgya bsgrub par bya/_/dri dbyibs kha dog ro la sogs/_/sha lnga bdud rtsir bcas pa dag_/b+han d+ha mtshan ldan lnga ru ni/_/dkyil 'khor 'khor dang phyogs bzhir dgram/_/rdo rje bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/_/so sor spang ba sbyang byas te/_/phyag rgya 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]sngags dang ting 'dzin mthus/_/rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrub/_/mchod cing mnyes par byas nas ni/_/las kun grub pa'i gsang sngags brjod/_/o~M pad+mo badzra hri g+hu na sid+hi sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta/_o~M AHhU~M swA hA/_de la 'od dang du ba dang /_/dri 
[\[127b.2\]]dang lha mo rtags dag ni/_/bzlas brjod thun mong khyad par dag_/'bum tsho gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur/_/de nas grub pa'i rtags mthong nas/_/de dag btag tsam sbyang bya zhing /_/mkha' 'gro rol pa'i brtul zhugs kyis/_/bsod nams sbyang zhing byin gyis 
[\[127b.3\]]brlabs/_/dkyil 'khor bkod pa rgyan dang bcas/_/khro bo 'bar bar zhal sgyur zhing /_/yab yum gdung ba'i glu dbyangs dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' 'phro 'du yis/_/dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gnas bzhugs par/_/bdud kyi gar gyi dbang phyug bskyed/_/slar 
[\[127b.4\]]nyid khro bo dkyil 'khor gyis/_/gzugs 'dul gtso bo'i thugs kar zhugs/_/ye shes dkyil 'khor kun bkug nas/_/dam tshig bdud rtsi gnyis med 'gyur/_/slar 'byung pad+mo'i rgyal po'i sku/_/dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gdan la bzhugs/_/mchod 
[\[127b.5\]]bstod dga' bas mnyes byas nas/_/bro gar glu yis thugs dam bskang /_/khyad par gsang sngags rgyal po'i mthus/_/ye shes lngar ldan 'od zer can/_/o~M ma hA sarba ta thA ga ta pany+tsa a mr-i ta ru lu ru lu hU~M phaT swA hA/_ji srid mtshan ma ma byung bar/_/sngags kyi 
[\[127b.6\]]rgyal po brjod par bya/_/de nas rta mgrin phyag rgya yis/_/sgrub pa chen po gsang ba'i don/_/rdo rje rta mchog phyag rgya che/_/bdud rtsi rdzas kyis dbang bskur zhing /_/rnal 'byor grogs bcas tshim par bya/_/phyogs rnams kun nas gdungs ba'i glus/_/dkyil 
[\[127b.7\]]'khor lha dang bla ma mchod/_/dngos grub gsol ba'i tshig brjod cing /_/dga' ba'i longs spyod rgya cher bya/_/lha rnams kun la dgyes 'dul zhing /_/dam med dbang po sngags kyis bskrad/_/bdud rtsi gtor bas lus rlag 'gyur/_/rang gi ye shes las las 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]skyes/_/de nas las mdzad srung ma dang /_/mgron tshogs gtor mas mnyes byas te/_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen po/_/rab tshogs 'gro ba'i don phyir bsngo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud 
[\[128a.2\]]chen po las bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o//_//de nas rta mchog rol pa'i sku dbus su/_/dkyil 'khor dbus su dgyes tshul gyis/_/'gro rnams kun la bskul mdzad cing /_/phrin las gsang ba'i don bshad mdzad/_/bsam gtan las 
[\[128a.3\]]kyis 'byung ba yi/_/zhi rgyas dbang drag mngon spyod dang /_/mnan bzlog rengs dang bsad la sogs/_/ting 'dzin gsal nas goms pa'i mthus/_/bdag dang gzhan don las la sbyar/_/zhi ba zhi ba'i yi ge ste/_/bsgrub bya zla dkyil la bzhag nas/_/rnam 
[\[128a.4\]]par snang mdzad 'od sngags kyis/_/dus gsum lha dang mngon sbyar zhing /_/byang chub sems kyi bde bskyed de/_/zug rngu rtog pa rnam par sel/_/yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]goms par bstan pa'i mthus/_/me 'bar gnas kyang zhi bar nus/_/rgyas la rgyas pa'i gzugs 
[\[128a.5\]]bgyis te/_/rin chen 'byung ldan la 'byung ba'i/_/'khor los sgyur rgyal cha lugs kyis/_/ser po 'od dpung 'bar ba brjid/_/rang gi btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas/_/bder gshegs byin brlabs kun bsdus shing /_/sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan dang /_/
[\[128a.6\]]phrin las sgo nas brtsam par mdzad/_/sngags dang 'od zer gsang ba yis/_/rin chen sna bdun gser la sogs/_/mkha' mdzod char sprin bzhin du 'bebs/_/tshogs rnams rang gis longs spyod cing /_/'gro rnams gzhan la sbyin par byed/_/thabs 
[\[128a.7\]]dang dbang du bsdus phyir ro/_/'od dpung dmar po mtha' yas sa sku/_/pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs shing /_/chags pa chen pos 'gro 'dul ba/_/rigs kyi ting 'dzin sngags kyi mthus/_/lha tshogs 'gro rnams dbang sdud cing /_/'khor bcas dang 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]bar gyur pa yin/_/gang zhig sdang ba'i sems yod pa/_/'phrad pa bzhin rgyas chags par 'gyur/_/gang zhig gsad pa'i las grub mdzod/_/de ni mthing nag las kyi khro bo'i ting 'dzin las/_/khro bo sprul pa'i 'phro 'du yis/_/bsgrub bya dang phra zhing dgug pa/_/
[\[128b.2\]]me yi dkyil 'khor la gzhag ste/_/shin tu ma rungs mtshon char ldan/_/dkon mchog gsum la sngo byed cing /_/skye bo yongs la 'tshe ba dang /_/slob dpon kun la bsngo ba dang /_/sangs rgyas thugs rjes bzod mi mdzad/_/las kyi khro bo sna tshogs kyis/_/
[\[128b.3\]]mtshon cha me 'od 'bar 'phros nas/_/sdig pa can de bsgral mdzad cing /_/bya khyi ce spyang sha za dang /_/khrag 'thung mang po 'dus pa yis/_/bstod pa'i tshul du rol zhing dgyes/_/til tsam med par zos pa dang /_/sems nyid bde ba chen po'i gnas/_/de 
[\[128b.4\]]dag ting 'dzin gsang sngags dang /_/dkyil 'khor so so'i rnam pa bsgrub/_/o~M b+hU ta tsakra sam ba ga ti lo tsA na che ge mo shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/_o~M rat+na sa~M b+ha gu ru ma ma ki che ge mo puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/_o~M yA mi te sa ra ba ra ho che ge mo pa sha~M ku ru swA hA/_o~M 
[\[128b.5\]]karma san+ti ba krota ni che ge mo hA yA swA hA/_rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzang po/_/rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas te/_/sngags dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba'i mthus/_/cho ga mngon du 'grub par byed/_/gzhan yang rmongs dang rengs pa dang /_/dbye zhing dgug dang 
[\[128b.6\]]bskrad pa dang /_/gnon la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang /_/rang gi lta ba'i sbyor ba yis/_/bsam gtan sngags kyis 'grub par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las 
[\[128b.7\]]bsam gtan gyi sbyor ba'i rim pa ste nyer brgyad pa'o//_//de nas sbyor ba'i rgyal po dang /_/phrin las kun gyi mchog gyur pa'o/_/rdzas rnams rten pa'i mtshan ma nyid/_/'dong 'dod 'bras bu sgrub byed pa'o/_/gar gyi dbang phyug phyag rgya'i sku/_/
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]rnam spro lha yi dkyil 'khor gyis/_/so so'i 'dod don sgrub par byed/_/rdo rje tsakra rin chen dang /_/pad+ma rgya gram la sogs te/_/las kun lha yi nga rgyal gyis/_/mtshan rtags ma byung bar du bsgrub/_/gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor gzhir 
[\[129a.2\]]bzhag nas/_/lha yi dkyil 'khor sgrub byed cing /_/mtshan ma'i rdzas la brten byas te/_/brten par mchod cing mnyes pa dang /_/las kun pa yi gsang sngags brjod/_/o~M ma ma sarba bi ta ha ra ku ru swA hA/_/sarba sa mo ku ni/_la~M ba shAn+tiM ku ru da ni hU~M/_
[\[129a.3\]]puSh+TiM rat+na ma ku ru swA hA/_/pa sha~M ku ru pad+mo hr-i da ya a~M/_sta~M ba na mo sha a karma pa ni hU~M phaT/_/cung zhig gzugs ni 'du ba'am/_/'od 'phros bskyod par gyur pa dang /_/nga rgyal ldan pas lag thogs te/_/gsang sngags drag tu brjod par bya/_/gang 
[\[129a.4\]]zhig zhi dang rgyas pa dang /_/dbang la sogs ni sgrub 'dod pas/_/de dag de dang mthun pa dang /_/las kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas bsam/_/phyag rgya'i mtshan ma bskul byas te/_/rang gi las la rnam par gnas/_/dgug la sogs pa'i las 
[\[129a.5\]]dag dang /_/lcags kyu la sogs las kyi bsgrub/_/rten gyi mtshan ma dang bral bar/_/ci 'dod bya ba mthar phyin 'grub/_/thabs dang sgrub byed gsang sngags la/_/so so'i las kyi mtha' brgyan te/_/yi ge bcu bzhi'i rjes thogs su/_/sum 'bum 
[\[129a.6\]]grangs kyis bsgrub par bya/_/o~M bi lo gi ma ma dush+Ta na ga ga na ru lu ru lu hU~M phaT/_dang po rtsa ba'i sngags ni/_gsum 'bum dag tu bzlas byas nas/_/slar yang de yi grangs mthun pa/_/gang 'dod las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/_/de bzhin 
[\[129a.7\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las rten gyi sgo nas spyad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o//_//'gro gnas thams cad srung byed cing /_/phan gdags cho ga bzang po nyid/_/
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]rgyal ba'i byin brlabs gnas pa'i thabs/_/rnam pa yis ni brtsam byas te/_/grong khyer la sogs bsrung 'dod pas/_/chu dang bye ma la sogs la/_/gsang sngags rgyal po brjod par bya/_/o~M na mo ku ru sarba bi da ra ni mo sa de ni ra sha ni ra sha kra ra kra ta hU~M phaT/_/rang gi 
[\[129b.2\]]lha yi sbyor ldan pas/_/stong du brjod cing phyogs bcur gtor/_/gang srung ba dag shis 'gyur cing /_/'byung po'i tshogs kyis mi tshugs 'gyur/_/gzhan yang ri'u cha dgu pa yi/_/'khor lo shing shun tshogs la bri/_/mu khyud dag gis mtha' bskor nas/_/gsang 
[\[129b.3\]]sngags rgyal po dgod par bya/_/dbus su dgod pa'i gsang sngags ni/_/yi ge bcu bzhi gsang sngags bsam/_/de'i mtha' mar o~M mthar he he dang /_hu ru kaM pa bag sha ha ha ma mra bri hU~M phaT swA hA_/de mthar dbyangs dang gsal byed gang /_/bsrung ba'i sngags dang bcas pa 
[\[129b.4\]]ni/_/gur gum bzang pos byugs byas te/_/rdo rje rgya gram dbus su gzhug_/gang gi ming bcas 'bum bzlas shing /_/btags pa'i srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/_/gzhan yang bum pa bzang po ru/_/bdud rtsi 'o ma sbyar ba dag_/rang gi gsang sngags yungs kar 
[\[129b.5\]]bcas/_/gar dbang chags pa'i skur bsgoms shing /_/sngags thod bsrung bar 'gyur bar byed/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/gsang ba 'di nyid bshad pa las/_/phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems bcas pas/_/de la thams cad dga' 
[\[129b.6\]]mdzad cing /_/lha rnams kun la slar bsgo mdzad/_/de dag dad pa'i shugs kyis ni/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di bzung zhing /_/de 'dzin gzhan la'ang byams par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen 
[\[129b.7\]]po zhes bya ba las bsrung ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//_//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po'i rtsa ba rdzogs so//_//_
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]{D840}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI he ru ka kA ru Na krI Di ta ta na tra gu h+ya ga~M b+hI ra u ta ta ma nA ma/_bod skad du/_dpal he ru ka snying rje rol pa'i rgyud gsang ba zab mo'i mchog ces bya ba/_/dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag 
[\[130a.2\]]gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_rdo rje dang /_rin po che dang /_pad+ma dang /_las kyi rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba chen po dam tshig gi sdom pa gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po dbang brnyes pa/_
[\[130a.3\]]thabs dang shes rab kyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po/_khams gsum thams cad kyi bdag po chen po/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i skabs 
[\[130a.4\]]dang ldan pa/_che mchog he ru ka'i shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rin po che gsang ba rdo rje mchog tu gsang ba'i bcom ldan 'das bud med kyi dkyil na gsung brjod pa 
[\[130a.5\]]med par bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa/_rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang /_rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /_nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo dang /_skal ba dang ldan pa dang /_'jib par byed pa'i 
[\[130a.6\]]gsang ba chen mo'i g.yog dang /_'byung ba chen po lnga dang /_'byung ba las gyur pa'i lha'i tshogs 'bum phrag brgya stong gis khyab pa 'di lta ste/_snying po ye shes rdo rje dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rdo rje dang me long ye shes rdo rje dang /_so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes rdo rje 
[\[130a.7\]]dang /_mnyam pa nyid ye shes rdo rje dang /_bya ba nan tan ye shes rdo rje dang /_nam mkha' ye shes rdo rje dang /_rlung ye shes rdo rje dang /_me ye shes rdo rje dang /_chu ye shes rdo rje dang /_sa ye shes rdo rje dang /_thabs dang shes rab ye shes rdo rje dang /_gzugs ye 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]shes rdo rje dang /_sgra ye shes rdo rje dang /_dri ye shes rdo rje dang /_ro ye shes rdo rje dang /_reg ye shes rdo rje dang /_sku ye shes rdo rje dang /_gsung ye shes rdo rje dang /_thugs ye shes rdo rje dang /_bde ba chen po ye shes rdo rje dang /_kun du bzang po ye shes rdo rje dang /_gsung 
[\[130b.2\]]gi dbang po ye shes rdo rje dang /_gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang /_zhi ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang /_gdul dka' 'dul ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang /_rgyal ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang /_me tog gi ye shes rdo rje dang /_rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang /_dbang gi ye 
[\[130b.3\]]shes rdo rje dang /_nyi ma'i khro bo ye shes rdo rje dang /_rgyal mtshan ye shes rdo rje dang /_rdo rje sgra ye shes rdo rje dang /_'gro ba 'dul ba ye shes rdo rje dang /_/gzhon nu ye shes rdo rje dang /_rgyu ye shes rdo rje dang /_gsung med pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang /_sna tshogs kyi ye shes 
[\[130b.4\]]rdo rje dang /_go cha ye shes rdo rje dang /_yang dag par zab par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang /_'dus pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang /_bde ba chen po'i ye shes rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems ye shes rdo rje dang /_rin chen dbang bskur ba ye shes 
[\[130b.5\]]rdo rje dang /_pad+mo dmar po ye shes rdo rje dang /_dam tshig ye shes rdo rje dang /_mchod pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang /_rnal 'byor ma chen mo g.yog dang bcas pa rnams la 'di lta ste/_shin tu dga' ba'i dbang mo zhes bya ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang /_rmongs par byed pa'i dbang mo ye shes rdo rje dang /_gsod ces 
[\[130b.6\]]bya ba'i dbang mo ye shes rdo rje dang /_rdo rje dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang /_ye shes dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang /_rin chen dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang /_pad+ma'i dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang /_las kyi dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang /_
[\[130b.7\]]gnon par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang /_'jums par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang /_rmongs par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang /_rgyas 'debs par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang /_'dren par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang /_gsod par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang /_'bigs par 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang /_gcod par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang /_sdigs byed ces bya ba ye shes rdo rje dang /_tshig byed ces bya ba ye shes rdo rje dang /_yan lag thams cad 'phrog byed ye shes rdo rje dang /_'jib byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang /_khrag 
[\[131a.2\]]la dga' ma ye shes rdo rje dang /_gcod byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang /_pham byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang /_nam mkha' la 'gro ma ye shes rdo rje dang /_dag 'phrog ma ye shes rdo rje dang /_zas sha rlon za ba ye shes rdo rje dang /_srin mo ye shes rdo rje dang /_gnod sbyin ma ye 
[\[131a.3\]]shes rdo rje dang /_gnod byed ces bya ba ye shes rdo rje dang /_sbrul ye shes rdo rje dang /_seng ge ye shes rdo rje dang /_stag ye shes rdo rje dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]ye shes rdo rje dang /_phag ye shes rdo rje dang /_spre'u ye shes rdo rje dang /_khyi ye shes rdo rje dang /_byi la ye shes 
[\[131a.4\]]rdo rje dang /_ra ye shes rdo rje dang /_bya rog ye shes rdo rje dang /_wa ye shes rdo rje dang /_bya rgod ye shes rdo rje dang /_sre mo ye shes rdo rje dang /_mi'i keng rus dang /_'bu chen po'i ro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_gzig dang /_bong bu dang /_rta dang /_ma he dang /_
[\[131a.5\]]ba lang dang /_'ug pa dang /_rdo rje 'phrog par byed ma chen mo dang /_rdo rje zas 'dren ma chen mo dang /_de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang bcas pa/_chos kyi dbyings rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs g.yog dang bcas pa/_rdo rje'i 
[\[131a.6\]]rigs ye shes rdo rje dang /_ye shes kyi khro bo ye shes rdo rje dang /_ye shes kyi khro mo ye shes rdo rje dang /_sprul pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang /_sprul pa'i phra men ma ye shes rdo rje dang /_yang sprul ma chen mo ye shes rdo rje dang /_bdud rtsi lha mo ye shes rdo rje dang /_de dag la 
[\[131a.7\]]sogs te bye ba phrag brgya stong po rnams sgra ca co 'byin cing nam mkha' dbyings rab 'byam chen po'i tshogs rnams kyis mchod par byed cing /_bud med kyi dkyil na gsung brjod pa med par bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal che mchog he ru ka kun du 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa gdon mi za ba'i tshogs rdo rje gtong ba dbang mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rol pa chen pos rnam par rol pa/_sprul pa chen po'i gar dang /_glu dang /_sil snyan dang /_gzugs 
[\[131b.2\]]dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg pa'i bde ba chen po dang 'phags par 'gyur ba dang /_rol pa la sogs pa'i reg pa bde ba la spyod pa'i gar nye bar ston cing /_rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshogs kyi tshul chen po 'phags par 'gyur ba dang /_rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 
[\[131b.3\]]gnon pa dang /_rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spros pa dang /_gar byed pa dang /_za bar byed pa dang /_'jib par byed pa dang /_spras par byed pa dang /_zlog par byed pa dang /_myong bar byed pa dang /_'gyur bar byed pa dang /_'phrog par byed pa dang /_rtsom par byed pa dang /_
[\[131b.4\]]kun du 'debs par byed pa dang /_bde ba nye bar stobs shing reg pa ro'i bye brag mang po bye ba phrag brgya stong tshad med par nam mkha'i dbyings rdul phran las 'das par mnyam par 'jog pas nye bar gnas shing 'tsho skyong ste/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar 
[\[131b.5\]]byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mi gzigs/_dgongs pa nye bar mi 'jog_/thabs dang shes rab ston par mi mdzad/_shin tu 'gal ba phyin ci log pa la 'jog par mi mdzad/_nye bar 'jog par mi mdzad/_/ma dad pa rnams dad par yang mi mdzad/_ma
