[\[131b.6\]]dul ba rnam dul bar yang mi mdzad/_nye bar gtses pa rnams 'tshe ba zhi bar yang mi mdzad/_ma 'gags pa rnams 'gog par yang mi mdzad/_ma bskul ba rnams bskul bar yang mi mdzad/_ma rgyas pa rnams rgyas par yang mi mdzad/_rnam par rmongs 
[\[131b.7\]]pa rnams sel bar yang mi mdzad/_dga' bar 'gyur ba rnams mi dga' bar yang mi mdzad/_dga' bar ma gyur pa rnams dga' bar yang mi mdzad/_ma khros pa rnams khros par yang mi mdzad/_mi gdug pa gdug par yang mi mdzad/_'jigs byed 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]chen po dang /_drag po ma rungs pa chen po dang /_gtum po chen po dang /_lha dang lha ma yin dang /_log 'dren dang /_gdug pa chen po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_shin tu gdug pa'i gdug pa 
[\[132a.2\]]chen po dang /_tsha ba'i don dang /_nad dang /_sbrul dang /_sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar byed pa rnams nye bar zhi bar yang mi mdzad/_rnam par dul bar yang mi mdzad/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas dgongs pa nye bar bzhag ste/_
[\[132a.3\]]spyan gnyis mi 'dzums par gzigs nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la bskor zhing sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i phyag gis phyag byas nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen 
[\[132a.4\]]po'i dbyangs kyis bskul zhing gsol ba btab bo/_/rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun/_/rnam dag sras bcas byang chub rnams/_/yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]bsgoms nas shin tu gdungs/_/dga' ba'i yid kyis dgyes par mdzod/_/kye 'dod chags dri med kun 
[\[132a.5\]]du bzang po'i spyod pa ste/_/'dod chags dam tshig la ni phye mdzad nas/_/dka' ba drug spyad shin tu gsungs pa yis/_/'dod pa bde ba nyid kyis 'jig par mdzod/_/rnam dag rdo rje las byung ye shes chu/_/rin chen 'bar ba'i byang chub sems ni 
[\[132a.6\]]rab phyung nas/_/rgyal ba thams cad rnams kyi dbu ni skams pa la/_/dri med rin chen char gyis spyi bor dbang bskur mdzod/_/mnyam dang mi mnyam 'dod chags tshul dag pa/_/pad+ma'i gnas su rdo rje mdzod gtod pas/_/sna tshogs sems dpa' 
[\[132a.7\]]sems brlan brlag gyur pas/_/sbyor ba gzhan min ma rtogs bshad du gsol/_/rdo rje sems khyod dbang mchog bde ba byed pa'i mchog_/rdo rje pad+mo dbye ba'i tshul gyis sbyor mdzod de/_/rgyal ba kun gyi gzugs kyi sku ni rab btud nas/_/thams cad bde ba'i sgrub pa 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]nyid kyis mnyes par mdzod/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyangs kyis nges par bskul ba thugs su chud nas bzhengs te/_/brjid pa dang bcas pas gar mdzad cing /_
[\[132b.2\]]zhal 'dzum pa dang 'dor ba dang /_bskum pa dang /_'gying ba dang /_spyan mdzes pas smin ring bskyod cing bsgyur ba dang /_pad+mo phyag gis g.yas g.yon gar gyi phreng ba'i tshul gyis sa'i ngos la zhabs 'phen cing bsgyur ba dang /_'dor zhing bskum pa dang /_'jog cing 
[\[132b.3\]]'degs pa'i rnam par gnon pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab par mdzad de/_rlung gi khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_sa'i khams kun khyab par mdzad de/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems la kun du khyab par mdzad de/_sna 
[\[132b.4\]]tshogs dang /_phra ba dang /_sbom pa dang /_bud med dang /_gzhon nu dang /_rgan pa dang /_skyes pa dang /_skyes pa ma yin pa dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_skar ma dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu bdag dang /_brgya byin dang /_'byung ba dang /_'byung ba las 
[\[132b.5\]]gyur pa thams cad la bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos rgyas par byas te yang dag par gnas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/_yang 'dus nas phyag gar dang bcas nas thal mo sbyar nas bcom 
[\[132b.6\]]ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen po la spyi bos btud nas gsol ba btab pa/_bcom ldan 'das kun gyi gsang ba'i he ru ka chen po rol pa'i thig le 'di/_/gnyis med ye shes yang dag 'byung /_/bcom ldan khyod kyis bshad du gsol/_/sems can 
[\[132b.7\]]kun gyi ma skyes pa/_/skyes dang ma skyes rnam spangs pa'i/_/'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rab sbyor ba'i/_/mchog tu rtag pa'i sbyor ba'o/_/thams cad rin chen 'byung gnas dag_/nam mkha' dri med 'dra ba yi/_/rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng bya ste/_/rdo rje chen pos 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]dbang bskur ba'o/_/longs spyod chos ni yang dag 'byung /_/pad+mo'i mchog ni dmar po mdog_/'dod chags de nyid gsang ba che/_/bde byed thams cad bdud rtsi'i mchog_/la la ar ni don dang ldan/_/yang dag mdzes pa 'gying ba'i 'gros/_/
[\[133a.2\]]sa phyogs ye shes bde ba che/_/byang chub sems thig mchog nyid do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun du bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas 'gog pa chen po ye shes rdo rje 
[\[133a.3\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/_/yang 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po kun du bzang po chen po la de kho na nyid kyi dbyangs kyis bskul 
[\[133a.4\]]te bzhes par mdzad do/_/o~M AHhU~M/_mi skye ye shes bde mchog ro la mnams/_/sems dpa'i mchog nyid 'gog pa rnams las bslang /_/chags med kun du mya ngan 'das mdzad bzhengs shing mnams/_/mchog tu gsang ba'i dam bcas 'jig rten 
[\[133a.5\]]sgrol/_/byang chub skye gnas dbyings las gar mdzod cig_/sngon gyi nyon mongs rdo skams gzir ba yi/_/bde mchog rgyan dang ldan pa'i thabs kyis bskul te go bar mdzad/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[133a.6\]]cad kyi snying po chen po he ru ka rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_rang gis gsang ba'i thig le shin tu dgyes ba chen po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs phyung nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i thi le'i dbus su rgyas par 
[\[133a.7\]]byas te/_nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du snang bar byas te/_steng dang 'og tu yang bzhugs te/_ma lus lus pa med pa'i ril dang /_sems can thams cad la gsal bar byas nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i ro bde ma mnyes par byas nas slar de nyid du 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]slar log nas/_bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i snying po gsang ba mchog gi thig le'i dbus na bzhugs so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi phreng ba mchog tu bde bar gyur pa snying po des bskul ba ni gar mdzad cing rang rang gi 
[\[133b.2\]]ting nge 'dzin du dmigs nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen po'i thugs kyi dbus su mchog tu gsang ba shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde bar bsgrubs te/_sku rang gi bud med kyi tshul du bskyed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas mngon par 'byung bar gyur 
[\[133b.3\]]to/_/de la la la ni spyan pad+ma lta bur bsgyur cing smin dkyus ring /_/sangs rgyas tshul gyis gar mdzad pa'i/_/sangs rgyas rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor du/_/rab dgyes rdo rje gdon mi za/_/rdo rje sems la dgyes mdzad cing /_/bde ba'i sangs rgyas bde ba yis/_/bcom 
[\[133b.4\]]ldan sangs rgyas bzhugs par 'gyur/_/zhal bsgyur smin ma bsgyur ba yis/_/spyan yang bsgyur zhing shin tu gnon/_/sor mo rnams kyang rab bsgyur dang /_/rdo rje tshul gyis gar mdzad cing /_/sems dpa' che la mnyes par mdzad/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor 
[\[133b.5\]]ma dkyil du/_/sku ni skad cig bskul ba yis/_/bcom ldan rdo rje gnas par 'gyur/_/zhal ni brjid cing rin chen dbu/_/dri med spyi bor gar mdzad cing /_/dkyil 'khor zhal gyis rnam bsgyur ba/_/byang chub sems ni med par mdzad/_/dur khrod yon 
[\[133b.6\]]tan tshogs dag gis/_/pad+ma'i spyan gyis gzigs mdzad cing /_/bde ba'i bdag po chen po la/_/rin chen tshul gyis mnyes par mdzad/_/rab tu dgyes gsal bde ba yi/_/pad+ma dmar la che mdzad do/_/'dod chags bral zhi rab tu bsgyur/_/pad+ma'i 
[\[133b.7\]]dra bas 'brel ba yi/_/pad+ma'i rnal 'byor ma dkyil du/_/brjid pa'i spyan gyis kun gzigs pa'i/_/bde ba che la mnyes par mdzad/_/bcom ldan pad+mo gnas par 'gyur/_/phyag gi sor mo rtse mo mtha'/_/rnam par bsgyur bar gar mdzad cing /_/phyag 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]sbyar khong stong pad+ma yis/_/glog bzhin dpral nas spyi gtsug tu/_/mchod pa'i sprin gyis longs spyod pas/_/sna tshogs bde byed gtso nyid la/_/las kyi tshul gyis mnyes mdzad cing /_/bcom ldan sna tshogs gnas par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom 
[\[134a.2\]]ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba byang chub sems kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba thig le byang chub kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po shin 
[\[134a.3\]]tu dgyes pa bde ba chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/dkyil 'khor nyid kyi tshul gyis su/_/cho ga sbyor ba spros byas te/_/de dang mthun pa'i dkyil 'khor gdon/_/sbyor ba'i gar gyis gar byas shing /_/ci ltar yang dag brtag 
[\[134a.4\]]par bya/_/ci ltar dkyil 'khor de kho na/_/he ru ka dpal dkyil 'khor ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' bos kyang /_/brtag par nus pa ma yin no/_/dkyil 'khor ye shes kyis brtags pas/_/snying po phyag rgya sngags rig gis/_/lta yi sbyor ba rgyas btab 
[\[134a.5\]]pas/_/cho ga shes pas bri bar bya/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi ba/_/rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan/_/thig gis yongs su 'khor bar btab/_/dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhir ldan/_/kun du yongs su mu khyud bcas/_/phyi rol rdo rje ra bas bskor/_/de'i dbus 
[\[134a.6\]]su bcom ldan 'das che mchog he ru ka rigs bzhi he ru kas ni bskor/_/grwa bzhi shwa ri yum dang bcas/_/de'i phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu drug la ye shes khro mo bcu drug_/de'i phyi rim pad+ma bcu drug la sprul pa'i khro bo pha bcu drug_/de'i phyi rim pad+ma 
[\[134a.7\]]bcu drug la sprul pa'i phra men ma bcu drug de'i phyi rim snam bu gcig la yang sprul bcu drug_/de'i phyi rim snam bu gcig la yang zhe sprul bcu drug_/de'i phyi rol snam bu gcig la sman gyi lha mo sum cu rtsa gnyis/_/de'i phyi rim snam bu la bcom ldan 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]'das de kho na nyid kyi sku bsil dpag bsam gyi shing bzhin/_de'i rtsa ba na sman bdud rtsi lhag ma re re/_gser gyi me tog gzhon nu re re/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing bdud rtsi bum pa thogs nas sku khrus mdzad pa re re/_de'i phyi rim snam bu la dbang phyug ma 
[\[134b.2\]]las las grub pa/_mgo brnyan ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad dgod/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dgod pa'i don bzung zhing bka' stsal pa/_dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du/_/bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka/_/dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig la/_/
[\[134b.3\]]phyag ni bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so/_/zhabs brgyad lha chen pho mo mnan/_/glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon/_/zhing chen g.yang gzhi ya ba skor/_/sbrul nag chun pos dbu la brgyan/_/thod pa rlon pas se ral kha/_/stag lpags mgo chen sham thabs can/_/
[\[134b.4\]]khrag dang zhag gi tshom bur bcas/_/bder gshegs rigs bzhi he ru ka/_/khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag_/mi 'jigs sems can bzhi yi khri/_/smug nag sngo nag ser nag dang /_/dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/dbu gsum phyag drug 
[\[134b.5\]]zhabs bzhir bgrad/_/cha lugs mgo bo yab dang mthun/_/dbus kyi dbu gyen du lta ba'i zhal gyi nang du rdo rje bcug nas gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba tshul bzhin du mdzad cing bzhugs so/_/rigs kyi yum kun gtso bo yab dang mthun/_/ye shes las 
[\[134b.6\]]grub pa'i khro bo rdo rje thogs med dang /_khro bo rdo rje mdung dang /_khro bo rdo rje me dpal dang /_khro bo rdo rje mda' bsnyag dang /_khro bo rdo rje phur bu dang /_khro bo rdo rje tho ba dang /_khro bo rdo rje bya gri dang /_khro bo rdo rje rnon po dang /_khro bo rdo rje ral gri dang /_khro bo rdo rje zhags 
[\[134b.7\]]pa dang /_khro bo rdo rje gtun khung 'dzin dang /_khro bo rdo rje gzhu 'dzin dang /_khro bo rdo rje ral pa gcig pa dang /_khro bo rdo rje ye shes dang /_khro bo rdo rje lcags sgrog dang /_khro bo rdo rje rgya gram 'dzin dang /_khro mo rdo rje pad+ma b+h+r-i ku Ti dang /_khro mo rdo rje ral gcig ma 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]dang /_khro mo rdo rje rtse mo dang /_khro mo 'jigs su rung ma dang /_khro mo mi thub rdo rjes 'dul ba dang /_khro mo bkra shis ma dang /_khro mo dpal ldan ma dang /_khro mo pad+ma'i phreng thogs ma dang /_khro mo nor bdag ma dang /_khro mo grags ma dang /_khro mo grags chen mo dang /_khro 
[\[135a.2\]]mo rin 'od ldan ma dang /_khro mo pad+ma'i spyan mnga' ma dang /_khro mo zas sbyin ma dang /_khro mo bdud rtsi 'khyil ma dang /_khro mo rdo rje dur khrod ma dang /_sku mdog gcig tu ma nges te/_sna tshogs cir yang 'gyur ba'o/_/sprul pa'i 
[\[135a.3\]]khro bo 'di dag kyang sku mdog sna tshogs su 'gyur ba'o/_/khro bo hU~M ka ra dang /_khro bo rnam par rgyal ba dang /_khro bo nI la daN+Da dang /_khro bo ya mAn ta ka dang /_khro bo mi g.yo mgon dang /_khro bo ha ya grI ba dang /_khro bo Ta ki rA dza dang /_khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 
[\[135a.4\]]dang /_khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang /_khro bo ma hA ba la dang /_khro bo bsnyud kyi rgyal po dang /_khro bo zla ba'i gtso bo dang /_khro bo rdo rje khu tshur dang /_khro bo gom pa 'dor ba dang /_khro bo gnod sbyin rdo rje dang /_khro bo las thams cad pa dang /_khro mo 
[\[135a.5\]]sprul pa'i phra men ma dang /_rdo rje go'u ri dang /_rdo rje tso'u ri dang /_rdo rje pra mo ha dang /_rdo rje be tA li dang /_rdo rje puk+ka si dang /_rdo rje g+ha sma ri dang /_rdo rje sma sha ni dang /_rdo rje tsaN+Da li dang /_rdo rje sing ha mu kha dang /_rdo rje byA g+h+r-i mu kha dang /_rdo rje sri la mu kha dang /_rdo rje 
[\[135a.6\]]bra na mu kha dang /_rdo rje kri ta mu kha dang /_rdo rje kaM ka mu kha dang /_rdo rje khwa ka mu kha dang /_rdo rje U lu ka mu kha dang 'di rnams sku mdog gcig tu ma nges so/_/'di kun zhing bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs so/_/bdud rtsi lha mo de rnams kyang /_phyag mtshan rdo rje bum pa 
[\[135a.7\]]'dzin/_sku mdog dmar po pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan la sku lus glang po che'i cha byad du sprul nas mdzad/_/yang sprul chen mo seng ge lcam dral dang /_stag lcam dral dang /_wa lcam dral dang /_
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]spyang mo lcam dral dang /_bya rgod lcam dral dang /_kang ka lcam dral dang /_bya rog lcam dral dang /_'ug pa lcam dral dang /_'di dag kun gyi ye shes sprul pa'o/_/pha bang lcam dral dang /_zer mo lcam dral dang /_pho rog lcam dral dang /_skra ka lcam dral dang /_
[\[135b.2\]]khwa ta lcam dral dang /_byi la lcam dral dang /_spre'u lcam dral dang /_/khyi lcam dral dang /_sprul pa sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad do/_/las grub pa dbang phyug ma/_/byo mi'i srin mo dmar ser shing chen tri shU g.yag mgo ma/_/tshangs pa'i dmar skya 
[\[135b.3\]]b+han dmar rtse lnga sbrul mgo ma/_/khro bo khyab 'jug 'byung sdig snying 'dren gzig gi mgo_/khyab 'jug dkar dmar dung dmar byi zhags sre mo mgo_/gzhon nu ser mo rdo rje pha bang mgo_/dbang mo dmar skya bam chen khro chen dred kyi mgo_/dmar mo dung dmar 
[\[135b.4\]]rgyu zhags dmar mo dom gyi mgo_/bdud rtsi sngon mo rin chen chu srin mgo/_/zhi ba sngo skya bam chen snying 'byin stag gi mgo/_/be con nag mo bam chen thod rlon khra yi mgo/_/srin mo nag mo bam chen rgyu zhags wa yi mgo_/za byed nag mo bam chen snying 'byin stag 
[\[135b.5\]]gi mgo_/dga' byed nag mo khong chen bgegs rgyal bya rgod mgo_/khrag 'thung dmar mo rdo rje dbyug dung dmar rta'i mgo_/gcig pu dkar dmar nam mkha' lding gi mgo_/yid 'phrog dmar ser bzhis bsdus byi za khyi yi mgo_/grub ma dkar dmar 
[\[135b.6\]]sad ma byi za pu shud mgo_/rlung mo dmar ser ro za rdo rje sha ba'i mgo_/gsod byed skya ljang bam chen rde'u chung skye ka'i mgo_/me mo dmar ser mo srag rgyu 'dren skyin gyi mgo_/phag mo ljang nag rtse sbyin rlon dmar phag gi mgo_/dmar mo ljang sngon bdud rtsi'i 
[\[135b.7\]]khrag 'thung khra yi mgo_/sna chen ljang nag bam chen longs spyod ba lang mgo_/grub mo ljang ser bdud rtsi b+han dmar sbrul gyi mgo_/phag mo lcags kyu phu tra rdo rje khu byug ma/_ra ni ser mo rgyu zhags ra yi mgo_/bum sna dmar mo lcags sgrog kun 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]'joms seng ge'i mgo_/gsus 'dzin ser mo bdud rtsi dril chen gzig gi mgo_/sems can thams cad mchog dag dang /_/dgyes pa thams cad rab bsgrub phyir/_/nga yi de nyid gsung gis ni/_/dkyil 'khor de nyid bstan pa yin/_/
[\[136a.2\]]sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po/_/gang gis chud pas rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sems can mchog gi ston byed na/_/de nyid sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub/_/de nas bcom ldan gcig 'dus nas/_/rab tu spro ba'i spyan gdangs nas/_/zhabs dang zhabs kyis gnon pa 
[\[136a.3\]]yis/_/sdud cing 'dor ba 'jug par mdzad/_/g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis/_/brjid pa'i rtse mo mtha' nas dgrol/_/cung zad zur gyis gnon pa yis/_/mdzes pa'i spyi gtsug rnam bsgyur ba'i/_/spyan gyi phyag rgyas phyag mdzad pa'i/_/'gro la 
[\[136a.4\]]phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur/_/dpa' bo rdo rje sems dpa' la/_/bskul ba'i dbyangs kyis rab tu bskul/_/gsang ba dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor du/_/shin tu dgyes tshe rdo rje dag_/sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po/_/mchog tu dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor du/_/bcom 
[\[136a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_/rnam pa kun du skye med rol cing chud mdzad pa/_/bdag cag gzugs dang bcas te rnam spyod 'gyur med pa'i/_/bde mchog byang chub sems dpa' ni/_/rnam pa kun du sdug bsngal yongs bral te/_/che ba'i ye shes lhun grub 
[\[136a.6\]]mchog dang ldan/_/bde spyod de la rol pas tshul bzhin mdzad/_/rdo rje glu ni blangs pa yis/_/shin tu srid pa'i mya ngan 'das/_/dag chen de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/_/dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis brlabs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa dang bcas pas 
[\[136a.7\]]spyan ut+pa la kha bye ba bzhin/_smin ma dang sku rnam par sgyur ba/_glog dang chu rlabs su gyur pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las de kho na nyid 'di gsungs so zhes/_dkyil 'khor zhes ni rab tu bya/_/ye shes rdo rje thugs la gnas/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]rdo rje mchog nyid do/_/nyid kyi sbyor ba btags pa yin/_/rdo rje dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor du/_/'od zer dkar po phreng bas mdzes/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'dra ba'o/_/rdo rje dpa' bo dkyil 'khor du/_/zla ba kham pa mdzes pa yi/_/mthing ga 'bar ba kun rgyas pa/_/me 
[\[136b.2\]]la rlung gis bus pa bzhin/_/dgyes pa'i mchog ni rab bsgrub pa'i/_/rin chen rdo rje dkyil 'khor ni/_/dga' bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor yin/_/rab tu dga' ba nyi ma bzhin/_/dkyil 'khor dgyes mchog 'byung byed pa/_/dam pa'i dbang po pad+ma 'dra/_/'dab 
[\[136b.3\]]ma brgyad po dgyes pa yi/_/ge sar ze bas mdzes bya ba'o/_/las ni thams cad 'grub byed pa/_/rdo rje las kyi dkyil 'khor ni/_/dga' byed dkyil 'khor gru gsum ste/_/'bar ba chen po me dang 'dra/_/de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[136b.4\]]rnams ni brtag bya ste/_/rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yis/_/ci ltar de nyid sprul pa yin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs nas rdo rje brjid pa'i gar mdzad cing glu dang /_sil snyan dang /_gling bu dang /_pi wang dang /_rdza rnga dang /_du na wa 
[\[136b.5\]]dang /_pa na wa dang /_pa la ki dang /_zhi ba'i thal mos sogs pa kun du gdungs pa dang /_sil snyan la sogs pa rol pas lha'i ro dang /_ro'i zas dang /_bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_theg pa dang /_stan dang /_gos dang /_bldag pa dang /_
[\[136b.6\]]'jib pa dang /_'jam pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos bstabs nas gus pa dang bcas nas 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan gdangs te/_dbyangs 'dis bstod pa mdzad do/_/byams pas kun du gzigs pas thugs rje'i spyan/_grol bar 
[\[136b.7\]]mthun pa'i lam ston dug lngas 'brel/_/gzungs kyi rang bzhin bder gshegs kun la stobs/_/bde chen kun du rgyas pas che ba'i ye shes 'dren/_/sku nyid stong pas tshogs pa'i rgyal po bzhin/_/chos nyid bde ba reg pas sku nyid ston/_/byang chub bgrod 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]phyir chos kyi sgo mo bstan/_/gzungs bstan rigs lnga'i gtso bo rnams mdzad do/_/dgyes pa drongs la bsnams shing rol mo mdzad/_/bde ba bsnams shing dbyings nas bslang ba'i phyir/_/skye 'gag med pa'i tshul du rnam par ldan/_/snying rjer rgyun 
[\[137a.2\]]bcas bde ba chen po ston/_/chos nyid bde ba chen pos nam mkha' bzhin/_/bde ba mchog gi ngang las sprul pa'i lha mo kye/_/rol pas 'dus pa'i tshogs la stsal bar mdzod/_/bde la bsnams shing bde la mnos hU~M/_/bde mchog char pa rab tu dbab par 
[\[137a.3\]]gsol/_/dbyings las bder gshegs slob ma gzung du gsol/_/ci ltar bzhugs pa'i gnas su bzhugs su gsol/_/ngo mtshar byang chub tshe 'di bde ba thob/_/pha rol phyin drug gang la mi rten par/_/mi skye mya ngan 'das pa'i gzugs dang 
[\[137a.4\]]rnam par ldan/_/bde ba chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa yi/_/rmongs pa'i bde bas 'gro la snying rje che/_/byang chub sems kyi dgyes mchog mi chags pa'i/_/glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis/_/yid dang 'thad pa'i bde chen po/_/dngos grub myur du thob par 
[\[137a.5\]]'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa/_pad+ma dang 'dra ba'i spyan gnyis kyis kun du gzigs shing /_/'dzum pa dang bcas pas zhal rgyas par gyur 
[\[137a.6\]]nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phran gyi tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams mang po bskal bar rgyas pa'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho chen po snyed ma lus lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_rdo rje dang /_nor bu dang /_rin po che dang /_pad+mo dang /_las kyi rigs 
[\[137a.7\]]las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_rdo rje 'dzin dang /_rin chen 'dzin pa dang /_sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang /_rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs dang /_thugs las byung ba dang /_mtshon dang /_dga' ba dang /_sgeg mo 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]la sogs pa rnal 'byor g.yog gi tshogs tshad med par byed par 'dren pa dang /_'gugs par byed pa dang /_'jigs par byed pa la sogs pa'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang /_grags pa med pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje 'phrog par byed pa'i tshogs 
[\[137b.2\]]dang /_gzhan yang phyi rol gyi rdo rje dang /_rin chen pad+ma dang /_las kyi rigs las byung ba'i rnal 'byor pa dang /_rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang /_nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams la rnam par gyur pa dang bcas pa kun du gzigs pa'i spyan 
[\[137b.3\]]gyis gar mdzad ma dang /_kun du gnon pa dang /_tshogs kyis 'debs pa dang /_phyag na gar mdzad ma dang /_'gying ba dang /_kun du rnam par 'dor ba'i gnon pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la byin gyis brlabs nas dgyes pa'i gdon mi za ba zhes 
[\[137b.4\]]bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las gsungs pa/_de nyid bdag ni mnyam bzhag dang /_/de bzhin lha'i de bzhin nyid dang /_/sngags dang phyag rgya de bzhin nyid/_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog tu 'gyur/_/
[\[137b.5\]]yan lag thams cad bsam las 'das/_/yod med gnyis las mi gnas pa/_/'dren dang tshig las yang dag 'das/_/'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog ces bya'o/_/chos min chos ni rnam dpyod pas/_/chos rnams thams cad brtag par bya/_/
[\[137b.6\]]rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba yi/_/dkyil 'khor 'di ni bstan pa yin/_/'dod chags mi chags 'dod chags mnyam/_/chu yi pad+mo dmar ba 'dra/_/rang sems 'dod chags shin tu chags/_/'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no/_/gzugs 
[\[137b.7\]]med gzugs ni dri med pa'i/_/khams gsum las ni 'jug byed pa'i/_/sems ni chu nyid dang ba bzhin/_/dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad g.yog dang bcas/_pho nya dang /_pho nya mo dang /_nam mkha' 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang /_yang bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po bzhengs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye ma rab dgyes dpa' ba mchog_/kye ma rab bgegs phyogs bsgyur ba/_/rnal 'byor chen po tshogs mchog ni/_/gsang ba'i 
[\[138a.2\]]dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsungs/_/sangs rgyas sbyor ba rab tu zab/_/rdo rje spyod pa bla na med/_/'jig rten gsum po bde thob pa'i/_/dkyil 'khor gsang ba nyid kyis gsungs/_/pad+mo rin chen sna tshogs che/_/thabs kyis sbyor ba gar mdzad pa/_/rnam 
[\[138a.3\]]grangs sems kyi 'jig rten du/_/bde chen dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsungs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_thams cad gar dang bcas pa'i phyag_/sor mo 'dab ma kun du 'brel/_/rdo rje thal mo gar rnams bsgyur/_/brjid bag dag tu rab tu bcas/_/
[\[138a.4\]]grol zhing ma mchu tshems kyis mnan/_/chu skyes 'dab ma bzhin du gzigs pas bshad/_/dbyangs len pa dang gcig la gcig bskul dang /_/snang zhing kun du ma chags par/_/chags med bde ba mchog gis ni/_/bde ba'i rnal 'byor gzugs kyis rnams/_/
[\[138a.5\]]stobs zhing bde ba sbyin mdzad pa/_/nam mkha'i rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/stobs shing bzhengs te grub par mdzod/_/chags pas rab tu mi gos pa'i/_/bde ba reg cing dgongs su gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen 
[\[138a.6\]]po dgyes pa chen pos bskul bas thugs sad par gyur te/_shin tu dgyes nas rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du shin tu dgyes pa'i rdo rje dbyangs 
[\[138a.7\]]kyis mgur len cing /_rdo rje rnam par rol pa yis/_bcom ldan 'das dgyes bzhad pas bzhad cing /_nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gsang ba'i thugs ka nas ma hA su kha hU~M zhes brjod/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag mo ye 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]shes kyi dbyings dbang phyug ma 'di phyung ngo /_/zla gam steng du ldan pa yi/_/ye shes gnyis po ma lta bu/_/thig le mtshan du ldan byas nas/_/gsal ba ye shes rnal 'byor ma/_/A li kA li 'dren byas ma/_/ri mo dbus su brtag byas te/_/de yi mgo dang 
[\[138b.2\]]mjug nyid du/_/khro bo gnyis po mchog pos bya/_/'di ni btsun mo rab gsang ba'i/_/rdo rje dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor ma'i/_/dran pa tsam gyis 'di dag kyang /_/bsod nams kun gyis byin brlabs 'gyur/_/A li gnyis dbus ri mo bri/_/'dren pa 
[\[138b.3\]]yang dag ldan pa ste/_/steng du zla gam thig ler dga'/_/mgo mjug tu yang gzhan yang bri/_/'di ni gsal ba'i don dam ste/_/rnal 'byor rin chen dbang bskur sbyin/_/bstan pas bsod nams thob 'gyur te/_/sdig pa rnams kyang 'jig par byed/_/
[\[138b.4\]]A li gnyis dang ldan bya ste/_/tsheg drag yi ge gnyis su bshad/_/'di ni rab 'gal kun du chags/_/chu srin ma zhes bstan pa yin/_/dang po bskal pa chen po yi/_/tsheg drag po dang bcas par bzhag_/sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed/_/bdag 
[\[138b.5\]]nyid la ma bzhag yang rung /_/phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste/_/bsgrub bya dkyil 'khor sgrub byed na/_/dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/_/dkyil 'khor dam pa rnams kyi mchog_/ye shes phyag rgya mngon gnas pa'i/_/'dzin pa'i bsod nams ci 
[\[138b.6\]]'dra ba'i/_/bris pa yis kyang khyab par 'gyur/_/e ma'o bde ba ye shes che/_/'di ni ye shes sku 'di la/_/gnod byed pa ni bsten byed cing /_/'di yi tshul gyis thob par 'gyur/_/khams gsum mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir/_/'di las rgya 
[\[138b.7\]]chen gzhan med do/_/sgrub pa po dang sems can kun/_/tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grub/_/che mchog he ru ka gsang ba 'di bcom ldan 'das dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor rgyas pa mchog tu gsang ba las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]btsun mo rnams kyi gsang ba chen po rnal 'byor ma dbang phyug chen mo rnams kyis mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ngo mtshar du gyur te/_dgyes pa'i yid ches 
[\[139a.2\]]pa dang /_mgu ba dang /_yid dga' ba skyes nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje bzhad pas mdzad cing /_yang he ru ka'i sku mdog ni sna tshogs pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das che mchog he ru ka zhabs brgyad phyag mtshan sna tshogs pa'o/_/de las spros nas phyag stong spyan stong gis/_stong gsum gyi stong 
[\[139a.3\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa na/_/shin tu mi srun pas gdug pa nga rgyal che zhing dregs pa can thams cad la badzra dza li'i sgra sna tshogs 'od zer du gyur te/_de las spros pas rigs bzhi he ru ka dregs pa 
[\[139a.4\]]can thams cad tshar gcod pa'i phyir/_rak+Sha he ru ka nyon mongs ba'i dug gsum dbang du sdud cing 'joms pa'i phyir rak+Sha he ru ka_/ye shes kyi don dang ldan pa'i phyir byi sha he ru ka_/dam tshig las mi 'da' ba'i phyir sa ma ya he ru ka_/de las 'phros pas he ru ka 
[\[139a.5\]]stong rtsa brgyad/_sku mdog dang phyag mtshan cir yang sprul nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad do/_/kro d+hi shwa ri sku mdog sna tshogs pa'o/_/dbu dgu phyag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad/_zhabs bzhi phyag cha sna tshogs pa'o/_/zhabs brgyad rdo rje 'bar ba me dpung gi nang na/_he ru ka bzhi zhabs bzhis mnan 
[\[139a.6\]]pa/_badzra he ru ka_/pad+ma'i sbubs su dpral ba'i spyan phyed tsam nub par bzhugs pa/_shin tu rngam pa'i khro mo dbu'i steng na he ru ka zhabs brgyad kyis khro mo dbu brgyad mnan pa yang dbus kyi gyen du bltas pa'i zhal ni nang du rdo rje bcug nas gnyis su med par sbyor zhing 
[\[139a.7\]]byang chub kyi sems yum gyi sku la bstims/_/byang chub kyi sems kyi rigs kyi he ru ka zhabs 'og tu mnan pa yang gnyis su med par sbyar zhing byang chub kyi sems 'bebs/_badzra dza li'i sgra sna tshogs pas rab tu g.yos par gyur te/_'jig rten gyi lha chen po rnam 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]par rab tu skrag nas skyabs su gsol lo/_/mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol te/_rdo rje 'bar ba me dpung gis/_/bskal pa bas kyang bsreg mdzad cing /_/'jigs chen rngam pa'i khyad par can/_/dbu mang bsgrub pa'i tshig sgrogs shing /_/phyag mang 'jigs pa'i 
[\[139b.2\]]mtshon cha bsnams/_/zhi ba'i phyag stong spyan stong yang /_/'jig rten rab tu spa bkong na/_/khro gnyer phyag stong spyan stong yang /_/rgod dang gshe zhing za byed pa/_/'bar ba'i mtshon cha sna tshogs can/_/'jig rten thal bar rlog mdzad pa/_/khro chen khyod la skyabs 
[\[139b.3\]]su mchi/_/ma dang sring mo bu mo dang /_/chung ma slas 'di rnams phul nas skyabs su gsol lo/_/chags pa med pa'i dbang gi thabs kyi sbyor bas dbang bsdus te/_dam tshig dang ming btags lag tu rdo rje byin nas rdo rje 'chang gi gral du dgod do/_/de nas bcom 
[\[139b.4\]]ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po he ru ka rol pa chen po'i don gyi gsang ba rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes rgyal po sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rol pa 'di phyung ngo /_/dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad ni/_/gru bzhi sgo bzhi mu khyud bcas/_/thig gis yongs su 'khor 
[\[139b.5\]]bar btab/_/dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri/_/dbus kyi pad+ma'i snying po la/_/bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka/_/shar du badzra he ru ka/_/lho ru rata na he ru ka/_/nub tu pad+ma he ru ka/_/byang du kar ma he ru ka/_/shar lhor rak+sha he ru ka/_/lho nub yak+Sha he ru ka/_/nub byang 
[\[139b.6\]]byi sha he ru ka/_/byang shar sa ma ya he ru ka/_/bder gshegs yum dang bcas pa dgod/_/de'i phyi rim snam bu la ye shes las grub pa'i phra men ma bcu drug dgod/_de yi phyi rim sgo bzhi thod pas bskor/_/gshin rje 'joms dang stobs po che/_/rta mgrin dang 
[\[139b.7\]]ni bdud rtsi 'khyil/_/sgo bzhi dag tu rim bzhin no/_/sku dang phyag mtshan cir yang 'gyur te gcig tu ma nges pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po de kho na nyid sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]he ru ka dbu lnga phyag bcu drug pa/_gshog pa rdo rjes gtams pa/_zhabs brgyad chas dang brgyan cing /_phra men ma bcu drug gi 'khor dang /_dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor nas bzhugs te sprul pa las bcom ldan 
[\[140a.2\]]'das rta mchog chags pa chen po rak+ta dang /_rus gong gsar snying gi nang na thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du zhing bsnol ma'i gdan khri la bzhugs so/_/dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhis klu chen po rnams brdzis pa/_rdo rje brag ris gtams pa rdo rje me phung 
[\[140a.3\]]'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs pa/_dbu gtsug nas rta mgo ljang gu lnga byung ba/_sbrul nag gi chun po stag lpags kyi sham thabs bgos pa/_thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa/_zhing bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs pa/_bcom ldan 'das rta mchog chags pa chen pos 
[\[140a.4\]]'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/hU~M nub phyogs sangs rgyas zhing khams nas/_/de nyid rang snang mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor na/_/bde ba chen po dpal 'bar mchog gi lha/_/'du 'bral med pa thugs rje dbang gi lha/_/dbang mchog ngo mtshar rngom brjid dbang gi lha/_/
[\[140a.5\]]dpal chen pad+ma'i thugs ni rin po che/_/khro bor ston kyang zhi ba'i cha lugs can/_/snying rje yum gyi mkha' la sprul pa sna tshogs cir 'gyur yang /_/'gro ba'i don du dpal chen bzhengs su gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rta mgrin de nyid/_yul la ma 
[\[140a.6\]]chags brag phug dgon pa/_zas la ma chags rtswa'i rtsa ba/_gos lam chags shing gi shun pa/_skom la ma chags brag gi thigs pa/_brag ri mi brten shing la brten/_shing la mi brten chu la brten/_chu'i snying po 'tsher ba gcig tu sprul nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad do/_/ha ya 
[\[140a.7\]]grI ba rta mchog dpal/_sku mdog dmar po stag gi sham thabs can/_/sbrul nag stong gis brgyan pas brjid chags pas dbu skra kham nag ral pa mun tsa cod pan can/_dbu'i gtsug nas bdud rtsi rnam sprul pa/_/smin mtshams sna brag kun nas 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]glog stong 'phro/_/dbu'i gtsug nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bskyed nas ni/_/snyan nas sgra byung 'brug skad ldir/_/spyan nas me byung khams gsum sreg_/shangs nas rlung 'byung 'jig rten 'thor/_/zhal nas khrag 'dzag rgya mtshor 'khyil/_/ma mo dam can 
[\[140b.2\]]rnams kyang dam la 'du/_/rta skad theng gsum 'tsher bas srid pa dbang du sdud/_/rta bro theng gsum brdungs pas bdud bzhi zil gyis mnan/_/pad+ma rgyal po rta mchog dpal/_/dkar po'i mdog la dmar po'i zhal/_/sku mdog mthing ga'i khro gnyer can/_/snyan 
[\[140b.3\]]ni dung gi khong seng can/_/mu med khams ni ci mchis gsan/_/spyan gnyis nyi zla'i phrugs su bcas/_/khams gsum dag ni ci mchis gzigs/_/rtog pa mtshon gyi lcang lo can/_/rnga ma lcags kyi g.yab mos 'debs/_/shangs nas me phung 'bar ba'i tshub ma 
[\[140b.4\]]'thor/_/zhal nas mi bzad lcags kyi ser chen 'bebs/_/g.yas pa gsum po ba dan 'phyar/_/g.yon pa sdigs pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng /_/ge'u ri gshog pa gsang ba'i phyag rgya yis/_/na ba rnams ni sos par byed/_/rta skad bzhad la rta bro brdung /_/rta 
[\[140b.5\]]skad chen po thang gcig gis/_/klu rgyal ris drug dbang du sdud/_/rta skad chen po thang gcig gis/_/ma tshogs dbang phyug dbang du sdud/_/rta skad chen po thang gcig gis/_/bgegs kyi tshogs rnams dbang du sdud/_/rta bro lan gsum brdungs pa yis/_/
[\[140b.6\]]bdud bzhi kun kyang zil gyis gnon/_/dpag tshad 'og na bdud gnas pa/_/klad du rgyob la thal bar rlogs/_/yab gcig re byams rta mchog dbang /_/rta rkun tshul du gar byed kyis/_/gar gyi brda la da tshur spyon/_/rta rkun tshul du spyugs 'dor gyis/_/
[\[140b.7\]]spyugs pa'i rta la da tshur spyon/_/rta rkun tshul du g.yab 'dor gyis/_/g.yab mo brda la da tshur spyon/_/hU~M gis rgyu drug rtsa nas gcod/_/phrin las zhi bar mdzod cig rta mchog dbang /_/srid gsum 'gran zla med pa rgyal ba'i mthu/_/che btsan kun las 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]'phags pas pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug che/_/gar mkhan sgyu 'phrul kun las thabs kyi rgyal por grags/_/byams ldan gar gyi dbang gis phrin las [(]mdzog[,]mdzod[) ]/rtag tu grub mchog re zhing 'bod 'grogs na/_/byams ldan mgon po bdag la 
[\[141a.2\]]ci phyir thugs mi brtse/_/lta mchog bdag gis 'bad kyang 'bras bu ma mchis na/_/ye shes lha mchog khyod kyis thugs rjer rung lags sam/_/dngos grub stsol bar mi dmigs kyang /_/sngon gyi thugs dam dbang gis dngos grub stsol/_/yum chen e ka/_/
[\[141a.3\]]dza Ti ma/_/ral pa gcig mas de skad bskul lo/_/yang yab kyis bskul ba 'khyud par bsten pa'i rnal 'byor ma/_/bdud kyi yum la gshin rje'i lcam/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma/_/dpal ldan chen mo re ma ti/_/ma chen e ka dza Ti ma/_/gu h+ya 
[\[141a.4\]]gsang chen ral gcig ma/_/re ta chen mo tsa mun Ta/_/srin mo dkar mo chen mo'i tshogs/_/dpal ldan rdo rje dam shin ti/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi rnam rgyal dpal/_/yi dam rgyal mo g.yu 'phro ma/_/las la 'khril cing chos la bstan/_/dbu rnams 'byin cing 
[\[141a.5\]]'dud pa'i tshul/_/gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/_/de nas snying po dran tsam gyis/_/pad+ma ta krid ha ya gri ba/_hu lu hu lu/_e A ra li hring hring hring /_e ka dza Ti sa ma ya hU~M/_ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/_sngags kyi phyag rgya sbyor ba yis/_/dbyings gsum rnam par 
[\[141a.6\]]dag pas bsgrub/_de nas skyo nas bsdu ba ni/_/hU~M hU~M zhes ni rab brjod de/_/phyag rgya chen po sku gnyis ni/_/sang ha ra na hU~M zhes rab tu brjod/_/yab kyang yum la bsdu/_/yum yang chos kyi dbyings su bsdu/_/bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po dang /_/kho na 
[\[141a.7\]]nyid kyi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor ni/_/cha ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya/_/dkyil 'khor dbang gi rang bzhin dmar po ni/_/dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya/_/pad+mo'i snying po la bcom ldan 'das dpal rta mgrin dbu 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]gsum phyag drug la shar gyi pad+ma la badzra he ru ka_/lhor rat+na he ru ka_/nub tu pad+ma he ru ka_/byang du kar ma he ru ka_/mtshams bzhir yum bzhi/_de'i phyi rim du ko'u rim brgyad dang /_/sing ha ma brgyad dang bcu drug_/sgo bzhi sgo khyud dang bcas pa'o/_/sgo bzhi rim 
[\[141b.2\]]bzhin dang mthun/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po de kho na nyid rab gsang ba'i thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud/_/za byed chen mo tshogs kyi bdag_/yon tan phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa/_/rdo rje shugs can dang /_rdo rje 'jigs 
[\[141b.3\]]su rung ba dang /_rdo rje grags pa dang /_rdo rje snying po dang /_rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dang /_rdo rje gsus po che dang /_rdo rje gad mo dang /_rdo rje gad rgyangs can dang /_rdo rje grags can dang /_rdo rje ha ha gad mo can dang /_rdo rje he he grags chen dang /_rdo rje bgegs gnon pa'i rgyal po 
[\[141b.4\]]dang /_rdo rje gshin rje gshed po can dang /_rdo rje las kyi bdag po dang /_rdo rje mi g.yo mgon po dang /_rdo rje bsgyings pa dang /_rdo rje glang po che dang /_rdo rje ko ba rlon pa dang /_rdo rje sems dpa' chen po dang /_rdo rje rgyal po dang /_rdo rje mig mi zad dang /_rdo rje bde 
[\[141b.5\]]ba dang /_rdo rje so'i phreng ba can dang /_rdo rje dung chen dang /_rdo rje khu tshur dang /_rdo rje ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje g.yab mo dang /_rdo rje dga' ba dang /_rdo rje 'degs pa dang /_rdo rje hU~M chen dang /_rdo rje mda' dang /_rdo rje gzhu bdungs dang /_rdo rje ral gri dang /_rdo rje rdo rje 
[\[141b.6\]]dang /_rdo rje g.yul zlog dang /_rdo rje 'bar ba dang /_rdo rje sa dang /_rdo rje chu dang /_rdo rje me dang /_rdo rje rlung dang /_rdo rje nam mkha' dang /_rdo rje yang dag dang /_rdo rje sgra 'bar dang /_rdo rje 'bebs pa dang /_rdo rje mig brgya ma dang /_rdo rje ba spu ma dang /_rdo rje sen 
[\[141b.7\]]mo skyes pa dang /_rdo rje zangs kyi pags pa can dang /_rdo rje lcags kyi mche ba can dang /_rdo rje spu gri so can dang /_rdo rje pags pa mkhregs pa dang /_rdo rje phreng ba thogs pa dang /_rdo rje rgyan pa dang /_rdo rje rnon po dang /_rdo rje kI la ya dang /_rdo rje dpal 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]ldan pa dang /_rdo rje rnam par dag pa'i snying po dang /_rdo rje za byed dang /_rdo rje 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang /_rdo rje chen po dang /_rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug dang /_rdo rje smra ba dang /_rdo rje skyes mchog dang /_rdo rje seng ge dang /_rdo rje kun du lta ba dang /_rdo rje mchog 
[\[142a.2\]]tu dga' ba dang /_rdo rje gzi brjid dang /_rdo rje 'od [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_rdo rje grags pa dang /_rdo rje snang ba po dang /_rdo rje sku dang /_rdo rje gsung dang /_rdo rje thugs dang /_rdo rje 'od gsal ba dang /_rdo rje sprin rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rdo rje char pa ston dang /_rdo rje rnal 'byor chen po dang /_
[\[142a.3\]]rdo rje rin chen kun bdag dang /_rdo rje 'chang ba po dang /_rdo rje nyi ma dang /_rdo rje snang ba dang /_rdo rje zla ba dang /_rdo rje dri ma med pa dang /_rdo rje chags pa bral ba dang /_rdo rje skyil krung dang /_rdo rje 'od po che dang /_rdo rje pad+ma skyes pa dang /_rdo rje thams cad kun mkhyen dang /_rdo rje 
[\[142a.4\]]mdzod 'dzin pa dang /_rdo rje pha rol phyin pa dang /_rdo rje rab tu ldan pa dang /_rdo rje rnam par dag pa dang /_rdo rje 'khor lo dang /_rdo rje gshog pa can gyi tshogs dang /_rdo rje nu ma can gyi tshogs dang /_rdo rje sder mo can gyi tshogs dang /_rdo 
[\[142a.5\]]rje mche ba can gyi tshogs dang /_rdo rje bzhad pa dang /_rdo rje ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /_rdo rje sprul pa'i sku dang /_rdo rje rgyud 'chang ba po dang /_rdo rje phyogs bcur sprul pa dgyes pa po dang /_rdo rje don byed pa po dang /_rdo rje lha'i dbang po dang /_rdo rje lha min 
[\[142a.6\]]bdag po dang /_rdo rje 'chi med lha'i dbang po dang /_rdo rje 'joms par byed pa dang /_rdo rje chos kyi sbyin bdag dang /_rdo rje byams pa dang /_rdo rje shes rab rnon po dang /_rdo rje thog thog lcags kyi gsor chen 'bebs pa dang /_rdo rje teg teg stong gsum 'gyed pa dang /_
[\[142a.7\]]rdo rje thib thib myos par byed pa dang /_rdo rje 'ur 'ur 'brug sgra sgrogs pa dang /_rdo rje chem chem gnan lcags 'bebs pa dang /_rdo rje yud tsam glog 'byin pa dang /_rdo rje shig shig khams gsum bsgul ba dang /_rdo rje ye shes 'bog byed dang /_rdo rje mi srung 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]smyang bar byed pa dang /_rdo rje kha T+wAM rgyal bar byed pa dang /_rdo rje dbang phyug sdigs shing sdang bar byed pa dang /_rdo rje sbrul gyi zhags pa dang /_rdo rje gnod sbyin srog gcod pa dang /_rdo rje khrag 'thung snying khrag 'thung ba dang /_rdo rje dpal snying sreg pa dang /_rdo rje mdung thung 
[\[142b.2\]]'bugs par byed pa dang /_rdo rje khrag za bar byed pa dang /_rdo rje tshil za bar byed pa dang /_rdo rje rkang za bar byed pa dang /_rdo rje sha za bar byed pa dang /_ye shes las sprul pa'i khro bo 'di rnams kyang 'thung bar byed/_zhal du 'dren par byed/_mkha' la rlom par 
[\[142b.3\]]byed/_zhal du rngub cing za bar byed/_dbang du sdud cing tshar gcod par byed/_tho bas rdeg par byed/_phur bus 'debs par byed/_ral gris gcod par byed/_be con gyis rdung bar byed/_'khor los lus gtub par byed/_dgra stas gsheg par byed/_rdo rjes mgo 
[\[142b.4\]]mjug med par rdeg par byed/_rdo rje rgya gram gyis phyed tshal du byed/_rdo rje mdas gting 'bugs par byed/_mtshon spu gri ma las gsheg cing dral bar byed cing lcags kyus 'gugs par byed/_zhags pas 'ching bar byed/_lcags sgrog gis sdom 
[\[142b.5\]]par byed/_rdo rje rgya gram phyed kyis dbang du bsdus nas las thams cad grub par byed do/_/rdo rje mtshon cha'i sngags so/_/o~M bi shwa badzra kro ng+ha dz+wa la maN+Da la phaT phaT/_ha la ha la hU~M/_badzra dza man tra suM b+ha ni/_o~M bru~M hU~M bru~M tru~M bru~M hi bru~M ha bru~M/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT 
[\[142b.6\]]phaT phaT phaT phaT/_grangs nges pa 'dir bstan to/_/lan grangs nyi shu rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_de skad ces rdo rje mtshon cha'i char 'debs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las tshe bsgrub pa 'di phyung ngo /_/
[\[142b.7\]]dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad ni/_/chag ni dgu yi tshad du bya/_/thig gis yongs su 'khor bar gdab/_/dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bri/_/'khor lo dag gi lte ba la/_/bcom ldan kun du bzang po bri/_/shar du rdo rje sems dpa' bri/_/lho 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]ru rin chen 'byung ldan bri/_/nub tu snang ba mtha' yas bri/_/byang du don yod grub pa bri/_/phyi rim rdo rje ra bas bskor/_/grwa bzhir dgod par bya ba ni/_/shar du rdo rje dbyings phyug bri/_/lho ru rin chen dbyings phyug bri/_/nub tu pad+ma dbyings phyug bri/_/byang 
[\[143a.2\]]du las kyi dbyings phyug bri/_/de yi phyi rim snam bu la/_/sgo bzhi sgo khyud bcas par dgod/_/sgo bzhi ni dkyil 'khor gzhan dang mthun/_de rnams kyang phyag mtshan tshe'i bum pa re re 'dzin cing bsnams pa/_gdan pad+ma la bzhugs pa sha dag go/_/de nas tshe 
[\[143a.3\]]dbub par bya ba dang /_tshe gshin rje nag po'i lag nas dbrog pa dang /_/tshe gang g.yab pa dang /_tshe bcing zhing bsdams pa dang /_tshe dbang du bsdu ba dang /_tshe yongs su spel ba dang /_tshe rgyas par bya ba dang /_tshe ring zhing bdud kyis bar mi chod par bya ba dang /_
[\[143a.4\]]tshe sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob par bya ba/_tshe skye shi med pa'i 'bras bu chos lhun gyis grub pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos lha mo lcags kyu thogs pa grangs med pa spros nas/_/o~M bru~M badzra A yu she hU~M zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[143a.5\]]bdud gshin rje nag po'i snying dral te/_shog shog skya bo rlung gis btab pa bzhin/_dun dun khyar khyar 'ong ba de la gshin rje'i co to nas bzung nas 'drad kyis bsgyel te/_rdo rje snying gar bzhag nas/_lag pa nas hur gyis phrogs nas/_tshe'i g.yab dar 
[\[143a.6\]]dang /_phyag rgyas g.yab pa dang /_ri rab rtse la sbas pa/_rgya mtsho'i gting du sbas pa/_bar snang gi khams la sbas pa/_phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad steng 'og bcu nas bkug cing tshe blangs te zhags pa'i tshogs kyis bcings/_lcags sgrog gi 
[\[143a.7\]]tshogs kyis bsdams nas dbang du bsdus te/_rgya cher yongs su spel bar bya'o/_/o~M bru~M badzra A yu she badzra hU~M a zhes brjod pas/_bde bar gshegs pa lnga'i phyag rgyas bstan nas rgyas par bya'o/_/oM badzra d+ha ra/_rad na d+ha ra/_pad+ma d+ha ra/_karma d+ha ra/_
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]ta thA ga tA/_sa ma ya ti/_ya ma ya ti kra sa ma ya ya d+ha ra ko\u0f85ha~M zhes brjod pas bdud gshin rje nag po'i lag nas tshe phrogs te/_gshin rje yang brgyal zhing sngangs nas bsgral zhing rdo rje khrag 'thung chen pos snying khrag 'thungs te/_tshe'i bar chod byas te/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye/_
[\[143b.2\]]ma hA pu N+ye/_a ba ra mi ta A yu pu N+ya/_dz+nyA na sam+b+ha ro pa tsi te swA hA/_zhes bzlas pas/_sku rdo rje dang /_gsung rdo rje dang /_thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub thob pa dang /_tshe srog gi snying po/_o~M bru~M badzra A yu she badzra hU~M a zhes bzlas pas/_tshe skye shi med pa'i g.yung 
[\[143b.3\]]drung gi sku tshe thob bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas tshe'i las 'di gsungs so/_/dbang phyug gtso dang rigs kyi yum/_/yang dag gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/_/bde ba chen pos yongs brgyan te/_/dkyil 'khor rdzogs par phun sum 
[\[143b.4\]]ldan/_/rdo rje sems gtso mnyes mdzad pa/_/gnas 'dir brtse phyir gshegs su gsol/_/a~M e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni kA tri sha ho/_sa ma ya sta~M/_dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/_brtan par bzhugs pa/_ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs/_/yon tan phrin las rmad po che/_/
[\[143b.5\]]de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor ba'i/_/phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig_/o~M badzra sa ma ya o~M/_a~M badzra sa ma ya a~M/_hU~M badzra sa ma ya hU~M/_swA badzra sa ma ya swA/_ha~M badzra sa ma ya ha~M/_las la bzhugs pa/_o~M shar gyi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/_/rdo rje lha 
[\[143b.6\]]mo dkar mo lcags kyu dza/_/tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig_/dkar mo zhi byed mgyogs ma 'od 'phro can/_/tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas/_/tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang du sdud/_/bru~M badzra A yu badzra a~M gu sha dzaHdzaHdzaH/_lho 
[\[143b.7\]]yi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/_/ser mo yid bzhin glog phreng 'dzin/_/phyag na rin chen sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams/_/tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas/_/tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang du sdud/_/nub kyi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma/_/
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]dmar mo bkra gsal dbang sdud ma/_/phyag na chu srin rgyal mtshan bsnams/_/tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas/_/tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang du sdud/_/byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/_/nag mo mig gcig ral pa can/_/dung 
[\[144a.2\]]gi tshems la lcags kyi spu/_/phyag na rdo rje rgya gram bsnams/_/tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas/_/tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang du sdud/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyings phyug ma rnams bskul ba/_/dbyings phyug mkha' ldan pad+ma'i dbyings/_/phyag rgya 
[\[144a.3\]]bde mchog dbyings kyi yum/_/ye shes sprul pa'i phyag rgya ma/_/dbyings su mkha' la tshe dang gzi brjid drongs/_/badzra aM gu sha hU~M dzaH/_stong gsum dbyings la tshe yi mnga' brnyes pa/_/khams gsum ma lus dbang sdud ma/_/zhing la rngam zhing brkam stobs can/_/stong 
[\[144a.4\]]gsum dbyings nas tshe dang gzi brjid drongs/_/dbyings ma dkar dang rkun mo gnyis med tshogs/_/bde chen rmongs byed thal byed ma/_/gtum mo dbyings su sgrol mdzad snying 'byin ma/_/dpal chen rgyal mo dgyes pa'i 'khor/_/dung phreng chen mo 'khor dang bcas/_/
[\[144a.5\]]tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas/_/dbyings su mkha' la tshe dang gzi brjid drongs/_/log par lta byed bdud dpung 'dul mdzad ma/_/'dod khams ma dang gnyis med rol pa'i sras/_/dbang phyug phra men 'bar ba'i tshogs/_/tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed 
[\[144a.6\]]kun bsgral nas/_/gshin rje lag nas tshe dang gzi brjid drongs/_/shar gyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/_/tshe yi lha mo lcags kyu ma/_/phyag na shel gyi bum pa bsnams/_/tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed sgrol bar byed/_/lho yi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/_/tshe yi lha 
[\[144a.7\]]mo zhags pa ma/_/phyag na mthing shing bum pa bsnams/_/tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed 'ching bar byed/_/nub kyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/_/tshe yi lha mo lcags sgrog ma/_/phyag na zangs kyi bum pa bsnams/_/tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed sdom par byed/_/
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/_/tshe yi lha mo dril bu ma/_/phyag na g.yu yi bum pa bsnams/_/tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed dbang du sdud/_/steng gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/_/tshe yi lha mo dbyings phyug ma/_/phyag na dngul gyi bum pa bsnams/_/tshe la gnod cing 
[\[144b.2\]]'gal byed dbang du sdud/_/'og gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/_/tshe yi lha mo bstan ldan ma/_/phyag na gser gyi bum pa bsnams/_/tshe la gnod byed lus dbang du sdud/_/o~M bru~M badzra A yu yud te rad na yu ti/_d+harma yu ti/_karma yu ti/_bru~M badzra A yu she hU~M a/_
[\[144b.3\]]de nas dngos grub blang ba ni/_/dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun 'chang ba/_/rdo rje mi phyed gsum dang ldan/_/deng bdag sangs rgyas sku 'dzin pa'i/_/byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas mdzod cig_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba A t+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/_dpal ldan rdo rje gsung 
[\[144b.4\]]'chang ba/_/rdo rje mi phyed gsum dang ldan/_/deng bdag sangs rgyas kun 'chang ba/_/byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/_dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba/_/rdo rje mi phyed gsum dang ldan/_/deng bdag sangs rgyas 
[\[144b.5\]]thugs 'dzin pa'i/_/byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/_dam tshig nyams pa thams cad skongs par gyur cig_/lta ba yon po thams cad srongs par gyur cig_/cho ga nyams pa thams cad rdzogs par 
[\[144b.6\]]gyur cig_/tshe sku gsung thugs kyi skye shi med pa'i dngos grub thob par gyur cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sku gsung thugs sprul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs so/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[144b.7\]]'dom gang gru bzhi la/_/ma hA rak+ta'i mgo la yan gyis byugs la/_dbus su badzra he ru ka_/yum kro d+hi shwa ri/_'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la/_shar du badzra he ru ka_/lhor rat+na he ru ka_/nub tu pad+ma he ru ka_/byang du karma he ru ka_/sku mdog phyag mtshan rgyud 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]gzhan dang mthun/_de'i phyi rim snam bu la/_phra men ma bcu drug_/de'i phyi rim sgo bzhi la dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dri chen gyis maN+Dal byugs la dbus su yak+sha he ru ka_/dbu dgu phyag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad/_zhabs brgyad gshog pa rdo rjes 
[\[145a.2\]]gtams pa/_de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la/_shar du badzra he ru ka_/lhor yak+Sha he ru ka_/nub tu byi sha he ru ka_/byang du sa ma ya he ru ka_/mtshams bzhir khro mo dbang phyug ma yum bzhi bzhugs/_gdan zhing bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs so/_/de'i phyi rim 
[\[145a.3\]]snam bu la phra men dang khro bo pha bcu ma bcu dgod cing bzhugs so/_/sgo bzhir lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bzhi dgod do/_/khro bo chen po nI la daN+Da dbus su bri/_/de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la sprul pa'i khro bo shugs can dang /_'jigs su rung ba dang /_rdo rje 
[\[145a.4\]]grags pa dang /_rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dang /_rdo rje gsus po che dang /_rdo rje gad mo dang /_gad rgyangs can dang /_'di rnams [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin bri/_sgo bzhi gzhan dang mthun/_dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/_rnam par rgyal ba dbus su bri/_pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la/_shar 
[\[145a.5\]]du rdo rje grags chen/_lhor khro bo gad mo can/_nub tu khro bo he he/_grags chen dang /_byang du rdo rje bgegs gnon pa'i rgyal po bri/_de'i phyi rim sgo rnams bri/_dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/_dbus su gshin rje gshed po bri/_phyi rim pad+ma 'dab 
[\[145a.6\]]brgyad la/_phra men ma sing ha la sogs pa brgyad bri/_sgo bzhi dgod/_dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/_khro bo mi g.yo mgon po dbus su bri/_de'i phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la khro bo 'gying ba dang /_khro bo glang po che dang /_khro bo ko ba rlon pa 
[\[145a.7\]]can dang /_khro bo mig mi bzang ba bzhi rim pa bzhin du bri'o/_/phyi'i sgo snam dgod do/_/dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su ha ya grI ba bri/_pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la/_ke'u ri ma brgyad bri/_phyi rim sgo snam dgod/_dkyil 'khor 'dom gang 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]gru bzhi la/_Ta ki ra dza dbus su dgod/_phyi rim maN+Dal brgyad pa la khro bo bde ba dang /_so'i phreng ba dang /_dung chen dang /_khu tshur dang /_g.yab mo dang /_dga' ba dang /_'degs pa dang /_hU~M chen dang ni 'di rnams bri/_sgo snam dgod/_dkyil 'khor 'dom 
[\[145b.2\]]gang gru bzhi la/_dbus su bdud rtsi 'khyil pa/_'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la/_shar du rdo rje spu can dang /_zangs kyi gshog pa can dang /_lcags kyi mche ba can dang /_spu gri so can dgod/_dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/_khams gsum rnam 
[\[145b.3\]]par rgyal ba dbus su dgod/_de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la stag gi mgo can dang /_g.yag gi mgo can dang /_sha ba'i mgo can dang /_byi la'i mgo can rnams so/_/sgo bzhi rim bzhin du dgod do/_/dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/_khro bo 
[\[145b.4\]]hU~M ka ra dbus su dgod do/_/'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la spyang ki'i mgo can dang /_wa'i mgo can dang /_dom gyi mgo can dang /_dred mgo can rnams dgod do/_/sgo bzhi dgod/_dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la stobs po che dbus su dgod/_'khor 
[\[145b.5\]]lo rtsibs bzhi la/_shar du rdo rje gdengs mo/_lhor ni rdo rje sder mo/_nub tu dur khrod bdag mo/_byang du rdo rje gtun khung rnams rim bzhin du dgod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo de rnams kyi las kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 
[\[145b.6\]]par zhugs so/_/dbus kyi khrag 'thung chen po ni/_/dbu dgu phyag ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad de/_/gshog pa rdo rje gtams pa gdengs/_/zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad du bstan/_/de yi 'khor gyi khro mo ni/_/phyag kyang srin mo ltar mthun te/_/zhabs kyang de dang 
[\[145b.7\]]'dra bar bstan/_/shar gyi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/_/khro bo rnam par rgyal ba ste/_/sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'phro/_/dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/_/zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/_/dri za bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs/_/'jig rten 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/_/shar lho mtshams na bzhugs pa ni/_/khro bo dbyug pa sngon po can/_/sku mdog sngo la 'od zer 'phro/_/dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/_/zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/_/me lha bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs/_/'jig rten 
[\[146a.2\]]skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/_/lho yi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/_/ya mAn ta ka gshin rje gshed/_/sku mdog sngo la 'od zer 'phro/_/dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/_/zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/_/ma he bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs/_/'jig rten skyong ba 'dul 
[\[146a.3\]]tshul lo/_/lho nub mtshams na bzhugs pa ni/_/khro bo mi g.yo mgon po ni/_/sku mdog sngo la 'od zer 'phro/_/dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/_/zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/_/bden bral bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs/_/'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul 
[\[146a.4\]]lo/_/nub kyi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/_/ha ya grI pa rta mchog dbang /_/sku mdog dmar la 'od zer 'phro/_/dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/_/zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/_/klu bdag bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs/_/'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/_/nub 
[\[146a.5\]]byang mtshams na bzhugs pa ni/_/khro bo Ta ki ra dza ste/_/sku mdog dud ka 'od zer 'phro/_/dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/_/zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/_/rlung lha bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs/_/'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/_/byang gi phyogs na 
[\[146a.6\]]bzhugs pa ni/_/khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste/_/sku mdog ljang gu 'od zer 'phro/_/dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/_/zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/_/gnod sbyin bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs/_/'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/_/byang shar mtshams 
[\[146a.7\]]na bzhugs pa ni/_/khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal/_/sku mdog ljang skya 'od zer 'phro/_/dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/_/zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/_/pi nA ya ka'i khri la bzhugs/_/'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/_/steng gi phyogs 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]na bzhugs pa ni/_/khro bo hU~M mdzad hU~M ka ra/_/sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'phro/_/dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/_/zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/_/nyi zla gza' skar khri la bzhugs/_/'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/_/'og gi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/_/
[\[146b.2\]]ma hA ba la stobs po che/_/sku mdog gnag la 'od zer 'phro/_/dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/_/zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/_/sa bdag bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs/_/'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo ya mAn ta 
[\[146b.3\]]ka'i ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs nas 'di skad ces bskul lo/_/bdud ru tra nag po 'dul bar mdzad do/_/hU~M gtum chen rab 'jigs 'jig rten 'joms mdzad la/_/nyi ma 'bum pas lhag pa'i 'od ldan khyod/_/phyag cha mang po bskal pa'i me bzhin 'bar/_/rab 
[\[146b.4\]]'bar gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje sku la klu dbang rab brgyan cing /_/gcan gzan gdug pa'i pags rlon sku la brgyan/_/brkyang bskum tshul gyis rab 'jigs gshin rje gnon/_/zhing chen khrag 'dzag thod rlon sku la brgyan/_/mi zad rgyal po 
[\[146b.5\]]gdong drug hU~M sgra can/_/phaT kyis khams gsum sngags mdzad zhabs drug po/_/sha za'i mgo gcod dbu yi rgyan du thogs/_/spyan bzlog tsam gyis thog 'bebs me ltar 'phro/_/ljags 'dril tshems kyi gseb nas thog 'bebs shing /_/ma mo rnams 
[\[146b.6\]]kyang sgren mor 'dar zhing 'bros/_/stong gsum mid par mdzad pa'i zhal gdangs la/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor bcas khrag gi thigs 'dzag cing /_/nad stong srin mo'i tshogs rnams 'bar zhing 'bros/_/rkan sgra gtogs pa lha chen khyab 'jug kyang /_/
[\[146b.7\]]'bum 'gyel bcas par khrag skyugs nyid la 'dud/_/phyag na mi thod rlon pa bsnams pa ni/_/dngos grub phyag gis glad khrag zhal du stobs/_/tshangs pa'i mgo bcad dbu yi rgyan du byas/_/zhing chen mgo nas chem chem za bar byed/_/rgyu 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]phreng khrag dang bcas par thogs nas ni/_/khyod mthong tsam gyis rab 'jigs nyid la 'dud/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_/sprul pa'i khye'u bzang dbu gsum phyag drug pa brgya rtsa brgyad byung nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum 
[\[147a.2\]]pa'i mdangs kyis me tog gtor bka' nod pa'i tshul du gong de bzhugs pa de la/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dgung la thog thog mi bzad pa/_/khyi'u chung sngon mo mkha' la lding /_/ya mAn ta ka khro bo ste/_/sku yang che la bam ldir 
[\[147a.3\]]bzang /_/sku mdog stang zil bcag pa 'dra/_/phyag gnyis dang po kha T+wAM ga_/bar na rdo rje dril bu bsnams/_/tha ma mda' dang gzhu bsnams te/_/'khor ni phra men brgyad kyis bskor/_/nga nyid yin te skal ba bzang /_/skal bzang nga yi dam tshig gis/_/dog la chem chem mi 
[\[147a.4\]]bzad pa/_/bsgrags pa ral pa gcig ma yin/_/dam tshig dus las ma 'da' zhig ces sgo'o/_/ci bka' stsal pa bzhin du/_las thams cad kyang grub par mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos ma dang phra men ma'i ting nge 'dzin du 
[\[147a.5\]]zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/las bcol bar mdzad do/_/kro d+hi shwa ri dpal 'bar ma/_/khams gsum srid la mnga' mdzad ma/_/las su gsod la dga' ba mo/_/shan pa spu gri rnon po so/_/ro la rngam pa'i kha T+wAM ga_/'byung po tsit+ta mchog la 
[\[147a.6\]]rol/_/mthing ga mchog ston dpal gyi yum/_/rdo rje thugs kyi dbang phyug ma/_/ki'u ri ma yi mchod pas rol/_/gser gyi 'od 'phro mda' gzhu 'gengs/_/rin chen sku yi dbang phyug ma/_/tsi'u ri ma yi mchod pas rol/_/pra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan 'dzin/_/
[\[147a.7\]]pad+ma'i gsung gi dbang phyug ma/_/pra mo ha yi mchod pas rol/_/nag mo ral pa thod pas 'gengs/_/karma las kyi dbang phyug ma/_/be tA li yi mchod pas rol/_/gtum mo zhe sdang spu gri so/_/zhe sdang 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma/_/g+ha sma ri yi mchod 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]pas rol/_/pad+ma 'joms pa'i char chen 'bebs/_/'dod chags 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma/_/puk+ka si yi mchod pas rol/_/rin chen me lce glog phreng 'dzin/_/gti mug 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma/_/sma sha na yi mchod pas rol/_/las su dgra sta 'bar ba 'dzin/_/nga 
[\[147b.2\]]rgyal 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma/_/tsan d+ha li yi mchod pas rol/_/sing ha gsod byed seng ge mgo/_/ro mchog za ba'i phra men ma/_/byA g+h+r-i mgo gcod stag gi mgo/_/thod rlon za ba'i phra men ma/_/sri ga dur rkun wa yi mgo/_/dur sri ma yi phra men ma/_/shwa na sha 
[\[147b.3\]]'drad spyang mo mo mgo/_/sha chen za ba'i phra men ma/_/gr-i d+ha khrag 'thung bya rgod mgo/_/khrag tshil za ba'i phra men ma/_/kang ka mu ka dur bya'i mgo/_/dug gsum 'joms pa'i phra men ma/_/khwa kha rgyu 'dren pho rog mgo/_/dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i phra men ma/_/hu lu tshe 
[\[147b.4\]]'phrog 'ug pa'i mgo/_/glo snying za ba'i phra men ma/_/stag g.yag sha ba seng ge'i mgo/_/byi la spyang ki wa yi mgo/_/dom dred phag gi mgo can rnams/_/thugs dam bzhin du las byos shig_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_chags pa med pa'i sbyor bas 
[\[147b.5\]]sku la 'khril cing /_las mthar phyin par mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo ba rnams la bka' stsal pa/_/dzaHdzaHlcags kyu glo snying 'dren/_/a mo sngon mo thod sbrul zhags/_/a li dmar mo lcags sgrog sdom/_/bas ni ljang gu dril 'khrol 
[\[147b.6\]]dgyes/_/bka' stsal pa bzhin du nyan par mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las ye shes kyi khro bo dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal lha mo sbyor ba'i ting nge 
[\[147b.7\]]'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor 'di byung ngo /_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/rta babs rnam pa bzhis ni brgyan/_/dar dang dril bu chun po dang /_/nyi ma zla bas rnam par brgyan/_/rin chen mu 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]tig 'bras bus spras/_/do shal rkang gdub rnams kyis brgyan/_/sna tshogs gzugs ni rnam bres pa/_/sna tshogs phreng ba gos kyis brgyan/_/srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste/_/ka ba mchog brgyad yang dag ldan/_/dbus su dga' byed stan la ni/_/dngul la 
[\[148a.2\]]sogs pas rnam par brgyan/_/sna tshogs pad+ma'i dar gyis g.yogs/_/thams cad stan la de dag ces/_/dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' ni/_/stan de la ni gzhag par bya/_/tshad med pad+mo dmar 'dra ba/_/sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs/_/yid bzhin nor bu 
[\[148a.3\]]dbu rgyan ldan/_/rin chen gtsug ni rnam par mdzes/_/tshad med dang ni sbyang ba yi/_/dbu la chun pos mdzes par byas/_/sna tshogs ye shes rab tu gnas/_/chu skyes spyan ni rab tu rgyas/_/dga' byed yid tsam g.yon du 'dud/_/g.yas kyi phyag gis rdo rje che/_/
[\[148a.4\]]snying gar gsor la rab tu brtson/_/bde la sogs pa yon tan ldan/_/thog ma nyid du rnam par gzhag_/slob ma'am yang na gzhan yang rung /_/mtshan kun gyis ni rnam brgyan la/_/tshul bzhin byin gyis brlabs bya ste/_/dbus kyi dkyil du gzhag par bya/_/
[\[148a.5\]]bdag nyid kyang ni mnyam bzhag ste/_/de la sogs pa yon tan gtso/_/dbus kyi stan la 'dug pa ni/_/bdag ni rab dgyes rjes su smra/_/der ni slob ma byin brlabs te/_/thams cad las byed phun sum tshogs/_/rdo rje pad+ma las byung ba'i/_/gsang ba yis kyang dbang 
[\[148a.6\]]bskur ro/_/rab dgyes la sogs yon tan ldan/_/yid 'ong bu mo btsal bya ste/_/snying ga mtshog ma mgrin spyi bor/_/lha rnams la sogs 'bru bsgoms te/_/mtshan ma phyag rgya rab 'bar ba'i/_/rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba'i/_/rang la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya 
[\[148a.7\]]yis/_/tshul bzhin thams cad gzhag par bya/_/mdun du lha mo myos byed ma/_/ma mchu 'dzin pa'i ro la dgyes/_/dkar dmar kha dog 'dres pa yis/_/thams cad rgyan dang yang dag ldan/_/lo ni bcu drug lon pa mchog_/shes rab can gyis mdun du 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]gzhag_/g.yas su lha mo gsod byed ma/_/mtshon cha'i mda' ni 'dren par brtson/_/do shal rkang gdub dag gis brgyan/_/lo grangs nyi shu lon pa ste/_/gser gyi ri bo zhu ba 'dra/_/chu skyes spyan ni yid tsam sngo/_/sems dpa' che la mnyes mdzad cing /_/de yi tshul 
[\[148b.2\]]bzhin gzhag par bya/_/rgyab tu lha mo rmongs byed ma/_/pad+ma dmar po mdog gi 'od/_/chu srin rgyal mtshan mdzes pa'o/_/sku yi tshad ni nyi shu gcig_/dga' byed 'dod pa'i ro la dgyes/_/sna tshogs na bza' yang dag gsol/_/sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par 
[\[148b.3\]]bklubs/_/sna tshogs pad+mo sbyor la sogs/_/gar gyi bya ba rab rlag gzhag_/g.yon du sna tshogs chen mo ste/_/sna tshogs dgos pa rjes brlabs pa/_/sku yi tshad ni bcu gnyis ldan/_/rnal 'byor la ni shin tu brtson/_/lha dang lha min mi yi rnams/_/'gro ba 
[\[148b.4\]]thams cad myos mdzad ma/_/sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs/_/sna tshogs dar ni na bza' gsol/_/grwa rnams dag ni thams cad du/_/gzugs sgra dri ro reg rnams dang /_/bdug pa me tog bsung ldang ba/_/gzi brjid chen po'i 'od dang ldan/_/ci 
[\[148b.5\]]rigs par ni gzhag par bya/_/sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/rang gi las kyi phyag rgyar ldan/_/skal ldan 'ga' la rnams mos pa/_/sgo srung bzhi ni gzhag par bya/_/gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/_/pi wang gling bu brdab pa dang /_/rdza rnga 
[\[148b.6\]]rnga chen ku mu da/_/mu ra tsa dang da ra dang /_/gar dang dbyangs dang bzhad pa che/_/rol mo yo byad sna tshogs rnams/_/dga' byed dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya/_/phyi yi dkyil 'khor thams cad do/_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni phyi rol du/_/rdo rje nam mkhar 'gro 
[\[148b.7\]]ma gzhang /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]phyag rgya yang dag zhon/_/dpa' bo 'jigs byed gzugs 'dzin te/_/skal ldan rang gi lag char ldan/_/gdug pa'i sems kyis bsdigs byed cing /_/sha khrag dang ni rgyu ma dang /_/rkang dang tshil bu za spyod pa/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]byas te bdug pa ni/_/tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya/_/dga' bar byed dang 'dren par byed/_/gsod par byed dang 'phrog par byed/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi rnams/_/shar gyi phyogs su gzhag par bya/_/gzi brjid che dang 'bar byed ma/_/
[\[149a.2\]]'joms byed bong bu lho ru ste/_/gtsug lag mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni/_/mkhas pas tshul bzhin gzhag par bya/_/chags chen po dang chags bral dang /_/'khor lo ma dang rgyas 'debs ma/_/rab tu 'byor bas 'byor byas te/_/ci rigs nub tu gzhag par bya/_/sna 
[\[149a.3\]]tshogs lus dang srung ba dang /_/gnod sbyin mo dang yang dag 'phrog_/sngags dang phyag rgya byin brlabs nas/_/sngags mkhan ci rigs byang du bzhag_/shar gyi grwa ru gzhag pa ni/_/bya rog gdong ni mig 'bru ste/_/'jigs pa'i mig dang 'jigs pa'i gdod/_/ci 
[\[149a.4\]]ltar rjes su mthun byas te/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]stan la yang dag 'dug_/sna tshogs mchog gi gdong 'dzin te/_/lag par gri dang khar gzhong thogs/_/mchog tu sha dang khrag za ba'o/_/nub dang lho yi mtshams gzhag pa/_/bzhad dang 'ug pa'i gdong ring ma/_/khros pa'i 
[\[149a.5\]]khri dang phag gi gdong /_/gsus po che la lto 'phyangs rnams/_/nub dang byang gi mtshams dag tu/_/rnga mo bong bu gdong 'dzin ma/_/khros par dang khyi yi gdong /_/rgyu ma'i mgo nas sha bar byed/_/shar dang byang gi mtshams dag tu/_/keng rus dkar po 'dzin pa ste/_/
[\[149a.6\]]khros pa rus pa'i phreng bas bklubs/_/lto 'phyangs po la bum pa 'dzin/_/phan tshun 'thab par brtson pa yi/_/ce spyang gi ni 'khor gyi rnams/_/'jigs byed gdong ni mche ba 'dzin/_/rnam par bsgyur ba'i gzugs 'dzin ma/_/sgo rnams kyi ni phyogs rnams kun/_/sgo 
[\[149a.7\]]bzhi rnams ni gzhag par bya/_/byang gi phyogs su 'bod 'grogs te/_/bum pa rnams ni shar nyid du/_/nub tu rnam par 'jigs pa'o/_/lho ru gshin rje rgyal po bzhag_/de dang gzhan yang rgyal po mchog_/nam mkhar 'gro bas kun du bskor/_/de nas bcom 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' yum gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/dgyes shing spyan ni rgyas pa yis/_/bzhengs nas dgyes pa chen po yi/_/brjid pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing /_/thal mo sbyor nas gtsug nyid du/_/gzhag pa yis ni 
[\[149b.2\]]'dud par byed/_/bskul ba yis ni dbyangs 'di yis/_/de dag gtso la mnyes par byed/_/kye ma chos ni ngo mtshar che/_/kye ma spyod pa ngo mtshar che/_/kye ma sbas pa ngo mtshar che/_/kye ma bde byed yang dag 'byung /_/kye ma kun du bzang po don/_/kye ma rab dgyes yang dag 
[\[149b.3\]]'grogs/_/kye ma bde ba dga' ba che/_/kye ma bde ba bde mchog ste/_/kye ma sngags kyi yang dag sbyor/_/kye ma snying po yang dag sbyor/_/kye ma phyag rgya yang dag bzhugs/_/kye ma bsgrub pa rmad 'byung ba'i/_/kye ma pha rol phyin pa yis/_/kye ma ci ltar mthur rigs pa/_/kye 
[\[149b.4\]]ma dgos pa sna tshogs che/_/kye ma dag pa gsum sbyar ba/_/kye ma rdo rje mnyam sbyor ba'i/_/kye ma pad+ma rnam phye ba/_/kye ma dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'i/_/kye ma mchog dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/_/kye ma gar ni dga' ba che/_/kye ma glu rab dri ma med/_/kye ma sil snyan rnam par 
[\[149b.5\]]'khrol/_/kye ma gda' dang mun sel ba/_/kye ma dga' byed me tog phreng /_/kye ma mar me mun pa sel/_/kye ma dri ni shin tu bsil/_/kye ma rnal 'byor mnyam sbyor ba'i/_/kye ma sgyu ma nam mkha' 'dra/_/kye ma sangs rgyas nam mkha' 'dra/_/kye ma rin chen bde mchog 
[\[149b.6\]]skyed/_/kye ma sna tshogs sgyu ma mdzad/_/kye ma ngo mtshar sangs rgyas dang /_/kye ma ngo mtshar dbang po rnams/_/kye ma ngo mtshar sems dpa' che/_/kye ma ngo mtshar lha yi rnams/_/shin tu dgyes che rdo rje la/_/rgyal ba kun gyis bstod byas te/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 
[\[149b.7\]]'gying ba yis/_/dga' dang bde byed skyes par 'gyur/_/chu skyes zhal ni 'dzum bcas pa/_/yangs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad de/_/spyan dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis/_/rab tu dgyes ldan smin ma bsgyur/_/yangs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad de/_/spyan 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis/_/yid tsam mdzes pa'i spyan zur gzigs/_/sha rgyas brla ni nu mar 'dud/_/rked pa'i dbyes ni rnam par yangs/_/rnams kyi gos kyang che la mdzes/_/chags pa cung zad tshems kyi gnon/_/tshems kyi phreng ba kun da zla/_/mi drag 
[\[150a.2\]]zlos pa'i dbugs 'byin cing /_/rab tu dga' chen dgyes pas bstod/_/bud med gzugs ldan mdangs bzang ba/_/lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la/_/byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas gsum gyis/_/dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsam/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo 
[\[150a.3\]]mchog_/spyan la sogs pa bsgom par bya/_/dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas/_/sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/'od zer sna lngas khyab pa yis/_/pad+mo rdo rje bsgom par bya/_/'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin du dkar/_/yid du 'ong ba bsgom par bya/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[150a.4\]]phan par 'dod pa yis/_/bud med rnyed na cho ga bzhin/_/bde bar mchod par brtsam par bya/_/ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/_/dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya/_/sngags shes pas ni gnas bzhin du/_/bud med rtag tu gzhag par bya/_/rgyan rnams thams cad 
[\[150a.5\]]yongs su rdzogs/_/bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis pa/_/dben pa'i gnas su khyad par du/_/sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub/_/mtshan nyid dag ni yongs su dag_/rab tu bzang la bzhin yang mdzes/_/rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/_/pang par bzhag nas rnam par 
[\[150a.6\]]bsgom/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/_/bu mo ut+pal mthing ga'i mdog_/'dra ba dag ni rtag tu bsgrub/_/sbyor ba'i cho ga de nyid ni/_/byas na las rnams brtsam par bya/_/bud med sems ni rab brtan pa/_/lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa la/_/rigs kyi sbyor ba 
[\[150a.7\]]rab bsgoms te/_/bdag gi khu bas mchod par bya/_/'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/_/na chung gzhon nu mig bzang btsal/_/gzugs bzang gzhon pas brgyan pa yi/_/lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon pa'i/_/bzung nas byol song skyes gnas brtag_/bzhin 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]shin tu mdzes pa yi/_/na chung mtshan ldan skal ba mchog_/mig bzang brtan pa'i blo ldan pas/_/khu ba blangs nas bza' bar bya/_/dben zhing rab tu nyams dga' bar/_/sbyor ba mchod pa kun brtsams na/_/rdo rje sku dang gsung dang thugs/_/zla ba phyed kyis 
[\[150b.2\]]nges par grub/_/smin dkyus ring zhing skra lo 'jam/_/lus ldem dbyibs sgu blo dag cing /_/brtan pa chags shing bcos su btub/_/lus nyan ci la thogs pa med/_/rked pa phra la ro smad zlum/_/stod ni drang la shin tu rgyas/_/tshems dkar mgul ring phyag sor 
[\[150b.3\]]ring /_/dkar la dmar chags nor bu'i mdog_/gzungs ma mtshan ldan spyad par bya/_/mnyen lcug 'khril ldem rab tu mdzes/_/yid 'ong 'dzum phran spyan zur gzigs/_/mkhur tshos dkar pos gdab par bya/_/dkar 'dzin phyir ni mnye bya ste/_/pad+ma'i ze ba 
[\[150b.4\]]chen pos gdab/_/pad+ma lan gsum mnyes bya ste/_/mchan khung mngon sum rna ba gnyis/_/zangs kyi mdog gis gzung bar bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi btsun mo dang bcas par gyur to/_/de nas 'di brjod par mdzad do/_/zhi ba kha dog 
[\[150b.5\]]dkar la 'tsher/_/btang snyoms kun gyi spro bsdu yis/_/gsum pa rdzogs par ldan pa dang /_/phyag rgya tshogs mchog de dag la/_/rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du skyes/_/phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/_/bcu gsum pa yi cha lugs 'dzin/_/che chung med 
[\[150b.6\]]par gsal bar bsgom/_/dbu la gnyis pa'i yi ger ldan/_/gsal ba nyid kyis dus dag tu/_/cod pan lnga yi rin chen las/_/rgyan gyi rigs ni gsal ba yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/mthing ga 
[\[150b.7\]]'bar ba'i yi ge che/_/rigs kyi rin chen spro bsdu las/_/phyag rgya gsal ba'i skur gsal ba'i/_/rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du skyes/_/sgrib pa kun spang sdig byed stobs/_/gnyis pa yi ni yi ge las/_/thams cad blo dbyangs yi ge gter/_/mnyam 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]par 'khril ba'i tshul 'dzin pa/_/rin chen rigs kyi phyag rgyar gsal/_/las 'di thams cad kun gyi mchog_/rgyal po rnam par rol pa'o/_/pad+ma rA ga 'dra ba'i mdog_/chos sku zla tshes rab ldan pa/_/gsal ba'i kha dog mdzes pa na/_/thams cad ma lus 
[\[151a.2\]]dbang du mdzad/_/sbyor dang skye dang bsdu ba yis/_/phyag rgya gsal bar dbang gis bskur/_/btsun mo dag dang mnyam du skyes/_/gnyis su med par 'khril ba yin/_/dbu ru yi ge gnyis par ldan/_/rin chen rigs kyi spro bsdu las/_/cod pan rigs lnga'i kha dog ste/_/ci 
[\[151a.3\]]bzhin pa yi ting 'dzin gyis/_/phyag rgya bzhugs tshul pad+mo'i tshul/_/mnyam par gsal bas dkyil 'khor yin/_/mi phyed pa yi ting 'dzin gyis/_/rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor kun 'dus mchog_/pad+ma rigs kyi phyag rgyar gsal/_/rigs kun gyi ni phyag rgyar gsal/_/
[\[151a.4\]]mun pa sel ba'i mar me bzhin/_/gsal dag yid gnyis med par bsgom/_/chu skyes 'jam pa 'og tu ldan/_/steng dang sprod pa'i rol mo yis/_/dgyes shing mnyam pa'i mchod pa bsham/_/'di ltar gsal ba dbang yang rdzogs/_/thams cad bsdu ba zhes bya ba/_/
[\[151a.5\]]de bzhin dbang ste las thams cad/_/dus gsum pa yi mdzad pa che/_/rigs kun 'dus par bde bar gshegs/_/mnyam pa ci bzhin ting 'dzin te/_/yi ge 'bru gcig kun gyi mchog_/bshad par khyad par las kun rdzogs/_/chu skyes gsal bar 'dab ma'i 
[\[151a.6\]]steng /_/gnyis su med par gsal bas na/_/rnam pa gnyis kyi bye brag gis/_/'dus par gsal bar skur gyur pa/_/'dod cing chags pa ma yin zhing /_/blo la yid gnyis med pas na/_/phyag rgya gsal bar rgyal ba'i sku/_/rgyal mo dang ni mnyam du skyes/_/
[\[151a.7\]]dbu la gnyis pa'i yi ger ldan/_/sbyin pa rgya chen khebs pas na/_/rang gi 'dod pa'i gnas su bsdu/_/bong tshod lo grangs khyad par med/_/gnyis su med par 'khril bar gsal/_/dus kun du ni mnyam ldan pa/_/gsang ba mchod pa rab tu rdzogs/_/zla rgyas 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]lta bu gtso bo bsgom/_/chags pa med par 'dod bsdu yi/_/yum dang lhan cig sgom pa ni/_/A li kA lir byed pa'i don/_/phyag rgya las kyi bye brag gis/_/bde ba chen po tshul gnas pa/_/rgyal ba kun kyang de dang mthun/_/phyag rgya bsnol bar gnas pa yi/_/kun kyang sems dpa'i 
[\[151b.2\]]dkyil 'khor ro/_/phyag rgya rdo rje thal mo ni/_/kun kyang yum gyi rgyab tu bsnol/_/zhal gnyis mdzes par rab sbyar ba/_/zla gam pa yi ljags gnyis mdzes/_/dung gi phur bus mkhur tshos la/_/'debs shing rdeg pa'i tshul du bzhugs/_/bsnyen pa nye bsnyen dbang rdzogs pa/_/
[\[151b.3\]]rgyal ba kun gyi sku yi mchog_/bzhad dang 'dzum pa'i gtso gzugs bsgom/_/rnal 'byor dka' thub chen po'i don/_/gsang ba spyod pa shin tu dgyes/_/gsang ba nyid du sems can 'dren/_/thams cad kun gyi rmongs pa sel/_/yum gyi las kyis khyad par ni/_/
[\[151b.4\]]sa yi rim pa kun sbyor zhing /_/zas dang mgo dbang med pa yi/_/nyan thos 'gog pa la sogs pa/_/byang chub sems kyi char chen gyis/_/pad+mor bcings pa tshar gcod mdzad/_/dam tshig chen po sdom pa ste/_/rgyal ba kun gyi dkyil 'khor yin/_/phyag rgya 
[\[151b.5\]]chen po tshogs mchog ste/_/dga' ba don du rigs mchog yin/_/myur bar rtag tu ma yengs na/_/gdon mi za bar grub pa ni/_/'dod khams lha yi nyin phyed kyis/_/gsang ba kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i don dang mnyam 
[\[151b.6\]]pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/kun du bzang po rnal 'byor mchog_/gsang ba nyid kyis mkha' dbyings so/_/yi ge a~M ldan tsheg drag bcas/_/rnal 'byor bde chen nyid kyi sras/_/gzugs khams lha tshogs byin brlabs te/_/phyag mtshan 'khor lo gsal ba dang /_/
[\[151b.7\]]bde ba rnal 'byor de bzhin gshegs/_/gtso bo gser gyi kha dog gsal/_/nyi ma gser gyi 'od bzhin du/_/gsal ba 'tsher ba bcom ldan 'das/_/dbu ru yi ge gnyis pa la/_/rin chen myu gu khang pa 'bar/_/sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan gyis/_/
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]legs par brgyan pa mtshan rnams rdzogs/_/rdzogs pa chen po bzhugs tshul dang /_/ting 'dzin mthun pa 'gro la gzigs/_/pad+ma ge sar dbus gnas pa'i/_/thig ler gsang ba bzhin dang ldan/_/mdun du lha mo chags pa mo/_/lo grangs nyi shu mdzes 
[\[152a.2\]]dang ldan/_/ma hA su khe gnas la dgyes/_/mdzes pa'i lag pa gar dang bcas/_/gnyis su med pa'i bzhugs tshul ni/_/gtso la rten pa'i tshul du bzhugs/_/rgyab tu lha mo dgyes chen mo/_/sangs rgyas bsnyen par mdzes tshul gyis/_/thal sbyar 'dzin pa sku brten pa/_/
[\[152a.3\]]sku tshe bcu drug brtsan dmar sku/_/sangs rgyas gdung 'dzin tshangs par sbyor/_/'dod chags can la mthun par mdzad/_/g.yas su zhe sdang 'dul ba mo/_/rdo rje pad+mo sbyor la dgyes/_/ma dad pa rnams dbang med par/_/drag po sbyor mdzad zhe sdang sel/_/chags pa chen 
[\[152a.4\]]po bcom ldan 'das/_/gnyis su med par sbyor ba yis/_/gtong ba med par bstan pa'i tshul/_/sngo bsangs mdog ldan khyad par che/_/sku tshad [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga chags pa can/_/dus mtha' med par sbyor la dgyes/_/steg dang sgeg pa'i cha lugs kyis/_/sems can kun 
[\[152a.5\]]gyi sdug bsngal 'khru/_/rab tu spras pa'i 'gog pa rnams/_/bslangs nas rgyal ba'i sras su mdzad/_/arta ma li phrin las kyis/_/thams cad byang chub chen po mdzad/_/mig gnyis 'dzums dang sbom po yis/_/dbang mor ldan par byas pa na/_/gnyis su med 
[\[152a.6\]]par sbyor 'dod yin/_/sna yi rtse mor mthe'u chung 'dzin/_/ma ta bzhugs par brtson byas pa'o/_/so so rnams bsdams kha phye ba/_/dus la bab ces bya ba ste/_/ting 'dzin gsal bar gyur pa na/_/dus la bab ces bya ba yin/_/'di ltar brda ldan ting 'dzin la/_/
[\[152a.7\]]dam can bud med rnams mi 'dud/_/dngos grub mi thob dam tshig nyams/_/tshe rabs kun du brlag par 'gyur/_/'di ltar brtson par byed pa na/_/g.yon pa skyed pa rnam bzhi yis/_/skyes pa na chung tshul bzhin du/_/rdo rje pad+ma'i mtshams nyid du/_/dbyings phyug lnga 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]la sbyar ba yis/_/dal bus dal bus gzhug pa dang /_/dal bus dal bus rab bskul te/_/drag po tshig gis spro ba dang /_/byang chub sems kyis pad+ma dgang /_/sbom po dbang ngam lnga rnams kyis/_/yum gyis blangs la gtso la mchod/_/nye ba'i bsnyen pa la sogs te/_/bsnyen 
[\[152b.2\]]pa che chung rdzogs par bsgom/_/byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor las/_/mchod pa brgyad kyis mchod par ston/_/de ltar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /_/gnyis su med par lugs bzhin du/_/mnyam par 'khril ba'i tshul du bstan/_/dus gsum kun gyi gdung 'dzin 
[\[152b.3\]]la/_/g.yon phyogs bsten pa'i skal dang ldan/_/na tshod lo ni bcu drug pa/_/sdong po rul pa dag la dgyes/_/g.yas pa zur gyi spyan gyis gzigs/_/dril bu sgra snyan 'khrol la brtson/_/rdo rje rab tu sgrogs byed ma/_/sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can/_/mngon du sbyor la 
[\[152b.4\]]rab brtson pa/_/brda dang bcas pa gar gyis ni/_/sangs rgyas kun la slong mdzad ma/_/byang chub sems kyi sprin chen gyis/_/mchod pa chen po rab mchod mnyes/_/sprul pa bsam yas mtha' klas pa/_/dus gsum 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/_/so sor 
[\[152b.5\]]chags pa'i mdangs kyis ni/_/mnyen dang bcas pa'i gar gyis mchod/_/de nas gsang ba chen mo dang gnyis su med par 'khril ba chen por gyur te/_/g.yon pa skyed pa mang pos mnyes pa dang pad+ma spang ba la sogs pa 'byung ba mnyes par mdzad nas rab 
[\[152b.6\]]tu dgyes te glu 'di blangs so/_/chos kun dngos po med par rab gsal ba/_/'byung gnas chen po ya mtshan 'byung bar mkhyen/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar che'o zhes blangs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa/_mdangs bzang 
[\[152b.7\]]mig gi dkyus kyang ring /_/sku ni ldem la tsan dan dri/_/yan lag lcug ma bzhin du mnyen/_/tshems dkar sum cu rnga rngo med/_/mgul ba zlum [{]rings [,]ring [}]rab tu legs/_/gser la g.yu spras g.yas su 'khyil/_/gzungs ma 'di dag bsten par bya/_/
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]skad gdangs mi snyan ra ra po/_/yang na rmongs bag su bsub po/_/sbrang bus gtses pa'i sna sgra bzhin/_/sems can dag la khro zhing 'tshog_/dam can dag la g.yel bar mdzod/_/phyi nang sra zhing 'bras bu can/_/de 
[\[153a.2\]]bsten na ni dngos grub nyams/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/bud med kun gyi sgyu ma la/_/rab tu 'phrul te 'char ba yin/_/bden gnyis so sor snang ba yis/_/yum gyi mkha' zhes rgyal bas gsungs/_/ma nor lam chen kun bsgoms nas/_/kun du bzang mo bsgoms pas grub/_/
[\[153a.3\]]bud med la ni mchod bsten na/_/ye shes chen po grub par gsungs/_/dpal kun du bzang po thams cad shes rab kyi longs spyod 'di gsungs so/_/mngon spyod las kyi 'jug pa 'di/_/phan tshun du ni dga' spyod na/_/rnal 'byor sdom pa gnas pa yin/_/de la mchod 
[\[153a.4\]]pa dam pa ni/_/sbyor ba rab tu sbyor ba ste/_/kun du khyab pa kun du sbyor/_/rjes su chags pa dam tshig mchog_/de byi dkar sham mdog dang ldan/_/bcu drug bong tshod ring ba dang /_/lugs su blugs pa lta bu ste/_/lus legs mdzes dang ldan pa dang /_/dpral ba
