[\[153a.5\]]dbyes che kos ko phra/_/nu ma chung zhing sor mo ring /_/yid tsam mig dkyus ring ba dang /_/so dkar thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mtshams thung zhing /_/skad bzang mdangs dang ldan pa ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas mchog ste/_/'di la brtson par byed pa ni/_/rigs kyi rdo rje gdon mi za/_/
[\[153a.6\]]tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/_/gnas rab bden par rab brtags te/_/sha dkar mdangs bzang mdog dang ldan/_/lus 'bring zlum pa cha byad can/_/so dkar thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mig dkyus ring /_/skad phra mdog dgod spro ring ba/_/dpral dbyes la sogs bzang 
[\[153a.7\]]gnas pa/_/rma nag la sogs gnas pa ni/_/rtag tu chos la 'dud pa yin/_/tshangs pa dbyangs kyi rin chen las/_/'di las brtson byas bsgrubs pa yi/_/de bzhin rigs kyi ting 'dzin las/_/phan tshun du ni dga' spyod na/_/tshangs pa'i snga dro gcig tsam gyis/_/
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa dga' ba ni/_/sbyor ba brtson pas 'grub par gsungs/_/bud med cha lugs legs pa ni/_/bong tshod mi ring lus phra zhing /_/rkang lag chung zhing skad gsal ba/_/mig legs ngo zlum brtsan dmar che/_/blun du 
[\[153b.2\]]chags pa mi shes med/_/lus la mtshan gyi rmad 'dras brgyan/_/tshig gsal rmi lam nyung ba dang /_/so dkar mchu legs dad par ldan/_/chog shes pa yi ting 'dzin gyis/_/gsang ba'i mkha' la nyi zla'i 'od/_/rdo rje pad+mor ldan byas te/_/phan tshun du ni dga' spyad 
[\[153b.3\]]na/_/'dod pa'i khams lha'i skad cig gis/_/'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za/_/lus zlum gtum pa nga rgyal can/_/khong na sems rnog sems la 'dzin/_/bya ba 'dra la mi gtong ldan/_/bslab pa'i blo rtul sha rus che/_/mdangs bkrag brtags na phyi phyir gsal/_/sbyin la dga' 
[\[153b.4\]]zhing chos la dad/_/rin chen rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis/_/bag chags yi ge tshar gcod cing /_/ting 'dzin blo la gsal ba na/_/bsgrub pa'i dus la bab pa ste/_/de tshe rab tu rtsen pa yis/_/yum gyi pad+ma kha phye zhing /_/bde ba thugs kyi 'phro 'du yis/_/phan 
[\[153b.5\]]tshun du ni dga' spyad na/_/rigs kyi rin chen grub pa ni/_/tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/_/thugs rjes mdzad spyod bye brag gis/_/'jig rten dag na dman pa'i rigs/_/rab tu bkug ste dga' spyad na/_/snying rje mchog dang thabs ldan pa'i/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[153b.6\]]spyod pa chen po gsungs/_/shan pa'i rigs ngan smad 'tshong ma'i/_/na ba'i rigs dang 'dod spyod rnams/_/'joms pa chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/myur du spyad na 'grub par gsungs/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gnod sbyin byol song dang /_/khyi dang rus sbal spre'u la sogs/_/
[\[153b.7\]]mi dang lha yi gnas mchog kun/_/so so 'tsham pa dga' spyad na/_/las mchog dam pa 'grub par gsungs/_/rab tu chags la chags pa'i mchog_/rab tu rmugs pa rmugs pa sel/_/zhe sdang can la 'tsham par ston/_/grags pa can la zhi ba che/_/
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]rtsen pa dag la rtsen par mdzad/_/thabs kyi mdzad pa kun gyi mchog_/sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/_/phyin ci log tu gang spyod rnams/_/gdul bar mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis/_/mi mdzad pa ni ci yang med/_/shin tu gtum pa'i cha lugs kyis/_/gtum po 
[\[154a.2\]]thams cad dbang du mdzad/_/shin tu zhi ba'i cha lugs kyis/_/grags pa can rnams dbang du mdzad/_/shin tu mdangs ldan cha lugs kyis/_/chags pa'i yid rnams dbang du mdzad/_/e ma 'o shin tu ngo mtshar che/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor chen pos rab 
[\[154a.3\]]tu brtson par mdzad pa/_/yid kyi 'phro ba dang /_zla gam med pa dang /_gyad 'gyed pa dang /_khur ba bla na med pas phan tshun du dga' ba spyod do/_/sha mdog dkar la nu ma 'bur/_/stod smad phyed la smin dkyus ring /_/pad+ma'i dri yang dung ltar 'phro/_/pad+ma legs pa gro 
[\[154a.4\]]bos 'dra/_/zlum pa che chung snyoms pa'o/_/sha mdog dkar la sme ba can/_/stod smad phyed la sor mo ring /_/nu ma chung zhing mkhrang ba ste/_/dri yang pad+ma'i dri ru bro/_/mgul pa legs la ring thung ran/_/pad+ma dmar la mkhur tshos legs/_/spyan yang zlum la 'og nas 
[\[154a.5\]]lta/_/sha mdog ser la nu ma zlum/_/rked pa phra la ro smad zlum/_/rkang pa'i sor mo nang du skyor/_/lus kyang legs la che chung snyoms/_/tshems kyang dmar la thags kyang dam/_/sor mo rnams kyang phra la ring /_/dri yang tsan dan dri ru bro/_/yan lag lcug ma bzhin 
[\[154a.6\]]du mnyen/_/pad+ma ser la phra la ring /_/spyan yang phra la zur du gzigs/_/sha mdog gnag la sme ba gnag_/sha yang gnag la rtsub pa ste/_/skad gdangs mi snyan gnyid ra ro/_/rmongs la mi shes sub sub mo/_/nu rdog che la nu bshal ring /_/rkang pa sbom la sor 
[\[154a.7\]]mo thung /_/gdong yang leb la sme ba mthug_/smin ma thung la mig mi sdug_/lus po sbom thung mjing pa thung /_/pad+ma gnag la yangs pa ste/_/ba lang can gyi rigs zhes pa'o/_/gzungs ma mtshan dang ldan pa btsal ba'i don ni/_rang dbang thob pa da lo yang /_/bcos su 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]btub la lung nyan pa/_/skad gsal lta bas thag chod pa/_/spyod pa la dor rtog pa choms/_/yid gzhungs blo rno dbang po gsal/_/sems dag gzhung bzang zhal ngo rtag_/dam tshig phog las mi 'da' ba/_/tshig la [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi gron theb med/_/dad pa skyo dang dub pa med/_/spyod 
[\[154b.2\]]pa blang zhing dor ba med/_/brtson 'grus thang dang lhod pa med/_/ngo tsha shes dang khrel yod pa/_/gom pa dal la spyod pa gzob/_/mig 'bru tshugs su mi lta zhing /_/'og dang zur gyis rtogs par lta/_/dbu lo 'jam la lcang lor 'khyil/_/spyan bkra phra la dkyus ring ba/_/sna 
[\[154b.3\]]gzur zor la rgyud ma chad/_/ya yo nyag dad chad pa med/_/so dkar sum cu thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la/_/kos ko sogs bu yul gzungs 'dra/_/mdog sdug dkar dmar mdangs phyed pa/_/rked phan chag gang zlum pa dang /_/mgul pa zlum la phra la ring /_/ngang mo bya yi 
[\[154b.4\]]tshul dang 'dra/_/sna zlum blta mdzes chung ba dang /_/phyag gi sor mo phra la ring /_/rna ba gro ba gcus pa 'dra/_/lce ni dar bltab khug pa bzhin/_/dbugs rgyu phyi nang med pa 'dra/_/gnyid chung sha yang sdud pa med/_/kha snabs med la dri zhim pa/_/sna tshogs spos dri lus la 
[\[154b.5\]]bro/_/bskyod par mkhas shing las la dpa'/_/sbyor drod rig dang ting 'dzin rig_/pad+ma dam la spyad na dog_/nu ma dag ni chung la sra/_/kha mchu srab la bzang ba'o/_/lha yi sbyor ba tsog pu/_/mi'i gan rkyal/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]zur gyis sbyor/_byol song kha sbub tu sbyor 
[\[154b.6\]]ro/_/gzungs ma mtshan dang ldan pa rnams la zhag zla'i tshad bzung ste/_dam du bcas nas mchod dus mi chag par phyi nang mi bsre/_dam bcas pa la ma gtogs pa gzhan dang sbyar bar mi bya'o/_/gzhan du sbyor ba byas na dam las 'das te/_/mngal gyi srin 
[\[154b.7\]]bu kha dmar du skye'o/_/dam las ma 'das bka' bzhin du bsrungs na/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sras su skye'o/_/gzungs ma 'di dag dang bka' mthun par bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med do/_/bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]sems dpas gsungs so/_/he ru ka rol pa las gsang ba'i lha mo mchod pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas ru lu'i bsnyen pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so/_/zhugs 
[\[155a.2\]]nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo /_/ru lu chos nyid du shes pa ni o~M la dpal chen po yab lnga la yum khrag 'thung rgyal mo lnga yang sku la rdzogs so/_/de nyid lta bas srin por song gis dogs nas ye shes lngar bstan to/_/a ltar snang 
[\[155a.3\]]ba chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes/_zla tshes me long lta bu'i ye shes/_sna ru so sor rtog pa'i ye shes/_ma mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes/_a la btags par bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes/_yab yum rnams kyang de bzhin du sbyar/_chos thams cad ma byung ma skyes 
[\[155a.4\]]pa'i ngang la skye ba'i cho 'phrul bstan no/_/ru lu dkyil 'khor du shes pa ni phung po lnga rigs lnga 'byung ba lnga yum lnga khams dang skye mched byang chub sems dpa' dang sems ma dang sprul pa lcam dral/_/phung po lnga he ru ka lnga/_'byung ba lnga khrag 'thung rgyal mo lnga/_/
[\[155a.5\]]khams dang skye mched phra men ma bcu drug_/sgal tshigs dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad/_/ba spu nyag ma re re sprul pa'i phra men ma dang pho nya/_yan lag sgo ba bzhi/_sprul pa thugs kyi rgyan te/_/sngags ma hA yo ga'o/_/dkyil 'khor la yang phyogs dang gral ma nor bar 
[\[155a.6\]]dgod do/_/sgo skyong yan chad rim bzhin du dgod/_ru lu lhar shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po byang chub sems kyi don rtogs na sangs rgyas yin par shes par bya'o/_/ru lu mchod par shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems kyi don rtogs na/_
[\[155a.7\]]bdag byang chub kyi sems mchod pas 'phags pa'i tshogs mnyes pa ste/_/'grangs shing tshim par 'gyur ro/_/tshim pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/_/ru lu bsnyen par shes pa ni bsnyen pa ni dpal chen po'i sku'o/_/nye ba'i bsnyen pa ni yum kro d+hi shwa ri'o/_/sgrub 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]pa ni phra men ma bcu drug_/sgrub pa chen po ni 'di ltar bsgrubs pas 'bras bu drod rnam pa gsum dang sbyar ro/_/'od kyi drod ni bdag sgrub pa byed pa'i dus su bdag gi lus la 'od 'byung ba ni drod dang po dang sbyar ro/_/'don pa'i drod ni bdag sgrub par byed pa'i dus su 
[\[155b.2\]]bdag gi lus bal 'dab g.yengs pa ltar byed na drod 'bring po dang sbyar ro/_/drod kyi drod ni bdag gi sems tag tag rang rang nam mkhar 'phur snyam byed na tha ma dag sbyar ro/_/bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/_don dam par bsnyen pa ni byang chub

[\[155b.4\]]ma ye shes kyi phyag rgya tsam du snang /_snang tsam nyid na rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis ka ste/_rgyu 'bras ro gcig pa'i byang chub kyi sems shes par bya ste/_thig le chen po'i ngang du ye nas ma bcos par lhun gyis grub par gnas pa ni lhun gyis grub pa'i byang chub kyi sems zhes 
[\[155b.5\]]bya ste/_sgrub pa chen po'o/_/ru lu sgrar shes pa ni byi khung na bung ba chen po'i skad tsam rang gi rna bas thos pa las ma gtogs pa gzhan gyis tshor bar mi bya'o/_/ru lu dbyangs su shes pa ni/_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dren stangs kyis/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho 
[\[155b.6\]]thugs dam bskul/_/rdo rje srin po ngur sgra yis/_/khams gsum ma lus dbang du sdud/_/'khun cing gdung ba'i sgra dbyangs kyis/_/ma dang mkha' 'gro thugs dam bskul/_/khong kun 'dren pa'i gdung dbyangs kyis/_/ke'u ri brgyad kyi thugs dam bskul/_/mkhur ba 
[\[155b.7\]]dbugs kyi rlung 'byin gyis/_/seng gdong la sogs thugs dam bskul/_/sngags kyi yig 'bru bzlas pa yis/_/rdo rje tshig la skad mdangs med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi bzlas pa 'di gsungs so/_/dam tshig ye shes dpal 'bar ma/_/o~M ni sku 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]gsung thugs kyi ngang /_/ru ni gzi brjid 'phrul po che/_/lu ni yum chen dpal 'bar ma/_/b+h+yo ni ma sring rgya mtsho tshogs/_/ru lu gser phreng rgya mtsho ste/_/phar spros pas ni sku la thim/_/slar bsdus pas ni thugs la thim/_/o~M ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/_/hU~M las rdo 
[\[156a.2\]]rje rtse lnga pa/_/pa~M las pad+mar gyur pa'i dbus/_/ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam/_/sha da pa la sogs pa yi/_/bskul ba bdag ni tshul bzhin du/_/bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa'o/_/sgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen po/_/yum ni pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du/_/bde ba thugs kyi 
[\[156a.3\]]dkyil 'khor spro/_/sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la/_/dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas bstim/_/stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/_/sku yi sprul pa bsam mi khyab/_/de yang dpal chen nyid kyi sku/_/stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/_/gsung gi sprul pa bsam mi khyab/_/
[\[156a.4\]]de yang dpal chen nyid kyi gsung /_/stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/_/thugs kyi sprul pa bsam mi khyab/_/de yang dpal chen nyid kyi thugs/_/stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/_/shar phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na/_/kun kyang badzra he ru kar byin brlabs nas/_/badzra he ru ka yi 
[\[156a.5\]]dngos grub dus 'dir stsol/_/stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/_/lho phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na/_/kun kyang rat+na he rur byin brlabs nas/_/rat+na he ru ka yi dngos grub dus 'dir stsol/_/stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/_/nub phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na/_/kun kyang pad+ma he rur

[\[156a.7\]]dur khrod chen po gnas kyi mchog_/bde ba chen po gnas kyi mchog_/yum gyi mkha' dbyings gnas kyi mchog_/de yang dpal chen nyid kyi gnas/_/stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/_/zas rab zas ni bsam mi khyab/_/rdo rje dri chen zas kyi mchog_/rdo rje ga bur zas kyi 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]mchog_/bdud rtsi rnam lnga zas kyi mchog_/de yang dpal chen nyid kyi zas/_/stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/_/skom rab skom ni bsam mi khyab/_/rak+ta dri chu skom gyi mchog_/de yang dpal chen nyid kyi skom/_/stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/_/skyogs rab skyogs ni bsam mi

[\[156b.3\]]bsam mi khyab/_/kun du bzang mo yum gyi mchog_/de yang dpal chen nyid kyi yum/_/o~M ru lu 'di ni sku yi sku/_/ru lu 'di ni sku yi gsung /_/ru lu 'di ni sku yi thugs/_/ru lu 'di ni gsung gi sku/_/ru lu 'di ni gsung gi gsung /_/ru lu 'di ni gsung gi thugs/_/ru lu 
[\[156b.4\]]'di ni thugs kyi sku/_/ru lu 'di ni thugs kyi gsung /_/ru lu 'di ni thugs kyi thugs/_/skur gsal gsung gsal thugs kyang gsal/_/sku don gsung don thugs kyi don/_/ru lur ma gyur gang yang med/_/stong khams thams cad ru lus bkang /_/ru lu dngos

[\[156b.7\]]bo rnams ni kro d+ha ni ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/_de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro gnyer snying po chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/o~M badzra b+h+r-i ku Di ma hA kro d+ha 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]ma/_ha na ha na/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_mA ra mA ra/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_hU~M dru~M bri bri/_bra ma ya bra ma ya/_bi dwa na sarbA pa ra na sarba duSh+TAM/_ma ta ma ta/_mo ta mo ta/_hU~M bri tra~M tra~M/_bri hU~M tra~M tra~M/_de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas zhes 
[\[157a.2\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/pad+ma dza la ma hA kro d+ha pad+ma ba mu ka kha kha/_sarba duSh+TAM/_kha hi kha hi/_sarba dusta ba/_du sta na ma/_da ma da ma/_badzra sho da ka_/ta ma tha ma tha/_kro d+ha kro d+ha/_
[\[157a.3\]]badzra kha ra tsa/_ba la du ru/_ga be ga tra sa ya tra sa ya ma hA badzra pa da ba mu ka_/pra ma pra ma hU~M phaT/_ti ha ha ti ha ti/_tsa tu ra mu kha/_bi phra na sha na hU~M hri/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hri/_/rdo rje chen po 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i khro bo chen po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes kyi snying 
[\[157a.4\]]gnas phyung ngo /_/o~M badzra be ga ma hA kro d+ha sarba duSh+TAM/_sa ma ya bak+Sha ya/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT/_badzra sa k+Sha ha na ha na hU~M phaT/_khro bo chen po thams cad phyag rgya chen po mngon par sprul nas mche ba chen po 'khyil cing zhal mi sdug pa/_spyan stong pa/_nyi ma chen po stong gi 
[\[157a.5\]]gzi brjid can rab tu za bar byed pa'i mdog sngon po'i sku/_/dur khrod chen po'i dpal chen gyi phyag cha mi'i keng rus khrag dang sha dang lud pa dang rkang dang tshil rnams zas su gsol ba/_mi'i pags pa rnams g.yogs te bsdams pa/_mi mgo'i phreng ba dbu la 'dzin 
[\[157a.6\]]pa/_seng ge dang /_glang po dang /_bong bu dang /_rnga mo dang /_ma he dang /_phag dang /_ce spyang dang /_ra dang /_khyi dang /_'ug pa dang /_bya rog dang /_bzhad dang /_byi la dang /_gzig dang /_stag la sogs pa khro bo'i byol song gi gdong la sogs pa brgya stong mang po 
[\[157a.7\]]rang gi ba spu'i bu gnas phyung ste/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis shar phyogs 'jigs byed 'dul ba/_zhal rnam par bsnyen pa/_'jigs pa lta bu'i spyan dang /_zhal rdo rje mche ba cher gtsigs pa/_'jigs par byed pa'i khro bo chen po brgyad stong gi g.yog dang /_
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]shar phyogs dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so/_/lho phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du khro gnyer can mang po brgya stong g.yog dang bcas par gnas so/_/nub phyogs su yang rta gdong khro bo chen po brgya stong mang po g.yog dang bcas te gnas so/_/byang du yang 'ur 
[\[157b.2\]]'ur chen po khro bo brgyad stong mang po g.yog dang bcas te gnas so/_/bcom ldan 'das shin tu khro bo chen po'i tshogs brgya stong mang pos bskor nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs te/_he ru ka'i khro bo'i tshogs chen po de dag dang /_khro bo chen po brgya stong mang po'i ri 
[\[157b.3\]]rab kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa bskyed byung nas nam mkha'i dbyings rab 'byam thams cad snang bar byas te/_stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad gang bar byas so/_/shin tu dgyes pa'i khro bo chen pos khro bo'i tshogs rnams la bka' stsal 
[\[157b.4\]]pa/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma sh+tsa Na Da badzra pA Na ye/_ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/_tad+ya thA/_o~M b+ho b+ho/_ma hA ba re ba da ra ba/_ma hA d+hi/_ha ra ha ra/_gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na/_ma ra ma ra/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_k+Shi kra na ma hA badzra tsaN+Da d+ha/_sarba duSh+TAM du ku_/ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_
[\[157b.5\]]pa tsa pa tsa/_ma tha ma tha hU~M phaT/_'di gsungs ma thag tu/_'jigs byed chen po dbul bar byed pa/_rang gi sku nam mkha'i dbyings kyi tshul du byed do/_/khro bo brgya stong mang po zhal rnam par bsnyer ba/_mche ba gtsigs pa/_'khyil cing bsgyur ba phyag brgya stong mang 
[\[157b.6\]]po la mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/_zhal brgya stong mang po me lce bzhin du 'bar ba'i sku/_o~M ma hA badzra ang /_ha sa ha sa/_ha ha ha hU~M ha/_o~M ti o~M ma hA/_be ra ba be/_shing shing /_tra tra tra~M tra~M/_ha ha i ti/_de nas 'jigs byed chen po 'dul bar byed pa'i khro 
[\[157b.7\]]bo des he ru ka'i nga ro 'byin cing mgo bo nas mnan to/_/rdo rje he ru ka'i rol pa'i bdag nyid kyi mthu chen pos 'jigs byed chen po'i nga ro 'byin cing rgyu ma'i sbu gu drangs nas khrag dang rus pa dang rkang rnams za zhing chem chem mdzad pas/_de'i 'khor la la 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]rab tu ston par mdzad/_ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang sgren mor byas te sma phab nas he ru ka'i tshogs chen po'i mthu dang gzi byin bskyed nas/_'khor thams cad thul skyabs 'og tu yang btsud nas dam tshig la gnas te yang dag par bzhugs so/_/de nas 
[\[158a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das khro bo drug po'i bzhad pas bzhad cing /_o~M badzra b+h+r-i ku Ti ha na ha na/_gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na/_ma ta ma ta/_ki na tsa ri ya/_si su ra ma hA sa/_sra ti re ke ba su ra dza la na la ra tshi pra ti dza li ta/_ma su ra ta~M/_A ka ta Ta A ka ta Ta/_a phya wa/_a phya wa/_kr-iSh+Na tsakra be 
[\[158a.3\]]ra brti da yan hU~M bri/_de nas khrag 'thung gi sngags/_/o~M badzra sUr+ya b+h+r-i ku Ti/_khro da ma hA kri te/_da ra ba da ra ba/_su ra du ra ti/_o~M sa me dad ma ni tsa na/_o~M bra bra bi bra~M ba/_/de nas rta gdong gi khro bo chen po'i sngags/_ba hri/_o~M ma hA badzra ba da/_ba mu ga_/kha kha/_khA hi khA hi/_
[\[158a.4\]]tsa dur mu khang /_ba ba bi ba/_a ru ti ram/_ma kAr+ya hr-i da yan/_dra na/_dam de'u/_badzra ba daM ba mu ka_/hi hi/_sha hi sha ma hA she sha hi hi/_de nas rdo rje chen po'i rta gad chen po mdzad cing bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen pos khros pa dang bcas pa'i lta bas gzigs 
[\[158a.5\]]te/_o~M gu lu gu lu badzra ma hA kro d+ha A kar Sha ya/_A kar Sha ya/_sha kra hr-i da yA na ma hA badzra daM Sh+TAM ya/_hU~M b+hak+Sha ya shriM/_de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po rnal 'byor pa rnams dang rol cing /_rang gi shin tu dgyes pa'i kun du longs spyod pa'i khro bo chen po'i dkyil 
[\[158a.6\]]'khor du bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'du ba mdzad nas/_bcom ldan 'das la bskul ba mdzad do/_/o~M ma hA su ra ta/_badzra ma hA kro d+ha pa saM ha ra pa saM ha ra/_sarba kro d+ha ma sha ma sha ma/_pra sha ma pra sha ma/_sarba kro d+ha 
[\[158a.7\]]u ts+tshuSh+ma kro d+ha b+ha ba sam ya/_ma hA ma dre le sta ma ya/_sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta kro d+ha ma ba ba ya/_dz+wa la ya sha kra pA daM/_bai sha ra ma ye/_sha ra ma hA/_b+ha ga ban+d+ha/_su ra ti/_sarba ta thA ga tA sA dA na/_sa ma ye na tsa hoH/_su ra ta/_sa ma i ti/_de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/o~M dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/_TAk+ki hU~M dza hU~M TAk+ki hU~M TUk+ki hU~M/_o~M ga ta she hU~M dzaH/_A kar Sha ya/_pra be sha ya/_b+han+d+ha ya/_pa shi ku ru/_sarba kro d+ha sa ma ya/_dzaHhU~M ya~M hoH/_TAk+ki hU~M dzaHdzaHhU~M/_TAk+ki hU~M/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi khro bo chen po 'di phyung 
[\[158b.2\]]ngo /_/o~M sum b+ha ni sum b+ha ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M phaT/_bdud rtsi'i khro bo'i dbang mo 'di phyung ngo /_/o~M badzra a mr-i ta ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri/_uts+tsha badzra a mr-i ta hU~M AH/_de nas bcom ldan 'das ma bdud rtsi chen mo 'di kun du khros te/_ru lu ru lu zhes bya ba 'byin cing rang gi pad+mo la

[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]smad dkris thod pa se ral khar thogs ma dang /_mi ro rgyu ma tshems kyis 'dren pa'i rdo rje zab mo dang /_khrag gi thig les brgyan pa'i rdo rje dri tshor ma dang /_zhing chung 'dzin pa'i rdo rje 'khrug ma dang /_rdo rje zhag gi tshom bu can chen mo dang /_rdo rje mi ro

[\[162a.3\]]ba mo dang /_zas su khrag tshil za ba'i rdo rje srin mo dang /_kun la dbang mdzad rdo rje pad+ma 'dzin pa dang /_zas su sha rlon za ba'i rdo rje rnga mo dang /_e ma ma tshogs rdo rje za byed ma dang /_dpal ldan chen po rdo rje lcang lo can ma dang /_kha nas rdo rje me 'bar rgya mtsho skems ma 
[\[162a.4\]]dang /_lag na bdud rtsi rdo rje 'dzin ma dang /_nag mo mig gcig rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin ma dang /_sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs pa'i rdo rje gshog pa can dang /_lcags kyi bya khra khyung gi g.yu mig can dang /_thal ba'i mtshan mas rdo rje 'byug ma dang /_rdo rje ral 
[\[162a.5\]]gcig chen mo za byed ma dang /_rdo rje tri shUl thogs pa'i zhag gi tshom bu can dang /_tsham ngam drag shul spyod pa'i rdo rje sgrol ma dang /_'jigs pa'i gzugs can rdo rje bdud 'dul mo dang /_rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdo rje gzugs can ma dang /_cir yang 'gyur ba'i rdo rje rdzu 
[\[162a.6\]]'phrul can dang /_khro gnyer spyan bgrad rnal 'byor sngo nag chen mo dang /_mche ba gtsigs pa'i ral pa 'khyil ma dang /_thod pa rlon pa'i rdo rje mun tsal dang /_dbu gsum phyag drug rdo rje mi lpags g.yang gzhi gsol ba dang /_sti ra chung ngu mang po brgyus nas brgyan 
[\[162a.7\]]te rdo rje brjid ma dang /_tsham ngam brkyang bskum rdo rje 'jig rten skrag ma dang /_bdud bzhi gnon pa'i rdo rje b+han d+har ldan pa dang /_stir chen glo snying 'dren pa'i rdo rje khrag 'thung ma dang 'jigs su rung ba'i rngubs pa'i rde'u chung thogs pa'i rdo rje rkan sgra can dang /_log par lta 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]ba'i rdo rje bdud rnams 'dul ba dang /_ro la rngam pa'i rdo rje za ba mo dang /_gsod cing sbyong ba'i rnal 'byor sngo nag ma dang /_khro gnyer spyan bgrad rdo rje mche gtsigs ma dang /_tsham ngam chen mo mdzad pa'i tri shUl mda' 'phen rdo rje 'gengs ma dang /_dgyes par byed pa'i rdo rje se gol 
[\[162b.2\]]rdebs ma dang /_'gugs par byed pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor dmar nag 'jigs pa'i sku dang /_sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje yum chen mo dang /_rnal 'byor chen mo dur khrod bdag mo dang /_tsham ngam gar mkhan chen mo rdo rje stabs tshul can dang /_rnal 'byor mthing nag rdo rje stir 
[\[162b.3\]]chen za ba mo dang /_bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i rdo rje gdug pa klad 'gems ma dang /_gsod pa'i las la dgyes pa'i khro mo rdo rje ljang ma dang /_khro gnyer 'jigs pa'i dbu gcig phyag drug ma dang /_rdo rje tri shUl rde'u 'dzin pa'i rdo rje rkan sgra rdebs ma dang /_'ching zhing sdom 
[\[162b.4\]]pa'i rnal 'byor ser nag dang /_gtum mo zhe sdang stir chen za ba mo dang /_zhing chen nang grol 'byin cing rdo rje tsham ngam can dang /_sgrol bar byed pa'i rdo rje mthing nag dang /_spyan bgrad mche gtsigs rdo rje chen mo dang /_sti ra 'dren pa'i rdo rje khrag 'thung zhal du stobs ma dang /_
[\[162b.5\]]spu gris 'debs pa'i rdo rje b+han d+har ldan ma dang /_zangs gris 'debs shing kha T+wAM 'phen pa'i rdo rje sha za ba mo dang /_ro la brkam pa'i rdo rje za stangs chen mo dang /_rdo rje ser nag seng ge mgo can dang /_mche gtsigs spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i rdo rje sdang mig can dang /_mche 
[\[162b.6\]]tshogs mang pos bskor ba'i rdo rje zhe sdang 'joms ma dang /_mthing nag rdo rje seng ge ral pa can dang /_rdo rje ye shes sku'i cha lugs 'chang ma dang /_mi 'jigs sti ra'i g.yang gzhi gsol ma dang /_srog chags mang po'i snying 'byin rdo rje klad 'gems ma dang /_
[\[162b.7\]]dmar mo chen mo sti ra mgo can dang /_ye shes lnga'i rdo rje cha lugs 'chang ma dang /_mi 'jigs bzhi'i g.yang gzhi se ral khar thogs ma dang /_bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong zhing las mdzad ma dang /_b+han d+ha rak+tas bkang nas gtso la stobs shing dgra 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]sdang klad 'gems ma dang /_gsod byed sngo nag dur bya'i mgo can dang /_mche tshogs 'khor du bskor zhing 'dod chags 'joms pa'i rdo rje za ba mo dang /_thal chen rak+tas rdo rje sku la brgyan ma dang /_spu gri mgo gcod b+han d+ha 'thung zhing gsod la dga' 
[\[163a.2\]]ba mo dang /_rdo rje zhags pa 'ching zhing khrag 'thung zhal du stobs pa dang /_mthing nag 'gying stabs rdo rje shwa na khyi mgo can dang /_glo snying 'dren pa'i rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin ma dang /_phrag dog 'joms par byed pa'i rdo rje za ba dang /_dmar nag 'gying ba'i bya rgod mgo can 
[\[163a.3\]]dang /_zhing chen rgyu 'dren gti mug 'joms par byed ma dang /_gshog tshogs mang pos bskor ba'i thod rlon 'dzin ma dang /_ser nag 'gying ba'i pho rog mgo can dang /_klu rnams 'dum par byed pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'chang ma dang /_mthing nag 'gying ba bya rog 
[\[163a.4\]]mgo can dang /_ser nag gsod par byed pa'i mgo can dang /_sha khrag za ba'i mkha' 'gro dbu gsum ma dang /_lcags kyus 'dren pa mi 'jigs sbyor ba dang /_rdo rje bka'i pho nya spyan gsum mche ba can dang /_rdo rje bran mo gtum bag can dang /_'jigs pa'i 
[\[163a.5\]]gzugs can rdo rje khrag 'thung ma dang /_snying rje phag gi mgo can dang /_rdo rje sbrul gyi mgo can dang /_rdo rje gzig gi mgo can dang /_rdo rje byi ba'i mgo can dang /_rdo rje pha bang mgo can dang /_rdo rje dred kyi mgo can dang /_rdo rje dom gyi mgo 
[\[163a.6\]]can dang /_rdo rje sdig pa'i mgo can dang /_rdo rje wa'i mgo can dang /_rdo rje stag gi mgo can dang /_rdo rje rta'i mgo can dang /_rdo rje spyang ki'i mgo can dang /_rdo rje bu shud kyi mgo can dang /_rdo rje sha ba'i mgo can dang /_rdo rje skyin gyi mgo can dang /_rdo rje phag gi mgo can 
[\[163a.7\]]dang /_rdo rje rnga mo'i mgo can dang /_rdo rje bya rog mgo can dang /_rdo rje spang ti'i mgo can dang /_rdo rje ske ka'i mgo can dang /_rdo rje khra'i mgo can dang /_rdo rje spre'u mgo can dang /_rdo rje khu byug mgo can dang /_rdo rje seng ge mgo can dang /_rdo rje pha bang mgo can dang /_rdo rje sha ba'i mgo can dang /_
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]rdo rje srin bya'i mgo can dang /_rdo rje sre mo mgo can dang /_rdo rje zer mo mgo can dang /_rdo rje dmag pa thang gog gi mgo can dang /_rdo rje nyi ma'i zhags pa can dang /_rdo rje me lce glog phreng 'dzin dang /_rdo rje srin mo mdung thung 'phen pa dang /_rdo rje ral gri sgra 'byin ma dang /_rdo rje klu 
[\[163b.2\]]mo thog 'bebs mo dang /_rdo rje 'jigs byed ba lang gi sna dang /_rdo rje gnod sbyin khyung gdong ma dang /_rdo rje lag na khrag thogs ma dang /_rdo rje zla ba skar mda' ltar gtong ba dang /_rdo rje dam tshig bsrung ma dpal phreng ma dang /_/rdo rje lag na phur bu 'dril ma dang /_rdo rje ri rab bsnyil 
[\[163b.3\]]ba'i rngam stangs can dang /_rdo rje dmar mo spyan gsum shin tu mi srun ma dang /_rdo rje cir yang 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul can chen mo dang /_rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i mgyogs ma dang /_rdo rje smug nag gtibs pa'i me dpal can dang /_rdo rje keng rus 'cha' ba'i tshems rnon ma dang /_
[\[163b.4\]]rdo rje bzhad ma'i shin tu gad rgyangs chen mo dang /_rdo rje nang grol 'dren ma kang ka'i mgo can dang /_rdo rje sgra 'byin 'brug sgrogs ma dang /_rdo rje bdud rtsi rin chen char 'bebs ma dang /_rdo rje shugs 'chang rdo rje sgrol ma dang /_rdo rje dbang mo rdo rje sder mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje 
[\[163b.5\]]shan pa spu gri rnon po'i so can dang /_rdo rje go cha sra bar byed pa dang /_rdo rje sprin tshogs mang po sdud par byed pa dang /_rdo rje 'ur 'ur shig shig g.yo bar byed pa dang /_rdo rje rkan sgra rdebs pa'i drag shul can chen mo dang /_rdo rje za bar byed pa'i phaT phaT sgrogs ma dang /_
[\[163b.6\]]rdo rje brkyang bskum gshin rje gnon ma dang /_rdo rje zhing chen khrag 'dzag thod rlon sku la brgyan pa dang /_rdo rje drag po'i nga ro 'byin pa'i gdong gsum ma dang /_rdo rje yud tsam 'dul phyogs bcur 'phro ma dang /_rdo rje seng ge stabs su mchongs pa'i nga rgyal can dang /_rdo rje sprul 
[\[163b.7\]]pa mang po 'gyed pa'i bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje stir gnas myul bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje dam tshig gi tshogs myul ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje phyi nang mtshams myul ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje dam tshig gi rjes gcod ma bya khra khyi 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje de bya'i sbyor myul ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje 'dod chags ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje dur khrod ro za 'dul ba'i bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje dmar mo bkra gsal dbang sdud ma dang /_rdo rje ser mo sbrul gyi ska 
[\[164a.2\]]rags can dang /_rdo rje gnam lcags 'ur mo thog 'bebs ma dang /_rdo rje brgyal byed dngangs par byed ma dang /_rdo rje bsdams pas srin mo brgyal bar byed ma dang /_rdo rje kha nas mi khrag rta khrag 'dzag ma dang /_rdo rje dbu stong phyag stong bdud kyi dpung rnams 'dul bar 
[\[164a.3\]]byed ma dang /_rdo rje 'bum phrag yangs pa'i mkha' 'gro chen mo dang /_rdo rje ral pa spyi gtsug 'khyil ma dang /_rdo rje sku yis rol pa'i mkha' 'gro 'bar ma dang /_rdo rje gsung gi sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed ma dang /_rdo rje thugs kyi sgyu 'phrul mnga' ba chen mo dang /_
[\[164a.4\]]rdo rje thugs kyi sgyu 'phrul dbang phyug mo dang /_rdo rje rin chen sku'i dbang phyug ma dang /_rdo rje pad+mo dbang phyug ma dang /_rdo rje dbyings la sbyor zhing stan byed ma dang /_rdo rje mgyogs ma dbu dgu ma dang /_rdo rje sgra 'byin ma dang /_rdo rje tsher ma dang /_rdo rje myong ma dang /_rdo rje reg 
[\[164a.5\]]byed kun la 'khyams dang /_rdo rje dmar nag dbu gsum ma dang /_rdo rje sngo nag ral pa can chen mo dang /_rdo rje ljang nag dbu brgya ma dang /_rdo rje ljang sngo dbu drug ma dang /_rdo rje ba lang gi mgo can ma dang /_rdo rje ser nag dbu [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga ma dang /_rdo rje smug nag dbu brgya ma 
[\[164a.6\]]dang /_rdo rje ljang ser khro gtum dbu dgu ma dang /_rdo rje ser mo dbu gcig ma dang /_rdo rje dkar mo dbu lnga ma dang /_rdo rje nag mo dbu gsum ma dang /_rdo rje bsnyems ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje ser mo bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje dur khrod kyi bdag mo 
[\[164a.7\]]bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje gtun khung ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje mda' bsnyag ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje skul byed ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje rlung 'byin ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje rjod byed ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]rdo rje 'jigs byed ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje bdud rtsi sbyor ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje 'phrog ma brlag byed ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje rmongs byed ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje yid 'phrog ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje khrag 
[\[164b.2\]]'joms ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje tshe 'joms ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje rmugs byed ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje srin mo snying zan ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje skul ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje 'bebs ma bya khra khyi sgyigs 
[\[164b.3\]]can dang /_rdo rje dpal bdag ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje rkan 'jib ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje gnas ma mgyogs byed ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje sgrub pa tshe 'dzin ma bya khra khyi sgyigs can dang /_rdo rje thod rlon dang sbrul nag 'khyil ba 
[\[164b.4\]]can dang /_rdo rje zhing chen stod g.yogs chu srin smad g.yogs can dang /_rdo rje za byed kha 'bar ma dang /_rdo rje nam mkha' lding dang /_rdo rje khra dang 'ug pa dang /_rdo rje bya rgod chen mo dang /_rdo rje byan lag dang /_rdo rje kang ka'i lus la chu srin gyi mgo can dang /_rdo rje 
[\[164b.5\]]gshog pa gtams pa dang /_rdo rje sder mo lcags kyu ma dang /_rdo rje mchu rtse gcig ma'i gdong can ma dang /_rdo rje so gri can dang /_rdo rje kha gdangs ma dang /_rdo rje karma mud ka ra dang /_rdo rje 'jigs par byed pa'i gzugs can dang /_rdo rje smigs bu'i mgo can dang /_rdo rje 
[\[164b.6\]]khwa'i mgo can dang /_rdo rje yid las byung ba'i mdun pa mo dang /_rdo rje myos pa mo dang /_rdo rje dra ba mo dang /_rdo rje ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje byed pa dang /_rdo rje dang ba mo dang /_rdo rje kha spu can dang /_rdo rje ral gri spu can dang /_rdo rje lcags kyi pags pa can dang /_rdo rje 
[\[164b.7\]]zangs kyi kha spu can dang /_rdo rje ka li pi ka'i dbyings can dang /_rdo rje dbang sbyin ma'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje dgyes pa chen mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje sgyu 'phrul gyi tshogs dang /_rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs dang /_rdo rje snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje ched du 'dzin 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje rab tu gtogs pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje gsang ba'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje gzugs kyi tshogs dang /_rdo rje sgra'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje dri'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje ro'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje reg gi tshogs dang /_rdo rje khro 
[\[165a.2\]]mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje gos gyon pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje bza' btung gi tshogs dang /_rdo rje bro gar gyi tshogs dang /_rdo rje ngo mtshar gyi tshogs dang /_rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje klu mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje dbye bar byed ma'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje pad+mo phreng ba ma'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje bde 
[\[165a.3\]]ba mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje sprin sdud ma'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje dgyes pa mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje mnyam pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje nyi zla'i 'od kyi tshogs dang /_rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje yid bzhin gyi tshogs dang /_rdo rje mchog phran 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje zhing 
[\[165a.4\]]'dzin pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje nga rgyal can gyi tshogs dang /_rdo rje thim par byed pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje ngo mtshar chen po'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje 'khor lo ma'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje pad+mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje mnyam par rdzogs pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje bka' nyan 
[\[165a.5\]]sprul pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje dngos grub las kyi tshogs dang /_rdo rje spyod pas ci la'ang thogs pa med pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje rigs su thabs mkhas pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje 'od 'phro ba 'bar ba'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje chags pa med pa'i tshul du gnas pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje 
[\[165a.6\]]sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje rigs su skyes pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje me stag phra mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje sems ma ye shes su snang ba'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje med pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje snyom las med pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje sgyid lug med pa'i 
[\[165a.7\]]tshogs dang /_rdo rje the tshom med par bsgrub pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje gsang ba ma'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa ma'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje rnam par spros pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje rgyan bkod pa mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje bstan pa mo'i 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]tshogs dang /_rdo rje nam mkha' la rgyu ba mo'i tshogs dang /_snying rje skyon dag pa mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje phyogs 'dzin pa mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje gdul ba mo'i dgongs pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje rten pa mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje tshigs mtshon pa mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje gab pa 
[\[165b.2\]]mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje sbas pa mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje thugs 'dzin pa mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje 'byung ba mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje shes rab 'dzin pa mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje bde ba'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje thugs kyi ye shes 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje drang snang mo'i tshogs 
[\[165b.3\]]dang /_rdo rje rang 'byung mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje kun du mang ba'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje shes rab kyi mig dang ldan pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje kun bzang longs spyod gnas pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje rmongs par byed pa mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje srog 
[\[165b.4\]]za bar byed pa mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje za ba mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje khrag za ba'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje tshil za ba'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje rkang za ba'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje bsod nams gter 'chang ba'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i tshogs 
[\[165b.5\]]dang /_rdo rje sgra mtha' yas pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje yon tan phrin las kyi tshogs dang /_rdo rje lhun gyis grub pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje sprul pa 'byung ba mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje rgyu las 'byung ba mo'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje gtum bag can dang /_rdo rje gdug pa 
[\[165b.6\]]gtong ba sbrul gyi chun po can dang /_rdo rje 'jigs pa'i mgo brgyad pa dang /_rdo rje mgo sna tshogs par sprul pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje lus stong la mgo bcu pa dang /_rdo rje lus brgya la mgo gcig pa'i tshogs dang /_rdo rje lus sna tshogs dang /_rdo rje yan 
[\[165b.7\]]lag 'bum yod pa dang /_rdo rje gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs thogs pa dang /_rdo rje lus brgya la mgo stong yod pa dang /_rdo rje lus brgya la mgo brgya pa dang /_rdo rje lus bcu la mgo gcig pa dang /_mgo brgya pa la rkang pa brgyad pa dang /_mgo 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]dgu pa la rkang pa gcig pa dang /_de'i 'khor gyi yang sprul gyi pho nya ni lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum po dang /_long brgyab sbrel ba dang /_nag po mgo dgu pa'o/_/shar gyi dkar mo sbyang dung gi khyi mo chen mo dang /_lho'i sbrul gyi zhags pa can dang /_nub kyi dmar mo 
[\[166a.2\]]zangs kyi mche ba can dang /_byang gi ser mo dril bu can dang /_'di rnams kyi pho nya mo ni shar gyi rdo rje sder mo dang /_lho'i nag mo dung gdub ma dang /_nub kyi dmar mo seng ge'i mgo can dang /_byang gi ser mo las kyi bdag mo dang /_rdo rje rus chen phreng ba can dang /_rdo rje zangs kyi 
[\[166a.3\]]phreng ba can dang /_rdo rje lcags kyi phreng ba can dang /_rdo rje ral gri so can dang /_rdo rje nam mkha'i gung gcod ma dang /_rdo rje nyi ma'i zer zhon ma dang /_rdo rje chu bo'i gzhung 'dral ma dang /_rdo rje rgya mtsho'i gting dkrugs ma dang /_'di rnams kyi sku mdog ni sna tshogs pa'o/_/phyag na 
[\[166a.4\]]mtshon cha sna tshogs pa'o/_/drag byed bdag pos sgrol bar byed pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru kas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las pho nya'i las 'di gsungs so/_/o~M hU~M pho nya sum brgya drug cu rnams/_/yud tsam gyis ni kun 'dul zhing /_/yud tsam 
[\[166a.5\]]gyis ni phyogs bcur 'phro/_/hU~M dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing /_/bskal pa'i 'brug sgra chen po ldir/_/mgo gsum po la lcags sder can/_/mi sha za zhing bdud dpung 'joms/_/bltas pas bdud rnams tshig byed cing /_/klu yi khyim rnams rab tu 'joms/_/rab tu mi srun 'di 
[\[166a.6\]]dag ni/_/'di yang dpal gyi pho nya ste/_/las rnams thams cad grub par gyis/_/mtshan dang dpe byad gnyis las 'phros/_/mgyogs pa mgyogs ma'i pho nyar ldan/_/glog 'gyu ma dang 'dra bar grags/_/chos nyid khyab pas mtshan ma dbyings su sdud/_/ye shes thugs rjes 
[\[166a.7\]]'brel pas kun la khyab/_/phrin las dra bas 'gro ba rlabs kyis grol/_/de phyir lha mo rin chen dra ba ma/_/o~M dz+wa la badzra hU~M/_ye shes glog 'gyus mtshan ma dbyings su gcod/_/skad cig thugs rjes 'khor ba dbye bsal byed/_/phrin las glog 'gyus 'gro ba yud 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]kyis sgrol/_/dra bas sdud la glog 'gyu ma yis 'dren/_/badzra a ma ka hU~M/_'od zer dud ka 'phro ba ni/_/hU~M dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing /_/bskal pa'i 'brug sgra chen po bzhin/_/kun kyang mgyogs ma rlung dang mtshungs/_/mig gsum yo la lcags sder can/_/mgo 
[\[166b.2\]]gsum po la rkang gsum pa/_/mang du za zhing bdud khyim 'joms/_/bltas pas bdud rnams tshig byed cing /_/klu yi gnas kyang nges par 'joms/_/'di rnams khro bo pho nya ste/_/ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing /_/gang gis rlung phyogs song ba yi/_/khro bo thams cad 
[\[166b.3\]]nges par 'jig_/na mo byi tsir b+h+yo/_/ha ha ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/_/mgo brgyad po la rkang brgyad po/_/lag pa brgyad la mig kyang brgyad/_/lag pa brgyad ni rdo rje 'dzin/_/rta mgrin gnas kyang nges par 'joms/_/mgo drug po la rkang drug po/_/lag pa drug ni rgyud drug gcod/_/
[\[166b.4\]]rkang pa gsum ni phur bu 'dril/_/g.yon pa gsum ni gtor ma sbyin/_/gang nas gang du 'gro ba'i tshe/_/rkang pa lcags phur rab tu drag_/'od zer dud kas reg pa ni/_/tshangs pa'i gnas kyang rab tu 'jig_/lag pa g.yon pas bskyod pa ni/_/phra men 'khor 
[\[166b.5\]]bcas ral par 'bar/_/lcags kyus dgra sta rab thogs shing /_/zhing chen yan lag 'dzin pa 'phro/_/byang gi phyogs nas 'byung ba ni/_/lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum po/_/lcags kyi lus la nyi ma'i mig_/spu ni lcags kyu bsregs pa 'dra/_/bang ni glog 
[\[166b.6\]]pas nges par mgyogs/_/skad ni 'brug pas shin tu che/_/rab tu mi srun 'di dag ni/_/phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang 'phrog_/mgo dgu po la rkang gcig po/_/lus kyang gnag la 'od phung gnag_/yan lag gnag la sbrul gyis brgyan/_/ral pa gnag cing 
[\[166b.7\]]mche ba gnag_/mig kyang gnag la lag nag po/_/mgyogs kyang rlung gis bskyod du med/_/'di dag pho nya'i mchog yin pas/_/las rnams thams cad grub par gyis/_/long ba rgyab sbrel phyi ma nang /_/maM sa za zhing ri lu sgrol/_/mig kyang med la cang mi 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]smra/_/yang na lag pa sbrel te 'gro/_/'di yang khro bo'i pho nya ste/_/las rnams thams cad grub par byed/_/shar gyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/_/dung gi khyi mo chen mo la/_/dung gi ba lang sna khrid can/_/dung gi mi mo chen mo zhon/_/lag na lcags 
[\[167a.2\]]kyu 'bar ba thogs/_/lho yi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/_/lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum pa/_/lcags kyi spyang mo mgo dgu la/_/lcags kyi mi mo chen mo zhon/_/lag na zhags pa sgril ma thogs/_/nub kyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/_/zangs kyi khyi mo chen mo la/_/
[\[167a.3\]]zangs kyi mi mo chen mo zhon/_/lag na lcags sgrog sgril ma thogs/_/byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/_/gser gyi khyi mo chen mo la/_/gser gyi mi mo chen mo zhon/_/lag na rdo rje phur bu 'dril/_/'di yang dpal gyi pho nya ste/_/las rnams thams 
[\[167a.4\]]cad grub par gyis/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka pho nya bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/_/dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/_/dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la/_/dbus su bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i rol ba/_sku mdog 
[\[167a.5\]]mthing nag dbu sum brgya phyag drug brgya pa zhig dgod/_shar du rdo rje til mar dgod/_lhor stag gi mgo can dgod/_nub tu g.yag gi mgo can dgod/_byang du sbrul gyi mgo can dgod/_de'i phyi rim pad+ma la brgya rtsa brgyad rim pa gsum la pho nya sum brgya bcu 
[\[167a.6\]]dgod do/_/de'i phyi rim snam bu la pho nya lnga bcu rtsa brgyad dgod do/_/de'i phyi rim snam bu la yang sbrul gyi pho nya dgod do/_/de'i phyi rim sgo ba bzhi/_/pho nya las byed bzhi dgod do/_/ci bgyi dang /_bka' nyan dang /_bka'i pho nya dang /_sprul pa dang /_yang sprul pa dang /_'di rnams 
[\[167a.7\]]yang dag pa'i bden du ngas par rig par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gsang ba he ru ka'i rol pa las rdo rje pho nya'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las he ru ka'i las kyi 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]bzlas pa 'di gsungs shing phyung ngo /_/bdag med gnyis rtogs sgrib pa gnyis spangs pa/_/thugs rje sprul pas 'gro ba ma lus sgrol/_/yul med ma skyes byams pa'i chos dbyings las/_/'dzin pa mi rtog snying rje zhen chags khro/_/gnyis med dag las phrin las 
[\[167b.2\]]snying rje snyoms/_/dpal chen khrag 'thung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rtog 'joms spyod pa mthun pas 'gro 'dul zhing /_/brda can yan lag len pa'i don go la/_/lha brgyud brjod pas dngos grub kun dang 'brel/_/bka' don gtan tshigs rigs pas brjod 
[\[167b.3\]]par 'os/_/zhes bya ba'i don to//_//lung gsum man ngag gsum dang spyi don gsum/_/lung gi spyi gcod man ngag gdeng du bya/_/spyi khog bcu bzhis don gyi khog phub la/_/bzhi bcom drug ldan rtsis mgos sa gcad de/_/khro bo rtog pa mtshan ma'i gnyer 
[\[167b.4\]]gyis bshad/_/'di ni khrag 'thung rngom brjid rgyal po'i lung zhes tshig nyung zhing mdor 'dus la don mang por 'byung bas mdo'i sde zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/_lung gsum gyis sna grangs te rde'u bya'o/_/man ngag 
[\[167b.5\]]gsum gyis mjug bsdus te blo la bzhag pa'i don to/_/spyi don gsum gyis lung thams cad kyi spyi gcad do/_/spyi khog bcu bzhis don gyi khog dbub bo/_/bdud bzhi bcom pas yon tan kun la snang ba'i che ba bcom mo/_/rtsis mgo drug gis sa 
[\[167b.6\]]gcad do/_/khro bo rtog pa mtshan ma'i gnyer gyis bshad pas ni gol sa dang ni sgrib pa spang ngo /_/yon tan kun rngom pas brjid gzhan la snang phyir rngom brjid chen po sum cu rtsa drug bstan te/_rgyal po yin pa'i rtags ni rin po che sna bdun gyis rgyal 
[\[167b.7\]]por gsol lo/_/lung gis spyi dril de bshad do/_/de ltar rnam pa bcur nges nas/_de ni phye byang ngo bstan te gses nas bshad pa/_de la lung gsum ni zhi gnas mi rtog dngos po mkha' khyab 'dra/_/lhag mthong ma rmongs gza' skar mkha' la bkram/_/
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]gdod bcas don dang bstun de 'tsham par bshad/_/ting 'dzin shes rab bka' lung gsum du nges/_/de la man ngag gsum ni bdag tu mi rtog sprul pa mdzod nas thong /_/yul du ma grub gzhan med mdzad du gshegs/_/yul sems gnyis med ma 
[\[168a.2\]]skyes dbyings su gcig_/nyan thos rang rgyal sems tsam spong man ngag_/de la spyi don gsum ni/_med rgyu btag chags sgrub 'grub bltas par snang /_/spyod mthun khro drag gdug pa'i dpal sos 'dul/_/rtog 'joms sman rdzas dngos len dngos grub rgyu/_/
[\[168a.3\]]'di ni khro bo spyi yi don du bshad/_/de la spyi khog bcu bzhi ni/_gang khro gang la ci phyir gang gis khro/_/gang khro rnam pa bzhir ni shes bya ste/_/ngang khro shugs khro bar bcas dang bcas so/_/rtogs pa thugs rje rang bzhin 'dul ba'i dbang /_/gang la snying 
[\[168a.4\]]rjes khros te yul dang gnas/_/las dang 'bras bu sems can sgrub pa'o/_/las bzhi sgrol mdzad 'bras su sku gsung thugs/_/ci phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis la ni/_/dus gsum mi yang sha rus khrag la rol/_/gang gi ro ni hU~M dang ha he phaT/_/gnas na 
[\[168a.5\]]lta 'og mkha' stong ye shes thugs/_/bskyed thabs cho 'phrul gsum po khro bo'i sku/_/'bras bu dpal chen phra men tshogs kyis bskor/_/phra men las drag 'gro ba cis 'dul mdzad/_/de la bdud bzhi gzhom pa ni/_/tsham ngam drag pos lha chen 'dar 
[\[168a.6\]]'gyel brdzis/_/brtul zhugs rol pas gdos bcas phung po bshig_/dus gsum brlag phyir sha rus khrag la za/_/rnam shes 'chi med rgyal ba'i gnas su stobs/_/rtsis mgo drug ni dbang dang rab tu ldan pa dang /_/dpal dang gzugs dang 
[\[168a.7\]]grags pa dang /_/ye shes dang ni nan tan dang /_/drug dang yang dag ldan phyir ro/_/de la dbang ni chags sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog ni/_/mnyes stobs yum dang 'jigs tshul sku yi sprul/_/dran med thod pa kham por g.yang gzhi ni/_/kha 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]dang rgyal mtshan me dang lha chen gnon/_/de la dpal drug ni/_byams las khyab pa thugs dam dmigs kyis bsgral/_/thugs rjes 'gro ba thams cad bu ltar dgongs/_/smon lam dbang gis 'khor bar ji srid bzhugs/_/gzhan don mdzad pas bdag don lhun gyis grub/_/
[\[168b.2\]]yongs su rdzogs pa bde ba chen po'i dpal/_/khro rgyal khrag 'thung dpal te rnam drug yin/_/de la dpal yongs su rdzogs pa bde ba chen po'i dpal ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa bzhi ste/_/de yang gang zhe na/_sku gsum sa gsum sems dpa' rtogs dka' ba/_/bka' 
[\[168b.3\]]khyab sprin 'dal char 'bab chu bo'i rgyun/_/ting 'dzin bsam yas bo d+his thogs pa de/_/bsam yas bsam khyab mkhas la gza' skar gsal/_/klu mthu gdul phyir klu lngas sku brgyan pa/_/mang chen gsung sgra dbyangs dang pho nya'i dbang /_/dug lngas gdos bcas 'du byed 
[\[168b.4\]]rgyan byas pa/_/khrag sprul g.yang gzhi khwa ta dregs pa 'joms/_/de la gzugs rnam pa gnyis ni/_mi thung bus pa'i gzugs 'dra la/_/a gon la ni rkang lag gtams/_/drang srong khros pa'i cha byad la/_/shin tu mkhrang zhing skems bags bri/_/gnod sbyin snying 
[\[168b.5\]]bags mi mthun gzugs dang ni/_/'dul dbang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]srin po drang srong 'dra/_/de la grags pa ni bud d+ha bo d+his bstod dam sras spun dgongs/_/gti mug gzengs bstod nga rgyal gnon par grags/_/de la ye shes ni/_rnam dag dbyings mkhyen 'khor ba'i skyon 
[\[168b.6\]]dang bral/_/'gro ba'i rgyud mkhyen 'khor ba'i mtha' las 'das/_/gnyis su med par mkhyen pas dbu ma'i ngang /_/mdor na thams cad pa yi ye shes yin/_/de la nan tan ni/_nan tan snying po zag med zag bcas 'du/_/nan tan phrin las 'gro ba gnas nas 'don/_/
[\[168b.7\]]bsam yas nan tan 'gro ba chud mi gson/_/nan tan mchog gis mchog tu shes par bya/_/da ni lung rnam pa gsum spyir dril te bshad do/_/de yang mi 'da' ba rgyan gyi lung dang /_che mchog yon tan gyi lung dang /_yan lag rtags kyi lung gis bshad do/_/de la mi 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]'da' ba rgyan gyi lung ni/_glang chen 'dul stobs theg pa'i rgyan zhes pa/_/bdud 'joms sman rdzas grub dang lta ba'i gzhung /_/stag ni dpa' rtun za byed rgyan zhes pa/_/ye shes thugs rje'i phrin las ngang du bstan/_/sbrul ni mnyen lcug phrin las rgyan zhes pa/_/
[\[169a.2\]]'jigs tshul dug gnon 'khril pa yum gyi rgyan/_/thod phreng dbang sgrol 'chad pa'i rgyan zhes pa/_/sku gsum theg gsum dus gsum dbang chad sgrol/_/g.yang gzhi tshul khrims gos kyi rgyan zhes pa/_/byang chub sems tshul dam khrims gos zhes bya/_/rak+ta 
[\[169a.3\]]thugs rje chags pa'i rgyan zhes pa/_/mi rtog dbyings nas thugs rje'i spyan/_/gzi chen don dam bcud kyi rgyan zhes pa/_/bcud kyi thig le don dam kun du 'ong /_/thal ba 'dul byed phrin las rgyan zhes pa/_/yi ge 'khor los mtshan ma thal bar rlog_/me ni 'bar 'phro 
[\[169a.4\]]'du sreg klong dkyil zhes/_/ye shes thugs rje dbyings 'dul phrin las te/_/zad par byed pa'i mtha' 'das dkyil zhes bya/_/me sgra sgra chen tha dad sgra zhes pa/_/chos sku khyab dang ting 'dzin sna tshogs pa/_/ral pa kham nag snyil zhing phye ma ni/_/de nas chos nyid 
[\[169a.5\]]dbang drag sprul pa 'phro/_/sku mdog mthing nag nam mkha'i rgyan zhes bya/_/'dul dbang mtha' med yon tan dgongs pa gting mi dpogs/_zhes bya'o/_/de la khrag 'thung zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gong du bshad par zad do/_/de la dpal he ru'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan 
[\[169a.6\]]cir yang ma nges par 'byung ste gang ltar bsgyur yang 'grub po zhes bshad do/_/de yang mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya dang /_/de la dngos byung phyag rgya rnams/_/nges pa med par dpa' bos bshad/_/mkhas pas bsgoms la ci dgar 'grub ces 'byung ngo /_/'o na yang 'di'i 
[\[169a.7\]]gnas skabs su/_/he ru ka dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad de/_de yang yan lag rtags kyi lung gis bshad na/_grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang /_mdzad pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang gnyis so/_/de la grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya ni dbu gsum dug gsum sku 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]gsung thugs lhun grub/_/lta spyod rnam gsum grub pa'i rtags/_/spyan dgu sa gsum sku gsum ye shes gsum ste dgu/_/bgrod med thob med dmigs pa las 'das pa/_/rtag chad spyan gnyis mtha' yangs dbu ma'i spyan/_/shangs gsum srog la mnga' 
[\[169b.2\]]mdzad ting 'dzin gsum/_/de bzhin nyid du kun du snang zhes bya/_/sgra chen tha dad sgra chen chos sku ting 'dzin snyan/_/zhal gsum rnam thar sgo gsum lhun gyis grub/_/ljags gsum theg gsum mthar phyin shes bya'i rtags/_/mche bzhi phrin las mthar 
[\[169b.3\]]phyin zhi ba'i tshul/_/ye shes drug ni mthar phyin phyag drug ste/_/pha rol phyin drug mthar phyin phyag mtshan drug_/zhabs bzhi lam bzhir bgrod pa med pa thob/_/de la mdzad pa rtags zhes bya ba ni/_spyan dgu sa dgu 'dul ba'i bye brag gzigs/_/spyan 
[\[169b.4\]]gsum srid gsum mgo rgyud so sor mkhyen/_/shangs gsum nas byung sprul pas stong gsum 'gengs/_/snyan drug 'gro drug gnas nas ci gsol gsan/_/dbu gsum srid gsum mgon mdzad sku gsung thugs/_/zhal gsum dbyings su dug gsum 
[\[169b.5\]]zad par rngub/_/ljags gsum theg gsum bstan pa'i gdangs ngar sgrogs/_/khams gsum nyug byed rdo rje srin mo lce/_/mche bzhi skye shi rtsa nas gcod par mdzad/_/phyag drug rgyud drug 'khor ba gting nas 'don/_/phyag mtshan pha rol phyin drug 'gro don mdzad/_/zhabs 
[\[169b.6\]]bzhir phrin las rnam bzhi bgrod med sgrol/_/yan lag rtags kyi lung gis 'di ltar yang dag bshad/_/rdo rje ye shes pha rol phyin pa ni/_/rang bzhin mi 'gyur las ni 'bigs shing 'joms/_/chos sku rdo rje rtog dang bag chags bsreg_/ye shes yin phyir de la de skad bya/_/b+han 
[\[169b.7\]]d+ha bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa ni/_/chos dbyings spros med ye shes bzhi dang ldan/_/ye shes dbyings rtog zhen khrag thugs rje skyed/_/mtha' gnyis skyon la mi bsngags bzod pa'i mchog_/kha T+wAM stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa ni/_/dug gsum dga' byed dregs pa'i lha bdud 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]'joms/_/stong gsum srid pa yo 'dul rgyal po'i rtags/_/kun la mnga' mdzad 'khor rnams dbang du sdud/_/zhing chen smon lam pha rol phyin pa ni/_/'bod pa'i g.yab mos 'khor rnams dbang du sdud/_/sbyin pa'i za bas mkha' 'gro tshim par byed/_/rdeg 
[\[170a.2\]]pa'i dbyig pas gdon bcas phung po bshig_/rtog pa chos nyid dran med shes lnga bzung /_/ci ltar smon cing grub pas de skad bya/_/thong gshol thabs kyis pha rol phyin pa ni/_/nyon mongs tha ba thugs rjes zlog mdzad cing /_/ye shes chos dbyings mtha' dang bral ba'i rtags/_/
[\[170a.3\]]thabs kyis sku gsum lhun grub sprul pa 'phro/_/brda ni shes rab pha rol phyin bstan pa/_/yul med ma skyes chos sku rnga sgo la/_/'dzin pa bdag med rig pa'i dbyu gus brdungs/_/gsung rab rnga sgras 'gro ba shes rab skyed/_/'khor lo bsam gtan lhag pa gsum gyi mtshan/_/
[\[170a.4\]]tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab gsum dang ldan/_/pad+ma 'dam skyes ma chags thugs rjes spyod/_/tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa'i ngang du bstan/_/mi zad par ldan sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/_/ral gri ye shes thugs rje mtha' gnyis gcod/_/rtse gcig ting 'dzin 
[\[170a.5\]]gnyis las brtson 'grus mdzad/_/dgra sta zhags pa la sogs phyag mtshan rnams/_/rang gnyer las kyi brda tsam chos sku rtogs par bstan/_/de la 'di man chad che mchog yon tan gyi lung gis spyir dril te bshad pa ni/_yon tan gyi brjid la phrin las kyi rngom 
[\[170a.6\]]sum cu rtsa drug bstan pa ni de la sku'i rngom pa bzhi la nam mkha' ri mo phyag rgyar rngom/_cir yang 'gyur bzhi bzhugs tshul rngom/_zil gyis gnon pa'i gdan rngom/_tsham ngam chen po'i stobs rngom pa dang bzhi'o/_/de yang kun rdzob rang bzhin med pa la nam mkha' 
[\[170a.7\]]la sprin da ba'i tshul dang /_lha dang 'phags pa tshangs pa dang /_smon lam cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs thabs kyi tshul dang /_srid pa'i 'khor lo zil gyis gnon pa dri med pad+ma nyi zla 'od yon tan rtags de gdan khri'i tshul dang /_stobs chen bcu'i tshul dang /_rnam pa 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]ni 'og nas 'chad do/_/gsung gi rngom bzhi la hom lnga 'brel par 'byung ba'i zhal rngom/_zla gam cir yang 'gyur ba'i ljags rngom/_skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshems rngom/_gsung sgra 'brug ltar sgrogs pa'i dbyangs rngom pa'o/_/de yang zhal ye shes kyi phyag rgya 
[\[170b.2\]]rnam pa lnga'i bsreg khang du ro rnam pa lngas tshim zhing mchod pa 'brel ba rnam lnga'i tshul dang /_gsung dbyangs tshul 'dus byas dang /_rang bzhin zung ma 'dres par ston pa'i tshul dang /_mche ba bzhi ye shes bzhi'i 'phro 'dus dug bzhi ye shes bzhis gcod pa'i 
[\[170b.3\]]tshul dang /_'brug ltar sgrogs pa'i yan lag drug cu'i dbyangs kyis snyan pa'i mdo sdes go bar sgrogs shing zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang rnam par bshad do/_/thugs kyi rngom pa bzhi la ting nge 'dzin phyag rgya'i rgyan gyi skar tshogs ltar rngom/_phrin las rgya 
[\[170b.4\]]mtsho rgyan gyi dba' rlabs ltar rngom/_yon tan sa gzhi rgyan gyi rtsi shing ltar rngom/_mdzad pa rol mo rgyan gyi gar thabs ltar rngom pa'o/_/de yang rgya chen po bzhi ni rang bzhin dang rgyan du dbye'o/_/lhag mthong gi rang bzhin las lhag mthong gi rgyan ma 
[\[170b.5\]]g.yos par snang ba'i tshul dang /_zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin las zhi gnas kyi rgyan khyad par du 'byung ba'i tshul dang /_zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin bzod pa las lhag mthong gi rgyan gyis phan 'dogs pa'i tshul dang /_zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin mi zad ma gol ba las 
[\[170b.6\]]lhag mthong gi rgyan gyis cir yang 'gyur ba'i dga' bskyed pa'i tshul lo/_/mthu'i rngom pa bzhi la ru tra bcos pa'i gnas rngom/_lha chen gnon pa'i gdan rngom/_khams gsum sgrol ba'i zhing rngom/_/rtogs 'joms spyod pa'i brtul zhugs rngom/_de 
[\[170b.7\]]yang gnas khyad par can bkra shis shing cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i tshul dang /_gnas khyad par can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang /_zhing khyad par can khams gsum yo sgrol ba'i tshul dang /_spyod pa khyad par can srid pa'i rtog 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]pa dus gcig tu bcom pa'i tshul lo/_/rngom tshul sum cu rtsa gnyis bshad do/_/de la brjid chen po la/_sku che yan lag rags pas brjid che/_grangs mang rkyen dang 'tsham pas brjid che/_bkur 'os gtso bor mthong bas brjid che/_khyad zhugs yid 
[\[171a.2\]]dang 'thad pas brjid che ba ste bzhi'o/_/de yang chos sku dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas sku che/_thugs rje dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas sprul rags/_sems 'du byed dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas sprul pa grangs mang /_/smon lam gyi sgo nas rigs dang 
[\[171a.3\]]mthun pa'i rkyen du 'tsham/_spyod lam gyi sgo nas bkur bar 'os/_rigs btsun pa'i sgo nas gtso bor mthong /_rang bzhin grub pa'i sgo nas khyad zhugs/_phrin las kyi sgo nas yid dang 'thad/_gsung gi brjid bzhi la gdangs che stong gsum gang bas brjid che/_tshig myur 
[\[171a.4\]]the tsom gcod pas brjid che/_bdag la cher ston snyam pas brjid che/_khyad zhugs yon tan mthong bas brjid che de yang chos skus khyab pa'i sgo nas sgra che/_sgra tha dad pa'i sgo nas stong gsum gang /_sgra dbyangs sgo nas kun gyis go bas myur/_nye bar bsgyur ba'i sgo nas 
[\[171a.5\]]the tsom gcod/_byams pa'i sgo nas bdag la gzigs/_thugs rje'i sgo nas nyi tsher ston/_shes pa'i bye brag gi sgo nas khyad zhugs/_tshig gi yon tan gyi sgo nas 'dul/_thugs kyi brjid bzhi la/_yangs pa re dogs med pas brjid che/_gsal ba mtha' 
[\[171a.6\]]gnyis spangs pas brjid che/_thugs rje thugs dam mthar 'byin pas brjid che/_ma rmongs thabs kyis 'dul bas brjid che'o/_/de yang gnyis med pa'i sgo nas yangs/_spang blang med pa'i sgo nas re dogs med/_lhag mthong gi sgo nas dbu mar gsal/_zhi gnas 
[\[171a.7\]]kyi sgo nas mi 'gyur bas gnyis mtha' spangs/_mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sgo nas thugs rje che/_'khor ba ci srid bzhugs pa'i sgo nas thugs dam mthar 'byin/_shes rab kyi sgo nas rmongs pa sel/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams thabs kyis 'dul/_yon 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]tan gyi brjid pa bzhi la/_med pa zad mi shes pas brjid che/_gcig la 'dod dgur ston pas brjid che/_gnod sbyor phan par 'dod pas brjid che/_thabs mkhas skyon gyis mi gos pas brjid che'o/_/de yang bdag tu mi 'dzin pa'i sgo nas med/_med pa'i sgo nas zad mi shes/_ye shes kyi sgo nas 
[\[171b.2\]]gcig_/sems kyi sgo nas 'dod dgur ston/_/sems kyi sgo nas gnod par sbyor/_/grub pa rgyu'i sgo nas phan par mdzad/_/shes bya'i sgo nas thabs mkhas/_spyod pa'i sgo nas skyon gyis ma gos/_phrin las kyi brjid bzhi 
[\[171b.3\]]la/_mi mnyel nyams phag rol pas brjid che/_'khor ba yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]mi mnyel bar brjid che/_mgon skyabs rgyun du mdzad pas brjid che/_dgongs pa'i don rnams mdzad pas brjid che'o/_/de yang sgyu mar gyur pa'i sgo nas mi mnyel/_rang bzhin 
[\[171b.4\]]gcig pa'i sgo nas phag tu rol/_spyod pa'i sgo nas 'khor bar yun rings por bzhugs/_bya ba med pa'i sgo nas mi mnyel/_mthu yi sgo nas mgon skyabs che/_dam bcas pa'i sgo nas 'gro don rgyun du mdzad/_rtse gcig gi sgo nas mtha' gnyis 
[\[171b.5\]]kyi skyon dgongs/_nan tan gyi sgo nas bya ba grub/_/brjid nyi shu dang sgo bzhi bcu ste spyir drug cu'o/_/de la rin po che sna bdun ni 'khor lo rin po che'i dbang bcus skye ba bzhi la dbang bskur ro/_/btsun mo rin po ches ni yul gyi rgyal po la mnyes par dbul lo/_/
[\[171b.6\]]dmag mi rin po che'i tshul dgus pha rol gyi dpung 'joms so/_/khyim bdag rin po che'i tshad med pa bzhis rgyal po'i chab srid 'dzin to/_/glang po rin po che'i stobs bcus pha rol du bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed do/_/rta rin po che'i myur mgyogs rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[171b.7\]]rkang pa bzhis bgrod pa'i gnas sleb par byed do/_/yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas sems can gyi re 'dod skong ngo /_/lung rnam pa gsum ni mi 'da' ba rgyan gyi lung la sogs pa gong du rtsis mgo spyir sbyar bar zad/_de nas 'khor lo rin 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]po che'i dbang bcu ni/_skye bzhi skur ston skye bzhi sgrol mdzad pa/_/lha mi sdig sbrul mche ba bzhi ru ston/_/yo byad brid pa'i 'dod yon lnga dang ni/_/rtog pa gzhom phyir sman lnga dang len rol/_/ci ltar mos bzhin 'dod dgu gzugs ston 
[\[172a.2\]]pa/_/gar dbang 'thad dga'i tshul du rol pa mdzad/_/rdzu 'phrul ba spu'i dbyings nas phra men 'phro/_/lus ni ci rdzu sems ni cho 'phrul ston/_/gad rgyangs gdangs ngar sgrogs pa sna tshogs kyis/_/mche ba zil gnon tha dad chos rnams ston/_/shes rab thabs ldan 
[\[172a.3\]]spyan gnyis dbu ma'i ngang /_/dbyings las ma g.yos cir yangs le mkhyen/_/sems kyi bye brag ting 'dzin tha dad 'phro/_/bsam gyis mi khyab bzhi la rol pa mdzad/_/rdo rje sder mo pags pa spu phreng brgyan/_/'khor ba ci srid bzhugs pa'i tshe la dbang /_/lta ba rnam bzhi spyan 
[\[172a.4\]]zur gyis bskul bas/_/phra men bzhi 'phro phyogs bzhir las bzhi mdzad/_/smon lam dbang gis drag po skur ston pa/_/dus mtha'i bskal pa bzhin du bshol du med/_/de la btsun mo rin po che'i dbang ni/_ma chags rdo rje gzugs kyi yum gyis 'khyud/_/zhi gnas ting 
[\[172a.5\]]'dzin mi g.yo yum gyis sbyor/_/thogs med shugs 'chang don grub yum gyis bskyod/_/lhag mthong ye shes yum gyis mnyes byed 'bebs/_/'byung ba bzhi po rdo rje lha mo ste/_/bde ba chen po'i sku la mnyes par dbul/_/dmag mi rin po che yi tshul dgu ni/_/bsgregs 
[\[172a.6\]]pas 'gro ba shes rab bskyed pa'i tshul/_/nyam nga med pa'i mdza' spyod dpa' bo'i tshul/_/gdug rtsub gdos bcad brgyan pas 'jigs pa'i tshul/_/log par ltar ba zhe gcod gshe ba'i tshul/_/rmad du byung ba'i chos sgrogs bzhad pa'i tshul/_/shin tu gdul dka' 
[\[172a.7\]]la khro snying rje'i tshul/_/smon lam dbang gis mi shom rngam pa'i tshul/_/nyon mongs grub pa'i gyur mdzad ngo mtshar tshul/_/khro drag dbyings nas mi g.yo zhi ba'i tshul/_/de la khyim bdag rin po che'i tshad med pa bzhi ni/_khro gtum tshad med byams par snang /_/bsod chen 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]snying rje bdag nyid che/_/bsgral zhing bstabs pa dga' ba'i mchog_/yal bar mi 'dor btang snyoms so/_/de la glang po rin po che'i stobs bcu ni/_thugs rje chen po'i stobs ni dregs chen bsnyengs phyir gnon/_/chos nyid stobs ni mi dmigs nam mkha'i mdog_/mi 'byed 
[\[172b.2\]]stobs ni dngos grub bdud rtsi'i rgyun/_/ma spangs stobs ni gdos bcas sku la brgyan/_/ma g.yos stobs ni don mthun grol ba'i brgyan/_/smon lam stobs ni bskal par yongs grol mdzad/_/sprul pa'i stobs ni mgo brnyan phra men 'phro/_/phrag dog log lta 'khor 
[\[172b.3\]]bar gcig mi gtong /_/'dod chags yud tsam 'phral 'dod spyan bzlog dmar/_/de la rta rin po che'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni/_chos dbyings med bzhin cir snang ba/_/mkha' la 'ja' tshon bzhin du rnam par bkram/_/ye shes rdzu 'phrul chos kyi dbyings 
[\[172b.4\]]rtogs pa/_/mkha' la nyi shar bzhin du gsal la stong /_/tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bye brag ni/_/mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sprin phung bzhin du bdal/_/sprul pa'i bye brag 'phro ba'i rdzu 'phrul ni/_/ro la cig car 'babs snod bye brag phye/_/de la nor bu rin po 
[\[172b.5\]]che'i rang bzhin ni/_'gro rnams ci ltar 'dod pa'i re 'dod skong /_/mi zad bdag nyid gter chen nam mkha'i mdog_/srid gsum mun nag sel ba'i ye shes sgron/_/dus gsum rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rin chen phreng /_/lung gsum ni rtsis mgo spyir sbyar ba yin no/_/da ni 
[\[172b.6\]]lha rgyud kyi rtogs pa so sor bshad par bya ste/_'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul zhing gshegs mdzad pa/_/shes rab nam mkha'i bskal pa dga' rgyud ston/_/gti mug tshul gyis gti mug 'joms mdzad pa/_/gti mug rdo rje bud+d+ha he ru ka_/ye shes rdo rjes nyon mongs rdo rje 
[\[172b.7\]]'joms/_/thabs 'dzin mchod pa'i dngos po bshig_/zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad pa/_/zhe sdang rdo rje badzra he ru ka_/rin chen dbyig ltar kun skong zhing /_/bdag med zhi gnas chu yi bskal pas 'khru/_/nga rgyal tshul gyis nga rgyal 'joms mdzad pa/_/nga 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]rgyal rdo rje rat+na he ru ka_/'khor ba'i 'dam du pad ltar sku 'khrungs shing /_/lhag mthong me chen 'bar bas thams cad sreg_/'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms mdzad pa/_/'dod chags rdo rje pad+ma he ru ka_/phrin las rgya mtshos 'gro 
[\[173a.2\]]ba'i don mdzad pa'i/_/shes bya thogs med bskal pa'i rlung gis bskyod/_/phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms mdzad pa/_/phrag dog rdo rje karma he ru ka_/sku yi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing /_/shes rab mthar phyin gti mug rnam par dag_/phyag rgya 
[\[173a.3\]]gzugs kyi mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing /_/chos dbyings nam mkha'i dbang bskur khro mo rgyal/_/thugs kyi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing /_/brtson 'grus mthar phyin zhe sdang rnam par dag_/rtogs pa reg bya'i mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing /_/sra 
[\[173a.4\]]brtan rdo rje dbang bskur khro mo rgyal/_/gsung gi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing /_/tshul khrims mthar phyin 'dod chags rnam par dag_/gsung rab sgra yi mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing /_/lhag mthong ye shes dbang bskur khro mo rgyal/_/yon tan 
[\[173a.5\]]longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing /_/sbyin pas mthar phyin nga rgyal rnam par dag_/ngar 'dzin bro mchog mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing /_/bdag med zhi gnas dbang bskur khro mo rgyal/_/phrin las longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing /_/bzod pas mthar 
[\[173a.6\]]phyin phrag dog rnam par dag_/tshul khrims dri med mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing /_/thogs med las la dbang bskur khro mo rgyal/_/thugs mchog rnam dag ye shes dkar mo'i tshogs/_/'gugs mdzad ye shes lnga yi dbyug to can/_/dran pas rgyud lnga sgrol 
[\[173a.7\]]mdzad zhi bar gzigs/_/srid gsum 'joms byed dbyug thogs gau rim/_/sku yi yon tan tshogs sdud rkun mo'i tshogs/_/mthu 'phrog zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel/_/bden gnyis lta bas khro tshul 'gro la gzigs/_/dam tshig dbyings mchog skul 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]byed tsau ri ma/_/gsung gis thams cad zil gnon rmongs pa'i tshogs/_/dbang mdzad mtha' gnyis mi yong chu srin ni/_/mi gnas rgyal mtshan 'dzin cing myos par lta/_/stong gsum dbang mdzad rgyal byed pra mo ha/_/thal ba byed pas thal byed ma yi tshogs/_/kun gyi 
[\[173b.2\]]dngos grub rdo rje rtse dgu 'dzin/_/sa dgu rtog 'joms shi ba slong bar gzigs/_/'jig rten thal byed rnge'u thogs pe tA li/_/'byed med shes rab mi rtog lbos mo'i tshogs/_/'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin 'ching zhing dbang 'dren las/_/khro gar gzigs tshul rgyun gyis 
[\[173b.3\]]thugs rjes sgrol/_/bde mchog dbyings su 'dren mdzad puk+ka si/_/zhe sdang tshul gyis don mdzad gtum ma'i tshogs/_/myos mdzad dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pa'i/_/thugs rjes dkrug cing ro za'i tshul du gzigs/_/snod bcud dkrugs nas skongs mdzad 
[\[173b.4\]]g+ha sma ri/_/chags pa'i tshul gyis don mdzad sme sha can/_/ma ni rgyud 'phel gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rtags/_/mtha' gnyis spangs pas rnam par g.yengs tshul bzhugs/_/'bar ba stong gsum stobs byed tsaN+Da li/_/thams cad 'byung ba'i lhun 'gyur ma tshogs ma/_/
[\[173b.5\]]kun gyi las mdzad chos kun snying po 'dzin/_/kun la rol pas gzigs tshul kun dang ldan/_/thugs rje 'jig rten sgrol mdzad sma sha ni/_/'joms byed rtsal mchog rdo rje thugs kyi yum/_/gnyen po stobs kyis thams cad zil gyis gnon/_/shes rab thabs 
[\[173b.6\]]ldan sku gsum bdag gzhan don/_/sdug bsngal zhe sdang gsod byed sing ha ma/_/dpa' brtun za byed ye shes thugs rje'i las/_/brtson 'grus myur ba'i shugs 'chang 'gro don du/_/thugs rje ye shes rtse gcig so sor gzigs/_/nga rgyal 'chi bdag 
[\[173b.7\]]'joms mdzad bya khra ma/_/mdzes byed dam tshig rnam dag gsung gi yum/_/thabs mkhas spyod pas bdag dang gzhan don mdzad/_/don gyi chos sku ting 'dzin ljags la gtang /_/'dod chags dur khrod 'joms mdzad sri ka ma/_/mi ma byed spyod pas 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]mchog rigs kyi yum/_/g.yer ba'i phrin las 'gro la thugs rjes srung /_/chos nyid sku la ye shes spyan gyis gzigs/_/phrag dog las grub za byed shwa na ma/_/yid kyi ye shes so so kun la rtog_/rnam shes kyis bsad god 'brang tshul khrims 
[\[174a.2\]]srung /_/'khor ba'i rgyun gcod rgyud 'dzin rgyu gri 'dzin/_/mgyogs mas snyags byed khrag 'thung gi gya ma/_/rnam shes mnyam nyid yid 'grogs mtshan ma 'joms/_/gsad pa'i god rnams sbyin pas pha rol phyin/_/mtha' 'das chos sku gzugs 'dzin spangs 
[\[174a.3\]]tshul bzung /_/'gro ba'i sdug bsngal che 'phrog ka ka ma/_/bslad pas mi 'gyur bkrus pas mi 'dag cing /_/mi mthun gnyen pos mi shigs bzod pa'i mchog_/chos sku thugs su chud phyir zhal na thogs/_/yon tan yid bzhin bdag nyid kang ka ma/_/dbyings 
[\[174a.4\]]la mi rtog 'gro la thugs rjes gzigs/_/gnyis la mi gnas shes rab pha rol phyin/_/dbyings kyi thugs rjes phrin las 'dus ma byas/_/mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i rngam tshul ka/_/bcu drug zhag gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs/_/dpal chen bcu drug sa 
[\[174a.5\]]la lhun gyis grub/_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i sku/_/thog ma med cing yon tan zla ba med/_/sbyin pas rigs pa'i klung du mtsho drang ltar/_/'khor bas 'jigs nas thugs rje'i lcags kyus 'dren/_/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin don 
[\[174a.6\]]mdzad pa/_/thugs rjes shar mdzad rta gdong lcags kyu ma/_/don dang mthun pas kun kyang dga' bar mdzad/_/byams pa'i zhags pa 'khor ba'i rgyun 'dzin cing /_/rin chen phyag rgyas sems can re 'dod skong /_/yon tan tshogs rdzogs phag gdong 
[\[174a.7\]]zhags pa ma/_/gzhan gyi don du spyad pas bdag gi don/_/shes rab sgrol mas mun pa'i sdug bsngal sel/_/don nyid mi 'da' dga' ba'i mchog_/kun gnyen ma rig nub mdzad nyi zla'i spyan/_/snyan par smra bas kun kyang bka' bzhin byed/_/btang 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]snyoms thabs mkhas thugs rjes 'gro don du/_/phab nas rnam shes thal ba'i gzugs kyang 'tsho/_/chos ston bag chags byang mdzad dril 'khrol ma/_/da ni srin mo ri lha rgyud bshad de/[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad spyan gyis [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad khams la gzigs/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad shangs nas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]
[\[174b.2\]]brgyad sprul pa 'byung /_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad khams la [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad skur ston cing /_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad thugs kyis [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 'dul thabs mnga'/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad snyan gyis [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad khams gsan cing /_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ljags kyis gsung rab [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 'chad/_/brgya rtsa brgyad 
[\[174b.3\]]kyis dgongs pa bsam mi khyab/_/sa dgur thugs rjes don mdzad dbu dgur ldan/_/brjod gnon zhabs brgyad phyogs brgyad lha brgyad gnon/_/ci ltar rol yang spyan dgur dbyings mi g.yo/_/'dul ba'i dbang du bskal pa'i tshul ston cing /_/rdo rje srin pos ci 
[\[174b.4\]]'dul yid bzhin rdzogs/_/rnam thar gsum las sku gsum phrin las 'byung /_/spyod pa rnam dag smon lam stobs kyis gshegs/_/ral gsigs sprul pas 'gro don rtse gcig rol/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad stong pas mnyes mdzad rtsa bting ma/_/brjid pa'i stobs 
[\[174b.5\]]kyis klu rnams zil gnon cing /_/phra ma'i skyon spangs ngag gi dbang phyug che/_/'bad pa med pa'i brtson 'grus shugs dang ldan/_/chos la dbang mdzad ha ya grI ba dpal/_/'dzin tshul stabs kyis drang srong tshar gcod cing /_/log lta'i nyes spangs yang dag lha 
[\[174b.6\]]dang ldan/_/tshul khrims mthar phyin drang srong spyod pas tshe/_/skye la dbang mdzad bran tshul mi g.yo mgon/_/shugs 'chang stabs kyis rlung lha tshar gcod cing /_/'khyal ba'i spyod spangs ngag gi dbang phyug che/_/'dod pa kun la sbyin mdzad rgyal po'i tshul/_/
[\[174b.7\]]sems la dbang mdzad 'dod pa'i khro bo rgyal/_/'tshir ba'i stabs kyis gnod sbyin zhabs kyis mnan/_/ngag rtsub skyon spangs ngag gi dbang phyug che/_/smon lam mthar phyin bdud 'dul thugs rje'i rtse/_/las la dbang mdzad bdud rtsi kuN+Da li/_/gnon 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]pa'i stabs kyis 'byung po tshar gcod cing /_/gnod sems nyes spangs thugs kyi dbang phyug che/_/mnyen pa'i stobs kyis mi mthun gnon mdzad cing /_/rdzu 'phrul dbang mdzad 'jigs byed stobs po che/_/rdegs pa'i stobs kyis srin po tshar 
[\[175a.2\]]cod cing /_/bden dang bral ba'i [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]spangs skyon sel ba/_/mtshan ma'i thabs kyis mtshan ma 'dul mdzad pa/_/ye shes dbang mdzad dbyug pa sngon po can/_/'debs pa'i stabs kyis sa bdag tshar gcod cing /_/brnab sems skyon spangs thugs kyi dbang 
[\[175a.3\]]phyug che/_/bzod pas gzhi lta bu gzhir 'gyur ba/_/smon lam dbang mdzad 'dam skyes kuN+Da li/_/zlos pa'i stobs kyis bdud rnams tshar gcod cing /_/'dod chags skyon spangs sku yi dbang phyug che/_/ye shes mthar phyin nyi zla'i 'od bzhin gsal/_/skye bzhi 
[\[175a.4\]]mos pas dbang mdzad hU~M ka ra/_/rol pa'i stobs kyis lha rnams tshar gcod cing /_/ma byin len pa'i skyon spangs bdag nyid che/_/rab tu shes pa'i shes rab mthar 'byin pa/_/yo byad dbang mdzad gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal/_/'jigs byed stabs kyis 
[\[175a.5\]]'chi bdag zil gnon cing /_/srog gcod nyes spangs sku yi dbang phyug che/_/gzung 'dzin skyon spangs bsam gtan ngang la gnas/_/tshe la dbang mdzad 'jigs byed gshin rje gshed/_/ye shes thugs rjes zin pas mthar mi 'ching /_/thugs rjes 
[\[175a.6\]]zin pa'i srid las grol/_/gnyis la mi gnas mtha' bral dbu mar bsnyems/_/'dod pa'i rgyal po mnyes mdzad la se ki/_/rig pa'i sder chen chos kyi dbyings nyid 'dzin/_/thugs rje lcags kyus 'khor ba mi gtong zhing /_/shes rab thabs 
[\[175a.7\]]kyi lcags kyus mtha' gnyis 'dzin/_/gtso bo dbyug sngon mnyes mdzad dra ti ru/_/ye shes mtshan sdud thugs rje khrod 'byung zhing /_/sprul pas 'gro bsgral sku dang ye shes 'phro/_/shes snying ma skyes dbu ma'i rig pa skye/_/sta na pa tis khro 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]rgyal gshin rje mnyes/_/dbyings su mtshan ma shes rab tho bas brdungs/_/thugs rjes sems can phrin las mtshan ma 'joms/_/dbu mar ye shes snying rje mi rtog dang /_/mi g.yo mgon po mnyes mdzad mu ha la/_/rdo rje gtum mo mtshan ma'i dngos po 
[\[175b.2\]]bcom/_/thugs rje rngam tshul srid pa thal bar brlag_/gnyis la mi gnas mtha' bral dbu mar bsdigs/_/ha ya grI pa mnyes mdzad tsaN+Da li/_/phra mor 'bigs pa'i ye shes dbyings su 'phen/_/'bigs pa'i ye shes gnad du thugs rjes rdeg_/ma 
[\[175b.3\]]khyogs dbu ma chen po'i don ston pa/_/gzhan gyis mi thub mnyes byed sha ya ti/_/mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings thos rig pa'i sgra/_/dbyings nyid rig shes dbyings la nyan pa'i sgra/_/de la bstan pa gsung gi sgra 'byin pa/_/bdud rtsir 'khyil ba sha 
[\[175b.4\]]ya ya tis mnyes/_/bdag rtog log lta'i mtshan ma kun bcom zhing /_/za byed mche bas skye bzhi rtsad gcad de/_/sku dang ye shes ma skyes mi dmigs pa/_/pad+mo 'khyil pa mnyes byed ma ra na/_/thugs dam dbang gis rnam dag dbyings nas bskul/_/thugs 
[\[175b.5\]]rje'i shugs kyis 'gro ba gnas nas 'dren/_/gnyis med mchod bskul dbu ma'i dgyes pa stobs/_/ma ha ha la mnyes mdzad tsun da ma/_/bskyod pa'i ye shes sa rnams dus gcig gcod/_/thugs rje shugs kyis 'gro ba gnas nas spor/_/thabs dang shes rab bskyod 
[\[175b.6\]]pas mtha' gnyis spor/_/ba ya ba tis khams gsum hU~M mdzad gnyis/_/sdug bsngal thugs rjes mi bzod phrin las dpa'/_/yal bar mi 'dor brtson 'grus shugs kyis brtan/_/gdod nas don mdzad 'khor ba mthar thug sgrol/_/de phyir dpa' brtul 
[\[175b.7\]]za byed bya khra ma/_/sdang mig mi 'gyur thugs rjes zhi la gnon/_/mthu rtsal rngom brjid 'gyur med bdud dpung bzlog_/tsham ngam ral gsigs gdangs ngar 'jig rten 'gengs/_/de phyir 'gyur med phra men tsa sa ra/_/rtog pa'i dgra spangs dran pa'i 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]dgon par gnas/_/'khrul skyon dri med shes bzhin rdzi mtshor spong /_/'gro don dus la bab na thugs rjes 'jug_/de phyir 'jug par byed pa'i ha ri na/_/chos dbyings gnas mal rtog pa'i skyon sel zhing /_/thugs rje spu ris sprul pa bsam mi 
[\[176a.2\]]khyab/_/dug gsum 'joms mdzad sha rus khrag la rol/_/sel byed sprul pas don mdzad d+h+ya ma/_/yang dag zon chags 'gro don thabs mkhas ldan/_/mi 'dul zing thub btang snyoms chen por bzhugs/_/dus la bab nas brtson 'grus shugs dang ldan/_/de'i 
[\[176a.3\]]phyir mkhas brtson mdzad pa'i rtsa la ma/_/ye shes dbyings la 'jug pa shes bya za/_/dbyings nyid shes la 'jug pa nyon mongs za/_/gnyis med ye shes phrin las 'khor ba za/_/de phyir za byed bu ka mu ka ba/_/rigs btsun gnyen por gyur pas thams cad 'dul/_/
[\[176a.4\]]phrin las rtsal gyis bdud dpung thams cad 'joms/_/stong nyid sgra bsgrags mu stegs wa tshogs 'jigs/_/de phyir 'joms byed rtsa mchog sing ha ma/_/dbyings la ye shes nyal zhing thugs rje rmi/_/lhing nag nag po drag po sku ston pa/_/thugs mchog rnam 
[\[176a.5\]]dag chos nyid dbyings su mkhyen/_/de phyir rmi byed phra men rik+Sha ma/_/ye shes thugs rje stobs kyis mtha' gnyis gnon/_/tsham ngam ral gsigs sprul pas bdud dpung 'joms/_/las su ci mdzad brtson 'grus stobs kyis rol/_/de phyir stobs ldan phra 
[\[176a.6\]]men ha k+Sha ma/_/lhag mthong chos dbyings zhi gnas rlan gyis brgyal/_/thugs rje 'khor bar smon lam stobs kyis myos/_/rtog 'joms rdzas la gtsang sme med par rol/_/de phyir phra men myos byed u ka ra/_/yid g.yo las can sems par gyur pa ni/_/
[\[176a.7\]]ye shes dbang gis thugs rjes 'gro la g.yo/_/don mdzad god 'brang ye shes dbyings su mkhyen/_/de phyir tshul khrims chen po kyi kya ma/_/bsam pa'i dngos po 'dod la 'dun pa ni/_/dbyings nyid mnyam nyid ye shes mkhyen pa za/_/thugs rje 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]'dun pas 'khor ba bag chags sbyong /_/de phyir phra men za byed don ka ma/_/dbyings la sems 'dzin yid la byed par 'gyur/_/ye shes dbyings rtogs drangs pa nyin mo nyal/_/'gro mdongs rmongs la thugs rjes mtshan mo ldan/_/ye shes thugs rjes drangs 
[\[176b.2\]]pa'i u lu ka/_/brtags pa'i dngos la rtse gcig ting 'dzin 'gyur/_/mnyam nyid mtha' bral dbyings las mi g.yo ba/_/rtog ge spyod yul byis pas mi mthong ba/_/de phyir sbed byed phra men ba ya ta/_/las 'bras bden la yid ches dad gyur te/_/mnyam nyid dbyings su ye 
[\[176b.3\]]shes thugs kyis mgyogs/_/zhi gnas spyan rdzi lhag mthong bgrod tshags chung /_/de phyir phra men mgyogs byed b+hag shi ta/_/nges pa'i dngos la 'dzin pa'i mos pa gyur/_/lhag mthong ye shes dbyings nyid mnyam 'gyur 'dzin/_/zhi gnas gces par 'dzin pa mi 'phrogs 
[\[176b.4\]]pa/_/de phyir phra men 'dzin ma tsa ta ma/_/'dris pa'i dngos po ma brjed dran par gyur/_/dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med ma brjed dran/_/ting 'dzin 'bum phrag lhag mthong so sor gsal/_/gnyis la ma rmongs zin ma ti ti la/_/chos rnams 'byed pa'i byed par gyur pa 
[\[176b.5\]]ni/_/mnyam nyid ngang du log lta sel byed cing /_/rig pa skyed pas som nyi the tshom gcod/_/de phyir phra men gsod byed na ku la/_/'jug pa rang dbang med pa'i gnyid gyur pa/_/bstan pa'i chos sgrogs log lta myos byed cing /_/mnyam dang mi mthun log lta myos byed phyir/_/
[\[176b.6\]]thams cad myos byed phra men 'u shi ka_/gsum 'dus gcod pa'i reg pa gyur pa ni/_/phrin las bye brag mang po ci mdzad cing /_/phyag rgya bzhi po ma skyes dbyings su bros/_/de phyir phra men 'bros byed ka si ka/_/'khor ba'i rdo rje brjod pas mya ngan 'das/_/chos sku rdo rje brjod 
[\[176b.7\]]pas mtha' gnyis spangs/_/rjod byed brjod bral don gyi tshig dang bral/_/de phyir rjod byed badzra ba sha ma/_/chos nyid rdo rjes mtshan ma'i dngos po bshig_/ye shes rdo rjes gzung 'dzin rtog pa bsregs/_/phyag mtshan rdo rjes dregs pa'i lha bdud bcom/_/de phyir 'joms byed 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]badzra be ra be/_/'chi med bdud rtsi yul sems skye 'gag med/_/grub pa'i bdud rtsi bsam pa'i 'bras bu thob/_/thugs rjes 'gro bdud rtsi gtong bla med bsgrub/_/rtsi mchog ye shes badzra a mr-i ta/_/ye shes 'phrog byed yon tan rgya mtsho bsgrub/_/thugs 
[\[177a.2\]]rjes 'phrog byed 'jig rten dbang du sdud/_/ye shes thugs rjes gnyis med dbang du 'ub/_/de phyir brlab byed badzra ma ra na/_/da ni pad+ma dbang chen dang /_dbang phyug ma lha rgyud brjod par bya'o/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga spyan gyis rgyud lnga'i mi dge bcu/_/ye shes lnga dang so so cis 'dul mkhyen/_/
[\[177a.3\]]snyan bcus mi dge bcu yi sdug bsngal gsan/_/shangs lnga nas byung rigs lnga'i sprul 'phros pas/_/rgyud lnga'i mgon mdzad brtson ldan rta dbu lnga/_/dug lnga zhal du shar te rngub mdzad cing /_/ljags lnga the tshom gcod phyir theg lnga 'chang /_/skye bzhi las bzhis sgrol 
[\[177a.4\]]mdzad shog bzhis skyod/_/bcu drug dmyal khams bcu drug phyag gis 'dren/_/phyogs brgyad 'dul phyir zhabs brgyad khro brgyad bcom/_/rigs bzhi snod bcud nyi zla 'od dang brdzis/_/phyogs bzhi rtsal drug dbang phyug yang ches mnan/_/che ba che ba yang che bla na med/_/bcu 
[\[177a.5\]]drug zhag gis zla dkyil rdzogs pa lta/_/tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas bcu drug sa la zhugs/_/phyogs bzhi dbu lngar 'bar ltar rigs lnga'i dbu/_/mkhyen pa'i ye shes thugs rjes gzigs/_/tshogs chen yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /_/dbang chen yongs 
[\[177a.6\]]su 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /_/tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs ye shes lhun grub pa/_/dkyil 'khor gsum gyis brjid pa'i khro bo rgyal/_/thugs rje 'dam skyes spyod pa skyon mi gos/_/mtha' gnyis dbang mdzad pad+ma he ru ka_/rngam pa'i tshul gyis srin mo gzugs 
[\[177a.7\]]'dzin cing /_/thod rus gdug pa 'bum mar zas su za/_/srid pa'i sems can chags pa'i snying khrag gsol/_/dbang drag las mdzad ma bu rak+Sha si/_/sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das rtogs tshangs pa'i gzugs/_/tshad med bzhi rdzogs rtags kyi dbu bzhir ldan/_/
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]zhabs bzhis smra 'don gling bzhir bkra shis brjod/_/gti mug yid bzhin rin chen pra ma ti/_/thams cad mnyam pa nyid rtogs rigs mchog ma/_/ma rig dug gsum 'joms mdzad dpal rtse bsnams/_/bud med chags tshul dbang mdzad bka' zlog ma/_/chags 
[\[177b.2\]]pa'i skyon bral te chen re'u tri ma/_/thams cad sgyu ma bzhin du rtogs mkhyen ma/_/'brel ba'i thugs rjes sems can kun la gtogs/_/phrin las rgya mtsho sgrol ba'i bzhed chen can/_/'khor ba'i rgyud gcod drag mo po sna be/_/'du phyed mi rtag dril bu'i sgra ltar
