[\[198b.3\]]spyod lam yan chad ci'i sgo nas kyang sgrub pa'i zhal zas dang tshogs rnams phyi rol tu byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa po nyid ting nge 'dzin gnyid dbang du mi gtang /_spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas sku gsung thugs dngos grub kyi dbyig bsgrub pa dang /_srid pa 
[\[198b.4\]]gsum gyi sems can rgyu'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa rnams grol bar mdzad pa'i phyir tshul mkhas pa dang /_spyod pa gzob pas rnal 'byor bsgrub pa la 'jug par bya'o/_/de la dang por sgrub pa la bgegs mi 'jug par bya ba'i phyir mtshams gcad do/_/ting nge 'dzin 
[\[198b.5\]]dang lta ba dang /_sngags dang phyag rgya dang /_rgyal mtshan dang rdzas 'di dag gis rab tu gcad par bya'o/_/bsnyen pa nye bsnyen dbang yang rdzogs/_/rdzogs nas dngos grub blang bar bya/_/lha'i grangs bzhin bsnyen pa dbul bar bya'o/_/snying po ni/_o~M ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/_zhes drang 
[\[198b.6\]]ngo /_/de nas bsnyen bsgrub lags pa dang /_yo byad rnams phyi rol du mi 'byung /_gnas su mi bgyer lha dang bdag mchod la sogs pa'i rjes la lhag ma dkyil 'khor sa'i 'og tu rin po ches kha bcad la sba bar bya'o/_/don de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[198b.7\]]dpa'i sras su skye'o/_/de ltar ma byas na dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phra men ma'i sgrub pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo /_/dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su gau ri/_de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]brgyad la shar du stag gi mgo can/_lho ru g.yag gi mgo can/_nub tu seng ge'i mgo can/_byang du gzig gi mgo can/_shar lho pha bang gi mgo can/_lho nub tu pu shud kyi mgo can/_nub byang du srin bya'i mgo can/_byang shar du ske ga'i mgo can/_sgo ba bzhi 
[\[199a.2\]]dgod/_dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su tsau ri/_de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la/_shar du smigs bu'i mgo can/_lhor bya rgod kyi mgo can/_nub tu sha ba'i mgo can/_byang du khu byug gi mgo can/_mtshams bzhir pha wang gi mgo can/_khra mgo can 
[\[199a.3\]]dang /_byan lag gi mgo can dang /_pho rog gi mgo can dang rnams so/_/sgo ba bzhi dgod do/_/dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su pra mo ha/_de'i phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la shar du 'ug pa'i mgo can dang /_lhor spyang ki'i mgo can dang /_nub tu sbrul 
[\[199a.4\]]gyi mgo can dang /_byang du gzig gi mgo can/_mtshams bzhir sre mo'i mgo can/_dred mgo can dang /_sdig pa'i mgo can dang /_wa'i mgo can rnams so/_/sgo ba bzhi dgod do/_/dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su be ta li/_pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug la ye 
[\[199a.5\]]shes kyi khro mo bcu drug dgod do/_/mtshams bzhir ye shes kyi khro mo bzhi dgod do/_/dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su puk+ka si/_de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la shar du rta'i mgo can/_lhor nam mkha' lding gi mgo can/_nub tu khyi'i mgo can/_byang du 
[\[199a.6\]]spang ti'i mgo can/_mtshams bzhir yang sbrul bzhi dgod do/_/de'i phyi rim sgo ba bzhi dgod do/_/dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su g+hasma ri/_de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la shar du rdo rje dbyings phyug ma/_lhor rin chen dbyings phyug ma/_/nub tu pad+ma 
[\[199a.7\]]dbyings phyug ma/_byang du las kyi dbyings phyug ma/_nub tu khyi'i mgo can/_mtshams bzhir phag gi mgo can ma/_byi la'i mgo can/_chu srin gyi mgo can/_ra'i mgo can rnams so/_/sgo bzhi dgod do/_/dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su sma sha ni/_de'i 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]phyi rim pad+ma 'dab brgyad la shar du sti ra'i gnas nyul ma/_lhor rdo rje phung nyul ma/_nub tu mchod pa'i tshogs nyul ma/_byang du de bya'i sbyor nyul ma/_shar lhor dam tshig rjes gcod ma/_lho nub tu phyi nang gi mtshams nyul ma/_dur khrod gnas phyug ma'i lhag nyul ma/_de'i 
[\[199b.2\]]mtshams bzhir rdo rje sgrol nyul ma/_bsnyen pa'i mtshams nyul ma/_dgongs pa'i don nyul ma/_dur khrod gnas nyul ma dgod do/_/dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su tsaN+Da li/_pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la/_shar du rdo rje sder mo/_lhor rdo rje gtum mo/_nub tu dur 
[\[199b.3\]]khrod bdag mo/_byang du rdo rje sgrol ma/_de'i mtshams bzhir rdo rje tib tib dang /_rdo rje teg teg dang /_rdo rje 'dzin ma dang /_rdo rje yid g.yo ma dang /_sgo bzhi dgod/_dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/_dbus su sing ha mu kha pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la/_chu srin gyi lus 
[\[199b.4\]]la seng ge'i mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/_sgo bzhi dgod/_dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/_dbus su bya g+h+r-i mu kha/_pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la/_kang ka'i lus la stag gi mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/_sgo bzhi dgod/_dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/_
[\[199b.5\]]dbus su sri la mu kha/_pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la seng ge'i lus la wa'i mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/_sgo bzhi dgod/_dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/_dbus su shwa na mu kha/_pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la pho rog gi lus la khyi'i mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/_sgo bzhi dgod/_
[\[199b.6\]]dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/_dbus su kr-i d+ha mu kha/_pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la kang ka'i lus la bya rgod kyi mgo can brgyad kyis bsgor/_sgo bzhi dgod/_dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su kang ka mu kha/_pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la/_spyang ki'i lus la kang ka'i mgo 
[\[199b.7\]]can brgyad kyis bskor/_sgo bzhi dgod/_dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su kang ka mu kha/_pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la 'ug pa'i lus la pho rog gi mgo btags pa brgyad kyis bskor/_sgo bzhi dgod/_/dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su u lu 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]mu kha/_pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la pho rog gi lus la 'ug pa'i mgo btags pa brgyad kyis bskor/_sgo bzhi dgod/_de nas bcom ldan 'das phra men ma'i ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs nas 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po 
[\[200a.2\]]rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las phra men ma bsgrub pa'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku dang gsung dang thugs dngos grub kyi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/_nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo /_/sku dang gsung dang thugs las sprul 
[\[200a.3\]]pa'i he ru ka_/chos dbyings don dam rig pa'i dbyings na bzhugs/_/phyag rgya yum gyi mkha' la bzhugs nas kyang /_/sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bdag la stsol/_/ye shes khro rgyal sprul pa mang po 'phro/_/phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'gro don mang por mdzad/_/las byed mkha' 
[\[200a.4\]]'gro chos dbyings sku la 'khril/_/ye shes khro rgyal dngos grub bdag la stsol/_/phra men za byed mche gshog 'bar ba'i tshogs/_/dbang phyug 'jug byed yid 'phrog nu ma can/_/rdo rje mchu can sder chen gshog pa can/_/phra men za byed chen mo dngos grub bdag la stsol/_/
[\[200a.5\]]rdo rje yang sprul chen po chos dbyings mkha' la shar/_/mtshon thogs sprul pa sna tshogs 'gro don mdzad/_/rtag tu don mdzad thugs rje shugs las byung /_/phra men yang sprul chen po dngos grub stsol/_/smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can/_/'gro ba'i don 
[\[200a.6\]]sgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa/_/sems can rnams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol/_/ye shes chos dbyings skad tshogs zla nya'i zhal/_/las mdzad ye shes nan tan don la bzhugs/_/rgyu 'bras gnyis kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/_/sgo ba yab yum 
[\[200a.7\]]dngos grub stsal du gsol/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro dbyings kyi ye shes yum/_/las byed ma mo kun la dbang mdzad ma/_/phyag brnyan sprul pa sna tshogs 'gro don mdzad/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dngos grub bdag la stsol/_/rdo rje gshog pa thogs pa'i yid 'phrog ma/_/rdo rje 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]sder mo phyogs bcur sprul pa 'phro/_/rdo rje las byed ma mo brgya yang 'gyed/_/dbang phyug pho nya'i dngos grub bdag la stsol/_/mi mnyam pa yi lha khyod rtag tu ni/_/thugs rje can gyis gzigs shing 'gro ba'i dpal/_/bla med byang chub bsgrub par dam bcas pa/_/bdag cag las kyi 
[\[200b.2\]]'bras bu mchis par mdzod/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'khor rnams 'dus nas gsol pa/_sngon tshe ye shes brnyes pa'i lha/_/de yi 'khor du gtogs pa ma dang mkha' 'gro ma/_/rtse gcig bsnyen kyang ye shes lha dang phra men khyod bsnyen bsnyen/_/bsnyen pa'i 
[\[200b.3\]]dus na rgyang ma ring /_/bsgrub pa'i dus na mthu ma chung /_/yang bsnyen ni yang yang bsnyen na/_/dpal chen phra men khyed ltar ma lags kyi/_/lang ka tshogs kyi srin mo yang /_/pha bas byams shing khu bas gdung /_/yang bsgrub pa ni yang bsgrubs na/_/lang ka'i tshogs 
[\[200b.4\]]kyi srin mo yang /_/ma bas byams shing sring bas gdung /_/gdungs pa'i mchi ma'i tshul du dku/_/ye shes lha yi thugs kyis bzod lags sam/_/dngos grub skal dang ldan par mi dmigs kyang /_/sngon gyi thugs dam dbang gis dngos grub stsol/_/de skad ces gsol pa 
[\[200b.5\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa'i dngos grub 'khor rnams la stsal to/_/'khor rnams kyis kyang rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa por dngos grub stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub dbyig bsgrub pa'i le'u ste 
[\[200b.6\]]bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i dam pa'i don gyi gsang ba zab mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung nas sprul pa lcam dral 'di mgo mjug gi don rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis/_dbyings dang ye shes gnyis/_thabs dang shes 
[\[200b.7\]]rab gnyis/_kun rdzob dang don dam gnyis/_mdor bsdus na don dam la lhun gyis grub pa'i byang chub sems su bsdu'o/_/rgyud 'di'i mgo mjug gi don dpal kun du bzang por 'dus so/_/kun du bzang po sku mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang /_gsung mi zad 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang /_thugs mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang /_sku gsung thugs bde ba chen po ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor nyid kyang byang chub kyi sems kyang 'dus so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i kun du bzang por 'dus pa'i don ni bcom ldan 
[\[201a.2\]]'das kyis sdud pa po rdo rje chos la gtad do/_/sku gsung thugs kyi don gsang ba zab mo 'di rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa po la gtad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa pos lus ngag yid gsum rjes su yi rang skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/_kun 
[\[201a.3\]]gzhi rnal 'byor rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor na/_/zab cing gting dpag dka' ba rgyal ba'i sku bzhugs so/_/sprul pa mang pos 'gro don rdzogs par mdzad/_/dpal chen kun bzang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ye shes khro bo chos nyid dbyings na bzhugs/_/sprul pa'i 
[\[201a.4\]]khro bos las rnams rdzogs par mdzad/_/phra men yang sprul ye shes dbyings su 'khyil/_/khro bo 'khor mo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sku gsung dngos grub ya mtshan cho 'phrul can/_/sku gsung thugs las sprul pa mang po 'phro/_/mkha' 'gro za byed phra men pho nya ma/_/mgyogs 
[\[201a.5\]]pa'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/las rnams drag shul mdzad pa'i khro rgyal sku/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i man ngag gsang chen rnams/_/klung nas grol bar mdzad pa ye shes yum/_/sgo ba sgo ma'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams 
[\[201a.6\]]rjes su yi rangs te/_legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_bka' dam pa gsang ba zab mo'i tan tra 'di sdud pa po rdo rje chos la gtad do/_/de nas sdud pa po rdo rje chos kyis bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po he ru ka 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la sku gsung 
[\[201a.7\]]thugs kyi bshags pa phul lo/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang du gyur pas na/_/lus ngag sems kyis sdig bgyis mthol zhing bshags/_/theg pa dman pa'i dbang du gyur pas na/_/thabs chen spyad dang ma spyad mthol zhing bshags/_/ma rig log pa'i 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]dbang du gyur pas na/_/yang dag don ma rtogs pa mthol zhing bshags/_/snying rje chung zhing zhe sdang dbang du gyur pas na/_/'gro ba'i don ma bgyis pa mthol zhing bshags/_/le lo gnyid kyi dbang du gyur pas na/_/bsgom dang bsgrub la g.yel ba mthol zhing bshags/_/
[\[201b.2\]]ser sna 'jur 'gegs dbang du gyur pas na/_/mchod pa lo zla 'das pa mthol zhing bshags/_/nga rgyal khengs sems dbang du bsdus pa na/_/slob dpon sku ma mnyes pa mthol zhing bshags/_/brtse gdung chung ba'i dbang du gyur pas na/_/grogs mched thugs 
[\[201b.3\]]dang 'gal ba mthol zhing bshags/_/za rog ngan pa'i dbang du gyur pas na/_/phud dang lhag mar gyur pa mthol zhing bshags/_/phud dang lhag ma nyams pa'i skyon dbang gis/_/phud nyul thugs dang 'gal ba mthol zhing bshags/_/phud nyul thugs dang 'gal 
[\[201b.4\]]ba'i skyon dbang gis/_/mkha' 'gro bka' chad gnas su gyur pa mthol zhing bshags/_/sgrol ba'i dus su snying rje chung ba yis/_/sems can gnas ma stobs pa mthol zhing bshags/_/nyon mongs gnas ma stobs pa'i skyon dbang gis/_/yun gyi sgrib par 
[\[201b.5\]]gyur pa mthol zhing bshags/_/sbyor ba'i dus su ting 'dzin ma gsal bas/_/gzungs ma thugs dang 'gal ba'i skyon dbang gis/_/chags shing 'khor ba'i gnas su mthol zhing bshags/_/bshags nas sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol/_/de skad ces 
[\[201b.6\]]bzod pa phul nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang tshangs pa gnang ste/_bka' dam pa 'di yang nas yang du rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa po la gtad do/_/de nas rdo rje chos kyis bka' dam pa 'di ma chags pa'i dbang gis bka' bzhin byas so/_/de nas 'khor de dag thal 
[\[201b.7\]]mo sbyar nas rjes su yi rang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha dang /_
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]klu dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/gsang ba'i snying po zab mo mchog dpal snying rje rol pa'i rgyud rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi lots+tsha ba mkhas par 
[\[202a.2\]]lobs pa bal po shrI kIr tis gtan la phab ste/_skad gsar pas bsgyur nas sog po mchog gi snying po dang /_an bkra shis dang /_bal po bzang bkra shis rgya mtshos yon bdag bgyis nas mang yul byams sprin gtsug lag khang gi ya thog gi dbu 
[\[202a.3\]]rtser shin tu gsang ste/_skad gsal bar bsgyur ro//[ {D841}{D841-1}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta/_sa ra sid+d+hi ma hA du ka_/hr-i da yA na pa ra bid twan aSh+Ta/_bod skad du/_thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin/_
[\[202a.4\]]dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po mchog bam po chen po brgyad pa/_dpal kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor na/_/shin tu rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho 'khor dang bcas/_/skal ldan rnams dang 
[\[202a.5\]]thabs cig bzhugs/_/gnas mchog yum gyi dkyil 'khor na/_/gnyis med lhun gyis gnas pa'i tshe/_/de tshe nyan thos dge 'dun dang /_/rang rgyal theg chen mdo sde dang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_/nyan thos dge 'dun chen po dang /_/dgra bcom 
[\[202a.6\]]ming yang med nang du/_/kun bzang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/_/dgongs te 'di skad bstan pa'i lung /_/bshad cing 'grel pa'i dus gcig dang /_/'di skad bstan pa'i dus gcig na/_/srid gsum ye nas bdud rtsi lnga/_/ma bcos ye nas rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/
[\[202a.7\]]kun du bzang po'i thugs dkyil nas/_/dus gsum srid gsum sku gsung thugs/_/ye nas bdud rtsi yin pa'i phyir/_/nges pa'i klong nas bka' stsal pa/_/zab mo'i klong nas phyung ste bstan/_/de nas bder gshegs thams cad dang /_/thabs cig bzhugs te 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]dgongs pa ni/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub tu/_/ye shes mnyam nyid nyams rnyed nas/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i gral bkod de/_/kun gyi dam par 'di gsungs so/_/bka' yi dam pa mchog gi lung /_/nges par phyung ste gsungs pa 'di'o/_/sgrub dang bsgrub par bya ba dang /_/'bras bu 
[\[202b.2\]]thob par bya ba'i phyir/_/gsang sngags gsang ba'i man ngag 'di/_/bdud rtsi dam pa mchog gi lung /_/snying por bsdus pa'i nges par 'di/_/byang chub 'byung ba snying po mchog_/lta ba dang ni spyod pa dang /_/dam tshig bsgrub pa phrin las dang /_/nges par sgrub dang bsgrub bya'i 
[\[202b.3\]]phyir/_/zab mo bsdus pa'i lung 'di gsungs/_/bsam gyis mi khyab bstan pa dang /_/brgyad khri bzhi stong rnam grangs kyang /_/theg pa'i sgo ni gsum du gsungs/_/gsang nyid theg par bsdus dang bzhi/_/ldem por dgongs dang don dam yang /_/bkri ba'i don de 
[\[202b.4\]]sangs rgyas yin/_/rna brgyud bstan pas thugs brtol te/_/thig le chos skus khyab pa'i phyir/_/nges pa'i lung yang sangs rgyas so/_/sangs rgyas mnyam dang dbyings su 'gro/_/nges pa'i lung yang rnam gcig tu/_/gsang sngags gsang bas sangs rgyas te/_/
[\[202b.5\]]byang chub sems 'di kun du dag_/rdzogs pa'i ye shes bde chen nyid/_/ma lus mtha' dag nyid kyi rgya/_/ye nas bya med bya mi dgos/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu 'khrul pa'i sgra/_/mi rtog sbyong ba'i yul min no/_/de lta'i yul du rtog 'dzin gyis/_/'khor ba'i rgya 
[\[202b.6\]]mtshor gyur pa yin/_/nges 'byung chos sku chen po la/_/b+ha gar ji bzhin bzhag pas na/_/byang chub nyid de ltung gnas med/_/bu gcig ma rtsol bde bar gnos/_/rgyud dang lung dang man ngag kyang /_/dmangs dang rje'u dang rgyal po'i tshul/_/khyad par rtsal 'phang 
[\[202b.7\]]thag ring yang /_/gcig la gcig rten gcig gi ngang /_/dbyer med tshul gcig rang bzhin pas/_/cig ste rnam grangs yongs kyis med/_/dbyer med ngang du rtogs pa la/_/bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya'o/_/de bas sku gsung thugs kyi bdag_/sku dang rgyan dang 'khor 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]lo yang /_/lung chen zab mo'i nang na gsal/_/lnga bzhi nang du 'khor ba yang /_/ye shes sangs rgyas de las med/_/dbyings su gyur pas mnyam gnas pas/_/ye nas sangs rgyas bde chen nyid/_/bdud rtsi zhes ni de la brjod/_/skye shi med pa'i 
[\[203a.2\]]dbyings su gyur/_/dbyings 'gyur dag mnyam lhun grub pas/_/lta ba 'di la gnas pa yi/_/rnal 'byor 'di ni skal ba bzang /_/ci spyad ci bsgoms ci bsgrubs kyang /_/bdud rtsi nyid de sman gyi mchog_/bder gshegs nyid kyi thugs dam nyid/_/byin brlabs 
[\[203a.3\]]ngo mtshar rgya cher 'byung /_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyi gsos/_/sangs rgyas bde chen nyid las byung /_/thams cad ma lus bdud rtsi 'di/_/spros med thig ler gnas pa las/_/mtha' yas sems can don gyi phyir/_/rang la mchod cing rang gis bza'/_/
[\[203a.4\]]sgrub pa pos ni nan tan byos/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos/_ye shes chen po'i thugs nas dgongs te bka' stsal pa'o/_/bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung las byang chub sems de kho na nyid lta bar bstan pa'i man ngag chen po gsang ba'i 
[\[203a.5\]]don dang po ste/_thugs kyi rgya mtsho'i nang nas gsang ba'i mdzod chen po las bam po chen po brgyad pa'i dang po//[ {D841-2}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_a mr-i ta ra sa ya na/_ta na dz+ha ya/_pra shasta pra ma na shri kra na pra shasta ya na mo/_bod skad du/_
[\[203a.6\]]tshangs pa la sogs pa drang srong dang /_lha dang klu dang mi'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas tshangs pa'i gtso bo mchog_/dung gi thor tshugs khong seng can/_/tshangs pa kun grol chen po dang /_/drang srong chen po ljang sngon dang /_/tsa ra ka dang na ba so 
[\[203a.7\]]skyes/_/tha skar bu dang lha skabs dang /_/rgyun shes pa dang g.yon phyogs lha/_/thang la gnas dang me bzhin 'jug_/dka' gnyis spyod dang ka la yan/_/shing khyer dang ni ljang sngon bu/_/nyi ma zla ba klu ru bcas/_/shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang ma/_/sman gyi lha mo nor gyi rgyun/_/
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]'di kun 'khor dang bcas pa yis/_/kun bzang lha la phyag 'tshal nas/_/sman gyi dbang dang dam tshig mnos/_/drang srong rnams la rjes su gnang /_/de nas kun bzang bder gshegs kyis/_/sman gyi rgyal po bdud rtsi mchog_/nges pa'i lung 'di bka' stsal to/_/de nas thugs rje'i cho 
[\[203b.2\]]'phrul gyis/_/sa rnams rab tu g.yos nas ni/_/stong gsum 'jig rten sa stengs su/_/thams cad sman chen ra sa yan/_/skye ba med las thams cad skyes/_/de ltar smin par byed pa yang /_/thugs rje rgya mtsho chen po las/_/thugs rje sprin ni khyab pa yis/_/sprin chen glog gi phreng ba can/_/
[\[203b.3\]]yud tsam sgra dang bcas pa yis/_/sa stengs khengs par char phab nas/_/de nyid thugs rje snyoms pa'i mgon/_/chu yi phung po bdud rtsi yis/_/ma lus par ni ngoms par byas/_/bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho thigs chen gyis/_/sa dang sman rnams kun gyi gsos/_/ri rab rtse dang ri sul 
[\[203b.4\]]dang /_/sman ljongs dang ni nags tshal dang /_/lcang lo can gyi 'khor kun du/_/sprin chen bdud rtsi char gyis brlan/_/chu de thams cad ro gcig ste/_/chu yi bcud las skyes pa ni/_/dpag bsam shing dang gel pa'i shing /_/ljon shing dang ni tsu ta'i shing /_/sa stengs khebs 
[\[203b.5\]]par skyes pa ste/_/bdud rtsir gyur te thams cad rgyas/_/sdong po dang ni sdong chen dang /_/rtsa ba sdong po shun lpags dang /_/snying po yal ga lo ma dang /_/'dab ma me tog 'bras bur bcas/_/de bzhin 'bru yi rnam grangs kun/_/thams cad bangs shing smin par mdzad/_/
[\[203b.6\]]'thungs na ngoms te rgyas par gyur/_/so so'i yul dang gnas dag dang /_/mdog dang ro dang dri dang mthu/_/gang gi sa bon de nyid las/_/de dag rang rang 'byin par byed/_/de bzhin srog chags thams cad kun/_/ra sa ya na'i rdzas la spyod/_/'gro ba drug gi gsos su 
[\[203b.7\]]'gyur/_/bdud rtsi sgo ni rnam par phye/_/'jig rten mgon pos bka' stsal to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal rnon pos bsdus te bka' stsal pa/_lha dang klu dang drang srong dang /_mi'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge bsnyen chen po dri ma 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]med par grags pa li ts+tsha bi la sogs pa la bdud rtsi ra sa ya na tan na dz+ha ya 'di dag bstan no/_/dang por bsgrub pa'i yul dang gnas ni/_u hu si ti pa tsa zhes bya ste/_ba tris zhes kyang bya ba/_ri'i rgyal po gser mdog can gyi rtse mo rta rna ri zhes bya ba der/_
[\[204a.2\]]ra sa ya na zhes bya ba drang srong rnams kyis bsgrubs so/_/de yang thang cig yud kyis 'grub/_/la la nyin zhag gcig gis 'grub/_/la la nyin zhag bdun gyis 'grub/_/mtha' ma nyi shu gcig gis 'grub/_/de la the tshom med pas 'grub/_/de dag kun gyi mtshan nyid 
[\[204a.3\]]ni/_/rtsa ba sdong bu yal ga dang /_/lo ma 'dab ma me tog dang /_/shun lpags 'bras bu snying por bcas/_/ro dang mthu dang mdog dang las/_/rtsa ba gcig la yan lag brgyad/_/yan lag brgyad las yon tan stong /_/'di dag kun gyi yon tan yang /_/bzhi brgya rtsa 
[\[204a.4\]]bzhi'i nad sel zhing /_/bdud bzhi nges par 'joms par byed/_/sman gyi rgyal po bdud rtsi'i mchog_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/_/drang srong chen po 'di kun kyang /_/mngon shes lnga dang ldan 'gyur zhing /_/rig pa'i gnas mchog [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad shes/_/
[\[204a.5\]]de nas sman ni bsgrub par bya/_/stegs bu khru gang ba gcig la/_/maN+Dal gtsang ma'i dris byugs la/_/de yi dbus su sman gyi mchog_/bdud rtsi cong zi rnam gsum dang /_/ser skya ba las byung ba yi/_/'o ma bre gang btsags nang du/_/a sho kan da'i phye ma dang /_/bsres 
[\[204a.6\]]nas bskol ba'i nang du gdab/_/lcags las byas pa'i snod du blugs/_/stegs bu'i dbus su bzhag nas ni/_/byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags 'di dag_/stong ngam brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas/_/oM badzra a mr-i ta/_pa la lig_/pe la la lig tsan da lig swA hA/_
[\[204a.7\]]dngos grub blang ba'i sngags 'di'o/_/a mr-i ta sin+d+hi byi tsu rna ya swA hA/_pu tsa lha ha kan/_byin gyis brlab cing bza' ba yang /_/nyi ma'i gung la bza' bar bya/_/don dam thig le bden pa las/_/snying po med las snying po blang /_/rnam smin 'bras bu 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]rig 'dzin 'grub/_/nad med lo brgya 'tsho bar byed/_/de nas drang srong nyi shu gcig_/grub pa'i rig 'dzin mchog tu gyur/_/de yi 'og tu drang srong mchog_/[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga yis ni bdud rtsi sman/_/ra sa ya na dam pa 'di/_/tshe yi rig 'dzin 'dod pa'i phyir/_/gzhon nu sred 
[\[204b.2\]]ces bya ba dang /_/'dron skyob ces ni bya ba dang /_/rtsibs kyi mu khyud la sogs pas/_/chu bo gang gA'i 'gram du bsgrubs/_/lha rdzas dge ba a ru ra/_/rigs bdun sa la lhung ba ni/_/brgya byin bdud rtsi 'thung ba'i tshe/_/thigs pa bdun ni kha nas ltung /_/rlung gis khyer te sa las 
[\[204b.3\]]skyes/_/bdud rtsi'i gtso bor rab tu grags/_/rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan dang /_/'dus pa'i nad dang dus kyi nad/_/dus min 'chi las thar bar byed/_/rlung mkhris bad kan 'di kun yang /_/gcig la'ang lnga lnga yod par bshad/_/de kun rab tu bsal ba'i phyir/_/phung 
[\[204b.4\]]po'i bdud dang nyon mongs bdud/_/lha bu bdud dang 'chi bdag bcom/_/bdud rtsi 'di yis sel bar byed/_/shar lho nub byang gang yang rung /_/brag phug stong pa yod pa las/_/bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'i khu ba ni/_/rin chen sna lnga 'byung ba'o/_/ming ni shi la mdza' du zhes/_/ra sa ya 
[\[204b.5\]]na bdud rtsi'i mchog_/a ru ra brgya rtsa brgyad dam/_/yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/_/sul bu zlum por gyur btsos te/_/de dag rab tu btsos pa dang /_/lcags zangs 'khar ba'i snod nang du/_/bkang ste stegs bu gong ma yi/_/dbus su bdud rtsi sman de gzhag_/byin 
[\[204b.6\]]gyis brlab pa snga ma bzhin/_/'od dang dri dang bro ba'ang med/_/rtags 'di rnam gsum gang byung yang /_/lag pa g.yon pa bkan te phyar/_/mthe bong srin lag mthil du dgug_/blangs te btung ba'i sngags 'di'o/_/oM a mraM ta si ti bi tsurna ya/_/lha ha kan zhes 
[\[204b.7\]]brjod do/_/de yi yon tan brjod mi lang /_/rdo rje brag dang 'drar 'gyur te/_/nad med rtag tu dar la bab/_/grub pa'i rig 'dzin dam par 'gyur/_/srid pa chags nas srubs shing gis/_/bsrubs pa'i 'bras bu rin po che/_/me shel chu shel gnyis byung ba/_/
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]de yang thabs dang shes rab ste/_/nyin mtshan gnyis la dbang byed pa'o/_/de nyid zung yang 'khor du bcas/_/de nas bdud rtsi zags pa ni/_/sa dman dag tu mi skye ste/_/a la be tas sar kal ba/_/lha dang dri za gnod sbyin dang /_/rin chen sna tshogs 'byung khungs 
[\[205a.2\]]gnas/_/legs ldan gangs ri gnyan gyi shod/_/ri brag chu klung bgegs gnas su/_/lhung nas babs te skyes pa ni/_/a~M li ka dang bris rtsi ka_/nyi ma gzi brjid ldan pa'i chu/_/a la be ta sar sra kal ba br-ik+Sha 'bru/_/de bzhin zla ba gzi ldan chu/_/de yi sa bon lhung 
[\[205a.3\]]ba ni/_/gser mdog bdud rtsi 'dra bar gsal/_/dmar ba mer blugs pus bus zer/_/gzugs bzang mdzes pa phun sum tshogs/_/tsher ma rno ba dpal dang ldan/_/bdud rtsi shing dang 'bras bur ldan/_/dug rnams 'joms shing slar yang zlog_/_sna tshogs 
[\[205a.4\]]nad rnams sel bar byed/_/nyi ma'i 'od dang zla ba'i mdog_/ro yang rnam pa sna tshogs ldan/_/rak+ta'i gtso bor 'di sbyor cig_/tshangs pa tshe dang ldan par 'gyur/_/nyi ma zla ba'i dngos grub thob/_/ra sa ya na'i gtso bo yin/_/de nas drang srong gzhon nu srid/_/khyab 
[\[205a.5\]]'jug spang gnyis bya ba yi/_/rwa yi gzhu thogs mi srun pa/_/lag na mtshon cha sna lnga thogs/_/de yis srid pa chags pa'i bcud/_/bdud rtsi rnam lnga bskus pa las/_/kha nas thigs gnyis sa la lhung /_/de nas bdud rtsi dam pa'i mchog_/ra sa ya na phyi ma'i 
[\[205a.6\]]rgyu/_/bu mo bzang mo gcig tu gyur/_/chu klung gang gA'i bye ma la/_/yod de skye ba bstan pa ni/_/nye'u shing ram nye'u zhes bya'o/_/'gan ta ku le par pa ta/_/gnad pri ya ku ma ha go na sig ha ma kha/_/tsher ma yar lta mar lta ba'o/_/de la lha bran tshogs kun 
[\[205a.7\]]gyis/_/bskor zhing mchod pa byed pa yin/_/ston zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]dpyid zla 'bring /_/nya yi tshe na btsal bar bya'o/_/btsal ba'i thabs ni 'di ltar ro/_/byis pa lo drug lo bdun pa/_/khrus byas dar ldan gos bskon nas/_/shar phyogs ngos su kha bltas te/_/
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]lha phyag lan gsum byas nas ni/_/de dag rtsa nas dbyung ba'i sngags/_/tad+ya thA sho hod ga te da re swA hA/_phyag 'tshal bdud rtsi mchog khyod la/_/phyag 'tshal bdud rtsi las 'byung ba/_/stobs dang gzi brjid 'phel mdzad ma/_/rang 'byung ston pa'i bka' bzhin du/_/lha mo khyod 
[\[205b.2\]]ni dbang gyur cig_/khu ba ra sa ya na'i mchog_/dngos grub mchog tu nye ba khyod/_/tshe dang stobs ni bdag stsol cig_/ye shes thams cad gsal bar mdzod/_/shun lpags dang ni rgyus pa bsal/_/tho to bsnyil te slar la sba'o/_/snying po brdungs la khu ba yang /_/
[\[205b.3\]]ras ni sar pa'i nang du btsir/_/bdag nyid lus kyang khrus byas te/_/dar ldan gos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gyon nas ni/_/sman du bsgrub pa'i 'jab la 'jug_/bsnyen dang 'dzab bsgom byas nas ni/_/stong ngam 'bum mam ci nus bzlas/_/bza' ba'am yang na 'thung ba'i tshe/_/
[\[205b.4\]]nyug chu ba yi 'o ma btung /_/yang na phye ma mchog tu bgam/_/bza' zhing btung ba'i sngags 'di'o/_/na ma dza ra a ga dza tu swA hA/_zhag gam za ma re re yang /_/srang re'i cha nas bskyed de bza'/_/zos pa'i yon tan 'di rnams so/_/lus ngag yid gsum 
[\[205b.5\]]dbang po gsal/_/bdud rtsi 'di dag su 'thung ba/_/ji ltar lha rnams 'chi med ltar/_/klu rnams la ni sman bzhin no/_/shing rnams la ni chu bzhin no/_/me tog la ni zla ba bzhin/_/lo ni lnga brgya lon bar du/_/bcu drug mdog ni gzhon nu 'dra/_/nad med rtag tu dar la bab/_/
[\[205b.6\]]stobs kyang glang po che dang 'dra/_/mngon shes lnga dang ldan par 'gyur/_/'o ma dag dang btung ba'am/_/mar khu'am sbrang rtsi dag dang btung /_/zhag gcig zos na yon tan bcu/_/zhag bdun zos na yon tan brgya/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig zos na ni/_/brgya rtsa brgyad 'dis thob par 
[\[205b.7\]]'gyur/_/bud med stong la khyab par sbyor/_/sa bon mi zad 'bras bu yang /_/bu phor 'phel zhing dpa' dang ldan/_/mi rnams kyis ni mi sod do/_/zla gcig zos na yon tan ni/_/ngo yang zla ba nya ba bzhin/_/gnod sbyin srin pos mi sod do/_/lha rnams kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/_/
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]zag pa zad nas nam mkhar 'phur/_/rdo rje 'gros kyis nam mkhar 'gro/_/rigs 'dzin go 'phang 'dir thob bo/_/'dres pa gang zag mi yi zas/_/zos na dngos grub mi thob nges zhes lung du bka' stsal to/_/de nas drang srong trag sha na/_/rgyal po shes nyen can zhes 
[\[206a.2\]]bya/_/lha dang drang srong thams cad la/_/mchod sbyin rgya chen byas pa las/_/ma hA de ba lha chen po/_/kun gyi 'jug tu spyan drangs pas/_/lha chen drag po de khros te/_/lha chen de yi dpral ba las/_/mig gcig lhag par byung ba ste/_/lha dang drang srong thams cad la/_/rlung mkhris 
[\[206a.3\]]bad kan sna tshogs dang /_/de bzhin mi la rims nad dag_/rlung lha'i lag par bskur nas gtor/_/lha dang drang srong mang pos kyang /_/ma shes ma tshor myos par 'gyur/_/phye ma'i rgyal po 'dab ma 'di/_/sa stengs khyab par skyes pa la/_/drang srong rnams kyang mchod pa 
[\[206a.4\]]byed/_/lug mig me tog chen po 'di/_/ra sa ya na'i rgyal mo ste/_/ba yi 'o ma dag dang bskol/_/rngubs gcig 'thungs pas ba spu langs/_/rngubs gnyis 'thungs pa'i yon tan ni/_/rims nad thams cad byang bar byed/_/rngubs gsum 'thungs pa'i yon tan ni/_/mig 
[\[206a.5\]]rtsa dmar zhing mdog kyang gzhon/_/phye ma grib mar bskams pa dang /_/ma to la yi khu bar sbyar/_/blud na dgra rnams myos par 'gyur/_/lha yis bsrungs kyang 'chi bar 'gyur/_/byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags 'di'o/_/stong ngam brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas/_/oM so 'u gri bA ha na ha na 
[\[206a.6\]]hU~M/_ma ra yam ra ya/_tse ta ya tse ta ya su gri ba phaT/_bdud rtsi ra sa ya na'i gtso/_/shu dag dang ni ru rta dang /_/phye mar byas te su blud pa/_/rgyal po bud med dbang du 'gyur/_/'gri ha 'gro lo ki dang sbyar/_/dgra la blud na rna ba 'on/_/lug mig grib mar bskams 
[\[206a.7\]]pa dang /_/su ti'i 'o mar sbyar ba ni/_/dgra la blud na 'chi bar 'gyur/_/lha chen drag pos bskyed pa 'di/_/'jam dpal gzhon nus mkhyen pa las/_/lha dang drang srong gzhan mi shes/_/de skad ces bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nus/_mi mjed kyi bdag po 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]lha tshangs pa dang /_drang srong dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang /_skal ba bzang po'i mi'i byang chub sems dpa' lits+tsha bI la sogs pa rnams la bka' stsal to/_/de yang tshe phyi ma'am dus phyi mar mi sdod par/_skal pa bzang po'i 'bras bu mngon du thob pa dang /_'bras bu tshe 'di 
[\[206b.2\]]nyid la smin to/_/de nas rtsi yi lha mo mchog_/ming ni grub pa'i blo gros ma/_/bu mo mu la zhes bya ba/_/de yi sa bon lhung ba ni/_/'dzam gling shing gi nags las skyes/_/rak+ta zhes ni 'dir grags pa/_/ra sa ya na'i gtso mo ste/_/rtsa ba rak+ta mu la kha/_/rtsa ba me tog 'bras 
[\[206b.3\]]bu rnams/_/mthun par zad par dmar ba ste/_/'bras bu sran ma ma sha tsam/_/gyen du zug pa de brko ba/_/ston zla ra ba'i nya la brko'o/_/srid pa'i na dang nags las skyes/_/khrag gi nyungs ma zhes ni grags/_/rlon pa'i khu ba btsir ba dang /_/pad+ma'i rak+ta cha mnyam bsres/_/
[\[206b.4\]]de dag bsgrub pa'i sngags 'di'o/_/oM na mo ra ga rak+ta/_mu la bu ne swA hA/_'gro ba dbang byed dam pa yin/_/rtsi yi lha mos bka' stsal to/_/ming gis med du mi rung ngo /_/rgyal bu don grub bya ba de/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i sku gdung ni/_/sha ri ram zhes grags pa yin/_/de yi sa bon 
[\[206b.5\]]'phel ba ni/_/'dzam gling sa stengs khyab par skyes/_/ma hA ni le zhes bya ba/_/ming ni tha skar rdo rje yin/_/me tog tha skar gzhon nu ste/_/snye ma zur gsum til gang 'dra/_/rdo rje brag kyang 'joms par nus/_/sha ri ram dang rus pa yi/_/sbyar ba'i 'phrad kyi dam par rung /_/
[\[206b.6\]]ming gis med du mi rung ngo /_/de yi yon tan thams cad kyang /_/rus pa sra mkhregs rdo rjer 'gyur/_/phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang mnyam/_/ra sa ya na'i mchog tu gsungs/_/de nas lha yi dbang po mchog_/brgya byin bu yi lag pa ru/_/gnod sbyin rgyal pos mda' brgyab pa/_/de 
[\[206b.7\]]yi dum bu lag sor yang /_/sa stengs khyab par skyes pa ni/_/li byi ce lag dbang po lag_/sdong bu yal ga mdzer pa med/_/me tog zur gsum mda' sgro 'dra/_/rtsa ba lag sor lnga pa ste/_/dbyar zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]nya la brko/_/bsgrub pa'i lag mthil g.yon du bzhag_/ra 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]sa ya na thams cad kyi/_/dngos grub blang ba'i phyag rgya yin/_/de tshe med du mi rung ngo /_/mang du 'phel 'gyur bsgrub rdzas yin/_/lus la 'byung ba'i dri chen dang /_/bsgral ba'i dri chen yungs kar gsum/_/cha mnyam 'thungs na dug rnams thub/_/'chi byed dug ni 
[\[207a.2\]]sel ba'i phyir/_/bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya'o/_/ming gis med du mi rung ngo /_/'chi bdag bdud kyang des bcom mo/_/purna zhes bya'i rna ba yang /_/srin po pu rna'i rna ba ste/_/bsgral ba'i rna ba dag dang sbyar/_/rna ba'i mngon shes thob par byed/_/ming gis med du mi rung 
[\[207a.3\]]ngo /_/b+ha hu lug mig me tog dang /_/mkha' lding bya yi mig dang sbyar/_/A la bi ga shang shang de'u/_/rma bya ngang pa ko ki la/_/'di rnams bsgral ba'i mig dang sbyar/_/mig gi mngon shes der thob ste/_/stobs ldan gyi ni mig yin no/_/ming gis med du mi rung ngo /_/
[\[207a.4\]]tsi tra ka dang snying zho sha/_/thams cad gnod sbyin snying gi brla/_/bsgral ba'i tsit+ta dag dang sbyar/_/mngon shes lnga yi dngos grub thob/_/ming gis med du mi rung ngo /_/bud med gong bshad 'dra ba yi/_/klad pa go ro tsa na 'byung /_/de ni ban glang rigs can yin/_/bsgral ba'i 
[\[207a.5\]]klad pa thams cad dang /_/thang bal hA yi rtsa bar sbyar/_/mdangs kyi dngos grub des thob 'gyur/_/ha lce ki ya kha 'bar ma'i/_/lce yin pas na lce dang sbyar/_/dbang ngo lcags kyi dngos grub dang /_/spyan ras gzigs kyi dngos grub thob/_/ming gis med du mi rung ngo /_/srid pa'i bdag 
[\[207a.6\]]po tshangs pa'i gtso/_/ming ni mgon btsun phywa zhes bya'o/_/nal gyi bu ni dzi hwa zhes/_/skad ma phyung gi lce zhes bya'o/_/skad phyung ba ni tshangs pa ste/_/skad ma phyung gi grubs par gcad/_/de dang sbyar ba'i 'phrad du ni/_/me tog rma lo kril kril te/_/ming ni ba ya sa ya'o/_/rtsa ba ma hA go na 
[\[207a.7\]]mig_/me tog gser gyi mdun zhu can/_/shar phyogs su ni kha lta ba/_/'di'i kun ha lce ki ya ste/_/cha mnyam btags te phye mar bya/_/zla ba gza' yis zin pa'i tshe/_/yi dam lha la mchod bya zhing /_/phye ma rgya chang nang du gdab/_/thang cig yud kyis 'grub pa ste/_/rta mgrin dbang 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]gi dngos grub thob/_/bsgral ba'i lce ni thams cad dang /_/sbyar ba 'phrad kyi dam par rung /_/ming gis med du mi rung ngo /_/sna dang sna ma'i 'bras bur sbyar/_/tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs sgrogs nus 'gyur/_/bsgral ba'i sna ni thams cad sbyar/_/ming gis med du mi rung ngo /_/dung dang 'brug 
[\[207b.2\]]rus gdung dang ni/_/bsgral ba'i rus pa thams cad sbyar/_/lus kyi rdo rje mngon shes thob/_/ming gis med du mi rung ngo /_/rgya mtsho dbu ba 'dus pa'i chu/_/sna tshogs chu dang gangs kyi chu/_/lan tshwa sna tshogs dri chu rnams/_/bsgral ba'i chu ni thams cad sbyar/_/rdo rje chu yi bdud rtsi ste/_/
[\[207b.3\]]rtag tu 'gro ba'i don byed nus/_/ming gis med du mi rung ngo /_/dgongs pa'i don du sems can mtha' dag la snang ba dang /_nus mthu'i yon tan gyis sems can kun la phan 'dogs par nus so/_/'gro ba yongs kyi gsos mdzad par dgongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das dpal 
[\[207b.4\]]kun du bzang pos ye shes kyi thugs nas dgongs nas mgur gyi bum par dril te/_ljags kyi dbang po la bkram ste/_zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas/_mkhyen rab kyi dang po 'jam dpal rnon po dang /_rdo rje chos la bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal gyis dkyil 'khor gyi 
[\[207b.5\]]sras mchog nye ba dang /_tshangs pa dang drang srong dang /_lha dang klu dang /_mi'i byang chub sems dpa' ba ma la g+hir ti rnams la bka' stsal to/_/bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung gi sde las/_sman ra sa ya na bsgrub pa'i lung 'bum sde las btus pa/_bam po 
[\[207b.6\]]chen po gnyis pa//_//[{D841-3}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_pradz+nyA b+ha ga ban ma hA rA dzA/_bod skad du/_bcom ldan 'das gnyis med kyi rgyal po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas spyod pa bstan te/_lung a nu yo ga ba rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor 
[\[207b.7\]]du bstan te/_lta ba dang ni spyod pa dang /_gzungs kyi mtshan nyid 'di gsungs so/_/de bzhin dam tshig chen po'ang bstan/_/las 'di lung gis bsgrub bya na/_/mi spong ba ni dang du blang /_/spyod pa dam tshig [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga bsrung /_/shes pa lnga dang bsrung ba gsum/_/
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]stong rtsa brgyad du bsrungs pas ni/_/rtsa brgyad stong zhes de la bya'o/_/de yang ma hA sa ma ya/_/bzhi po rdzogs na kun du bzang /_/zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang /_/mnan bzlog drug ni gcig tu'o/_/dang la ga ni lung bshad de/_/khru tshad bzhi dang ldan pa ni/_/
[\[208a.2\]]yon tan bcu gcig dang yang ldan/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mig gi dkyus ring ba/_/stod smad phyed la rked pa phra/_/tshigs pa zlum la sor mo ring /_/yon tan 'od can bcu gcig lo/_/ye shes rigs can yin par bshad/_/bcu gsum rdo rje rigs su 'grub/_/bcu drug 
[\[208a.3\]]sngags pas 'grub nges pa'o/_/rin chen rigs mchog yin par bstan/_/nyi shu gcig pa pad+ma'i rigs/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang rta mchog 'grub/_/nyi shu rtsa lnga lon pas ni/_/thogs med byang chub sems kyang 'dren/_/thams cad las kyi rigs mchog 'grub/_/
[\[208a.4\]]sum cu rtsa gcig phan chad kyis/_/sems phebs tshun chad kun du dge'o/_/yid du 'ong ba dam pa yin/_/bder gshegs rigs su 'grub par bshad/_/bde chen 'du 'bral med pa'i gzungs/_/de dag ma lus gang rnyed pa/_/lus kyang khrus byas gtsang mar bya'o/_/
[\[208a.5\]]dri zhim tsan+dan go pan dang /_/dza ti pa la ku ru tshe/_/ka ko la dang ga pur dang /_/a ka ru dang du ruska/_/gi bang glang po'i spos rnams kyis/_/byugs nas rgyan dang phreng ba gdags/_/dar dang ras bal 'jam po dang /_/gos rgyan chas bklubs bskon nas ni/_/gser 
[\[208a.6\]]gyi rna cha gdub kor dang /_/do shal dpung rgyan se mo do/_/rin chen sna tshogs rgyan du gdags/_/ji bzhin bde ba'i stan dag la/_/g.yon phyogs su ni gzhag par bya/_/bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang /_/bsgrub dang bsgrub chen bya ba ni/_/dkyil 'khor 'dom 
[\[208a.7\]]gang gru bzhi pa/_/'phang du sor bzhi'i tshad du bya/_/rdo rje dri chus maN+Dal byugs/_/sha chen gu gul pog gis bdug_/dkyil 'khor de la bskor te 'dug_/g.yon du de phyi bzhag nas ni/_/b+ha ga de nyid byin gyis brlab/_/spyi bor oM dkar 'od ldan pa/_/
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]lce la a~MHdmar dam pa bsam/_/snying gar zla dkyil hU~M mthing ga_/lte bar swa sngon 'od ldan pa/_/rkang par ha ljang 'od ldan pa/_/ba las pad+ma'i dbyings su yang /_/gru gsum me 'od 'bar ba bsam/_/nyon mongs lnga rnams sbyang ba dang /_/sdug bsngal lnga ni tshar gcad phyir/_/lag 
[\[208b.2\]]g.yas gzhan gyis mi thub ma/_/g.yon pa ro langs chen mo ste/_/de yi kha la khro gnyer ma/_/ral pa gcig ma pad+ma la'o/_/gsang yum lnga dang khro mo bzhi/_/byin gyis brlabs te sngags bzlas pa/_/oM a~MHhU~M sA hA/_b+ha ga ban ni nyid kyi bka'/_/phyag rgya bzhi ru 
[\[208b.3\]]bdag gyur pas/_/gnyis su med par mnyam sbyar nas/_/lha yi bdud dam phung po'i bdud/_/nyon mongs bdud dang 'chi bdag bcom/_/phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan/_/mkha' la sems phebs 'phros pa'i tshe/_/byang chub 'khor ba mya ngan 'das/_/gnyis su med pa'i sar 
[\[208b.4\]]phyin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas sems can thams cad dang /_/mtshan mar btags pa thams cad kun/_/bde chen nyid las gzhan ma yin/_/bde chen nyid las gzhan pa'i chos/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi mkhyen to/_/phyi nang 
[\[208b.5\]]ma lus snod bcud kyang /_/byang chub sems su rnam dag pas/_/skye med ye shes yum gyi dbyings/_/gnyis med bdud rtsi chen po ste/_/yab yum bde ba'i ngang du gsal/_/'di ni snying po byang chub sems/_/bder gshegs kun gyis bka' stsal to/_/lus kun yongs su 
[\[208b.6\]]'khyud pa yis/_/rdo rje pad+mar ldan byas nas/_/rang 'byung rnams ni bde mchog sems/_/phul bas myur du grub pa ni/_/oM ra ga pU dza ho/_dngos grub blang zhing 'di brjod do/_/byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur te/_/dngos grub bsgrub pa la gzud do/_/bdud rtsi 
[\[208b.7\]]chen po mchog gi lung gi nang nas/_bsgrub pa chen po'i lung dang /_gzungs kyi mtshan nyid dang /_sbyor ba'i man ngag dang /_gA na bsgrub pa'i lung dang /_byang chub kyi sems kyi yon tan dang /_a mr-i ta grub pa'i lung ste/_bam po chen po gsum pa//_//
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]{D841-4}]rgya gar skad du/_sta na ma hA dar pany+tsa/_bod skad du/_'bras bu chen po lnga bsgral ba'o/_/dpal chen khro rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mi phyed dang bas phyag 'tshal na/_/de nas sta na'i lung bshad de/_/ye nas rgyu nyid dag pa las/_/nga 
[\[209a.2\]]dang bdag tu 'dzin pa yis/_/khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgyu ru gyur/_/khams gsum de dag bsgral ba'i zhing /_/A sa ma tsa la d+ha rma d+ha tu/_swa b+ha ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_ra~M ya~M kha~M ta tha phaT/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/_/mi g.yo phyag rgya chen po'i ngang /_/
[\[209a.3\]]dbang phyug chen po'i bsgral thabs ni/_/'tsho ba'i bdag po'i tshe dang srog_/_thugs rje'i ngang dang shes rab dang /_/thabs la mkhas pa'i byin brlabs kyis/_/'gro ba thams cad sbyong bar mdzad/_/bdud dang gshin rje 'khor bcas kun/_/gnyis med phyag rgyar rol pa 
[\[209a.4\]]yis/_/dus la bab po sam ya/_/oM sarba pA pa kar he ha sa si stam/_tro~M ka ru ni hU~M dza dza/_ma tang gi ni rnam shes de/_/nges par gzugs la phab nas ni/_/Ta ki zhal ni nub tu bstan/_/dbang du bsdu ba'i las mdzad kyis/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis rlobs/_/
[\[209a.5\]]khams gsum ma lus bsgral ba'i zhing /_/sta na chen po bya ba'i phyir/_/bder gshegs mang po kun 'dus shing /_/byams dang snying rje ldan pa yis/_/nyon mongs 'khor ba'i rgya dral to/_/gnas kyi sgo 'di su yis bcad/_/sems kyi bdag pos bcad dam ci/_/
[\[209a.6\]]gzung 'dzin rkang pa bsnol ba yis/_/yul las 'das pa'i sgo phye shig zhes brjod de/_sgo dbye'o/_/ka ta ri ka na pra be sha/_/g.yon pa'i zhabs kyis ru tra'i gzugs/_/gnas kyi sgo 'di bcad bzhin du/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i skyabs su gsol/_/shi 
[\[209a.7\]]ba'i sdug bsngal 'dir byung ngo /_/zhes lha chen po brgyad kyis dus gcig tu tshig de smras so/_/Ta ki brgyad kyis bka' stsal pa/_dregs pa ma rungs lha chen khyod/_/sems kyi sgo kun da dbye yis/_/rdo rje 'bar ba'i spu gri yis/_/gnas kyi sgo kun des phye nas/_/
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]sems kyi bdag pos gzung bar bya/_/ston pas gsungs pa/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis 'chi ba yin/_/sdig pa'i rkyen gyis bcom pas 'chi/_/bdag kyang dngos por lta bas 'jig_/nga yi bstan pa 'di la gzung /_/'on kyang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal bral/_/gzugs 
[\[209b.2\]]'dzin rkang lag yul las bzlas/_/pho mo bsnol te mnan pa yang /_/mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan/_/rkang pa byang shar mtshams su brkyang /_/Ta ki'i zhabs ni g.yas pa yis/_/ru tra ling ga'i steng du mnan/_/de ltar ling ga mnan byas nas/_/thar 
[\[209b.3\]]byed chen po'i 'gying stabs kyis/_/rngom brjid chen pos 'di skad do/_/sa ma ya ke sha tsi ta dz+wa la hU~M phaT/_zhes mnan no/_/ma hA de ba ru tra dza zhes pa dang /_khams gsum nas 'byung sems can rnams/_/rdo rje sku yi khyad par gyis/_/'od zer 
[\[209b.4\]]tshul du bsdus nas ni/_/de dag bdag gis gzugs la gzung /_/spro ba rdo rje thams cad kyis/_/sku dang ye shes mchog gis bya'o/_/thar pa'i lam 'byed dkyil 'khor 'dir/_/brod pa can rnams 'ong ba ltar/_/skal dang ldan pa rigs kyi bu/_/
[\[209b.5\]]bde bar 'ongs pa legs te 'ongs/_/rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yis/_/rtse rgyal bstan pa'i gnas chen 'dir/_/bo d+hi tsit+ta'i dbyings nyid du/_/khams gsum 'khor ba kun bsdu'o/_/chos nyid skye 'gag med pa la/_/bde bar gshegs dang 'gro ba zhes/_/dbyings su 
[\[209b.6\]]gcig pas gnyis su med/_/kun kyang ngo bo mnyam nyid de/_/thams cad snying po byang chub sems/_/ma skyes pas na 'gag pa 'jig_/bdag nyid med na mnyam pa'i sku/_/thugs rje chen po cir mi mdzad/_/ye nas de ltar gnas bzhin du/_/sems can ma rig 
[\[209b.7\]]rmongs pa'i blos/_/bdag dang bdag gir so sor 'dzin/_/rtag chad mtha' gnyis ma spangs te/_/nor pas btags pa'i phung po lnga/_/log rtog phyin ci log bzhes bcings/_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal rgyu bsags te/_/'khor ba'i rgyud lnga kha brims pas/_/mya 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]ngan mi 'da' yun [{]rings te[,]ring ste[}]/_/phung po khams dang skye mched la/_/'khrul pa'i bag chags bag la nyal/_/bde 'gro'i lam la bsgribs pa'i rnams/_/'khor ba'i lam lnga rgyun gcad phyir/_/ngan song rnam par sbyong ba'o/_/ma tha ma tha sarba pre tag ti he ta hu~M phaT/_pa 
[\[210a.2\]]tsa pa tsa sarba ti ra yag te he ta hu~M phaT/_da ha da ha sarba na ra ga te he hu~M phaT/_de ltar ngan song rnam sbyangs te/_/sdug bsngal gsum gyi sgo gcad phyir/_/ra~M ya~M kha~M zhes brjod la/_ye shes 'bar ba'i mes bsregs te/_/mtshan nyid med par stong par 'gyur/_/dus la bab 
[\[210a.3\]]pa'i sems can de/_/las la bab pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir/_/thugs rje lcags kyus bkug nas ni/_/skal dang ldan pa'i rnam shes de/_/thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/_/sku yi sprul pa phyogs bcur bkye/_/gsung gis sems 
[\[210a.4\]]can mtha' dag grol/_/thugs ni tshad med bzhi dang ldan/_/nyi zla gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor du/_/tshe dpag med par dbang bskur nas/_/yang dag nyid la yang dag sgrol/_/yang dag bsgral na bde chen thob/_/mi ldog sa la nges par phyin/_/phyin pa tsam gyis dbang thob nas/_/rgyal 
[\[210a.5\]]ba'i zhing khams dbyings nyid mthong /_/rgyu drug gnas su mi skye phyir/_/dpa' bo 'bru lngas lam lnga dgag_/oM a~M hU~M swA hA/_'og min dga' ldan lha yul du/_/ye shes rlung gis btegs nas ni/_/sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT kyis 'phang /_/a nri su tri pri du/_gang yang 
[\[210a.6\]]rung ba'i rnam shes de/_/gsang ba'i dbyings su hU~M gis bsdu/_/skur bskyed ye shes skur spros te/_/dbyings dang ye shes lhun grub pas/_/sangs rgyas zhing sa rab 'byams dang /_/bder gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor du/_/rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang ldan pa yis/_/'phags 
[\[210a.7\]]pa'i lam du rlung zhugs nas/_/chos kyi 'khor lo skor zhing gshegs/_/'jig rten lha yi gtso bo dang /_/nyan thos dgra bcom rang rgyal dang /_/sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' yis/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pas mchod/_/stug pos brgyan pa'i sa 'das nas/_/
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]pad+ma spyan gyi sa la bzhag_/'chi ba med pa'i chos sku thob/_/stong gsum ma lus bton pa bas/_/'bum gyi char yang mi phod de/_/rang sems ma bcos ye nas chub/_/skyes bu chen po rnal 'byor gyis/_/bsgral ba 'ba' zhig snying rje'i mchog_/de nas ma trang ru tra de bsgral 
[\[210b.2\]]te/_sngon 'byung ba yi gleng gzhi dang /_gtan tshigs su dgongs nas/_phyi rabs kyi sngags 'chang rnams yid ches par bya ba dang /_dad pa can gyi rnal 'byor pa rnams drang ba'i phyir/_dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad dang /_ma mo chen mo brgyad dang /_rang 'byung gi 
[\[210b.3\]]mchod rten chen po brgya da/_'di man chad gtan tshigs dang bcas te bstan to/_/gong du bsgral ba'i bsam rgyud ni 'og nas zhib tu bstan no/_/'di yang bsnor te lung dkyus nas bstan no/_/bdud dang dbang phyug gshin rje de/_/thugs rje tshad med bzhes bsgral nas/_/
[\[210b.4\]]ro yi nyal thabs gan rkyal te/_/'dzam bu'i gling lo'i gling khams su/_/bor nas sa gzhir gyur pa ni/_/dur khrod chen po brgyad du gyur/_/mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan/_/rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan/_/lag pa gnyis ni g.yas g.yon brkyang /_/mgo 
[\[210b.5\]]dang lus snying yan lag kun/_/gnas kyi dur khrod chen po brgya da/_/de ni dpal chen bzhugs gnas yin/_/thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/_/ro yi srung ma chen mo ni/_/ma mo chen mo brgyad bzhag go/_/de yi gnas rten chen por yang /_/mchod rten chen po gzi 
[\[210b.6\]]byin can/_/rang 'byung re re bzhag pa yin/_/de ltar sa gzhi 'di kun yang /_/bkra shis ya mtshan thugs rje can/_/chos dang dngos grub 'byung ba'i gnas/_/cho 'phrul 'byung bar bka' stsal to/_/de yi lus snying ma ga ta/_/dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal/_/ma mo 
[\[210b.7\]]chen mo ke'u ri gnas/_/mkhas shing snying stobs che ba'i sa'o/_/mchod rten ming ni bde byed rten/_/de yi mgo bo lho phyogs kyi/_/dur khrod chen po bzhag pa ni/_/sing ga yul gyi gling phran yin/_/ma mo chen mo tso'u ri gnas/_/mthong thos rnam pa'i 'phrul bag can/_/
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]mchod rten ri bo ta la la/_/lag pa g.yas pa shar lho'i mtshams/_/dur khrod chen po bal yul yin/_/ma mo chen mo puska si/_/lhag par zas kyi longs spyod che/_/mchod rten kha sho bya g+h+r-i kha'o/_/lag pa g.yon ni lho nub mtshams/_/dur khrod chen po sa 
[\[211a.2\]]la'i yul/_/ma mo chen mo be ta li/_/phyag na rdo rje dbang gi gnas/_/de na mthu dang dbang yang che/_/gyad yul chen po'i sa las ni/_/mchod rten ma la sa gan da/_/rkang pa g.yas pa byang shar mtshams/_/dur khrod chen po li yi yul/_/ma mo chan mo tsan+Da li/_/lha 
[\[211a.3\]]mo shang ki ni zhes grags/_/chu dang me grub rdzu 'phrul can/_/mchod rten ming ni ge'u to shan/_/rkang pa g.yon pa nub byang mtshams/_/dur khrod chen po kha che'i yul/_/ma mo chen mo pra mo ha/_/bde skyid ldan pa phun sum tshogs/_/mchod rten ming ni ska ni ska/_/
[\[211a.4\]]pho mtshan steng gi byang phyogs na/_/dur khrod chen po u rgyan yul/_/ma mo chen mo kas sma ri/_/'byor pa'i longs spyod lnga dang ldan/_/dngos grub can yang de na mang /_/gzi yi mchod rten chen po ste/_/ming yang d+ha rma tsakra'o/_/de yi nang grol thams cad kun/_/
[\[211a.5\]]dur khrod chen po za hor yul/_/rgya mtsho'i sgo gling ma ha do/_/lang ka pu rangs srin po'i gnas/_/ma mo chen mo sma sha ni/_/mngon shes rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab/_/srin po srin mo sha za rnams/_/de dag kun la dbang sgyur zhing /_/rin chen nor dang dpag 
[\[211a.6\]]bsam shing /_/'byor ba'i yo byad kun dang ldan/_/mchod rten bde byed gzhon nu'o/_/'jig rten kun du bstan pa yi/_/dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad do/_/de ltar sta na'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon 'byung ba'i/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/_/
[\[211a.7\]]de ltar gyur pa'i 'dzam gling du/_/skye shi gnas pa'i yul yin pas/_/phyi rabs sngags kyi sgrub pa pos/_/'jigs byed chen po khrag 'thung gi/_/dus gsum rgyal ba'i bka' bzhin du/_/bskyed nas byin gyis brlabs pa ni/_/sngags mchog bdud rtsir bsgrub pa'i 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]phyir/_/rgyu dang dam rdzas thams cad ni/_/sangs rgyas sgrub pa'i rgyu dang bzhi/_/dam tshig dam par bsrung ba'i rdzas/_/byin gyis brlab par bya ba'o/_/de nas 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor bskyed de/_nges don gcig tu lam rgyud lnga ni 'bras bu chen po lnga yin te/_de dag thams 
[\[211b.2\]]cad 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyis dus gcig tu bsgral ba'i phyir/_bdud yak+sha ma ha ru tra zhes bya ba zhig_/dus der bsgral zhing gnas spar ro/_/de la bdag nyid sku ni smug nag 'bar/_/phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams/_/pradz+nyA ke sha tsi ta dz+wa la hU~M phaT/_ma 
[\[211b.3\]]nu da ra~M to sha phyung /_u ma da ram badzra ma hA maM sa/_tra ma kha'i zhes bsgral te/_e h+ye hi ma hA ru tra/_sha tu ma ka ra/_badzra ni hU~M phaT/_ma hA de baM ru tra hU~M dza dzA zhes brjod de/_sta na dang g+ha na chen por byas/_rnam par shes pa byang chub sems su dbang bskur ro/_/de 
[\[211b.4\]]na sta na'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/_/dur khrod bdag po btul nas ni/_/'khor bcas ma lus dbang du bsdus/_/'jig rten gtso bo lha brgyad dang /_/srin mo brgyad dang bu mo brgya da/_/dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis/_/'di skad ces ni khas blangs te/_/mgrin 
[\[211b.5\]]gcig tu ni rab smras pa/_/ho rdo rje 'bar ba'i me dpung gis/_/bskal pa bas kyang sreg mdzad pa/_/'jigs tshul rngam pa'i khyad par can/_/dbu mang rtsub pa'i tshig sgrogs shing /_/phyag mang 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha bsnams/_/zhi ba'i phyag stong spyan stong 
[\[211b.6\]]yang /_/'jig rten khams kun spa gong na/_/khro gnyer phyag stong spyan stong gis/_/dpa' bo sgeg dang 'jigs su rung /_/rgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed/_/snying rje rngam dang zhi bar ston/_/'bar ba'i tshogs chen sna tshogs can/_/khams gsum lha chen 
[\[211b.7\]]thams cad dang /_/'jig rten thal bar rlog mdzad pa/_/e ma ho che mchog he ru ka/_/khro rgyal khyod la skyabs su mchi'o/_/thugs rje nan tan bdag cag zung /_/gal te bka' bzhin ma bgyis na/_/bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying /_/dum bu brgyar ni 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]gtubs 'gyur bgyid/_/de phyir 'bar bas bdag ma gtang /_/zhes mthun par smras so/_/khams gsum thams cad bsgral ba'i zhing /_/rgyu drug gnas pa'i sems can rnams/_/bsdu ba'i sbyor bas kun bsdus nas/_/mi ldog dbyings su yang dag nyid/_/
[\[212a.2\]]thig le chen pos dbang bskur te/_/zla gsang dbus na byang chub sems/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas la som nyi med/_/sha chen bshang gci khu ba khrag_/bde gshegs lnga yi sa bon te/_/rnam par dri chen snang bar mdzad/_/phyi rol chen po lnga dag la/_/nang gi rgyu 'bras 
[\[212a.3\]]ye nas dag_/mi bskyod byang chub sems nyid de/_/dmigs su med pas dag pa yin/_/maM sa rin chen 'byung ldan po/_/mnyam dang mi mnyam dbyer med do/_/snag pa rak+ta mtha' yas thugs/_/skye 'gag med de ye nas dag_/don yod dri chu las grub pa/_/dri 
[\[212a.4\]]med rgyu nas rnam par dag_/kun kyang gtsang zhing dri med pas/_/thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas lnga/_/lus pa med pas ye shes dang /_/ma bcos ye nas de nyid do/_/de phyir sman chen bcud kyi mchog_/bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya'o/_/rtogs pa'i klong du su 'dris 
[\[212a.5\]]pa/_/mi zhes bya ba sangs rgyas yin/_/bcom ldan 'das ni gud na med/_/'byung ba lnga las gyur pa'i rgyu/_/sprul pas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas yin/_/rang gi lus la bsdu ba'i phyir/_/sku gsum rdo rje dbang thob 'gyur/_/de phyir bsgrub pa'i rdzas su gsungs/_/
[\[212a.6\]]de skad ces sman spyod pa'i lung du bka' stsal to/_/bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung 'bum sder bzhugs pa'i nang nas/_lung a nu yo ga'i spyod pa bla na med pa bstan pa ste/_bam po chen po bzhi pa//_//
[\[212a.7\]{D841-5}]rgya gar skad du/_ku la pany+tsa bud+d+ha na maH/_bod skad du/_rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ma hA yo ga'i don du bsgrub pa'i thabs 'di bstan to/_/ri ni nyams dga' mdangs bzang ba'i/_/yid 'ong gnas su 'dug nas ni/_/
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]byin brlabs mtshams bcad brtan byas nas/_/dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi pa/_/dri sna lnga yis maN+Dal bya'o/_/thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad/_/maN+Dal brgyad pa'i gzhung bzhin bri/_/de yi rtse mo brgyad la yang /_/yid bzhin nor bu 'bar 
[\[212b.2\]]ba bri/_/de yi dbus su bsam pa yang /_/srid gsum b+han+d+ha bzang kong yug_/ye nas ma bcos rang 'byung snod/_/dpal dang ldan pa'i snod bzhag la/_/de yi nang du blugs pa'i sman/_/ye nas rang 'byung bdud rtsi lnga/_/sha chen bshang gci khu ba 
[\[212b.3\]]khrag_/dag pa'i rgyu ste bdud rtsi'i dngos/_/stong las sbyar bas ye nas dag_/btag dang btsag dang gzhal ba yi/_/nyi zla gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor du/_/'bru lnga ye shes 'phro 'du las/_/stong khams khyab par don byas te/_/bcud kyi dam pa kun bsdus nas/_/
[\[212b.4\]]dus gsum sangs rgyas mchod pa'i phyir/_/bka' bzhin bstan pa'i dngos grub blang /_/mu tig dkar po dri med ltar/_/sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya'o/_/'gu ya lag pa'i phyag rgya yis/_/gzhung bzhin brtan nas 'phro 'du bya/_/de dbus klu bdag sa bon 
[\[212b.5\]]gyis/_/dngos grub dam pa blang bar bya/_/dgu pa'i sngags kyis btab nas ni/_/le lo med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/_/bar chad med pa'i 'phro 'du bya'o/_/oM gyis ye shes 'od phyung zhing /_/AHyis mes bsregs thal bar 'gyur/_/hU~M gis bdud rtsi rnam 
[\[212b.6\]]par dag_/gsal la 'byung 'jug lhan ne bos/_/rtags dang mtshan ma bdun gyis 'byung /_/'od dang du ba dri dang sgra/_/lha mo'i gzugs kyang ston par 'gyur/_/mang du 'phel na bsgrub rdzas yin/_/de la ya mtshan bskyed mi bya/_/mtshan ma'i rtags dag ma byung 
[\[212b.7\]]na/_/bskang gso'i cho ga rgya bskyed cig_/_spogs thags bskyar la rtsal shugs dbyung /_/dam tshig chen po bskang ba'i phyir/_/bsgrub rdzas rnams kyang bstar nas gzhag_/de nas mchod cing dngos grub blang /_/slob ma la yang dbang bskur ro/_/bla ma lung ldan 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]des kyang ni/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod do/_/gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag chos kyi dbyings/_/dag dang ma dag mi rtog rtog las 'das/_/snga ma 'das dang da ltar phyis 'byung ba/_/dus gsum gcig la sku bstan phyi bshol med/_/dngos grub 
[\[213a.2\]]sna tshogs rlabs chen 'bar ba can/_/su 'dod sbyin gyis da lta 'di la long /_/skal bar sbrebs dang gti mug mun nag la/_/sprin mthongs nyi shar khud par dro ba bzhin/_/bdud rtsi rgyal po dbang chen 'di byin pas/_/rig 'dzin rgyal po gtso bo'i go 'phang thob/_/tshe dang 
[\[213a.3\]]skongs dang yid du 'ong /_/bgegs rnams zhi ba la sogs te/_/nad dang bral nas ci 'dod pa'i/_/yon tan rtsa brgyad 'di yis thob/_/zhes bka' bstsal nas/_de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pas bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[213a.4\]]kyis lung 'di las/_/dbang bskur gnang ba gang yin pa/_/'khor rnams kun gyis thob par shog_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/yang 'khor nye ba'i sras mchog dam pa 'jam dpal la sogs pas dbang mnos nas/_yang rigs lnga dang rigs rgya mtsho'i gtso bo 
[\[213a.5\]]la lung gi don zhus pa/_rtog pa dang mi rtog pa'i don ji ltar blta/_don gyi 'bras bu gang lags zhes gsol pa las/_kun du bzang po dang rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/_tshangs dang drang srong gtsang ma za/_/de dag grol bar ngas ma 
[\[213a.6\]]bshad/_/klu dang bram ze gtsang ma za/_/de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad/_/byol song rtswa mchog za ba yang /_/ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du za/_/de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad/_/yang dag don gyi lung 'di nyon/_/rnal 'byor thabs dang ldan pas ni/_/chos sku gcig 
[\[213a.7\]]las tha dad pa'i/_/rigs lnga'i kha dog 'di bshad do/_/'di ltar rtogs na grol zhes bshad/_/rang bzhin ye nas dag pa'i rdzas/_/mnyam pa'i dbyings su rab rtogs na/_/gnyis med don gyis zin pa yin/_/ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/_/dngos dang dngos 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]med rtog pa'i mtshan/_/gtsang dang mi gtsang rtog pa'i mtshan/_/mkhas pas dbus la gnas mi 'gyur/_/ye shes sku lnga bstan pa'i phyir/_/byang chub sems ni dkar bas na/_/dri med dkar bas ye shes sku'o/_/rak+ta chags med dmar bas na/_/chags med 
[\[213b.2\]]rnam dag chos kyi sku'o/_/maM sa yid bzhin rin chen sngo/_/sna tshogs 'byung gnas mnyam nyid sku'o/_/rin chen gser mdog snang mdzad de/_/mngon 'byung sprul pa chos kyi sku'o/_/dri chu dag byed ljang gu'i mdog_/kun du don grub las rab sku'o/_/sku lnga lhun 
[\[213b.3\]]grub bdud rtsi 'di/_/so so'i lus la gnas pa yin/_/dri chen dri chu rak+ta dang /_/maM sa sems chu 'di rnams kun/_/sems can rtog pa bzlog pa'i phyir/_/gtso ru dang du blang bar bya'o/_/gtsang sme med par kun gyis spyod/_/'di dag grol bar ngas 
[\[213b.4\]]bshad do/_/the tshom med pas dngos grub thob/_/spyod pa'i skyes bu rnal 'byor pas/_/tshe 'di nyid la grub par 'gyur/_/ces bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pas bka' stsal to/_/'di yan chad ma hA yo ga'i don gyi lung dang sgrub thabs 
[\[213b.5\]]bdud rtsi chen po 'bum snge las btus pa'i/_bam po chen po lnga pa//_//[{D841-6}]rgya gar skad du/_a mr-i ta kuN+Da li na maH/_bod skad du/_bdud rtsi 'khyil pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdud rtsi rgyal la phyag 'tshal nas/_/bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i thabs bstan te/_de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis bdud rtsi 
[\[213b.6\]]bsgrub pa'i dgongs pa la zhugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i dgongs pa la zhugs te/_de nas bdud rtsi rgyal po yis/_bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i thabs 'di bstan te bka' stsal to/_/dang por phun sum tshogs pa'i yul/_/dga' zhing 
[\[213b.7\]]bar chad med pa'i gnas/_/btsal nas nyid kyi dbang du bya'o/_/de nas rang lus bsrung ba'i phyir/_/lag cha phun sum tshogs pa yis/_/bar chad byed pa'i dgra bgegs bzlog_/de nas bsgrub pa'i yo byad rnams/_/'tsho ba zas kyi yo byad dang /_/
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]bsgrub pa dam rdzas yo byad dang /_/rkyen zlog sman gyi yo byad dang /_/de ltar phun sum tshogs ldan nas/_/ji bzhin bde bar 'dug nas ni/_/sa gzhi rab tu sbyang byas te/_/tshes grangs yar gyi brgyad la brtsam/_/snga dro'i dus nas dkyil 'khor 
[\[214a.2\]]bya/_/maN+Dal 'dom gang ba lnga bri/_/bsgrub pa chen po bya ba'i phyir/_/dri chen dri chu'i skyong nul bya'o/_/dur khrod thod pa lnga nang du/_/tshil chen me mar re re yang /_/me mar sdong bu lnga brgya bya'o/_/me mar lnga brgya gtams nas ni/_/de nas bsgrub pa brtsam 
[\[214a.3\]]bya zhing /_/rdzogs pa'i las ni rnam bzhi bya/_/zhi ba'i tshe na byang du blta'o/_/gA na'i tshe na nub tu blta'o/_/sta na chen po lho ru blta'o/_/rgyas pa'i che na shar du blta'o/_/yang na phrin las rnam pa bzhi/_/so so'i phyogs phyogs dag nas blta'o/_/de ltar 
[\[214a.4\]]'dug stangs bstan nas ni/_/shar gyi dkyil 'khor steng du ni/_/bsgrub rdzas thams cad gzhag par bya'o/_/lho yi dkyil 'khor steng du ni/_/me mar lnga brgya smos pa bzhag_/nub kyi dkyil 'khor steng du ni/_/sgrub pa yab yum gnas par 
[\[214a.5\]]bya/_/byang gi dkyil 'khor steng du ni/_/rgyu mchog chen po gzhag par bya/_/dbus kyi dkyil 'khor steng du ni/_/bram ze bkra shis gtsang ma'i rigs/_/bkra shis thod pa gzhag par bya'o/_/yang na b+han+d+ha dpal ldan rdzogs/_/zlum zhing 'khyil pa pad+ma 
[\[214a.6\]]'dra/_/dbus na bu ga gcig yod pa/_/de yi nang du hrI zhes bri'o/_/de'i nang du blugs pa ni/_/snying po tshim byed bcud kyi mchog_/gtso bo lnga dang 'bras bu lnga/_/dri zhim bcud ldan thams cad kun/_/'di dag rab tu bskyab pa'i phyir/_/mang po 
[\[214a.7\]]'dus pa mthu byin tshe/_/yang na rtsa ba brgyad dang sbyar/_/go tsi hwa dang leng leng hwa/_/gi'u wang tsi'u tang ra sa yan/_/ga pur mu tig lan tshwa rnams/_/'di rnams rtsa ba brgyad dang sbyar/_/yang na gtso bo lngar sbyar ba/_/a 'bras rgun 'brum pa na 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]se/_/ger rgya a ru ra dang lnga/_/'di ni nang gi 'bras bu lnga'o/_/sha lnga dag dang sbyar ba yang /_/dbang bo lnga yi gzugs dang sbyar/_/de yi phrad du dgos pa yang /_/mig dang rna ba sna dang lce/_/gtso bo tsit+ta nyid dang lnga'o/_/shing tog rgun 'brum ka ko la/_/a 'bras pa na 
[\[214b.2\]]bum sha lnga'o/_/dri ni chen po sna lnga dang /_/cha yi grangs dang mnyam ste sbyar/_/nA ga ge sar shing tsha dang /_/sug smel gan+d+ha pa tra dang /_/kun du ru dang dri sna lnga'o/_/yang na dri yi rgyal po lnga/_/rgya spos dzA ti pha la dang /_/ga pur tsan+dan li shi lnga'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[214b.3\]]spos lnga'i dam pa yang /_/a ka ru dang du ru ska/_/pog dang sbrang rtsi lce pog dang /_/gser dngul zangs lcags g.yu dang lnga/_/bdar ram zhib tu btags te blugs/_/'di dag rab tu mnyam zhing bsog_/'di dag sbyar zhing btag pa'i sngags/_/oM a 
[\[214b.4\]]mr-i ta mu sa la/_/gra he ha na ha na hU~M phaT/_'di rnams sbyar ba'i bdud rtsi mchog_/dngos grub 'bras bu nges thob bo/_/'bras bu rnam lnga bsgral ba'i phyir/_/byang gi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/me lce gla gli snying la sogs/_/gsang ba'i brda tshig dag gis ni/_/de dag rab tu 
[\[214b.5\]]sba zhing bsgrub/_/phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru gzhag_/rgyu mchog chen po khrus byas nas/_/mngon spyod mngon spyod ya mtshan gyi/_/'jig byed 'jigs byed chen po yi/_/e yi dkyil 'khor sum brtsegs kyi/_/steng du bzhag nas dbang bskur ro/_/de nas 
[\[214b.6\]]dpal chen he ru ka/_/dur khrod bdag po chen po ni/_/che mchog shin tu mi bzad pa/_/dbu mang phyag cha rtsub pa bsnams/_/smug nag sku ni 'bar ba can/_/zhal ni nyi shu rtsa gcig ste/_/phyag kyang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so/_/oM badzra ma hA shrI he ru ka/_/raM dz+wa la 
[\[214b.7\]]hU~M/_gsang ba'i yum yang yab dang mthun/_/ma hA kro ng+hI shwa ri/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta mu drA a b+hi shiny+tsa hU~M/_zhes yum dbang bskur nas/_gzhan yang rigs dang mthun pa ru/_/phyogs bzhi dag tu dgod par bya'o/_/de yang tshul bzhin byin gyis 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]brlab/_/e h+ye hi ma hA ru tra hU~M phaT/_sarbe da a a zhes brjod pas_tsit+ta drang ngo /_/yang nas yang du spar byas te/_/dug gsum rtsa ba der gcad do/_/rgyu 'bras mthun zhing sbyar ba yang /_/yangs shing rgyud la goms pa dang /_/chos sku 
[\[215a.2\]]zhi ba'i ting 'dzin yod/_/yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa la/_/nges pa'i don dbang thos par bya'o/_/'byung ba bzhi las skyed pa'i yum/_/tshul bzhi dag dang ldan pa'am/_/yang na mtshan bzang sum cu ni/_/lus la rdzogs par yod pa la/_/zla gsang 
[\[215a.3\]]dkar dmar rlung dkar lci/_/de bzhin sring mo rnal 'byor ma/_/btsal nas bsgrub pa chen po bya'o/_/'o ma spos chus mgo lus bkru/_/dkyil 'khor nang du gzhag par bya/_/'dzag pa'i dus su sbyar ba yi/_/khrag chen po ni sems dang bcas/_/ra sa 
[\[215a.4\]]ya na'i gtso bor bya'o/_/bdud rtsi dam pa'i snod bstan pa/_/kun byed thams cad za ba yi/_/slob ma dpa' brtul gtsang sbra can/_/skyon drug rnam par spangs pa yi/_/mi phyed pa ni dgu dang ldan/_/dam tshig thams cad ma nyams shing /_/srog lus bu 
[\[215a.5\]]dang chung ma dang /_/rin chen sna tshogs 'bul byed pa/_/sring mo shin tu brgyan pa yang /_/slob dpon bla ma de la dbul/_/de ltar 'bul ba'i slob ma'i mchog_/yud yang pany+tsa yan chad kyis/_/rab tu 'bru ni gdams pas bya'o/_/thugs kyi dngos grub dam pa 
[\[215a.6\]]'di/_/rang byung nga yis bstan pa'i phyir/_/re ba med pas blang bar bya/_/ma dag pa ni mtshams gcad do/_/las kyi gtsor ni bskang ba dang /_/sbyang dang mtshams dang gsal bar bya'o/_/nyi zla pad+ma yang dag gnas/_/bdag nyid dpa' bo 'bru lnga yis/_/
[\[215a.7\]]gnas lnga dag tu bsam par bya'o/_/dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma gsum/_/ma thob bar du mi gtang zhing /_/gtang na bar chad chen po 'gyur/_/gsang sngags bdud rtsi yon tan 'di/_/sad pa'i phyir yang bsgrub dgos na/_/mkhas pas bden 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]pa'i don shes nas/_/don la the tshom ci ste za/_/zhes the tshom bcad la/_dngos grub blang ba'i sngags 'di'o/_/a hoHsu kha d+harma gA ya ni/_a mr-i ta sid+hi hrIH/_zhes dngos grub blang ngo /_/gnas lnga dag tu bsam pa yang /_/spyi gtsug dbus su zla ba ste/_/der 
[\[215b.2\]]ni oM dkar 'od ldan pa/_/'od zer lnga ni 'phros pa las/_/slar 'dus snang mdzad gtso bo ste/_/rtag pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa'o/_/lce la hri dmar 'od 'phros pas/_/slar 'dus mtha' yas chos kyi gsung /_/mnyam pa'i phyag rgyar gnas pa'o/_/snying gar 
[\[215b.3\]]yi ge hU~M mthing ga/_/'od zer lnga ni 'phro ba'o/_/slar 'dus mi 'khrugs sems dpa' ste/_/phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams/_/yang na bdud 'dul sa gnon no/_/lte bar yi ge swA ser po/_/'od zer lnga ni 'phro ba las/_/slar 'dus rin chen dam pa'i gtso/_/phyag 
[\[215b.4\]]rgya yid bzhin sbyin pa'o/_/gsang bar yi ge ha ljang gu/_/'od zer sna lnga 'phro ba las/_/slar 'dus don yod grub pa ste/_/zhi ba'i phyag rgyar mnyam rdzogs pa'o/_/rigs lnga gtogs pa 'di kun yang /_/rang 'byung gi ni dkyil 'khor yin/_/de 
[\[215b.5\]]ltar 'od zer lnga lnga yis/_/nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'phro 'du las/_/khams gsum 'gro ba'i don byas nas/_/slar 'dus sman lnga nyid la bsdu/_/sman nyid phyag rgyar gsal 'bar nas/_/'od zer sna lnga slar 'dus nas/_/phyag mtshan so sor gsal 
[\[215b.6\]]'gyur te/_/gser gyi 'khor lo zur brgyad las/_/dri chen bdud rtsi zhu ba'o/_/hU~M las rdo rje rtse lnga pa/_/'bar nas byang chub sems su zhu/_/swA las rin chen 'od 'bar te/_/ma hA maM sa bdud rtsir zhu'o/_/hriHlas 'od zer sna tshogs pa'o/_/pad+ma 
[\[215b.7\]]rak+ta thig ler zhu'o/_/ha ljang 'od 'phro sna tshogs pas/_/dag pa'i dri chu bdud rtsir zhu'o/_/de ltar 'phro 'du bya ba yang /_/goms pas yang nas yang du bya'o/_/de nas bdud rtsi rnam lnga la/_/bsam pa'i yi ge dam pa lnga/_/oM hU~M swA hrI A/_rtsa ba'i 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]yi ge lnga po yang /_/'od zer 'phro ba snga ma bzhin/_/de nas 'dzab bsgom bzlas pa'i sngags/_/dgu pa 'di ni 'dzab du drang /_/oM badzra tsit+ta sa ma ya hU~M tha/_de la bdud rtsi'i phyag rgya ni/_/lag pa g.yon pa'i dpung ba brkyang /_/mthe bong srin lag mthil du 
[\[216a.2\]]dgug_/rdo rje mtshon gang bcas pa dang /_/mdzub mo gung mo mthe'u chung brkyang /_/sbyar te lag pa'i mthil gyis ni/_/bdud rtsi snod kyi steng du gnon/_/de nas bdud rtsi byin gyis brlab/_/ting 'dzin me dang 'dra ba las/_/bzlas brjod rlung dang 'dra ba yis/_/glal dang lud pas 
[\[216a.3\]]bar mi gcad/_/de nas bdud rtsi byin gyis brlab/_/badzra a mr-i ta o~M AHhU~M hri thA/_/'di ni rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga'o/_/dzaHhU~M pa~M hoH/_ma hA a mr-i ta A be sha hoH/_zhes bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi rgyal pos bka' stsal to/_/bdud rtsi dam pa mchog gi lung 
[\[216a.4\]]las 'bras bu chen po lnga bsgral ba'i lung nges pa dang /_de bsgral nas de sman du sbyar ba'i thabs bstan pa'i bdud rtsi chen po sa ma ya 'bum sde las/_bam po chen po drug pa//_//[{D841-7}]rgya gar skad du/_a mr-i ta ka la shi sid+d+hi/_
[\[216a.5\]]bod skad du/_bdud rtsi bum pa'i lung /_dpal bdud rtsi bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phan byed mgon la phyag 'tshal nas/_/bsgrub pa'i yul dang gnas bstan te/_/shar lho nub byang phyogs bzhi'i ri/_/drang srong chen po'i bsgrub lugs dang /_/phra men 
[\[216a.6\]]ma yi sbyar lugs dang /_/rtsi sman 'khrungs pa'i yul khams dang /_/shing dang nags kyi lha mo'i gnas/_/ri bor sman ljongs tsan+dan gnas/_/bzhugs pa'i gnas su bsgrub par bya'o/_/dug rnams bdud rtsir sbyar ba'i thabs/_/rtsa ba dang ni yan lag 
[\[216a.7\]]bcas/_/ra sa ya na la sogs rdzas/_/tshang bar bsogs nas bsgrub par bya'o/_/ri bor nags 'dab chu ngogs sam/_/brag phug stong pa thibs po'am/_/bsgrub pa'i gnas mchog der bya'i phyir/_/sa gzhi rab tu brtag par bya/_/mnyam zhing snum 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]pa'i sa snag can/_/zug rdo srin brag med pa dang /_/tshwa sgo sa dang ba tsha med/_/ma grugs ma gas mnyam po la/_/bsgrub pa'i gnas mchog der bya'o/_/rang 'byung khro bo chen po bcus/_/phyogs mtshams phur pas btab nas ni/_/gnas dang sa gzhi dag par sbyang /_/
[\[216b.2\]]oM badzra kI la ya ma hA kro d+ha hu~M hu~M phaT phaT/_gardza gardza hu~M phaT/_ha na ha na hu~M phaT/_da ha da ha hu~M phaT/_pa tsa pa tsa hu~M phaT/_b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha hu~M phaT/_hu lu hu lu hu~M phaT/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hu~M phaT/_tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hu~M phaT/_b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha hu~M phaT/_s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya ha phaT/_phyogs 
[\[216b.3\]]bcu dag tu mtshams gcad do/_/sa gzhi rab tu sbyangs nas ni/_/dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi bya/_/dri sna lnga dang rak+ta yis/_/byugs pa'i maN+Dal bzang du bya'o/_/ba su ta yi rgyu phreng gis/_/thig ni bcu drug char yang gdab/_/de la thig 
[\[216b.4\]]le bcu drug gam/_/yang na phyag mtshan bcu drug dgod/_/de'i dbus su bzhag pa'i snod ni/_thod pa ma gas ma chag pa/_/yang na rus sbal mgo yang rung /_/dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su gzhag_/_bdud rtsi sna grangs brgya rtsa brgya da/_/btags te 
[\[216b.5\]]thod pa'i nang du dgang /_/'khor lo lte ba'i dbus su gzhag_/phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad rnams su yang /_/snod ni bzhi 'am brgyad bzhag la/_/rigs dang kha dog mthun pa'i dar/_/b+han+d+ha lnga yi kha nas dgab/_/yang na bum pa'i mgul chings bya'o/_/
[\[216b.6\]]ra sa ya na la sogs rdzas/_/ji snyed 'byor pas ma lus kun/_/dkyil 'khor de la bskor te gzhag_/de bzhin dar dkar mthing yol gyis/_/dkyil 'khor 'khor bar rab bskor nas/_/dkyil 'khor grwa bzhir mda' bzhi gzugs/_/me long bzhi 
[\[216b.7\]]dang rat+na bzhi/_/ral gri bzhi dang phur pa brgyad/_/dkyil 'khor 'khor bar bskor te gzhag_/ting 'dzin rnam gsum rim bzhin bsgom/_/rgyu yi ting 'dzin 'bras bu las/_/de nyid byang chub sems su 'gyur/_/'byung lnga yum gyi dkyil 'khor dag_/
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]byang chub sems las rim bzhin skyed/_/raM yi khaM su bru~M/_nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa yi/_/gzhal yas gsal bar gyur par bsgom/_/dbus su byang chub sems chen po/_/shar du rdo rje dri chen che/_/lho ru maM sa sha sna tshogs/_/nub tu pad+ma 
[\[217a.2\]]rak+ta'i tshogs/_/byang du dri chu sna tshogs te/_/'di rnams rim bzhin bkod pa la/_/gtso bos sbyor ba tshul bzhin bgyis nas/_me long yu ba can gyi steng du/_byang chub kyi sems blangs te/_dbus kyi snod blangs la/_kha shar phyogs su bltas te/_byang 
[\[217a.3\]]chub sems kyis g.yab cing dbyangs 'di brjod do/_/byang chub sems 'di'i ye shes rang bzhin te/_/dri med rnam dag char bzhin bab pa las/_/'gro ba kun skyed yid bzhin nor bu'i tshul/_/gdod nas dag pas bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin la/_/gnyis med sbyor 
[\[217a.4\]]bas rdo rje'i rigs chen 'grub/_/me long ye shes de nyid yin par bshad ces brjod de/_dbus kyi b+han+d+ha'i nang du/_shel phor bzhag la/_byang chub sems thams cad dang /_gdung dang go ro tsa na la sogs pa kun bsdus la blugs so/_/'gu ya 
[\[217a.5\]]lag gi phyag rgya yis/_/de yi steng du bzhag nas ni/_/sgrub pa po kun kha shar phyogs su bltas te/_byang chub kyi sems kyis g.yab cing /_sngags 'di brgyad rtsa brgyad bzlas so/_/oM AHhU~M badzra sa twa hU~M/_sarba e shud+d+he/_a mr-i ta su kha ma hA yo ga hu~M/_
[\[217a.6\]]tsit+ta hu~M oM AHhu~M/_ak+Sho b+h+yaHd+he Sha ra ti sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod nas/_dbus su blugs la gzhag go/_/lho phyogs su kha bltas te/_ma hA maM sa'i snod blangs la 'di skad brjod do/_/sems can rnams ni gnas la chags/_/nor bas bdag nyid 
[\[217a.7\]]gtsang mar 'dzin/_/don gyis sun ni ma phyung na/_/bsod nams thams cad dang bral ba'i/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]skam thag chad pa yang /_/bdag lus gtong bar mi phod na/_/lha la sogs pa'i bsod nams kyis/_/lus can rnams la smos ci dgos/_/de bas 'di kun 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]sun dbyung zhing /_/rang 'byung bdud rtsi bstan pa'i phyir/_/lhas kyang lha yi bdag nyid bza'/_/mi la sogs pa de bzhin du/_/rnal 'byor pas kyang spyad cing bza'/_/'di ltar bdag gzhan mi 'byed pas/_/blang dor med par grol ba yis/_/mnyam pa nyid kyi don mthong na/_/
[\[217b.2\]]thams cad mnyam nyid ye shes sku/_/bder gshegs rin chen rigs mchog 'grub/_/oM AHhU~M ma hA maM sa/_sa ma ya ra ho ha~M/_rat+na ra ti sam ya s+t+waM zhes brjod de/_rin po che'i rigs yab yum spyan drang zhing brgya rtsa brgyad brjod de/_ma hA maM sa 
[\[217b.3\]]dang /_sha sna tshogs bstabs shing lhor gzhag go/_/kha nub phyogs su bltas te/_rak+ta sna tshogs kyi snod blangs la 'di skad brjod do/_/rA ga rak+ta pad+ma 'byung /_/smad pa mi gtsang rdzas 'di dag_/chags yul bde ba'i gnas yin te/_/pad+ma rigs 
[\[217b.4\]]kyi dam tshig 'grub/_/so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes yin zhes brjod cing /_nub phyogs kyi snod kyi nang du blugs la bzhag_/oM AHhU~M ma hA pad+ma rak+ta mu la/_a mr-i tA b+ha rA ga ra ti/_sa ma ya hu~M su ba hriHzhes brjod de nub phyogs su gzhag go/_/
[\[217b.5\]]kha byang phyogs su bltas te dri chu'i snod blangs nas 'di skad brjod do/_/kun 'byung zag pa gur gum chu/_/rdo rje dri yi chu yin te/_/chu las ma byung gang yang med/_/las kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang /_/nan tan ye shes mchog kyang 'grub/_/
[\[217b.6\]]oM AHhU~M a mo g+ha sid+d+hi/_badzra ra ti sa ma ya s+t+wa~M zhes brjod de byang phyogs su gzhag go/_/shar gyi snod dang dri chen blangs te 'di skad brjod do/_/smad pa mi gtsang snyigs ma 'di/_/rtog pa de nyid snyigs ma yin/_/tshe mchog 'dzin pa'i 
[\[217b.7\]]bdud rtsi ste/_/gdod nas dag pa'i rang bzhin pas/_/bde gshegs kun gyi thugs dam nyid/_/gnyis med sku ru sbyor bas na/_/chos dbyings ye shes dam tshig 'grub/_/oM bai ro tsa na mo ha ra ti sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/_ma hA yo ga a ti s+phA ra Na ba lin+te/_
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]a mr-i ta u tsi tha a d+hi tiSh+Tha oM zhes brjod do/_/de nas sgrub pa po kun gyis thal mo sbyar te/_dbus kyi snod yum gyis blangs te 'di skad brjod do/_/ye shes snying po can rnams kyi/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi chos nyid 'di/_/snying po chos kyi 
[\[218a.2\]]don las 'byung /_/byang chub spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin/_/smad par bya ba'i rdzas lnga po/_/gcig la yon tan lnga lnga'am/_/gcig la'ang yon tan gsum du dbye/_/dam tshig rtsa ba [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga yin/_/yan lag nyi shu rtsa brgyad do/_/snod bcud dbus 
[\[218a.3\]]su 'dus nas ni/_/bcu drug por yang bstan par bya'o/_/thabs dang shes rab ldan pa las/_/sems dpa' sems ma'i tshogs su blta'o/_/rtsa ba brgyad dang yan lag brgyad/_/rdzas ni sems dpa' bcu drug ste/_/snod dbyings sems ma 
[\[218a.4\]]bcu drug yin/_/'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu drug kyang /_/rang bzhin mi gnyis dbyings gcig pas/_/phyag rgya thig le ldan par bsgom/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan pa/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan/_/rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[218a.5\]]rdzogs/_/rgyu yang gsang la 'bras bu'ang gsang /_/rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la/_/mdzod ldan dpal gyi phyag rgya dang /_/kha 'byed rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni/_/'khor lo rtsibs kyi dbus su gzhag_/bdud rtsi lnga dang rtsa ba brgyad/_/mig dang rna ba sna 
[\[218a.6\]]dang lce/_/mtshan dang rnam shes yul dang bcas/_/'dus la ma byas rdo rje ste/_/dgongs pa 'dus pas rdo rjer bshad/_/rdo rje sems dpar rab sbyar nas/_/rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur/_/oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta badzra satwa hU~M zhes 
[\[218a.7\]]brjod de/_bdud rtsi rnam lnga byin gyis brlab cing bskul lo/_/de nas yang rtsa ba brgyad dang yan lag stong du 'dus shing sbyar ba dang bskul ba'i tshig 'di brjod do/_/de nas yang snod stong par rgun chang dang /_sbrang chang dang /_rgya chang dang /_bu ram chang 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]dang /_'bras chang dang /_chang sna tshogs sbreng zhing 'di skad brjod do/_/'bru rnams la yang chang med de/_/chu la chang gi rang bzhin med/_/mkhas pas 'bru dang chur sbyar na/_/mnyam pa nyid kyi chang du 'gyur/_/chang byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags/_oM a mr-i ta dza gad 
[\[218b.2\]]pra ba swA hA/_oM dzi ba swA hA/_sman chang du blugs la/_dkrugs pa'i sngags/_mu sa la mu sa la/_ro mchog go 'phang thob par 'gyur/_/mi gtsang ba la'ang gtsang ba med/_/man ngag can gyi grub pa bos/_/mkhas pas gnyis med sbyar bas na/_/mnyam pa 
[\[218b.3\]]nyid kyi don thob 'gyur/_/kro ng+hI shwa ri sho d+ha ya sa~M sho d+ha ya/_yang 'o ma sna tshogs sbreng zhing 'di skad brjod do/_/rta dang mi la sogs pa yi/_/ji ltar 'o mar gyur pa la/_/mkhas ldan chen pos rab sbyar na/_/yon tan zho dang mar ltar snang /_/de bzhin rdzas 
[\[218b.4\]]rnams bsgyur bas na/_/mnyam nyid yon tan mar ltar 'grub/_/zhes brjod de/_byang chub sems kyi snod du sbreng ngo /_/de nas rin po che sna tshogs bdar zhing 'di skad brjod do/_/dper na gser dang rin chen ltar/_/gcig tu bsres dang so sor gnas/_/
[\[218b.5\]]so sor gnas kyang rang rang gi/_/kha dog mtshan nyid so sor gsal/_/rin chen yon tan de 'dra yang /_/bsdus nas yon tan rmad du 'gyur/_/de bas gnyis spras mdzes par snang /_/de bzhin rdzas kyi yon tan yang /_/rang gi yon tan rin chen snang /_/gnyis 
[\[218b.6\]]med mnyam par sbyar bas na/_/bla med yon tan rmad du 'gyur/_/thams cad gcig tu bsdu ba'o/_/de nas bdud rtsi ra sa ya na sna tshogs bsdus te/_snod stong bar chu sna tshogs sbreng zhing 'di brjod do/_/chu rnams sna tshogs tha dad pa/_/rgya mtshor phyin na lan tshwa'i 
[\[218b.7\]]ro/_/de dag thams cad bsdus pa'i dpal/_/rgya mtsho tsam du rlabs che la/_/chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig go/_/'byung ba lnga yi thugs rje las/_/sman dang bdud rtsi rnam lnga po/_/'gro ba yongs kyi gsos mdzad pa/_/thugs rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]dngos po med las dngos grub blang /_/byang chub sems kyi sprin yin pas/_/ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur de skad ces brjod de/_sman lag tu blangs nas/_ngos ngos nas sman che ba'i yon tan brjod do/_/rang 'byung gdod nas dag pa yi/_/
[\[219a.2\]]rtsa brgyad stong las sbyar ba'i sman/_/ra sa ya na la sogs rdzas/_/rtsa ba 'bum phrag yangs pa'i bcud/_/gnyis med bde chen las 'byung ba'i/_/byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste/_/sha chen mchod pa rin po che/_/zas mchog tshe yi dri chen po/_/pad+ma me tog 
[\[219a.3\]]yang dag ldan/_/rdo rje chu ste bdud rtsi mchog_/ga pur shel gyi spos phor bri/_/rin chen me ltar 'bar ba'i tshogs/_/yon tan 'bum phrag yangs pa'i bcud/_/rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos/_/ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas/_/rgyud lnga 
[\[219a.4\]]sems can kun sgrol ba'i/_/dug lnga sel ba'i thabs mchog ste/_/thams cad rnal 'byor bdud rtsi che/_/ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le ste/_/sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor phyir/_/gcig tu dpa' bo ro rnams dang /_/gnyis su med par mnyam sbyar 
[\[219a.5\]]nas/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams la mchod/_/zhes brjod do/_/de nas shes rab yum rnams kyis/_sman lag tu bzhag la/_yang bkra shis pa/_don la dam pa 'di brjod do/_/ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos/_/
[\[219a.6\]]nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i gnas/_/rnam par mi rtog snang ba las/_/kun rdzob tsam du bstan pa mtshar/_/zhes brjod do/_/sman snod bcud chas par lag tu blangs la yum gyi gtso bo la bdud rtsi phul te/_gtso bos blangs te phyag rgya chen por bsgyur 
[\[219a.7\]]zhing bsgom mo/_/de nas bsgrub pa po'i gtso bos dpa' chas su zhugs te/_ba yang nyo ba ti dang /_ba yang shang gi ra dang /_na ra si ra dang /_thal chen gyi thig les brgyan te/_sro tsa a~M dza na dang /_dgug cing g.yab pa'i dam rdzas/_mchog gi ha sta dang /_brta 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]sha ril dang /_shun chen gyi 'breng ba/_'dre brdab pa'i lcag dang /_rkang gi gling bu bud cing ku sha'i glu blang /_mchog gi tshar ma dang /_shun chen gyi g.yang gzhi bting la/_gu gul gyi mgo ma yeng gis bkus la/_rak+ta'i thig le dgu byas te/_mtshon re re'i steng du ta krid brgyad 
[\[219b.2\]]gzhag go/_/byA g+h+ra tshar ma'i g.yang gzhi ta kis gyon la/_mdud la ba dan phyar nas thogs te/_dkyil 'khor yang 'khor lo rtsibs brgya da/_dbus su zla gam dmar po gcig bris nas/_de'i steng du sman spungs la/_sgrub pa po yab yum yang sbyor ba tshul bzhin du bgyi/_
[\[219b.3\]]lha mo bcu drug gi bsnyen pa brgya rtsa brgyad yan chad gdon no/_/de nas byin dbab cing /_dbab pa'i phyag rgya yang bya'o/_/g.yab mo'i brda la sogs te brda sna tshogs dang /_thabs kyi rdo rje badzra sha rI raM la sogs pa dang /_yang na mchog gi lag pa g.yon gyis/_sman dgug cing
