[\[219b.4\]]g.yab cing /_'khar gzhong gi nang du bsres te btsags la sman b+han+d+ha'i nang du blugs la/_rdo rjes dkrug cing glu dang gar dang rnga dang /_dam pa'i tshig gis bstod do/_/spos kyis bdug cing gar gyi bro thags dang /_rdo rje 'gros kyis dkyil 'khor du/_bdud rtsi dbus su 
[\[219b.5\]]bzhag la bskor ro/_/de nas ngos ngos nas kyang che ba'i yon tan brjod do/_/yang zhi ba'i lha'i dkyil 'khor yang /_/rigs so so'i yig 'bru kun sman la bstim zhing 'di brjod do/_/o~M a mr-i ta sarba ma hA yo ga hU~M/_o~M badzra sarba sa ma ya hU~M/_o~M ma hA 
[\[219b.6\]]sarba a mr-i ta ma hA su kha hrIH/_o~M sarba e shud+he/_kro ng+hI shwa ri/_sarba shod+ha ya/_o~M AHhU~M badzra a mr-i ta hu~M hrIHtha zhes rab tu yang bzlas so/_/de nas hom dang sbyin sreg dang /_me'i phud kyang nang du blugs so/_/de nas sems sbyang ba'i sman/_leng leng hwa dang /_
[\[219b.7\]]shel ga pur dang /_snying zho sha dang /_mkhal ma zho sha dang /_gla gor zho sha dang /_shu dag ku be ra dang /_shu dag pra me dang /_shu dag nab se dang /_ra sa ya na dang /_ra sa ya na ta na dza ya dang /_khrus mkhan ut+pa la'i thig les brgyan la/_gdod sman bsre zhing sbyar 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]nas/_dkrugs la b+han d+ha ra stsal te/_b+han d+ha gnyis kha sbyar la/_dar gyis bcings la/_mtshams su rgyas btab la/_gzod dkyil 'khor zla gam gyi dbus su gzhag go/_/sngags dgu pa 'dzab du drang ngo /_/'di mgo mjug tu tshogs kyi mchod 
[\[220a.2\]]pa bar mi bcad/_mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi 'phro 'du yang bya/_sman bsgrub pa'i don dang /_sbyar thabs bstan pa'i lung dang /_las kyi rim pa'i skul tshig dang /_yo byad du byas pa'i rnams bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung las bdud rtsi bum pa'i lung gi bam po 
[\[220a.3\]]bdud rtsi 'bum sde las 'byung ba'i don/_bam po chen po bdun pa//_//[{D841-8}]rgya gar skad du/_b+ha ga bAn many+dza shrI tIk+Sh+NA na maHsid+d+ha~M/_bod skad du/_bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal rnon po la phyag 'tshal 
[\[220a.4\]]lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal nyid sku rdo rje lta bu byang chub kyi dgongs pa nyid la bzhugs pa la/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje kun du bzang po ni/_dus gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i/_yum gyi tshal chen po na dgongs pa chos kyi dbyings 
[\[220a.5\]]zhi ba chen po la bzhugs so/_/rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyang /_gsang ba'i yum bzhi dang /_'khor byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang /_sems ma'i tshogs/_rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor na/_sras mchog dam pa nye ba'i 'khor/_rigs kyi rgyal po 
[\[220a.6\]]ma lus pa rnams dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /_drang srong chen po dang /_lha dang klu dang /_li ts+tsha bI la sogs pa'i mi rnams kun la dpal kun du bzang pos bka' stsal pa/_nan tan gyis ni brtson 'grus bskyed/_/the tshom med na nges par 'grub/_/bdud rtsi chen po rnam lnga 'di/_/
[\[220a.7\]]spyad cing bcangs pa'i yon tan dang /_/rang bzhin dang ni ngo bo dang /_/mthu dang byin gyis brlabs kyis 'grub/_/mi brjed rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin/_/nges par bsgrub pa'i yon tan ni/_/nges pa'i man ngag gsum du bstan zhes bka' stsal nas/_sdud pa po chos kyi don/_'jam dpal 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]rnon po la gtad do/_/de nas 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis/_rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha 'khor tshogs rgya mtsho dang bcas pa rnams la 'di skad brjod do/_/e ma hoHsangs rgyas kun du bzang /_/gsang chen thig le nyid la rdzogs/_/ma rig mun sel ye shes sgron/_/dpa' 
[\[220b.2\]]bo khyod la skyabs su mchi'o/_/rang 'byung dri med bdud rtsi 'di/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa'i mchog_/mi shes dri ma kun bcom nas/_/nges pa'i dbyings la 'god mdzad pa/_/gnyis med gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/_/snang mdzad rdo rje rgyal spyan dang /_/mi bskyod nyi ma snang 
[\[220b.3\]]mtha' yas/_/don yod bdud rtsi 'khyil pa la/_/dgyes shing gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/_/dbyings phyug yum gyi tshogs rnams la/_/dga' ba'i yid kyis 'dud phyag 'tshal/_/lag na rdo rje rgyal po dang /_/kun bzang blo gros chen po dang /_/don rab sa snying la sogs la/_/rab 
[\[220b.4\]]tu gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/_/nam mkha'i 'jig rten dbang po dang /_/'gro ba 'dzin mchog dam pa la/_/gnyis med gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/_/dag la rang bzhin dri med sku/_/tshul bzhin phreng ba dbyangs dang gar/_/spyod mchog dga' sdug phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdug pa me tog 
[\[220b.5\]]mar me ho/_/gzugs mchog mnyes mdzad lha mo la/_/mos pas 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo/_/rig byed tshogs kyi bdag po mchog_/rdo rje srin po 'dul mdzad pa/_/khro rgyal yab yum 'khor bcas la/_/gus pas bstod de phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho dang 
[\[220b.6\]]bcas pa rnams kyis legs so legs so/_/a la la hoHzhes brjod nas gnang ngo /_/de nas dbang byin te/_'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis/_thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin la/_mkhyen rab dang pos kun gyi mchod pa chen po mdzad do/_/de 
[\[220b.7\]]yang nyid kyis nyid la mchod de/_'di man chad ye shes kyi lha rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi sems bdud rtsi chen por thim nas/_mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings la mi snang bar byas nas/_ma hA su kha la sbas te bzhugs pa las/_de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]du bzang po dang /_rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis 'phags pa 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i mkhyen rab kyi dang po khyod la/_da nged kyi chos 'di bsdus te bshad do/_/'jam dpal rdo rje chos 'di lta ste/_e ma hoHgsang ba las 
[\[221a.2\]]byung ba'i/_/ma rig mun sel sgron ma'i mchog_/dpa' bo khyod la skyabs su mchi'o/_/nan tan gyis ni brtson 'grus byos/_/zhes pa dang /_'jam dpal bdud rtsi 'di'i chos kyi don ni/_dper na me dang 'dra ste/_chung ste rdul tsam nas che ste srid pa'i ri bo yang sreg go/_/de bzhin 
[\[221a.3\]]du bdud rtsi 'di ni dper na nyi ma dang 'dra ste/_nyi ma'i 'od zer chen po ni 'dzam bu gling du thog ma nyid du ri'i rgyal po chen po brgyad la snang bar byed do/_/de'i 'og tu kho ra khor yug tu snang bar byed do/_/de'i 'og tu ri bo che rnams la snang bar byed do/_/de'i 'og tu ri nag po 
[\[221a.4\]]rnams la snang bar byed do/_/de'i 'og tu gangs ri mthon po rnams la snang bar byed do/_/de'i 'og tu 'dzam bu gling 'dir sa phyogs dma' ba rnams la snang bar byed do/_/nyi ma'i 'od zer chen po de la/_blang dor med de mi rtog mi sems so/_/rnam par yang mi rtog mi 
[\[221a.5\]]sems so/_/rdo rje chos dang 'jam dpal nyi ma'i 'od rnams ni/_dbri bskol med do/_/de bzhin du sems can gyi rnam par shes pa la yang /_de dang 'dra ste dbri bskol med do/_/phye ba dang bskyed pa dang /_bskyungs pa yang med do/_/de bzhin du chos bdud rtsi 'di yang bsam 
[\[221a.6\]]gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings su bstan pa yin pa'i phyir/_bdud rtsi chen po 'di dbu las bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan zhes smos pa yin no/_/de bzhin du chos bdud rtsi chen po'i lung 'di yang ma skyes mi 'gag mi rtog pas/_mtshan dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_mi gnas pa 
[\[221a.7\]]la rnam par khyab ste gnas so/_/de bzhin du chos bdud rtsi chen po 'di yang nyi ma'i 'od zer dang 'dra bar kun la khyab par gnas te/_skal ldan rigs lngas 'byung ba lnga la khyab cing /_'byung ba lnga nyid rigs kyi yum lnga'i tshal chen po ste/_yum lnga dang yab lnga 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]yang gdod nas dag ste/_nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du shar ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams la bshad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams la khyab bo/_/de nas srid pa'i 'jig rten du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs 
[\[221b.2\]]pa'i lha rnams dang klu rnams la khyab bo/_/de nas mi'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang rim pas nam mkha'i nyi ma bzhin khyab cing shar ba ste/_thugs rje'i bdud rtsi 'di yang srid pa gsum du nyi ma bzhin du shar bar bya ste/_'jam dpal stong gsum gyi 
[\[221b.3\]]stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing phra rab snyed la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus phul bas ni/_bdud rtsi chen po 'di lus la bcangs pa bsod nams che'o/_/'jam dpal dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba bas 
[\[221b.4\]]ni/_bdud rtsi 'di lus kyi mgul du btags pa 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do/_/'jam dpal bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams la spyi bos bkur zhing phyag bya ba'i don ni/_bdud rtsi chen po 'di spyi bo la bkur ba'i yon tan ni/_sangs 
[\[221b.5\]]rgyas thams cad bkur ba yin no/_/'jam dpal bskal pa stong gi bar du sems can gyi don bya ba bas ni/_bdud rtsi chen po 'dis lan cig gis 'gro ba'i don byas pas/_dmyal khams brgyad kyi 'jig rten yang thar pa'i lam du 'dren pa yin no 
[\[221b.6\]]zhes gsungs pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_bdud rtsi chen po'i rang bzhin ni/_/kha dog dbyibs dang mtshan ma med/_/'gog pa med cing dbye ba'ang med/_/rtsa ba med cing rten pa'ang med/_/bdud rtsi che la brjod pa 'ang 
[\[221b.7\]]med/_/nyon mongs dug dang bdud bzhi bcom/_/dri med dag pa'i byang chub sems/_/nges don de la 'dud par byos/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dang dam pa'i chos bdud rtsi'i lung 'di la 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis slar la lan gsum du bstod pa/_nam mkha'i 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]mtshan nyid sangs rgyas te/_mtshan nyid med pas nam mkha' 'dra'o/_/bya ba med pas grol ba ste/_/bdud rtsi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chu zla bzhin du dri bral bas/_/thams cad rtog pa yongs su spangs/_/bdag tu 'dzin med rnam par dag_/bdud rtsi rgyal la phyag 
[\[222a.2\]]'tshal lo/_/dus gsum chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam/_/bdud dang ngan song gsum las thar/_/len pa med cing gtong ba'ang med/_/dri med dag pa'i byang chub sems/_/bdud rtsi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i rgyu/_/khams gsum sems 
[\[222a.3\]]can 'dren pa'i dpal/_/'gro ba drug gi sgrib sbyong ba/_/bdud rtsi rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de skad ces gsol nas/_phyi nang gi snod bcud ril sman ras ya na dang /_bdud rtsir gnas so zhes lung dang man ngag dag tu bsdus te bka' stsal pa'o//_//bdud rtsi chen po 
[\[222a.4\]]mchog gi lung /_lung gi rgyal po chen po rtog pa'i mchog las 'khor lo bskor ba'i nang nas lung gi bam po chen po brgyad pa'i 'grel ba chen po'i don/_bam po chen po brgyad pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//spyir bdud rtsi 'bum sde las myur shas tsam cig bi ma la mi tras bshad cing /_
[\[222a.5\]]lots+tsha ba dz+nyA na ku ma ras bsgyur ba'o/_/rdo rje yang dbang gter gyi lags rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//[{D841a}]@##/_/rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod/_/mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba'i ngang /_/nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs pa shar/_/srog gi sgo ru shar ba dang /_/snying gi sgo ru bsgom par bya/_/snying 
[\[222a.6\]]rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni/_/gsad cing gnan pa ma yin te/_/phung po rdo rje gtams byas nas/_/rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom/_/o~M badzra kI li kI la ya/_sarba big+hAn ba~M hU~M hU~M phaT/_rdo rje gzhon nu rig 'dzin rnams/_/srid pa rdo rje grub mdzod cig_/srid pa rdo rje phur pa'i lha/_/ye 
[\[222a.7\]]shes khro bo grub par mdzod/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku/_/ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las/_/'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa/_/sku yi dbyig tu bdag gyur cig_/thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du/_/byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba/_/sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas/_/
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]dbang dang byin brlabs 'dir gsol cig_/o~M badzra kro d+ha hU~M kA ra hU~M/_gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza hU~M phaT/_khro bo chen po hU~M kA ra dang /_yum rdo rje sgra 'byin ma/_sprul pa'i phra men ma phag gi mgo can dang /_smigs bu'i mgo can no/_/o~M badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya hU~M/_ha na ha na hU~M phaT/_khro bo chen po rnam par 
[\[222b.2\]]rgyal ba dang /_yum rdo rje rnam snyems ma/_sprul pa'i phra men ma stag gi mgo can dang /_bya rgod kyi mgo can no/_/oM badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hU~M/_da ha da ha hU~M phaT/_khro bo chen po dbyug pa sngon po dang /_yum rdo rje sder mo/_sprul pa'i phra men ma g.yag gi mgo can dang /_bya rog 
[\[222b.3\]]gi mgo can no/_/o~M badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hU~M/_pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/_khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed po dang /_yum dur khrod kyi bdag mo/_sprul pa'i phra men ma sha ba'i mgo can dang /_'ug pa'i mgo can no/_/oM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hU~M/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/_khro bo chen po 
[\[222b.4\]]mi g.yo mgon po dang /_yum rdo rje gtun khung ma/_sprul pa'i phra men ma gzig gi mgo can dang /_khwa'i mgo can no/_/oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hU~M/_hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/_khro bo chen po rta mgrin dang /_yum rdo rje gtum mo/_sprul pa'i phra men ma byi la'i mgo can dang /_
[\[222b.5\]]pu shud kyi mgo can no/_/o~M badzra kro d+ha a pa rA dzi ta hU~M/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/_khro bo chen po dpal ldan gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /_yum rdo rje mda' snyems ma/_sprul pa'i phra men ma spyang ki'i mgo can dang /_khra'i mgo can no/_/o~M badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hU~M/_tshin+d+ha 
[\[222b.6\]]tshin+d+ha phaT/_khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang /_yum rdo rje rlung 'byin ma/_sprul pa'i phra men ma seng ge'i mgo can dang /_pha wang gi mgo can no/_/o~M badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hU~M/_bin+d+ha bin+d+ha hU~M phaT/_khro bo chen po khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang /_yum rdo rje gsod 
[\[222b.7\]]byed ma/_sprul pa'i phra men ma dred kyi mgo can dang /_zer mo'i mgo can no/_/o~M badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hU~M/_s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hU~M phaT/_khro bo stobs po che dang /_yum rdo rje bskyod byed ma/_sprul pa'i phra men ma dred kyi mgo can dang /_byi ba'i mgo can la sogs pa rnams kyis gtams pa'o//_//
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub pa dang /_/dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir/_/ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol/_/khro bo chen po gshegs nas kyang /_/rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang /_/kI la ya yi dngos grub gsol/_/dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab/_/sprul pa chen po'i 
[\[223a.2\]]dus la bab/_/phyag brnyan chen po'i dus la bab/_/shwa na mu kha'i dus la bab/_/bdag nyid chen mo'i dus la bab/_/khyed kyi phrin las dus la bab/_/sa bdag chen mo'i dus la bab/_/mthu rtsal dbyung ba'i dus la bab/_/byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing /_/dus gsum 
[\[223a.3\]]rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob pa/_/rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni/_/gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs/_/bdud dang bar du gcod pa rnams/_/khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/_/yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas/_/mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral ba dang /_/
[\[223a.4\]]lus ngag rdul du bshig nas kyang /_/sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod/_/o~M la~M hU~M laM/_sta~M b+ha ya nan/_mo ha ga ya b+ha ga bAn/_shi kri bi kri/_shrI badzra hU~M kA ra hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/_badzra kI li kI la ya/_dzaHhU~M pa~M hoH/_sarba big+h+nAn/_o~M badzra kI li kI la ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/_badzra 
[\[223a.5\]]hUM kA ra hU~M phaT/_hU~M kA ra hU~M aH/_dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i bgegs/_/gdug cing sdang sems byed pa rnams/_/zung shig rgyob cig rnam par chings/_/gtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis/_/rings par khug la smrar chug cig_/phob cig rnam par gzir bar gyis/_/
[\[223a.6\]]nga yi dbang du gyur nas kyang /_/bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan par gyis/_/hU~M pa ra bi d+h+wan hU~M phaT/_tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hU~M phaT/_bin+d+ha bin+d+ha hU~M phaT/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M phaT/_ha na ha na hU~M phaT/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/_ta thA ya ta thA ya hU~M phaT/_ha sa ya/_ra na ha ta na hU~M phaT/_shri krin a na ya hU~M phaT/_dz+wa 
[\[223a.7\]]lA pa ya dz+wa lA pa ya hU~M phaT/_A be sha ya A be sha ya hU~M phaT/_bid+d+ha ya bin+d+ha ya hU~M phaT/_bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs/_/khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab/_/sngon chad ji bzhin dam bcas pa'i/_/mngon spyod phrin las myur du mdzod/_/ha na ha na badzra/_da ha da ha badzra/_pa tsa pa tsa badzra/_
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]ma tha ma tha badzra/_dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/_su ru su ru badzra/_mu ru mu ru badzra/_ka tang+ka te ya/_dza ye bi dza ye ya/_a dzi te a pa rA dzi ta ya/_ma ra sai n+ya~M pra marda nA ya hU~M phaT/_rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni/_/sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed pa/_/stobs chen khro bo chen po yis/_/
[\[223b.2\]]klad pa tshal pa brgya ru khos/_/nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs/_/nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed/_/hU~M ma ma ba shi ku ru/_ma tha ma/_ny+ya ka ra/_i nan dasti/_ma ma karma shri krang ka re ya/_gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa yi/_/lha 'am 'on te bdud kyang 
[\[223b.3\]]rung /_/nga la bar chad byed pa rnams/_/mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par byos/_/sarba A na ya hU~M phaT/_tad thA ya tad thA ya hU~M phaT/_brdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun/_/bka' las 'da' byed sdig can rnams/_/rdo rje me dbal snying sregs nas/_/lus ngag 
[\[223b.4\]]rdul phran bzhin du rlogs/_/khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du/_/rdo rje tho bas brdungs byas nas/_/lha yang rung ste bsgral bar bya/_/kha tha ma/_kha tha ma/_kha tha ma/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT/_badzra yak+Sha kro d+ha khA hi/_khA hi/_kha hi/_hi hi hi/_ha ha ha/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_
[\[223b.5\]]phaT phaT phaT/_chos nyid kyi bden pa'o/_/gsang sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi mthu'o/_/a b+hi tsAr+ya'i dus la bab pa'i brnag pa de kho na la'o/_/kI li kI la ya nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgya da/_dkar nag gi mtshams 
[\[223b.6\]]su'o/_/hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT/_tsam bzlas so/_/rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//[{D842}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_DA ki nI ag+ni dzi hwa dz+wa lA tan+t+ra/_bod skad du/_mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud/_srid gsum 'jigs byed 
[\[223b.7\]]drag po rdo rje'i sku/_/bdag dang gzhan gyi dpal gyur snying rje can/_/bdud las rnam rgyal ye shes lnga dang ldan/_/phyag na rdo rje che la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_ri rab ri'i rtse mo gshin rje 'bar ba'i pho brang /_
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]gnod sbyin ut+pa la'i gdong gnas pa'i dur khrod/_srin po ma tang+ka ru tra ka'i 'chag sa/_bdud gtsug phud nag po'i khang pa/_rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal chen po/_lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa'i gnas/_'byung po dge ba kha T+wA~M ga'i shing nag po ti 
[\[224a.2\]]sha ka skyes/_srin mo kang+kA la zangs kyi gshog pa me ltar 'bar ba'i zhing khams mi ro gsar rnying mang po yod pa/_nam mkha' las tri shUl dang 'khor lo dang lce 'bab pa/_sa gzhi las ral gri dang /_spu gri dang mdung rtse lnga pa skyes pa/_ri bo thams cad keng 
[\[224a.3\]]rus su snang ba/_chu klung thams cad rnag khrag tu 'bab pa/_sa phyogs thams cad ni mi ro ut+pa la sngon po'i dri mnam pa/_nye 'khor na rngam pa dang /_ngu ba'i nga ro rab tu 'jigs pa drag ste/_shin tu 'jigs pa rab tu skyi g.ya' ba'i gnas de na/_bcom 
[\[224a.4\]]ldan 'das dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po/_rigs sngags dang gsang sngags kyi bdag po/_thabs dang shes rab kyi dbang phyug_/sku dang ye shes kyi rang bzhin/_drag po chen po dpal phyag na rdo rje snying rje chen po gtum zhing khro ba/_lus bskal 
[\[224a.5\]]pa'i me chen po ltar 'bar ba/_srid pa gsum dang bdud bzhi dang /_nyon mongs pa brgyad khri dang /_sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis las rab tu rgyal ba/_sangs rgyas stong rtsa brgyad kyi thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes las grub pa/_lha ma srin sde brgyad 
[\[224a.6\]]kyis mchod cing phyag byas pa/_nyi ma stong gi gzi dang ldan pa/_dbu skra kham pa gyen la brdzes pa/_spyan sdang mig me ltar 'bar ba/_shangs kyi rlung sgrom nas bskal pa'i rlung 'byung ba/_zhal gyi mche ba rdo rje zla tshes su gtsigs pa/_rin 
[\[224a.7\]]po che margat+tas dbu brgyan pa/_rigs lnga'i rgyal ba mi bskyod pa bzhugs pa/_thod pa skam rlon gyi dbu rgyan dang mgur chu can/_mchog dang glang gi ko bas brgyan pa/_lag na ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin pa/_klu'i rgyal po gzi can gyis 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]thod du bcings pa/_klu tak+Sha kas rked chings byas pa/_klu kun nas gdugs dang /_sog ma med kyis gdan khri byas te/_khro bo chen po'i cha byad du byas nas bzhugs so/_/de'i 'khor ni tshangs pa dang /_'jug sred dang /_brgya byin dang /_ma hA kA li dang /_
[\[224b.2\]]drang srong me bzhi 'jug dang /_thang la gnas dang /_gshin rje rtel pa nag po dang /_srin po rA ma Na dang /_chu'i lha dang /_rlung gi lha dang /_gnod sbyin chen po ku be ra dang /_'byung po dbang ldan dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_skar ma dang /_sa bdag 
[\[224b.3\]]lag chen dang /_ma mo nag mo ral gcig ma dang /_lto 'phye rab brtan dang /_grul bum dang /_dri za dang /_mi'am ci dang /_rnam thos kyi bu dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_'byung po pho mo dang /_gcan gzan gyi tshogs ni seng ge dang /_
[\[224b.4\]]stag dang /_khwa dang /_spyang gi dang /_dom dang /_chu srin dang /_gung dang /_gzig dang /_ce spyang dang /_sre mo dang /_khyi li 'du dang /_'phar ba dang /_sram dang /_bya'i tshogs kyang bya rgod dang /_chu klag dang /_dur bya kang+ka dang /_bzhad dang /_khyung 
[\[224b.5\]]dang /_bya rog dang /_so bya dang /_'ug pa dang /_khra dang /_skye ga dang /_srin bya dang /_shang shang te'u dang /_ne tso yang yod do/_/gzhan yang glang po dang /_sha sbrang dang /_sbrul gdug pa can dang /_rus sbal dang /_rnga mo dang /_bse dang /_phag rgod 
[\[224b.6\]]dang /_ba men dang /_khyi snya dang /_sha ba dang /_gla ba la sogs pas bskor te bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de rnams kyi nang nas glang po che rab tu brtan pa gtsug na gser gyi dra bas brgyan pa/_mgo bo sum cu rtsa gsum yod pa'i steng na/_
[\[224b.7\]]nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dbus nas/_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin zhes bya ba/_spyi bo'i gtsug na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'bar ba/_lus la gser dang /_bai DUr+yas brgyan pa/_des 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha byad du byas nas/_glang po che'i stan 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]las langs te/_dpal phyag na rdo rje la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas/_rgyal srid rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod pa byas so/_/de nas brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa gsang dbang po/_/yid bzhin nor bu rab 'dra zhing /_/dngos grub 
[\[225a.2\]]tshogs la mnga' brnyes khyod/_/snying rje bdag po yin pas na/_/ma 'ongs sems can skal ldan gyi/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro go 'phang mchog_/nag mo me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud/_/bdag ni khyod la dri bar 'tshal/_/deng 'dir ston pas skabs 'byed zhu/_/zhes gsol pa 
[\[225a.3\]]dang /_dpal hU~M mdzad chen po des me 'bar ba'i gdan las bzhengs te/_rdo rje rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_brgya byin la seng ge'i lta stangs kyis gzigs nas/_glang po che'i 'gying bag tu gom pa gsum bor te/_hU~M hU~M hU~M gi sngags bzlas 
[\[225a.4\]]te/_ye shes kyi phyag gis rdo rje lan gsum nam mkha' la dril te/_'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/snying rje'i yid kyis brgya byin nyon/_/skal ldan dus mtha'i sems can rnams/_/mi nub 
[\[225a.5\]]chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro me lce'i rgyud/_/bdag gzhan don la 'jigs med pa/_/ngas bshad khyod kyi yid kyis zung /_zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_brgya byin la sogs pa'i 'khor shin tu dga' ba dang /_spro ba skyes nas/_la las ni me tog man+dA ra ba dang /_
[\[225a.6\]]puN+Da ri ka dang /_pad+ma dang /_ut+pa la dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_bu ram dang /_bdug spos dang /_mar me dang /_byug pa dang /_kha zas dang /_gdugs dang /_ba dan dang /_bsil yab dang /_bla re dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_'phan la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pas mchod do/_/
[\[225a.7\]]'khor la las ni bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga dang /_lcags kyu la sogs pa nang gi mchod pas mchod do/_/'khor la las lha mo dang gnod sbyin mo'i cha byad du byas nas gsang ba'i mchod pas phul lo/_/de nas dpal phyag na rdo rje la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]gsol to/_/khro chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar/_/drag po hU~M mdzad rdo rje 'dzin/_/da ltar 'dod pa'i khams 'di na/_/lha mo nag mo zhes bya ba/_/gtum zhing khro la lus kyang 'jigs/_/srid gsum skrag pa'i nus mthu can/_/dngos grub dam pa'i gzhir gyur 'di/_/dang po gleng 
[\[225b.2\]]gzhi rgyu yi rgyud/_/slob dpon slob ma gang gi rgyud/_/don dam kun rdzob lta ba'i rgyud/_/dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum gyi rgyud/_/thang ka lha rten sku gzugs rgyud/_/dpon dang g.yog ni dam rdzas rgyud/_/bskyed dang rdzogs ni ting 'dzin rgyud/_/rje dang khol gyi sngags 
[\[225b.3\]]kyi rgyud/_/bca' ba phyag rgya bcu gnyis rgyud/_/mchod pa gtor ma sbyin sreg rgyud/_/'da' bar dka' ba dam tshig rgyud/_/grub pa'i drod tshad mtshan ma'i rgyud/_/spogs dang gnad la dbab pa'i rgyud/_/mi 'bral 'grogs pa gzungs kyi rgyud/_/pra dang mtshan ma 
[\[225b.4\]]dbab pa'i rgyud/_/dbang bskur gnang ba sbyin pa'i rgyud/_/so so las kyi bye brag rgyud/_/mar me dang ni bdud rtsi rgyud/_/thig le ye shes man ngag rgyud/_/lha srin sde brgyad bstod pa'i rgyud/_/'khor la yongs su gtad pa'i rgyud/_/tha ma lung du bstan pa'i rgyud/_/
[\[225b.5\]]dgos 'brel nyi shu rtsa gnyis gang /_/ston pas bka' stsol bdag nyan 'tshal/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/_brgya byin la sogs pa khyed rnams kyis/_rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud 
[\[225b.6\]]chen po zhu ba zhus pa legs so legs so/_/khyed kyang rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig_/ngas rnam par phye ba bstan par bya'o/_/sngon 'dod pa'i khams 'di nyid na/_ri rab kyi rtse byang shar gyi mtshams/_shing yongs 'dus brtol zhes bya ba/_
[\[225b.7\]]rtse mo na bya khyung ga ru Na gnas pa/_lo ma la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rang 'byung ba/_'bras bu la rin po che sna bdun lo tog ltar smin pa/_yal ga'i rtse g.yu'i ze ba'i bar bar na/_lha dang lha mo dang /_gza' dang skar ma dang /_nyi ma dang zla 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]ba'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_rtsa ba'i ngos la khrus kyi rdzing bu bdun la/_re re la shing rta re re/_shing rta re re la bu mo bdun bdun/_bu mo re re la g.yog mo bdun bdun/_g.yog mo re re la rma bya bdun bdun yod do/_/shing rta de'i sa phyogs 
[\[226a.2\]]na/_sman gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_lo tog gi rigs khri phrag bzhi rang skye ba tsan+dan dang /_ga bur dang /_go shiR+Sha dang /_sbrul gyi snying po rdzing bu lnga brgyas bskor te/_de lta bu'i shing de thun mong gi bsod nams kyis skyes so/_/de'i dus la 'dod pa'i 
[\[226a.3\]]shing de ni lha rnams kyis dbang byed pa'i tshe/_ri rab kyi rtsa ba na 'od mi snang ba zhes bya ba'i gnas na/_lha ma yin gyi rgyal po sum brtsegs dang /_thags zangs ris dang /_he ran+na ke shun dang /_rnam par snang byed dang /_rab sim dang /_sgra gcan 'dzin 
[\[226a.4\]]la sogs pa bye ba dung phyur tsam/_shin tu mi sdug pa'i cha byad du byas nas/_rab tu rngam pa'i nga ro dang /_'jigs shing skrag pa'i mtshon cha thogs nas/_ri rab kyi kha chos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya bar lhags so/_/de nas ri rab kyi kha la lha ba su de ba 
[\[226a.5\]]dang /_lha ma hA de ba dang /_brgya byin nyid la sogs pa/_lha bye ba dung phyur la lha ma yin rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/ri rab rtse gnas sum cu rtsa gsum lha/_/shing 'di'i lha dang lha min thun mong las/_/da lta 'dod pa'i khyed cag lha 
[\[226a.6\]]dbang na/_/da ni nged cag lha min bdud la blang /_/zhes smras pa dang /_lha rnams kyis slar smras pa/_dpag bsam shing la 'dod yon bsam yas kyang /_/bsod nams dbang gis lha la yongs su grub/_/gzhan la yod na skams shing med par 
[\[226a.7\]]'gyur/_/de bas khyed la ljon shing nged mi ster/_/zhes smras pa dang /_slar lha la smras pa/_thun mong las grub bde ldan ljon pa'i shing /_/lha yis dbang byas nged la mi ster na/_/'jig rten sreg pa'i mtshon gyi char phab la/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]chen 'gyed ces zer/_/ces smras te/_slar yang song nas lha ma yin gyis dmag drangs so/_/glang po che sa srung gi mgo sum cu rtsa gnyis la gnod sbyin sum cu rtsa gnyis zhon te/_dbus kyi mgo la dbang po thags zangs ris zhon te/_glang po che'i sna 
[\[226b.2\]]la ka ma la nag po btags te/_lha ma yin gyi dmag bye ba dung phyur gyis bskor te/_rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la mtshon gyi char chen po me lce 'bar ba 'dra ba'i char 'bebs te dmag drangs so/_/de nas chos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba'i gdan sar lha rnams 
[\[226b.3\]]'tshogs te/_'thab par brtsams pa dang /_dang po lha rnams kyis khro ma shes nas rtsub 'gyur gyi khang pa na/_khro bo lang+ka nag po khros pa'i kha chu khro chu'i rdzing bu bdun pa'i 'khyil pa las 'thungs so/_/der lha rnams zhe sdang skyes te shin tu khro bar gyur nas/_
[\[226b.4\]]bzo'i lha bi sho kar mas nub gcig la gser khrab bye ba phrag dgu 'bum rang brdungs so/_/lha ma hA kro d+ha sa nub gcig la mtshon ral gri dang /_'khor lo dang /_thod pa dang /_lcags kyu dang /_dgra sta dang /_mdung rtse gsum pa bye ba phrag dgu khri dgu 
[\[226b.5\]]'bum rang brdungs so/_/dus de tsam na lha rnams go mtshon thogs te/_glang po che rab tu brtan pa'i mgo sum cu rtsa gnyis la nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis zhon/_dbus kyi mgo bo la lha'i dbang po brgya byin zhon/_lha dmag bye ba dung phyur gyis mtha' 
[\[226b.6\]]brten te/_glang po che'i sna la ral gri btags nas lha dang lha ma yin gnyis g.yul bkye'o/_/dus de tsam na lhas mtshon brgyab pa rnams ni/_khrag gar phog pa la bdud kyi dmag mi khri khri tsam du 'phel lo/_/lha ma yin gyis mtshon brgyab pa la ni khrag 
[\[226b.7\]]la dmag ma 'phel bar shi'o/_/der lha thams cad gting 'pham ste/_lha ma yin rab tu rgyal ba'i dus su/_phyag na rdo rje nyid kyis lha rnams rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir/_dpal be'u dbus nas hU~M mthing nag 'bar ba gcig sprul te/_lha biTh+Nu rA dza'i 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]dpral ba'i dbyings su lcags kyi mdzer pa cig tu gyur to/_/mdzer pa brtol ba'i nang nas bud med sngon mo dbu skra bai DUr+ya'i chun 'phyangs can/_mig ut+pa la'i 'dab ma 'dra ba/_mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa cig byung ngo /_/de la lha rnams kyis 
[\[227a.2\]]ming btags pa/_lha mo u ma de ba bya bar btags/_lha'i bu mo de kun gyi chung mar 'dod pa la/_nam mkha' la phyag na rdo rjes nga'i sprul pa'i tshigs bcad 'di bsgrags so/_/lha yi rgyal srid mtho zhing brtan pa dang /_/ris drug sems can 
[\[227a.3\]]dge la dgod pa dang /_/lha min bdud kyi g.yul chen bzlog pa'i phyir/_/dbang phyug lha la u ma chung mar byin/_/zhes bsgrags so/_/dus de'i tshe na 'dzam bu'i gling gi nub byang mtshams/_yak+Sha ka ma la 'bar ba'i dur khrod na/_lha ma hwA de ba dge 
[\[227a.4\]]slong gi cha lugs su 'gog pa'i brtul zhugs drag po la zhugs pa'i drung du u ma de ba khrid nas zhag bdun phrag bdun drod la btsas pas/_'dod pa'i 'khrig pa spyad do/_/'khrig pa spyad pa'i dbang gis bar snang la gza' dang skar ma byung ngo /_/der lha mo 
[\[227a.5\]]u ma de ba la bu tsha ming sring gnyis skyes so/_/ming po ni gshin rje ma hA kA la zhes grags so/_/sring mo ni lha mo dmar mo tsa muN+Di zhes bya bar grags so/_/gshin rje ming sring de gnyis chos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lha'i 'dun sar khrid nas phyin to/_/de nas phyag na 
[\[227a.6\]]rdo rje nyid kyis/_/gshin rje'i ming sring la/_ma hA yak+Sha bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i dbang bskur te/_sngar bzhin du lha dang lha ma yin gnyis g.yul chen po bkye'o/_/de nas gshin rje ma hA kA las/_lag na gsal shing ri rab tsam gcig gis/_
[\[227a.7\]]lha ma yin gyi g.yul ngor dril bas g.yul bzlog go/_/tsa muN+Di'i ral gri me lce phreng ba zhes bya bas/_lha ma yin he ra Na ke shu'i mgo bcad do/_/de nas lha dmag mang pos kyang lha ma yin la mtshon cha'i char phab nas/_khrag rnams 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]dmag mir sprul pa 'dra ste/_lha mo tsa muN+Dis he ra Na ke shu'i thod pas/_khrag bcus shing rol pas 'phel ma nus par byed kyin mtshon gyi char phab nas/_tsa muN+Di'i lte ba la lha bye ba dung phyur rnams kyi rdzong byas pas 'thabs so/_/lha dmag dkar po rgyal 
[\[227b.2\]]bar byas shing dpag bsam shing gi mnga' bdag tu gyur te/_rnam par rgyal ba'i khang [{]bzangs kyang [,]bzang yang [}]rang byung du yod do/_/lha ma yin 'pham par gyur to/_/brgya byin nyon cig_/de nas lha'i bu mo tsa muN+Di des/_ri khrod chen po mdangs dga' 
[\[227b.3\]]zhes bya bar/_shing ri khrod zhes bya ba'i lo ma gyon nas/_lo bdun du 'phags pa mi pham pa'i gzungs bzlas pas/_lha mo par+N+Na sha ba ri ri khrod lo ma can zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de nas lha mo des klu dung gi mdzer ba can zhes bya ba'i byang 
[\[227b.4\]]chub sems dpa' de bya khyung ka ru Na zhes bya bas 'tshe ba la/_lha mo par+N+Na sha ba ri des bya khyung btul bas klu bskyangs te/_lha mo dkar mo dung skyong ma zhes bya bar gyur to/_/lha mo dung skyong ma de ni ri rab rtse mo rnam par rgyal ba'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rtsa/_
[\[227b.5\]]byang shar gyi mtshams byang chub kyi shing drung na/_rin po che'i khang pa bdun brtsegs kyi gzhal yas kyi khang na/_rin po che'i khri stengs na/_gser dngul bai DUr+ya'i dbu rgyan dang mgur chus brgyan te/_lus 'gying bag tu bzhugs so/_/lha'i bu 
[\[227b.6\]]dang bu mo mang pos kyang longs spyod dang /_glu dang dbyangs dang /_rol mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mchod pa byed do/_/brgya byin nyon cig_/de nas yul lang+ka pu ri ru srin po'i grong khyer bdun 'bum yod pa la/_lha rnams kyis skyon phab ste/_srin 
[\[227b.7\]]po da sha ba dang /_de'i sring mo rna la rtse gnyis lus so/_/de nas srin po da sha grI bas/_lha dang mi 'dul 'dod pa'i don ched du/_sring mo lha ma hA de ba la btsun mor phul lo/_/de nas lha dbang phyug ma hA de ba dang /_sring mo rna la rtse gnyis tshogs 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]pa las/_phas ni khye 'ur smon lam btab/_mas ni bu mor smon lam btab/_ma'i smon lam mthu btsan pas/_ya mtshan can gyi bu mo gcig byung /_pha khros phas thal khung du bor ro/_/mas slar blangs nas lus kyi drod la 
[\[228a.2\]]btsas nas/_A u b+h+rU~M zhes tshe drangs gsos te/_phas ming btags pa sbas pa'i thal mdog mar ming btags/_mas ming mi pham khro gnyer ro langs mar ming btags/_gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes dmod btsugs nas ming btags pa/_
[\[228a.3\]]dus thams cad du nag mo re ma ti zhes bya bar grags par gyur nas/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'i nus mthu dang ldan par gyur cig ces ming du btags pa'i tshe/_bar snang gi lha ma srin sde brgyad po yongs kyis kyang de ltar 
[\[228a.4\]]gyur cig ces bzlas so/_/de nas skye ba thams cad du nag mo re ma ti zhes bya bar grags so/_/lha mo dung skyong mas ming btags pa ni/_srin mo dmar 'dab phur pa'i lha gser can zhes bya bar ming btags so/_/dus der srin po 
[\[228a.5\]]da sha grI ba des/_nga ni lceb bo lceb bo'i sgras 'jig rten du grags so/_/sring mo dang rna la rtse gnyis kyis ming po ma lceb par ci 'dod pa nga la smros shig ces gsol to/_/da sha grI bas gsol pa/_nga ni lha mo dung skyong 'dod do zhes gsol to/_/
[\[228a.6\]]sring mos smras pa/_nga'i bu mo phur pa'i lha 'di ni lha mo dung skyong gi khol mo byed du gsol te/_de nas gdod bslu'o zhes smras so/_/de nas rna la rtse yis bu mo khrid nas dkar mo dungaskyong gi g.yog du phul lo/_/de nas re ma tis dkar mo dung 
[\[228a.7\]]skyong la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye che zhe chen mo rigs kyi yum/_/bdag nyid chen mo ga gar ma/_/dbu bzang rin chen thor tshugs la/_/bai DUr sngon mo 'od lam lam/_/zhal bzang pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du/_/nyi zla phyugs gcig rgyan bkod de/_/
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]tshems bzang dung la ljags bzang me/_/khyod 'dra 'jig rten khams na med/_/bdag ni khyod kyi gtan 'bangs bgyi/_/khyod kyis bdag la thugs brtser dgongs/_/bdag kyang glo ba nye bar bgyi/_/ces gsol to/_/de nas lha mo'i 
[\[228b.2\]]g.yog mo byas nas glo ba nye bar byas te lha mo'i yid la ci 'dod pa dgos pa byas so/_/de nas lha mo yang khol mo de la dgyes nas gces par byed de/_de'i tshe de'i dus na yul lang ka pu ri ru/_spre'u 'bal le dang mgrin 
[\[228b.3\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'thabs pa la lha thams cad ltad mo la 'gro bas/_lha mo u mas bu mo dung skyong ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de ring khyod kyi gan du su 'ongs pas khyod bslu ste 'ong bas/_de la ma lta cig ces bstan tsam na/_khol 
[\[228b.4\]]mos skabs der da sha grI ba la sbran no/_/der srin po da sha grI bas/_srin gyi bong bu dmar gwa la zhon nas/_lha mo'i pho brang sgor phyin te srin po kho bdag ni mi'i cha byad la shin tu gzugs bzang la mdzes pa cig tu sprul/_bong bu ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gwa dor 
[\[228b.5\]]smug po cig tu sprul te/_lha mo dung skyong ma'i spyan sngar phyin nas/_rol mo'i sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sna tshogs byas pas bslus so/_/lha mo rol mo la dga' bas 'dzum cig shor ro/_/de nas srin pos glags rnyed de/_lcags kyi lham sgrog sngon 
[\[228b.6\]]po bkrol nas bzung ste glu 'di skad blangs so/_/kye yongs 'du shing gi gnas mchog na/_/rin chen mdzes pa'i pho brang nas/_/bde ldan 'phrul gyi lding khang na/_/'gying bag tshul du gar mdzad pa/_/dbang phyug sras mo ma lags sam/_/dga' byed 
[\[228b.7\]]dung skyong ma lags sam/_/lha mo mang po'i tshogs dang rol/_/dbu yi snyan cha gdub 'khor ni/_/rin chen mdzes pas kun nas spras/_/spyan ni ut+pal 'dab ma 'dra/_/shangs ni bil ba'i 'bras bu 'dra/_/zhal nas ut+pal ngad kyang bro/_/sku ni 'khril 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]ldem gzhon tshul 'dra/_/gsung ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs snyan mchog_/nu 'bur stod smad phyed pas 'gying /_/khyod 'dra'i sku ni gzhan na dkon/_/lha yi longs spyod mdzes pas mi brel yang /_/zhabs kyi chas su lcags sgrog 'di 'bul zhes/_/
[\[229a.2\]]ci mdzad ci sdug ci yang gsung ba snyan/_/khams gsum dag na khyod 'dra shin tu dkon/_/sems can kun gyis lta bas mi ngoms khyod/_/bdag gis dbul 'di bzhes par gnang bar mdzod/_/ces phul ba la/_lha mos lcags sgrog blangs so/_/
[\[229a.3\]]de nas rang gi rkang pa g.yas pa la dkris te rgyan byas so/_/de nas khol mo des/_jo mo dung skyong ma la zhus pa/_kye jo mo bde mchog dung skyong ma/_bdag zhu ba gcig mchis na gnang ngam byas pa la/_jo mo na re khyod glo ba nye bas ci zhus pa 
[\[229a.4\]]gnang ngo zer ro/_/de nas lha ni ngag bden pa'i sdom pa yod pas/_ji skad smras pa ltar byed pa yin no/_/de nas khol mos gsol pa/_kye bdag gi yun gyi rjer gyur dung skyong ma/_/khyod 'dra 'jig rten gzhan na med/_/'grogs pas zla 
[\[229a.5\]]med skar ma gcig shar 'dra/_/deng 'dir mchis pas lcags sgrog 'bul mkhan de/_/gtan gyi grogs zlar mdzad par zhu ba 'bul/_/bdag kyang rtag tu khyod kyi bran mo byed/_/zhes zhus pa la/_lha mo des sngar khas blangs pa des mi 
[\[229a.6\]]bya ba'i dbang med nas/_lha mo na re khyor bya'i mi de gang na 'dug_/su yin byas pa la/_khol mos smras pa/_de ni bdag gi zhang po srin po da sha grI pa yin/_yul lang+ka pu ra na 'dug ces smras pa dang /_de nas dung skyong ma dbang med du srin 
[\[229a.7\]]po'i chung mar song ngo /_/de nas lha mo u mas bu mo dung skyong ma la dmod pa bor ba nga'i bu mo rab tu gces par byas te/_lha'i longs spyod mdzes pas mi brel yang /_nga la gsangs la srin po'i chung mar song /_/phyin cad bu mo khyod 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]kyang srin dang 'grogs/_mi sha za yi mi lpags gyon par gyur/_srog gcod byed cing mi yi thod khrag thogs/_/bong bu zhon la lha yi kha dog nyams/_/srin gyi kha dog nag la 'jigs par shog_/de yi khol mo re ma ti khyod kyang /_/nga yi bu mo 
[\[229b.2\]]bslus te srin la byin/_/khyod kyang mi sdug 'jigs pa'i gdong du gyur/_/tshe rabs kun du khyo dang ma phrad cig_/ces dmod pa bcu gnyis pa bor ro/_/de nas bu mo la ma'i dmod pas bsdigs nas lha'i kha dog dkar po nyams te mthing nag tu gyur/_
[\[229b.3\]]mi sha za mi khrag 'thung /_mi lpags gyon bong bu zhon/_gcer bur bud nas 'dug go/_/bu ni srin po phru gu seng ge zla dang /_me tog cod pan dang /_gangs can dang /_mche ba bdun la sogs pa lnga brgya skyes tsam na/_khyo srin po da sha grI ba 
[\[229b.4\]]shi'o/_/de nas bu mo dung skyong ma yang yugs sa'i cha lugs byas te/_skra mdun skra lan bu gcig la blas so/_/bran mo phur pa'i lha yang dmod pas bsdigs pas/_srin gyi phag rdzi byed tsam na/_phag rdzi dun bu srin bya bas mo la dbang med 
[\[229b.5\]]du chags pa spyad do/_/de nas phur pa lha yang nal bu sbrum mo/_/de nas dpon g.yog gnyis kyis srin po'i bong bu brkus pa zhon nas/_da sha grI ba'i ral gri sdig pa can brkus pa g.yas na thogs/_srin po'i nor bu rin po che brkus nas ne'u le'i 
[\[229b.6\]]rkyal bur sbas nas/_lag pa g.yon du thogs nas bros so/_/phyi nas srin po'i dmag gis bsad kyis dogs nas/_bong bu bskyod nas kha phyir bstan te/_phyi na srin po bya ra byed cing phyin no/_/tha mar dur khrod gcig tu phyin na skyes pa 
[\[229b.7\]]g.yul du bsad pa'i ro gcig dang phrad do/_/de nas khong gnyis sha de bsregs nas za 'dod pa la gtsub shing med nas/_rgya mtsho'i 'gram na rdo sol gyi ri la char bab nas me 'bar ba mthong nas rdo sol me blangs nas sha bsregs nas 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]zos so/_/phyi na khyi dkar po gcig 'brang ba yang bsad nas zos so/_/pags pa la rgyal mtshan byas so/_/de nas khol mo re ma ti la nal phrug skyes so/_/khong gnyis kyis na la phrug gi sha yang zos so/_/de nas jo mos bong bu la 
[\[230a.2\]]zhon khol mos kha khrid byas nas rgya mtsho'i khar phyin nas/_gshin rje rlung gi 'khor lo can zhag bdun bsgoms pas/_rlung nag tshub ma nag po gcig drung der grub bo/_/de nas lha mo dpon g.yog gnyis kyis/_snang srid kyi lha 'dre mthu bo che 
[\[230a.3\]]bos nas smon lam btab pa/_nga yang tshe 'di 'phos ma thag tu gsang sngags kyi grub pa thob nas rgyal ba'i zhal mthong ste/_'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug mar shog shig_/nga'i bran mo phur pa'i lha 'di yang dus thams cad du nga'i 'bangs ka ma 
[\[230a.4\]]lar shog shig_/nor du mi mgo la longs spyod par shog shig_/zhon pa bong bu la byed la/_lag cha ral gri la byed par shog shig ces smras so/_/rgya mtsho bskor zhing rlung tshub ma la bA ya be bA ya be zhes bos tsam na/_tshub ma byung bas dpon g.yog 
[\[230a.5\]]gnyis ka rgya mtsho'i nang du bskyur te btang ngo /_/de nas lha mo dung skyong ma des mi sha zos pa'i mthu dang /_rang gi smon lam gyi dbang gis/_rgya mtsho'i 'gram du dur khrod chen po ro'i tshal zhes bya bar/_gshin rje'i lha mthu can gyi bu mor skyes te/_gnod sbyin ma 
[\[230a.6\]]chen mo la kha dog mthing nag la rab tu 'jigs pa/_mig rtsa dmar ba mche ba zang yag la ral pa ting za pang du 'dug pa cig tu gyur te/_gshin rje ma ru rtse dang sbyor ba byas pa la bu bdud khram nag po bya ba byung /_bong bu yang dmar gwa la g.yu'i 
[\[230a.7\]]rna ba can rlung gi gshog pa can/_mig mjug mar yod pa cig tu byung nas nor skal byed do/_/de nas khol mo re ma ti ro langs ma 'di ni skye ba gang blangs zhe na/_rgya mtsho'i nang du bud med lus po phyed skams la chu srin gyi mgo can gcig tu skyes 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]te/_ming yang klu mo gzhogs skams chu srin mgo klu mo re ma ti zhes bya bar btags nas/_zhag dgu bcu na tshe 'phos nas/_skye ba blangs pa ni yul dri za'i grong khyer gser sdings skyed mos tshal zhes bya ba na/_dug shing nag po 'gyur med kyi rtsa ba na 
[\[230b.2\]]bdud ri ti 'gong nyag dang /_dran pa dbang byed gnyis byi byas pa la zhag drug cu rtsa gcig na bu mo gcig skyes te/_phas ni srid pa gsum gyi blo 'phrog mar btags/_mas ming btags pa ni ya mtshan 'phrul gyi gshog pa can du btags/_bdud pho mo 
[\[230b.3\]]gnyis kyis rang gi bu mo la skra nyag re la gser dang /_bai DUr+ya'i chun 'phyang dang /_rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang /_nyi zla'i thod gdengs dang /_thod pa'i mgur chu dang /_sbrul gyi gdu bus brgyan te/_byi byas pa'i nal phrug yin pas/_bdud kyis rin po che sna 
[\[230b.4\]]lnga'i khang pa'i dbus su thod pa'i gzhal yas khang byas/_thod pa'i nang du yang thod 'phrul gyi lding khang grub/_de'i nang du khang pa bdun brtsegs kyi bdun tshogs kyi nang du/_mi ro 'bum gyi khri stengs su bu mo de sus ma mthong sus kyang ma tshor bar sbas te/_
[\[230b.5\]]sgo smra bo lag [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_nam gru khrab thogs kyis bcad do/_/bdud kyi dmag gi rgyal mo dang /_gling bzhi'i rgyal mo dang /_sa bdag gi rgyal mo dang /_de rnams kyis khang pa de rab tu srung zhing 'khod do/_/brgya byin nyon cig_/de'i tshe na lha mo dung skyong 
[\[230b.6\]]ma ni/_sngon gyi khol mo re ma ti ro langs ma bdud kyi bu mor skyes pa bkug nas khol 'dod pa las/_phyag na rdo rje nga'i gsang sngags bye ba phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad bzlas pas/_gsang sngags de'i byin gyi brlabs las/_mkha' 'gro'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[230b.7\]]grub pa mo/_lag na pad+ma he ru ka thogs pa gcig rang byung bas/_ma bdud kyi yul dang pho brang kun byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshe na/_bdud kyi rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_'khor rnams dran pa med par myos par gyur to/_/bdud kyi bu mo re ma 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]ti des sngon gyi jo mo lha mo dung skyong ma dran pas/_yid phyogs te dung skyong ma'i spyan sngar 'gro 'dod pa'i bsam pa drag po byung nas/_bdud ri ti 'gong nyag gi mtshon bdud kyi khram bam nag po de/_bu mo re ma tis brkus nas/_lag 
[\[231a.2\]]pa g.yas su thogs/_ma'i tshon gyi gru gu sngon dmar de brkus nas lag pa g.yon na thogs nas/_nam phar phyed tshur phyed na jo mo dung skyong ma'i gan du bros te phyin nas/_lus gcer bur 'dug pa la/_khyim bdag rab sbyin gsal gyi 
[\[231a.3\]]ba rdzi mo dmangs rigs mo bya ha mu zhes bya ba de re lde nag po gyon nas 'dug pa dang phrad/_mos dmangs rigs mo bsad nas sha zos/_pags pa rked la dkris/_de'i gos re lde bshus nas bdud mo nyid gyon nas phyin tsam na/_lam khar 
[\[231a.4\]]srin mo purna shi ba'i gsur khrag_/nad kyi rdzing bu cig yod pa'i khar phyin pa las/_bdud mo re ma tis skom nas thog cig 'thungs tsam na/_kha rlangs las nad du song bas/_mo'i kha rlangs gar phog pas rims nad byung ngo /_/der mo rang 
[\[231a.5\]]yang ngo tsha skyes nas/_sngar gyi dmangs rigs mo bsad pa'i rlud bu rked las bkrol te/_nang nad kyi rdzing bus bkang nas/_kha sbrul gyis bcings te/_mchan khung du sbas nas/_sems can la gdug par bya bar bsams te/_phyin tsam 
[\[231a.6\]]na/_btsan skya rdo rje zla ba dang phrad pa na re bdud mo chen mo chags pa spyad dgos/_rngan pa yang sbyin zer nas/_mo bzung nas chags pa spyad pa'i khu ba thigs pa gcig 'dzam bu'i gling du bo ba ni jong ji dkar por song /_der btsan skya rdo rje 
[\[231a.7\]]zla ba'i lag na shod rde'u dkar nag gang la bor ba phung bar byed pa bdun yod pa la/_mo la byi rngan du byin pa de blangs te/_lag pa g.yon du bzung nas/_grong khyer sbrang ldan zhes bya bar phyin tsam na/_rgyal po seng ge rtsal la bsod snyoms 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]byas te/_sbrang rtsi lhung bzed gang phul nas/_sbrang rtsi lag tu len khar phyag tshang bas hub byas nas mo la sbyin/_mos blangs tsam na/_bar snang gi lha rnams kyis bdud mo/_rgyal po'i khol mo'i lhag ma dang kha 'phro 'thung ngam/_che ba nyams 
[\[231b.2\]]so zhes zer tsam na/_bdud mo re ma ti khros pas yid 'khrugs te/_rgyal rigs la der rims nad btang ngo /_/der rgyal po'i dkor zangs kyi dra ba dgu phul nas rims bcad do/_/de nas nag mo re ma ti des/_rgya mtsho'i 'gram du dur khrod chen po 
[\[231b.3\]]ro'i tshal du sngon gyi jo mo dung skyong ma'i spyan sngar phyin to/_/de nas dpon g.yog gnyis 'grogs nas/_srid pa gsum gyi sems can zad cing stongs par byed pa'i dus de tsam na/_jo mo dung skyong ma'i zhon pa srin gyi bong bu dmar gwa dang /_
[\[231b.4\]]srin mo rna la dun rtse'i rgod ma zangs kyi so can gnyis chags pa spyad pa las/_dre'u mo sngon mo rlung gi gshog pa can gcig byung ba de/_rgyu ma'i mthur la zangs kyi sga bstad nas/_lha mo dung skyong mas khol mo re ma ti la zhon par byin/_
[\[231b.5\]]der jo mo ni bong bu dmar gwa la zhon/_khol mos dre'u sngon mo la zhon/_rje mos mi pags gon thod pa dang ral gri lag na thogs/_khol mos re lde nag po gyon/_lag na khram bam dang /_shod rde'u thogs/_de nas shin tu mthu 
[\[231b.6\]]rtsal che ste skye ba rnam bzhi'i sems can yo zad cing stongs pa tsam du zos so/_/'jig rten gyi mkha' 'gro ma/_dkar mo'i tshogs dang /_sngon mo dang dmar mo dang /_ser mo'i tshogs dang /_lha mo dang /_bdud 
[\[231b.7\]]mo dang /_srin mo dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa mang po yang lha mo rje khol gyi 'bangs bgyi zer zhing bran du 'ongs so/_/brgya byin nyon cig dus de tsam na lha mo dpon g.yog gnyis/_bud med kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa nyid kyis/_rtag par 'dod 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]pa'i 'khrig pa spyad pa'i ched du khyo dgu dang sbyor ba byed de/_jo mo la khyo lnga khol mo la khyo bzhi yod de/_rje mo'i khyo lnga ni/_gza' rA hu la/_srin po sgra ldan/_gshin rje mA ru rtse/_bdud char ka nag po/_klu kun la dang lnga/_
[\[232a.2\]]khol mo'i khyo bzhi ni/_'byung po dge ba dang /_bgegs bI na ya ka dang /_gnod sbyin yak+sha ka pa la dang /_rlung bA ya be dang bzhi'o/_/de ltar dpon g.yog gnyis kyi khyo dgu ni/_nyin par ni mchan khung g.yon du bskungs shing sbed 
[\[232a.3\]]la/_mtshan mo dur khrod du bskung zhing sbyor ba byed do/_/brgya byin nyon cig de nas lha'i bu mo la sngon gyi las 'phros 'brel zhing dge ba spyad pa'i shugs kyis/_byang chub kyi shing drung na/_bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar 
[\[232a.4\]]phyin nas/_lha mo des byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas rang gi snying po 'di phul lo/_/tad+ya thA/_o~M ru ru be ti sta ba do si/_ru ru ro ru be sti sta ba do si/_tsa pa la a shug+me hU~M b+h+yo dzaH/_zhes 
[\[232a.5\]]phul lo/_/khol mos rang gi snying po phul ba/_tad+ya thA/_o~M ru ru be ro ru hU~M ti snga to si/_rag+mo tsit+ta kha rag+ma dun b+h+yo/_ma ma trag+Ra k+sha kha mun+t+ra ba tra rak+sha tsit+ta kha rag+ma duM hU~M b+h+yo/_ru lu sa ma ya phra ma ma hA sti phra b+h+yo zhes phul lo/_/de nas byang chub mchog 
[\[232a.6\]]tu sems bskyed nas lha mo dpon g.yog gnyis kyis a su ra'i brag phug tu phyin pa las bram ze mchog sred sgrub pa byed pa dang phrad do/_/lha mos khyod 'di na ci byed byas pa la/_bram ze mchog sred kyis smras pa/_sngon khams 'di nyid 
[\[232a.7\]]na dge slong brtan pa'i sde dang /_dge slong ma dar ri sde gnyis khrims nyams te rgyal po'i chad pas bsad do/_/de skye ba 'phos pa ni/_bdud laM nga 'ge'u ri dang /_ro sha kha 'dar gnyis su gyur te/_yul mi ci yod zad par zos nas/_
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]de nas nga la za res bab pas/_nga ni bdud 'dul ba'i phyir/_yum e ka dza Ti ral gcig ma/_bsgrub bo zhes zer ro/_/dung skyong ma na re 'o na nged dpon g.yog kyang bsgrub par bya na/_yon tan de lta bu yod dam byas pa na/_bram ze na re khyed 
[\[232b.2\]]gnyis dngos grub ci 'dod pa yin/_lha mo na re nged gnyis 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang mo cher gyur nas/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'i grub pa 'dod byas pa la/_'o na grub par bya'o zhes zer nas/_bram ze dang lha mo dpon g.yog 
[\[232b.3\]]bsgrub pa byas pas yum e ka dza Ti zhal mthong nas grub pa thob bo/_/yum e ka dza Tis/_lha mo dung skyong ma'i ming ni/_dpal lha mo nag mo ma hA kA li zhes btags so/_/khol mo'i ming ni yak+sha re ma ti zhes bya bar btags so/_/
[\[232b.4\]]'dod khams 'dul ba'i dbang mo cher dbang bskur ro/_/ma hA kA lis kyang chos bskyang zhing bstan pa bsrung bar khas blangs so/_/rang gi snying po 'di phul lo/_/o~M ru ru be ti sta ba do si/_ru ru ro ru be tista ba do si/_tsa pa la a shug me b+h+yo dzaH
[\[232b.5\]]re ma tis kyang /_o~M ru ru ro ru be tista ba do si/_rag mo tsit+ta kha rag ma hU~M b+h+yo/_ma ma trag rag+sha kha mun tra ba tra trag rag+sha/_tsit+ta kha rag me re ma ti sa ma ya phra ma ya phra ma ma hA te phra dun b+h+yo/_/dzaHdzaHru lu b+h+yo zhes phul lo/_/bdud laM 
[\[232b.6\]]nga 'ge'u ri dang ro sha kha 'dar bsgral lo/_/de nas sa'i lha mo brtan mas kyang nam gru mched brgyad kyang 'bangs su phul lo/_/srin yul du dmag drangs pas/_srin po yag+sha ko re bsgral lo/_/brgya byin nyon cig_/de nas 'phags 
[\[232b.7\]]pa spyan ras gzigs kyis/_dpal rta mgrin du sprul pa'i bsgrub pa byas te/_rta mgrin gyi zhal mthong zhing gsang ba'i gzungs ma byas te/_rje mo'i ming dpal lha mo nag mor btags so/_/khol mo'i ming ni rdo rje glog ma srin du 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]ming btags so/_/des phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur ro/_/las kyi lhar byin gyis brlabs so/_/de'i tshe na dpal lha mo nag mos/_dpal rta mgrin la snying po mdongs gsol du phul lo/_/bstan pa bsrung bar 
[\[233a.2\]]khas blangs so/_/de nas sngon gyi u ma de ba dang rna la rtse gnyis kyang /_sngon gyi bu mo gnyis la srin lag rtse la nu zho blugs pas bros nas/_dred mo'i ral pas g.yab mos 'bod de/_bu mo gnyis ma'i drung du phyin tsam na/_
[\[233a.3\]]dbang bskur zhing dam bsgrags/_/bstan pa bsrung bar dbang byin to/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos kyang rang gi rtsa dang khrag dang khu ba'i mchod pa byas nas/_lha dang mi'i rgyal srid phul nas/_rma bya rin po che'i 
[\[233a.4\]]gshog pa can spyi bo na nor bu rin po che yod pa/_jo mo la nor skal du byin no/_/bya de mo nag mo spyi bo na nor bu rin po che yod pa cig khol mo la nor skal du byin nas/_lha mo rje khol gnyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos byin 
[\[233a.5\]]pa'i rma bya dang /_de mo nag mo gnyis gtan gyi nor skal byed cing chags/_de nas dpal lha mo ni gsang ba'i gnas dur khrod ro khang nag po'i dbus mA ru rtse'i sgo 'gram du/_dpal phyag na rdo rje'i he ru ka'i dngos grub sgrub 
[\[233a.6\]]pa'i tshe/_dpal phyag na rdo rje'i dngos grub grub ste/_dpal phyag na rdo rjes lha mo dpon g.yog la spyi bo gtsug tu dpal rta mgrin gsang ba'i dbang bskur/_lus ngag yid gsum la khrag 'thung he ru ka'i dbang bskur/_
[\[233a.7\]]thugs kyi dpal be'u rigs lnga sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur/_sku stod kyi rgyan du phra men ma bcu drug gi dbang bskur/_ljags kyi dkar dmar la lcags kyu gsang ba'i dbang bskur ro/_/gnad mdo chen drug tu tshom bu gsang ba'i 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]dbang bskur ro/_/gsang ba pad+ma la thig le ye shes shar ba'i dbang bskur/_rdo rje pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi 'khor du dbang bskur/_pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ni sprul pa dang yang sprul du dbang bskur/_de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[233b.2\]]'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes jo mo'i ming ni dpal ma hA kA li zhes btags so/_/khol mo'i ming ni gnod sbyin shan pa nag mo re ma ti zhes btags so/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung bar 
[\[233b.3\]]gnyer gtad do/_/de nas dpal phyag na rdo rje nyid la/_dpal lha mos rang gi snying po phul te/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dus rtag tu bsrung bar khas blangs so/_/de nas dpal lha mo de mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[233b.4\]]par gyur to/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug mar gyur pa'i tshe/_lha tshangs pas nyi ma'i rgyan phul/_/khyab 'jug gis zla ba'i rgyan phul/_rnam thos sras kyis seng ge'i rna cha phul/_nam mkha'i lha bran rnams kyis gser gyi dril 
[\[233b.5\]]bu'i rgyan phul/_srin po dang sha za rnams kyis thod phreng dang khrag dang zhag gi thig le phul lo/_/klu dga' bos sbrul gyi gdengs ka phul/_lha mo de srid pa gsum na 'gran pa'i zla med par gyur to/_/de nas brgya byin gyis gsol 
[\[233b.6\]]pa/_kye bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma 'di/_dang por lha'i bu mor gyur ba dang /_bar du srin po'i chung mar gyur pa dang /_da ltar 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug mar gyur pa 'di/_
[\[233b.7\]]sngon gyi rkyen ci las grub pa lags zhes gsol pa dang /_gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/_brgya byin nyon cig_/da ltar lha mo nag mo 'di sngon sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi bstan pa la lha mo 'od zer can du gyur te dge ba bcu sha stag 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]spyad do/_/de nas sangs rgyas gser thub kyi bstan pa la lha mo dpa' brtan ma zhes bya bar gyur te zhe sdang rang kha mar spyad do/_/de nas sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la lha mo many+dzu zhes bya bar gyur te/_dus de tsam na 
[\[234a.2\]]shAkya thub pa ni dge slong dbang phyug dpa' bo zhes bya bar grags so/_/dge slong de la lha mo many+dzus mchod gnas byas shing smon lam gcig tu btab bo/_/brgya byin nyon cig_/de da lta na ni lha mo 'di la sangs rgyas gsum 
[\[234a.3\]]gyi ring gi rnam par smin pa shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa la dus gcig tu smin no/_/lha mo 'di dang por ma hA de ba'i bu mor skyes pa ni/_dang por dge ba spyad pa'i mthu'o/_/bar du srin po'i chung mar gyur nas rang lceb pa ni zhe sdang spyad pa'o/_/tha mar da ltar 
[\[234a.4\]]'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug mar gyur pa ni/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur nas shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa srung ba ni sngon shAkya thub pa la sdig bshags byas kyi smon lam btab bo/_/khol mo re ma ti sngags kyi bsod nams las grub 
[\[234a.5\]]pa'o/_/mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_gsang ba'i bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye bcom ldan mgon po gsang ba'i 
[\[234a.6\]]bdag_/ma 'ongs phyi ma'i sems can rnams/_/mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor rab bsgrub pa'i/_/slob dpon slob ma'i mtshan ma'i rgyud/_/gang yin bdag gis nyan par 'tshal/_/zhes zhus pa'i tshe/_gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/_/
[\[234a.7\]]dpal ldan lha mo rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/_/thun mong ma yin kun gyis bya ba min/_/de yang slob dpon mtshan nyid bshad/_/slob dpon chos la rab 'dud pa/_/tshad med bzhir ldan snying rje can/_/phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang thob nas/_/
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]dam tshig srog bzhin 'dzin byed cing /_/bden pa gnyis rtogs lta ba can/_/sngags dang phyag rgya mi spong zhing /_/rtag tu phyag rgya che la gnas/_/sems can don byed man ngag ldan/_/de ni slob dpon mtshan nyid de/_/slob 
[\[234b.2\]]ma dul la dad pa can/_/bla ma'i zhabs la rab 'dud cing /_/dad dang gtong phod snying rje can/_/'dul dang sdom pa dam tshig 'dzin/_/lha dang slob dpon rtag tu bcang /_/gsang sngags 'dzin pa'i snod ldan la/_/slob mar bya ba 
[\[234b.3\]]nga yis bshad/_/dpal mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las slob dpon dang slob ma'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces 
[\[234b.4\]]gsol to/_/rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' bo che/_/dus mtha'i rnal 'byor bskyang slad du/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i mkha' 'gro ma'i/_/lta ba dam pa bdag nyan 'tshal/_/zhes zhus pa'i tshe/_dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/_bdag 
[\[234b.5\]]dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i/_/gdod nas ma skyes gzung 'dzin yul dang bral/_/nga dang bdag 'dzin mtshan ma'i rtog pa bcom/_/don dam kun rdzob skye ba med pa'i gzhi/_/gnyis med chos kyi dbyings su dbyer med cing /_/stong nyid 
[\[234b.6\]]chos sku nam mkha' ye shes lnga/_/sprul pa'i phyag rgya lha dang lha mo'i mtshan mar snang /_/mkha' la 'ja' 'dra rang bzhin ga la yod/_/snying rje'i dbang gis 'gro don byed pa na/_/mdor na sangs rgyas sprul pa yin pa ste/_/khol mo byang 
[\[234b.7\]]chub sems dpa'i sprul pa'o/_/mtshan ma'i srin mo bdud mor blta mi bya/_/mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]to/_/gsang ba'i bdag po ye nas thugs rje can/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum gyi rgyud bshad 'tshal/_/zhes zhus pa'i tshe/_phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/_brgya 
[\[235a.2\]]byin la sogs 'khor rnams rab tu nyon/_/dkyil 'khor rnam gsum mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ni/_/rang bzhin dkyil 'khor byang shar ri rab rtse/_/ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor sems kyi yul/_/gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor 
[\[235a.3\]]gnas bzhi'i sa la bya/_/tshon rtsi mi rus ldong ros rams dang skyegs/_/mthing nag gru bzhi'i dbus ni e gru gsum/_/dbus su gtso bo phyag na rdo rje ste/_/de yi g.yas su lha mo nag mo ste/_/g.yon du ma mo'i 
[\[235a.4\]]ting 'dzin grub pa mo/_/gtso bo'i mdun du khol mo re ma ti/_/de yi phyi rim srid pa'i ma mo dang /_/stag spyang bya rgod seng ge khyung gis bskor/_/phyi rim thod phreng me ri keng rus bri/_/tsa ka li 'am yig 'bru phyag mtshan 
[\[235a.5\]]bri/_/mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye 'jigs byed che mchog 'gro 
[\[235a.6\]]kun 'dul ba'i gtso/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro nag mo dam pa yi/_/dngos grub bsgrub pa'i rdzas rnams gang lags pa'i/_/gsang ba'i bdag po bdag la bshad du gsol/_/zhes zhus pa dang /_phyag na rdo rjes bka' 
[\[235a.7\]]stsal pa/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dngos grub 'dod pa'i mis/_/rdzas rnams med na dngos grub mi thob ste/_/rmongs pas sa bon gtsub shing gtsub stan 'dra/_/kun ka tshang na dngos grub mtshan ma ster/_/mkha' 'gro ma la rdzas 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]ni rnam pa bdun/_/bod pa'i rdzas dang ma mo bsten rdzas dang /_/mchod pa'i rdzas dang dam tshig bsre ba'i rdzas/_/bskul ba'i rdzas dang mtshan ma dbab pa'i rdzas/_/tha mar gnad la 'bebs shing bzlog pa'i rdzas/_/bdun po 'di tshang grub pa'i mtshan ma 
[\[235b.2\]]'byung /_/gtso bo phyag na rdo rje'i dam rdzas ni/_/go ro tsa na gtso bo bod pa'i rdzas/_/gtso bo'i rten ni seng ldeng mi rus phur/_/gsal ba lnga dang bdud rtsis gtso bo mchod/_/dam tshig bcu yis rdo rje sa ni mchod/_/gu gul nag po yungs nag 
[\[235b.3\]]til gyis bsku/_/spos dang lce bog mi tshil mtshan ma 'bebs/_/gtso bo gnad la 'bebs pa a mr-i ta/_/dpal ldan lha mo nag mo'i bod rdzas ni/_/g.yab dar dang ni ha sta mi tshil dang /_/cong zhun spos lngas bsregs la bod/_/lha 
[\[235b.4\]]mo'i rten ni bu mo gtsang ma dang /_/rgya mtshor shi ba'i bud med thod pa gnyis/_/mkhar du brtsigs la dkyil 'khor dbus su kha sprad la/_/mi gsod mtshon gyi ral gri sor brgyad pa/_/yu ba ma bris dkyil 'khor dbus su gzugs/_/
[\[235b.5\]]rma bya seng ge g.yang gzhi go zung nag pa'o/_/rje mo lha mo nag mo'i dam rdzas ni/_/dge slong sha dang mi ro seng ge'i snying /_/gri rgod sha dang dbang po rnam pa lnga/_/ru tra nag po'i snying dang bdud rtsi lnga/_/sman ma'i khrag dang sha khrag 
[\[235b.6\]]sna tshogs dang /_/phye ma lnga yis gtong bas gur kum brdzi/_/pad+ma'i rak+tas byugs la rgyun gtor bya/_/lha mo nag mo 'di dang dam tshig bsre ba'i rdzas/_/ru hi rdo rje pad+ma mi de sngags/_/bskul rdzas mi yi tshil dang gu gul bsreg_/mtshan 
[\[235b.7\]]ma 'bebs pa bu mo gtsang ma'o/_/gnad la 'bebs shing bzlog pa yugs sa'i rkang /_/khol mo re ma ti yi bod rdzas ni/_/dred mo'i ral pas g.yab cing srin lag bstan/_/gu gul dang ni mi tshil gsur gyis bod/_/re ma ti yi rten du lug nag gam/_/de mo nag mo dri mo'i thod pa'o/_/
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]khol mo re ma ti yi mchod rdzas ni/_/bum pa gang ba'i khrag dang a mr-i ta/_/nal bu'i sha dang mi sha chang phud do/_/dam tshig bsre zhing rtag tu mchod pa'i rdzas/_/ru hi rdo rje pad+ma dag gis shis/_/bskul rdzas gu gul 
[\[236a.2\]]nag dang cong zi'o/_/mtshan ma 'bebs pa bu mo gtsang ma'o/_/gnad la 'bebs shing bzlog rdzas dre'u yi rkang /_/'di rnams gtsang zhing ma nyams tshogs 'gyur na/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs rnams ni/_/bung bas 
[\[236a.3\]]u dum bA ra mthong ba ltar/_/dga' ba skyes nas mi la dngos grub ster/_/de bas nan tan bskyed la brtson par bya/_/mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las dpon g.yog gi dam rdzas bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//
[\[236a.4\]]de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye gsang bdag phyag na rdo rje 'dul ba'i gtso/_/bsgrub pa'i rten gyi rdo rje mkha' 'gro sku/_/thang ka 'dri ba'i nan tan 'dri bar 'tshal/_/zhes zhus 
[\[236a.5\]]pa'i tshe/_gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/_mkha' 'gro'i rten gyi sku gzugs ni/_/mis ma 'phrigs par dur khrod 'gro/_/dang po phyag na rdo rje dang /_lha mo'i bsnyen pa 'bum 'bum bzlas/_/de la sbyin sreg gtor ma 'bul/_/ri mo 
[\[236a.6\]]mkhan la dbang bskur ro/_/dam tshig rab tu sbyin par bya/_/de nas bud med zhabs ma dang /_/ro dkris dag gi ras dag ni/_/ro bsregs mgal ba'i shing gis kyang /_/bri ba'i tshon rtsi rnam pa lnga/_/dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i 'phro 'du las/_/rgyal ba 
[\[236a.7\]]rigs lngar byin brlabs la/_/dbus su phyag na rdo rje bri/_/mdun du lha mo nag mo ni/_/bong zhon ral gri thogs par bri/_/g.yon du khol mo re ma ti/_/dre'u zhon khram bam thogs pa'o/_/g.yas su bram ze mchog sred ni/_/mgrin pa sma ra dkar 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]la ring /_/kr-iSh+Na'i stan la long phreng 'dzin/_/rma bya ne'u le thogs pa'o/_/de yi g.yon du bdag nyid ni/_/kriSh+Na'i stan la long phreng 'dzin/_/rma bya'i spu dang ne'u le thogs/_/de nas rang gi srin khrag gis/_/sku gzugs rnams kyi spyan 
[\[236b.2\]]phye la/_/mdun du gtor ma'i sbyin sreg dbul/_/zhabs la btud de phyag byas la/_/dngos grub gang 'dod gsol ba gdab/_/dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs su gsol/_/lha yi sku yi thugs kar ni/_/srin lag khrag gis 
[\[236b.3\]]zla kham bri/_/de yi dbus su snying po bri/_/de'i dbus rgyus chen sum sgril gdags/_/rtse mo bdag bzung bzlas pa bya/_/yang na lugs ma dag la bya/_/de ltar byas na dngos grub rgyu/_/mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud 
[\[236b.4\]]las sku gzugs bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_gsang ba'i bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye gsang mdzad drag po hU~M mdzad che/_/dpal ldan 
[\[236b.5\]]rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i/_/ting 'dzin bsgom thabs bdag la shod/_/ces gsol pa dang /_phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin nyon cig_/skye ba med pa'i ngang las sprul pa'i cho 'phrul ni/_/hU~M las 
[\[236b.6\]]rdo rje rtse ni lnga pa ste/_/de nas bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje yin/_/mdog ljang sngo la khro bo'i cha byad de/_/lus 'gying bag can/_/dbu skra ral pa gyen la brdzes pa la/_rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can/_phyag na ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa 
[\[236b.7\]]'bar ba/_lus la glang chen gyi ko ba dang /_mchog gi g.yang gzhi dang /_stag gi sham thabs dang /_thod pa'i phreng ba dang /_sbrul gyi chun pos lus brgyan pa/_spyan mig dmar ba/_mche ba gtsigs pa/_
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]bskal pa'i me dpung ltar 'bar ba'o/_/de'i mdun du dpal lha mo nag mo bskyed de/_ma hA kA li bA ya be s+pha ra Na yang /_de ni rlung nag tshub ma'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'o/_/ma hA kA li dz+wa la ra~M/_de ni me'i 
[\[237a.2\]]dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'o/_/de'i dbus su b+h+rU~M bi shwa bi shud+d+he ka pA la hU~M/_de ni thod pa'i gzhal yas khang ngo /_/gar+b+ha pa hU~M/_de ni bong bu dmar gwa la mig mjug ma na yod pa/_rlung gi gshog pa can no/_/ti ra ba~M/_bong bu'i 
[\[237a.3\]]thog tu zhing bsnol ba'o/_/ma sU r+ya maN+Da la a/_nyi zla'i gdan no/_/b+h+yo nag mo'i 'phro 'du las/_lha mo'i ting nge 'dzin/_o~M de bI shrI ma hA kA lI hU~M zhes pa la/_rang gi byang chub kyi sems la/_/lha mo nag mo ni kha dog nag 
[\[237a.4\]]mo la/_ral ba gting za pang du 'dug pa/_mig rtsa dmar ba kha gdangs pa/_mche ba gtsigs pa/_lus la sbrul dang /_thod pas brgyan pa/_lag na ral gri dang /_ne'u le thogs pa'o/_/thal ba dang khrag dang zhag 
[\[237a.5\]]gis mtshon pa'o/_/rna rgyan dril bu dang seng ge la byas pa/_nyi ma dang zla bas lus brgyan pa'o/_/sku smad glang gi ko bas brgyan pa'o/_/rkang pa la lcags sgrog gis brgyan pa'o/_/lha mo de'i spyan sngar re ma ti khol mo bskyed de/_/ya~M bA 
[\[237a.6\]]ya be rlung gi tshub ma'o/_/b+h+rU~M bi ha ra Na hU~M/_rin po che'i gzhal yas khang ngo /_/de'i nang du ka pA la b+h+rU~M las thod pa'i gzhal yas khang ngo /_/de'i nang rti r+hi sti bru~M las 'phrul gyi lding khang ngo /_/de'i nang du khang pa bdun bskyed do/_/de'i nang du 
[\[237a.7\]]dre'u rlung gi gshog pa can bskyed do/_/de'i steng du bse'i gdan no/_/de'i steng du ma nag mo'i 'phro 'du las/_/rak+sha re ma ti hU~M zhes pa las/_bdud kyi bu mo re ma ti de nag mo ral pa kham pa la/_me stag dang rin po ches brgyan pa'o/_/mig dmar 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]ba mche ba gtsigs pa/_/re lde nag po dang mi lpags gyon pa/_lag pa na khram bam dang /_shod rde'u thogs pa'i sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang /_nyi zla'i thod gdengs dang /_nad kyi kha rlangs can/_stag gi sham bu dang /_zangs kyi dra ba 
[\[237b.2\]]dang /_mtshon gyi gru gu dang ldan pa rnams bskyed do/_/b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo zhes brjod pa las/_'khor nag mo 'bum bskyed do/_/dpal me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas lta'i dbang 
[\[237b.3\]]po brgya byin gyis/_dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/mnyam nyid rdo rje'i sku bsnyems gsang ba'i lha/_/mtshan ma 'joms pa'i dpa' brtan drag shul can/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro me lce phreng ba yi/_/srog snying bsgrub pa'i sngags rnams bshad 
[\[237b.4\]]par zhu/_/zhes gsol pa dang /_dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/_sngags zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro'i srog rtsa yin/_/grangs kyang mang la zur yang ma chag ste/_/gug skyed tsheg drag dag kyang ma nor na/_/lha mo nag mo sngon du 'gugs pa yin/_/zhes bka' stsal 
[\[237b.5\]]pa dang /_dpal phyag na rdo rje de/_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/_dpal phyag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po 'di thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/o~M badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M/_gtso bo phyag na rdo rje'i bsnyen pa 'di sngon du 'bum tsho bdun du bzlas pa byas la/_gtor 
[\[237b.6\]]ma dang ni sbyin sreg gis mchod de/_/des ni phyag na rdo rje'i grub pa thob/_/lha mo bkug cing dbang du byed par nus/_/de nas gdod cig lha mo'i sngags la 'jug_/sngags ni dpon mo'i snying dang g.yog mo'i srog_/mngon du 'gugs 
[\[237b.7\]]pa srog gi snying po'i sngags/_/gtso bo'i spyan 'dren g.yog mo 'gugs pa'i sngags/_/mi g.yo brtan pa rdo rje gdan gyi sngags/_/mnyes par bya phyir gtor ma dbul ba'i sngags/_/ging du dbang bskur dam la gdags pa'i sngags/_/
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]mngag zhugs phan gnod las la bskul ba'i sngags/_/mi bya dbang med gnad la 'bebs pa'i sngags/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub blang ba'i sngags/_/zhabs la 'dud pa'i slob ma dbang bskur sngags/_/lha dang bgegs kyi nyams len brtag 
[\[238a.2\]]pa'i sngags/_/brda dang mchod pa rdo rje gsang ba'i sngags/_/bar chod mtshan ma ngan pa bzlog pa'i sngags/_/bcu gnyis rdo rje'i gsang sngags bstan par bya/_/dpal lha mo nag mo'i srog snying la/_/o~M ru ru be ti sta ba do si/_ru ru ro ru be tiSh+Ta ba do si/_pa tsa la a shug me 
[\[238a.3\]]hU~M b+h+yo dzaH/_khol mo re ma ti'i srog snying la/_o~M ru ru ro ru/_hu tiSh+Ta ba to si/_rag mo tsit+ta kha rag mo hU~M b+h+yo/_ma ma trag rak+Sha/_kha mun+t+ra ba tra ba trag rak+Sha tsit+ta kha rag ma/_re ma ti sam ya/_pra ma ma hA ste pra dun b+h+yo ru lu ru lu b+h+yo dzA dzA/_de ni srog las 'dren pa'i sngags yin te/_
[\[238a.4\]]sa ya bzlas na ma mo mngon du yong /_/bye ba bzlas na phyag rgya ston par byed/_/'bum phrag gis kyang dngos grub mtshan ma ster/_/khol mo'i snying po bzlas ma thog nas 'ong /_/sa ma ya du ling rak+sha si/_he rak+Sha/_b+h+yo rak+Sha/_du~M rak+Sha mA rAk+Sha si/_mA mA mA mA/_ru lu ru lu/_
[\[238a.5\]]ru lu ru lu/_b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/_ru ru ru ru/_de ni 'khor ma mo 'bum gyi spyi'i snying po'o/_/o~M ma hA kA li maN+Da la ma tre/_A gats+tsha ya/_A gats+tsha ya/_pra be sha ya/_pra be sha ya/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_a ba lo ka/_a ba lo ka ye/_hU~M dzaH/_de ni spyan drang ba'i sngags so/_/o~M ma hA kA 
[\[238a.6\]]li ma ma sa ma ya/_shi ti tiSh+Tha s+t+wa~M/_ma hA kA li A be sha ya/_re ma ti sa ma ya be sa/_de ni gdan gding ba'i sngags so/_/a maN+Ta bi ma hA kA li re ma ti ba liM kha kha khA hi khA hi/_ma hA pU dza hoH/_a mr-i ta kha kha le le/_de ni gtor ma 'bul ba'i sngags so/_/ma ma sa ma 
[\[238a.7\]]ya ma hA kA li sa ma ya/_ma hA kA li kA ya sa ma ya/_ma hA kA li bA ga sa ma ya/_ma hA kA li tsit+ta sa ma ya/_ma hA mu tra ka pA la hU~M/_de ni dam tshig bstan pa'i sngags so/_/o~M badzra dzo gi ni ti bi ma hA kA li sa ma ya/_badzra kro d+ha karma rak+Sha hU~M/_de ni las la bskul ba'i 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]sngags so/_/o~M ru ru ru tsa hU~M/_a shug me ba tri ru tra kha sha la nag mo hU~M/_rak+Sha tsit+ta ma hA sa mA d+hi/_ma ru kha tsit+ta nan/_rag mo ti ki ma dzaH/_ma ma ti ti hU~M b+h+yo/_de ni dpon g.yog gnad nas bskul ba'i sngags so/_/o~M badzra DA ki ni de ba ma hA kA la re ma ti/_kA la wA ka tsid+d+hi sa ma ya 
[\[238b.2\]]pha la A be sha ya a/_de ni dngos grub blang ba'i sngags so/_/o~M ma hA kA li ye hU~M phaT/_ru ru tsa pa la a shug me hU~M ma hA kA li a b+hi Shiny+tsa/_ka bA la tri ni/_ma hA dz+nyA na/_kA ya wA ka tsit+ta sid+d+hi hU~M/_de ni dbang bskur ba'i sngags so/_/hring hring tsa miN+Di gurtse hU~M/_de ni nyams len brtag 
[\[238b.3\]]pa'i sngags so/_/hU~M phaT/_ma hA de bi kA li duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hu lu nan/_da ha pa tsa mA ra ya hU~M phaT/_de ni mtshan ma ngan pa bzlog pa'i sngags so/_/hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_hring hring hring hring hring hring hring hring /_ta ki ta ki ta ki ta ki ta ki ta ki ta ki ta ki/_bru~M gem bru~M gem 
[\[238b.4\]]bru~M gem bru~M gem bru~M gem bru~M gem bru~M gem/_hU~M du~M hU~M du~M hU~M du~M hU~M du~M hU~M du~M hU~M du~M hU~M du~M/_phaT ta ka phaT ta ka phaT ka phaT ka phaT ka phaT ka phaT ka/_de ni rdo rje ma hA mkha' 'gro ma'i rnga sgra'o/_/mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[238b.5\]]lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan mgon po rgyal tshab las kyi lha/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rnal 'byor ma'i/_/gsang ba'i phyag rgya bdag la bstan par 'tshal/_/zhes zhus pa dang /_phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/_rnal 'byor 
[\[238b.6\]]gsang ba'i phyag rgya dam pa ni/_/spang bar mi bya rtag tu bcang bar bya'o/_/dang po gtso bo rdo rje rgyal la gnas/_/rlung gis me sbar bong zhon dbang phyug ma/_/lcags kyus bzung nas gshog pas zil gyis gnon/_/bong bus gdan 'dings thod pas dbang bskur te/_/thod rlon 
[\[238b.7\]]dam brtan gnyis med dngos grub blang /_/rtag tu mtshan ma ngan pa phyag rgyas bzlog_/dang po gtso bo rdo rje rtse lnga ni/_/lag gnyis sor mo rgyab tu bsnol bcangs la/_/mthe bong gung mo mthe'u chung gshibs la bsgreng /_/rdo rje rtse lnga phyag na rdo rje'i rgya'o/_/dang po rlung nag tshub 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]ma'i phyag rgya ni/_/lag na thal sbyar gung sprod bsgreng ba dang /_/mthe chung srin lag tshigs bsnol bgrad pa dang /_/de [{]brkyang ma[,]rkyang ma[}]the bong gung gtad mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng rdzong /_/rtse mo bkug pa rlung gi phyag rgya'o/_/me ri smug nag 'bar ba'i phyag rgya ni/_/
[\[239a.2\]]mdzub mo gnyis ni sor mo dgug byas te/_/mthe bong bkug ste de la gtad byas la/_/gung mo mthe'u chung bsgreng ste phyar ba'o/_/lha mo nag mo'i ral gri'i phyag rgya ni/_/lag g.yas mthe'u chung bkug ste mthe bos mnan/_/gung mdzub srin lag gshibs te bsgreng ba'o/_/
[\[239a.3\]]khol mo re ma ti yi phyag rgya ni/_/lag pa g.yas bkug mthe bos mnan byas te/_/lhag ma gsum brkyang bas ni khram bam phyag rgya yin/_/ma mo dgug pa lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ni/_/lag gnyis rgyab sprad mthe'u chung bsgreng nas ni/_/mdzub mo gnyis bkug gung srin mthe bos 
[\[239a.4\]]bsdu/_/brkyang ste phral nas snying gar lcags kyu gnyis/_/zil gyis mnan pa khyung gshog phyag rgya ni/_/mthe bong gnyis gshibs sor mo gshog ltar brkyang /_/gdan mchog bong bu dag gi phyag rgya ni/_/mthe'u chung bsnol bas srin lag mnan byas te/_/srin lag thor 
[\[239a.5\]]to mthe bos mnan pa'o/_/de bzhin gung mo gnyis kyang nang du bstan/_/byin brlabs dbang bskur thod phreng phyag rgya ni/_/lag pa g.yas g.yon khu tshur bcangs pa la/_/mtheb mdzub bzhi po lcags sgrog lta bur sbrel/_/lag gnyis thod rlon dam tshig phyag rgya ni/_/mthe 
[\[239a.6\]]bong mdzub mo bkug nas bzlum byas te/_bkug nas srin lag gnyis bcug mig 'bras 'dra/_/gung mo mthe'u chung gnyis ni thod rlon kha/_/dngos grub blang ba'i bdud rtsi bum pa ni/_/lag gnyis sor bcu rtse bsdus bkug la zlum/_/mtshan ngan bzlog pa tri shUl phyag 
[\[239a.7\]]rgya ni/_/lag g.yas mtheb mdzub srin lag mthil du dgug_/mthe bo gung mo mthe'u chung phyar la bsgreng /_/mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las phyag rgya bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]skad ces gsol to/_/kye stobs po che la gnod sbyin grags pa can/_/rig sngags gsang sngags tshogs kyi mnga' bdag gis/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/_/mchod pa'i rim pa bdag la bshad du gsol/_/zhes zhus pa la/_gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' 
[\[239b.2\]]stsal pa/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dngos grub myur bya'i phyir/_/mnyes par byas te mchod pa rtag tu 'bul/_/dang por mchod pa'i rdzas kyi gtor ma 'bul/_/gnyis pa la ni sbyin sreg dbul ba'o/_/de bzhin gsum pa gsang ba'i mchod pa dbul/_/dang por gtor ma 
[\[239b.3\]]sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga/_/mchod pa'i rdzas dang dza gad rak+ta rnams/_/pad+ma mdzes pa'i snod du bkang byas nas/_/rlung gis me sbar a yis thod pa bskol/_/hU~M gi rdo rjes rab tu dkrugs nas kyang /_/a dkar 'bar bas kha zas dug bcom la/_/dpa' bo 'bru lngas bdud rtsir 
[\[239b.4\]]byin gyis brlabs/_/dang pos gtso bo phyag na rdo rje mchod/_/gnyis pas lha mos 'thungs par bsam/_/tha ma re ma ti yis rngubs par bsgom/_/o~M badzra pA Ni hU~M/_DA ki nI ma hA kA li/_yak+sha re ma ti/_ma ma sha tru~M a mu ka/_ma tsa me ta ba sam sa/_ru ti dzi ba~M/_prI ya beg+shi ni/_
[\[239b.5\]]i da~M ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_kha kha kha kha/_khA hi khA hi/_gsang sngags des ni rtag tu gtor ma dbul ba'o/_/de nas sbyin sreg dbul ba bstab par bya/_/sku gzugs mdun du me thab bskor byas te/_/'o ma tsher ma yod pa'i shing brtsigs la/_/bram ze khyim nas me blangs me sbar 
[\[239b.6\]]la/_/bsreg rdzas mi sha mar nag sbrang rtsi chang /_/khrag la sbyar la khri phrag gcig tu dbul/_/bsgom thabs me nyid me lhar skyes zhon pa la/_/phyag bzhi g.yas na dbyug pa dang ni mchod sbyin no/_/g.yon na g+hun+d+he dang ni bgrang phreng rab tu 'dzin/_/de yi snying gar phyag 
[\[239b.7\]]na rdo rje dang /_/lha mo nyid dang khol mo re ma ti/_/gsal bar bskyed la sbyin sreg dbul bar bya'o/_/gnyis pa gtso bo phyag na rdo rje mchod/_/gsum pas lha mo nag mo de la dbul/_/de bzhin tha mas re ma ti la mchod/_/so so'i snying po bzlas shing dbul 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]bar bya'o/_/o~M badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M/_ma hA de bi kA li hU~M/_yak+Sha re ma ti hU~M/_ag+na ye ha bya ka bya/_ma hA ti ba ti ba ti bya/_sarba duSh+TA na bak+sha ni kha ra~M khA hi swA hA/_de nas thal ba dur khrod du bskyal/_/de nas gsang ba'i mchod pas rab bshad bya/_/dngos la 
[\[240a.2\]]mkha' 'gro gsal lam ting 'dzin la/_/gsang ba ye shes hU~M dang a~M gnyis la/_/rdo rje pad+mas rab tu dkrugs nas kyang /_/zla bas mkha' 'gro rab tu mnyes 'gyur te/_/thugs kyi thig les bdag gi gzi byin bskyed/_/thugs kyi dngos grub dam pa'i man ngag go/_/ma hA 
[\[240a.3\]]kA li sa ma ya bo d+hi tsit+ta/_ma hA pu dza gu h+ya s+t+wa~M spro ba'o/_/ma hA kA li sa ma ya/_ma hA rak+ta gu h+ya s+t+wa~M/_A pe sha a/_bsdu ba'o/_/mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las mchod pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin des/_/dpal phyag na rdo rje la 
[\[240a.4\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/ye shes lngar ldan dpa' brtan thugs rje can/_/dpal ldan mi bskyod rdo rje sems dpa' khyod/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yi dngos grub ni/_/srog dang 'dra ba'i dam tshig bdag nyan 'tshal/_/zhes gsol pa dang /_dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' 
[\[240a.5\]]stsal ba/_mkha' 'gro ma yi dam tshig ni/_/gsang ba'i phyag rgya 'da' dka' ba/_/mi shigs rgyal pos dbang bskur te/_/rdo rje mtshan ma 'joms pa'i rgyu/_/dam tshig de nyid rab bshad bya/_/'das na rdo rje dmyal ba'o/_/ma 'das dngos grub dam pa'i rgyu/_/gtso 
[\[240a.6\]]bo phyag na rdo rje dang /_/lha mo nag mo dpon g.yog la/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni/_/gtso bo'i sku yi dam tshig ni/_/sku yi phyag rgya mi spong zhing /_/lha dang slob dpon mnyes par bya/_/rdo rje spun la gdung ba bskyed/_/gtso bo'i gsung gi dam tshig ni/_/bzlas brjod 
[\[240a.7\]]snying po rgyun mi gcod/_/mi yengs rdzun spangs gsang sngags 'dzin/_/gtso bo'i thugs kyi dam tshig ni/_/gsang ba gzhan la mi spel zhing /_/stan gan 'bras bu lnga la spyod/_/de nas gtso mo'i dam tshig bshad/_/lha mo'i sku yi dam tshig ni/_/bong bu la ni byams 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]par bya/_/khal gyis mi mnan dbyug mi brdeg_/rma bya'i mdongs ni rtag tu bcang /_/me yi dkyil 'khor mthong ba na/_/me tog skyes ltar dga' bar bya/_/rtag tu yi dam mi 'da' ba'i/_/zhag re phyag rgya gnyis gnyis bstan/_/lha mo gsung gi dam tshig ni/_/rgyun du 
[\[240b.2\]]bzlas pa byed pa dang /_/ne'u le mthong na bstod pa bya/_/phyag rgya bstan zhing dga' bar bya/_/zhing pags rdzas kyi snod du bya/_/tshub ma dag dang phrad gyur na/_/rked par mi gcod rgyab mi bstan/_/tshes grangs shis dang nam gung la/_/phyag rgya bya zhing bstod pa bya/_/lha mo'i 
[\[240b.3\]]thugs kyi dam tshig ni/_/'jig rten gang dang gang dag na/_/bud med yugs sa yod pa la/_/byams par bya zhing chags pa spyad/_/rtag tu bu mo gtsang ma bsten/_/lha mo zla mtshan rgyu dus su/_/gsang ba'i mchod bas dam bsre'o/_/lha mo'i khol mo re ma ti'i/_/de yi sku 
[\[240b.4\]]yi dam tshig ni/_/byis pa dag gi nal phrug la/_/gos dang kha zas mgron du sbyin/_/rtag par de la byams par bya/_/shing lo sor bzhi rked par gcad/_/phyed la ma mo'i sku bris te/_/phyed la dngos grub gsol bar bri/_/de ni rtag tu bcang ba'o/_/khol mo gsung gi dam tshig 
[\[240b.5\]]ni/_/ma phebs bar du srog snying dang /_/nub re gtor ma 'dar mi rung /_/kha 'phro dag kyang bsre ba min/_/phreng ba la yang reg pa bsrung /_/bdag gis dgra la byad byas te/_/phyis ni bcos par ma bshad do/_/khas blangs yol du ga la rung /_/phud kyang nyams par bya ba 
[\[240b.6\]]min/_/rdo sol chur ni bskyur mi bya/_/khol mo thugs kyi dam tshig ni/_/nal bu yod pa'i sbrum ma la/_/me tog gtor zhing byams par bya/_/kha zas sbyin zhing dang na mi bgrang /_/sna khrag zla mtshan blang bar bya/_/dam tshig yod rung med rung ste/_/bdag ma yin pa'i rnal 
[\[240b.7\]]'byor la/_/rang gi lha dang snying po dang /_/rdzas dang phyag rgya mi bstan no/_/mtshan ma rdo sol zhu bas bsku/_/bya nag lug nag rtag tu bcang /_/the tshom zar ni mi rung ngo /_/dpon g.yog spyi yi dam tshig ni/_/ru hi rdo rje pad+ma'i mi/_/rtag tu bcangs la bstan cing mchod/_/
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]de dang bral du mi rung ngo /_/rnal 'byor dngos grub thob bya'i phyir/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig bstan/_/brgya byin dag gis rab zhus pa/_/dam tshig nyams pa'i skyon ni gang /_/dam tshig bsrungs pa'i yon tan gang /_/'byung po'i gtso bos bshad 
[\[241a.2\]]du gsol/_/phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/_/rab tu bshad kyis brgya byin nyon/_/gtso bo phyag na rdo rje yi/_/sku yi dam tshig nyams pa na/_/mtho ris go 'phang rgyud lam 'chad/_/gsung gi dam tshig nyams pa na/_/bsgrubs kyang dngos grub mi 'thob cing /_/sngags la nus 
[\[241a.3\]]mthu med par ro/_/thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa na/_/mkha' 'gro'i chad pas rab bcad nas/_/nges par rdo rje dmyal bar skye/_/dngos grub med par bar chod 'byung /_/dpal ldan lha mo nag mo yi/_/sku yi dam tshig nyams pa na/_/rgyal po'i chad dang sbrul gdug dang /_/
[\[241a.4\]]me dang chu yi bar du chod/_/gsung gi dam tshig nyams pa na/_/bsgrub la g.yel zhing nus mthu med/_/bsgrub pa rtsom res bar chod 'ong /_/thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa na/_/nyams len 'ong zhing rims nad 'ong /_/khol mo bdud mo re ma ti'i/_/sku yi dam tshig
