[\[241a.5\]]nyams gyur na/_/'khor la rims nad smyo 'bog 'ong /_/dgra rnams tshe dang bsod nams 'phel/_/gsung gi dam tshig nyams pa na/_/bu dang chung ma 'chi ba dang /_/snying mi dga' zhing kha yang yo/_/nor dang longs spyod zad par 'gyur/_/thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa 
[\[241a.6\]]na/_/rang gi tshe la bar chod 'ong /_/mdze dang rgyu gzer na zhing 'bog_/spyi yi dam tshig nyams pa na/_/rtag par bsgrubs kyang 'grub dus med/_/rtag par dgra dang mi 'bral lo/_/yang ni lha dbang brgya byin nyon/_/dam tshig bsrung ba'i yon tan la/_/gtso bo phyag na rdo rje yi/_/
[\[241a.7\]]sku yi dam tshig ma nyams na/_/bla med byang chub go 'phang 'thob/_/gsung gi dam tshig ma nyams na/_/phyag na rdo rje'i zhal mthong nas/_/rdo rje'i ngag la dbang thob 'gyur/_/thugs kyi dam tshig ma nyams na/_/phrin las rnam bzhi mngon du 'grub/_/mkha' 'gro ma 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]rnams mngon du 'khol/_/mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsams pas 'grub/_/dpal ldan lha mo nag mo yi/_/sku yi dam tshig ma nyams na/_/lha srin pho mos phyag byed de/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi rgyal srid thob/_/gsung gi dam tshig ma nyams na/_/sngags bzlas 
[\[241b.2\]]mkha' 'gro mngon du 'ong /_/bar chad med par dngos grub ster/_/thugs kyi dam tshig ma nyams na/_/bdud dang dgra yis mi tshugs shing /_/rtag tu rims nad mi 'byung zhing /_/dgra rnams the tshom med par 'chi/_/lha mi yongs kyis bkur bar 'gyur/_/tshe 
[\[241b.3\]]ring nor dang ldan par 'gyur/_/de nas nag mo re ma ti'i/_/sku yi dam tshig ma nyams na/_/'khor ni bkra shis dar zhing rgyas/_/dgra dang bgegs rnams phung bar byed/_/gsung gi dam tshig ma nyams na/_/bu dang chung ma dar ba dang /_/nor dang longs spyod rgyas par 
[\[241b.4\]]'gyur/_/mig rnon rkang mgyogs ro langs 'grub/_/thugs kyi dam tshig ma nyams na/_/tshe ring grags pa thob pa dang /_/lus la chad kyis mi thebs shing /_/sems la sdug bsngal med par 'gyur/_/mthu rtsal chen po thob par 'gyur/_/spyi yi dam 
[\[241b.5\]]tshig ma nyams na/_/gtso bo phyag na rdo rje dang /_/lha mo nag mo dpon g.yog kun/_/rtag tu bdag dang mi 'bral lo/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i don de 'grub/_/gang ltar mngag pa'i las de byed/_/mkha' 'gro me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las/_dam tshig gi 
[\[241b.6\]]le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/hU~M mdzad hU~M gi rgyal po rdo rje che/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i drod tshad mtshan ma shod/_/ces zhus pa dang /_dpal phyag na rdo 
[\[241b.7\]]rjes bka' stsal pa/_/skyes bu blo ldan man ngag rtsal can gyis/_/gsang sngags ting 'dzin phyag rgyar rab ldan na/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i grub rtags 'di ltar 'byung /_/grub rtags phyi nang gsang ba gsum du bshad/_/nang gi grub rtags mig 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]dang rna ba dang /_/sna dang lce dang lus dang snying la 'byung /_/gal te mig gis srid pa gsum mthong na/_/gtso bo phyag na rdo rje'i mtshan ma yin/_/mig gis lha mo mthong na lha mo yin/_/mig ni 'dar zhing 'gul na re ma ti/_/rna bas srid pa gsum po thos na 
[\[242a.2\]]rdo rje 'dzin/_/mkha' 'gros gtam zer thos na lha mos bstan/_/bud med 'brug sgra sgrogs na re ma ti/_/sna la ga bur dri ni rdo rje 'dzin/_/ku mu da yi dri ni lha mo nyid/_/spos sam gur gum bro na re ma ti/_/lce la dam chos 'chad na rdo rje 'dzin/_/lce la gsang sngags 
[\[242a.3\]]zlos na lha mo yin/_/legs nyes mtshan ma smra na re ma ti/_/lus ni 'phro na phyag na rdo rje yin/_/lus las 'od 'byung ba ni lha mo'i rtags/_/lus po 'dar ram skyi sha bung ba dang /_/sha rtsa 'gul na re ma ti yi rtags/_/glal lam skyugs shing mchi ma 'ong ba na/_/lha mo dpon 
[\[242a.4\]]g.yog yo ga phebs pa yin/_/gal te snying gis skye ba dran pa na/_/phyag na rdo rje'i dngos grub mtshan ma'o/_/snying ni dga' la 'tshig na rje mo yin/_/snying 'di khri la 'tshig na khol mo yin/_/da ni gsang ba grub rtags bstan par bya/_/sngags dang ting 'dzin nus pa skyed 
[\[242a.5\]]tsam na/_/rdo rje dbus kyi rtsa yi nam mkha' la/_/byang chub sems kyi dga' bde skye ba na/_/mkha' 'gro rang la shar bar bshad/_/da ni phyi yi grub rtags bstan par bya/_/phyi yi rtags ni rab 'bring tha ma gsum/_/rab ni lha mo nyid kyi sku mthong ste/_/nam mkha'i dbus 
[\[242a.6\]]su phyag na rdo rje mthong /_/bud med dkar mo bzhad cing byung ba na/_/gsang ba'i ye shes dngos grub ster ba'o/_/nag mo ral pa can du byung ba na/_/'dod khams 'dus pa'i mthu rtsal dngos grub bdag la ster/_/dmar mo bse yi ral pa can du byung ba na/_/'jig rten dbang 
[\[242a.7\]]du sdud pa'i dngos grub ster/_/ser mo thod pa'i phreng ba can du byung ba na/_/tshe dang longs spyod rgyas pa'i grub pa ster/_/mkha' 'gro grub rtags 'bring po ni/_/rdo rje nam mkha' las dbab gtso bo yin/_/rje mo lha mo dung skyong grub rtags la/_/rdzas lud dang ni mun pa 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]shin tu nag_/me tog char 'bab 'brug dang rlung dmar dang /_/bud med gzugs dang gzha' tshon ston pa'o/_/khol mo re ma ti yi grub rtags ni/_/'brug dang rlung dmar sgo rdung khang thog 'tsheg_/thibs thibs mnan dang th+wal th+wal smra ba'o/_/grub rtags tha ma rmi lam 
[\[242b.2\]]dag tu ston/_/byang chub sems dpa' rmis na gtso bo yin/_/ma dang sring mo rmis na jo mo yin/_/chung ma khol mo rmis na g.yog mo yin/_/bong bu sha ba rmis na rje mo yin/_/dre'u dang bya nag rmis na khol mo yin/_/ma mo grub nas dbang du 'dus pa na/_/bud med dag 
[\[242b.3\]]gis bdag la phyag 'tshal na/_/'dzum zhing 'khrig go byed pa spyod pa yin/_/ma mo grub nas dbang du ma 'dus na/_/mi sdug gzugs su ston zhing rje mor rdzu/_/gcan gzan zar 'ong ma mo phyag sgugs so/_/dam tshig nyams nas ma mo 'khrugs gyur na/_/ma mo nang 'thabs 
[\[242b.4\]]mtshon gyi char pa 'bab/_/bya nag nang 'thabs khrag gi na bun 'khrigs/_/ltas de mthong na bka' chad 'ong ba'i rtags/_/gal te lte phur nag mo la sogs pa'i/_/dam sri rnams kyis bsgrub par bar gcod na/_/grang la 'khrigs shing khyim du 'gro snying 'dod/_/kha 
[\[242b.5\]]bla smra snying 'dod la khro zhing 'tshig_/bud med rkub dang mo mtshan ston pa rmi/_/gal te gtor ma dus las yol ba na/_/mo mtshan dang ni sngon gyi dbang rtags ston/_/du ba 'khrigs nas bud med glal ba mthong /_/bud med ngu ba mthong na nyams pa gnod/_/mig ni btsums 
[\[242b.6\]]pa ting 'dzin g.yel ba'i rtags/_/thal mo rdeb na dam tshig ma tshang zer/_/lce rtse ston na snying bo chad pa yin/_/so sgra 'khrigs na gzhan dang 'thab mo 'ong /_/rgod pa thos na dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i rtags/_/khro na bar chad 'ong ba sbron pa yin/_/sbyor bar byed na dngos grub 
[\[242b.7\]]ster ba yin/_/rgyang glu len pa mthong na grub thag ring /_/mchi ris ngo la yod na rims nad 'ong /_/gar thabs byed cing byung na ci bsams 'grub/_/gling bu 'bud pa mthong na gtor ma 'dod pa yin/_/phreng ba bgrang ba mthong na sbyin sreg 'dod pa yin/_/kha la 'o byed 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]sbyor ba 'dod pa yin/_/bong bu zhon pa rmis na rje mo yin/_/dre'u zhon pa rmis na khol mo yin/_/snyi sbams thogs pa mthong na rang la chags/_/g.yab dar thogs pa mthong na rang la chags pa'o/_/me long thogs pa mthong na chung ma'i lus la chags/_/
[\[243a.2\]]stang stabs byed pa slob ma'i lus la chags/_/bya dang gcan gzan gtor ma za ba bzang /_/kha rog 'dug na snying po phyag rgya nor/_/'dzum pa mthong na bdag nyid tshe ring rtags/_/gos la me rag yod na slob ma nyams/_/sha ba zhon na nor rnams 'phel ba'i rtags/_/ma mo 
[\[243a.3\]]grub pa'i rtags rnams gang byung yang /_/de nas grub rtags bzang po mthong ba na/_/bdud rtsi bum pa'i phyag rgya bcas la ni/_/dngos grub blang ba'i sngags ni bzlas byas la/_/snying la ci 'dod pa yi dngos grub blang /_/ma dang sring mo khol mo dam la gdags/_/mtshan ma 
[\[243a.4\]]ngan pa dag ni mthong ba na/_/mtshan ma ngan pa bzlog pa'i tri shUl phyag rgya bca'/_/mtshan ma ngan pa bzlog pa sngags kyis bzlog_/gal te bdag ni gzhan du don gnyer na/_/bud med lag na rdzas ni gang ba thogs/_/bya dang gcan gzan mngon du 'gro na bzang /_/de tshe 
[\[243a.5\]]gtor ma phul la don la 'gro/_/spyad stong thogs pa mthong na don mi gnyer/_/grub pa'i drod tshad rnal 'byor spyi la gces/_/mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las drod tshad bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas dpal phyag na rdo rje la/_lha'i 
[\[243a.6\]]dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/thabs dang shes rab mnga' mdzad rdo rje 'dzin/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro bsgrubs kyang ma grub na/_/spobs shing gnad la dbab par zhu/_/zhes gsol pa dang /_dpal ldan phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/_/skyes bu ting 
[\[243a.7\]]'dzin blo ldan rtsal can gyis/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yi gsang sngags gtsor blangs te/_/gang 'dod dngos grub mi thob mi srid do/_/'on kyang bsgrub thag ring ba na/_/de la nyes dmigs rnam pa bzhi/_/sngon gyi las 'phros ma 'brel dang /_/bsnyen pa zhag grangs nyung ba 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]dang /_/bgegs kyis bar du gcod pa dang /_/rnal 'byor dam tshig nyams pa bzhi/_/bsgrub thag ring ba'i rgyu bzhi yin/_/de bzhin mtshan ma ngos bzung ste/_/sngon gyi las 'phros ma 'brel na/_/bsgrubs kyang dngos grub mtshan ma med/_/bzlas brjod bsnyen pa grangs nyung 
[\[243b.2\]]na/_/grub rtags 'ong zhing las mi nyan/_/bgegs kyis bar du gcod pa na/_/snying mi dga' la 'gro zhing 'jigs/_/rnal 'byor dam tshig nyams pa na/_/bar chod rkyen dbang drag po 'byung /_/'on kyang mi gzhag bskyar zhing bsgrub/_/sngon gyi las 'phros ma 'brel na/_/
[\[243b.3\]]dang po bsnyen pa yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]la/_/de nas gnad la dbab pa ni/_/bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor byang shar du/_/dur khrod sa la gru gsum dkyil/_/'phang du khru gang yod pa brtsigs/_/mi yi khrag gis chag chag gdab/_/de nas zhing sogs g.yas pa la/_/lha mo nyid kyi sku bris 
[\[243b.4\]]la/_/rgyus pa'i gzungs thag snying gar gdags/_/gru gsum steng du gan rkyal mnan/_/gzungs thag rtse mo sos bzung la/_/hU~M mdzad chen por gsal bsgoms la/_/ma mo gsod pa'i snying po bzlas/_/rag mo tsit+ta rak+ta sti ra ti ti mA ra ya hU~M/_dzaH/_de skad gsang 
[\[243b.5\]]sngags bzlas nas ni/_/ma mo'i snying khrag rngub par bsgom/_/ma mo bong bur bcas pa rnams/_/ma trang bzhin du 'gyel bar bsam/_/de nas snying gar rdog pas mnan/_/tsit+ta dz+wa la ra~M zhes pas/_/bdag gi zhal nas me byung bas/_/ma mo thul gyis bsregs par 
[\[243b.6\]]bsam/_/ma mo'i sa bon ma~M nag mo/_/bdag gi zhabs 'og rgyud pa las/_/ma ma ru lu zhes brjod pa las/_/bdag nyid dpal gyi zhabs 'og nas/_/lha mo nus pa'i thod phreng can/_/thal mo sbyar nas 'dug par bsgom/_/rta mgrin phyag rgyas dbang du bsdu/_/khyung 
[\[243b.7\]]gshog phyag rgyas zil gyis mnan/_/gnad la gdab pa'i dam rdzas bsreg_/de ltar lan cig bsad pa des/_/gzugs ni rdog pa'i 'og nas dbyung /_/byang shar mtshams su bzhugs su gsol/_/smre bshags bya zhing gdung glu blang /_/bdud rtsi rnam pa 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]lnga yis gso/_/mtshang nas bru zhing gnad nas bskul/_/de nas bsgrub pa bskyar la brtsam/_/the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/_/bsnyen pa zhag grangs nyung ba na/_/mi rus sam ni ru rag sha/_/lung thang dag gi phreng ba la/_/ma yengs grangs kyi bsnyen 
[\[244a.2\]]pa ni/_/'bum tsho bdun du bzlas kyang rung /_/yang na mtshan ma'i bzlas pa shis/_/bgegs kyis bar du gcod pa na/_/gru gsum e dong nag po brko/_/mi khyi phag gi chag chag gdab/_/kham sa rdza yi ling+ga la/_/snying gar dam sri'i ming bris la/_/rabs chad nag 
[\[244a.3\]]po'i thod par gzhug_/thod pa dong gi nang du gzhug_/'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom/_/dam sri bkug cing bstim byas la/_/mi rus sor brgyad phur pa yis/_/mi g.yo mgon por gsal bsgoms gdab/_/mtshan ma ngan pa bzlog sngags bzlas/_/de steng 
[\[244a.4\]]rdo ba nag po la/_/ri rab rdo rje rgya gram bri/_/'brub khung de yi kha bcad la/_/de steng sku gdung nag po brtsig_/de ni dam sri mnan par bshad/_/rnal 'byor dam tshig nyams pa la/_/mkha' 'gro ma yi chad pa 'byung /_/nyams tshad che na bka' chad che/_/bsgrub pa grub rtags 
[\[244a.5\]]med pa dang /_/rang nyid srog la bab pa'o/_/nyams pa 'bring gi bka' chad ni/_/'khor la rkyen dang rims nad 'byung /_/nyams pa tha ma'i bka' chad ni/_/dgra dang nor la god ka 'byung /_/de nas nyams pa bskang ba bstan/_/nyams pa chen po bskang ba ni/_/gtor ma 
[\[244a.6\]]khri dang sbyin sreg khri/_/de bzhin ra tsa gsum gyis bskang /_/des kyang skongs par mi 'gyur na/_/dang po mkha' lding gsum gyis bskang /_/de nas shel nag gsum gyis bskang /_/bka' chad 'bring po byung ba na/_/gtor ma stong dang sbyin sreg stong /_/mkha' lding gnyis 
[\[244a.7\]]dang spyi nag gnyis/_/de bzhin ra tsa gnyis kyis bskang /_/mdangs kyi mar me [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dbul/_/bka' chad tha ma byung ba na/_/gtor ma brgya dang sbyin sreg brgya/_/mkha' lding gcig dang shel nag gcig_/_ra tsa gcig gis skongs par bshad/_/mkha' 'gro ma 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las spogs shing thugs dam skong ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/drag po dpal 'bar gnod sbyin khros pa'i gtso/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dngos grub bsgrub 
[\[244b.2\]]'dod pas/_/rtag tu bsten pa rdo rje 'dzin pas shod/_/ces gsol pa dang /_dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/_nyon cig mkha' 'gro rtag tu bsten pa ni/_/dang po grub cing mtshan ma thob pa gces/_/de nas phyi nang gsang ba gsum du bstan/_/dpon mo'i phyi yi rten ni rma 
[\[244b.3\]]bya'o/_/rma bya'i snying gar b+h+yo las lha mo bskyed/_/khol mo'i phyi yi rten ni bya nag mo/_/snying gar b+h+yo las re ma ti bskyed la/_/rma bya de mo nag gam shel nag la/_/sna la ma mo dpon g.yog legs par dbab/_/de nas phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang bskur la/_/dus su gtor 
[\[244b.4\]]mas mchod cing rten du bzung /_/nang gi rten ni sku dang gsang mtshan no/_/rang gi gzugs dang gsang mtshan kha sprad la/_/bar du ru ti rdo rje pad+ma mi/_/gsang ba ga bur stsal te lus la bsrel/_/gsang ba'i rten ni lhan cig grub pa'i lha/_/gsang ba ye shes thig le ma mor 
[\[244b.5\]]blta'o/_/de nas rtag tu sngags dang phyag rgya dang /_/ting 'dzin rdzas dang dam tshig mi spong ngo /_/rtag tu zas kyi phud kyis bsten par bshad/_/mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las ma mo rtag tu bsten pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas dpal phyag na 
[\[244b.6\]]rdo rje la/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye dpal 'bar chen mo nyi ma stong gi gzi/_/rdo rje lha mo mkha' 'gro ma dpal gyi lha mo'i/_/bra rtags dbab dang slob ma dbang bskur ba'i/_/ma mo dbab pa'i gsang sngags bdag la shod/_/ces gsol 
[\[244b.7\]]pa dang /_dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/_lha mo 'bebs shing slob ma dbang bskur ba'i/_/slob dpon nyid kyis ma mo grub pa gces/_/de nas ma mo grub pa'i slob dpon des/_/dur khrod chen por zhag bdun bsnyen pa bya/_/sngags dang man ngag rdzas su ldan par bya/_/
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]dang po rang la ma mo phebs par dbab/_/de nas slob ma dkyil 'khor 'jug pa dang /_/me tog dor dang lha ngo bstan bya dang /_/dpal phyag na rdo rje'i dbang bzhi bskur/_/dang po rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar ba'i dbang /_/gnyis pa shes rab dril bu dag gi dbang /_/de 
[\[245a.2\]]bzhin gsum pa la ni dbu rgyan te/_/bzhi pa rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi dbang /_/de nas lha mo nag mo'i dbang bzhi bskur/_/dang po la ni thod pa'i dbang /_/gnyis pas shes rab ral gri'i dbang bskur te/_/gsum pa la ni ne'u le'i rkyal bu'o/_/de bzhin bzhi pa dpa' bo 
[\[245a.3\]]ha sta sbyin/_/de nas re ma ti yi dbang bzhi bskur/_/dang po dur khrod g.yang gzhi'i dbang /_/gnyis pa rdo rje Da ma ru yi dbang /_/gsum pa kha T+wAM bdud kyi khram bam dbang /_/de bzhin bzhi pa chu gri 'dod pa'i dbang /_/dbang ni bskur ba'i sngags kyang bzlas par bya/_/bcu gnyis 
[\[245a.4\]]rim pa sngon du rjes pa dang /_/sku dang gsung gi dam tshig dpog par bya'o/_/de nas gsang ba'i dbang la 'jug par bya ste/_dbang po bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs kyi/_/bu mo brgyad dang bcu drug nyi shu ma/_/mig gi dkyus [{]rings [,]ring [}]sngo bsangs nu ma rgyas/_/skra bzang so 
[\[245a.5\]]dkar ut+pal bro/_/de la khrus byas me tog gser gyis brgyan/_/dbang po lnga la bdud rtsi dag gis gdab/_/dpral bar phyag na rdo rje'i gsang sngags bri/_/de yi snying gar lha mo'i snying po la/_/lte bar re ma ti yi snying po bri/_/sman lnga bdud rtsi lnga yi zas byin la/_/gsang 
[\[245a.6\]]ba'i pad+mar ru hi rdo rje stsal/_/de nas bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor nub phyogs su/_/dbang bskur stegs bu zlum po dmar po brtsig_/de yi steng du bu mo de bzhag la/_/phyogs mtshams kun du tshil dang cong zi bsreg_/steng 'og kun du zhing gi bla re gdan/_/mdun dang rgyab 
[\[245a.7\]]tu gtor ma sbyin/_/de nas ma mo'i snying po 'bum du gdon/_/de nas rdo rje slob dpon gu ru yis/_/Da ma ru rdung ma mo drag tu bod/_/srog snying drang zhing g.yab dar g.yab/_/de nas bu mo de la sems gtad la/_/sngags 'di bzlas shing gdong du rtag tu blta/_/bu mo ma yengs 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]sa le bsgom du gzhug_/o~M tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M sa ma ya pra thA ru ru ro ru tsa pa la a shug me sa ma ya pra thA/_kha mun+t+ra pra ma ya ma tis+Ti pra yo ga sid+d+hi sa ma ya pra thA/_A be sha a/_drag tu ma mo bskul zhing dbab par bya'o/_/phebs par dka' na gnad la 'bebs rdzas 
[\[245b.2\]]bsreg_/lan gsum ma mo 'bum gyis nges par phebs/_/bzang ngan legs nyes mtshan ma th+wal th+wal smra'o/_/yang na mi smra bar yang phebs par byed/_/de nas bu mo de yi lus po la/_/spos dang me tog mar me dri chab kyis/_/dang po la ni phyi yi mchod pa bya/_/sha lnga 
[\[245b.3\]]bdud rtsi lnga dang bza' btung gis/_/de nas gnyis pa nang gi mchod pa dbul/_/gsang ba'i mchod pa khu ba'i thig le des/_/dang pos gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa mchod/_/gnyis pas lha mo dpon g.yog mchod par bya/_/gsum pas khu ba bdag btung dngos grub blang /_/
[\[245b.4\]]gzungs ma mkha' 'gro yin par nges bskyed la/_/gzungs ma'i lce la gzhag la dam tshig bsre/_/de nas thig le slob ma'i lce la gzhag_/de nas ma mo thugs kyi dbang sbyin no/_/de nas bu mo de yi mdun du ni/_/dbang gi rtags su zla gam dmar po brtsig_/de nas 
[\[245b.5\]]slob ma stegs bu'i kha la gzhag_/mkha' 'gro kun la sbyin sreg gtor ma dbul/_/de nas bu mo shes rab ma de yis/_/ma mo 'dod kyi slob ma de la dbab/_/ma mo bskul ba'i rdzas rnams bsreg par bya/_/phyi dang nang gi drod tshad mtshan ma dbab/_/mtshan ma 
[\[245b.6\]]phebs nas thugs kyi dam tshig dbab/_/dam tshig bsre ba'i gsang ba'i dbang bskur ro/_/des ni mkha' 'gro mngon du 'grub par bshad/_/ma mo mkha' 'gro thugs kyi gsang rgyud 'di/_/dbang dang dam tshig med pa'i slob ma la/_/tshig gcig bstan 
[\[245b.7\]]yang tshe yi 'du byed bskul/_/myur du shi nas rdo rje dmyal bar skye/_/de bas dbang bskur gnang ba thob la sbyin par bshad/_/mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o//_//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin des/_
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye ma phyag na rdo rje che/_/ngo mtshar byin brlabs rnams kyi mchog_/lha mo grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i/_/las kyi rim pa bshad du gsol/_/ces gsol pa dang /_dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' 
[\[246a.2\]]stsal pa/_nyon cig lha yi dbang po brgya byin nyon/_/lha mo'i grub pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/so so'i las la ched du ma brtsams kyang /_/yid la ci 'dod bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub/_/'on kyang ched du sgrub pa rtsom pa na/_/las kyi bye brag dam pa ngas bshad 
[\[246a.3\]]do/_/ma mo grub pa rnams kyis bya ba yin/_/dang po'i las can rnams kyis mi brtsam mo/_/brgya byin nyon cig_/zhi ba'i las kyi khyad par ni/_/bu ram sbrang rtsi gi'u wang dang /_/gu gul spos dang 'o ma dang /_/mar khu til dang 'bras chan dang /_/a ga ru dang 
[\[246a.4\]]du ru ska/_/gang la bya ba'i ming dang bcas/_/ril bu khri tsho gcig byas la/_/zhi ba'i thab khung zlum po dang /_/'o ma yod pa'i shing brtsigs la/_/mkha' 'gro ma rnams dkar po la/_/bdud rtsi'i bum pa thogs nas kyang /_/gang la bya ba'i spyi bo nas/_/dbang bskur 
[\[246a.5\]]lus po zhi bar bsgom/_/me sbar ril bu rim gyis bsreg_/gong ma'i srog snying bzlas shing dbul/_/srog gi snying po'i gzhug rgyan du/_/shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA bzlas/_/'bum tsho bzhi ru bzlas byas la/_/bdud dang bgegs rnams zhi ba dang /_/dgra dang nad yams 
[\[246a.6\]]zhi bar byed/_/rgyas pa'i las su bya ba ni/_/gur gum sta rga'i rgun 'brum dang /_/ut+pal mar khu gi'u wang dang /_/bdud rtsi lnga dang dpag bsam shing /_/gang la bya ba'i ming dang bcas/_/khri tsho gnyis kyi ril bu bya/_/rgyas pa'i thab khung gru bzhi pa/_/'bras bu 
[\[246a.7\]]yod pa'i shing brtsigs la/_/gtso bo phyag na rdo rje dang /_/mkha' 'gro ma kun ser po la/_/rin chen mdzod dang bum pa thogs/_/gang la bya ba'i snying ga ru/_/dbang bskur phung po rgyas par shog_/me sbar ril bu rim gyis dbul/_/o~M tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M/_kha 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]mun+t+ra ba tra ba trag rag mo puk+Ting+ku ru swA hA/_/'bum tsho brgyad du bzlas pa bya/_/tshe dang rigs rgyud 'phel bar byed/_/nor dang longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur/_/dbang gi las su bya ba ni/_/sbrang rgod ra khrag chang dang chab tshan dang /_/khug chos lug mig pa dang 
[\[246b.2\]]ni/_/yung dang gla rtsi cong zhun dang /_/nya sha mar khu rgya skyegs ni/_/ril bu khri tsho gsum byas la/_/dbang gi thab khung zla gam la/_/tsher ma can gyi shing brtsigs la/_/gtso dang 'khor gyi ma mo kun/_/mdog dmar lcags kyu thogs pa yis/_/gang la bya ba 
[\[246b.3\]]bkug par bsgom/_/mi sbar ril bu rim gyis bsreg_/o~M tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M/_pa tsa la a shug me/_pra ma ma hA sti pra che ge mo A kaR+Sha ma nA ya hrIHdzaH/_'bum tsho bcu drug bzlas pa na/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang /_/stag dang glang po nor bu dang /_/'gro ba bzang 
[\[246b.4\]]dang blon po dang /_/dmag mi dang ni lha mi dang /_/klu dang gnod sbyin bu mo dang /_/kun kyang bdag gi dbang du 'gyur/_/bskrad pa'i las su bstan pa ni/_/drag po'i me thab gru gsum du/_/dug shing tsher ma'i me bus la/_/rta dang mgrin ring sha dang tshil/_/khwa yi sgro 
[\[246b.5\]]dang thar nu'i chang /_/gang la bya ba'i ming dang bcas/_/'bum tsho ru ni bzlas pa bya/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng du ni/_/rlung gi rnga mo sngon mo bskyon/_/de steng gang la bya ba bskyon/_/re ma ti yis sna nas khrid/_/lha mo nag mos phyi nas ded/_/phyag na rdo rjes rgyab nas 
[\[246b.6\]]phul/_/dpag tshad brgyad khrir bskrad par bsam/_/snying po bzlas shing ya stags bsreg_/snying po tha ma skrod ces bskul/_/yul nas dbyung zhing 'khyams par nus/_/phaT tsa pa la a shug me/_/s+phA ra Na ma ya~M phaT phaT skrod cig_/dbye ba'i las su 
[\[246b.7\]]bstan pa ni/_/rta g.yag bya rog 'ug pa'i sha_/btsan dug skye tshe spyang ki'i tshil/_/mdza' bo gnyis kyi ming bcas la/_/tsher ma'i shing la me bus la/_/'bum tsho gcig tu bstabs pa bya/_/srog gi snying po'i tha mar ni/_/ma ma trag rag sha ru tra mA ra 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]ya hU~M phaT/_gats+tsha phaT zhes ni bzlas pa bya/_/the tshom med par dbye bar nus/_/bud med 'gugs pa'i sbyor ba ni/_/lan tshwa rgya skyegs rdo sol dang /_/cong zi bu ram nya sha dang /_/sbrang rtsi mngal khrag khu ba dang /_/gang la bya ba'i ming ngam skra/_/ril 
[\[247a.2\]]bu brgya rtsa brgyad byas la/_/seng ldeng me la bsreg par bya/_/du ba byung na 'dod chags langs/_/me lce 'bar nas khugs par byed/_/sngags ni mkha' 'gro'i snying pos bya/_/tha ma bud med 'di khug bya/_/des ni the tshom med par nus/_/lkugs par bya ba 
[\[247a.3\]]bstan pa ni/_/kham pa'i rdzas la dgra gzugs bya/_/lug gi rkan la ming bris la/_/de yi snying gar gzhug par bya/_/kha yi nang du nya mgo gzhug_/kha ni tsher mas rab tu gtur/_/gzugs ni khyi mgo'i khar gzhag la/_/khyi mgo spyang ki'i rgyus pas 
[\[247a.4\]]dkris/_/gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas/_/o~M badzra tsaN+Da ro Sha Na hU~M/_re ma ti che ge mo bag+sha hU~M/_sos par bya na slar la bshig_/gal te ma bshig mnan na ni/_/ma shi'i bar du kha 'thams so/_/smyo ba'i las su bya ba ni/_/btsan dug ldong ros sbrul nag 
[\[247a.5\]]go/_/sdig pa'i rwa dang bye'u chung ro/_/gang la bya ba'i ming dang bcas/_/de nyid kyi ni gnas su bsreg_/che ge mo sha trU na nA/_sha pra ma ya hU~M phaT/_the tshom med par 'bog cing smyo/_/rengs par bya ba bstan pa ni/_/gri rgod ro bsregs rus pa dang /_/a bra nag po'i 
[\[247a.6\]]'bras bu dang /_/dmangs rigs khyim gyi dud pa dang /_/byi la'i sha dang btsan dug dang /_/phabs dang sug pa gu gul nag po dang /_/phye ma dag tu rab sbyar la/_/sngags ni 'bum du bzlas pa bya/_/o~M mA Ni badzra ma hA ka li tsa pa la hU~M/_spo ta grum sngo sreng hU~M hU~M hU~M/_
[\[247a.7\]]de rnams kyis ni phye ma de/_/gang la gtor bas rengs par nus/_/rang lus sba ba'i sbyor ba ni/_/khwa ta nag po'i tshang shing la/_/ut+pal nag po'i khu bas byug_/bram ze'i go ro tsa nas bsku/_/bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus su gzugs/_/phyag na rdo rje'i 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]snying po bzlas/_/de nas na bun bu mo bdun/_/srin bal nang du dril la gzhag_/lha mo dpon g.yog snying po bzlas/_/srin bal thul po shing la gdags/_/mis ma mthong bar lus la bcang /_/bdag ni sus kyang mi mthong ngo /_/nyon cig lha dbang brgya 
[\[247b.2\]]byin nyon/_/bstan pa gnyan po bshig pa dang /_/rdo rje slob dpon brnyas pa dang /_/gsad pa'i sbyor ba rab tu bshad/_/rje mos gsad pa'i las bzhi dang /_/khol mo nag mo'i thun drug ni/_/ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med/_/gsad pa'i las bzhi bstan 
[\[247b.3\]]pa ni/_/dang por khrag nad dbab pa dang /_/gnyis pa rims nad dbab pa dang /_/gsum pa tsha ba 'brum nag 'bar/_/bzhi pa snying gzer 'bar ba'o/_/nad bzhi gang 'dod 'bar bas bsad/_/khrag nad dag gis dgra gsad na/_/ro tshas ras la ling+ga 
[\[247b.4\]]bri/_/tsha ba gsum gyi khu bas bsku/_/bzlas pa bya zhing gtor ma gtang /_/phebs par dbab cing bskul bar bya/_/o~M badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M/_o~M ru ru tiSh+Ta pa to si/_ru ru be ro ru be tiSh+Ta pa to si/_tsa pa la a shug me/_che ge mo rak+ta ro ge na ga mA ra ya hU~M 
[\[247b.5\]]phaT/_khri tsho gcig tu bzlas byas la/_/ling+ga gtor mar dbul bar bya/_/khrag nad kyis ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/da ni rims nad dbab pa bshad/_/btsan dug mda' dug rgyu gzer khrag_/chang dang lo dug khrag dang bzhi/_/thod pa dum bu brgyad par stsal/_/
[\[247b.6\]]zhing ras dag gis kha bcad la/_/sngags 'di sum 'bum bzlas pa bya/_/o~M badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M/_ru ru be tiSh+Ta ba to si/_ru ru ro ru ho ruSh+Ta ba to si/_tsa ba la a shug me hU~M bya ha di ma ro ge na ga A be sha ya/_mA ra ya phaT/_rang nyid khros pa'i cha 
[\[247b.7\]]lugs bya/_/dgra yi phyogs su mtshan mo gtor/_/rims nad dag gis phung bar nus/_/tsha ba'i nad kyis gsad pa ni/_/rabs chad nag po'i sha khrag dang /_/bya rog 'ug pa'i sha tshil dang /_/seng stag bya rgod skyung ka'i snying /_/rta nag ra rog 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]phag gi snying /_/spyang mo'i snying dang rme gri'i sha_/cong zhun dang ni gi'u wang sbyar/_/dug dang khrag kyang bsres byas la/_/ril bu khri tsho bzhi byas la/_/ma trang nag po'i zhal bcas la/_/ma trang de yi kha nang du/_/dug shing nag po'i hom sbar te/_/
[\[248a.2\]]rdo rje mkha' 'gro dpon g.yog kyang /_/nag mo ral pa rngam bag can/_/lag na ral gri thogs pa yi/_/dgra sha bcad cing za bar bsgom/_/ril bu re dang dgra ming re/_/bsdebs shing bsregs pa'i las bya'o/_/ma mo bskul ba'i rdzas re bsreg_/nag mo chen mo'i 
[\[248a.3\]]dmod pa ni/_/o~M badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M/_ru ru be tiSh+Ta ba to si ru ru ro ru be tiSh+Ta pa to si/_tsa pa la a shug me/_ma ma sarba sha tru~M a mu ka shI g+h+ra~M mA ra Na/_dz+wa la ra~M tsit+ta dz+wa la dzi pa~M ru d+hi ra~M mA ra ya nA sha ya hU~M phaT/_de nas thal ba hoM khung mnan/_/tsha ba'i nad la the tshom med/_/
[\[248a.4\]]snying gzer 'bar bas dgra bsad na/_/lcags sam dug shing phur bu la/_/lus la bcangs la bsnyen pa dbul/_/spyi bor phyag na rdo rje bsgom/_/rked par lha mo nag mo bsgom/_/rtse mor re ma ti yang bsgom/_/logs la 'khor gyi ma mo bsgom/_/kI la ya la 
[\[248a.5\]]bsgom pa rnams/_/sku stod rgyan dang lag char ldan/_/rked par zhe sdang sbrul gyis dkris/_/sku smad gdug pa'i phur bu 'bar/_/lus la bcangs la bsnyen pa dbul/_/o~M badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M/_ru ru be tiSh+Ta ba to si/_ru ru ro ru be tiSh+Ta ba to si/_tsa pa la a 
[\[248a.6\]]shug me/_re ma ti badzra kI li ki la ya hU~M mA ra Na hU~M phaT/_rtag tu bsnyen pa dbul byas la/_/gtor ma sbyin sreg dag gis mchod/_/de nas dgra yi gzugs byas la/_/rkang lag dag la btab pa na/_/snying la btab na 'chi bar byed/_/snying gzer 'bar ba'i cho ga'o/_/
[\[248a.7\]]khol mo nag mo'i thun drug ni/_/'gu li nag mo'i thod pa'i thun/_/nir ti nag mo mda' yi thun/_/rak+ta nag mo khrag gi thun/_/tsa ra~M nag mo sgo nga'i thun/_/byi sha nag mo dug gi thun/_/tsit+ta nag mo snying gi thun/_/nag mo'i thun drug rab bshad bya/_/'gu li nag mo'i 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]thod mda' ni/_/mi ro dkris pa'i dkris ma la/_/dug dang khrag gi snag tsha yis/_/dbus nas bskor la yi ge bri/_/o~M tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M/_zhes bya ba dbus su bri/_/de yi phyi rim du ru ru pe tiSh+Ta ba do si/_ru ru ro ru be tiSh+Ta ba do si/_tsa pa la a shug me hU~M b+h+yo zhes bri/_
[\[248b.2\]]de'i phyi rim du ru ru be ro ro ru hU~M tiSh+Ta ba do si/_rag mo tsit+ta kha rag ma hU~M b+h+yo/_ma ma trag rak+sha kha mun tra ba tra ba trag rag+sha tsi tra kha rag ma/_re ma ti sa ma ya ma hA pra ma sti pra dun b+h+yo dzaH_dzaH/_ru lu b+h+yo b+h+yo zhes bri/_de'i phyi rim du ma nag mos bskor/_/de'i phyi rim du b+h+yos bskor/_/de 
[\[248b.3\]]nas sngags kyi 'khor lo de/_/nal thod dum bu brgyad par stsal/_/thod pa de yi nang du ni/_/ba~M dang khyi rgya ra rog snying /_/yugs sa mo yi mngal khrag dang /_/nad gang 'dod pa'i sha rus khrag_/dug sna tshogs dang khrag sna tshogs/_/chang dang sbyar la thod par blug_/thod pa 
[\[248b.4\]]g.yang gzhi'i steng du gzhag_/de rag dza ti ta ba~M dang /_/mkha' 'gro ma la phul nas ni/_/ske tshe yungs nag thal chen la/_/sngags 'di bzlas la thod par blug_/o~M ru ru be ro ru hU~M tiSh+Ta ba to si/_hU~M hU~M/_tsa pa la a shug me karma de byi mu di rA ga ba~M hU~M hU~M tsa pa la a 
[\[248b.5\]]shug me/_mu yaM rak+Sha thum du na nan/_kha rag tsa mun ti hU~M hU~M tsa pa la a shug me/_a ka ma mA ra Na hU~M phaT/_sngags de khri tsho thon pa'i tshe/_/go ro tsa nas kha bcad la/_/dur khrod dag tu gnas dag ste/_/nam phyed thod mda' dgra la 'phang /_/ma mo bskul ba'i dam rdzas 
[\[248b.6\]]bsreg_/de ni phung zhing rlag par byed/_/nir ti nag mo'i mda' thun ni/_/mda' sgro bya skyung ka yis sgron/_/dug shing nag po'i mde'u btsugs la/_/bam gyi snying khrag yugs sa'i khrag_/btsan dug yungs kar skye tshe dang /_/mi rigs dgu yi so sen dang /_/bya dang gcan 
[\[248b.7\]]dgu'i sder mo dang /_/tsher ma dgu dang mtshon dbal dgu/_/gri rgod khrag dang g.yul sprad sa/_/de rnams bsres pa'i phye ma la/_/ma mo las la bskul ba dang /_/gnad la dbab pa'i sngags kyis gdab/_/de yi gting la thun gyi mthu/_/dme gri nag mo'i zor sngags 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]bzlas/_/rag mo tsit+ta mo tsa tsa mo b+h+yo/_hi li hi li ma ma b+h+yo/_badzra a li ga sri ga si hU~M b+h+yo/_badzra ma ma ti b+h+yo/_de skad sngags ni bzlas nas ni/_/rdzas dang phur thun mda' sbubs blug_/mda' nyid dug dang khrag gis byug_/dur khrod mgal pa'i pha zhu 
[\[249a.2\]]bdungs la/_/mde'u yi rtse mo bsreg byas la/_/mda' de nam phyed dgra la 'phang /_/gang la bya ba gri ru 'chi/_/rag+ta nag mo'i khrag thun ni/_/mi rta ra khyi phag khrag dang /_/rims nad khrag dang gu gul dang /_/tsher ma dgu dang mche sder dgu/_/klu yi chu dang btsan dug 
[\[249a.3\]]dang /_/rngar gri 'bum tri nang du stsal/_/yungs kar dag la thun sngags 'di/_/bdun khri bzlas la khrag gi nang du blug_/ru ru tsa dug a shug me pa ti ru tra kha shal mo/_che ge mo a mu ka rak+ta tsa ra nan/_mA ra ya mA ra ya ru ti ra~M/_A kaR+Sha ya a hU~M phaT/_de skad 
[\[249a.4\]]khrag la sngags bzlas la/_/ma mo las la bskul sngags gdab/_/de nas khrag gi zor mda' de/_/ro dkris dag gi 'ur rdor stsal/_/nam phyed dgra la 'phang bar bya'o/_/des ni gang la bya ba 'chi/_/tsa ra nag mo'i sgong thun ni/_/bya mo nag mo'i sgo nga yi/_/spyi bo 
[\[249a.5\]]brtol ba'i sgong stong du/_/rims kyi khrag dang btsan dug stsal/_/yungs kar thal chen mtshon dpal la/_/srog gi snying po 'bum du bzlas/_/tha mar sgong thun gdab sngags bzlas/_/kha mun tra ba tra ba trag sha rag mo te ke ma dzA dzA/_kha rag te kem b+h+yo b+h+yoH/_de 
[\[249a.6\]]nas sgo nga kha bcad la/_/ha sta lag par bcug la 'phang /_/mkhar la brgyab kyang 'jig par nus/_/dgra la 'phang na the tshom med/_/byi sha nag mo'i dug thun ni/_/ma he'i rwa 'am ba men ru/_/mda' dug btsan dug lo dug dang /_/rims nad khrag dang 
[\[249a.7\]]chang blugs la/_/rwa ru nang nyid khar bcug la/_/dang la mkha' 'gro'i snying po dang /_/las la bskul sngags ming dang bcas/_/de nas dug gi dbal sngags bzlas/_/hU~M re ma ti ma ma ru lu rag Sha b+h+yo/_/re ma ti byi shi ma ya sta yak+sha kro d+ha che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/_
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]rwa rtse phra mo bcad par ni/_/dug gi khu ba mi mgos gting /_/mi mgo dug gis khengs tsam na/_/ma mo bskul ba'i rdzas bsregs la/_/khram bam phyag rgya bcas la ni/_/nam phyed khros te dgra la 'phang /_/the tshom med par dgra brlag go/_/tsit+ta nag mo'i snying thun 
[\[249b.2\]]ni/_/spyang ki stag dang sre mong snying /_/khyi dang 'ug pa wa yi snying /_/pho rog khrag dang sbrul gyi snying /_/thod pa'i nang du stsal la ni/_/dang po ma mo dpon g.yog gi/_/gnad la bskul ba'i sngags bzlas shing /_/ma mo bskul ba'i dam rdzas bsreg_/de nas snying gi thun 
[\[249b.3\]]sngags ni/_/trag rak+sha tsi ta dung ro ta ma ta sma ra ra ta b+h+yo/_/de skad bzlas pa'i snying thun des/_/grong la brgyab kyang phung bar byed/_/nag mo 'bar ba'i thun drug 'dis/_/mkhar la brgyab kyang 'jig pa la/_/g.yul ngo chen por brgyab kyang bzlog_/gzhan gyi byad 
[\[249b.4\]]dang sngags kyang bzlog_/dgra dang bgegs la the tshom med/_/yang ni bshad kyis brgya byin nyon/_/bstan pa gnyan po'i sku dgra la/_/ltas ngan bya nag dbab pa ste/_/dang po bya nag bzung byas la/_/bcu gnyis dbang gi rim pa bskur/_/de nas bya la ma mo dbab/_/
[\[249b.5\]]bya de mig rtsa rgod pa dang /_/skad 'byin gshog pa gdeng ba na/_/ma mo phebs pa'i rtags yin pas/_/phyi dang nang gi mchod pa bya/_/phyag rgya dgu ni rab bstan la/_/dbang bskur dam tshig sbyin par bya/_/de nas ma mo bskul sngags bzlas/_/las la 
[\[249b.6\]]bskul ba'i dam rdzas bsreg_/sngags 'dis bya de spar la gtang /_/o~M k+Sha rag sha tsi ta kha rag ma tsit+ta tung tung dza sha yu ta ti b+h+yo/_re ma ti rAk+Sha si ru lu ru lu pra ma ma hA sti pra dung b+h+yo/_kar ma sam ya b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo zhes gtang ngo /_/des ni bya nag gang du smos par 
[\[249b.7\]]'gro'o/_/mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i las kyi rgyud las las so so ma mo'i bye brag bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin des/_dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye rig sngags gsang sngags 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]bdag po gsang dbang po/_/phyag na rdo rje thig le bstan pa bsrung ba yi don du/_/bdud rtsi 'chang bzhin mar me gsod pa yi/_/skyes bu chen po mnga' bdag bshad du gsol/_/zhes zhus pa la/_dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/_lnga brgya tha ma 
[\[250a.2\]]me ltar 'bar ba'i tshe/_/nyams pa gsod pa'i sbyor ba bshad kyis nyon/_/dang po mkha' 'gro me lce bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/skabs su gsad pa'i las la 'jug pa ni/_/dang la mtshan ma phebs pa'i bsnyen pa bya/_/gtor ma sbyin sreg sti ras bu tsa bya/_/
[\[250a.3\]]kham sa rkang rjes dri chu skra shad la/_/gang la bya ba'i snying gar ming /_/dug dang bdud rtsi'i gtor ma'i nang du stsal/_/de nas ma mo zhag bdun dbab cing bstab/_/bskul ba gnad la dbab pa'i dam rdzas bsreg_/gnad la dbab cing las la bskul sngags 
[\[250a.4\]]bzlas/_/ting 'dzin khrag 'thung bdud mo'i bar du ni/_/snying gi 'od zer dag gis drangs byas te/_/bdud rtsi drangs pa'i sbyor ba ston pa ni/_/gsal ba dngos grub spyi ste log pa yis/_/gsang sbugs bdud rtsi bdud mo'i zhal du drang /_/thugs kyi dkar dmar pad+ma'i sbu 
[\[250a.5\]]gur spro/_/bdag gi sbubs na thugs kyi dpal be'u rgyas/_/de nas mar me gsad pa'i ting 'dzin ni/_/bzhis bsdus dbus nas nr-i las 'od 'bar ba/_/bdag nyid bdud mo'i rang bzhin gsal ba la/_/spro ba'i rlung gis mar me gting nas sbar/_/bud pa'i rlung 
[\[250a.6\]]gis mar me khad kyis gsad/_/'dren pa'i rlung gis thig le'i rtse mor drang /_/dang bos bkrag shor gnyis pas sum cha nyams/_/gsum pas phyed la bzhi pas sum gnyis med/_/lnga pas mun khang ltar gyur bdag la gsal/_/mar me bdud rtsi lo grangs du 
[\[250a.7\]]lon thub/_/de nas dgra gzugs 'gu ling nag por gzhug_/hom khung nang du rtsang nang phur bus bskor/_/nag mo ro zan kha la me 'bar ma/_/ma bdud rgyal po lhag pa'i snying rje can/_/khrag 'thung re ma ti yi dmod pa ni/_/tra ga rag sha re ma ti'i hU~M a mu ka sri 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]kra ma ma ra na ya ma rag mo Ar+ya tsa tsa thi gi ma kha la b+h+yo b+h+yo/_/rag mo tsi ta kha rag ma b+h+yo/_rag mo ti ki ma dzaHdzaH/_kha le dun b+h+yo/_kha rag ti ki ma dza kha le dun b+h+yo/_ma rag thun ma b+h+yo/_che ge mo mA ra ya hU~M phaT/_gsang sngags de ni khri tsho gnyis su gdab/_/yungs kar thal 
[\[250b.2\]]chen dag la sngags la gdab/_/'gu ling dur khrod rnying pa'i gting du mnan/_/gang la bya ba de ni zhag bdun len/_/mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las mar me bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dpal phyag na 
[\[250b.3\]]rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye bde ba chen po rdo rje 'chang /_/'khor ba'i rgyun lam bcad pa dang /_/ye shes nus pa bskyed pa'i phyir/_/thig le ye shes man ngag 'di/_/snying rje can gyis bshad du gsol/_/zhes zhus pa'i tshe/_dpal phyag na rdo rje des 
[\[250b.4\]]gsang ba'i thugs ka nas/_ye shes 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bkye nas 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'di skad cas bka' stsal to/_/ye shes rdo rje thig le ni/_/thun mong ma yin shes par dka'/_/don dam kun rdzob gnyis su bshad/_/don dam sems kyi spyod 
[\[250b.5\]]yul lo/_/kun rdzob las kyi phyag rgya dngos/_/rgyal rigs bu mo de la bsten/_/rang rig rtsal gyis rlung g.yos te/_/rlung gi thig le ye shes me/_/rdo rje gsang bas sa bon bskul/_/rtog med gsang ba'i thig le la/_/mi bskyod mnyam par sems gtad na/_/mar 
[\[250b.6\]]me'i rtse mo lta bur brtan/_/gnas pa'i rtsa yi nam mkha' la/_/srog 'dren thig le bsgom pa'i tshe/_/brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po kun/_/bden gnyis byang chub don gsal nas/_/dang ba'i chu la gzugs brnyan bzhin/_/rgyal ba'i go 'phang rang la 'cher/_/
[\[250b.7\]]mkha' 'gro ma yi rang bzhin 'grub/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i lha mo'i don/_/mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las ye shes kyi thig le bshad pa'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o//_//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin des/_dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]ces gsol to/_/bgegs kyi gtso bo dbang phyug rje/_/'gro ba thugs rjes bskyang ba'i phyir/_/bcu drug rdo rje 'phrul gyi rgyud/_/dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol/_/zhes zhus pa dang /_dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/_ma 'ongs phyi ma'i 
[\[251a.2\]]sems can rnams/_/dad dang spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir/_/rdzu 'phrul bcu drug bshad kyis nyon/_/dang po lha yi rnal 'byor la/_/drod dang mtshan ma thob par bya/_/de nas 'phrul la 'jug pa ni/_/a nu sa ti'i ril bu sbyar/_/rma bya khrung khrung ne tso sha/_/nya dang spre'u dang byi la'i sha/_/
[\[251a.3\]]rnga mo khwa ta ngang pa'i sha/_/ne'u le go bya mthing ril sha_/de rnams skams pa'i phye ma dang /_/bil ba'i shing dang a ru ra/_/shing tsha sug smel rus sbal rus/_/ka ka ru dang me khyer srin/_/mi rus dang ni phag rgod khrag_/mi rgod skra dang chu klag sgro/_/de rnams bsres la ril bu 
[\[251a.4\]]bya/_/sbrang rgod dag gis mgo bsdus la/_/dur khrod thod pa'i ga 'ur stsal/_/phyag na rdo rje'i snying po dang /_/ma mo'i srog snying bdun 'bum bzlas/_/bar bar bram ze'i me la bsro/_/de nas sna yi ril bu la/_/'od dang me stag 'phros tsam na/_/zangs sam lcags kyi 
[\[251a.5\]]ga 'ur stsal/_/de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro la/_/dug dang khrag gi sbyin sreg dbul/_/a bu si ti'i ril bu de/_/rang gi lce la myangs pa na/_/rtag tu btsan dug 'thung bar nus/_/yang na ma mo mkha' 'gro la/_/so bya rog mo'i sbyin sreg dbul/_/a bu si ti'i ril bu de/_/rkang 
[\[251a.6\]]pa'i mthil du bskus pa des/_/chu yi steng du 'gro bar byed/_/ma mo mkha' 'gro dpon g.yog la/_/chang dang bya rgod sbyin sreg dbul/_/ril bu yan lag bzhi la bsku/_/bdag ni nam mkha' dag la 'phur/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dag la/_/mi sha'i mar khu sbyin sreg 
[\[251a.7\]]dbul/_/ril bu lce la myangs pa na/_/skye ba snga phyi dran par nus/_/ma mo dag dang mkha' 'gro la/_/mar dang ra khrag sbyin sreg dbul/_/a bu si ti'i ril bu de/_/bud med gang gi dpral bar bskus/_/de ni bdag gi dbang du 'gyur/_/rdo rje nag mo chen mo la/_/chang dang 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]sbrang rgod sbyin sreg dbul/_/de nas ril bu mig la bsku/_/srid pa gsum ka dus gcig mthong /_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen mo la/_/ma ra dang khwa ta'i sbyin sreg dbul/_/ril bu rkang pa'i mthil la bsku/_/nyin gcig dpag tshad brgyad khrir phyin/_/rdo rje lha mo nag mo la/_/khrag 
[\[251b.2\]]dang mar khu'i sbyin sreg dbul/_/ril bu mchan khung gnyis bskus na/_/rang lus sus kyang mi mthong ngo /_/dpal ldan lha mo dpon g.yog la/_/'bras dang bu ram sbyin sreg dbul/_/ril bu khong par 'thungs pa na/_/tshe lo stong ni thub par nges/_/dpal ldan rdo rje lha mo 
[\[251b.3\]]la/_/'bru dang mar khu'i sbyin sreg dbul/_/ril bu lus la bsrel ba na/_/nor gyi gter la spyod par 'gyur/_/de nas mkha' 'gro ma la ni/_/til dang mi sha'i sbyin sreg dbul/_/a bu si ti'i ril bu de/_/mi ro sar pa'i khar bcug nas/_/ma mo'i snying po 'bum bzlas 
[\[251b.4\]]na/_/mi ro langs nas dngos grub ster/_/gser dang dngul du 'gyur yang rung /_/yang na de la ral gri sbyin/_/ci 'dod pho nya'i mngag gzhug byed/_/phrin las rnam bzhi gang bcol 'grub/_/rdo rje dpal ldan lha mo la/_/go ro tsa na'i sbyin sreg dbul/_/ril bu nad pa'i lus 
[\[251b.5\]]la bsku/_/nad pa rnams ni 'tsho bar byed/_/yang ni rdo rje lha mo la/_/chang dang gi wang sbyin sreg dbul/_/ril bu bgyis pa lte bar bsku/_/sri bu dag ni 'tsho ba'o/_/rdo rje dpal ldan nag mo la/_/til mar ske tshe'i sbyin sreg dbul/_/ril bu me ru bsregs pa na/_/dgra la 
[\[251b.6\]]thog dang ser ba 'bebs/_/rdo rje lha mo nag mo la/_/mar dang mu tig sbyin sreg dbul/_/ril bu dpral ba'i dbyings su bsku/_/rgyal po'i chad pa mi 'byung zhing /_/me dang chus kyang mi tshugs so/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma kun la/_/me tog bu ram sbyin sreg dbul/_/
[\[251b.7\]]ril bu lte bar bskus pa na/_/sbrul dang btsan gyis mi tshugs so/_/byad stems kyang ni bzlogs par 'gyur/_/mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las rdzu 'phrul bcu drug gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//_//de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa'i nang nas/_lha'i dbang 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]po brgya byin stan las langs te/_dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje la bstod pa/_bcom ldan mgon po rdo rje 'dzin/_/sku gsung ye shes lngar ldan lha/_/thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can/_/rig sngags gsang sngags dngos po 'dzin/_/srid pa gsum 
[\[252a.2\]]gyis bskur ba'i gnas/_/lha srin brgyad kyis mchod cing bstod/_/nyon mongs bdud las rnam par rgyal/_/phyag na rdo rje che la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/dpal lha mo la dge bcu'i sgo nas bstod pa/_brgya byin gyis bstod pa/_de nas dpal lha mo la lha ma srin sde 
[\[252a.3\]]brgyad kyis so so nas dpal lha mo bstod pa/_de nas g.yog mo re ma ti la/_bdud ri ti 'gong nyag gis/_'dul thabs kyi dbang gi sgo nas bstod pa/_lha la dbang sgyur lha mo dpal 'bar ma/_/dbang phyug sras mo lha mo gzi ldan ma/_/sum cu rtsa gsum 
[\[252a.4\]]gnas kyi gtso mo ste/_/lha mo re ma ti la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/bdud la dbang sgyur bdud mo dpal 'bar ma/_/ri ti 'gong nyag bu mo re ma ti/_/nag mo rtse dgu gnas kyi gtso mo ste/_/bdud mo re ma ti la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/klu la dbang sgyur klu mo 
[\[252a.5\]]dpal 'bar ma/_/gtsug na rin chen bu mo yid 'ong ma/_/rol mtsho bdun gyi gnas kyi gtso mo ste/_/klu mo re ma ti la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/gnod sbyin dbang sgyur gnod sbyin dpal 'bar ma/_/gang ba bzang po'i bu mo shang ka na/_/nags tshal dra ba 
[\[252a.6\]]can gyi gtso mo ste/_/gnod sbyin re ma ti la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/bstod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//_//de nas dpal phyag na rdo rje des/_pad+ma'i gdan las sku bzhengs te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sras mchog 'khor gyi dam pa brgya byin nyon/_/
[\[252a.7\]]lha dang lha min mi dang nam mkha' lding /_/bgegs dang gshin rje ma mo dang /_/sha za lto 'phye dri za dang /_/srin po grul bum bdud dam mi/_/sngags 'chang rnal 'byor gnod sbyin dang /_/nga yi 'khor rnams rab tu nyan par gyis/_/ngas ni rdo rje ting 'dzin lhun 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]gyis grub/_/ngas ni mtshan ma 'joms pa'i phyag rgya rnyed/_/ngas ni thun mong ston pa'i bdud las rgyal/_/ngas ni snying rjes 'gro kun dge la bkod/_/ngas ni thabs dang shes rab kun la byed/_/ngas ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i gsang rgyud 'di/_/thun mong ma yin me lce 
[\[252b.2\]]'bar ma 'di/_/ngo mtshar thabs mchog dngos grub dam pa'i gzhi/_/ngas ni bshad zin khyod la rab tu gtad/_/skal ldan dad dang brtson 'grus yod la gtad/_/snying rje gzhol zhing brtul zhugs che la gtad/_/bden gnyis don rtogs yi rangs brtan 
[\[252b.3\]]la gtad/_/brnag pa'i gzungs thub snod ldan yongs la gtad/_/zung shig chongs shig snod ldan rnams la shod/_/'di yi don rnams rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/_/'dis ni mi nub chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po thob/_/'dis ni chos kyi dbang phyug go 'phang thob/_/
[\[252b.4\]]'dis ni yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba thob/_/'dis ni ci 'dod thogs med dngos grub thob/_/blo dman shes chung nyan thos rnams la gsang /_/log pa'i mthar 'khyams mu stegs can la gsang /_/dmu rgod mi mkhas skur pa mkhan la gsang /_/dad med 
[\[252b.5\]]snying rje spangs pa rnams la gsang /_/ma rig rmongs pa'i le lo can la gsang /_/zhes bka' stsal nas/_brgya byin gyis spyi bos blangs so/_/'khor la gtad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin des/_/dpal phyag na rdo rje la 
[\[252b.6\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye bcom ldan 'das lung bstan du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa mkha' 'gro ma lung bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa dang /_dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/_mkha' 'gro ma lha mo nag mo 'dis/_bskal pa mang po'i sngon 
[\[252b.7\]]rol nas/_/dus gsum rgyal ba'i zhal mthong ste/_/dman pa'i zhing 'dir sprul sku yis/_/lha mo'i tshul du sku bstan nas/_/'gro ba'i don la rab tu brtson/_/nyon mongs sgrib pa rab tu spangs/_/da ltar shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyong /_/de yi khol mo re ma ti/_/
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]smon lam dbang gis 'gro don byed/_/bsgom pa'i lam la rab gnas nas/_/da ltar nyon mongs sgrib pa sbyong /_/'di nas dus 'di phyi ma'i tshe/_/mkha' 'gro lha mo nag mo 'di/_/byang shar mtshams kyi 'jig rten khams/_/pad+mo rnam par 
[\[253a.2\]]rol pa der/_/yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su/_/pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya bar ni/_/ngas ni lha mo lung bstan to/_/de yi g.yog mo re ma ti/_/pad+ma can gyi zhing khams de/_/bde ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/_/blo gros bshes gnyen bya bar ni/_/de 'dir 
[\[253a.3\]]ngas ni lung bstan no/_/mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las yongs su lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//[{D842a}]mchod na rgyal ba rigs lnga rtag tu mchod/_/srung na dam tshig nyi shu rtsa brgyad srungs/_/dgra byung lha mo 
[\[253a.4\]]nag mo mtshon char phyung /_/nyes chung kha 'thab tsam la mtshon mi dbyung /_/nga yi dkor khang 'jig na mtshon char phyung /_/dkon mchog dbu 'phang smod na mtshon char phyung /_/sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig na mtshon char phyung /_/dkon mchog sku dgra dar na mtshon char 
[\[253a.5\]]phyung /_/zhes slob dpon pad+mas slob bu glang dpal gyi seng ge la de skad ces bka' stsal zhing gdams so//[ {D843}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_badzra man+t+ra b+hi ru san+ti ma ra tan+t+ra nA ma/_bod skad du/_drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud 
[\[253a.6\]]ces bya ba/_bcom ldan 'das mthu stobs kyi bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid/_ri rab chen po'i yang stengs/_lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog_/rab tu brgyan pa'i pho brang chen 
[\[253a.7\]]po na/_yum chen mo 'byung ba lnga'i bdag mo dang /_gnyis su med par snyoms par zhugs te/_sku las 'od zer sna tshogs rab tu spros nas/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi gdug pa can dang /_dregs pa can dang /_gzi brjid can dang /_drag shul can la sogs pa 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]dag gis gnas thams cad rab tu g.yo zhing bskyod par mdzad pas/_de dag gi sde dpon dang bcas 'khor dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams/_rlung gi shugs kyis bskyod pa bzhin du lhags pa ni 'di lta ste/_gshin rje tshe bdag nag po chen po yum dang bcas pa 
[\[253b.2\]]dang /_bdud nag po chen po me'i kha rlangs can dang /_yum bdud mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma dang /_srin po'i rgyal po gsod byed nag po yum dang bcas pa dang /_gnod sbyin chen po gang ba bzang po dang /_yum gnod sbyin mo sha za ral gcig ma dang /_lha'i rgyal po dbang 
[\[253b.3\]]phyug chen po dang /_ru tra'i bdag po thar pa nag po dang /_rmu rje btsan pa rgyal po chen po dang /_phyi rol lha'i bdag po kA la nag po dang /_khyab 'jug chen po kun du rgyu ba dang /_klu'i bdag po gzhon nu gtum po dang /_lha'i rgyal po li phyin chen po dang /_gnod sbyin chen 
[\[253b.4\]]po lag rgyu ba dang /_bdag nyid chen po rdo rje mdzes pa dang /_klu bdud chen po yam shud dmar po dang /_gzhan yang lha dang /_klu dang /_lha ma yin dang /_za byed dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_'byung po'i tshogs dang /_pho nya'i tshogs 'jigs par byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 
[\[253b.5\]]rab tu 'dus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug byed chen po'i 'khor de dag rab tu 'dul bar mkhyen nas/_dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor mngon par sprul par mdzad de/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor dag_/gzugs su brnyan pa rab tu 'jigs/_/
[\[253b.6\]]sgra ni mi snyan drag cing gtum/_/dri ni mi zhim rul myags gsung /_/ro ni kha skyur tsha bar bro/_/reg bya tsha rtsub mi gdug spyod/_/zhe sdang chen po'i me 'bar zhing /_/nga rgyal keng rus brag tu gtams/_/gti mug mun nag rab tu 'thibs/_/'dod chags khrag gi 
[\[253b.7\]]chu chen 'brug_/phrag dog rlung ni rab tu 'khrugs/_/sti ra chen po'i longs spyod la/_/stag gzig gcan gzan ce spyang dang /_/kAng ka dur bya 'dab chags tshogs/_/sha za khrag 'thung rus pa 'joms/_/bam dang rul dang myags pa dang /_/bye dang 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]bral dang gzhig pa dang /_/zos dang 'thor dang rab tu 'thor/_/brul dang zags dang brlag pa dang /_/rtsod dang rgod dang glal ba dang /_/'jigs shing gdug dang rngam pa dang /_/rol ba'i longs spyod rab tu sprul/_/kun kyang gdug pa'i sems 'chang 
[\[254a.2\]]zhing /_/gsod gcod shag gtub lus kyi las/_/tshig rtsub brlang ba'i nga ror 'byin/_/khros pa'i brtul zhugs drag po yis/_/ma lus 'dul zhing tshar gcod pa'i/_/mngon par gcod la rab tu bkod/_/'di ltar mthong zhing snang gyur pa/_/kun rdzob tsam 
[\[254a.3\]]du snang ba las/_/sems can gcig gi ba spu la/_/cung zad gnod pa yod med de/_/rang gi rnam rtog bde bar spyod/_/nges pa'i de nyid kho na'o/_/cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/_/rdo rje 
[\[254a.4\]]'chang ba'i rgyal po yis/_/dus gsum rgyal ba sras bcas kyis/_/thog ma med pa'i dus nyid nas/_/ma lus bstan pa bsrung mdzad pa'i/_/gsang bdag chen por dbang bskur phyir/_/gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje 'chang /_/lnga brgya'i grogs dang bcas pa yis/_/
[\[254a.5\]]so so gtso chen mdun nyid nas/_/rang gi stan las rab tu langs/_/mngon du spyod pa'i sprul pa mdzad/_/thugs kyi gnas pa'i sa bon las/_/phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug kun/_/ljang nag rlung gis rab tu dkrogs/_/khrag gi rba klong 'khrug cing g.yo/_/
[\[254a.6\]]sha rus gtams pa'i sa gzhi las/_/bskal pa'i me ri rab tu 'bar/_/b+han+d+ha 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang /_/gdug cing 'jigs su rung ba ni/_/stobs chen rnams kyang nyer mi spyod/_/phrin las ma lus rdzogs mdzad lus/_/phyi nang mtha' dbus kun la khyab/_/
[\[254a.7\]]bstan la rab sdang pha rol pos/_/phung po zhabs kyi gdan du bting /_/'od gdan gtsang ma gsum dang bcas/_/che ba mchog gi skur mdzad de/_/rig can mthar gnas dbur mnan cing /_/stong pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dag cing snang /_/phyag gis dregs pa'i lha brgyad bsgral/_/
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]b+han+d+ha tsit+ta g.yas g.yon bsnams/_/thugs kyi dbang rtags dang pos gzung /_/thugs rje mi 'gyur mthing nag mdog_/mi 'jigs rig par mnan pa'i zhabs/_/bdud bzhi phyogs dang bcas pa gnon/_/ma lus dbang du sdud pa'i phyir/_/ral pa kham nag srid rtser 
[\[254b.2\]]'bar/_/'bar ba'i spyan gyis khams gsum gzigs/_/gdangs pa'i shangs kyis srid gsum rngub/_/shangs kyi rlung sgras stong gsum khyab/_/rno dpal tshems kyis gdug pa sgrol/_/ljags 'dril rkan sgra drag por brdebs/_/khro gnyer 'od kyis dbang du sdud/_/
[\[254b.3\]]dpa' ba'i chas kyis rab tu brgyan/_/bsrung ba'i lha rnams sku la rdzogs/_/stobs ldan de nyid mnyes mdzad pa'i/_/'byung ba che la dbang sgyur ma/_/dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi ma/_/gri gug tri shUl bdud rtsi g.yas/_/b+han+d+ha zhing chen g.yang gzhi g.yon/_/
[\[254b.4\]]gtso bdag tshul 'dzin rab tu sgeg_/dgyes mdzad rab tu rol pa las/_/'dul byed sprul pa rab tu 'phro/_/phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams kun gyi/_/gtum po gdug pa'i tshul 'chang ba'i/_/drag sngags bdag po ma lus kun/_/rang nyid so so'i 'khor bcas pa'i/_/
[\[254b.5\]]brten dang gnas la re rer snang /_/rang dbang med par 'dud cing g.yo/_/o~M badzra sarba duSh+TA na e ka ya ma ma b+he ra b+ha gr-i h+Na hU~M phaT/_bdud dang gshin rje srin po dang /_/gnod sbyin lha dang log lta can/_/rmu rje che dang phyi rol phyogs/_/gdug byed mkha' la rgyu ba dang /_/byol 
[\[254b.6\]]song ltos 'gro lus 'dzin dang /_/nga rgyal 'chang dang sprul pa can/_/mtha' 'khob gnas mtha' ma lus rgyu/_/lha bdud mi ma yin gyi gnas/_/kha ba can du phyogs shing bsreg_/las kyi lus kyi nus pa 'byin/_/ma lus pa rnams thams cad kun/_/shugs 
[\[254b.7\]]dag rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin/_/rab tu 'dar zhing mdun du gnas/_/thugs rje bdag pos dgongs mdzad kyang /_/gtum rngam 'jigs byed chen po'i sku/_/gsang tshig drag po gsung gi sgras/_/ma lus tshim par bka' stsal pa/_/e ma 'jig rten khams 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]kun gyi/_/drag sngags bdag po dregs pa can/_/sngon gyi rdo rje 'chang chen dang /_/rang gi bka' las ma 'da' bar/_/khyed rnams rang gi 'khor dang bcas/_/so so'i lus dang btags pa'i ming /_/rigs dang brten dang byed pa'i las/_/
[\[255a.2\]]sde dang cha lugs longs spyod rnams/_/'jigs byed gnas 'dir myur du ston/_/khyed rnams 'di las 'da' byed na/_/nga yi srog gi dam tshig gis/_/khyed kyi lus sems srog dang bcas/_/ma lus gtan nas brlag par bya/_/zhes bka' stsal nas/_drag sngags 
[\[255a.3\]]kyi tshogs 'di dag kyang bka' stsal to/_/o~M sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/_ya ma rA dza mr-i ta ga s+ya ma ma/_k+She ta mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/_du phrag rA dza dug dun ma ting mA ra yi hring hring dzaH_dzaH/_rak+sha rag mo ma ma ra ti ka mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/_yak+Sha a pa sma ra rak+sha mi 
[\[255a.4\]]ru sham pa mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/_ma hA de ba shwa ra rA dza mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/_ma trang+ka ru tra kA la mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/_mun mun pa tsa tsit+ta mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/_tirti ka ma te ma hA de ba mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/_biSh+Tu phi tra rok+ti dza mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/_nA ga rA dza 
[\[255a.5\]]ku ma tsan+d+d+ha mA ra ma hring hring dzaHdzaH/_rA dza b+hu long e sa ya mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/_ma hA khu lo sa b+ho mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/_badzra sA d+hu/_so aM tsa mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/_a b+hi shu traM li mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/_nr-i hur thums dzaH/_sha tru~M mA ra ya rbad ces brjod 
[\[255a.6\]]cing sku 'jigs byed 'bar ba ni slar yang 'jigs su rung bar bstan to/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing khams stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma rungs pa'i sgra chen po dang /_'od dang glog 'bar ba dang rlung gi shugs drag pos gang 
[\[255a.7\]]bar gyur to/_/bdud dang gshin rje la sogs pa'i phyogs bcu'i dregs pa can rnams kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas te/_rab tu 'dus nas rang rang gi rigs kyi dregs pa dag phul te/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mdun du nye bar gyur nas/_bka' rab tu bsgrub 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]par brtson par gyur to/_/drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las byin brlabs chen pos dbang du bsdu ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud kyi rgyal po me'i kha rlangs can zhes bya ba/_mdog nag po/_
[\[255b.2\]]kha nas me 'bar ba/_lag na khram shing dang bdud zhags nag po thogs pa/_zhing lpags kyi gos gyon pa/_yum bdud mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma zhes bya ba/_lag na khram shing dang thod pa rlon pa thogs shing /_gos su mi lpags gyon pa/_bdud rta nag po la khyo 
[\[255b.3\]]shug gnyis char zhon nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdud kyi rigs kyi lha'i tshogs dang bcas nas rings par lhags so/_/de bzhin du 'chi bdag gshin rje zhes bya ba/_/mdog nag thod pa gri gug 'dzin/_/chung ma gshin rje za byed ma/_/gri gug thod pa phyag 
[\[255b.4\]]gis 'dzin/_/khyo shug zhing lpags rlon pa bgos/_/ma he chu glang zhon nas ni/_/gshin rje pho mo'i tshogs dang bcas/_/'gal byed gzor zhing myur du lhags/_/srin po gsod byed yab yum yang /_/mdog nag zhing gi pags pa bgos/_/ral gri gri gug g.yas 
[\[255b.5\]]kyis bzung /_/g.yon gyis mi mgo thod khrag thogs/_/stag dang seng ge zhon pa skyod/_/srin po'i tshogs bcas myur du 'khod/_/gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po dang /_/chung ma sha za ral gcig dang /_/mthing nag mgyogs byed rta la zhon/_/zhing lpags gyon te phyag 
[\[255b.6\]]gnyis kyis/_/ral gri dar nag zhing lpags bzung /_/gnod sbyin tshogs dang bcas te 'khod/_/drag sngags bdag po'i sde dpon te/_/shar lho nub byang phyogs dag gi/_/gnas su gtso la 'dud cing 'khod/_/dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba/_/'jig rten lha 
[\[255b.7\]]yi sngags dag gis/_/dkar po ba dan shel gri thogs/_/dar dkar gos can gnam ru zhon/_/dregs pa lha yi bdud 'khor bcas/_/rings par bcas te shar phyogs 'khod/_/thar pa nag po zhes bya ba/_/mdog nag mchod gtor dug thun 'dzin/_/dom 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]nag zhon te zhing lpags bgos/_/sde dang bcas te lho phyogs 'khod/_/rmu rje nag po zhes bya ba/_/dar nag dang ni zhags pa thogs/_/ber nag gyon te rmu rta zhon/_/rang gi sde dang nub phyogs 'khod/_/mu stegs nag po chen po yang /_/kha T+wAM 
[\[256a.2\]]dang ni tri shUl bzung /_/mi lpags bgos zhing ma he zhon/_/rang gi sde bcas byang du 'khod/_/khyab 'jug rog ti zhes bya ba/_/mthing nag khram shing dgra sta 'dzin/_/sprin nag bgos shing 'brug sngon zhon/_/gza' bdud 'khor bcas steng phyogs 'khod/_/
[\[256a.3\]]klu rgyal sog ma med ces pa/_/gos nag sbrul lpags na bza' can/_/bum pa dang ni rus sbal 'dzin/_/chu srin zhon te klu tshogs bcas/_/'og gi phyogs su 'khod cing 'dug_/gzhan yang li byi lag dgu dang /_/the se gtso dang yam shud kyi/_/so so'i 
[\[256a.4\]]sngags kyi bdag po dag_/dkar ser dmar po'i mdog ldan zhing /_/shel gri thogs shing lag dgu 'gyed/_/dar dmar mdung [{]rings [,]ring [}]lag gis 'dzin/_/rta dkar bya rgod ra skyes dang /_/rta dmar zhon te zhing lpags bgos/_/so so'i sde dang g.yog bcas 
[\[256a.5\]]shing /_/phyogs kyi sgo bzhir gnas bcas 'khod/_/gzhan yang lha klu gnod sbyin dang /_/ma mo gshin rje srin po bdud/_/ru tra mu stegs 'gong the dang /_/ging rmu gza' dang rgyan bran sman/_/snang srid lha srin dregs pa can/_/ded dpon chen po rnams kyi 'khor/_/
[\[256a.6\]]phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang /_/yang gsang dang ni drag po dang /_/btags shing chags pa smas pa dang /_/las byed shan pa thor shong dang /_/che grags rtsal dang ma mo dang /_/mun thibs stong 'khrugs srog gcod dang /_/glen zhing dbang che la sogs rnams/_/bcom 
[\[256a.7\]]ldan rdo rje 'chang ba yi/_/bka' bzhin rjes su sgrub byed pas/_/ma thogs dur khrod gnas chen du/_/'dar zhing myur ba'i shugs dang bcas/_/rang gi nus pa rab bstan te/_/bka' nyan gsung bstod rjes 'brangs gnas/_/de ltar 'khod pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]pa'i dregs pa'i bdag po sngags kyi stobs dang ldan pa de dag gis/_rang rang gi 'khor dang /_rigs kyi sde dang /_mthu dang /_longs spyod kyi khyad par dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bstan nas/_'di skad ces kyang gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 
[\[256b.2\]]'dzin pa chen po/_/bdag cag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i/_ma rungs pa'i tshogs gdug pa can sdang ba/_gnod pa dang /_shugs pa dang /_'tsho ba dang rtsod pa'i bsam pa dang ldan zhing /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_phan pa'i sems skye bar 
[\[256b.3\]]mi nus pa rnams kyis te/_rang rang gi khams dang /_byed pa dang /_rigs dang /_las kyi bya ba dang /_rten dang /_nus pa dang /_dbang gi khyad par dag dang /_mthun pa'i bstan pa mi bzad pa stobs dang ldan pa dag bka' stsal bar gsol zhes gsol to/_/drag sngags 
[\[256b.4\]]'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu bkod pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/_/sku yi che ba rab ston cing /_/gsung gi snying pos gnad skul te/_/thugs kyi dgongs pa gtsor mdzad nas/_/'jig rten dregs pa 
[\[256b.5\]]can dang mthu stobs can/_/'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/_/hU~M 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs chen rnams/_/nga yi bka' bzhin nyan par bgyi/_/nga ni chos sku bde chen te/_/ye nas ma bcos lhun gyis grub/_/snang ba'i sku la dngos po med/_/ye shes 
[\[256b.6\]]sku ste sku yi mchog_/nga ni sngags gsung mthu chen te/_/ye nas tha snyad sgra dang bral/_/brjod pa'i gsung la 'dzin pa med/_/ma 'gags gsung ste gsung gi dpal/_/nga ni bden pa'i thugs mchog ste/_/ye nas mtshan med yang dag bral/_/gnyis med thugs 
[\[256b.7\]]las rtsol ba med/_/skye med thugs te thugs kyi dpal/_/nga ni yon tan tshogs chen te/_/lhun gyis grub cing bsam mi khyab/_/smon med dgos pa ma lus 'byung /_/dngos grub chen po bskyed pa'i gzhi/_/nga ni phrin las mdzad pa'i ste/_/yongs rdzogs brtson 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]pa'i bdag nyid can/_/zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon du spyod/_/sna tshogs gzhan don lhun gyis rdzogs/_/'jig rten sngags bdag dregs pa can/_/gtso chen dbang sgyur khyed rnams kyang /_/nga dang dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi/_/thugs dang ye shes 
[\[257a.2\]]gnyis su med/_/gsung dang dbye ba yod ma yin/_/sku la so sor mi blta ste/_/yon tan mnyam pa nyid du rdzogs/_/phrin las gcig ste thun mong bsgrub/_/thog ma med nas da lta'i bar/_/nyon mongs las kyi rgyu 'bras kyis/_/gnas ngan len gyi phung por smin/_/nga rgyal 
[\[257a.3\]]dregs pa'i lus ngag sems/_/stobs dang nus pa dpag med rdzogs/_/che btsan dbang phyug ldan gyur kyang /_/yang dag nges pa'i don ma rtogs/_/don dam bden pa khong mi chud/_/spros bral dge la blo ma phyogs/_/rang rig rgyal ba'i stobs ma rnyed/_/skye med dbyings 
[\[257a.4\]]kyi rtsal ma shar/_/bde chen gnas kyi gdeng ma thob/_/mtshon med bcud kyi ro ma myos/_/chos nyid sku yi gzugs ma mthong /_/ye shes glong gi sgom phyed/_/de bas rigs kyi bu rnams kyis/_/rang gi gnas la rab tu rtogs/_/lus la bdag tu yod ma 'dzin/_/ngag 
[\[257a.5\]]la brjod par ma smra cig_/sems la dngos por gang ma rtog_/gnas yul rigs khams sde dang dpung /_/brten rdzas longs spyod dbang skal rnams/_/nga dang nga yir gzung bya min/_/thun mong dang ni tha dad gcig_/de dag ma lus stong pa ste/_/stong pa nyid kyang de dag 
[\[257a.6\]]go/_/de las gud na gzhan med de/_/gzhan las gud na'ang de med cing /_/ma skyes ma 'gags mtshan nyid med/_/ma phri ma bsnan ma bslad cing /_/ma bcos ma bsgyur ma byung la/_/ma skyes ma bsgrubs ma bshad pa'i/_/don chen de ni rang nyid las/_/phyi nang snga phyi 
[\[257a.7\]]steng dang 'og_/phyogs mtshams 'khor 'das lus dang sems/_/kun nas rnyed pa ma yin te/_/'di na'ang yod pa ma yin no/_/sha khrag pags dang rus pa dang /_/snying dang glo ba snod rnams dang /_/dbang po yan lag bcas pa la/_/bde chen dam pa de mi gnas/_/
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]de las gzhan na'ang gnas min te/_/gnas ma grub la gnas zhes brjod/_/gnas yod mnyam na der rtogs shig_/ci 'dra ci zhig ji lta bu/_/gang nas 'ongs shing gang du song /_/gang na 'dug cing ci zhig byed/_/dbyibs dang kha dog ming dang mtshan/_/
[\[257b.2\]]rigs dang khams la rab tu rtogs/_/de la de yis der bltas pas/_/mthong ba med pa blta ba yi/_/gang la gang gis gar bsgoms pas/_/bsgom dang bral la sgom zhes bya/_/ci la su zhig spyir spyod pas/_/spyod dgu mi gnas spyod pa che/_/su las sus thob ci 
[\[257b.3\]]bsgrubs pas/_/ma grub rang gnas 'bras bu ste/_/ma lus med cing rnam pa yi/_/yon tan yongs rdzogs dbang phyug go/_/zhi dang rgyas dang mngon du spyod/_/dbang du bsdu ba phrin las yin/_/rang la rdzogs shing rang gis grub/_/thag chod pa dang bstan pa dang /_/tshad 
[\[257b.4\]]ldan mthar phyin la bzla dang /_/'das dang ma 'das ston pa dang /_/bshad dang nyan dang sdud pa dang /_/gnas dus yon tan skyon rnams ni/_/rang gi de nyid rtogs pas 'grub/_/ces bka' stsal to/_/drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las don dam pa'i gnas nye 
[\[257b.5\]]bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi ba'o//_//de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/_/dgos pa chen po 'di gsungs te/_/ye nas ma byung ma skyes pa'i/_/chos nyid don gyi snying po ni/_/gzung 'dzin mtha' bral don rtogs te/_/nga bdag 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog gis/_/
[\[257b.6\]]dregs shing gzir ba'i ru tra de/_/ma bsgral ba ni nyes pa ste/_/thabs dang shes rab snying rje gsum/_/mthun zhing mtshungs ldan sras kyis bsgral/_/dam pa'i don de ma rtogs par/_/dngos por spyad pas 'khor bar ltung /_/mkhas rtogs ldan pas spyad pa yis/_/'phags 
[\[257b.7\]]pa mnyes shing sems can sgrol/_/tshogs nyid rdzogs te sku gsum thob/_/rnam rig mthong bas la thag bcad/_/brtul zhugs drag pos bsgrub pa brtsam/_/dbang du bsdu dang gdul ba'i phyir/_/'jig rten las kyis bsdus pa'i rgyud/_/nga dang ston pa rnams 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]kyis bshad/_/chos dbyings rang gnas dur khrod du/_/rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis ni/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa'i don du sdud/_/snyigs ma rab tu bdo ba'i dus/_/bsdod cing btsugs las ltos pa'i chos/_/skyon dang yon tan tshul du 'byung /_/
[\[258a.2\]]bstan pa 'jig byed las ngan can/_/drag sngags stobs kyis bsgral byas nas/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur/_/dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i rten yin no/_/lha dang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin/_/rdzas rnams rgyu dang rkyen du 'gyur/_/ling ga nya'o dmigs 
[\[258a.3\]]pa'i rten/_/ming rus byang bus rnam shes dang /_/bla tshe 'khor ba'i rten yin te/_/'gugs 'dren gyis ni de dag 'gugs/_/pho nyas las kun sgrub par byed/_/sngags dang rdzas kyi dpal skyed cing /_/thun rdzas rnams kyis myos pa dang /_/rengs lkugs mtshon 'bebs 
[\[258a.4\]]rdul du rlogs/_/gnad du 'bebs shing snying nas 'dren/_/lha dang 'byed cing rtsa ba gcod/_/byang chub sems kyi dngos po ni/_/don po khrag gi lan bu'i mgo/_/kun gzhi til 'bru tsam zhig gnas/_/rtsa ba rlung gnas 'dra bas te/_/phur ba me sbal lta bu yis/_/
[\[258a.5\]]bsdus shing bsregs te gcad pa yis/_/dmigs pa rten dang bral bar byas/_/bkrag dang gzi mdangs rang la 'dus/_/phrin las rnam bzhis gzi ba la/_/dge sdig ngo bo nyid du mnyam/_/lta spyod ldan pas zhing bcus te/_/pha rol bla med gnas su bsgral/_/
[\[258a.6\]]bar ma do yi rnam shes ni/_/hU~M dang phaT kyi 'phro 'du yis/_/sbyang dang spar ba'i las rnams bya/_/phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed/_/phung po lhag ma tsam nyid ni/_/rten gsum gyis ni rab tu sbyang /_/chos sku'i gzugs brnyan bstan par bya/_/'dis ni pha rol bla 
[\[258a.7\]]na med/_/sprul pa dus gsum sangs rgyas dang /_/rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/spyod pa rlabs chen spyad pa'o/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dmigs pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas rdo rje 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]'dzin pa yis/_/las kyi bye brag 'di gsungs te/_/thog mar 'di la shis pa'i gnas/_/dur khrod chu gling ri yi sul/_/khros shing gdug pa'i gnas de ru/_/rab tu mnag cing gdeng ldan pas/_/dam tshig ldan pa'i sgrub po ste/_/yongs su rdzogs pa'i slob 
[\[258b.2\]]ma yis/_/sngon du bla ma mnyes byas shing /_/lhag pa'i lha nyid stobs dang ldan/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa he ru ka/_/nye dang ldan pa gnyis su med/_/tshad dang ldan par gyur pa ste/_/yang dag nges pa'i rtags mthong nas/_/rab tu 'bad par bya ba ni/_/smin 'byor gdug cing 
[\[258b.3\]]shis pa'i sa/_/las la mngag pa de dag la/_/dregs pa gtso 'khor dmigs pa'i rten/_/'dom gang la sogs tshad dang ldan/_/lte ba las ni 'khor lo'i rtsibs/_/bzhi 'am drug gam brgyad du 'god/_/bar khyams phyogs bzhir sgo bzhir bcas/_/rim pa 
[\[258b.4\]]gsum gyi thod phreng ldan/_/rang gi rigs la sngags pa yi/_/dbyibs dang kha dog rgyan dang rtags/_/thams cad ldan pa nyid du bya/_/dregs pa can rnams sku yi rten/_/bris sam brkos sam brtsigs pa dag_/rang gi gnas su mdzes par dgod/_/gsung gi 
[\[258b.5\]]snying po'ang de bzhin no/_/thugs rten rang rang phyag cha 'am/_/sngon nas bsags pa'i rdzas yin no/_/rang sngags bsags pa'i 'khor lo dang /_/mthun gzugs srog gi rgyal mtshan rnams/_/nang du mtshon pa'i rten du gzugs/_/de dag tsit+ta so so ru/_/dmigs pa'i 
[\[258b.6\]]snying po dril te gzhug_/gsang zhing sbas pa'i rten du 'gyur/_/de yi byang shar phyogs mtshams su/_/nga yis sngar bshad rgyud nyid la/_/e dbyibs bzhi dang brgyad cu gnyis/_/khru gang 'dzub gang thur du brko/_/gdug cing drag po'i rdzas kyis byug_/gdug cing 
[\[258b.7\]]bsreg pa'ang de yis so/_/de nyid dgod pa'i rdzas rnams ni/_/rgyud med gzugs ngan ka pA la/_/seng ldeng gser shing yan lag skyes/_/dpal ldan drag po'i phur pa dang /_/shel nag gnam ru gnag po dang /_/gi ling dkar dang gdong dmar dang /_/zla mi gcig dang 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]srid shing dang /_/tsa ra ka dang mgrin snyan dang /_/sa spyod chu spyod rnams kyi lus/_/phyi nang bar dang gsang bas brgyan/_/bsreg chen spyi yi mnyes pa'i rdzas/_/rgyan ldan gzugs dang rnga gling sgras/_/bsung chen dri dang sha khrag ro/_/tsha rtsub reg dang 'bru 
[\[259a.2\]]bcud bshos/_/sha chen dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i tshogs/_/rab tu bstar zhing 'bad pas sbyar/_/dpa' zhing rtul phod skyes bu yis/_/nga yi sngon gyi phrin las bzhin/_/khro la khros pas zhi mdzad de/_/tha mas gnas pa'i 'byung chen lnga/_/drag po sngags kyi 'byung bar 
[\[259a.3\]]bsgom/_/keng rus 'bar ba'i ri rab bam/_/dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gzhal med khang /_/b+han d+ha gnas rigs gsum gyis brtsigs/_/sti ra gsar rnying tshogs kyis gtams/_/rak+ta dmar po brub cing 'bab/_/tshil chen dud pa 'khyil zhing 'phyur/_/dbang po don 
[\[259a.4\]]snying 'phyo zhing 'brul/_/bdud rtsi bshang gci dri bsung ldan/_/yan lag nying lag rkang zhing snyil/_/shun dang pags pa brgyangs shing 'phyar/_/phyogs bzhi mtshams dang steng dang 'og_/gcus dang 'phyang ba bskum dang brgyangs/_/rgyal mtshan dang ni za ra tshags/_/
[\[259a.5\]]ba dan bla re lhab lhub dang /_/phur pa dang ni ltab ma dang /_/yol ko ka ma la gtams ni/_/rab tu mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan/_/gzhal yas 'bar ba de 'dra ba/_/rab tu sngags pa 'di las bshad/_/dregs pa'i bdag po yum dang bcas/_/sbyor zhing dgos pa de 
[\[259a.6\]]nyid kyis/_/bdag gi rang bzhin yongs su bskyed/_/'phro dang chas kyi khyad par dang /_/bsdu dang rang gi gnas su brtag_/skur gyur gang gi mtshan nyid ngo bo dang /_/byang chub sems kyi bya ba yis/_/yum dang bcas pa yongs su rdzogs/_/de yi las kyang sngar bzhin du/_/
[\[259a.7\]]rgyal mdzad rang gi phyag rten du/_/dmigs pa myur lhags de yi 'khor/_/bdud dang gshin rje srin po dang /_/gnod sbyin drag po'i klu dang lha/_/rang rang chung mar bcas pa dag_/ngas bshad bzhin du 'jigs par bsam/_/sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag ste/_/lha 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]dang ma mo rgyal po ging /_/btsan 'gong rmu dang mu stegs dang /_/rang gi sde dang dpung du bcas/_/ma lus dregs pa can gyi tshogs/_/'di las rab brjod gang yin pa/_/de nyid du ni gsal bar bya/_/nga yi sku dang gsung dang thugs/_/ye shes rigs kyi dbang bskur 
[\[259b.2\]]zhing /_/byin gyis brlabs nas rgyas btab ste/_/de la rang bzhin gnas pa bstim/_/yongs rdzogs sku yis bstan pa bsgrub/_/phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul zhing bstod/_/rab tu mnyes pa rgya cher bya/_/phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yis/_/bsdu dang sbyor dang sgrol ba 
[\[259b.3\]]dang /_/gnas dang ring dang rim pa dang /_/bskyed dang dbab pa mnyes pa yi/_/gnas lugs lhun grub ma bcos pas/_/drag sngags rol ba ma 'gags spyod/_/rang gi las la sbyar ba ni/_/bdud kyi khram dang gshin rje'i lto/_/srin po'i dmar dang gnod sbyin byad/_/
[\[259b.4\]]lha yi chad dang ma mo'i rims/_/gza' yi ki kang klu yi dug_/tshe chad pa dang khri mon bcug_/gcan gzan 'dzums dang lcags sgrog tshud/_/nad dang mtshon nyid khong zhugs dang /_/dug 'thungs thog babs bzhin du drag_/thar zhes bya ba gdags su med/_/bdud 
[\[259b.5\]]ni ma brtags srog la rgol/_/gshin rje 'khor ba'i 'khor los gcod/_/srin po ral gri'i so yis 'gems/_/gnod sbyin gnam lcags thog gis 'joms/_/lha ni 'dod pa'i mdung gis sor/_/ma mo dpag med mda' bzhin 'bigs/_/gza' bdud 
[\[259b.6\]]stobs chen sgyogs kyis brdeg_/klu ni sa 'og ral gri sogs/_/thams cad 'dul zhing gcod pa'i sngags/_/mun pa gling 'khrugs bdud kyi skad/_/ngu 'bod lta bu gshin rje ste/_/ro len dur ba srin pos [(]'gren[,]'gran[)]/_/lce mdud drag po gnod sbyin no/_/bka' chad 
[\[259b.7\]]drag stsal lha yi dmod/_/ngu 'bod gdung ba ma mo ste/_/'brug sgra glog 'byin gza' bdud do/_/klu yis sbrul nag dug gis 'joms/_/'jig rten lha srin rang sgra yis/_/phal pa rnams la dmod par byed/_/de ni drag sngags dmod pa'o/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las dmod pa nye bar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/_/so so'i drag sngags dmod pa bstan/_/phung bshig bdud kyi drag sngags ni/_/rabs chang nag po'i thod pa ru/_/shel 
[\[260a.2\]]nag snying du nya'o stsal/_/dur khrod ras nag rgya yis gdab/_/tshon sna lnga 'am nag pos bcings/_/gri lcags sbug ma srog rtsar gzhug_/yungs kar yungs nag til nag dang /_/ske tshe shang tshe zi ra dang /_/zangs lcags rdo yi phye ma dang /_/dug khrag ngar dang bcas pa 
[\[260a.3\]]rnams/_/mu su ra yi thod par bsdu/_/bdud kyi srog tig sngags kyis mngag_/bdud po nag po kha mun de ba mi la cho/_ka la mu tri mA ra ya/_dgra bo snying ling tsit+ta rbud/_nr-i bzlum khyigs/_bram bram ro la 'dus/_zer sprugs/_ro sprugs/_bdud rjes chod/_bdud 
[\[260a.4\]]mos rol/_bdud bus gtor/_ba~M khyigs/_pra ma ni/_sha tru~M mA ra ya rbad/_mun pa gling khrugs zhes bya ba/_/ma 'ongs bdud kyi rang skad de/_/rtag tu brjod cing sbug mar brab/_/gang la dmigs pa de myur du/_/snang srid bdud kyis srog nas 'dren/_/mi nag go mtshon 
[\[260a.5\]]bcas pa dang /_/sngags nag bud med mon dang rdo/_/khyi nag rta nag bya nag dang /_/rgod nag dre nag shel nag dang /_/ri nag mtsho nag shel nag tshogs/_/dmag dang 'khrug dang 'thab pa dang /_/khrid dang gsod dang sha ba dag_/las byed grub pa'i rtags su 'gyur/_/
[\[260a.6\]]de nas nya'o bstabs shing bsgral/_/gri mtshon phur ba rnams kyis gtub/_/lhag ma bdud rtsi sha khrag sbyar/_/ku ku nag po'i zas su sbyin/_/rol par mi byed bskyar la bsgrub/_/ru tras myos shing 'thib nas 'chi/_/'chi bdag gshin rje'i drag sngags ni/_/rgyud med pho 
[\[260a.7\]]mo ka pA la/_/za ma tog tu kha sbyar la/_/nang du de nyid tsit+ta gzhug_/pho thod steng nas spyi bor phug_/bcing dang dgab pa drang ba dag_/sngar bshad rdzas kyis brab cing brdeg_/ya ma me tak+She/_ra tsa sa to me/_ru tsa na yo ni/_ro ma tsa ni/_sa ma rA dza/_mu ka snying khrag rtsal 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]rbad/_ya ma dbugs la rdubs/_ro tsa ya ma rA dza/_rA dza ba~M ril rbad/_ya ma rA dzaHhri snying gong chod/_ya ma snying /_ya ma khrag_/ya ma du ba~M ril rbad/_gshin rje bsdus shing dril ba'i sngags/_/rab tu bsngags te tsit+tar brag_/sha khrag chen pos mnyes par bya/_/
[\[260b.2\]]gsod byed nag po'i tshogs rnams kyis/_/don snying rlon par ster ba dang /_/snying dang thod pa 'phar ba 'byung /_/de nas las la sbyar byas na/_/gang la dmigs pa myur du sgrol/_/gtum khro srin po'i dmod pa ni/_/myur shi'i thod par de snying nang /_/dmigs pa rnams 
[\[260b.3\]]kyi gzugs brnyan de/_/ming sngags ldan pa btsal byas te/_/le brgan kha dog dar gyis dril/_/sngo dmar skud pa'i dra bar gzhug_/sti ra gsar pa kha phye la/_/dbang po don snying nang grol gyi/_/srin po skang zhing dmod pa bzlas/_/rag sha 
[\[260b.4\]]srin po sa mun dzaH_rag sha ru tra hur hur b+h+yo/_ru gnyan nag po dgra la b+h+yo/_dgra bo mu le shi ni sod sod/_hab le hob le kha thun b+h+yo/_rag sha dzaH_tri ta dzaHdu ru du ru shan dzaH/_rag sha rbad/_nr-i mA ra ya sod/_dmod pa rdzas la bzlas shing brdeg_/mi nag shan pa'i tshogs rnams kyis/_/khrid 
[\[260b.5\]]dang gsod dang don snying ster/_/las la sbyar ba tshul bzhin gyis/_/dgra bo'i don po myur du sgrol/_/drag sngags gnod sbyin drag sngags ni/_/rta dkar snying dang thod pa ni/_/nya'o gzhug pa'i snod du bsngags/_/rag chen la phug mu sa la/_/snying sna khrag sna 
[\[260b.6\]]sbyar bas mchod/_/gnod sbyin srog tig dmod la brjod/_/yak+Sha ba hu da ri dzaH_ma ga la bag sha dzaH_ru ru ma ru tra ma ti dzaH_yak+Sha snying la shad shad du dzaH/_yak+Sha srog la bred thuM dzaH/_ming shar tshogs dang 'od dang sgra/_/rlung dmar dag dang bu yug 'ong /_/
[\[260b.7\]]gsang ba'i rdzas kyis drag tu brdeg_/lhag ma bsregs shing rlung gis gtor/_/de nyid khrag tu skyugs te sgrol/_/drag rtsal lha yi drag sngags ni/_/lha g.yag dkar po'i snying nang du/_/brnag pa'i gzugs dang ming rus bris/_/sngon dmar skud pas ske nas 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]gdags/_/rje rigs thod pa'i nang du gzhug_/dar dkar gyis ni kha bcad la/_/tshon skud sna lngas bcing bar bya/_/bya rgod dar ma'i sgro rtsa ni/_/srog rtsar bcug la dkyil du brtol/_/dkyil 'khor mda' gang gru bzhi la/_/dbus su gru gsum 
[\[261a.2\]]thur du bru/_/lha rdo gsum gyi sgyed po la/_/gong gi thod pa gzhag par bya/_/mthun rdzas bshos gtsang rngon cha dang /_/ru dkar snying dang shel dkar snying /_/bya dkar snying dang ru mtshon dang /_/ba dan dkar po rten du gzugs/_/yungs kar sngags kyi mda' chog ni/_/thun 
[\[261a.3\]]gyi rdzas su gzhag par bya/_/drag sngags snying gi nang du brab/_/stobs ldan rdo rje 'dzin gsal bas/_/lha rnams 'dus pa'i sngags rnams sbreng /_/ma hA de ba ti dzaHti dzaH/_sa ma phra ma na rag sha ka~M ka la ya hU~M/_de ba rA dza ma hA ni dzaH/_dgra bo mar ya thun rbad thun rbad/_
[\[261a.4\]]shag sen dzaHdzaH_shag sen dzaHdzaHhU~M hU~M/_tsa tur mu kha rag sha ma na/_kang ka ma ya hU~M/_ma hA de ba a mu ka mA ra ya sod/_'jig rten grags pa mthu rtsal can/_/lha yi bod rbad gsad gsum dril/_/drag tu bzlas shing snying nas brab/_/rtags ni rgyal po rje dpon dang /_/
[\[261a.5\]]skyes pa stag chas dar ma dang /_/zhub can pho tshogs 'ong ba ni/_/gsod gcod byed dang snying 'byin dang /_/dngos su snying phyung 'phang ba 'ong /_/rtags byung snying nas ling ga dbyung /_/mtshon gyis gtub la me la bsreg_/thal ba nya'o byas nas ni/_/thod par bcug la lha rten 
[\[261a.6\]]nam/_/'jig rten lha chen gnas sar mnan/_/lha yi dal yams dgra la phebs/_/nad bdag ma mo'i drag sngags ni/_/nr-i dri'i mo yi thod pa ru/_/de yi snying nang ling ga gzhug_/mthing nag dar gyis kha gcad la/_/thod pa tshon skud lnga yis bcings/_/dkyil 'khor mthing 
[\[261a.7\]]nag gru gsum dbus/_/thod pa bcug la bsgrub par bya/_/smug nag gsum gyi snying khrag gis/_/ma mo 'khor dang bcas pa mchod/_/yungs kar yungs nag ske tshe sogs/_/drag po'i thun rdzas tshogs tshad la/_/ma mo rnams kyi dmod pa'i sngags/_/ma ma snying kha rag_/
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]ma ma snying kha rag_/ma ma rak+sha/_ma ma rag sha_/trag rag sha snying khrag la hu bas dzaH_snying khrag rtsa la dun dun/_trag rag sha ma ma dzaH_dzaH_ngam ngam dgra snying rbad bu nan ma ma nr-i snying tsit+ta la thun/_trag rag sha tra rag sha mo thun thun/_mugs mugs myogs myogs 
[\[261b.2\]]rbad rbad dzaHdzaHma ma thun/_snying khrag thun/_sha ti ta ma ma rag mo/_sa ma ya b+h+yo b+h+yo/_ma mo'i srog tig bsdus pa yi/_/gsad pa las kyi ngan sngags 'di/_/gri lcags las byas sbu gu 'am/_/bya rgod sgro rtsa'i nang nas bsngags/_/ma sring mon mo phal mo dang /_/byi mo la 
[\[261b.3\]]sogs bud med tshogs/_/bya nag rgod nag tshogs chen lhags/_/dngos su sha dang mgo sug ster/_/tsit+ta dngos su 'phar ba dang /_/bsad rtags yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_/snying la phur bas gdab cing bsad/_/dug shing me la sbyin sreg bya/_/thun khrag 
[\[261b.4\]]dmigs pa'i dgra la 'phang /_/thal ba bsdus la nya'o bya/_/dur khrod dbus su gnas par bya/_/rims nad dag gis dmigs pa sgrol/_/drag po'i gza' yi drag sngags ni/_/mon pa nag po'i ra rog po'i/_/thod par snying nang ling ga gzhug_/srog rtsar gri lcags sbu gu 
[\[261b.5\]]gzhug_/yungs kar yungs nag zangs lcags phye/_/thun du sngags te thod par brab/_/mA ra pa sha mi ki/_du ru du ru/_ma ti dz+wa la ti dzaH_tsa ba ma ni/_ru ru ra hu la/_a tra ta tra pad ma sha ra sha ra shasta/_a mu ka mu ra ru phaT/_tri ling ka shang+ka du dri/_dzaHdzaHyag sha thun/_
[\[261b.6\]]bum dril shi ni ba~M b+ha ba hi/_kha yag kha dun ti/_ru ti shu ti ti trig shu la pra ti/_mA ra ya dzaH/_dbang chen gza' yi drag sngags 'di/_/drag po'i rdzas la bsngags te brdeg_/sha rul khrag rul btsos dang rjen/_/dkar gsum dmar gsum rdzas kyis mchod/_/nyi 
[\[261b.7\]]zla klad la 'khor ba dang /_/mon pa nag po 'ong ba dang /_/sbrul chen gshog can 'khyug pa dang /_/bar snang 'ja' yis khengs pa dang /_/dgra bo dngos su khrid nas 'ong /_/rgod dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gsod pa dang /_/don snying nang khrol ster zhing rol/_/de lta'i gsod 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]rtags rdzogs pa dang /_/snying dang long ka hoM mer bsreg_/thun rdzas dgra yi yul du gtor/_/thod pa klu yi brtan sar sba/_/chu 'khyags ser ba drag tu dbab/_/hur thum nad kyis glo bur 'chi/_/kha lkugs rkang lag rengs par 'gyur/_/gdug pa 
[\[262a.2\]]klu yi drag sngags ni/_/lung gsum 'dus pa'i dben gnas su/_/stegs bu mthing nag gru gsum brus/_/dgra yi pha mes mgo bo 'am/_/yang na mdze can thod pa ru/_/dgra yi ming rus bris te gzhug_/gtsang ma'i snod du dkar gsum dang /_/mngar gsum klu sman 
[\[262a.3\]]sna tshogs dang /_/rtag tu mchod cing mngag par bya/_/o~M nag po ti pa tsa ya/_nA ga rA dzaHdgra bo he khu la phe shan/_nA ga phos phos/_shig shig_/hu ya hu ya/_ti ya ti ya/_ti pa tsa ti pa tsa/_a sha nag po ti pa tsa ya/_nA ga rA dza dgra bo mA ra ya rbad/_shag ti rbad/_
