[\[262a.4\]]srog ti rbad/_snying ti rbad/_snying la ril sham sham rbad/_o~M shan nag po phe rag u da nA ga rA dza nAn/_thi li nAn/_pho li nAn/_drag tu brjod cing bsgrub pa yis/_/me chen 'bar dang chu chen brug_/ba glang sbal sbrul sdom sdig tshogs/_/shing gcod sa snyil brag 
[\[262a.5\]]ral sogs/_/lus la shu ba skrang lo byung /_/stobs ldan gnyen pos drag tu gcun/_/de nas byang bltas chu mig tu/_/ba ling gtang zhing bden pa brdar/_/thod pa ling gar bcas pa mnan/_/klu rgyal 'khor dang bcas la gtad/_/phung po lhag med btang bar bsam/_/
[\[262a.6\]]gnas su phyin la bsrung bar bya/_/dgra ni mdze dang rmugs pas 'chi/_/sde brgyad so so'i drag sngags kyis/_/'jig rten las kyis mnar ba yi/_/bstan pa'i ru tra gdug pa can/_/ma lus rnams kyi gshed du 'gyur/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/drag sngags 'dus pa 
[\[262a.7\]]rtsa ba'i rgyud las dregs pa'i sde so so'i las la sbyar ba drag sngags kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/_/'jig rten dregs pa can rnams kyi/_/so so'i rigs dang gtan tshigs dang /_/sde dang las kyi byed pa bstan/_/sngon gyi 'jig rten 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]khams 'di nyid/_/phung po nyon mongs la brten nas/_/nga rgyal dregs pa'i dbang gis myos/_/rang gzhan kun la 'tshe zhing rtsod/_/gnas ngan len gyis kha khrid byas/_/legs pa'i lan du nyes par spyod/_/ma rig rtsa ba yan lag gis/_/gti mug mun thibs bdud 
[\[262b.2\]]dang klu/_/nga rgyal stobs kyi dregs pa bdag_/lha dang rgyal po gol sar 'gyur/_/phrag dog gza' dang gshin rje'i rigs/_/'dod chags ma mo gnod sbyin rigs/_/zhe sdang btsan dang srin por gol/_/srog lus 'brel pas bdud ces bya/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gshin 
[\[262b.3\]]rje rdog rnams rje/_/phra mor rgyu ba snang zhing dregs/_/de yi don gyis srin por byung /_/gang gis gnod pa sbyin byed pa'i/_/de yi rigs dang mtshan nyid do/_/gang las bskyed pa ma mo ste/_/skyod byed nus pa lha yin no/_/gdug cing gtum pas mi 'chor ba/_/gza' zhes 
[\[262b.4\]]bya bar brjod pa yin/_/blun zhing myos pas klu zhes bya/_/'gro ba rigs drug so so la/_/bdud dang lha dang lha min te/_/gnod sbyin gza' dang rgyu skar bcas/_/rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha yi sde/_/ma mo srin mo mi yi sde/_/gshin rje [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sde yin te/_/klu ni byol 
[\[262b.5\]]song sde yin no/_/bdud ris pho dang mo yi rigs/_/ye nas gnas dang blo bur byung /_/'thab dang myos dang dregs par byed/_/sred dang chags par byed pa ste/_/gshin rje las dang zhi bas ste/_/gzugs can gzugs med dbang can dang /_/dbang med phyi dang 
[\[262b.6\]]nang khyad par/_/las kyis rab tu bsgrims pa yi/_/srin po sha za rgan mo can/_/sprul pa dang ni gzu lums can/_/rab tu rgyu dang gcig pu gnas/_/gnod sbyin gtso dang 'khor gyis brtags/_/grol ba dang ni rang rgyud de/_/tha dad rigs ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad de/_/
[\[262b.7\]]gnod cing 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid can/_/lha ni 'dod pa'i gzugs can dang /_/gzugs med lha ma yin du gtogs/_/rab tu gdug rtsub che bas ni/_/lha min mi ma yin du grags/_/gang las byung dang gang las srid/_/gang gis bskyed pa'i gzhir gyur pa/_/
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]ma mo zhes su grags pa ste/_/las dang ye shes bsdus shing phye/_/phra dang rags pa'i khyad par gyis/_/che chung gcal dang 'khor du snang /_/mkha' la rgyu ba'i drag shul can/_/las kyi phung po kho na'o/_/rgyal po bla rje bram ze dang /_/dmangs dang 
[\[263a.2\]]gdol pa can rnams kyis/_/nyi shu rtsa lnga'i yan lag 'gyur/_/tha dad rigs ni sde yin no/_/'di dag thog ma'i las kyi dngos/_/dngos dang rang bzhin mtshan nyid kyis/_/ma rig 'khrul pa'i gzung 'dzin byung /_/bdag blta bag la nyal du gnas/_/g.yo 
[\[263a.3\]]'gul phra mo'i kun nas ldang /_/'khrug cing 'tshe dang rtsod par shar/_/bsod nams las dang de ma yin/_/las kyi mtha' gnyis g.yang sar lhung /_/gnag cing mi dge zag par bcas/_/kha na ma tho lung ma bstan/_/log pa lus ngag yid gsum gyis/_/gnas 
[\[263a.4\]]ngan len pa'i rgyun chags 'thud/_/dus gsum phyogs dang bcas pa yi/_/rjes su 'gro dang bzlog pa yis/_/'khor ba brten gzhi dam po btsugs/_/so sor ma rig srog la gcod/_/longs spyod 'phrog cing rnam par 'tshe/_/gzi mdangs 'byor pa sde dang 
[\[263a.5\]]bcas/_/gang yin 'joms shing rlag nus la/_/rgyud la sdug bsngal skyed byed pa/_/ma rungs nyes pa 'byin byed las/_/srog len tshe 'phrog gcod dang sha/_/myos 'thibs byi nad rims dang yams/_/gcog 'gyel gdug pa'i nad 'bebs shing /_/rme dang 
[\[263a.6\]]'khrug pa rtsod pa dang /_/thor shod las dang dmod pa yis/_/rang gi sde las re re yang /_/kun la khyab pa brgyad brgyad de/_/drug cu rtsa drug yan lag bcas/_/las kyi dbye ba bsam mi khyab/_/dregs pa'i bdag po so so yi/_/rang bzhin dgos pa'i bye brag 
[\[263a.7\]]gis/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas bstan pa dag_/tshul bzhin srung ba'i dam tshig can/_/drag sngags las kyi dmod pa la/_/brgya dang bcu gnyis bcu drug gis/_/nus pa rdzu 'phrul mthu la sogs/_/rang gi rigs la gang bsngags pa/_/de dang de la rab sbyar 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]bas/_/las kyi mtha' la gang dmigs pa/_/rdo rje can gyis yongs grub ste/_/nga yi stobs dang nus pa dang /_/mthu dang rdzu 'phrul yon tan tshogs/_/lus ngag yid kyis rab 'bad pa/_/gang yin de la mngon par 'byung /_/de yi thun mong yongs 'grub cing /_/
[\[263b.2\]]mthar phyin pa yang len par byed/_/'di las ma 'ongs rnyog pa can/_/the tshom bskyed par ma byed cig_/nga dang rgyal ba thams cad kyis/_/'di ni rab tu bsngags pa'o/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las dregs pa can gyi sde rigs 
[\[263b.3\]]dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/_/las la sbyar ba'i rim pa gsungs/_/dur khrod chu gling ri rtse dang /_/chu 'dus ngam grog 'jigs su rung /_/phung shul nags khrod ma rungs pa/_/dregs pa las kyi gnas yin no/_/
[\[263b.4\]]mi rus mi gsad phung shul sa/_/rdur zad phe ta rul chad sa/_/sa smin dri chen ma rungs khrag_/las kyi rten 'brel dmigs pa'i rdzas/_/rta nag dre nag ma he dang /_/chu glang dang ni stag seng dang /_/rta dkar ne le rgod dkar dang /_/dom nag dmu rta ban glang dang /_/
[\[263b.5\]]'brug chen rma bya rus sbal dang /_/bya khyi ku ku shel dang mi/_/rgyal mtshan thod pa snying dang khrag_/bdud rtsi 'bru bcud byang chub sems/_/rang gzugs snying po 'khor lo bcas/_/rgyan ldan shos cha mthun pa'i rdzas/_/dam tshig mchod cing brten pa'o/_/so sor sngags 
[\[263b.6\]]pa'i las khung du/_/thod ngan 'bru nag dug khrag g.yos/_/rgyu gsum phu sa mtshon cha rnams/_/gsad pa thun gyi rdzas yin no/_/rme khrag gsum dang dri ngan gsum/_/srog chags gsum dang rme rdzas gsum/_/thabs rdzas gsum dang bsreg rdzas gsum/_/rten sa 
[\[263b.7\]]gsum dang dril sa gsum/_/bzhugs sa gsum dang dbab sa gsum/_/kun rdzogs rtsol ba'i sbyor ba yis/_/chu drag dbab pa nges par 'grub/_/rigs sul snod dang mchod rdzas dang /_/gnas sbyong byang chub srid 'dor blos/_/legs slangs yid kyis mthun 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]spyad pas/_/gang la dmigs pa der gtad pas/_/chos sku'i gzugs brnyan rten khang la/_/steng 'og gnas gsum bdag po gsum/_/rgya mtsho'i gting dang ri rab zur/_/bar snang khams dang nam mkha'i dbyings/_/bsrung dang bzlog 
[\[264a.2\]]dang gsad pa'i las/_/dmag dpung bsdu dang dpal skyed dang /_/rab tu khros dang sbyor ba zhig_/las kyis pha rol dmod pas bzlog_/ngan pa'i thod pa sna gsum dang /_/shis pa ma yin sa brgyad du/_/rten cing 'brel pa 'byung sbyor bas/_/dmigs pa'i nus 
[\[264a.3\]]stobs gnon par byed/_/khyad par las kyi bye brag gis/_/rgyal po ya rabs rje dpon dang /_/chung ma slob dpon mkhan po dang /_/rab byung khyim pa sngags spyod dang /_/phyi rol phyogs dang chos kyi grogs/_/che btsan dregs pas bsnyems pa dang /_/nga rgyal ldan zhing 
[\[264a.4\]]skal ba bzang /_/kun gyis bkur zhing brjod pa dang /_/sems rgyud bsrel dang yun gyis drin/_/nye bar bstan cing slob sbyong gnas/_/lhag pa'i lha yis rab skyangs te/_/thun mong nus pa'i stobs rnyed cing /_/yon tan gcig gis rab bsdus pas/_/tshar gcad 
[\[264a.5\]]dka' ba'i yul yin te/_/ma lus gang la bsngags pa yis/_/ting nge 'dzin dang dmigs pa'i grogs/_/rab sngags brtson 'grus can gyis bsgral/_/gzhan yang zhi dang rgyas pa dang /_/dbang dang mngon par spyod rnams dang /_/rdo rje 'dzin pa nga dang gzhan/_/
[\[264a.6\]]mtshungs ldan rnams kyis bshad pa bzhin/_/thogs med nus pa'i stobs kyis spyad/_/de dag gsang ba'i dmod pa yang /_/dregs pa sde brgyad so so yi/_/gal gnad snying po 'di dag go/_/ya ma du ha na ha na tiSh+Ta tiSh+Ta ru tra ma ma sod sod/_/kha tri dza ma tri dzaHdzaH
[\[264a.7\]]shog tri dzaH_yag sha dzaHda hri dzaHsha tri pa tri dzaH/_tsit+ta pra ma ya a mu ka srog la dzaHdzaHb+h+yo/_tri tsa pa la ag shug me/_a b+hi sha/_a b+hi shu/_tsag kra rag sha sa ma ya dun thum ril li li/_myags myags myogs/_srog la thun rbad/_rag sha srog la phrig 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]phrig_/a pa ti li ki ni ya ma shri hri sti b+h+ri tri ta na kro ma ri pa tra srog la dun b+h+yo/_ma hA yag sha thum ril rbad/_ma ru tse d+ha sha 'grib pra ma ling /_gsod sgra gcod byed 'phrog byed kyis/_/ma lus las la bsngags par 'gyur/_/nr-i hur thums dzaHsha tru~M mA ra ya rbad/_
[\[264b.2\]]a mu ka mA ra ya nu ma ka ma ru sod sod/_gsad pa thun gyi dmod pa'o/_/byi sha mi ki du ru mi tri ka ta dz+wa la a ta dza la swA hA/_tsa pa ti rA hu la ma hA kro d+ha ka pa shar shar ta sha ra ti hU~M phaT/_bi shu la du ma gi sha dz+wa la an/_ma hA tsan+d+ha rag sha hr-i da nr-i ma ya ru tra sa tri byi 
[\[264b.3\]]nA ga rA tsa be ga a nan+ta rag+sha ti san+d+ha rak+Shi na tsit+ta b+ha mi ku ru/_mu hri tsan+d+ha dum bu dum bu/_kha la rag sha thum ri li li/_ma ma sa ma ya trag rag sha trag rag sha ma tri ga na/_ma sa kha ya ku ru ti rtse b+ha li mu ta da ra da ra/_tri kar mi tri/_dul dul/_snying khrag la ril ril/_
[\[264b.4\]]rtsa la thun thun/_trag rag mo hril hril/_shag shag_/shar shar rbad/_ma ma tsag sha trag tu phrom/_a se la mi byi ru lu ru lu ma ma trag rag sha hril hril shar b+h+yo/_mA ra ya raM hril shar b+h+yo/_shel tra hU~M drag tu rtsar shu ti phroM kar phroM/_phyir ma ti ba shad/_mi 
[\[264b.5\]]gi ri ra hu la shag shag hril phob/_khrag la tsa ra mu sha b+h+yo/_trag ram thun shag ril ram shar b+h+yo/_bdud phroM kar shu ti phroM/_nag hril sen shags du ma ya hril b+h+yo/_pra ta pa sha ya ya ma snying ya ma snying ya ma khrag_/ra hu la hril hril shag shag_/ser ser/_tug tug_/
[\[264b.6\]]ya ya/_phob phob/_mu ka ye/_ka pa ye/_a pa ye/_hri sti byi krin te/_dza pa ti ra hu la ma hA kro ta ka bab ta shar shal ta te hU~M phaT/_thig nig_/shu ti phroM/_bdud phroM/_mthongs phye/_lcags sgrog khrol/_mi reng sod/_rkyang rje rkyang mo tsu ru tsu ru/_ho ho/_phroM 
[\[264b.7\]]phroM/_mu ra mu ra sha/_du ru phroM/_thog hU~M hU~M sod sod/_rlung dang sprin dang rab rgyu dang /_phyogs dang rtags kyi tshad ldan pas/_dbab pa'i sbyor ba shes par bya/_steng 'og bar gsum drag po'i las/_/gzhug dang gtor dang bsreg pa'i dang /_/bskol dang 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]dgug dang sbreng ba dang /_/bod dang dmod dang gdung ba dang /_/gzir dang skor dang gzhig pa dang /_/gcad dang dril ba'i las rnams kyis/_/smin pa'i lo thog 'joms par byed/_/nag po ti pa tsa yan rag sha/_ra dza d+he gu lu phe sha rag sha nAn/_phos 
[\[265a.2\]]phos/_shig shig_/hu ya hu ya/_tir+ya tir+ya/_kA la nA ga ban+d+ha dgra bo mA ra ya dzaH/_nag po ti pa tsa ya phe sha rag sha dzaH_nA ga ka ka la phe sha rag sha dzaHdzaH_a shan nA ga ti pa tsa ya dgra bo ma ra ya dzaH/_nA ga rA dza shag ti srog ti la rbad/_snying la rol/_sham sham 
[\[265a.3\]]rbad/_i shan nAn/_phe sha rag sha u nAn/_nA ga nAn thi li nAn/_phi li nAn/_rtsi ri nAn/_a par sod rmag_/dul dul kA la rdubs myogs thibs/_mA ra ya 'dus 'dus/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_ru ru/_ra ra/_ti ti/_tri mo ti ti/_ga ru ga ra gtor dza ma ra te gad/_
[\[265a.4\]]man dzaHphe shan rag sha u ta nAn/_b+ha shi ni/_shar le/_shu ru mu le/_d+ha ta ma re na/_hu ya hu ya/_ra ti ra ti/_thi ri shag tsag gi/_nr-i mA ra tri ya ma du ya ma snying yam khrag tshal pa ba~M ril/_nag po ti pa rag sha nAn/_khug ro la ba~M/_dgra bo mA ra ya dzaH/_nag po ti pa 
[\[265a.5\]]tsa/_snying la dzaH/_shag shan nAn/_khug thum ril rbad/_tsan dri rag sha ro la khug thun kA la snying la thum ril rbad/_kA la sho ro snying la trag sha ha ra ka/_a mu ka mA ra ya thum ril rbad nAn/_khugs dang 'gro dang las byed pa'i/_/rang gi rtags dang ldan pa na/_/
[\[265a.6\]]dmigs pa'i las la sbyar bar bya/_/zlog dang ma grub 'khyil pa dang /_/'byams dang sdug dang zad mthar gtugs/_/gnyen po 'dab ma sna sel dang /_/bsdu dang spo dang mi zad gter/_/longs spyod thug pa med pa yis/_/dbyings kyi ngang du gtad par bya/_/sde brgyad 
[\[265a.7\]]so so'i ming gi sngags/_/rang skad dmod pa'i yan lag la/_/d+he ba a byi sarba b+h+yo bzlog_/pra la dun rtse phob/_badzra 'grig sho sa ma ya hri b+h+yo/_ba san ti ma ru ru/_ya ma trig b+hu ta k+Shi pa lo hU~M/_bzlog bsgyur gdug pa'i drag sngags kyis/_/las kyi mtha' sgyur ma 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]lus par/_/nga 'am nga dang 'dra ba yi/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa gzhan rnams kyis/_/phyi nang gsang ba'i las rnams kyis/_/gang la bsngags pa de dag sbyar/_/gzhan gyis the tshom mi bya ste/_/nga dang dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis/_/de la rig par snang ba yin/_/zhes 
[\[265b.2\]]bka' stsal to/_/drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las phrin las dmigs pa'i khyad par las sbyar ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/_/yon tan bstod pa 'di gsungs so/_/hU~M dur khrod chen po'i rol pa'i dkyil 'khor nas/_/
[\[265b.3\]]gtum drag me ltar 'bar ba'i gzhal yas na/_/gdug byed ru tra sti ra'i khri stengs na/_/mdangs ldan nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs na/_/dregs pa'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gtso/_/bcom ldan dpal chen stobs ldan nag po ni/_/sku mdog mthing nag rab tu 'bar/_/
[\[265b.4\]]sa dgu rdzogs pas dbu dgu bstan/_/stong pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ldan pa'i phyag_/zhabs kyis brjid pa'i bdud bzhi gnon/_/dbus mthing g.yas dkar g.yon dmar bas/_/khro zhing bzhad dang gtsigs pa'i zhal/_/ral pa kham nag srid rtser 'bar/_/khams 
[\[265b.5\]]gsum ma lus spyan gyis gzigs/_/shangs kyis srid gsum ma lus rngub/_/snyan gyis stong gsum 'brug sgras 'gengs/_/tshems kyis gnod gdug ma lus sgrol/_/ljags kyis glog dmar 'jig rten khyab/_/khro gnyer 'od kyis dbang du sdud/_/phrin las 
[\[265b.6\]]rigs kyis dbu la brgyan/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad phyag gi dang po gnyis/_/dbang sdud rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/_/g.yas g.yon 'og ma'i phyag brgyad na/_/dregs pa'i lha brgyad b+han d+ha g.yas/_/tsit+ta srog rtsa g.yon na bsnams/_/'bar ba'i chas kyis sku la brgyan/_/bsrung 
[\[265b.7\]]ba'i lha brgyad sku la rdzogs/_/g.yas g.yon zhabs kyis dregs pa gzir/_/ma rungs gdul dka' rnams kyi gshed/_/log lta ru tra 'dul ba'i dpal/_/'byung lnga'i bdag mo gnyis med yum/_/dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi sbyor/_/gri gug tri shUl bdud rtsi 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]g.yas/_/b+han d+ha zhing chen g.yang gzhi g.yon/_/mthing nag 'od kyis kun du khyab/_/ched 'ga' rigs kyi sprul pa 'di/_/dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/_/sku mdog mthing nag khros shing rngam/_/phyag drug g.yas g.yon dang 
[\[266a.2\]]po yis/_/rdo rjes dung khrag dkrug cing gsol/_/g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi phyag bzhi yis/_/lha brgyad klu brgyad tsit+ta rol/_/yum chen zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/_/sku mdog mthing nag zhabs gnyis sbyor/_/g.yas kyis nam mkha' stong khams 
[\[266a.3\]]'degs/_/g.yon gyis 'jig rten sa gzhi gnon/_/zhal nas 'byung ba lnga 'char ma/_/dpal chen yab yum byin rlabs las/_/sprul pa'i dregs pa pho mo gtso/_/bdud mo nag mo kha rlangs can/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing /_/khram shing tri 
[\[266a.4\]]shUl g.yas na bsnams/_/g.yon gyis kha T+wAM zhags pa 'phen/_/na bza' zhing lpags rlon pa gsol/_/zhabs gnyis gdug pa'i snying gar gzir/_/bdud mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma/_/khram ba~M thod rlon phyag na bsnams/_/sku la zhing lpags gsar pa 
[\[266a.5\]]bgos/_/bdud rta nag po chibs su bcibs/_/zhabs kyis dgra bgegs bshugs kyis sgrol/_/'chi bdag gshin rje nag po ni/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog gnag_/phyag g.yas thod khrag gri gug g.yon/_/btsun mo yum chen za byed ma/_/
[\[266a.6\]]gri gug thod pa phyag na bsnams/_/yab yum zhing lpags rlon pa gsol/_/ma he khros dang chu glang bcibs/_/zhabs kyis dgra bgegs pho mo gzir/_/srin po gsod byed sku mdog gnag_/phyag na ral gri thod khrag bsnams/_/yum chen gsod par 
[\[266a.7\]]byed ma yang /_/gri gug mi thod phyag na bsnams/_/na bza' zhing lpags rlon pa gsol/_/stag seng rol pa chibs su bcibs/_/gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po yang /_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo/_/dar nag 'phyar zhing zhing lpags brdeg_/
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]yum chen sha za ral gcig ma/_/yum gyi tshul 'dzin sprul pa mo/_/zhing lpags gyon te gyi ling bcibs/_/drag sngags bdag po chen po ni/_/dbang phyug chen po lha yi gtso/_/mdog dkar shel gri ba dan 'phyar/_/na bza' dar dkar ber chen gsol/_/chibs 
[\[266b.2\]]su gnam ru dkar po bcibs/_/thar pa nag po ru tra'i gtso/_/mchod gtor dug thun phyag na bsnams/_/zhing lpags gyon te dom nag bcibs/_/dmu bdud rje dpon nag po ni/_/dar nag 'phyar zhing sti ra 'drad/_/ber nag gsol zhing dmu rta bcibs/_/mu stegs 
[\[266b.3\]]kA la yag sha ni/_/mthing nag kha T+wAM tri shUl 'dzin/_/zhing lpags bgos te ma he bcibs/_/khyab 'jug rog ti nag po yang /_/khram shing dgra sta phyag gis 'dzin/_/sprin nag bgos te 'brug sngon bcibs/_/klu rgyal ba ru Na yi rje/_/ser nag sbrul gyi 
[\[266b.4\]]nam bza' gsol/_/bum pa rus sbal phyag gis 'dzin/_/chibs su chu srin mgo dgu bcibs/_/rgyal po har mdzes zhes bya ba/_/mdog dkar shel gri dar dkar 'dzin/_/sras mchog 'bar ba dmar po ste/_/mdung [{]rings [,]ring [}]g.yas la shan gri g.yon/_/rdo rje 
[\[266b.5\]]mdzes pa mdog dmar po/_/ru mtshon dgra sta phyag gis 'dzin/_/khu le lag dgu 'bar ba yang /_/mdog gser sprul pa'i lag dgu 'gyed/_/zhing lpags bgos shing sti ra gnon/_/drag sngags bdag po gtso 'khor yang /_/rang gi rigs kyi 'khor 
[\[266b.6\]]'dul ba/_/so so'i sprul pa bsam mi khyab/_/gcod par byed pa bdud kyi sde/_/'chi bar byed pa gshin rje'i sde/_/gsod byed shan pa srin po'i sde/_/gdug rtsub 'chang ba gnod sbyin sde/_/drag rtsal ldan pa lha yi sde/_/nad gdon 'bebs pa ma mo'i sde/_/
[\[266b.7\]]nam mkha' dbang sgyur gza' yi sde/_/glen lkugs gdug pa klu yi sde/_/sde brgyad dmod pa'i drag sngags can/_/mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab/_/'khor dang sde rigs brjod mi lang /_/phrin las longs spyod mi zad gter/_/yon tan nus pa dpag tu 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]med/_/zhe sdang can la khros par ston/_/nga rgyal can la lhag par ston/_/'dod chags can la mi sdug ston/_/gti mug can la myos par ston/_/ser sna can gyis 'phrog par byed/_/phrag dog can la 'jigs par ston/_/khyod kyis mi 'dul 
[\[267a.2\]]gcig med kyis/_/mchod cing bskang ba'i thun rdzas bzhes/_/bcol cing gnyer ba'i las mdzod cig_/bstod cing bsgrub pas las mdzod dgyes par mdzod/_/de nas rang gi snying po dang /_/'jig rten dregs pa'i bdag po rnams/_/so so'i sngags kyi las 
[\[267a.3\]]la sbyar/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis/_/byang chub sems kyi bsam pa yis/_/ltos dang re ba kun spangs te/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa rab dmigs nas/_/drag sngags bdag po nyer bsgrubs na/_/nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa thob cing /_/
[\[267a.4\]]sems can rnams kyi ston par 'gyur/_/thun mong ba dang nye ba dang /_/mchog 'gyur ring ba'i dngos grub kun/_/dpa' bo de las mngon du 'byung /_/yon tan mchog gi stobs rnyed cing /_/'jig rten chos las rab bsngags pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 
[\[267a.5\]]dang /_/sa chen po la rtogs pa yi/_/rlabs chen rnams kyang nus par spyod/_/mthu stobs nus pa bsnyems pa yis/_/gzhan gyis brdzi bar mi nus shing /_/rang gi dbang du khugs pa dang /_/bsgo ba rtsod pa med par 'gyur/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/drag 
[\[267a.6\]]sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las bstod pa yon tan brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos/_nyid kyi sku 'jigs byed chen po'i lugs su sku sprul te/_thugs chos nyid zhi ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la 
[\[267a.7\]]snyoms par zhugs nas/_sku'i gnas thams cad las 'od kyi dra ba dpag tu med pa phyung nas/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dregs pa can gyi gnas thams cad khyab par mdzad nas/_/ma rungs shing gdug pa dang gtum pa'i sems dang 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]bsam pa thams cad kyang ma lus par zhi ba byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par gyur te/_phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_gnod pa med pa dang /_brtse ba dang /_yid dga' ba dang bcas pas phyogs der snang bar gyur nas/_thams cad kyis bcom ldan 
[\[267b.2\]]'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de la phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye ma bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang /_/khyod kyi bstan pa gsang chen 'di/_/ma 'ongs pa yi dus dag tu/_/rab tu rgyas par 'gyur zhig na/_/bdag cag 'jig rten dregs pa 
[\[267b.3\]]can/_/zhi ba'i sems su gnas byas pas/_/rjes su spyod pa gang yin pa/_/de la rgyas pa phan par bstan/_/phrin las dang ni lta spyod kyis/_/khyab pa de las yongs rdzogs shing /_/grogs dang bran dang dmangs bzhin du/_/gang gis 
[\[267b.4\]]bsgo ba de bzhin bgyi/_/dam tshigs bsrungs pa'i yon tan dang /_/rol pa'i ting 'dzin ldan pa la/_/bka' las 'da' ba mi spyod cing /_/gsung bzhin bsgrub pa rab tu spro/_/bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin khyod kyis/_/ji ltar mngags pa'i las rnams 
[\[267b.5\]]ni/_/bdag cag nus pas myur du bsgrub/_/byin gyis brlab pa gtsor mdzod cig_/ces gsol nas rang rang gi gnas su dengs shing phyin par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer gyi bkod pa rnams rang gi 'khor gyi snang ba thams cad kyang nyid 
[\[267b.6\]]kyi sku'i dbyings su bsdus shing sku nyid kyang chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin du gnas par mdzad do/_/drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las phrin las kyi gnyer phul ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs 
[\[267b.7\]{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas dang /_bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bdag bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//rgyal po khri srong lde btsan gyi bla'i phyag dpe la zhal bshus pa las brgyud pa'o//_//_
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]{D844}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_lo ka sto tra pU dza tan+t+ra nA ma no pi ka san+ta ka~M/_bod skad du/_'jig rten mchod bstod sgrub pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba[(] [,]/[ )]bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom 
[\[268a.2\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid gsang ba chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa/_dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ma lus pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las ma lus pa yang dag par bsgrub par mdzad pa/_
[\[268a.3\]]mthu dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_dbang phyug dang /_gzugs kyis 'jigs par byed pa/_gtum po dang /_drag shul can dang /_dregs pa can dang /_stobs can dang /_bzod par dka' bdag myur du 'dul bar byed pa/_bde bar gshegs 
[\[268a.4\]]pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi snying po de kho na nyid las phyung ba/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtso bo sa chen po mthar phyin pa la rab tu zhugs pa/_'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa'i dbang phyug lha'i rigs rnams kyi 
[\[268a.5\]]bdag po chen po lcang lo can gyi gnas dang ri rab kyi gnas kyi gnod sbyin rnams kyi ded dpon chen po de/_'og min gyi gnas lha'i rgyal po'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na bzhugs te/_dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 
[\[268a.6\]]'phrul pa'i 'od zer sna tshogs bkye nas tshig 'di skad du bskul te/_kye kye gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin/_/khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/_/bstan pa dam pa bsrung ba yi/_/mthu stobs bdag por dbang bskur te/_/dam tshig chen po de gzigs 
[\[268a.7\]]la/_/sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba las/_/'jigs byed 'jigs par byed pa yi/_/sku mchog drag po'i gsung dang bcas/_/gtum po'i thugs kyis shugs phyung la/_/gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir/_/sprul pa snga 'phrul phrin las kyis/_/
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]sngon gyi thugs dam rol par mdzod/_/ces bskul ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad pa'i dus la bab par mkhyen nas/_nyid kyi sku gsung thugs zhi ba chos nyid de bzhin las ma g.yos kyang gdul bar bya ba'i yul drag shul 
[\[268b.2\]]can rnams la gzigs nas/_phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sku'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa khro bo chen po'i gzugs 'di lta ste/_sku mdog mthing nag zhal dgu pa la/_g.yas 
[\[268b.3\]]kyi zhal ni kham nag gtsigs pa/_g.yon gyi zhal ni smug nag bsdus pa/_dbus kyi zhal ni mthing nag khro zhing rngam pa/_phyag g.yas kyi rdo rje 'bar bas g.yon gyi thod khrag dkrug cing gsol pa/_g.yas 'og ma brgyad na lha chen po bsgral ba'i mgo gcad de 
[\[268b.4\]]bsnams la/_g.yon gyi 'og ma brgyad na klu chen po brgyad kyi mgo bsnams pa/_de dag kyang g.yang gzhi dang bcas pa/_g.yas kyi spyan dgu gyen la bzlog pa/_g.yon gyi spyan dgu 'phred la gzigs pa/_dbus kyi spyan dgu thur la sdang mig mdzad pa/_khro gnyer 
[\[268b.5\]]drag po dpral par bsdus pa/_shangs nas srid pa'i rlung drag po 'tshub pa/_zhal nas bskal pa'i me 'bar ba/_mche ba dmar po bar snang khams su gtsigs pa/_sma ra ag tshom sprin bzhin du gtib pa/_dbu skra ral pa kham nag srid pa'i rtse mor 'bar 
[\[268b.6\]]zhing 'khyil ba/_snyan nas gdug pa'i sgra chen po 'byin pa/_sbrul gyi chun pos yan lag dkris pa/_bdud dang ru tra bsgral ba dang glang po che'i pags pa na bzar gsol ba/_stag gi pags pas sku smad dkris pa/_khrag dang zhag gi thig le dang ri mos brgyan 
[\[268b.7\]]pa/_thal chen gyis lus la byugs pa/_thod pa skam po dang rlon pa dang /_sha khrag ra ri can gyis phreng bar byas nas brgyan pa/_zhabs brgyad kyis tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po dang /_brgya byin chung ma dang bcas pa dag mnan pa/_yum chen mo 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]rab tu gtum mo 'jigs byed ma rang gi sku dang mtshungs pa zhig dang mnyam par sbyor ba/_grangs med cing brjod kyis mi lang ba bye ba til gyi gang bu bzhin du gyur pa thams cad kyang /_oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/_ces bya 
[\[269a.2\]]ba'i gsung sgra drag po 'byin pa/_de dag re re las kyang sprul pa dang sprul pa'i yang sprul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu snang bar mdzad pa/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi dregs pa can lha'i tshogs dang /_bdud dang /_gshin rje dang /_srin po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_
[\[269a.3\]]gza' bdud dang /_klu dang /_rgyal po dang /_ging dang /_ma mo chen mo rnams dang /_mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang /_ru tra dang /_mu stegs dang /_srog gi bdag po dang /_nor gyi bdag po dang /_tshe'i bdag po dang /_sngags kyi bdag po dang /_srid pa'i bdag 
[\[269a.4\]]po dang /_gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang /_dur khrod chen po dang /_yul chen po dang /_'dzam bu'i gling gi mtha' 'khob kyis dang /_ri'i rgyal po dang /_ri phra mo dang /_rgya mtsho dang /_chu bran dang /_yongs su 'du ba'i shing dang /_nags tshal 
[\[269a.5\]]chen po dang /_gnas phra mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag na gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can pho dang mo'i rnam par 'dug pa dang /_gtso bo dang 'khor dang khyad par rgyu ba dang /_bran dang g.yog gi tshogs dang bcas pa dag gis/_rang rang gi gnas nas 
[\[269a.6\]]myur ba dang zhing skrag la 'jigs pa dang ya nga ba'i sems dang /_dul ba'i sems kyis 'thon te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar rlung drag po'i shugs kyis rab tu bskyod pa'i shing bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du rang dbang med par lhags par gyur te/_phyogs 
[\[269a.7\]]bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa dang /_khyad par du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na gling bzhi dang /_rgya mtsho chen po dang /_rol pa'i chu klu'i gnas dang bcas pa/_ri rab chen po dang /_ri bdun gyi gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang /_lha'i gnas 'dod 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams dang bcas pa dang /_dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_byol song gi skye gnas na gnas pa dang /_'dzam bu'i gling gi sa'i cha na gnas pa'i dregs pa can rnams so so nas rang rang gi 
[\[269b.2\]]mdun na drag po chen po'i sku gzi byin dpag tu med pa/_gzhan dag gis nye ba'i thugs mi thub pa re re 'dug pa mthong ste/_de dag thams cad tha dad du rang rang gi sde dpon chen po rnams la skyabs su 'gro bar byed do/_/sde dpon chen po rnams ni 
[\[269b.3\]]'jigs byed chen po'i sku gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la rang gi 'khor dang bcas te skyabs su 'gro bar byed de/_thams cad kyi rang rang gi gzugs dang longs spyod dang 'khor dang /_rgyan dang bzhon pa dang gnas dang nye bar bde bar spyod pa phrin las khyad par 
[\[269b.4\]]ma lus par bstan cing /_ming gi snying po rnams mngon du phyung ste smras so/_/ma hA de ba e dzaH/_u ma de ba e dzaH/_d+hu dra ma du phrag dzaH/_dun+ti ma du dzaH/_zhes 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug chen po yab yum bdud pho mo dang bcas pa rnams kyis rang rang gi 
[\[269b.5\]]ming phul ba'o/_/de nas gshin rje'i ded dpon rang gi tshogs dang bcas pas rang rang gi ming dang srog dang bcas pa phul ba/_hrIHSh+Ti kriSh+Na ya ma pre ta dzaH/_ma ma ya mun+t+ri b+hi tri dzaHzhes phul lo/_/de nas srin po'i sde dpon rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa'i ming gi 
[\[269b.6\]]snying po/_/rak+Sha ra sha ra ma ti rak+Sha ma shu ti dzaHzhes phul lo/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa'i ming dang srog gi snying po yak+Sha ku be rak+Sha ta me yak+Shi ma sha dzaHzhes phul lo/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi gnod sbyin lha'i sde dpon kha ba can 
[\[269b.7\]]gyi dbang pos rang gi ming phul ba/_ga~M b+ha b+ha tra d+he ba ta ru ti dzaHzhes phul lo/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi rgyal phran gyi ded dpon lha'i the bcu gsum gyi bdag pos ming phul ba/_ga~M ta pa sha li bar tri saM ka ra sha dzaHzhes phul lo/_/de nas spyi bdud kyi sde dpon rang 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]gi 'khor dang bcas pas ming gi snying po smras pa/_du spra sha~M dza a ka ru ka~M tsa dzaHzhes phul lo/_/de nas ye shes dang las las grub pa'i dang dam tshig gi tshogs kyi bdag mo srid pa dbang sdud ma dang /_ral pa gcig ma dang /_mkha' 'gro 
[\[270a.2\]]ma'i tshogs kun gyis rang rang gi ming gi snying po phul ba/_ma ma trag mu tra ra tsa e ka dz+wa Ti ru ru ro tiSh+Ta b+hat+to re tu ma ti kha mun+t+ra pa tsa la me sha dzaHzhes phul lo/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi lha btsan po dang /_ru tra'i rigs kyi ded dpon chen po rnams kyis rang rang gi ming gi snying po/_/
[\[270a.3\]]de ba a b+hi shu tri ru tra ni dzi ha~M sha~M tri dzaHzhes phul lo/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi bgegs kyi rgyal po dang /_mu stegs byed pa dang /_bdud dmu ba'i tshogs kyis rang rang gi ming gi snying po/_bi nA ya ka tir+thi ta ka du mun mun paHdzaHzhes phul lo/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi 
[\[270a.4\]]srog gi bdag po dang /_gnod sbyin klu'i bdag po rdo rje can dang /_bla'i rgyal po chen po dang /_lha'i dbang phyug nag po chen po'i tshogs kyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyis rang rang gi ming gi snying po/_ging+ka ra tri pa le rA dza badzra bu ru lu dza badzra la ru tri dza ma hA kA la yak+Shi dzaH
[\[270a.5\]]zhes phul lo/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi klu dang gza' skar gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyis rang rang gi ming gi srog gi snying po phyung ba nA ga tsi ta hu ya nA ga me k+She tra hu la g+hu he pa sha mi ke hU~M dzaHzhes phul lo/_/gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dregs pa'i dbang phyug ma 
[\[270a.6\]]rungs pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa dag gis rang rang gi lus dang srog dang bcas pa/_e a nri dzaHsa ma ya srog breng breng dzaHdzaHzhes phul lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dregs pa can 'khor dang bcas pa de dag dbugs phyung nas mi 'jigs 
[\[270a.7\]]pa byin te 'di skad du/_kye ma 'jig rten grags pa'i tshogs/_/khyed rnams nga la ma 'jigs shig_/nga ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las bdag_/chos nyid zhi ba chen po yi/_/thugs rje dang ni ye shes kyis/_/dus gsum 'dus 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]byas 'dus ma byas/_/skad cig nyid la mngon du gsal/_/ma 'ongs sems can don gyi phyir/_/sna tshogs lus kyi gsang ba ston/_/dregs pa'i sde dpon khyed rnams kyang /_/thog ma med nas da lta'i bar/_/nyon mongs 'khrul pa'i dbang gyur te/_/gnas 
[\[270b.2\]]ngan len gyi bag chags kyis/_/lus ngag yid kyis mi dger spyod/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgyun mi 'chad/_/na rag chen por lhung nas ni/_/thar pa'i dus med 'byung srid kyis/_/de bas da lta'i dus mchog 'dir/_/nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[270b.3\]]kyis/_/sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang /_/mdzad pa'i phrin las rab son la/_/bsgo ba'i gsung bzhin nyan par gyis/_/las dang srid pa don yod la/_/mi dge'i bag chags dor bar gyis/_/bslab pa'i gzhi bzung sems bskyed la/_/mthu stobs nus 
[\[270b.4\]]pa drag shul dag_/sangs rgyas bstan pa'i rjes su spyod/_/rig 'dzin rnams kyi bka' bzhin skyongs/_/khyed cag rgyal po rje dpon dang /_/bran g.yog tshul du lus brten pa/_/dngos grub gsol zhing phrin las sgrubs/_/gal te de ltar mi byed cing /_/
[\[270b.5\]]gsang ba'i tshig las 'gal byed na/_/khyed kyi lus sems srog gi rgyud/_/da lta nyid du ma rungs 'gyur/_/zhes bka' stsal nas dam pa'i tha tshig la bkod nas bzhag go/_/'jig rten pa'i sde dpon gyi tshogs rab tu 'dul ba gleng gzhi'i 
[\[270b.6\]]le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i dbang phyug chen po yab yum la sogs pa'i dregs pa can gyi 'khor rab tu 'dus pa de dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gsang ba'i bdag po 
[\[270b.7\]]chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag_/'jig rten gnas pa'i drag shul can/_/'dod chags zhe sdang sred len gyis/_/gang gis mchod cing brten byas nas/_/bdag cag rnams ni dga' mgu rangs/_/khyod 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]kyi bka' lung rjes bzhin du/_/brtul zhugs 'dzin pa de dag la/_/phrin las spyod pa'i grogs bya'i phyir/_/bdag cag so so'i gnas dang dus/_/rang gi sde dang 'khor g.yog dpung /_/mthun pa'i las dang longs spyod dang /_/cha lugs 
[\[271a.2\]]rigs dang bsam pa dang /_/khams dang byed pa'i tshul dag dang /_/dam tshig sbyor ba'i khyad par dag_/bdag cag rnams dang ma 'ongs pa'i/_/rig pa'i tshul 'dzin don phyir ru/_/ma lus rgyas par bshad du gsol/_/zhes gsol pas/_de nas bcom ldan 
[\[271a.3\]]'das kyis 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can dag gi gtso bo dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams/_/so so'i las dang gcig tu sbas pa dang /_/tha dad du sbyar ba dang /_nges pa dang /_ma nges pa dang /_rim pa dang 'chol ba dang /_phyi dang nang dang /_gsang ba dang /_sbas pa dang /_
[\[271a.4\]]'tshogs pa dang /_'thor ba dang /_mthun pa'i rdzas dang /_snying po dang /_mag pa dang /_gnyer gtad pa dang /_skul ba dang /_rbad pa dang /_bzlog pa dang /_tshar gcad pa dang /_gzir ba dang /_spogs pa dang /_las sna tshogs pa dag gi sgo nas/_/rol pa chen 
[\[271a.5\]]po'i gsang ba sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dam tshig chen po las phyung ste bka' stsal to/_/nyon cig 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs/_/phyi ma'i tshe na snyigs ma'i dus/_/dge sbyong chen po'i bstan pa 'di/_/so so'i skye bo rnams la snang /_/nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyi 
[\[271a.6\]]tshul/_/rdo rje 'chang ba rnams kyi sku/_/rgyud dag sa lam rdzogs la gsal/_/spros med chos sku 'du 'bral med/_/ting nge 'dzin la sbyangs pas 'grub/_/bsam pa tshe snga smon pa yis/_/rigs drug so so'i bdag por snang /_/las kyi dregs pas khyed rnams ni/_/
[\[271a.7\]]'jigs shing 'jigs par byed pa yis/_/gtum zhing dpa' la ches dpa' bas/_/gdul zhing drag par nus pa las/_/zhi bas 'dul bar mi 'gyur te/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bu ni/_/stobs ldan dregs tshogs kun 'dul ba/_/khams gsum spyi la dbang 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]sgyur byed/_/nga dang gnyis med sbyor ba yis/_/las kyi bya ba rang rdzogs pas/_/dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs pas/_/byin gyis brlabs pa'i dben sa ru/_/sgrib byang bsod nams bsags pas dang /_/bar chod bdud bzlog las la 'bad/_/mthun rdzas sa la 
[\[271b.2\]]pho brang bzhengs/_/dam tshig drag po'i rdzas kyis bran/_/thod mkhar bang mdzod ldan pa 'am/_/e khram grangs dang sbyar bar bya/_/dregs pa'i lus ngag yid gnas brten/_/ngas bshad tshul dang mthun par dgod/_/phyi rol sgo sogs rgyan 'jigs ldan/_/
[\[271b.3\]]dur khrod chen po sngon du phyung /_/tsa ra ma he chu glang dang /_/seng ge glang chen rta nag dang /_/bya khyi lug nag rnga mo dang /_/stag dang bya rgod khyi phag gnag_/bdud bya chu srin nya rus sbal/_/rgod dkar rgod gnag rta dkar dmar/_/so bya dre'u ba glang rnams/_/rgyal mtshan 
[\[271b.4\]]sha khrag snying dang bcas/_/so so'i mthun pa'i gnas su bsham/_/'bru bzang bshos dang dam tshig rdzas/_/bdud rtsi sha khrag snying sbyar ba/_/rin chen bcud kyis sbreng ba ni/_/grangs mnyam yang na phyogs bzhir bzhag_/gdugs dang ba dan bla res dang /_/
[\[271b.5\]]lda ldi dra ba za ra tshags/_/'di la shis shing mthun pas te/_/stag gzig dom dred 'bar spyang dang /_/kAng+ka dur bya rgod khra/_/mi rta bal glang ke le yi/_/sha rgyus pags pa mgo yis bya/_/mda' gzhu mdung dang kha T+wAM ga_/ral gri chu gri spu gri dang /_/tri 
[\[271b.6\]]shUl phur pa so [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang /_/mtshon cha drag pos bskor zhing gtams/_/mdzes dang mi mdzes snyan mi snyan/_/dri nga ba dang gdang ba dang /_/kha mngar tsha skyur rtsub pa dang /_/tsha grang 'jam rtsub dro dang bsil/_/gzugs sgra dri ro reg rnams kyis/_/ji ltar 
[\[271b.7\]]'dod pa bzhin du gtang /_/de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa des/_/phyi nang gsang ba'i bsrung ba yis/_/gnod cing 'tshe ba tshar gcad de/_/bsod nams tshogs kyis rang rgyud sbyang /_/gzhan phan byang chub sems kyis bsgrub/_/chos rnams gnas lugs bzhin 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]du sgom/_/ma mthong ba la snying rje bskyed/_/ngo bo skyed rgyu hU~M du sgom/_/de las gnod kyi gzhi mo lnga/_/ye shes 'byung ba lnga ru bsam/_/steng du rin chen ri rab kyi/_/dbus su dur khrod gzhal med khang /_/thod mkhar e tra~M sum cu pa/_/gzugs brnyan bzhin du ting 'dzin 
[\[272a.2\]]bskyed/_/dbus su nyi zla pad+ma dang /_/ro bzhi bsnol ba'i steng nyid du/_/rdo rje 'chang ba'i sku gsung thugs/_/nga nyid kun la snang bzhin bsam/_/yum chen khams gsum spyi 'dul ma/_/gtso dang gnyis med sbyor ba las/_/thabs dang shes rab 'od zer las/_/e dgu'i rnam pas bon 
[\[272a.3\]]tshul/_/'phro 'dus gri gug kha T+wAM gsal/_/de nyid gsal ba'i rgyud sbyangs pas/_/'dod khams dbang phyug gtso bo che/_/lha mo yum dang bcas par gyur/_/seng ge glang chen zhabs kyis gnon/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing nag rngam/_/na bza' ljang nag bklubs 
[\[272a.4\]]ber gsol/_/gtso chen gri gug tsit+ta bsnams/_/yum gyis kha T+wAM thod khrag bzung /_/yab yum gnyis med thugs ka nas/_/ya ma/_dun+ti/_rak+Sha/_yak+Sha las/_phyogs bzhir bdud dang gshin rje dang /_/srin po gnod sbyin sde dpon dang /_/yab yum bcas pa gsal bar spro/_/
[\[272a.5\]]gra he nA ga_/steng 'og tu ni bdud klu gza'i/_/sde dpon yab yum spro zhing bskyed/_/de ba/_tri dza/_du tri/_gang bzang lha dang rnam rgyal dang /_/spyi bdud sde dpon shar du bskyed/_/ma ma~M/_dza ti/_d+ha ki las/_ma chen srid pa'i rgyal mo dang /_/ral gcig ma dang mgyogs byed ma/_/mo 
[\[272a.6\]]tshogs sde dpon lho phyogs su'o/_/ru tra/_a b+hi/_ha~M sha~M las/_lha sbyin btsan dmar ril btsan gyi/_/sde dpon nub kyi phyogs su bskyed/_/bi tra/_ti thi/_rmu du las/_bgegs dang mu stegs dmu bdud kyi/_/sde dpon byang gi phyogs su bskyed/_/tri ya~M/_ra tri sa tri na tri las/_/srid pa'i 
[\[272a.7\]]srog gi bdag po dang /_/gnod sbyin klu tsha bdud rgyal po/_/sku lha gsang ba rdo rje legs/_/nag po chen po chos srung rje/_/shar lho nub byang sgo bzhir bskyed/_/phyi rol khyams su dregs pa can/_/so so'i g.yog 'khor mang po dag_/bka' nyan gsung sdod tshul du bskyed/_/
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]rang rang sngags kyis bstan par bya/_/dbang po'i tshul du gsal ba dang /_/'jig rten rang rgyud so so yi/_/gnas nas 'od kyis bkye ba dang /_/gsang ba'i snying pos myur du bod/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul 'dra ba/_/rang gi gzugs brnyan lus la bstim/_/rang rgyud ba dang gzugs 
[\[272b.2\]]brnyan 'dres/_/o~M AHhU~M/_o~M badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/_sku gsung thugs ldan byin brlab cing /_/rdo rje 'chang bas dbang bskur bya/_/dur khrod gnas kyi sgo bzhi nas/_/bka' nyan las byed sde brgyad kyis/_/lus ngag gus pas phyag 'tshal zhing /_/phyi 
[\[272b.3\]]nang gsang ba'i 'dod yon tshogs/_/'tshe zhing gdug pa'i bsam pa can/_/gzugs can gzugs med bcas pa yis/_/dregs pa'i tshogs la mnyes par dbul/_/sku yi cha lugs so so yi/_/don rtags mthun pa'i tshig gis bstod/_/sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan dang /_/phrin 
[\[272b.4\]]las smos te thugs dam skul/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku gsung thugs/_/gsal brtan tshad dang ldan pa yis/_/nam mkha'i khams kun mthas khyab kun/_/rang gi yul gsum gsal bar dmigs/_/dregs pa'i sde dpon re re'i drung /_/rdul snyed 'dul byed gnyen po gnas/_/
[\[272b.5\]]phal ba re re'i gnas drung du/_/sde dpon chen po de bzhin bsam/_/bka' nyan gsung sdod g.yo mi nus/_/cung tsam 'da' bar mi spyod cing /_/rang gi 'dod pa mi spobs la/_/skad cig tsam la don sgrub dmigs/_/de nyid kyis ni gtso chen gyis/_/bsnyen cing bsgrub pa tshad 
[\[272b.6\]]rtags ldan/_/yongs su rdzogs par gyur nas ni/_/dregs pa'i sde dpon tshogs rnams kyi/_/so so'i gzugs brnyan gsal btab ste/_/rang gi ming gi snying po dang /_/gcod 'phrog yi ge spos te bzlas/_/dus tshad grangs dang mtshan ma yis/_/tshad bzung ma nor grub pa 
[\[272b.7\]]yis/_/rtags la phab ste las la sbyar/_/nga nyid rjes su sgrub byed pas/_/dregs pa myur du dbang du sdud/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/'jig rten pa'i ded dpon gyi tshogs nye bar sgrub pa'i rtsa ba'i las kyi gnyer gtad pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas rab tu 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]bshad bya ba/_/'di dag kun la ngas bshad pa'i/_/sde dpon chen po rang gnas nas/_/bod dang gzhug dang mnyes pa dang /_/bstod dang thugs dam bskul ba dag_/tshig brjod 'di yis bstan par bya/_/thugs rje rnam dag dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas/_/
[\[273a.2\]]chos sku stong nyid dbyings las ma g.yos kyang /_/'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs rnams 'dul ba'i phyir/_/khro chen dpa' gtum 'jigs byed skur bstan pa/_/thugs dam dgyes bskul gsang ba'i yum dang bcas/_/ma rtogs shugs kyis 'dul phyir gshegs 
[\[273a.3\]]su gsol/_/dregs pa'i dbang phyug 'jig rten lha yi gtso/_/'dod pa'i lha mo bde chen 'byung gnas ma/_/'khor tshogs drag shul mthu stobs dpung gi bdag_/khro gtum gdug pa'i rtsal 'chang dpal dang ldan/_/rdo rje 'chang gi bka' bzhin rjes su sgrub/_/
[\[273a.4\]]dam tshig rjes dgongs gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol/_/badzra sarba duSh+Tan+ta a ta na ya e dza b+h+yo/_a gats+tsha sa ma ya hring hring /_dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir/_/lha chen nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs su/_/bcom ldan khro rgyal rngam brjid 'bar 
[\[273a.5\]]ba'i sku/_/yab yum dgyes par rol cing bzhugs su gsol/_/snang srid dregs pa ma lus ded dpon gtso/_/'dod khams bdag po dgyes mdzad yum dang bcas/_/lha srin tshogs kyi gtso chen 'khor dang bcas/_/phrin las mthun pa'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol/_/
[\[273a.6\]]badzra sarba duSh+Tan a ta na ya e dza b+h+yo/_sa ma ya sti ta badzra hU~M dzaH_dus gsum sangs rgyas thugs kyi snying po mchog_/chos kyi sku las gzugs sku 'gro don sprul/_/che btsan 'gran zla med pa khro bo'i rje/_/dbang sdud yum dang bcas la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/phyogs 
[\[273a.7\]]bcu'i rgyal ba ma lus sras dang bcas/_/dam bcas bstan pa'i tshul bsrung 'jig rten mgon/_/zhing bcu sgrol mdzad phrin las drag shul can/_/sde dpon sum cu'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/badzra sarba duSh+Tan a ta na ya e dza b+h+yo/_na ma A ra li hoH/_dpal chen 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]dregs pa kun 'dul yab yum la/_/sku gsung thugs mnyes mchod pa 'bul ba ni/_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan bla re dang /_/phreng ba phye ma lda ldi za ra tshags/_/bdug spos me tog mar me chab bsil dang /_/gzugs mdzes sgra snyan dri zhim ro bro dang /_/reg 'jam 
[\[273b.2\]]'dod yon ma lus ji snyed pa'i/_/'phags pa'i thun mong mchod tshogs bzhes su gsol/_/khyad par gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul ba ni/_/dus gsum gnas su sbyangs pa'i sha rus khrag_/dug lnga sman du grub pa'i dam tshig rdzas/_/stobs mchog nus pa ba ling mchod pa 
[\[273b.3\]]dngos/_/thugs rjes mthun pa'i ngang gis bzhes su gsol/_/dpal chen yab yum bka' bzhin rjes sgrub pa'i/_/dbang phyug chen po yab yum mnga' bdag rje/_/'jig rten 'das kyang 'khor ba'i cha lugs 'dzin/_/bka' yi bstan srung sde dpon sum cu la/_/
[\[273b.4\]]'dod pa'i yon tan mchod cing sbyin pa ni/_/dkar dmar ser ljang la sogs mdog_/zlum po gru bzhi la sogs dbyibs/_/che chung sbom phra ring thung tshad/_/mdzes dang mi mdzes sdug mi sdug_/'byung ba rten 'brel rol mo'i sgra/_/glu tshig bstod dbyangs snyan pa'i 
[\[273b.5\]]tshig_/spos sman bdud rtsi me tog dri/_/bsreg sungs baM sungs dri dang ngad/_/kha mngar tsha skyur bska ba dang /_/lan tshwa spod dang bye skyu dang /_/'jam rtsub bsil yang tsha dang bro/_/so so'i yon tan tshogs dang bcas/_/'dod dgur 'bul gyis bzhes su gsol/_/bdud 
[\[273b.6\]]rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dang /_/don snying lnga dang 'byung ba lnga/_/dbang po lnga dang yul lnga dang /_/phung po lnga dang nang grol lnga/_/'tshe zhing gsod dang bar du gcod/_/gdug par sems shing log par lta/_/mi mthun phyogs lngar bcas pa rnams/_/so sor 'bul gyis bzhes 
[\[273b.7\]]su gsol/_/badzra sarba duSh+Tan a ta na ya e tsa dza b+h+yo/_ma hA ba lin+ta/_a mr-i ta/_su ka ta/_mA~M sa/_rak+ta/_bi ba ta/_bA su ta/_la ma ta/_i da~M gr-i h+Nan+tu sa ma du/_kha kha/_khA hi khA hi/_bcom ldan dpal chen dregs pa kun 'dul dang /_/yum chen khams gsum spyi 'dul 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]'khor bcas kyi/_/sku mdog 'gyur med me long gzugs brnyan bzhin/_/gsal zhing rtog med snang ba ma 'gags pa/_/sku lnga lhun grub rdzogs pa'i dngos grub gsol/_/gsung mchog 'gag med brag cha sgra brnyan bzhin/_/snyan dang 
[\[274a.2\]]mi snyan grag stong tshangs pa'i gsung /_/gsung dbyangs nam mkha'i mthas khyab dngos grub gsol/_/thugs mchog spros bral bsam 'das chos kyi dbyings/_/mi rtog bde chen thabs dang shes rab dang /_/rtsol med mi g.yo mchog gi dngos grub gsol/_/yon tan brjod 
[\[274a.3\]]kyis mi lang sna tshogs yod/_/'das dang ma 'das mchog dang thun mong gi/_/grub pa brgyad dang mthar thug dngos grub gsol/_/'jigs pa brgyad sogs zhi dang 'byor ba rgyas/_/log lta mos pa'i tshul gyis dbang du sdud/_/mngon spyod dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i 
[\[274a.4\]]dngos grub gsol/_/badzra sarba duSh+Tan a ta na ya e dza kA ya sid+d+hi/_ba ka sid+d+hi/_tsit+ta sid+d+hi/_gu Na sid+d+hi/_kar+m+ma sid+d+hi/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_bcom ldan dpal chen dregs pa kun 'dul ni/_/dbu dgu phyag ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad de/_/sku mdog mthing nag khro zhing rngam/_/g.yas kyi zhal 
[\[274a.5\]]gsum smug nag bag bgrad/_/g.yon gyi zhal gsum kham nag gtsigs/_/dbu skra ral ba me dpung 'bar/_/spyan dgu sdang mig bzlog cing bgrad/_/shangs nas srid pa'i rlung nag 'thor/_/snyan nas stong gsum 'brug sgra 'dir/_/sma ra ag tshom me ltar 'bar/_/
[\[274a.6\]]mche gtsigs srid gsum rtsa ba gcod/_/phyag dgu g.yas g.yon dang po yis/_/rdo rje thod khrag dkrug cing gsol/_/g.yas kyi phyag brgyad 'og ma na/_/dregs pa'i lha brgyad bsgral ba yi/_/g.yang gzhi mgo bor bcas te bsnams/_/g.yon gyi phyag brgyad 
[\[274a.7\]]'og ma na/_/klu chen brgyad kyi b+han d+ha ru/_/dregs pa'i snying khrag bkang nas gsol/_/dpa' bo'i chas brgyad sku la rdzogs/_/zhabs brgyad brkyang bskum dor stabs kyis/_/khams gsum bdag po sde bzhi mnan/_/yum chen khams gsum spyi 'dul ma/_/zhal 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]gcig phyag gnyis mthing nag sku/_/rdo rje 'phyar zhing thod khrag stobs/_/gnyis med thugs kyi phrin las kyis/_/'jig rten dregs pa bran du 'khol/_/lha srin sde brgyad las la 'gyed/_/dgra bgegs gdug pa rtsad nas gcod/_/khro rgyal gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/dpal 
[\[274b.2\]]gyi bka' bzhin las mdzad pa'i/_/lha chen dbang phyug chen po ni/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing /_/phyag g.yas gri gug tsit+ta g.yon/_/lha mo u ma de ba ni/_/sku mdog mthing nag gtso la 'dud/_/phyag g.yas rtse gsum thod khrag g.yon/_/seng ge glang chen gdan la 
[\[274b.3\]]bzhugs/_/sde dpon dregs pa kun gyi gtso/_/yab yum sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/bdud kyi rgyal po'i sde dpon ni/_/khram shing g.yas la dgra sta g.yon/_/bdud rta nag po'i khri la bzhugs/_/sbyor yum bdud mo re ma ti/_/khram bam g.yas la nad rkyal g.yon/_/bong 
[\[274b.4\]]bu gwa dmar gdan la bzhugs/_/gshin rje'i sde dpon chen po ni/_/be con g.yas la thod dbyug g.yon/_/sbyor yum gshin rje za byed mo/_/phyag gnyis srid pa'i 'khor lo bskor/_/yab yum ma he chu glang gnon/_/srin po'i sde dpon glog phreng can/_/phyag gnyis 
[\[274b.5\]]thog ser 'dril zhing 'phen/_/srin mo sbal mgo khrag mig ma/_/phyag g.yas phur ba khrag phor g.yon/_/yab yum 'brug dang rnga mo gnon/_/gnod sbyin sde dpon me dbal ni/_/phyag g.yas rin chen g.yon ral gri/_/sbyor yum gnod sbyin nag mo ni/_/phyag g.yas 
[\[274b.6\]]spu gri g.yon spyang mo/_/stag seng phag mo zhabs kyis mnan/_/gza' bdud ded dpon chen po ni/_/phyag g.yas mda' gzhu g.yon sprul zhags/_/sku smad sbrul 'khril 'brug chen gnon/_/sbyor yum thog gi bu yug can/_/g.yas g.yon phyag gis 
[\[274b.7\]]thog ser 'bebs/_/klu rgyal ded dpon chen po ni/_/phyag g.yas sbrul zhags g.yon nad rkyal/_/sbyor yum klu mo nag mo ni/_/sbrul mgo phyag mtshan yab kyi tshul/_/yab yum chu srin rus sbal gnon/_/phyogs bzhi steng 'og gnas bzhugs pa'i/_/
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]dregs pa'i ded dpon 'di dag ni/_/kun kyang sku mdog mthing nag la/_/khros pa'i cha byad 'jigs tshul can/_/dur khrod g.yang gzhi'i chas kyis brgyan/_/rang gi tshogs 'dus phrin las mdzad/_/yab yum bcas la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/
[\[275a.2\]]gnod sbyin lha yi rgyal po ni/_/shel gri ba dan dkar po 'dzin/_/rgod dkar ru [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhabs kyis mnan/_/gnam rgyal chen po ded dpon ni/_/phyag g.yas ldan dkar g.yon shel gri/_/rta dkar rngog dmar zhabs kyis mnan/_/spyi bdud rgyal po gu rum rtse/_/
[\[275a.3\]]phyag g.yas ba dan g.yon shel gri/_/zhabs gnyis rdo rta gro bo gnon/_/dkar po'i ded dpon chen po gsum/_/shar phyogs gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/srid pa'i ma mo ded dpon mo/_/'khor lo g.yas la me long g.yon/_/zhabs gnyis 'brug mo mgo 
[\[275a.4\]]dgu gnon/_/sngags kyi srung ma chen mo ni/_/tsit+ta g.yas la spyang mo g.yon/_/dre rta nag mo zhabs kyis gnon/_/mkha' 'gro nag mo mgyogs byed ma/_/rgyu zhags g.yas la mtshon grug g.yon/_/so bya nag mo zhabs kyis gnon/_/nag mo'i ded 
[\[275a.5\]]dpon ma mo gsum/_/lho phyogs gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/rdo rje bdud 'dul nag po ni/_/g.yas g.yon phyag gis thun khrag 'phen/_/brag btsan srog zan dmar po ni/_/mda' gzhu 'phen zhing dar dmar 'phyar/_/che btsan 'gong rgyal chen po ni/_/
[\[275a.6\]]shang lang dang ni zhags pa 'dzin/_/dmar po'i ded dpon rgyal po gsum/_/kun kyang rta dmar zhabs kyis gnon/_/nub phyogs skyong la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/bi nA ya ka bgegs kyi rgyal/_/phyag g.yas kha T+wAM g.yon thod khrag_/phyi rol skyong ba'i mu stegs 
[\[275a.7\]]gtso/_/tri shUl g.yas la thod khrag g.yon/_/dmu bdud chen po phrag med ni/_/mda' gzhu dang ni shang lang 'dzin/_/nag po'i tshogs kyi ded dpon gsum/_/bdud rta nag po zhabs kyis gnon/_/byang phyogs gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/tshangs pa'i rgyal po srog gi 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]bdag_/spu gri g.yas la nyi zhags g.yon/_/seng ge dkar po zhabs kyis gnon/_/bdud kyi rgyal po nor gyi bdag_/bdud zhags g.yas la spu gri g.yon/_/ban glang sna [{]rings [,]ring [}]zhabs kyis gnon/_/sku lha'i rgyal po yul gyi bdag_/phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yon ba dan/_/ra 
[\[275b.2\]]dkar gnam ru zhabs kyis gnon/_/nag po chen po tshogs kyi bdag_/phyag g.yas be con g.yon thod khrag_/rta nag mgyogs pa zhabs kyis gnon/_/phyogs kyi sde dpon chen po bzhi/_/sku mdog dkar ser dmar nag mdzes/_/sgo bzhir gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/
[\[275b.3\]]sde dpon dregs pa 'di dag ni/_/khro zhing gtum pa'i tshul 'chang zhing /_/na bza' g.yang gzhi 'jigs pa'i chas/_/sna tshogs mdzes pa'i rgyan dang ldan/_/rang gi 'khor g.yog tshogs kyis bskor/_/sprul pa'i cho 'phrul bsam mi khyab/_/mchod bstod chen pos khyed bsgrubs 
[\[275b.4\]]na/_/so so'i tshogs 'dul phrin las mdzod/_/zhes brjod ting 'dzin ldan pa yis/_/dregs pa'i ded dpon mchod cing bstod/_/'di ltar spyod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/'jig rten gtso bdag gzhung bzhin bsgrub/_/rdo rje 'dzin dang gnyis su med/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/
[\[275b.5\]]'jig rten gyi ded dpon nye bar bsgrub pa rdo rje'i dam tshig mchod bstod kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/'jig rten dregs pa dbang sdud cing /_/tshar gcad las la skol ba'i phyir/_/byin brlabs gnas pa'i dbang bskur bshad/_/
[\[275b.6\]]gsang zhing dben pa'i gnas dag tu/_/sngar bshad las kyi pho brang bsham/_/yo byad rdzas kyi khyad par 'phags/_/ma lus par ni gzung bar bya/_/rdo rje 'chang ba rjes 'brang bcas/_/mtshan nyid ldan pa mngon sum sbyar/_/dus kyi grangs dang mtshan ma'i rtags/_/
[\[275b.7\]]bsnyen pa'i lung bzhin brtson par 'bad/_/gzugs brnyan bdag po slob ma rnams/_/khyad par gnas pa'i sta gon bya/_/bris dang rkos pa la sogs pa'i/_/sde dpon rnams kyi gzugs brnyan dang /_/phur pa grangs dang mnyam par dgram/_/gzhan yang bum 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]pa mchod gtor dang /_/dug gtor thun gtor thun rdzas dang /_/sha khrag bshos chang bza' btung sogs/_/rgyal mtshan ba dan mda' dang gzhu/_/dpa' ba'i chas dang rol mo'i sgra/_/rab tu brdar zhing mdzes par bsham/_/rdo rje 'dzin pas ting 'dzin gsal/_/
[\[276a.2\]]las kyi rgyal pos mchod bstod bya/_/rgyu dang mdangs kyis thugs dam bskang /_/bshags dral gcugs sbyang dbab pa bya/_/mos shing spros bdag dang ba yis/_/bdud 'dul gtso la skyabs su 'gro/_/bstan pa bsrung bar sems bskyed de/_/bla ma sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin/_/
[\[276a.3\]]he ru ka dang gnyis med la/_/gdug byed log lta 'dul nus pa'i/_/mthu dbang chen po'i gzhung 'tshal gyis/_/brtse ba'i thugs kyis dgongs nas ni/_/dkyil 'khor dam par gzhug tu gsol/_/nyon cig skal ldan rigs kyi bu/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs/_/
[\[276a.4\]]gnas pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir/_/spro bas 'jug pa khyod lags kyis/_/mngon spyod brtul zhugs dam pa yis/_/dam tshig chen po'i sar 'dug shog_/mgon po he ru ka dpal rje/_/'dul ba'i 'khor tshogs bcas pa yi/_/drag shul spyod pa'i pho brang du/_/mdzes pa'i me 
[\[276a.5\]]tog bdag dbul gyis/_/rdo rje dam tshig 'di bzhes la/_/dregs pa 'dul nus dngos grub gsol/_/pra ti gr-ih+Na puSh+pa hU~M/_dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang ba yi/_/rjes 'jug rigs kyi bu khyod ni/_/thog ma med nas da lta'i bar/_/bstan pa bsrung ba'i skal ldan te/_/sde dpon dbang chen 
[\[276a.6\]]dkyil 'khor 'dir/_/bstan la rab dga'i sems kyis ltos/_/badzra ya sa ma ya ma d+ha la tsag shu bra be sha ya phaT/_rdo rje bdud rtsi dam tshig chu/_/'di las dus gsum 'da' mi bya/_/grub pa'i 'bras bu gnyis yin te/_/tshul bzhin mi 'da' bros dor cig_/ma hA sa ma ya i 
[\[276a.7\]]dan+te nA ra kAn ShA ba mi la~M/_rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' drin che/_/thugs rjes rtag tu byin brlab phyir/_/'di nas rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bar/_/mthu stobs dngos grub stsal du gsol/_/badzra sa ma ya tsit+ta sid+hi sid+d+hi hU~M/_thog ma'i sangs rgyas sras bcas kyi/_/rjes su bsgrub pa bdag 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]yin gyis/_/'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i/_/lha dang dregs pa mthu stobs can/_/gtso dang 'khor du bcas rnams kyis/_/sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig dgongs/_/rdo rje slob ma rig 'dzin la/_/dbang bskur dngos grub rtsol mdzad pa/_/nus chen rtags mtshan 
[\[276b.2\]]bstan du gsol/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal ldan gyis/_/khri stan chen po'i steng 'dug la/_/snod ldan slob ma mdun bzhag ste/_/dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i bum pa yis/_/sku gsung thugs su dbang bskur bya/_/gnyen po gtso dang gdul bya'i yul/_/dregs chen yab yum 'khor 
[\[276b.3\]]bcas kyi/_/mdzes pa'i sku gzugs sku yi dbang /_/so so'i tshig bstod snying po dang /_/smon lam bcas pa gsung gi'o/_/rang rgyud gnas dag don rtags kyis/_/chos skur dbang bskur thugs kyi'o/_/rigs sbyangs stobs la ngang gis gsal/_/phur ba drag shul rdzas kyi dbang /_/
[\[276b.4\]]mchod gtor bshos cha sku gsung thugs/_/ma lus mnyes par byed pas te/_/yo byad tshogs kyi longs spyod spel/_/rgyal mtshan ba dan sgra dang bcas/_/dus rnams kun du mnga' thang rgyas/_/sha khrag dug gtor thun rdzas rnams/_/dregs pa'i ded dpon dbang sdud cing /_/pho nya phrin 
[\[276b.5\]]las bskul mdzad de/_/mngon spyod gdug pa tshar gcad dbang /_/'di dag kyang ni gzugs brnyan sgra/_/don ngo shes pas dbang bskur te/_/chos kun spyi dang dregs pa yi/_/sde dpon so so'i dam tshig rtsal/_/thugs rje dang ni rtogs pa yis/_/rang bzhin don gyis sgrol byed 
[\[276b.6\]]pa'i/_/dpag med don chen 'dir 'dus te/_/tha dad mi gnas cig yin no/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid kyis/_/phyi nang 'khor bcas so sor snang /_/ma lus dbang bsdu zil mnan phyir/_/so so'i snying po tshad kyis bstim/_/nga rgyal brtan po mdun du skyes/_/don snying 
[\[276b.7\]]sha rus khrag sogs bza'/_/dug gsum tshar gcad dbyings nas dbyung /_/gzugs brnyan bstims la rab tu gsal/_/dbang bsdu las bcol 'dul ba'i phyir/_/zhabs 'og mnan te bran bzhin bsgo/_/dam tshig rdzas mchod sngar bzhin gso/_/dam tshig dbab 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]cing bstod skul bcol/_/'jig rten lha srin khyed rnams kyang /_/nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/_/zhal mthong lung bstan mchog stsal ba/_/srid pa'i sa bon phra mo yis/_/da rung 'jig rten las la spyod/_/rang rgyud rtsub mos phan gnod sbyor/_/da ni 
[\[277a.2\]]bka' yi dam tshig bzung /_/ma 'ongs dus na bsgrub bya dang /_/sgrub par byed pa de dag dang /_/mnyam par kun la dbang sgyur te/_/chos nyid rig pa'i rgyal po rdzogs/_/theg mchog ma 'dres cir yang ston/_/ma lus myur du rdzogs bya'i phyir/_/rgyal tshab spyi bor bzhag 
[\[277a.3\]]gnas pa/_/kun du bzang po nyid thob 'gyur/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po nye bar bsgrub pa'i rdo rje dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/dregs pa'i 'khor tshogs mnyes 
[\[277a.4\]]bya'i phyir/_/mthun rdzas gzugs kyis bskang ba ni/_/ri bo'i rtse bo'i chu bo'i mdo/_/'jig rten dbang phyug 'du gnas su/_/skal med yul la mchod sbyin gnas/_/thod mkhar re'u mig dgu sogs sam/_/yang na gling bzhi ri rab brtsig_/'bru dang sha khrag sna tshogs pa/_/rin 
[\[277a.5\]]chen spos sman me tog stsal/_/dregs pa bdag po so so yi/_/gzugs brnyan rang gi 'khor dang bcas/_/sku mdog phyag mtshan yongs rdzogs shing /_/rang gi gdan khri bzhon par bcibs/_/ri rab thod mkhar yang stengs su/_/lha chen yab yum 'khor bcas bzhugs/_/
[\[277a.6\]]bang rim re'u mig dang po gsum/_/bdud dang gshin rje srin po dang /_/gnod sbyin gza' dang klu rnams kyi/_/sde dpon yab yum 'khor bcas dgod/_/gnyis po la ni dkar po dang /_/nag po dmar po nag po'o/_/sde dpon bcu gnyis gnas su bya/_/gsum pa'i phyogs 
[\[277a.7\]]bzhir sgo srung bzhi/_/'khor bcas rang gi gnas su dgod/_/tha ma gsum mam bzhi pa la/_/phyi nang gsang ba sbas pa la/_/gsang ba'i gter dang drag po sngags/_/las byed btags chags lha ma srin/_/sde brgyad gzugs brnyan gnas su dgod/_/gtso chen 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]sum cu'i mthun rdzas ni/_/rang gi gdan nam bzhon pa yi/_/srog chags gzugs ni lnga 'am bcu/_/brgya 'am stong ngam grub tshad bya/_/skyes pa bud med glang chen rta/_/ban glang ra lug bya ra khyi/_/longs spyod skong rdzas sngar bzhin no/_/sde brgyad phal pa kun la ni/_/
[\[277b.2\]]shes ldan mi dang byol song ste/_/'dab chags gcan gzan [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_/sa chur gnas dang dud 'gro tshogs/_/mthong thos dran pa rnams kyi gzugs/_/ji ltar nus pa'i grangs kyis bskor/_/'di dag bskang ba'i yo byad ni/_/'gro ba'i glud du 'bul ba ni/_/rin chen ngar mi rgyan 
[\[277b.3\]]ldan dang /_/nam mkha' sems kyi gzugs brnyan dang /_/sku gsung thugs ldan rgyang bu dang /_/shing glud yul mkhar mtshon pa dang /_/skyes pa bud med cha byad dang /_/rgyal mtshan ba dan ru mtshon rnams/_/dregs pa so so'i sku mdog dang /_/mthun pa grangs mnyam gnas 
[\[277b.4\]]su dgod/_/mchod gtor bshos cha mar me dang /_/gling tshad chung ngu de bzhin no/_/bzlog bsad drag po zor gyi rdzas/_/sbyin pa'i sa la zor phor du/_/gru gsum mnyam byas dug khrag dang /_/thun rdzas sna tshogs stsal ba dang /_/gdug pa'i shing gi rtsang phur dang /_/b+han 
[\[277b.5\]]d+ha dug thun gtor mar bcas/_/bzhi brgyad bcu drug sum cu gnyis/_/ci rigs sbyar te mdzes par dgod/_/steng du zhing lpags g.yang gzhi 'am/_/dar nag tshon skud gdugs kyis dbub/_/tha mar ras bzang yol bas bre/_/de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/_/gtso chen bskyed 
[\[277b.6\]]cing rdzogs pa dang /_/drags pa mchod bstod mnyes byas nas/_/gzugs brnyan mthun rdzas sngo ba ni/_/rnal 'byor ting 'dzin nga rgyal bsar/_/bdud rtsi mchod skyems rak+ta sbreng /_/sha chen spos kyi dri bsung 'bul/_/rnga chen gling bu rol mo sgra chen bsgrags/_/mda' chen 
[\[277b.7\]]ba dan nag pos g.yab/_/hUM nga ni dpal chen he ru ka/_/gdul dka' ma lus 'dul bar byed/_/'jig rten dregs pa zas su za/_/khams gsum srid gsum nga yi dbang /_/snang srid 'khor 'das nga yi bran/_/nga yi bka' bzhin 'dir 'dus shig_/nyon mongs 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]dbang gis dregs pa yi/_/lha bdud gshin rje srin po dang /_/gnod sbyin gza' klu rgyal po dang /_/ging dang ma mo lha btsan dang /_/rang gi sde dang g.yog tu bcas/_/dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs/_/mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam skongs/_/
[\[278a.2\]]ri rab chen po'i yang stengs nas/_/lha chen dbang phyug chen po bzhengs/_/btsun mo u ma de ba bzhengs/_/na bza' dar nag ber chen gsol/_/chibs su seng ge glang chen chibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni/_/g.yas na pho rgyud pho nyar 'gyed/_/g.yon na pho rgyud las 
[\[278a.3\]]la 'khol/_/'khor du 'jig rten dregs pas bskor/_/dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs/_/mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang /_/rtsal gyi rgyal po seng ge dang /_/stobs kyi rgyal po glang chen dang /_/shes ldan mi dang cang shes rta/_/theg chen glang dang 
[\[278a.4\]]'dod 'jo'i ba/_/rin chen lug dang gtsang ldan dang /_/thos gsang khyi dang mkha' lding bya/_/khyed kyis bzhes pa'i dkor du 'bul/_/rin chen rgyan ldan ngar mi dang /_/sems kyi gzugs brnyan nam mkha' dang /_/sku gsung thugs ldan rgyang bu dang /_/shing ris yul mkhar 
[\[278a.5\]]mtshon pa dang /_/pho glud mda' dang mo glud 'phang /_/rgyal mtshan ba dan du mtshon rnams/_/nyid kyi sku mdog dang mthun pa'i/_/rnal 'byor rnams kyi glud du 'bul/_/dam rdzas sbyar ba'i mchod gtor dang /_/mthun rdzas ldan pa'i bshos cha dang /_/snang gsal 'od ldan mar me 
[\[278a.6\]]dang /_/rgyan ldan mdzes pa'i gling tshad dang /_/mdzes pa'i gzugs dang snyan pa'i sgra/_/zhim pa'i dri dang bda' ba'i ro/_/khyed kyi thugs dam bskang phyir 'bul/_/lha chen yab yum 'khor dang bcas/_/sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dgongs te/_/mdos glud mthun rdzas bzhed 
[\[278a.7\]]pa'i dkor/_/sna tshogs sbyar ba 'di bzhes la/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa khyed kyis srungs/_/dkon mchog dbu 'phang khyod kyis bstod/_/rnal 'byor sku dgra khyed kyis sgrol/_/sgrub pa po la bar gcod pa'i/_/stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs rigs rnams/_/bzhi brgya 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams dang /_/glo bur gnod pa brgyad cu gcig_/ye 'drog sum brgya drug cu'i tshogs/_/dus min 'chi ba rnam brgyad dang /_/gshis ngan 'gum pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga dang /_/gzugs can dgra dang gzugs med bgegs/_/rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ltas 
[\[278b.2\]]ngan pa rnams/_/zhi dang bsal zhing bzlog pa dang /_/gdul dang tshar bcad las mdzod cig_/ri rab chen po'i shar phyogs nas/_/srid pa'i rgyal po skos rje ni/_/bdud rnams kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs/_/na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol/_/ral pa nag po mun ltar 
[\[278b.3\]]gtibs/_/spyan mig nyi zla 'khyil pa 'dra/_/rno dpal mche ba zla tshes gtsigs/_/sma ra kham nag srid rtser 'bar/_/chibs su bdud rta nag po bcibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni/_/khram thogs bdud sde g.yas nas rol/_/shod thogs rtsis pa g.yon nas 'gyed/_/
[\[278b.4\]]snang srid pho bdud khyod kyi 'khor/_/dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs/_/mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang /_/shugs ldan rta nag la sogs pa/_/khyed kyis bzhed pa'i dkor du 'bul/_/rin chen ngar mi la sogs pa/_/rnal 'byor rnams kyi glud du 
[\[278b.5\]]'bul/_/dam rdzas mchod gtor la sogs pa/_/khyed kyi thugs dam skang phyir 'bul/_/srid pa'i bdud rje 'khor bcas kyis/_/sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dgongs la/_/ji ltar bcol ba'i las mdzod cig_/bdud mo chen mo re ma ti/_/ma bdud kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs/_/
[\[278b.6\]]dpal ldan nag mo 'jigs gzugs can/_/nag mo sha zlog bdud kyi ma/_/sku la mthing nag ber chen gsol/_/chibs su bong bu gwa dmar chibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni/_/ma bdud 'bum phrag pho nyar 'gyed/_/nag mo stong sde las la 'dzud/_/snang srid 
[\[278b.7\]]bdud mo khyod kyi 'khor/_/dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs/_/cang shes bong bu la sogs pa/_/mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang /_/srid pa'i bdud mo 'khor bcas kyis/_/ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod/_/ri rab chen po'i lho 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]phyogs nas/_/gshin rje ya ma rA dza ste/_/gshin rje'i tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengs/_/sku mdog nag po ral pa can/_/gdug pa'i thod sbrul g.yang gzhis brgyan/_/gcan gzan gdug pa'i pags pas dkris/_/sha za'i mgo gcad 
[\[279a.2\]]thod du bcings/_/zhal bgrad mche ba rab tu gtsigs/_/ma he nag po chibs su chibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni/_/gshin rje pho mo pho nyar 'gyed/_/'chi bdag gshin rje btsun mo ste/_/gsod byed mon mo'i tshul 'dzin cing /_/gshin rje mo yi sde dpon 
[\[279a.3\]]bzhengs/_/za byed dur khrod chas kyis brgyan/_/g.yang gzhi nag mo sku la gsol/_/chu glang nag po chibs su chibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]pho mo las la 'dzud/_/snang srid gshin rje khyod kyi 'khor/_/dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir 
[\[279a.4\]]bzhugs/_/ma he chu glang la sogs pa/_/mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang /_/gshin rje pho mo 'khor dang bcas/_/ji ltar bcol pa'i phrin las mdzod/_/ri rab chen po'i nub phyogs nas/_/srin po nag po glog phreng can/_/srin po'i tshogs kyi sde dpon 
[\[279a.5\]]bzhengs/_/sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la/_/glog dang 'od kyi phreng bas brgyan/_/'brug chen 'ur ba chibs su chibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni/_/srin po 'bum phrag pho nyar 'gyed/_/srin mo gsod byed las la 'dzud/_/gcan gzan gdug pa phyi nas rol/_/
[\[279a.6\]]'khor du snang srid srin pos bskor/_/srin mo sbal mgo khrag mig ma/_/srin mo rnams kyi sde dpon bzhengs/_/sku mdog dmar nag 'jigs su rung /_/lus la khrag gi lwa nag gsol/_/rus sbal dkar po'i thor tshugs can/_/chibs su rnga mo gdong drug 
[\[279a.7\]]chibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni/_/srin mo kha 'bar pho nyar 'gyed/_/gdong srin nag mo las la 'dzud/_/snang srid srin mo 'khor dang bcas/_/srog gcod srin po yab yum 'khor/_/dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs/_/'brug sngon rnga 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]mo la sogs pa/_/mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang /_/srin po pho mo'i 'khor gyis bskor/_/ji ltar bcol pa'i phrin las mdzod/_/ri rab chen po'i byang phyogs nas/_/gnod sbyin yak+Sha me dbal can/_/gnod sbyin kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs/_/
[\[279b.2\]]sku mdog mthing sngon 'bar ba la/_/me dpung tshub ma na bzar gsol/_/stag seng rngam pa chibs su chibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni/_/g.yas na me dpal 'bar ba la/_/g.yon na dud 'thul phyu ru ru/_/gnod sbyin stong sde pho nyar 'gyed/_/zhub chas 
[\[279b.3\]]'bum sde las la 'dzud/_/'jig rten gnod sbyin 'khor gyis bskor/_/gnod sbyin chan mo blo mon ma/_/gnod sbyin bu mo gdug pa can/_/nag mo rdo rje lcags mchu ma/_/snyan cha rin chen ne'u les brgyan/_/sku la ba ti nag po gsol/_/chibs su lcags kyi 
[\[279b.4\]]phag mo chibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni/_/nor 'dzin mo ni pho nyar 'gyed/_/blo mon nag mo las la 'dzud/_/gnod sbyin mo ni 'bum sdes bskor/_/shan pa gnod sbyin yab yum 'khor/_/dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs/_/stag seng phag mo 
[\[279b.5\]]la sogs pa'i/_/mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang /_/gnod sbyin pho mo 'khor dang bcas/_/ji ltar bcol pa'i phrin las mdzod/_/ri rab chen po'i steng phyogs su/_/gza' bdud chen po mi bzad pa/_/rog ti khyab 'jug rA hu la/_/gza' 
[\[279b.6\]]bdud sde dpon chen po bzhengs/_/mgo dgu smad sbrul mgo [{]mangs [,]mang [}]lus/_/chibs su 'brug chen glog 'gyu chibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni/_/'brug sgra stong gsum ldi ri ri/_/nam mkha' glog 'od khyugs se khyugs/_/gza' bran rgyu skar pho 
[\[279b.7\]]nyar 'gyed/_/thog ser ki kang drag tu 'bebs/_/gza' bdud stong gi 'khor gyis bskor/_/gnam sman thog gi bu yug ma/_/gdong mo rnams kyi sde dpon bzhengs/_/sku mdog dmar skya mdzes pa la/_/na bza' gu zu mdzes pa gsol/_/'brug sgra glog 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]gis 'od la zhon/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni/_/gza' chen nyi zla klad la bskor/_/rgyu skar tshogs ni zhal la 'char/_/lha sman 'bum ni pho nyar 'gyed/_/gdong zor ma mo las la 'dzud/_/zor gdong srin mo'i 'khor gyis bskor/_/gza' gdong gnam sman yab yum 'khor/_/
[\[280a.2\]]dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs/_/'brug chen 'ur ba la sogs pa'i/_/mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang /_/gza' bdud gdong mo sman dang bcas/_/ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod/_/ri rab chen po'i 'og phyogs nas/_/klu bdud nag mo mgo dgu po/_/klu rnams kun 
[\[280a.3\]]gyi sde dpon yin/_/sku stod dud kha nag po la/_/tsha ba'i 'bu srin nyi li li/_/sku smad dug sbrul nag po la/_/grang ba'i sbal lcong khra la la/_/chibs su chu srin mgo dgu chibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni/_/klu rgyal stong ni pho nyar 'gyed/_/klu bran 
[\[280a.4\]]'bum ni las la 'dzud/_/klu bdud gdug pa'i 'khor gyis bskor/_/klu mo yak+Sha nag mo ni/_/klu bdud ma mo'i sde dpon bzhengs/_/sku mdog dud kha 'jigs bag can/_/sbrul nag gshibs pa'i ral pa las/_/mdze dang shu ba'i tsha tsha 'phro/_/sbrul gyi thul pa na 
[\[280a.5\]]bzar gsol/_/sbal sbrul nye'u tha ra ra/_/rus sbal nag po chibs su chibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni/_/klu rigs lnga yi sprul pa 'gyed/_/sa bdag gdug pa'i pho nya gtong /_/snang srid klu mo'i 'khor dang bcas/_/gdug pa klu bdud yab yum 
[\[280a.6\]]'khor/_/dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs/_/chu srin rus sbal la sogs pa'i/_/mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang /_/klu bdud pho mo yab yum 'khor/_/ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod/_/ri rab chen po mdzes pa yi/_/bang rim 
[\[280a.7\]]gnyis pa'i shar phyogs la/_/gnod sbyin rgyal po gang ba bzang /_/srid pa lha yi sde dpon bzhengs/_/mdog dkar ral ka 'bar ba gsol/_/gnam ru dkar po chibs su chibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni/_/gnod sbyin stong ni pho nyar 'gye/_/
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]b+ha dmag 'bum sde las la 'dzud/_/ba dan can ni g.yas nas rol/_/go mtshon can ni g.yon nas rol/_/gnod sbyin lha yi 'khor dang bcas/_/skyes bu gnam rgyal chen po ni/_/rgyal phran kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs/_/na bza' dar zab ber chen gsol/_/
[\[280b.2\]]rta dkar rngog dmar chibs su chibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni/_/rgyal bran stong sde pho nyar 'gyed/_/grong rgyu phra mo las la 'dzud/_/the rgyal phra mo'i 'khor dang bcas/_/spyi bdud rgyal po gu rum rtse/_/mi ma lha yi sde dpon bzhengs/_/sku stod rgya che'i 
[\[280b.3\]]slag pa gsol/_/'bum bye smad kyi sham thabs can/_/dbu la shel rmog dkar po gsol/_/chibs su rdo rta gro bo chibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni/_/srid pa'i khyung chen klad na lding /_/stag seng tshang ma phyi nas rol/_/sde dpon mched lnga pho nyar 'gyed/_/
[\[280b.4\]]ma sangs spun dgu las la 'dzud/_/lha ma srin gyi 'khor dang bcas/_/skyes bu dkar po sde gsum yang /_/dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs/_/gnam ru rta dkar gro bo chibs/_/mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang /_/dkar po sde gsum 'khor dang 
[\[280b.5\]]bcas/_/ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod/_/bang rim gnyis pa'i lho phyogs nas/_/ma chen srid pa'i rgyal mo ni/_/snang srid ma mo'i sde dpon bzhengs/_/na bza' dar nag gu zu gsol/_/chibs su 'brug mo yid mgyogs chibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul 
[\[280b.6\]]ston pa ni/_/tshogs kyi rje mo pho nyar 'gyed/_/sman mo lnga bcu rtsa brgyad 'khor/_/snang srid ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor/_/e ka dza Ti ral gcig ma/_/bka' yi srung ma'i sde dpon ni/_/sku la na bza' mthing nag gsol/_/chibs su dre rta nag mo chibs/_/
[\[280b.7\]]khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni/_/srin mo nag mo pho nyar 'gyed/_/bal mo nag mo las la 'khol/_/ma mo nag mo sna tshogs sprul/_/smug nag 'bum gyi 'khor dang bcas/_/dpal ldan nag mo mgyogs byed ma/_/mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi sde 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]dpon bzhengs/_/na bza' mthing nag gu zu gsol/_/chibs su so bya rog po zhon/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni/_/rigs kyi mkha' 'gro pho nyar 'gyed/_/sna tshogs mkha' 'gro las la 'dzud/_/snang srid mkha' 'gro'i 'khor gyis 
[\[281a.2\]]bskor/_/dpal ldan nag mo sde gsum yang /_/dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs/_/'brug dang dre rta so bya sogs/_/mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang /_/nag mo sde gsum 'khor dang bcas/_/ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod/_/
[\[281a.3\]]bang rim gnyis pa'i nub phyogs nas/_/skyes bu rdo rje bdud 'dul ni/_/gnod sbyin ru tra'i sde dpon bzhengs/_/na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol/_/ral pa nag po mun ltar gtibs/_/chibs su rta dre nag po chibs/_/zhing lpags gyon pa pho nyar 'gyed/_/
[\[281a.4\]]ral chas bgos pa las la 'dzud/_/snang srid ru tra'i 'khor gyis bskor/_/btsan rgyal srog zan dmar po ni/_/srid pa'i btsan gyi sde dpon bzhengs/_/sku la dar dkar ras dmar gsol/_/chibs su rta dmar glog 'gyu chibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul 
[\[281a.5\]]ston pa ni/_/dbu la bse rmog dmar po gsol/_/btsan po kha bzhi pho nyar 'gyed/_/mgyogs pa sde brgyad las la 'dzud/_/snang srid dregs pa'i btsan gyis bskor/_/skyes bu yam shud dmar po ni/_/btsan 'gong rnams kyi sde dpon bzhengs/_/
[\[281a.6\]]sku la zab dmar ber chen gsol/_/chibs su rta dmar yid mgyogs chibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni/_/g.yas su bro brdung chi li li/_/g.yon na spyugs glu kyu ru ru/_/rta zhon stong ni phyi na 'breng /_/srid pa'i btsan 'gong 'khor 
[\[281a.7\]]dang bcas/_/skyes mchog dmar po sde gsum ni/_/dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs/_/dre nag rta dmar la sogs pa'i/_/mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang /_/dmar po sde gsum 'khor dang bcas/_/ji ltar bcol 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]ba'i phrin las mdzod/_/bang rim bzhi pa'i byang phyogs nas/_/bi nA ya ka bgegs kyi rgyal/_/log 'dren kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs/_/na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol/_/chibs su rta nag mgyogs pa chibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni/_/rgyal 
[\[281b.2\]]chen bzhi ni pho nyar 'gyed/_/phyogs skyong tshogs ni las la 'dzud/_/snang srid bgegs kyi tshogs kyis bskor/_/dbang phyug gu lang nag po ni/_/mu stegs tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengs/_/na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol/_/chibs su stag 
[\[281b.3\]]seng ma he chibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni/_/sa gzhi kun ni dmag gis 'gengs/_/bar snang mtshon dang dar gyis bkang /_/nam mkha' glog dang 'od kyis 'gengs/_/gcan gzan 'dab chags rgyug cing lding /_/mu stegs nag 
[\[281b.4\]]po'i 'khor gyis skor/_/dmu bdud nag mo bkrag med ni/_/dmu bdud tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengs/_/na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol/_/chibs su dmu rta nag po chibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni/_/dmu bdud 'bum phrag pho nyar 'gyed/_/dmu bran 
[\[281b.5\]]stong sde las la 'dzud/_/snang srid dmu yi 'khor gyis bskor/_/skyes mchog nag po sde gsum yang /_/dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs/_/stag seng ma he rta la sogs/_/mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang /_/phyi rol nag po'i tshogs 
[\[281b.6\]]dang bcas/_/ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod/_/ri rab chen po mdzes pa yi/_/bang rim gsum pa'i shar phyogs la/_/tshangs pa dkar po srog gi bdag_/lha chen ging gi sde dpon bzhengs/_/srid pa gsum gyi myur mgyogs par/_/sku la bya rgod thul pa 
[\[281b.7\]]gsol/_/chibs su seng ge dkar po chibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni/_/ging chen [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pho nyar 'gyed/_/ging bdud pho mo las la 'gyed/_/mi rta ra lug bya dang khyi/_/stag dang bya rgod la sogs pa'i/_/mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang /_/bang 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]rim gsum pa'i lho phyogs la/_/gnod sbyin rgyal po nor gyi bdag_/sku la dom gyi slag pa gsol/_/chibs su ba glang sna [{]rings [,]ring [}]chibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni/_/skyes pa brgya dang bud med brgya/_/nyan thos stong dang sngags pa stong /_/
[\[282a.2\]]'bag seng mon bu bsam mi khyab/_/stag seng bal glang spra dang spre/_/mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang /_/bang rim gsum pa'i nub phyogs la/_/rdo rje mdzes pa zhes bya ba/_/'jig rten lha yi sde dpon yin/_/ma thar shel gyi na bza' gsol/_/
[\[282a.3\]]kun kyang shel gyi na bza' gsol/_/ra dkar gnam ru chibs su chibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni/_/'dzin ging bzhi bcu pho nyar 'gyed/_/rang gi 'khor sde las la 'dzud/_/tsa ra bya khyi la sogs pa'i/_/mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang /_/
[\[282a.4\]]bang rim gsum pa'i byang phyogs la/_/lha chen nag po chen po ste/_/bstan pa'i bsrung ba'i sde dpon bzhengs/_/na bza' ljang nag ber nag gsol/_/chibs su bdud rta bra nag chibs/_/khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni/_/lha dmag phyogs kyi dbugs 'byin 
[\[282a.5\]]cing /_/lha min g.yul ngo rab tu bzlog_/phyogs skyong dpal mgon las la 'dzud/_/mi rta ra lug bya dang khyi/_/nag po'i tshogs kyi thugs dam bskang /_/dregs pa'i bka' nyan sgo srung bzhi/_/rang gi bka' nyan 'khor dang bcas/_/dam tshig dbang 
[\[282a.6\]]gis gnas 'dir bzhugs/_/mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang /_/dbang chen sde bzhi 'khor dang bcas/_/ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod/_/bang rim tha ma'i phyogs bzhin/_/phyi yi lha srin sde brgyad dang /_/nang gi lha srin sde brgyad 
[\[282a.7\]]dang /_/sbas pa'i lha srin sde brgyad dang /_/gsang ba'i lha srin sde brgyad dang /_/yang gsang gter gyi lha srin dang /_/drag po sngags kyi lha srin dang /_/las byed myur mgyogs lha srin dang /_/brtags shing chags pa'i lha srin dang /_/sde brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa la/_/
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]khyed kyi thugs dam bskang ba ni/_/shes ldan mi dang cang shes rta/_/theg chen glang dang 'dod 'jo'i ba/_/rin chen lug dang gtsang ldan ra/_/thos gsang khyi dang mkha' lding bya/_/khyed kyi bzhed pa'i dkor du 'bul/_/rin chen rgyan 
[\[282b.2\]]ldan ngar mi dang /_/sems kyi gzugs ldan ngar mi dang /_/sku gsung thugs ldan rgyang bu dang /_/shing glud yul mkhar mtshon pa dang /_/pho glud mda' dang mo glud 'phang /_/rgyal mtshan ba dan rol mo rnams/_/nyid kyi sku mdog dang mthun pa/_/rnal 'byor rnams 
[\[282b.3\]]kyi glud du 'bul/_/dam rdzas sbyar ba'i mchod gtor dang /_/mthun rdzas ldan pa'i bshos cha dang /_/snang gsal 'od ldan mar me dang /_/rgyan ldan mdzes pa'i gling tshad dang /_/mdzes pa'i gzugs dang snyan pa'i sgra/_/zhim pa'i dri dang bda' ba'i ro/_/khyed kyi 
[\[282b.4\]]thugs dam bskang phyir 'bul/_/'jig rten dregs pa 'khor dang bcas/_/sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dgongs te/_/mdos glung mthun rdzas bzhes pa'i dkor/_/sna tshogs sbyar ba 'di bzhes la/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa khyed kyis srungs/_/dkon mchog dbu 'phang khyed kyis 
[\[282b.5\]]stod/_/rnal 'byor sku dgra khyed kyis sgrol/_/sgrub pa po la bar gcod pa'i/_/stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs rigs dang /_/bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams dang /_/glo bur gnod pa brgyad cu gcig_/ye 'drog sum brgya drug cu'i tshogs/_/dus min 'chi ba rnam brgyad dang /_/
[\[282b.6\]]gshis ngan 'gum pa brgyad cu gcig_/gzugs can dgra dang gzugs med bgegs/_/rmi lam mtshan ltas ngan pa rnams/_/zhi dang bsal zhing bzlog pa dang /_/gdul dang tshar gcad las mdzod cig_/zhes brjod rang gi mthun rdzas bstabs/_/bskang bzlog gsad dang 
[\[282b.7\]]gso la sogs/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i phrin las bcol/_/gang la dmigs pa de bzhin 'grub/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/'jig rten gyi dregs pa can gyi sde dpon 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mchod bstod rgya chen po'i sgo nas nye bar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas rab 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]tu bshad bya ba/_/dregs pa'i 'khor tshogs 'di rnams kun/_/ngo bo rang rig byang chub sems/_/ma skyes dbyings las g.yos pa med/_/'jig rten gnas dang mthun 'jug cing /_/mchod dang bstod pas mnyes 'gyur bas/_/'jig rten mchod bstod 
[\[283a.2\]]zhes su brjod/_/phyi nang gsang ba'i bye brag ste/_/snang dang srid pa'i dkyil 'khor kun/_/gsang ba'i bdag po de nyid dang /_/gnas skabs mchod bstod phyi yin no/_/dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin las byung /_/rang gi snang ba 'dus pa'i tshogs/_/dbang po'i yul gyi longs 
[\[283a.3\]]spyod dang /_/gtsang sbra'i rtog pa sbyang ba'i rdzas/_/'dod chags bzhi dang 'bru bcud rtsi/_/gnyis med pha rol snang byed pa/_/rang gi ngang du mnyes byed cing /_/so so'i mtshan dang dpe byad dag_/nges par bstan pa nang gi'o/_/sems dang sems la bstar ba'i tshogs/_/
[\[283a.4\]]thams cad ye nas dkyil 'khor che/_/ma bcos rang bzhin lhun gyis grub/_/lung nas ma lus 'dus pa las/_/chos gzhan med de yul nyid dang /_/yul du 'dzin pa snang ba'i bdag_/gnyis med rtogs shing khong du chud/_/mchod bstod rab tu gsang ba yi/_/lus las 
[\[283a.5\]]sprul zhing bsgrubs pas sku/_/'bru bcu sgra yi 'khor lo gsung /_/rang grol snying po ma bcos thugs/_/lha klu gnod sbyin btsan dang bdud/_/srin po gza' dang mo rigs rnams/_/dregs shing gdug pa khro zhing gtum/_/myur mgyogs rmugs shing 'thibs pa dang /_/
[\[283a.6\]]dregs dang dbyings pa so so'i sde/_/ri rab bshos gtsang rgyan dang bcas/_/'bru lug snying rtse tsa ru'i dbyibs/_/dkar dmar bcud ldan dmigs kyis mchod/_/pha dang rgyal po grogs dang lha/_/ma dang rje khol bran lta bu/_/brten pa rang gi tshul yin no/_/che btsan 
[\[283a.7\]]dbang gi dngos grub dang /_/longs spyod 'phel zhing mngag par blang /_/rgyud 'jam skyabs che bka' nyan zhing /_/drag rtsal ldan zhing slar mi ldog_/shin tu nye ba yon tan te/_/rang la rtsub cing 'tshe ba dang /_/longs spyod mi 'byor mi 'phrod dang /_/bloM bur nad kyis gzir 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]byed cing /_/slar ldog bkra shis nyams pa dang /_/bsgo ba mi nyan don med cing /_/rang rgyud rtsub cing khengs pa dang /_/rigs rgyud ma smin kun gyis brnyas/_/bsam don mi grub mnga' thang nyams/_/rgyud don sbas pa ma shes skyan/_/khrims kyi bdag po lta bu'i lha/_/gnad 
[\[283b.2\]]kyis bcing zhing bsgrub par bya/_/dbang chen pha dang mtshungs pa'i bdud/_/mtshungs med grogs dang 'dra ba'i btsan/_/gnod sbyin khrims kyi gtso lta bu/_/srin po srog la rgol ba'i gshed/_/gza' rgod lag yan gzhon lta bu/_/sdong bu dug sbrul lta bu'i 
[\[283b.3\]]klu/_/mo rgyud dbang chen rje dpon ma/_/mtshungs ldan de yi gnyen pos bsgrub/_/khugs su ma bcug bsgo mi nyan/_/se long gnad med bdud du 'gyur/_/bcud phur ma thebs slar la ldog_/rang gi rab rol ma bzhar g.yel/_/lto ba ma dkrugs las mi
