[\[283b.4\]]myur/_/log non ma ldan bdag nyid stob/_/dbang du ma 'dus bsgo mi nyan/_/gnad kyi man ngag brgyad kyis ni/_/mchod bstod bsgrub ste phrin las bcol/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyi zab pa'i mchod bstod gnad 
[\[283b.5\]]kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya/_/'jig rten dregs pa'i sde dpon rnams/_/drag po'i las la sbyar ba ni/_/dur khrod gdug pa'i gnas dag tu/_/rtsa ba'i bsnyen pa sngon song nas/_/so so'i mthun pa'i rdzas bsar te/_/
[\[283b.6\]]drag po'i las kyi khang pa ni/_/e dbyibs sum cu ldan par bsham/_/phyi nang gsang ba sku gsung thugs/_/gnas byin brlab dang bskang dang mchod/_/spyi dang so sor bsngags pa dag_/rab tu bde bar 'dod pas dmigs/_/gzugs sgra bsam pa'i nus pa yis/_/lus 
[\[283b.7\]]dang lus kyi 'phrul 'khor dang /_/srog dang srog gi gnyen po yis/_/sems dang sems kyi ngo bo las/_/phyi nang kun du bsngags pa ste/_/'phro 'du 'od kyis drang zhing dgug_/rang gzhan dmigs pa de la stim/_/sha lus khrag sogs ma lus bzas/_/dregs 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]pa'i sde dpon sku gsung thugs/_/ma lus mnyes pa 'di yis bya/_/gang la dmigs pa tshad kyis sgrol/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi brtul zhugs kyis/_/bul dang myur ba blo yi stobs/_/'di la the tshom mi bya ste/_/rdo rje 'chang chen gsang ba'i bka'/_/
[\[284a.2\]]gal te 'bar bas mngon spyod cing /_/myur du 'pho bar bya ba ni/_/rno dbal tsha rtsub dri nga ba'i/_/yam shing gdug pas dbyibs ldan brtsig_/gdol ba rigs ngan shan pa dang /_/g.yung mo grogs bral khyim gyi mes/_/spar zhing dug khrag mngar ba la/_/gzugs 
[\[284a.3\]]brnyan rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i/_/slar yang dmigs te lhag ma dbul/_/gtso dang 'khor gyi rab phye ba'i/_/drag po'i tshig gis rab tu bgrang /_/dregs pa'i bdag po so so yi/_/che brjod gnad dang bcas pa yis/_/stab cing sbyin pa rim bzhin bya/_/drang srong phrin 
[\[284a.4\]]las rdzogs par bskul/_/thal chen dang ni drag po'i rdzas/_/rme khrag gsum dang gsod byed gsum/_/mtshon bral rin chen gsum gyi dbyig_/rang byung bkra shis bzlog pa'i rdzas/_/nang du 'du 'phror sbyar ba ni/_/sgra tshig ting nge 'dzin ldan pas/_/stobs chen 'khor 
[\[284a.5\]]los dbab cing 'phang /_/dregs pa 'khor bcas las su dmigs/_/gzhan yang mchod rdzas gzugs brnyan byas/_/rab tu bstan pa'i dmigs pas bstim/_/'gyu gnas sa dang chu phug dang /_/sra gsher 'thab dang phung shul dang /_/rgya mtsho'i dbus dang lam po 
[\[284a.6\]]che/_/mtshon gyis brdegs dang rlung gis bskyal/_/bag med lhung zhing me chus 'joms/_/lugs nas byung ba'i rten 'brel te/_/brnag pa'i yid kyis 'dzin phur gdab/_/gdug byed 'khor dang zas su gtad/_/ji srid 'khor ba ma stongs par/_/thar par mi 'gyur las 
[\[284a.7\]]kyi ging /_/byams dang snying rje'i sems ma rtogs/_/'di ltar mngon par spyad pa yis/_/bstan la rab sdang phyir gyur pa'i/_/rjes 'brang log par lta ba rnams/_/tshar gcod sgrol zhing 'dul ba yi/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po'i phrin 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]las drag po'i las la sbyar ba'i/_le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni/_/'jig rten dregs pa rang gi gnad/_/gsang ba'i snying po drag shul gzungs/_/kun bsdus dril dang phye mas mnan/_/badzra sarba duSh+TAn/_e ka pa ra asta na 
[\[284b.2\]]ya/_ma he shwa ra de ba de bi/_du phrag dun ting ma ya/_pre ta bi kr-i sta na rak+Sha rak+Sho yak+Sha k+Shi ta/_piSh+Ti pa tra a se la dza nA ga gu ling sha dzaH/_tsa du tri tsa ra tsa la ma du tri/_ma ma ru lu man+t+ra rA dza du ma ti/_ma kA la ru tra tIk+Sh+Na tir+thi ka tha/_a b+hi shu tri pa sha li ha~M sha~M tri dzaH/_rA dza ging+ka 
[\[284b.3\]]ra/_sa du tri nA tha kA la A gats+tsha/_hring hring dzaH/_bod pa'i sngags so/_/badzra sarba duSh+TAn e ka pa ra sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta a gats+tsha/_ba lin+ta grih+Na i ma~M ta gr-ih+Na i ma~M ta gr-ih+Nan+tu ma hA ga Na pU dza kha kha khA hi khA hi/_'di dag sbyar bas mchod par 'gyur/_/sarba a yu mi tra sid+d+hi pu tra brta ni 
[\[284b.4\]]sid+d+hi pu tra ba hu b+ha dra bA su d+ha ra rat+na rat+na buSh+TiM sid+d+hi/_ma hA dz+nyA na sarba d+harma gar+b+ha kA ya bAk+tsit+ta sid+d+hi sid+d+hi/_pha la sid+d+hi ma hA sid+d+hi a be sha ya a/_ha ha hi hoH_rab tu sbyar bas dngos grub blang /_/sarba sha tru~M yak+Sha rbad rbad b+h+yo b+h+yo/_'di yis rab tu rbad par bya/_/nr-i hu ra thu~Ms dzaHdzaH
[\[284b.5\]]sha tru~M tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/_rU pa ya kan+da rbud rbud phaT phaT mA ra mA ra thu~Ms thu~Ms/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_thun rbad thun rbad/_'di yis dmigs pa rab tu gsad/_/ma mA ra ya phri pre ta ka hring hring /_tri sha pha li rU pa ya/_bin+d+ha bin+d+ha/_hu lu hu lu/_rbad 
[\[284b.6\]]nAn la~M nAn/_o~M nAn hU~M nAn/_sta~M b+ha ya sta~M b+ha ya nAn zhes pa yis ni mnan par bya/_sarba mA ra ta ka ra~M ra~M/_dz+wa la ra~M dz+wa la ra~M/_s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/_ho ha ya ho ha ya/_ra~M tsa ya ra~M ku ya zhes pas ma lus bsreg par bya/_mA ra sha tru~M thun b+h+yo thum ril b+h+yo na he thun/_A be sha 
[\[284b.7\]]ya b+h+yo/_dmigs pa 'di yis 'phang bar bya'o/_/badzra uts+tsha Ta ya phaT a gri sarba b+h+yo bzlog_/sa ma ya rbad sa myags bzlog_/pha rol nus pa 'di yis bzlog_/ma hA b+ha ri sha ya/_a b+he sha ye pra tsa ya/_be tsa ya be tsa ya zhi bas lugs dbyung chu 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]dbab pa'o/_/nA ga gra he bi tsa ya phro~M phro~M hril hril/_shar shar/_ra~M na tsag ne phro~M hril shar shar phob phob/_drag pos bzlog cing bstab pa'o/_/ma hA shAn+tiM buSh+TeM wa sh+yaM ku ru mA ra ya dza ya karma ma li a mu ki sid+d+hi su sid+d+hi ka ra swa sti swA hA/_/
[\[285a.2\]]phrin las thams cad rab sgrub pa'i/_/mthun pa'i rdzas dang ting 'dzin gyis/_/las kyi khyad par so sor dbye/_/gnas sgyur dang ni grub pa'i mtha'/_/snying rje byams pas rab skul zhing /_/kun du khyab pa'i mchod sbyin bya/_/zhi dang rgyas dang dbang du bya/_/drag pos bsgral 
[\[285a.3\]]zhing tshar gcod pa'i/_/las kun rang gzhan don du spyad/_/'jig rten gnas shing srog dang snying /_/yi ge gsal bar rang 'byung gnas/_/mngon du rgyu ba thugs ka ste/_/ring thung pho mo khrag dang dus/_/chags sdang snying srog snying rje gtser/_/rdo rje pad+ma rlung 
[\[285a.4\]]dang gnas/_/thabs dang shes rab chos can dang /_/chos nyid las dang 'bras bu yis/_/mi 'tshang gnad 'tshang bong dang drang /_/grogs dang ldan pas las la sbyar/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyi las sna tshogs kyi 
[\[285a.5\]]rtsa ba'i snying po gnad kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/'jig rten dregs pa'i gtso chen rnams/_/tshul bzhin rab tu bsgrub pa yis/_/grub cing nye ba'i rtags rnams ni/_/nyams dang rbad rtags rmi lam rtags/_/'di la 
[\[285a.6\]]so sor 'byung 'gyur te/_/dga' zhing mdangs ldan stobs rnyed dang /_/bde dang rtogs pa spro bskyed cing /_/mngon rgyu yid kyis gdeng thob kyis/_/nyam nga bag tsha dogs med cing /_/nus ldan phrin las mthar phyin rtogs/_/'di dag la sogs rim 
[\[285a.7\]]par 'byung /_/lus 'jam dbugs kyis mi gnod cing /_/yang zhing brtan la khyad par dga'/_/nad dang gdon gyis brdzi mi nus/_/'byung ba'i nus pas mi skyod cing /_/kha dog dang ldan sdug cing mdzes/_/'di la sogs pa lus 'byung gda'/_/
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]ji ltar bsgo ba gzhan gyis 'dzin/_/rang dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/_/mthun pa'i tshul gyis mi dor la/_/snyan dang mi snyan ci brjod rnams/_/tshangs pa yi dbyangs bzhin du 'ong /_/grag thos tsam gyis dbang du byed/_/tshul mdzes 'jug 
[\[285b.2\]]pa ngag gi brda/_/gang la brtsams pa de 'grub cing /_/ma zhum mi spor mi 'dor bas/_/dbang dang ldan zhing mi g.yo la/_/gsang ba'i mthu stobs rab tu thob/_/yid kyi yul du brda 'byung ba'i/_/snga phyi de ma thag pa'o/_/bag chags ma yin rmi lam ni/_/
[\[285b.3\]]rgyal po mkhan po slob dpon dang /_/che btsan rigs ldan rgyan bcas ldan/_/gcan gzan 'dab chags dud 'gro dang /_/skyes pa bud med bus pa sogs/_/rang gi gnas su lhags pa ni/_/nye bar 'grub pa'i rtags yin no/_/bran 'bangs mngag pa'i 
[\[285b.4\]]tshul 'chang zhing /_/bka' bsgo las byed nyan pa rtags/_/ring ba'i gnas nas glu len cing /_/rgyang mig blta ba g.yel ba'i rtags/_/rang la chad pa'i las rtsom zhing /_/nyes lan 'ded la bzlog pa'i rtags/_/zas skom 'dod cing 'khrig 
[\[285b.5\]]lan bsnyag_/rang nyid gnong 'gyod ma skongs rtags/_/'dzom zhing ngud mos 'debs byed pa/_/ma dag lus snang nyams pa'i rtags/_/rang gi bsgo ba mi nyan zhing /_/slar zhing tshul la 'khol 'dod pa/_/gnyen pos dbang du ma gyur rtags/_/
[\[285b.6\]]mtshon cha brdung zhing tshad ma ldan/_/nus med bya ba mi 'grub pas/_/sngags kyi nus pa ma grub rtags/_/gzhan 'dod rang la med pa dang /_/rang gi yod pa 'dod med rnams/_/mchod bskang thun rdzas ma tshang rtags/_/sha rus khrag sogs 
[\[285b.7\]]longs spyod cing /_/ngo mthon rab tu che ba na/_/las byas 'grub pa'i rtags yin no/_/pha rol dmag tshogs ma byung zhing /_/sgo med khang par bdag zhugs la/_/ngan sngags gzhan gyis bzlog pa'i rtags/_/bye brag sde brgyad so so ni/_/mi dang dud 'gro 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]'dab chags sogs/_/pho tshogs nag po bdud kyi rtags/_/mo tshogs rgyan bzang ma mo ste/_/che btsan 'bag seng gtsug lag khang /_/bus pa spra spre rgyal po'i rtags/_/mi rta khra spyang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]ni/_/brag btsan ri btsan rtags yin 
[\[286a.2\]]no/_/chu gnas dud 'gro klu yi rtags/_/ma he ra lug mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang /_/mun pa bu yug gza' yi rtags/_/skyes pa chas bzang 'byor ba can/_/ri mtsho la gnas gnod sbyin rtags/_/nya pa shan pa bya ba dang /_/dmag gi go mtshon srin 
[\[286a.3\]]po'i rtags/_/'di dag sngar bshad bzang ngan sbyar/_/bye brag sgrub pa'i rtags su 'gyur/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po bsgrub pa'i rtags kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad 
[\[286a.4\]]pa/_/dregs pa can gyi khyad par rdzas/_/mdzes pa'i gzugs brnyan sku yi rten/_/ming nas bod pa gsung gi rten/_/phyag mtshan dam pa thugs kyi rten/_/lug g.yag dkar po sbal sbrul nya/_/glang rta sngon po rin po che/_/g.yul bshams myur 
[\[286a.5\]]bsgral bya gcan dang /_/rnel bu shel nag bya nag dang /_/rta lug khyi dang rgod gnag dang /_/ra phag bya khyi dkar po dang /_/kla klo ra rog dom khyi gnag_/sbrul nag bya rgod ra skyes dang /_/rta rwa bya khyi dmar po yi/_/snying khrag mgo dang rgyal mtshan ni/_/lha 
[\[286a.6\]]klu gnod sbyin srin po dang /_/ma mo bdud dang rgyal po ging /_/gshin rje gza' dang btsan rnams kyi/_/rim bzhin so so brten pa'i rdzas/_/rab tu gsang ba'i nyid yin no/_/e ldan gdug bcas rgyud med kyi/_/thod pa mtshon cha phur pa dag_/dug khrag 
[\[286a.7\]]rin chen drag po'i 'bru/_/kun tshogs rab tu gsad pa'i rdzas/_/klu bzung snod ni sha khrag bcas/_/ru [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rigs med myur song chu/_/myu gu sna tshogs dri ldan rdzas/_/chu drag dba' rabs dud pa'i rdzas yin no/_/mchod rten ri rab rgya gram bcas/_/rme rdzas 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]rigs ngan mgo bo gsum/_/dmigs pa'i 'bab rdzas pad+ma ni/_/slar la bzlog pa'i rdzas yin no/_/nad gdug ba~M ril mgo rkang rnams/_/rab tu mnan pa'i rdzas yin no/_/dug khrag tshogs dang mtshan ma ngan/_/dmigs pa'i rten la 'phang ba'i rdzas/_/
[\[286b.2\]]ngan pa'i sa yi rten khang dang /_/gdug cing rab tu tsha ba'i shing /_/'bru nag dug khrag bsres pa'i rdzas/_/gzhan yang dbang can dregs pa'i 'khor/_/so so'i rigs dang sder bcas pa'i/_/mthun dang mi mthun gtsang dang sme/_/bsngags pa'i kun 
[\[286b.3\]]rdzas shes par 'gyur/_/ma 'ongs dus na rdo rje 'chang /_/rang gi rig 'dzin byang chub sems/_/brtul zhugs can gyis 'grub pa yis/_/dbus dang mtha' 'khob yul rnams dang /_/sangs rgyas zhing gi 'jig rten khams/_/kun nas sde 
[\[286b.4\]]dpon g.yog bcas pa'i/_/yid dang dngos po'i lus can rnams/_/khams dang rigs pa bsam pa dang /_/skyed pa brten gnas yo byad dang /_/ma lus rdzogs par rab tu rtogs/_/shes ldan mig can rnams la ston/_/de tshe dregs 
[\[286b.5\]]pa'i gtso chen rnams/_/da lta nga yis gdams pa yin/_/yang dag don la ma 'da' cig_/khyed rnams kyang ni dus nam zhig_/las kyi gnas ngan len spangs te/_/byang chub sa la myur 'gro yis/_/de bas bka' yi dam mnos la/_/ji ltar 
[\[286b.6\]]dmigs pa bzhin sgrubs shig_/gsang chen nga yi bstan pa'i tshul/_/phyi rol phyogs la sogs pa yis/_/nyams shing smas par mi 'gyur bas/_/rgyas shing bstan par khyod kyis byos/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen 
[\[286b.7\]]po'i rten rdzas dang las kyi gnyer bsgo ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid gsang ba chen po'i sku'i rnam par rol pa chen po de dag nyid kyi sku la 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]rab tu bsdus pa mdzad de/_/dgyes pa'i gsung gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kye ma 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams/_/bdud dang gshin rje la sogs pa'i/_/'jig rten dbang chen gtso chen rnams/_/mthar thug mya ngan 
[\[287a.2\]]'das nas kyang /_/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_bstan pa'i tha tshig sgrub pa dang /_/rnal 'byor lam gyi grogs mdzad phyir/_/drag po'i sku gsung thugs nyid dang /_/yon tan phrin las sna tshogs ston/_/phyi ma'i dus na rig pa 
[\[287a.3\]]'dzin/_/skyes bu brtson ldan rnams kyi ni/_/gnyis su 'dzin par yang mi bya/_/yul snang phyi nang ma lus kun/_/rang rig sems kyi rgyal por bsgrub/_/de ni ma bcos yul mi bral/_/ma chad ma lhung bdag po med/_/gnyis med mnyam nyid 
[\[287a.4\]]lhun gyis grub/_/nges 'gyur spang blang rtsol sems bral/_/ma lus rtsa ba snying gi srog_/de nyid shes bya rab tu blang /_/dbang gi rgyal po 'char bar 'gyur/_/gal te nga dang dregs pa can/_/so so rang rgyud ldan pa yis/_/gnyis 'dzin yid 
[\[287a.5\]]kyi rtogs sod cing /_/mtshan mar rab tu sgom byed par/_/rkang med khams gsum bgrod 'dod cing /_/mig med stong gsum blta dang mtshungs/_/bdud bzhi dga' ba skyed par byed/_/de bas rigs mchog ma rnams kyis/_/gsang bdag 
[\[287a.6\]]nga nyid shes par gyis zhes bka' stsal nas/_nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po chos nyid de bzhin nyid spros dang bral ba'i dbyings su thim par mdzad do/_/'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po 'khor dang bcas pa chos sku mthar thug tu 
[\[287a.7\]]sgrub par gdams pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//dregs pa can gyi sde dpon 'jig rten mchod bstod sgrub pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//mang+ga laM//
